review_text: An adorable romper! Belt and zipper were a little hard to navigate in a full day of wear/bathroom use, but that's to be expected. Wish it had pockets, but other than that-- absolutely perfect! I got a million compliments.

This dress is just darling. I would absolutely wear it again. It fits true to size with a little room. I have larger hips and this dress fit fine and highlighted my smaller waist.  It isn't too tight around your middle and I was really comfortable in this one. I wore it out to dinner in Vegas and really felt amazing.

This dress fit great, but it did ride up as I walked. I didn't let it get me down, because it looked so great. 
 We were off to a concert that night, but stopped off for an impromptu renewal of our vows with Elvis - this dress was so fun and just added to the tone of our evening.

Lovely dress for a summer vacation. Felt elegant and the material was thick enough to be able to wear any type of undergarments. The only downside was the middle button over my chest would come undone sometimes, but still one of my favorite dresses rented from RTR
Incredibly comfortable and really flattering. Wore it to brunch on vacation. Highly recommend.
Comfortable and so cute that it transitions perfectly from day to an evening of pub crawling in New Orleans.
So I didn't get a backup of this dress because it looked online like I would be charged extra for the backup. This was small enough that I couldn't zip it up and it was unwearable.
I wore this to Disneyworld, and it was perfect! Lightweight and forgiving, but most of all happy! I will definitely rent this again this spring.
I thought the overlay was going to be gold but it is bronze/copper. Shoes were a challenge.
review_summary: The lace overlay is very pretty. BRONZE.

review_text: Loved this romper! Wore it out a couple nights while on vacation, it was too good to only wear once! I am 5'4'' and it was the just right length on me, otherwise may have been a big too short. Runs true to size.
I'm 5'8 and I should have gotten the long instead of the regular length it was a bit high water
review_summary: It was well fitting and it supported my boobs without a bra!

review_text: This dress was a replacement for a dress that came in damaged from a previous renter.  I am usually a Medium in Herve but I can fit the small- and this dress was only available in a small.  I wanted a " WOW" Herve for one night of my recent Vegas trip and this one did the job!  It is very sexy!

I wore this dress for both an out of state wedding and my vacation. It was very on trend with the off the shoulder sleeves and looked very high end with the fabric and print. It was full length on me, and the adjustable straps helped. I was very pleased with this dress and got a lot of compliments. Also it was easy to travel with, as it didn't wrinkle when I packed in my suitcase, which is always a plus!
I actually loved this jumpsuit. I'd love to own it.  Sadly, I didn't get to wear it because of shipping issues.  But I did try it on!
review_summary: Sadly the outfit didn't arrive in time for me to take it with me.  So nothing. :(

review_text: It is stunning! Very picturesque. I wore with high-waisted pants and it hung out perfectly. Not too long to ruin the line.
This is so cute and lightweight. You'll want to wear it everyday! It is a bit see-thru though so I wore it as a coverup over my swimsuit.

We went to Riveria Maya for our honeymoon, and I wore this the night we went to the fancier restaurant at our resort. My husband loved it! It's such a fun and flattering dress, will definitely rent again. It is fairly snug around the chest.

This dress is literally amazing!  I wore it in Cabo at a resort and people complemented me all night.  I didn't take a picture in it and am kicking myself for that!  It is so flattering.  I am 5'4" and 125 with an athletic build.  I will rent this over and over!
This dress was amazing, the only thing I would warn ladies about is that it's super short.  Be sure to have a pair of sturdy knickers on!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a Las Vegas trip - the dress is a true "party dress"! So fun and flattering!

review_text: I loved the material in this top, as it was very high end.  But the white part is see through and very white so it does not match any other shade of white besides pure white.  Normally, I am a size medium on the top for almost everything but the medium was a little too big in the shoulders and, sadly, the small was too small.
review_summary: Love this top but it is a little big and see through.

review_text: Flirty, cute, and pretty comfy. Definitely is a bit heavier and shorter than it looks (see other reviews), but I wore it in southern Spain and it was still easy/not too hot. Makes your shoulders look amazing, great color, and can be dressed up or down.

I was expecting 70 or such degree dresses casual for a weekend away.  This was a perfect 10 in weight of jacket and the colors vibrant din print more fun then a sweater and a nice change up from jean jacket.
review_summary: The perfect layer and pop of fun

review_text: This dress was perfect for the Coachella music festival. It was such a great option for the hot desert... and it was so much fun pairing it with some black booties and a wild fanny pack. :)
review_summary: Perfect dress for a music festival!

review_text: The fit was perfect...not stretchy so make sure you order the correct size.  Gorgeous dress the only flaw was the inside of my upper arm rubbing against the fabric the sequins were rough on my skin but definitely not enough to bother or regret this dress
review_summary: I wore it out for a night out in Vegas beautiful dress!

review_text: Loved this jacket! I paired it with a navy tank (yes, I didn't look close enough and discovered there's actually navy AND black accents on the jacket!), white skinny jeans and my favorite pink shoes. I was able to stay warm and feel fashionable at the same time.
review_summary: Adorable jacket with the perfect pop of PINK!

review_text: Wore this to Vegas for the 4th of July! It was flattering, glamorous, and perfect! Wish I owned it. Only thing was that the sequins under the arm start to really hurt by the end of the night, but I have sensitive skin.

I was so excited about this dress.  Unfortunately, it arrived in a 10R rather than the 10L I ordered, and so it barely touched the floor when I wore flats.  Not a good look.  Otherwise, it is a beautiful, classic silhouette, and the beadwork on the shoulder is stunning.
Great fit! Lots of compliments!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in St. Lucia!

review_text: Loved the pattern on this dress but it was too wide around the waist. I wore a cross-body purse with it which gave me some shape but it looked a bit like a maternity dress!

I loved this dress! Usually mumus do not work for me- I'm on a slender build so I usually look swallowed up in them, but for whatever reason, this dress looked amazing. I think it's probably a sisterhood of the traveling dress type deal. I loved the ties around the neck and sleeve details. I wasn't sunburned but it would've been great for too much sun due to the loose fit or if on vacation you are ready for a big dinner, you won't have to worry about looking great versus eating all the seafood you can!
review_summary: Perfect vacation dress after a long day in the sun!

review_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress! I rented this for a beach vacation (easy to pack!) and paired it with a jean jacket for a casual dinner. The material was super light and breathable - I felt very comfortable wearing this in the Caribbean heat. The back dips low, so I opted not to wear a bra, which was not a problem because the material in the bust has some gathering (plus, I'm not that busty!). The lengths of the straps are adjustable, so I didn't have to worry about pinning the front. It was roomy in the hips. The Petite length was perfect for me to wear with flat sandals. If I was to wear this dress with heels, I would have gotten the Regular length. Over 50% of the time I wear a S in dresses, but the XS fit me, no problem.
review_summary: Absolutely beautiful dress for a beach vacation!

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation on the Cape and it was exactly what I wanted. As a few other reviews mentioned this size 2 had a broken zipper and it was extremely difficult to zipper it. However, once I got it on, I loved it. As with most Kate Spade dresses, the size 2 was slightly tight in the chest area but not uncomfortable. This dress is also forgiving in the stomach since it flairs out a bit. Besides the zipper issue, I really enjoyed this dress.
review_summary: Perfect for happy hour with friends!

review_text: The floral appliques on this dress are gorgeous. I wore it for Easter. I do think it was a little too long (I'm 5'4"), but didn't look bad. Flattering yet conservative.

I wish it would have been longer! It was too short for me in the torso, meaning that it didn't cover me appropriately up top. The inseam length in the pant was perfect for flats or a small heel, but it needed to be an inch or two longer in the torso for me to wear. Otherwise the size was perfect. Super bummed because it was so cute!
review_summary: I was unable to wear this because it wasn't long enough in the torso.

review_text: This dress was super comfortable and fit perfectly. I wore this dress for a dinner out and I would definitely rent it again!
review_summary: Great dress for a dinner out!

review_text: I wore this to a music festival in NYC and got photographed by a women's lifestyle magazine! Loved wearing this. Great length on the shorts and the sleeves were very fun.

Runs a bit large - size down if in between sizes
Great color but not garrish
Wore it with mid-heal pointed toe pumps and a statement necklace like the model
review_summary: I wore this to a bachelorette weekend bar crawl with a "bright and tight" theme!

review_text: I am 5'9" and a 38C or 36D and this dress showed side boob on me so I didn't wear it and sent it back same day.
review_summary: I don't recommend for 36D or up

review_text: Cuts in a little too far on the top, so it you are sensitive about arm chub you might need a sweater
review_summary: Great dress, can be worn dressed up or casual

review_text: Very comfortable and can be worn literally ALL NIGHT. I am 5ft tall and it hit me right above the knee, I can see the dress being a lot shorter for someone a few inches taller then me.  I usually wear a 6, I ended up wearing the 8 to have a little bit more breathing room.
review_summary: Perfect for the Britney Spears concert in Vegas!

review_text: I felt super comfortable in this dress. You will feel like a princess when you wear it.
review_summary: It was an informal girls night out.

review_text: Great casual dress, perfect for traveling and roaming around a city or day on your feet. Fits true to size, and isn't inappropriately short. I wasn't given the option to buy it for some reason in my shipment, but I had I been I might have considered. Really flattering and great staple.
review_summary: Lovely casual dress - great for traveling.

review_text: The colors on this dress are much more vibrant in person then in photos, definite plus. It also runs a bit short and a bit small so size up one. Perfect for most spring time events

This is such a cute and fun little dress. The colors are really bright, and the dress is perfect for the summertime.  The bottom portion was a little on the tighter side, so I went with the 4 instead of my usual size 2.  I was happy I sized up! Also, the mid section is really loose, so this dress is great if you want to hide your stomach. Overall, it was really comfortable, cute, and a great dress!
review_summary: The perfect dress for a summer day

review_text: the belt is a little tattered but it was fine
review_summary: Really fabulous for my cruise. Made for some good photos

review_text: Perfect for a tiny waist, wider hips and thighs. Super flattering. I'm between a 4-6 and a 4 fit perfect.
review_summary: This skirt screams fun! It fits well and covers up any insecurities. I got compliments galore!

review_text: herve leger dresses are my very favorite, as they always fit so beautifully and feel so good.  the fabric is heavy and the dress is weighty.  it goes on very tight, but once the material warms up, it stretches perfectly to fit my body, and is so easy to wear.  no spanx, no bra -- this dress just holds everything right where it should be.  the ombre greys are gorgeous, and having the darkest color at the waist is brilliant.
I wore this my first night in Fort Laurderdale. We went to a low key patio bar event. This was an easy piece to dress up, comfortable and stylish.
This is the ultimate vacation dress. I wore it to brunch with sandals and to a nice dinner with heels. Highly recommend it.
review_summary: So many compliments. So easy to wear!

review_text: Great fit! Very cute!

I love this romper, I have rented it several times. It's perfect for a vacation because it travels so well. I find that it runs bigger up top and I typically size down to  accommodate that. The only tough part is that the buttons in the back require a friend. Pictured is me wearing it super dressed down to a sporting event, which I then changed my shoes and wore to dinner later on.
review_summary: perfect outfit to pack for a vacation

review_text: Had a hard time giving it back! Really flattering.
This is a fun dress! It was comfortable and a good fit, I am 5'4" and it was a good length! I could wear it for any occasion! Will rent again!

This dress should just be renamed "Vegas" because it was perfect for Sin City.  I wore this out and received compliments, looks, etc. but still felt SO comfortable. I felt more comfortable wearing the stick on bra, but I wasn't able to hook it in the front - it still worked just fine and once this dress was on, nothing moved.  Classic Herve and I am so glad this dressed lived up to my expectations!
This fit very well and I loved the color and fit!  Would rent again

I love Free People in general so had to try this one. The fabric feels very high quality and love the double layer wrap. I found the fit on this to be a little weird but probably because I'm short-waisted and only 5'3". The top portion of the dress was a little long for me and kind of fell over at the bustline rather than standing up like it does on the model. The ties were also comically long on me no matter how I tied them. The skirt fit perfectly though so I'd say this one is true to size. Overall super cute dress, maybe better for taller ladies.
review_summary: Cute, well-made dress for every day.

review_text: Don't know if I've ever felt more attractive than when wearing this dress.  I just float around in it feeling amazing.  Rented it twice now.  Very comfortable to wear, never was worried about wardrobe malfunctions.  Cutouts are very flattering!  I wore this around London and Paris and Italy.  This dress is extremely versatile because if you bring a sweater with you, the sweater can cover all the non-conservative parts of the dress and instantly turn the dress into something very conservative.  Might consider sizing down if you are small-busted and on the fence between sizes, because if this dress is too loose for you on top, you might have to constantly fidget with the top.  It worked great for me, though.  Very comfortable, not tight.
review_summary: Super flattering, great fabric for hot days, gorgeous cutouts, well-lined skirt

review_text: I got a bigger back up size assuming I would need to wear the 12, but the 10 fit!!  You might want to bring a safety pin to get the front, but I was in Vegas and wore a black bra.  The dress material sort of clung to the bra, but in a more conservative atmosphere, you might want the security of a pin.  It comes all the way to the knee and was just tight enough on my ribs to hold it all together.  I really felt amazing and invincible in this dress. I walked down a busy road and people parted for me like the Red Sea. My two girlfriends from college and I had a reunion trip in Vegas and all wore different colored sequined RTR dresses.  DANG did people notice us!  SO SPARKLY.  We did a photo shoot and we all looked so amazing, I really enjoyed this dress. The sequins DO sort of irritate your arms, but I just tried to stop swinging my arms around so much (I can be a dramatic story teller).  Comes all the way to the knee, can be worn with a bra, unfortunately no pockets but that's literally the only down side.  Effortless!!
review_summary: 3 amazing women, 3 amazing RTR's, one excellent Vegas Vacation!

review_text: I was apprehensive about renting such an unstructured dress, but it hung nicely.  For the cold airplane, I paired it with a scarf and denim jacket for the flight -- adorable.  Once we landed, I lost the extra gear and wore it with wedges.  My plan was to change into something a little less casual for dinner, but it was so cute, I wore it all evening, too.  Pretty colors.  Nice fabric.  Fit well.  I'd rent it again.
review_summary: Loved this dress!  I rented it for a long weekend in Key West. It was cute, comfy, and stylish!

review_text: Loved the fit and color of this dress. Hugged me like a glove. Only downfall was the bottom hem that puckered and rode up quite a bit. It was like that one both sizes so not just a one dress flaw. Plus the shoulders were a bit big even in the smaller size.

I absolutely adore this piece. It fits perfectly, in all the right places. It's comfortable. Extremely flattering, especially on taller woman. I got a ton of compliments and I felt like a million bucks. The deep berry color is beautiful, especially with a tan. I wore this in Vegas but it can really be worn anywhere, especially a date night. Your significant other will be drooling.

This dress is SO easy to wear and I got ENDLESS compliments. I wore it for a day out on Martha's Vineyard during my friend's bachelorette party. It is light, breezy, and super flattering. I would wear it every day. It didn't photograph super well on me, but I loved it regardless. I would rent again and highly recommend.

This dress was fun to wear! The neckline was a little higher than I would have liked, probably could have worn the small. The cotton fabric was super lightweight, but the pattern kept it from being see-through.
review_summary: Light and flowy, perfect for a summer trip to a  vineyard!

review_text: Wore these pants to a concert in Vegas and they're perfect! Blingy AND comfortable! Would absolutely rent again!

This dress was so flowy and gorgeous!  I did a size 0R only because the 0P wasn't available.  This dress was extremely long on me---I'm 5'2 and 1/2 and even with 3 inch heels I had to pick it up whenever I walked---but it otherwise was a good fit and was not at all baggy.  I loved that I was able to wear a normal bra with this one, and I definitely felt that it flattered my figure.  My sister wore it another night on our cruise (she's 5'4 and about 115 pounds) and it looked amazing on her too.  Love this dress!
Just okay. Didn't wear.  A little worn
The fit was amazing, I got tons of complements and felt great.  Highly recommend!  I usually wear a small or xsmall, went with small on this one.
review_summary: Wore this out while on a trip to Chicago- loved it! It was perfect for a night out with friends

review_text: Loved the floral fabric and pattern along with the mesh detailing. Unfortunately, I was unable to wear this dress because I could not get it over my wide hips. Total disappointment.
review_summary: Super cute dress, just the wrong size for me.

review_text: The top ran a bit big, however it was not as long as I thought it would be. I usually would wear a Small but the X-Small was a good fit..definitely not too tight! Light fabric, good quality!
review_summary: Perfect for Southernground Music and Food Festival in South Carolina

review_text: It was pretty loose, and the top was sliding off a bit. I would have worn the 6, but it was too tight around the booty to be comfortable. I decided to just go with the baggy and it was great - so comfortable, fun, great movement in the sleeves and the color is fantastic. You'll definitely stand out! My last couple rent the runway dresses have been a size 10, so the fact that I almost wore a 6 says something. But for a comfortable, beachy, FUN dress - this is fantastic. I want to own it.
review_summary: This dress was so much fun! Wore it a fancy dinner on South Beach

review_text: This dress is great for travel, and I will most likely rent it again. It doesn't wrinkle, is so comfortable (feels kind of like wearing a nightgown), and looks elegant. It worked well for an event in Venice as well as for walking around, exploring in Rome. I probably could have worn it every day of my trip.

I read the reviews that it ran large but the XS so out so I went with a S. Although it ran large-it still worked. I wore this as a bathing suit cover on vacation in the Dominican Republic and the loose fit was great for the humid weather. The colors also looked great with a tan. This could have easily been dressed up with cute sandals as well.

I rented this as bikini cover-up on a boat tour.  It was perfect for that!  As some of the other reviews mentioned, in windy conditions this skirt can cause a major wardrobe malfunction.  But as a cover-up it worked great!

I rented this dress for a romantic castle/dinner in Switzerland and it was perfect! 
I was  looking for a piece that is high up on the list of current  fashion trends yet conservative as the Castle tour was a work related event for my husband. 
While  I am fairly tall (5'7) and thin  I do have a large bust & the dress still fit perfectly!
Be prepared for a night of complements and questions because you will hear time and time again "I love that dress where did you get it".
review_summary: A must Luxe dress for fall events

review_text: I rented this for a weekend trip to Vegas. The dress looks stunning and received many complements - BUT - the sequins are very scratchy. After trying it on I looked I was malled by an animal. The night I wore it out I used runners body glide on my back and arms to protect my skins against the cutouts.
review_summary: Sitting in the Eiffel Tower Restaurant in Vegas looking out over the Bellagio water show

review_text: I LOVED his dress but wound up selecting my alternate selection. I will defiantly rent this dress next time. It hugged all of the right places and sparkled when I moved. I wanted something a little more low key for this occasion but this is a really beautiful dress.

The fit was spot on!  It was snug, yet comfortable.  The length was perfect, the slightly higher hem in the front made the dress  classy, elegant, AND sexy.  In the picture on the internet,  the dress looks quite plain, and I don't think that I would have considered renting it.  I was, however, in the shop at the Cosmopolitan in Vegas and the sales associate put the dress in my dressing room. The dress did not jump out at me when I saw it on the rack, but as soon as I put it on, I knew that it was the one!  There was much more detail than I originally gave this dress credit for.  I did not wear any jewelry, but I would have totally paired the dress with some chunky jeweled necklace or bracelet and I think it would be perfect for New Years!
review_summary: Went to Vegas with my friends and found this dress at the Rent The Runway shop in the Cosmo

review_text: This romper was a great addition to my vacation pieces. It fit great and could be worn either on the shoulder or off the shoulder. I paired it with espadrilles for a boho look but could easily be worn with white sneakers and a baseball cap for a more sporty look. This is slightly sheer so I recommend wearing on a day that is out in the sun with a strapless bra for the most comfort.
This dress was a little loose, even thou I am a busty gal. But the effect was great. The skirt flows when you walk, the fabric is great and lightweight.
review_summary: This dress got so many compliments, even from strangers on the street. Beautiful details!

review_text: I typically wear a 6/8 but will choose a 10 for comfort. The 8 was perfect. The 10 might have been a bit roomier, but the extra space in the hips was too much. I got multiple compliments (in New York city, no less) on what a fantastic and flattering dress I was wearing. We walked quite a bit, had tapas, saw a show and then stopped for cocktails. I was totally comfortable all night. Great choice!
Cute zipper on the back!
review_summary: Super trendy - received so many compliments!  Can be dressed up or down!

review_text: I wore this on a vacation in Mexico. The romper fabric feels very nice, and the fit if flowy and comfy. Not the most exciting piece of clothing, but stylish enough and the deep V gives it a little something.

I ordered a S and M fully expecting to wear the M since I'm about a size 8 (sometimes 6 in dresses). The M fit well but was  a bit loose and my husband loved the more snug S much more! The dress was very comfortable and I received SO many compliments the entire night. I felt like a shiny disco ball!
review_summary: I wore this dress for my birthday in Vegas and it was perfect!

review_text:
This dress was another Rent the Runway win. Many compliments received, and I felt so comfortable and cute in this dress. It was a great maxi, different from any that I own myself, which is why I rent from Rent the Runway in the first place. The colors were bright and vibrant, and there were some blues and greys that you can't even see online in the dress. It was definitely me.

The fit was pretty perfect. A nice empire waist and flowing skirt that helped keep me cool. I was going out with friends for a nice dinner, and it was the perfect dress. The only problem was, as others mention, it is very long. I am not a short girl, and I wore a wedge sandal and it was still grazing the ground. Otherwise, perfect.
review_summary: Comfortable, stylish, and perfect for my dress up night with the ladies!

review_text: Amazing fit! Brand new, still has the tag on it! I love theory, makes you feel like a million dollars without looking like your trying. I rented to wear for Wedding Venue appointments.
review_summary: Perfect fit! Great material. Feels expensive! Fits like a glove!

review_text: The dress fit perfectly in an XS. I am normally a S in dresses from RTR. It was the perfect dress for a traditional Southern dinner with friends in Charleston, SC celebrating my fiancee's 30th birthday and our engagement!
review_summary: This dress looked amazing and got several compliments! Loved everything about it! Fit wonderfully!

review_text: I hate that I didn't get a better picture! I ordered a 4 and 6 in this dress and ended up with the 4. (I am small up top) The dress hugged nicely around my hips but not too much where I felt uncomfortable. The front has a little extra fabric so your midsection is "hidden" which I appreciated as a mom :) Length was perfect; my friend we were cruising with said she felt like I was a celebrity and she was my assistant lol. Husband LOVED it...I would rent this dress again!
review_summary: Great dress for an adult night out on Disney Cruise!

review_text: This dress gives off serious boho vibes. I felt so comfortable in this! This dress runs true to size and is great for any cup size. There is comfortable room for hips and curves, and the fabric is very stretchy. We recommend wearing a NuBra or no bra, since the straps are so skinny. Wear this to an outdoor party or a day at the park!

This is a very cute outfit! The only thing is that one must have a long torso for the back part to "straightened up". I took a pic of the back to see what that means. In any case, it was a unique pretty design and the material is well made. No bra needed as the back part is open but the material "protects" the front well. It' s like an eyelet (closer look at the pic). Got so many compliments in person and on-line!
I almost passed on this dress because it didn't come in the long length, but tall gals- hooray for us, this will be long enough! Flattering fit and if you are feeling fat- this is perfect!
This was great! I'm short, and the height was fine with heels. The color was so fun for a beach trip, I got so many compliments on it!
review_summary: Loved this!! Comfy, flattering, and great colors

review_text: The color of this dress was absolutely stunning. I really loved it. However, the fit was a little strange. The 2 was slightly too small in the hips but for perfect up too. I ended up wearing the 4 which then was a little big for my chest. Also, because I'm so short, the material bunched a little around my waist but adding a belt solved that. I wish it was a tad bit shorter on me but all in all I loved it!
review_summary: I rented this for what I thought was a normal vacation and ended up being my engagement weekend!

review_text: i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and the small fit me well. the cutouts were great and i loved the neon stripe down the dress. i'm only 5'3" but even with 4.7 inch heels the dress was still touching the ground. i didn't wear a bra with this and didn't need to, but pasties are a must. the inner lining stopped around mid thigh for me, so just be aware of that when sitting, but otherwise great dress!
Its so perfect i want to buy it, fabric is so soft and great for a beach vacation! Length was a little too long if you're planing on wearing flats. I received lots of compliments.
Fit like a glove !!!
You can wear this with ANYTHING! It is so chic and comfortable, and fashionable. I loved the leather and the fit was great.
review_summary: Great fit, easy high fashion style

review_text: The dress was really flattering, and perfect for a rainy day touring wineries in Napa. I had to add tights and a jacket (it was pretty chilly) but the dress would have been great on its own too. Highly recommend.

Wore with a standard strapless bra.  If I rent again, I will go down one size.  The straps were a little bit long, and so my hubby tied little knots at the top of the straps to shorten them.  Luckily my hair hid the knots.  This shirt can be dressed up or down, and I felt really great in it.  I wore it over 4th of July weekend, and the red, white and blue colors were great....but, I'd wear it anytime.
review_summary: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this shirt.

review_text: I loved this dress. I have a booty, it hugged nicely, but the nude color looked a little green on me. It didn't match my shoes. But the fit and feel of this dress was amazing.
review_summary: I sent this back before my event.

review_text: This romper was so cute and comfortabel! The shorts are a great fit even if you have bigger thighs and the waist band makes it easy to blouse it up or down to fit your body. Highly recomend it!
Love this! Great vibrant colors. Fits true to size. Very comfortable and flattering.
review_summary: Rented for a vacation in Spain! Perfect.

review_text: I rented this as one of the dresses for two formal nights on my cruise last week. I absolutely love this dress! I could hear compliments all night as I walked by other cruisers to and from dinner. The V in front is VERY deep, and I had to wear a normal bra as my breast lift patches weren't working. You could see the bra, but I used fashion tap to try to minimize the appearance. My husband did have to help me into it, especially with the top zipper in back, and we also tapped the dress to the bra in back. The color was stunning, and the pockets!! Perfect for not having to carry a purse to hold my phone and cruise card. I'm 5'4", and wore a 14 and it was perfect. The cut out back is a fun little detail as well. I wore 3-4" heels and the length was perfect. And because my backups didn't arrive in time due to shipping issues, I ended up wearing this on the second formal night as well. Definitely would rent this again!

Wanted something with a pop of color on hawaii vacation, and this fit the bill.
Pros : bright color, comfy, easy fit
Cons : a bit short in the leg (looked ok w srappy heeled sandal);  kind of yucky synthtic fabric (though i knew tha t when i rented it )

Was fun, though probably would rent something with nicer fabric next time.
the white and yellow detailing was perfect for a birthday weekend in miami--straight off the PSFW runway and helps stand out from all the other white dresses

this was a pretty, well-made romper. the color was a bright lime, but not too fluorescent. My only real issue with it was the fit in the chest area. you can't really wear a bra with this, which was fine for my 32B chest, but the romper had so much extra fabric/room in the chest that it looked sort of ill fitting and lumpy. I would think that with a size 0, the chest area would be a bit more fitted. either way, i wore it twice and liked it:)

I wore this to look fun and classy poolside in Palm Springs.  The fit is a little bit odd - I did try on medium and it was much too large in the bust.  Small was a better fit, although a little tight in the hips.   Be aware that it fits much lower than it looks on the model.  Perhaps she is freakishly tall, but on me the dress was mid-calf length.  On someone shorter it would definitely be almost a maxi dress!  Also be aware the slit is very high on the side - which is great when you're sitting poolside and it's 105 degrees out, but not so much if you were planning to wear this to a more conservative affair.
This is a great dress, but beware it runs small.

I rented the 6 and 4 for my honeymoon, and I wore the 4.  It was snug, but since I went braless that was the best.  It was very flattering and sexy.  I will say that the photographs do NOT do it justice.  It is WAY hotter in person.  I felt like a million bucks in it.
Cute with a jean jacket and scarf!
Great fabric, and elastic waist makes it super comfortable.

Ended-up wearing the 8, even though I'm typically a 10/small 12 in dresses lately. 32FF chest fell out the sides a little bit, but certainly far better than I anticipated. Didn't think I could wear a bra with this, so went without the first night I wore it, but was able to wear my strapless without issue the second. This crop top is surprisingly forgiving if you're not totally a crop top-kinda gal (like me!) Paired with the matching skirt while out to dinner, then with a long, billowy black maxi skirt the next day for a casual lunch.  The material is pleasantly dense; was fine for late spring in Charleston, but I'd be a little nervous for summer wear in a humid locale. 

The print is really just to die for!!!  I've rented a lot on here through Unlimited and for formal events, but this is the first outfit I'm *seriously* considering purchasing!

I wore this for a birthday weekend at the beach. It's very fun, the colors are bright and beautiful. It could be a little longer, but that's how most maxi dresses fall on me anyways and I knew it would be short based on the other reviews. I ordered the 4 as well but didn't try it, just went with the 6. Got lots of compliments- it's really a fun dress!
review_summary: Fun dress, beautiful colors that really stand out!

review_text: When we got bumped to first class on our flight to Hawaii, my glamorous look made me feel like a rockstar. It felt like everyone who walked by on the plane looked at me and thought, "Yeah. She fits the profile of First Class." I loved the preview look so much, I also sprang for some white capris, which completed my vacation look!
review_summary: This top was gorgeous and comfortable.

review_text: I rented this for vacation and could not stop wearing it.  It was so simple, matched with everything, and no bra required!  Could not have been better.

I never thought I could pull off a bandage style dress, but I thought I'd give it a chance for a trip to Las Vegas.  The dress hugged all the right places and held in my middle.  The fit is definitely snug, though, so if you prefer looser fitting dresses, look to another style.
review_summary: Very flattering and perfect for a night out -- I felt like a million bucks

review_text: Not prone to wrinkling which made this great to pack for vacation.  Shows off curves without hugging the frame too much.  Racerback bra nicely hidden.
review_summary: Worn for a semi-formal night on a cruise.  Extremely comfortable.

review_text: I'm usually a 4 in dresses and the small fits perfectly. The dress has a bit of weight to it and the yellow color is nice and bright. The lacing is very detailed but won't snag easily. The drop shoulders kept riding up though when I sat down to eat. Thankfully I had a black cape sweater on so I didn't have to keep pulling the shoulders down. This is the first time I wore this type of dress so I'm not sure if it's common for the shoulders to ride up or I just need to size up. Maybe I'll try the medium next time!
Rich color and fun cut. I liked the cotton ribbing on the sleeves. Perfect piece to layer and dress up or stay casual.
review_summary: Great accent piece for cooler weather.

review_text: I ordered this skirt to take with me on our honeymoon to Thailand. It was BEAUTIFUL! It was perfect to wear while touring about Bangkok.  It was conservative but fun and flirty. I wore the Xsmall - and was surprised that the waist was still a little big. So size down - as the waist band is stretchy and will be forgiving. I also seemed to have a hard time finding a good top that worked well with the waist of this skirt. The best fit/look I found was with a simple/plain neutral colored shirt that was tight and could be tucked in to the waist band of the skirt.

Loved the fit of this dress. Plenty of room for my larger bust but not matronly, and a perfect stretch for my hips.  At 5 10 I thought I might find it too short.  And yes it was short, but never road up.  There was a light breeze the day I wore it and the sleeve movement really looked nice with the breeze.  Note there are some silver accents to this piece.  Had I known that I would have chosen silver accessories rather than gold.  But the accents were so subtle, it was not a problem.  My BF wanted me to buy this dress!
review_summary: This was a perfect day dress for  Vegas.

review_text: rented multiple times for vacation trips
review_summary: Perfect summer maxi - great color - loose fit, but still flattering.

review_text: The print of this dress is great. This is the perfect piece to throw on with sandals for a daytime look, or heels and accessories for date night. The front is very low cut; however, you could use fashion tape to have a slightly more modest neckline. This dress fits very loosely, yet the layers and cut of the dress still give it shape.

My friends took me out on a wine tour in California for my birthday, and with the warm weather, this dress was perfect! I loved the pattern, and I was excited to rent my first maxi dress. I will say that if there was an XL, it may have been the more comfortable size. Also, the material makes the dress really static-y when it comes out of the garment bag. Make sure to have a dryer sheet on hand for a quick and easy fix! (I didn't, so some of the pictures just look like I'm wearing a jumpsuit.)
review_summary: Perfect for a wine tour in California!

review_text:
The dress fit well overall. I opted for an open back thinking it'd be warmer in Vegas. Unfortunately, the weather did not cooperate, so I kept my blazer on almost the entire night. But I did enjoy vibrant red of the dress. It was rather short but it wasn't anything inappropriate. My only complaint was that the top seemed slightly stretched out, and I was somewhat self-conscious of upper side boob showing. But I'm rather modest, so it probably would not bother others.
I did pick up my dress at the store and that was a treat to actually be in a city with a store location!
review_summary: I rented this to celebrate my birthday in Vegas.

review_text: it was a very ight and airy fit which was perfect for the weather
review_summary: this was perfect for my trip to Mexico with my husband

review_text: The dress has pockets, which adds extra bulk in the hips. The pockets on the chest made my chest look fuller. Overall cute and comfortable dress.
Didn't wear.  Too baggy in the abdomen

Beautiful dress but did not work for me. The straps were extremely long . I did not want to tie or tamper with it so I just ended up sending it back. I think it would truly look beautiful on someone taller as it really is a pretty dress, just did not work for me.
review_summary: I rented this for a Malibu vacay but did not ultimately end up wearing it.

review_text: Tall girls order the long or plan to wear flats and those that are small chested fashion tape is a must!
review_summary: Fit perfectly, such a classy jumpsuit. Got compliments on it all night and so comfy.

review_text: Love the texture and pleats of this dress as it adds more excitement to this floral piece. This does run true to size but I would recommend going a size down for your back up as there is plenty of room around the waist and hips . I am a 34DD and still had enough space in the bust, so this style will work well for any cup size. I would suggest a strapless bra and at 5'5, this dress fell 6 inches below the knee. This look can easily be dressed up or down but add some great tassel earrings and this will be an effortless look for your next day time party or weekend get away.

I rented this for a vacation to wear around town with nice flip flops ... it's really cute, but it's actually a little more formal than the image here when you see it in person (at least to my taste).  It's an actual event dress / probably needs high heels or at least nicer shoes than flip flops and it's flattering but tailored around the waist, so not an easy throw on type of dress (I would have had to use Spanx to make it look nice).
review_summary: Cute dress, but a little tight around the waist / more formal than it looks here

review_text: This top went perfectly with tthe Nanette Lepore White Sugarcane Crop Pants I had rented to go with it. I went with the Medium size due to my larger bust (34DD). It fit perfectly. It was the perfect length and I didn't have any problems with my tummy showing. The fabric was perfectly soft and opaque enough that it did not require any special undergarments to keep it from being see through. Thrown on with navy and white stripeed wedges the look was casual cool which is perfect for Texas and oh so comfortable.
review_summary: It was my first night out with my friends on my Texas vacation and I looked great!

review_text: Great summer shirt. Material is very thin which is nice for a hot summer night.

I was 34 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress.  Ordered it for babymoon and ended up wearing it as bathing suit cover as the area around the bump was a little tight.  It is a buttoned down dress and at one place there was slight spreading of the fabric (where my bump is biggest).  The material is super light and soft--perfect for warm weather:)  Looks great with sandals!
review_summary: Maternity Review! Nice casual dress--used as swimsuit cover for vacation

review_text: I imagine it would have been great but the size was huge.  Will probably try again but definitely a smaller size
review_summary: Sadly I didn't get to wear it because it was too big and arrived 2 days before I left

review_text: Loved this dress!  The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I wish there wasn't so much extra fabric in the stomach area.  I think it made me look larger than I am.  But it was a comfortable dress that I was able to wear my regular bra with.  I did use the fashion tape to close the neckline a little more though because my bra was showing.  A deep plunging bra would work best.  I wore black accessories.
Length was great, thin crepe silk dress.
review_summary: Great dress, great length in heels

review_text: First of all I LOVE this dress. The pattern and style are just beautiful and I really wanted to give it 5 stars. However even with spanx it is not very forgiving around my stomach area so I ended up wearing a cream blazer over this to conceal the stomach part. It is very flirty and fun-  just not sure if the fit is quite right for me.
review_summary: Bought for a trip to France

review_text: The dress is a beautiful print and design and flows really well. The shoulder straps were a little long, but not unbearably so. The biggest problem was the length. I'm 5'4" and even with 4 inch wedges, I was still tripping over the bottom of the dress. Its a shame I didn't get to wear it because its a very flattering maxi. That being said, I wouldn't recommend renting the regular length unless you are 5'5" wearing tall heels.
review_summary: Didn't get to wear it because it was so long

review_text: Perfect length for walking on the beach and relaxing.  Vibrant colors and beautiful pattern.
review_summary: I wore this as a beach cover up and to lunch.  It was perfect for vacation.

review_text: obsessed with this dress!!! I loved the color! It does run small, so I'm glad I read reviews and sized up from my normal.  I felt so good in this dress. Highly recommend. Wish i could keep it.  Will definitely rent this again!
review_summary: I want to keep this!!! Absolutely perfect!

review_text: Sadly this dress just didn't work for me, I felt that it wasn't right for my more mature figure.  While I'm petite in stature, the dress just hugged my hips and tummy in a way that made me feel uncomfortable.  I thought it might have a bit more "give" but it was quite restrictive.  I'm sure it would look beautiful on a younger woman but I also feel it is made for very thin individuals.

I did not end up wearing this dress because it was too large BUT the print is gorgeous & it's great for summer. I would suggest belting it to give it more shape. Flowy, feminine and great for a hot summer day!

I rented this dress to transition from a Friday morning at the office to a dinner with friends on vacation in spring. It worked beautifully since I tend to get cold in planes and restaurants. I got a ton of complements--even from complete strangers. In most modern designers, I am a 6 or 8, with a 36" bust, 28-29" waist, and 40" hips/butt. I have two DVF dresses, so I know that her line runs small (or less ego-boosting, depending on your point of view). Just don't think about the number once you put it on, because the woman knows how to cut a dress.
review_summary: Pretty, versatile dress - from work to plane to dinner!

review_text: I brought this dress on vacation and it was a real work horse, looked great doing everything in every weather. Light, good quality, not to voluminous, tons of compliments and second looks. Wear it with a black racerback bra and you're good to go from morning to night.
Got a lot of compliments on it - runs a bit big. The material also looks a bit wrinkled and messy.
This dress is really short. It is very cute as a beach cover-up but I didn't feel comfortable walking through a hotel lobby wearing it! Too short!

This dress was so fun in Vegas! I got so much attention! I loved wearing it, however.... I still have cuts on my arms and chest from the sequins (the only reason I didn't give it 5/5) The fabric was very forgiving - so I had no problem dancing the night away! I would definitely rent this dress again!

I rented this for a bachelorette weekend - the bride wanted us all in black or pink sequins/sparkles. I did the eight day so I'd have time to get a replacement, should it not fit but that wasn't necessary. I was nervous that the 16 would be too tight under the bust but it was absolutely perfect! I'm 36DDD, normally a 16 or 18 in everyday clothes but sometimes bigger in dresses. (My bridesmaid dress from David's bridal is a 20 because I need the room up top) The zipper was a little stubborn but I was able to zip it in front, spin it and still get my arms in. And I was able to wear a normal bra with it, I did choose a plunge style but it wasn't visible at all. My girls fill out the top and even being so low cut, it looks exactly how I wanted it to without making me self conscious. It fell three inches or so above my knees and didn't ride up while sitting. The sequins didn't bother me at all either and it was very comfortable to wear.  I paired it with Franco Sarto Gulf wedge sandals (black) and large, single Swarovski crystal earrings.
review_summary: Comfortable and fit fantastic - can't wait to rent in another color!

review_text: This dress was so cute for a day spent on Bourbon Street and at the parades. I liked how low cut it was. It was very fitted until the waist and I didn't even need to wear a bra. It hit right at my waist and flared from there, and it was very flattering and slimming. It also wasn't too short - it hit right above the knee. This can be dressed up to be really fancy or dressed down to be more of a fun/party dress. I usually am between a 2 and a 4 and went with the 2.  I would describe the color as a rose gold. I would SO rent this again!
review_summary: Perfect, festive dress for my birthday/Mardi Gras in New Orleans

review_text: Loved this dress. I rented it for my upcoming Florida Vacation, but got it a bit early, so I wore it this weekend. I may keep it awhile longer (I'm an unlimited customer) if the weather in Chicago stays hot. The top was a bit big on me. I'm a size 12/14 with a smaller chest. I wore this with some cognac Tory Burch Sandals. Something you cannot tell in the photos is that it has very light cream/yellow pinstripes on the dress. It's a bit sheer, so I'd wear nude undergarments.
The button didn't stay close with a large bust.  That clasp was too weak so, I threw on a pretty bra and pearls, to help.
review_summary: I wore to travel in.  It was very comfortable. I just threw on a jacket when it got a little chilly.

review_text: Got this through unlimited for my cancun vacation.  Had great potential, kept it and took it to Mexico. I didnt wear it, its pretty see through and the front is pretty short and I wear short stuff, but with the flowy material it was too risky for me to take.  maybe as a bathing suit coverup

The best item I have ever rented from RTR.  I have already re-rented it for another event!  
This is an amazing jacket.  It goes with everything.  I wore it with a  navy lace dress/heels but I also wore it with a black tee and jeans.  And it is very slimming.  
It does run small.  I normally wear a size 6 or 8 or M, but the 4 in this jacket fit perfectly.
This dress runs slightly small so size up if you're busty or have broad shoulders.  The front slit is very high so I wore a shawl around my legs every time I sat down.  The pattern is bright and fun.

I rented this dress for a bachelorette party day dress in Charleston. The print is really cute and the dress is extremely comfortable. Im 5'9" so it was a little short on the sides but because it was longer in the back it was perfect. It's breathable but not see through

This dress is even prettier and more vibrant in person. I'm 5'2", 34A/32B, and ~120lbs, I usually wear a 0-2 in lilly but needed the 4 in this dress. I found it to be the perfect length, it's on the "shorter" side for a typical Lilly shift dress, but was the perfect length on me (sometimes I feel like the shifts can be a bit matronly when they hit at the knee). It's a very nice weight as well. Highly recommend.
review_summary: beautiful dress, but does run small.

review_text: Great dress for a beach party. Runs VERY large. I'm a pretty solid size 10 & this was huge. I could easily have worn an 8 maybe even a 6. And missing the belt.

Really beautiful blue color and the pattern is great! This is a great dress for being fashionable while totally classy and appropriate. The neck line is higher than I expected but it ended up being okay. Zero cleavage has its place, I suppose :)
So cute. I through a top on it as well and it worked awesomely. Very comfortable, very breathable.
Nice and loose fit. Awesome for hot weather.
review_summary: Wore this to Capri! Very comfy and cute.

review_text: Brought this to Cancun and it was perfect! Glad I ordered a size up since it is definitely pretty tight! It would be short on taller girls but the length was perfect for me at 5'2
wore to vegas for a friends 30th. got so many compliments. only negative...side seam near zipper bunches up. had to pull down often. would rent again though.

I rented this dress for a trip to Vegas and loved it! The only two complaints I had was that the zipper in the back didn't stay in the center the whole night. (It kept twisting to the side.) Also, the liner wasn't tacked to the dress and kept riding up to my waist.  Other than that it was a good rental! Perfect for Vegas! I don't think I could get away with wearing this dress anywhere else though other than maybe NYE because of how sparkly it is.
Great Fit! Very comfortable , can we worn with flats or heels. Loved this romper. Renting again !
Wore this to St. Thomas...it was a show-stopper! Very flattering ! It traveled well but it is a heavy dress.
I feel confident and super comfortable in this cotton dress. And I love its bright yellow color. Check out dynostyle.com for more photos :)

Loved this dress.  It ran a little large, so I would recommend ordering a size up.  It's perfect with a wedge or a sandal depending on the occasion.  I wore it on a trip to the cost of Italy, it packed really well and wore well also.
review_summary: Perfect dress for summer date night or vacation

review_text: Lovely blouse! It was brand new when I received it, with the tags still attached, so that was great!. I rented through my Unlimited account and wore it several times, always gaining compliments. High quality silk with a luxurious feel.
review_summary: Super cute top with a high quality feel.

review_text: Such a flattering beautiful blouse, I might have to buy it. Prettier in person. Tons of compliments. Can dress it up with skirt or causal pretty in jeans. My favorite RTR piece so far.

Great light weight shirt! It was perfect for our vacation in Hawaii and also back home. I wore it to work and a weekend of shopping-compliments everywhere. The fit is boxy, which was exactly what I was looking for. It is loose at the hips-which I need. The neckline was perfect for an upgraded look with a flashy necklace.
Color is as pictured, runs true to size, but a little short.
review_summary: This is an easy summer dress.

review_text: Very nice top,  covers down to waist
Fit was loose and comfy for summer, but the sleeves were comically big.

I really liked this sexy red dress. It hugs your curves and is definitely a head turner so be prepared to stand out! I tried to wear a low cut bra, but if you lift your arms up it would show though the cuts in the dress. As a result I decided to go braless. If the dress were a little tighter I would have felt more comfortable going without a bra. The strap around the waist is also a little loose. Lastly, I liked the fact that the dress was long sleeved so I didn't feel too exposed. Overall, the dress was absolutely perfect for Vegas and I'd highly recommend it!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a girl's weekend in Vegas.

review_text: Wore this to an outdoor awards BBQ.  Very cute dress. Loved the bright colors.  Couldn't really wear a bra with this, because strapless bra showed in the back and under arms.  Perhaps some other creative bra that I don't own would have worked.  But, I'm small in the chest, so I just went without.  The only downside was that it was VERY hot the day I wore this and the lining (which is how I could wear this without a bra) made the dress much hotter.  Otherwise, loved it and would rent again.  Wouldn't suggest for a very hot day.

I wore this to dinner and then out on a hot night in Italy. I thought the small may be too small because the hips looked a little narrow, but it fit perfectly and is such a pretty dress. The top is NOT elastic, you will need to have someone tie the strings in the bacfk so they stay on your shoulders. That is probably the only negative thing about the dress as you may have to keep pulling up the sleeves... other than that, it is a perfect beach vacation dress and I will definitely be renting this one again. Also, it doesn't wrinkle very easily and most wrinkles will fall out upon hanging.
Rented through Unlimited for a Japan trip. This dress travels wonderfully - no wrinkles and easy to dress up or down for multiple wears. Comfortable and chic - I want to keep it!
Glad I ordered One Size Larger

I rented this with plans to bring it on a beach vacation.  But, it didn't quite fit right, so I sent it back unworn.  I am normally a size 6/8, so I rented the Medium.  I'm 5'4" and about 140 pounds.  The waist is cinched and it hit me above my belly button, so well above my actual waist.  The material has no stretch, except at the waist, and was actually almost tight on the zipper in the back.  I could have worn this, but overall with the waist so high and therefore the inseam coming up so high, I thought it didn't look very flattering, so I just decided to send it back.
Super flattering. I was worried about the volume of the skirt, but it was perfect.  Will rent again
I really loved the fit and movement of the dress. I wore it to a special dinner in Cuba and received lots of compliments. The V neck cuts a little deep and fits well with smaller chest size.
great fit, it runs true to size, the arms aren't too tight. I wear a 6/8 and the Medium was perfect.
review_summary: This dress just makes you feel like a million dollars. The fabric is fantastic and it is well made.

review_text: This dress is true to size and is made of a beautiful thick lace fabric.  I opted for sticky boobs with no bra and the tight fit on the top of the dress made going bra free not a problem-disclaimer: I'm not comfortable going bra free, but between the sticky boobs and the close fit of the top of this dress it worked for the night.  I LOVE that this dress has the folded fabric over the belly area, a delicate way to cover what some might consider to be their problem area.  I wore the 10 and it fit very true to size, I would recommend sizing up if you need extra room for dinner, drinks and extra desserts!
review_summary: Absolutely perfect dress for a spring wedding!

review_text: I wore this dress on a night at a fancy schmancy boutique hotel that only had 15 rooms. I felt like I fit right in, actually I take that back, I felt like I totally stood out from the very well dressed crowd in this dress. This is probably my favorite dress I've ever worn. It did run a bit big, but I honestly loved that because it made it so comfy to boot! Highly recommend!
review_summary: Stood out in a very well dressed crowd

review_text: Wore it on the airplane. Cute, comfortable.

I really like the look of this outfit. My only complaint is it runs LONG! I couldn't think of a good way to pull the waist up, so I had to go along with the baggier look. It would be good if they made, or RTR provided, a petite version of this outfit.
True to fit and a such a fun pop of colour.
review_summary: Great top for a Mexican spring night- perfect weight and looked great paired with white jeans.

review_text: the mesh area went up a little high so sometimes you could see the bottom of my bra (not sure if my measurements are up-to-date in the profile, so it should say 5'3", 123 lbs, 32B/C, petite)
review_summary: Lots of stretch, easy to move in

review_text: Loved this sun dress I rented for vacation - great pale blue. The sleeves were comfortable and the pop of skin at the shoulder is just enough. The dress was short, but not too short for a tall girl like me, even paired with heeled sandals. Will be renting again!

Cute, light, and great for warm weather. Details are nice and the fit was pretty true to size. Would definitely rent again. Straps and waist are adjustable, so you can make it tighter or higher on the shoulders.

Overall a great dress for sightseeing, dinner, day, or night.
Wore this to a polo match this past weekend and received a ton of compliments. It fit perfectly. It is a bit short but worked well with flats. The color is amazing.

I rented this for a vacation in London and it was perfect! It was super comfy while still looking like I was dressed up and put together. Can be worn open, as-is, or I wrapped mine with a high waisted belt for a more tailored look. I love it and got lots of compliments. Will rent again for sure!

I rented this at the Vegas showroom for a weekend getaway. The dress is very stretchy and comfortable, but it is VERY low-cut. I could technically wear a bra with it, but I took it off because with a bra the cleavage was a little overwhelming! The lace around the v-neck also would not lay flat, which was sometimes bothersome, but overall this was a very pretty, eye-catching dress that transitioned well from day to night.

I rented this beautiful dress for a fun night out in Las Vegas.  It is so sparkly and perfect if you like all eyes on you!  I got many compliments and felt great it in.  However, much like the other sequin dress I ordered, my underarms were raw by the end of the night.  The dress runs a bit large but it was comfortable for dancing.  Overall, I'm very happy with this rental!
review_summary: Beautiful sparkly dress but a bit scratchy

review_text: Dress runs large but the small fit great. Great for a larger chest as you are able to wear a regular bra. Material is stretchy. Under arms is definately scratchy. Def a great dress to rent!
review_summary: Great dress for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: There is no belt which was fine.  If you're a petite person the coat may "swallow" you.
The fit was perfect. It has a unique print. It isn't a Wow dress, but a pretty dress to wear to a dinner or meeting.
review_summary: The dress was nice quality. Its a very fun print. Its not a Wow dress, but it is unique

review_text: Such a fun top! It was definitely a little snug so it pulled at my chest, but I do have a full bust. So I'd probably recommend this for a smaller bust. Also, I didn't realize when looking at the model's picture that it was a crop top! It landed at a flattering place, just above my belly button, and I liked that the tie is designed to go in the front so it makes it a little more conservative than a typical crop top. I also love that this top would look great with so many different kinds of bottoms! You could wear it with regular jeans, white jeans, skirts, etc. Perfect Summer/Spring look!
I loved this dress so much! It was so comfortable and I received so many compliments! I would recommend this dress to anyone!
This dress is so see-through that you definitely need a slip or something to wear underneath.

Rented this for vacation in Mexico and it was perfect. I loved the pattern and flounce on the top and bottom. It moves well when you walk. It is a heavier material like some other reviewers said. It also isn't super bright colors.

This romper was so cute on. I am usually between a 6-8 but after reading other peoples posts went with an 8. the 8 fit perfectly everywhere but the bust. I am  36D and was unable to zipper the top. The fabric has no give. I wouldn't size up because then the bottom half would be too big. Overall love the fabric quality, it is even better looking in person

Such a comfy dress with wonderful stretchy material that hugs you.  Colors are vibrant and the cut was great.  Wore to the office, then to a beach resort.  Easy transition from heels to fancy flip flops for a getaway.

Really cool dress loved the abstract of it. It was a tight up top, i didnt wear a bra but i also have a broad back. The bottom part gave little room but also no as tight as the top. You had to zip the top part with a little zipper was kinda hard. I loved the style of the dress and the colors.
review_summary: wore it out on vacation and to the beach party.

review_text: I am 5'6 and average size and the entire outfit runs short in my opinion. I couldn't end up wearing it because the midsection was short and it rode in the crotch and the legs were entirely too short too. If you are 5'4 and below, I think it would be perfect, but if you are tall, it won't work. I am not tall and it was so short.

It fit well and was very flattering but when I turned around you could see my entire bra.  The band doesn't line up with any reasonable bra.  When I wore a strapless it made the front part not look right.  If I'm being honest this is more meant for someone with no boobs or fake ones.  Otherwise it fit really well and was flattering.  The shorts weren't too short like most rompers and the front was very flattering on the stomach area.

I love when dresses are just so easy to wear, but are still so sophisticated.  I wore this dress on vacation in Greece and it really was an attention-grabber as I walked through the streets.  My only real issue with it was that it was a tad bit too long with my flat sandals, so I would recommend a wedge with this dress so you don't trip or have to hold it up while walking.  The waistline is very forgiving so you can go a size down if you feel like you're generally between sizes.
review_summary: A really comfortable, easy to wear stunner

review_text: This jacket is incredible.  I'm a blazer junkie with a large chest, so I've become an expert on fit.  This has an interesting, modern fit that's still incredibly flattering.  A white jacket is difficult to find, but this one is lined in a way that doesn't give a see-through effect whatsoever.  I didn't end up wearing this for the vacation but knew I'd need it for my normal wardrobe for years to come.  Had to buy it.
Way too long. I am 5'2" so I knew this would be longer on me but this brushed the floor. Would order again if it came in petite.

I'm rather tall (5 ft 10) and this dress is the perfect length for something like Vegas. It is not as short of some of Herve's other dresses and the material has a lot more give as it is thinner. The dress was incredibly flattering and makes me look skinnier than any of the other Herve dresses I have worn. I got a lot of compliments on it (as per usual for RTR) and would definitely rent again. As a matter of fact - I have rented this dress before. I also wore this dress in NYC in May when I went to a Broadway show and it worked fine for that as well. Please excuse the poor quality photo.

I really wanted to love these pants.  The fabric is amazing a lot thicker than I thought it would be. These pants are perfect for the fall and winter. The length was good too, even for having shorter legs.  I have a athletic thighs and they stood out a bit more than I would like so I ended up not wearing them.
review_summary: Great quality, just didn't work for me.

review_text: Had the formula for a great fit: great above knee length and a little side boob, plus was flattering because it was loose around the mid-section. It was the perfect dress for dinner during by vacation, I even wore in again 2 nights later because I loved this dress.
review_summary: Love this dress, it fits great.

review_text: Wore this traveling and out for dinner on a trip to the mountains.  I got lots of complements.  It can be worn dressy or casual and was warm.

This dress is an easy wear - the classic button down front combined with the vibrant blue presents a sophisticated but modern look from the front, and then the back adds a little edge to keep the dress from being too conservative. I would only caution women with larger chests that they may need to size up as the top area was a tad snug even on me.

This might be my favorite rental.  I struggle to wear maxi dresses because I am short, but this dress was really cute and flattering and not too long.  It was just so fun to wear, I didn't want to take it off.  The cutout makes it a little sexy too.  I wore it for a night out in Napa and to a graduation lunch.  One time I wore flats and another time I wore 2 inch wedges.
review_summary: Loved this dress so much, I rented it twice.

review_text: The dress is very pretty, great for holiday.  Longer than I anticipated, wore it for a casual beach dinner, would rent again for holiday.
Incredibly soft, it was dreamy to wear.  Others had issues with the buckle, but I did not.
review_summary: This jacket looked amazing with jeans.

review_text: I loved the color - much softer looking than a traditional leather jacket. The back detail was adorable. It was comfortable and warm. I would rent this again!
review_summary: Great twist on a leather jacket!

review_text: I LOVE this dress, I am not returning it just yet. It is soft and flowy, not too long so I could wear it with flats without it dragging too much on the ground. I was able to wear this without a bra (Which is a never occurrence for me) comfortably without looking slutty or droopy. I will keep it fpr the 4th of July weekend, its bright and beautiful for the occasion.
I should have ordered a size down so that it would be a bit tighter at the top. However, I was still able to wear it and love it!
Part of Unlimited order. Perfect fit, not too long, loads of compliments. Super vivid colors. You can wear a normal bra with it. Plan to wear it more before I return it!

This dress was  a replacement for TWO that I had mailed to me for my upcoming trip to Las Vegas.  Both dresses looked terrible on me, so I visited the store in Las Vegas to swap them out.  Upon trying this dress on, I knew it was PERFECT.  I was really surprised when I saw the photos of the dress  on the website.  This dress is far more flattering and beautiful in person.  I am usually a size 16, but  the 14W was perfect.  The photos make the dress look boxy, but it perfectly covered my midsection (I'm self-conscious about it) and skimmed over the rest of my curves beautifully.  The slip is separate from the lacy/sparkly overlay which makes it easy to take on and off.  You will not be disappointed!
I wore my normal size in this dress.  It is on the short side, but it wasn't too short.  The fit is forgiving so even though I ate a HUGE dinner, I still felt pretty and comfortable.
review_summary: Very pretty dress. The fabric is a little heavy which might get hot in the summer.

review_text: Fit with plenty of room. I could have definitely sized down. The material is very stretchy.  Even with the cutouts I was able to wear a regular bra. My husband loved the print much more in person. You won't regret this one!
loved this dress.
review_summary: loved this dress it was great.

review_text: I have an athletic figure with a moderate size bum; but this dress was too tight in the hips and shoulders for my straight frame/bigger butt- really tight in the hips. Cute if you are straight and narrow.

This dress does run small as the reviews say.  I wanted to order a size 8 in the dress; however, it was unavailable.  I decided to go for the 6 and wished for the best.  The 6 was difficult to zip (partially because the zipper was very stiff) however it did look really great.  Once the dress zipped it did not even feel tight it was just difficult to get on.
AMAZING FIT and so, so flattering!!
review_summary: I LOVE THIS ROMPER SO SO MUCH!!!

review_text: I loved the print and feel of this dress. It fit loose but in a flattering way if that makes sense. I wore it all day and then to dinner too while on a coastal Labor Day weekend vacation. I would wear it with tights to work too.

It fit really well the vest overlay helped to cinch in the waist and because I'm smaller chested I didn't have any problem with the fit, I could have even sized down. I wore this at the end of summer and the material of the skirt is very thin and airy so it was almost a little cold. Such a fun dress to wear would definitely rent again!
review_summary: This was a perfect dress for a summer weekend event!

review_text: I've been completely obsessed with lace, so when I found a dress with lace *and* sleeves, I just about fell out of my chair. Living in a state that borders Canada, it tends to get pretty chilly in November. I wore this to the opera and to The Melting Pot. I ordered both the 10 and an 8. I exclusively wear 10, but I could have easily worn the 8, it was just a tish shorter. Also, I didn't realize this until I tried it on, but it has pockets! Love renting - second time and I plan to keep doing it!
Good length, not too short.

I got this dress for my birthday trip to Napa. It was perfect for a sunny California day. I loved the white and peach color in the detail. I wore flats with the dress and it was fine. Because of the back, I didn't wear a bra with this dress. I really love everything about it and was sad when I had to send it back. If you are looking at this dress, I suggest you get it. You will be so happy you did.
Size way down on this one.  Extremely comfortable to wear but very casual.  Wouldn't recommend for an event.

I chose this dress as one of my pieces in testing out RTR unlimited beta. I wore it several times during my beach vacation. I loved the dress as the fabric is super cool against the skin and very comfortable. I love that it has pockets and is casual but feminine.  My only complaint would be that it was a little big in the chest area for smaller-chested females. I had to wear a padded strapless bra with it but the edges of the bra would peek out in the front. I think you need to wear a demi cup bra with this dress if you wear a bra at all.
review_summary: Simple, classic, and perfect for summer!

review_text: I loved wearing this dress on vacation. I knew in advance it was more of a coverup, so that was absolutely what I expected. This isn't something I could wear to work, but it was perfect for a boat day. It runs LARGE, I could have easily worn a small and that is a rarity!
I loved this dress. The material is thick and noticeably nice. Great dress to wear when you want to stand out but still be casual.  It was a bit snug in the hips but I also have larger hips!
I want to wear this dress every single day. So comfortable and adorable. Wore this to a birthday brunch. Will be renting again! I've looked for it in stores and online and couldn't find.
Like the other reviews mention, this is very low cut.  I didn't wear a bra with it. As long as you are ok with a low cut and a little cleavage it's really cute.
review_summary: Loved this top, it was girlie and preppy but still could be styled with a little edge too.

review_text: I wore this dress to a nightclub in Las Vegas.  I ordered two sizes and wish I could have combined them because it was small in the hip, but larger up top - and I'm a pretty busty girl.  I ended up wearing the larger of the two sizes so it wouldn't pull too much around my midsection, but it did end up bunching in the back all night.  The color was beautiful and I liked it pretty well overall.  My husband said it wasn't the most "vavoom" dress I've rented for Vegas, but it was classy and fun.  Service was excellent, as usual.  Next time I think I may hit up the actual store in the Cosmopolitan and try things on with a stylist.
Roomy in the bust (even at 34C it felt large), very fitted along waist and loose around hips and legs
review_summary: Cute dress - perfect for a night out in the city!

review_text: I didn't end up wearing this on vacation, mainly because I thought I would be too hot.  The dress was longer than I would have liked and hit right above my knee.  I would have also needed to use some fashion tape since the top was gaping.  A size smaller might have done the trick.
review_summary: Flattering cut with lots of sparkle

review_text: Looks and fits true to the photo.  Material was a little thicker (and thus hotter) than expected, but I was in a warm humid place
review_summary: Really cute!  Thicker material than expected, but good quality

review_text: Rented this for a weekend away.  Beautiful color and fabric.  Word to the wise - it's very low.  Make sure you have pins because the tape did not stick.  I would rent this lovely dress again.  It's above the knee but with flats not bad for a gal pushing 60 :)
Great Fit! loved the pockets and weight of the material.
review_summary: Really pleased the length of the shorts were age appropriate!!

review_text: I absolutely love this romper - the color and fabric are to die for. However I do find that it runs a little small, especially if you have a long torso or hips - the shorts were just a tad too short and riding up in the back. Someone had also tacked the straps to make them shorter with thread - even when I undid the tacking it was still too short in the torso. So if you have hips, I'd recommend sizing up!
Great, tight fit. the bust was a little worn out, but still very flattering.
review_summary: This was the perfect dress for a Vegas Bachelorette weekend!

review_text: Rented this dress for a wedding weekend in the OBX and wore it while lounging around the resort and on the beach. Great lightweight fabric that didn't feel tight around my growing baby bump (30 weeks!). Wore it with a pair of flat sandals and it was the perfect length.
review_summary: This dress was baby bump friendly!

review_text: The dress runs a bit small and short. I couldn't get my back up size so I squeeeezed into this. It is cut beautifully-- very flattering. I rarely have a dress that fits my ample bosom so well. I want to buy this dress!
review_summary: Beautiful dress! I received a ton of compliments.

review_text: Print and cut is wonderful. I'll totally rent again. But big bottom girls beware- size up so you don't show too much of your behind
It fit ok, little tight in the arms but overall not bad.
review_summary: Cute, but I found it just ok.  I could get into the 6, but found the 8 more comfortable to wear.

review_text: I'm 5'4 and the dress was long for me. Luckily I wasn't walking around much in it as I wore it to dinner. It was a perfect fit otherwise. Loved the pattern!
review_summary: Beautiful pattern - perfect for dinner in Hawaii

review_text: great fit and style

If you have a long torso this is NOT the outfit for you - I had to go back and check to make sure I didn't order a petite size. Pretty disappointed because the top looks so nice, but I need a good 3 to 4 more inches to be able to walk in this thing. For reference, I am 5'8.
review_summary: Wore this to dinner but it didn't fit

review_text: I liked this skirt a lot and would wear again for a casual occasion. I had to go with a size S as XS was not available. The S was a bit big as I suspected but it worked out to pin it and loop the tie around to make it tighter at my waist. The fabric is flowy and pretty and the liner helps make sure it's not see-through.
I will definitely order this again throughout the winter season.  Beautiful shimmer to it.
review_summary: Beautiful jacket to dress up any outfit!

review_text:
Absolutely in love with this dress. I wore it on a date with my boyfriend for dinner, and in Nantucket for a bachelorette party and it was perfect for both occasions. It's amazing quality (100% silk), easy fit and super comfortable. It is long though, so I wouldn't advice anyone below 5'5" wear it (I'm 5'6" and had to wear a 4 inch wedge so it wouldn't drag).

I love it so much I rented it in another color for the 4th of July long weekend. Highly recommend!
review_summary: Wanted to buy this dress (and still might)!

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation in Italy. I usually wear a large, but i probably would have worn the Medium if i had it. Even the regular length was a bit long, but worked perfect with a pair of heels. This dress is really comfortable and flattering.
