It ties, low on the back, making it impossible to wear even a strapless bra. Overall, I would highly recommend this dress for a dinner/evening out.
review_summary: Great Maxi for a hot evening!

review_text: Fabulous, chic maxi with edge. Runs on the larger side with ample room in the bust, waist, and hips, but it's important to note that the silhouette is meant to have an oversized fit to it. Comes with a black slip so you can wear it with to cover up the sheerness or without to show off some skin. Great for day or night and super versatile. If you do wear without the slip you definitely need black or nude undergarments. At 5'7" the length hit at about my ankles.
Different then any other dress I have worn. Wore it in Hawaii with a big hat and red lips and sandals. Got compliments, it was fun and the fabric is cotton so it is cool
Just a tad big, a bit baggy because of that. Longer on me than I expected but I was ok with it!
review_summary: I loved this dress - really nice for a casual brunch or day party. Also great for work!

review_text: Really like this dress. The Medium straps were a little large and my bra clasp kept showing out of the back. But the small was too tight (I'm 5'4 137lbs 34DDD) Perfect for a vacation dress in Miami. Low cut but not too bad.
It was very tight! I am 5'4 and weigh 130 and I wore a 6 but could have even gone with an 8.
review_summary: I rented this dress for my 30th birthday in Mexico! It was perfect! Great quality!

review_text: Made me feel like I was the most beautiful person in the room. I usually wear long dress's but I was on a cruise and was so happy to have this shorter dress. It still went to my knees and I did not feel like it was too short at all. I'm 195lbs and it looked great still.
It would be a good maternity dress. Doesn't flatter thinner figures.

Great dress for all seasons - in summer w sandals , in cooler weather w a wrap and heels . The halter meck is so flaytering, my arms/shoulders arent the most toned but youd never know it the way this was cut . The beading is exauisite but doesnt overdress it - just a fabulous high quality dress!
review_summary: Fabulous fit, cant emphasize enoigh how flattering this dress is! My husband loved it!

review_text: Loved it!  brand new with tags great color and cut.
review_summary: Super fit easy fun tailored casual dress

review_text: Rented this dress for a mother/daughter weekend in Sarasota, Florida. I wore this dress out to a nice restaurant. It definitely felt dressed up but not overdone. The material was extremely comfortable and the print was beautiful. I received countless compliments that evening! You can wear a regular bra with it, but you definitely need the kind with a lower back strap. Slits are very high but because the entire dress is so long and modest it doesn't feel like it's too much skin. The fabric was nice and light - comfortable on a hot humid evening in Florida.
review_summary: I felt adorable in this dress!

review_text: OMG. I loved this dress. I wore it twice while on vacation...once to a trendy bar and once to a really high end restaurant and it worked perfectly for both. Its dressy without being over the top and I think you could even pair it with a moto jacket and booties for a more casual evening event. The dress is comfortable, sucks everything in amazingly and my chest and backside looked fantastic. Wore it with sticky boobs and nude patent heels and feel fabulous.

This jacket was perfect for my trip to Paris during a cold spell this spring. The lining kept me cozy and warm and I was able to wear this with jeans during the day and still pair it with dressier outfits at night. The lining does pull out around the cuffs and there was a small rip in the leather, but it was barely noticeable. I didn't love how this looked on me when it was all the way zipped up, but luckily it was cozy enough that I stayed warm even with it unzipped. The leather is super soft and it the fit is true to size. This is a really versatile piece that will be hard to send back!

This dress is so comfortable! I wore it out in Las Vegas and received many, many compliments. I love the fit. The fabric actually has stretch in it and the print is gorgeous. I wish I owned this dress!!!!

I wasn't a big fan of this dress but it just not my style. I wore it on vacation and my sisters loved it. It was very long for size xs. The bodice was tight enough that I did not need to wear a bra and was slimming.
review_summary: I got a lot of compliments.

review_text:
Pros
- Wide leg (great for women who are curvy)
- Perfect balance between sexy and elegant 
- I am 5 foot 8 inches and I wore the SL and the length of the jumpsuit was perfect!
- The lace detailing and color is beautiful!

Cons
- There is no give to the material, so I would size up just in case your normal size does not fit
review_summary: The details of this jumpsuit are so feminine! I especially loved the open back!

review_text: Fit well - small fit my body perfectly.
review_summary: Really fun, printed romper - perfect for a weekend in LA! Made me feel like was a walking fiesta!

review_text: I rented this dress for a vacation in Florida. The top portion of the dress wasn't really my style because it is low cut and felt too much like a bathing suit. But, I loved all the color in it.  So, I tied up a jean shirt over the top to make the dress look more like a skirt. It worked well for a fun, beachy look. I will say, the bottom half of the skirt buttons, so when you sit down there is chance for gapping depending on what size you are and what size the dress is!
review_summary: Fun pops of color for a bold statement piece!

review_text: Very form fitting. I did not wear a bra and everything stayed in place. I think this dress has probably been rented a lot so the colors didn't quite pop as much as I thought they would. Still enjoyed the dress and will most likely order from this line again.
review_summary: Nice fit and fun vacation attire

review_text: FIt true to size. Very comfortable! Would rent this dress again!
review_summary: Beautiful dress!! Felt like a sun goddess!

review_text: This was a great, comfortable dress that I wore during the day at The Fontainebleau hotel in Miami.  It was comfortable and pretty.  It's not form fitting, but it doesn't fit like a bag either.  It's not a date dress, but it's great for an afternoon out or a BBQ kind of event.  I would rent it again!

My package arrived on time and in perfect condition to my vacation location.  Unfortunately, I was in such a rush that I did not try on the dress until I was actually going to wear it on Saturday night.  The dress fit beautifully except around the chest area.  I am a 36D, so it fit, but there was way too much side boob hanging out.  So I took it off and put spanx on underneath it to see if I could minimize the amount of side boob showing but then all you saw was my bra!  I ended up not wearing the dress because I felt like after a night in Vegas I was headed for a wardrobe malfunction!!  If I was just going to dinner I might have chanced it, but dancing and raising my arms was way too much of a risk!

As I am normally 0/2, this fit was slightly on the larger side for me but still very comfortable and flattering. I absolutely love the ruffles and bell sleeve. The material is slightly thicker than I expected, but I liked that. It holds a shift shape very well.

The first thing i noticed was how heavy and structured it was. pictures do not do this dress justice. The embroidery is amazing. Less white than it looks here. It could easily be worn for a cute barn wedding or reception. I usually wear a 6 but i opted for the 8 because it gave me a bit more breathing room.

I absolutely love this dress. It is so versatile and perfect for my vacation to California. So easy to dress up or down, and the print is and cut is unique and flattering. Will definitely be renting again!

The romper is structured and my usual size fits perfectly. The fabric is thick, has no stretch, and not too delicate. There is a lining but it's still a bit see-through at the butt area. The V at the front dips a bit low with a snap in the front. For a small bust person like me, I will likely wear a thin camisole underneath. I look forward to wearing it on my cruise.

It was a little shorter and tighter than the Slate and Willow silver/champagne one I'd rented before. Different fabric! That one was looser, while this one didn't have much give. Would have rented in a larger size if they'd had it available!
review_summary: Fun - love the colors, but short and tight

review_text: I adored this dress. I rented it for a Girl's trip to Vegas and had it sent to the Cosmopolitan.  I fell in love as soon as I tried it on!  This dress fit wonderfully and was even a little big.  I have a very square frame, 220 lbs, with a 44DD. The 20W was a little big, so I didn't have to unzip it.  That helped with the zipper issues I read about in the comments.  I had to pin the chest, the V was very deep even for my DD.  The length hit right above the knee and was very comfortable. I didn't have any problems with the underarms chafing at all.
review_summary: I loved this dress!  This was my first time renting from RTR and I would def do it again!

review_text: Worn to a bay front vow renewal.  Tons of compliments, from both friends and strangers.  Even though the top portion is baggy the dress does wonders for your legs.  My only con would be the way the neckline falls- I felt like it was never flat or straight and folded over a bit.  It is pretty short too... so if you plan on dancing, be aware of how high you raise your arms!
Excellent and very comfy.
review_summary: I'm 5'11" and roughly 140 and the medium fit perfectly

review_text: I loved this dress. I wore it to a vacation in New Orleans. It breathed pretty well in the heat and it was great that it was double lined as it is white. Great fit in the bust and great length. Sorry the picture isn't of my entire body!
the material is thicker than i expected, but looks just as nice in pictures.
Beautiful print, great fit, loved the small pockets. Unfortunately, the belt was missing.

I've rented quite a few Herve dresses, and they never fail to disappoint.  Pretty color and got us walked into the front of the line in Vegas :)  Fit true to size and the material is thick - so even though the dress is tight, you can wear what you need to underneath!
review_summary: You can never go wrong with Herve!

review_text: Very cute! Worn for a beach BBQ for labor day weekend. Other people mentioned in was too short but I have extremely long legs and felt very comfortable wearing this.

This was sent to me from RTR after my item became unavailable.  It just wasn't for me as I was on a romantic getaway with my husband.  This was probably more suitable for a brunch or something casual with the girls or even for work….but not for a romantic dinner in my opinion.

This dress was really comfortable to wear. Like almost all Joie, it runs large, but the medium fit fine!! It's one of those dresses where you NEVER should size up, but you don't need to size down either. Overall I liked it, despite a small toothpaste stain..
I ended up not wearing this, but it was my fault for ordering the wrong size because it was the only one available.  I will try it another time in my size.  It was tight around my neck.

The dress fit fabulously and it is fitted in the top enough that I didn't need a bra which is rare for me. The fabric is thick and beautiful but not overly hot. I wore it for a night out in Miami and could not have been more comfortable.

From the moment I saw this dress, I was in love with it! The colors are gorgeous and the cut is so flattering. There is a very high slit on the thigh which goes all the way up to your hip, so be sure to wear nude undergarments underneath. I am a true size 2, so while this dress did fit, I definitely could have worn a size 0. Because of this, I would suggest getting your true size and one size down for backup. I am 5'1" and wore it with flat sandals, so the length was a bit long but not too bad. Material was like a thick gauze-type so very breathable. Would 100% recommend for a photoshoot - looks perfect with a red lip!

OK - I have rented several Herve dresses and although i am very small - i sometimes find them unflattering in pictures/casting strange shaddows or way too tight in the breast area - this one was different!! THis dress was fitted with out suffocating me - it was shorter than the other Herve dresses ive worn.  The pattern, fit, and length was all perfect!!! I would HIGHLY recommend this dress for a special evening out with the girls, date night, or trip to vegas!
review_summary: THE BEST DRESS I HAVE EVER RENTED FROM RTR

review_text: Loved the curvy fit of this dress, but the cotton material has no give and it was a bit tight in the bust. Would definitely recommend this dress - it was casual enough for a Hawaii vacation and dressy enough without being overdressed.

This is a beautiful dress, but as other have said, it runs very small. I normally wear a 12, so ordered at 14 and still did not fit. I'm not sure if even a 16 would have fit, it was so tight and couldn't zip it.
review_summary: This was my first RTR experience, and of the 3 dresses that were shipped, this was my favorite

review_text: This dress is different. I really like it. Unfortunately, the dress i picked was unavailable and this dress was wayy too hot for the beach so i didn't wear it out. Its very flattering though and worth the rental. Id try it again in the winter. Its heavy and made very well. It did hit lower than the picture, i feel its more knee length than thigh... then again i have short legs.
This is my new favorite dress! It is absolutely gorgeous, I highly recommend it!
Great pattern and color. Looks great with a belt!
review_summary: Great cover up dress but runs big

review_text: This dress is fantastic.  There is no zipper. It pulls on over your head.  Very very comfortable.  Great length and fit.  I loved it so much I'm going to buy it.

I usually wear a 40R (2) in this brand, but this one didn't fit. It was too small in the chest. I am a 34C. I recommend this dress for smaller chested women. It is beautiful. Great fabric and amazing colors. Very lady-like =)

I loved this dress. It flattered my athletic build and was fun and comfortable. The material had a little stretch and the print was nice. I wear a small or more often a medium depending on fabric and cut, but small fit me perfectly.
review_summary: Flattering cut, super cute. This is the dress that may make my friends try RTR.

review_text: Runs large! Went a size down and had still had plenty of room. Kept me warm on a brisk night out in November in Chicago - I even took off the scarf that I brought in case I got cold. I got so many compliments from strangers and family members alike. Can be dressed up (cover up for night out) or dressed down (I wore with jeans/leggings and boots throughout the weekend). Will definitely rent again!
folds nicely into suitcase, light and can go from day to night easily. Material is lightweight and breathable. Perfect for a warm vacation
review_summary: very versatile and easy to pack for vacation

review_text: Typically do not love wearing the color orange, but absolutely love this style! The cream and light orange combination is perfect for spring/summer and flatters a variety of skin tones. Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for a more oversized fit and down for less. With room in the bust and the option to wear a standard bra, this style is great for all cup sizes. There is ample room in the waist and hips, allowing for a more flowy fit. Fabric has no stretch, which allows for a more structured fit. At 5'7", the length hit about mid-thigh. Looks great with a leather satchel!
Color, cut and material were beautiful.  Fit great.  I had planned to wear this to a brunch but decided to keep it for my vacation as well!
Rented this for Vegas vacation, comfortable and pretty but felt kind of weird at the waist/hip
review_summary: Very pretty but weird fit at the waist/hip

review_text: This is a fun dress - the ruffles and color - but it didn't really have a shape on me. I think it'd be OK to wear on a warm day, since the shape feels very casual.

This dress is surprisingly VERY comfortable for how fun and flashy it is. The sequins in the sleeves are a little itchy, but not unbearable by any means. If you're looking for a dress that will make you look and feel like a movie star, while still being able to dance and have fun, then I would suggest renting this one. I had a blast in it!

Fun with florals! I loved this style, it was such a fun pop of color and was very comfortable to wear. This style runs large so I would suggest sizing down for a back up. There is ample room in the bust so it would be a great size for any bust size, there is room in the hips as well as the style is not fitted and the fabric has some stretch. I would recommend wearing a NuBra or no bra and using fashion tape to keep everything in place. I would recommend it for women of the following body types: Hourglass, Athletic, Petite, Straight & Narrow, Full Bust. I would wear this style to a beach party, a day date in the summer, brunch with friends. I would pair it with neutral accessories and shoes, like wedge heels and a simple cork or wicker clutch.

i rented this dress for a wedding.  I'm pear-shaped and got the large but it was way too big in the shoulders...which make me look larger.  it was also extremely scratchy from the sequins.  just by taking it off, it left a big scratch mark on my hand...glad i didn't wear it.  Fortunately, RTR overnighted me a replacement dress that ended up working great.

This dress for a night out on vacation with my friend in Miami. The material is gorgeous and it fit perfectly. It's comfortable and classy. It's a more casual style which I loved. I posted a pic on Facebook and a few people said it reminded them of the pretty woman dress.

I love this dress.  I have a friend who wore this dress a few months ago.  When I saw her in it, I knew it was coming to Vegas with me.  The top fit perfectly- I am a little bigger up top and have broader shoulders than most girls.  The waist down was a little big, which was fine given the fact we had a massive dinner the night I wore this!  But all in all, this dress was so flattering, fit so well, I want to buy the dress!
I had to readjust the neckline several times, but it was a beautiful dress.
review_summary: beautiful dress, perfect for day time

review_text: Caution:  do not wear this dress if you don't want people looking at you.  This is a head turner, the dress you wear when you're ok with heads swivelling to look at you when you walk in the door.  I brought it to Vegas and even there, amidst the glitz and sparkle and over-the-top-ness of it all, I felt like the belle of the ball.  I am normally a size medium in Herve but would have liked this to be tighter on top.  Not sure if it was this particular sample, stretched out a little maybe, but just in case I'd order a smaller size as backup.
I was not able to wear this as it isn't flattering on larger busted ladies. It is so cute and wish it would have worked.
Loved everything about this - need to purchase!
review_summary: Loved this for every day wear or to dress up.

review_text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it.  Will rent it again!! I received compliments all night!
review_summary: This dress is absolutely stunning on!

review_text: I absolutely loved this jacket - it was the perfect cover-up for a November weekend trip to NYC. It wasn't too fancy for daytime wear but still dressed up my evening outfits. Will definitely rent again.
I run between a 6 and 8 for dress size.  It was a little large for me, and my bra was showing at the cutout area.  It's gorgeous in person though!
review_summary: This dress is gorgeous in person.  Sadly it was a little large for me.

review_text: Wore this for a dinner in Vegas. Everyone complimented the dress!

The Small was a perfect fit for me.  My other RTR dresses have been XS.    This is a great dress if you want to enhance your cleavage.   I loved being able to wear a push-up bra and added spanx for extra shaping.
review_summary: This dress was a real showstopper.  I have never had so many compliments on a dress!

review_text: Adorable dress.  Fits more like an 8 than a 12.  Made very small.

I LOVE this dress. I wish I could own it. The only con that I have is that the lace under the arms rubbed just a little. The color is stunning, the fit is perfect and there are pockets! I wish it would have been just a tad shorter but when you're 5'0 you get used to it!
review_summary: Wore this for a surprise engagement weekend!

review_text: This dress has a a beautiful color and fits perfectly. It's incredibly comfortable and very cute on.

I love love love this top but the off the shoulder style is just not for me. I personally find it annoying, have to keep adjusting them all night, whether eating or taking a sip everytime I moved my arms one shoulder or the other would move. Could definitely be me though, I have broad shoulders and terrible posture! If I had nice straight shoulders maybe it would have been fine. Just not for me, but really really pretty top. lots of compliments regardless how I felt lol!
loved this dress! i am size 10, curvy. i ordered a Large, the fit was perfect! I was comfortable & received compliment after compliment all night. I'll be ordering this one again!

Absolutely loved this dress! The blue is even more vibrant in person, and it' s on a heather grey background which is a little hard to tell in the pictures. I also rented the suggested necklace, and while I was a little skeptical when I saw the necklace separate from the dress, it worked beautifully together. I wore this for a night out in Vegas in April, and I was a little nervous it would be too warm based on other reviews, but it was perfect.
review_summary: Loved this dress so much I want to wear it again in black!

review_text: This dress was the perfect dress for a vacation in Hawaii, specifically for dinner on the beach. I got compliments all night long - people kept telling me I matched the flowers and the Mai Tai's! Definitely runs small overall - I am flat chested and short, and this dress was the perfect length and tight in the bust. Works great with low-to-med heels and NuBra (strapless/backless stick on bra). No jewelry needed! EASY.
Simple lightweight material with nice details. Worn site seeing in warm weather. Perfect dress for everyday.
Slightly short on me - I had to wear tights

You might think its going to look like a tent-dress but its just enough fabric.  It drapes beautifully...and the material breathes!! I wore it on vacation in Miami, in June, and it was perfect.  When I walked it was like walking down a "runway" due to all the attention it got.  Loved this look.
Great quality, very sexy, true to size
review_summary: Wore it for formal night on a cruise.  Perfect outfit

review_text: I brought this romper with me on vacation and absolutely loved it! It was cute as a cover-up but also easy to dress up for casual everyday wear. Can be worn off the shoulder or as a t-shirt style - will definitely be renting again!
review_summary: Best Romper to bring on vacation!

review_text: I took this dress on vacation to New Orleans and ended up wearing it twice. The material isn't thick (but it is lined) so it's great for warmer weather. I paired it with sneakers in the day while walking around the city and with heeled sandals at night for a nice dinner out. The ruching on the stomach not only provides some wiggle room when you're eating, but also provides shape (very flattering for hourglass figures). Even though there's not too much give in material in the top, I still felt comfortable in (and could get easily in and out of) the dress. Overall, great rental... I want to buy this dress to keep!
review_summary: Flattering style that works day and night!

review_text: It is a bit short, I ordered up a size and it was perfectly appropriate for work with black tights!
review_summary: This dress was adorable and flattering! Sooo many compliments.

review_text: Great fit, true to size
review_summary: Very comfortable and looked great on!

review_text: This dress is beautiful! I received so many compliments on it when I wore it wine tasting in Napa.  It's super lightweight, soft and comfy. It can be dressed up or down depending on your needs.  Love it!

This is the second time I've rented this romper and it's very comfortable! The color is beautiful! The only downside to it is when you need to go to the restroom, someone will need to help you zip it up. However, I look forwarding to renting it again for another event!

This dress isn't made of Clover Canyon's usual material - this is more of a jersey material. But the dress fits well and the pattern is fun. The cutout is just enough. It's definitely long. I am only 5'2" , but with the regular length I needed 5" heels for the dress not to drag.
Absolutely gorgeous dress. Great fit, no complaints! Lots of compliments.
This dress fell just at/above my ankles, not a true maxi. This did not bother me at all, but if you are 5'9 like me, just know that your shoes and feet will be totally visible.
review_summary: I received compliments throughout the night.

review_text: Cute, comfortable and easy to wear. The fabric is nice  - I expected it to be more cotton/casual but it's a lightweight synthetic material (it's nice, I don't know how to describe it) that makes it feel a little nicer than just a cotton sun dress. I wore this to work and took it on vacation to Hawaii - it's pretty versatile. The shape is forgiving and it fit well. The only area that was a little tight was under the arms, but it was not so tight as to be uncomfortable. A good all-around dress rental, with low risk that it won't fit.

As a muscular, curvy and petite girl, i wasn't sure the romper would look good. It is beyond cute and the M fits great. I wanted to be safer with less tight so I went with M as opposed to S. Highly recommend this with some nude pumps...now all i need is a spray tan :)

I met a great friend for a weekend away in Chicago. We had never been before and LOVED it. We had a night out and both got dressed up. This was super comfortable and easy to wear. If you aren't comfortable with your bust this may not work for you. Also other people said it was short but I felt ok with the length.
The size was too small resulting in me not being able to wear it. A friend of mine was able to fit into it.

Perfect for vacation.  Fit great in the bust.  May run a little large but fit perfectly for me.  The size 10 was ok, but I like things a little looser.  The lining is a stretch material which makes it super comfy.
Never wore it.
review_summary: Coat arrived late, so I didn't get to take it with me to Canada.

review_text: Got the 2.  Managed to squeeze in, but decided I wouldn't be comfortable for the night. Not a lot of stretch/give to this dress.  I recommend you size up for the back-up.  Very classy.
dress is very fitted in the top but also flattering
review_summary: flattering dress and unique colors / patterns

review_text: Such a playful and unique beach cover-up!  The fabric has a slight stretch to it. It's not completely see-through, so you can simply throw it on and transition the look from beach to restaurant-appropriate!
I wore this dress for formal night on a Caribbean cruise. The color and fit were perfect for the occasion. I felt great and did not want to send this dress back!
review_summary: Perfect for a Caribbean Cruise Vacation

review_text: LOVE this dress. It's super cute and fits nicely. I like the zipper in the front, you can zip it all the way up and be conservative or leave it a little low and show a little chest. Fabric is very light so you won't feel hot if the sun is beaming down on you.
review_summary: Such a cute dress for the summer!

review_text: The dress does have a back zip that makes the bodice more form fitting than the pic portrays. It is a lovely dress I wore to a day party in a vineyard and was very pleased!!

I wore these pants on a trip to the Middle East. I figured they would be both fashionable and airy for the desert sun. They're lined, so they were actually less breathable/airy than I thought. But it was still a great choice for photos/activities on a day when a dress wasn't appropriate. Would absolutely recommend!
review_summary: Photographed beautifully. Fashion forward and comfortable. True to size.

review_text: A little too low at the boobs for the bra I had available to me, but fit nicely otherwise and a fun find.

The pattern and color are great for vacation. The dress is very sexy in the shoulders and chest, but fits quite large and loose around the torso and body. In fact, it felt like a mumu. Nonetheless, it was comfortable and sexy at least from the shoulders up!
Runs true to size, love the dress

The material of this dress made it very comfortable and the dress looked great on... this was a great choice for my kentucky derby dress!!  The only complaint I had was the top was slightly too large (too long between shoulders and bottom of bust i think) so it gapped a little bit at the bust... but that's just a minor nit-pick... otherwise I LOVVVED this dress!
review_summary: This dress was SUPER comfortable... great choice for warm weather events!

review_text: Thick fabric which made for a tighter fit but it was perfect for a night out in Vegas! Will rent this one again!
Nice a-line cut was very flattering around shoulders and forgiving at the waist line which was perfect since I am 4mos pregnant so just starting to show!
review_summary: Dress was perfect for night out

review_text: Wore this for a night out in Vegas and it was perfect! It definitely showed some wear in the arms where sequins have come off, but not noticeable unless you were really looking. I'd recommend sizing up if you have muscular arms/broad shoulders - it was definitely snug around the arms for me, while the rest of the dress fit nicely. The sleeves were also really short on me, but I was able to push them up for a 3/4 look without much trouble.

The dress is visually stunning but not very comfortable to wear. The material is heavy and bulky to wear. There is little stretch so if it doesn't fit exactly to your body type then it won't fit. The dress is also very long. I'm 5'9 and it came down pass my knees. Bonus is you can wear a regular bra with the dress.
Loved this rental. Wore it to church and out for lunch on the lake in Austin TX.  The length and overall fit were great. The open detail on the back was nice and classy.
I rented these just as an alternative for vacation.  They are super slimming, something about the color blocking.  Thick fabric, quality piece.
Don't sweat or get any water on this dress--there will be an immediate ring.  Otherwise, loved it!
No stretch, fits true to size.
review_summary: Loved this skirt for a recent trip I took to Europe. Was easy to dress up/down.

review_text: I rented this after I already rented 2 other dresses for a Vegas Bachelorette Party. After reading about how one of the dresses ran small I spoke with Heather/Megan B. (? sorry I typed name on my phone but lost phone in Vegas!) and she recommended this one. It fit like a glove! I usually rent 8 but so glad I got the 6 too. The 8 wasn't too bad but the 6 was definitely more of a vanity thing. :) The lining inside the dress will keep you warm, it's almost like sweat pants lining. Very comfortable dress to move around in! This has been one of my top faves and I never would have gotten this dress had it not been for the stylist from RTR!!!
Didn't end up wearing, the white wasn't bright in the dress, it almost looked worn so many times so it was greyish and the other colors didn't pop as much. Unfortunate because the fit was great
I wore this to a very upscale restaurant in Bermuda and received many compliments for the its flowing beauty.
This dress has great stretch and is a heavier material with great construction that is very forgiving! I loved how the longer length gave some sophistication to the middle cut-out.

I liked this dress a lot, although it was very heavy for a beach vacation. It really looked great on and the cut out at the stomach is a perfect detail to add something interesting without being over the top. The only downsides were that the material presses against your skin a little too much around the cut out which can look kind of unflattering and that it really was heavy for a warm day.

I received this dress as part of a group because one of my originals didn't come back to RTR in time to ship to me.  I tried this dress on, but on me, it was not flattering.  It was overwhelming for my frame, and a little too long for my height.  Luckily RTR had sent a different Clover Canyon that worked well.  I love the brand and this dress did have that same stretch to it, which was nice.

The original Herve that I picked out became unavailable the week of my trip to Vegas, and RTR let me pick another dress regardless of price. That was a plus in my experience. Like all Herves, this dress fit like a glove. So in normal sizing I would say it runs a little small but for Herve it is true to size. I want to own this one!!
review_summary: PERFECT for a night out in Vegas! Loved the color!

review_text: I rented this to wear it Paris and it was fine. It is a lot of material for overall it is a bit baggy.

This is going to be an odd review but I really like this dress. The pattern is super odd and the placement of the bottoms frills are odd and the buckle is kind of odd. BUT it is SO flattering! The dress is really cute on and I do not know how to explain it. If you have a day time event, possibly a luncheon, bridal shower or nice BBQ this is perfect! The top is a bit roomy but it fit really well otherwise. True to size.
review_summary: Odd style and pattern BUT so flattering and cute!

review_text: I rented this dress through my unlimited subscription for a vacation to Mexico. I am a pretty true size 2 and can occasionally squeeze into a zero, but this 2 I couldn't even zip. I even asked my size 0 18-year old sister to try it on and she couldn't fit into it. That said, it's a beautiful dress and the ruffles are delicate and unique. If I rent it again, I will definitely do at least a 4!
review_summary: Gorgeous dress, but runs very small!

review_text: The color is accurate and it has a nice stitch pattern. The elastic top does not stay down across your shoulders, which is the only redeemable quality to the dress.  This dress makes anyone look heavier than they are - I would highly recommend as a maternity dress, if anything.  I am 5'1" and athletic, and I was absolutely swimming in this material.  I let my friend try it on (so someone could at least wear it!), but even at 5'10" and thin, she hated how it made her look!
review_summary: Unflattering on anyone. This dress was unflattering on me, 5'1", and my friend, 5'10".

review_text: I rented this for my honeymoon, but was also able to wear to work. Very versatile and comfortable. I love Trina Turk. Her dresses do run larger. I fit into my size, but could size down if I wanted form fitting.

I was nervous about how short this romper is when I first put it on! Especially because I am not blessed with skinny legs! It is beautiful though, the lace is great and the sleeves make it feel more classy with the short length. I wore this in Vegas for dinner and a show and it was perfect for that.  I added a belt because I felt the pockets made it puff out a little bit. I would rent this again, I received so many compliments
true to size, lightweight, flowy and super comfortable! can also be slightly dressed up with jewelry.
review_summary: perfect for a night out OR a casual beach day

review_text: This dress fit perfectly, even without a bra. I wear a 6 in every brand, and this could have fit a 4-8 comfortably (especially for pear shapes). The back is elastic, so it's very forgiving with eating and moving around. The silk material did make my legs and butt sweat more than usual while I was sitting and make the dress feel wet, but it dried quickly and was very breezy while standing. You're probably not going to get 100 compliments, but the comfort of it made me happier than the usual RTR compliments.
Got compliments on it. The detail on the front was very nice quality.

I wore this dress for a night out in South Beach. The dress does run small -- I usually wear a small or medium and I wore the large in this dress. The medium would have fit, but the large was a little more comfortable. This dress is great because you can wear a normal bra with it, and it looks classy while still being sexy.
This is lovely in person although the neckline is a true crew neck ( I was expecting a bit more of a boat neck). It is quite tight in the bust but the wrap part is very flattering.
Very true to size.  Felt great on.  Lots of people said how great I looked
review_summary: I loved this dress!! I wore it to a wedding and felt great.

review_text: The material is a bit sheer, but you could not see through it when it was on.  I was able to wear a strapless bra with it.  I wore it with white shorts and a cute summer beach hat.  Made a lunch date by the beach feel more dressed up.  I would rent it again.
I wore this multiple times. both with heels and flat sandals.
review_summary: This romper was perfect for my Mexico vacation.

review_text: This was a cute dress on the hanger, but on me it just fit a little awkwardly. It was longer than I expected, but tight around the thighs. And the way that the back of the dress draped was a little funny since the neckline with a tie was a little loose.  So it was tight in some places and loose in others. I ended up not wearing it on vacation (and therefore didn't take any photos).  This would work for someone taller than me with thin legs and broader shoulders.
review_summary: Awkward fit and a little long

review_text: Fit really well. Only thing was the zipper kinda made a funny roll if I stood a certain way. Wasn't that noticeable, though.
review_summary: Felt supersexy! Perfect for a Miami night.

review_text: Fit was perfect for curvy figure
The dress was longer than I expected but I was still able to wear it with flats. I loved the way the dress fell and the thickness of the material.
review_summary: The back of the dress is stunning. The thickness of the material was perfect.

review_text: I rented this dress as part of my unlimited subscription.  I wore it on a cruise in the Caribbean.  It was comfortable and fit perfectly to size!  I was able to wear shape wear underneath without it being too obvious.  I have a shorter than average torso, so the dress fell at the perfect length.  If you have a longer torso, it may be too short for you.  I wanted to keep this dress!

The fit of this dress was tricky for me. I have a very small waist and larger hips/butt. It fit perfectly everywhere, but in the back, it was a little baggy right at the bottom of my back. It didn't stop me from wearing it, though! And I don't think you could really tell! Loved it!
review_summary: I loved the look of this dress! Classy, but sassy!

review_text: OK!  Soft wool coat that is sooooooooooo comfy.  It runs large, so order accordingly!  Leather trim is the perfect touch.  The full length zipper is fast and easy to zip. This jacket could go with so many things in your closet.  I am 5'8" and 175 lbs and if I order again will get a large instead of the XL.  Probably looks better on a taller woman since print is very large.  It was fun to wear!
review_summary: Phenomenal Jacket!  Did not want to send back!

review_text: Loved the fabric and pattern. It was a little to big on top for me but was ok through the hips. I might try to rent it in the 8 to see if I prefer that size

After reading other reviews, I rented the XS size and it fit perfectly. The material isn't silk, but rather a polyester blend. It held up great while flying and then going straight into 90 temps and wine tasting. Fits well under the arms, and the cut around the hem makes it very flattering. I was worried that it might be a little short given the size, but it was perfect. I definitely recommend.
review_summary: Perfect dress for traveling and wine tasting!

review_text: In terms of fit, it was larger than I had expected.  I got a small and a medium, but could have worn an extra small.  I got multiple compliments and would totally rent the dress again.  The lace was awesome on the side of the dress.  Also, when I received it there was a hole in the lace and I told customer service.  They gave me a credit, which was very nice.  Overall, great dress and happy I rented it!
review_summary: Wore it for a night in Vegas and it was perfect.  Picture says it all!

review_text: This dress was much more fun than I was expecting. The skirt has a bit of fullness, which is great for offsetting a top-heavy figure. However, I thought the most fun detail was the Run The World shoulders. Very fun & I got compliments all night.
This top fit perfectly.  I have never received so many compliments in one day on anything I have ever worn.  I highly recommend this.  I wore it with jeans during the day shopping in Vegas.

Quality was as expected. I still think it's a cute, whimsical dress, but it was quite possibly the least flattering dress I've ever tried on. The straight across neckline coupled with the volume of the sleeves made me look like an actual circus tent. 
May be better suited to a smaller busted woman, or someone with a lot of height to offset the volume.

I loved the top part of this dress.  It fit beautifully.  The fabric was also very rich.  I wish the bottom part of this dress hit higher around my waist because I felt like it hit me right where my stomach was, and it made me feel a little bigger than normal.

First, I was nearly 5 months pregnant when I wore this so guessing at what might fit was nerve wracking.  But this was perfect!  The waist band is high, so whether it be pregnant belly or otherwise, it will hug where you're smallest and give PLENTY of room everywhere else.  In fact, if you're on the small or short side, I'd go down a size for the alternate.  I wear a 4 pre-pregnancy and still wore a 4 in this when I'm certainly at least a 6 in everything else.  The fabric is so soft, like a really smooth high quality cotton feels.  I wore it in Orlando in August and didn't overheat.  Also, pockets you can actually use.  The top does taking some getting used to, I tied and re-tied it a few times to get it right.  But the good news is that there's plenty of fabric to cover as much or as little as you want.  I went bra-less and am currently up to a 34D and they were contained, I won't say they sat as high as I'd like, but it wasn't worth trying to hide a bra under there.
review_summary: Perfect for baby bumps and felt like pajamas...in a good way!

review_text: I wore this more than anything else on our road trip down the keys. It's cute, comfortable, looks great with a belt or without. Good for swimsuit cover up or for a night out on the town. I will rent again for vacays!
super soft and silky.  A great length for a mom.  perfect for the beach.  I also wore with white jeans and sandals for errands.

Loved this jacket. I got numerous compliments just walking around Vegas.
Not too heavy. Was a bit bulky and not the most flexible garment...but def worth it.
This dress was not too revealing with the side cut outs.  Still looked classy but also sexy.  Not too short and runs true to size.  Would recommend.
Great fit, colors and shape.  This is a one of a kind great top.  would love to own this top!
review_summary: AMAZING TOP!  Hubby loved it.  Very flattering.

review_text:
Pros: I was super comfortable wearing it. The color is beautiful and it's unique. 
Cons: I had to size up and I found myself pulling it up more times. But it's worth it.
review_summary: Comfortable, stylish and a nice fit

review_text: This is the perfect jumpsuit. Super comfortable, but also chic. Will definitely rent this again... or buy it! Does run a little big in the chest. The snap across the chest isn't super secure, but works.
Great fit and I felt comfortable and warm in 40 degree weather.
review_summary: Got it for a trip to NYC and loved it! It went perfect with everything.

review_text: Wore this for a beach vacation, really cute and fun colors.  I do have big hips and it was somewhat tight on them. It was fine, but you can tell the dress is supposed to be more relaxed look.
Fun and fancy at the same time. Perfect fit for me. I am 5'10" and  it hit just above the knee. Great standout dress without being overly dressy. Comfy as the lace stretches.
review_summary: Was great for a GA wine dinner.

review_text: Absolutely a fabulous dress!  It was fun and beautiful, and it fit great!
I wore this in India where the temp was around 100 F.  The material was breathable and respectful to my visits to local temples while also fashionable & didn't look like I was wearing a tent.

I loved this dress. It was all in the details! It is a very light yellow, but almost off white. Fabric is stretchy and is fairly true to size. I would size up if you have a larger bust or broader shoulders- I sized up to give my arms more wiggle room. Wore this to the gardens of Versailles in Paris and it was perfection!

I rented this as a cover-up for a vacation and it was perfect. It would have been too short to wear as an everyday outfit. The material was perfect for hot weather. The off the shoulder stayed up and wasn't too tight. The only reason I say it runs small is that the shorts are SHORT.

Very pretty dress in bold colors that turns heads. The slight off the shoulder look is sexy but allows for a traditional bra. The fit is perfect as well - highlights the waist and curves in a tasteful manner. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Love the almost off-the-shoulder look and the bold colors

review_text: Ordered this for a trip to iceland -- i loved the way it looks, but unfortunately was too large (even though i typically like box-y fits.. i ordered the 2 instead, hopefully that one works!

I rented this dress to take on a trip to London, and ended up wearing it a few times.  The fabric is lightweight, but significant enough to be comfortable.  Pattern is bright and cheerful, and the cinched elastic waist is very comfortable but polished.

Pros - Pretty, good material, and perfect for young women or women who have a small bust 
Cons- I am in my late 30s and have a large bust, and while the body was perfect, the top was too tight for my bust and wasn't appropriate for my age group. I think this is better for a 20something or early 30s.
review_summary: Pretty dress, love the colors, perfect for spring.

review_text: Fits like a glove! The fabric is thick enough for good support with a good amount of stretch. My sticky bra showed too much so I went without it and it looked and felt fine.

Hard to get into, impossible to zip without assistance.  I wore this with a black sweater over top, black tights, and black booties.  I dressed it down for during the day, and when I took the sweater off it managed to transition quite well into evening activities.  The neckline is conservative, which is very nice.

Great corset fit, very comfortable, but holding it all together. Wore it for a sexy date on vacations, and all eyes were on me. I wish it was a bit shorter as this midi length is not best for me, but still would love to buy it for the summer
review_summary: Very sexy dress, felt like a princess, planning to buy it

review_text: Rent this immediately!  I received so many compliments when I wore it to dinner during a Florida vacation.  It's comfortable and the XS was the perfect length to wear with flats (I'm 5'9").  Love this one!
Well made dress in a beautiful vibrant yellow. Fully lined with zipper down the back. I wore this poolside at the beach this week.

This dress is beautiful! I love the Art Deco pattern and feel. Unfortunately, it was small around my hips and I could have worn it but didn't want to be tugging at my dress all night in Vegas. If you have wider hips, make sure to go up a size.

this was perfect for 50's on our trip in Spain.  the length is great and feel very stylish wearing it. can be dressed up or dressed down  it is a boxy body but the shoulders and arms are not so I would not have ordered a 0.  I liked the collar it was simple.  fun piece to have in my unlimited membership
review_summary: great style and warm without bulk

review_text: If you have large bust then go up a size. It was very pretty on.
review_summary: I received a lot of compliments.

review_text: Sorry ~ I am the most unphotogenic person but the dress was so fun & flattering that I needed to post!  I am 50 and usually a size 10 but was told the day it was shipping the 10 did not come back so they were sending the 8.  No problem there ~ it fit & was so so comfortable.  Kind of stretchy a bit & not constricting at all.  I would rent again in a heart beat!  Loved it :)
review_summary: Super fun dress ~ so perfect for a cruise :)

review_text: I didn't love this dress like I wanted to. The pattern was perfect, and the material was nice (if a little thin and unstructured). But even the large was just too tight for me- too tight and low to wear a bra. However a looser fit probably would have exposed too much cleavage. I have a large bust, wide ribcage, and broad back. I didn't feel it was that flattering on my body type. The length was fine though- I am 5'8.5" and I was able to wear flats. So this dress is just not my favorite, but it might be yours! It was appropriate for a January, Key West, wedding rehearsal dinner!

Love this dress, so comfortable and flattering! I sized up to a 6 so it was extra roomy, but could have definitely worn a 4 or even a two if I wanted it to be tight. The pockets were great at the hip & the length was perfect for a casual look, could have easily also worn to work. Size up if you have a larger bust if you want to wear it buttoned to the top.

Very flowy and light. Loved the color. Fit was perfect and elastic waste made the dress comfortable after a dinner out. Only issue was one of the sleeves kept flipping over to show the line color underneath. No big deal but did not match the other sleeve.
If you're not  in love with your arms or the armpit area, you might want to reconsider this dress, but otherwise it was sooooo comfortable and faltering!
review_summary: I felt great and comfortable all night in the dress!

review_text: this by far was the hardest item to send back...it was beautiful!! I am 5'5 155lb 36D chest and I wore the medium. it fit PERFECTLY. I wore it up north to dinner since the weather was a little cool at night. it was a head turner. very sophisticated piece of clothing. I cannot wait to rent again
review_summary: I've never struggled so bad to give something back

review_text: I absolutely loved this maxi dress - the fit was perfect and the print was gorgeous. Big fan of Yumi Kim dresses!

This dress was amazing!! Best rental so far for me. Seriously wish I could add this to my closet permanently. 

I wore it multiple times during my honeymoon in Belize but my husband never got sick of it. It nips in at the waist just perfectly and the slit is just the right length. Nice for vacation because you don't need to wear a bra with this one.
review_summary: I absolutely loved this dress; wish I could own it!

review_text: If you're tall size up for length because it's short, especially if you lift your arms! Fit is loose but not a shapeless bag. Great, fun dress with unique flirty sleeves!
Fits true to size. I'm short (5'2'') and this top was pretty short on me. Wore with high waisted shorts and it worked perfectly

The fit was a little loose on me, but nice for wearing a sweater underneath. I definitely needed the extra layer too - this is a lighter jacket. Slightly cropped,  but a good length for me. Love the zippered pockets!
review_summary: For a fall trip to NYC

review_text: This was a fun piece to wear and I got multiple compliments.  As others have mentioned, it was a heavier fabric than you might expect it and it was easy to wear without a bra.  As someone with a small bust and waist, I found it to be a flattering silhouette that showed off my assets instead of being too big.
I rented this via Unlimited for a vacation, the dress fit a little more snug than I wanted it to. Overall it's pretty and nice. Just didn't end up being quite the right fit for me.
I absolutely love this dress! My husband kept telling me how beautiful I looked all night long. This was a perfect vacation dress!
review_summary: I might not return it lol

review_text: Loved the style but it was too small I had to send it back.
Fits great, thick fabric with a lot of stretch. I liked this dress a lot and highly recommend.

Fit was great
 fitted in the botice and flowy skirt it was lightweight and a great color
review_summary: A great 30th Birthday dinner  in napa

review_text: I thought this would be perfect for my Miami vacation but the fabric is very thick and hot. Not appropriate for summer weather. I wore a strapless bra with it which kept creating creases at the top of my bra line, very annoying in pictures.

I didn't want to take this dress off the second I tried it on. It's so comfortable, the fabric is delicious. I rented a UK 14/ US 10, and it was a bit roomy, but the lines were good. It's unique and perfect for vacation or a sunny, weekend day out. I would do the size down next time. Also, in the pic - this is what I was wearing when I visited Chicago RTR location. My friend had to snap a shot. :)

If you're busty, get ready for a knock out look. Bra at your discretion, the dress offers a little support, but with regular adjustments.

This is just a great warm weather dress, beautiful blues and lightweight fabric. Very casual classy and didn't wrinkle in my suitcase. I felt it made me look a bit blocky but I might have needed a smaller size. I have a couple pairs of  Lilly Pulitzer pants in a 6 and they are tighter in the waist than I would like so I went with the 6 in the dress as the 8 was not available and I'm glad, as this was quite comfortable. I thought about buying it but restrained myself!
The material is durable and very comfortable!
Dress is pretty. Great length. Sequins added sass. Didn't love that I couldn't wear a bra with it. Scratchy at times. Not sure I would rent again but it worked for my vacation.

I really liked the dress, but the straps were way long.   Maybe you need to be a bit more busty for this dress in size 10.  The rest of the dress fit nicely.   This was the first time that I had worn this designer, so not sure how to compare to other dresses of same make.

I have rented this a few times now and I love it everytime.  I usually rent it for Vegas.  super comfy.  I actually wear a bight colored racerback bra with it.  the back it a bit open and you can somewhat see a bra but its really great overall.
Great for an evening out, just a tad short, had to keep covered when sitting down.  Otherwise, adorable.

I rented this dress for a weekend trip to Las Vegas with my best friend. I rented the small with the medium as a backup based on the reviews. I probably could have worn the small but it was just a little too tight, so I went with the medium since it was a little more generous length wise. My friend and I decided it would be funny to match, so she ended up wearing the small! Two girls in matching gold sequin dresses in Vegas certainly drew some attention. These dresses were totally hot and actually comfortable! I was a little warm initially with the long sleeve because we were rushing to get to a show on time, but once we got to sit and relax the long sleeves weren't too hot. The sequin create a cool sequin pattern but do tend to catch on each other, the only reason i give is 4 stars instead of 5.

I rented these pants for a vacation to Mexico. I wore them all around Mexico City and also by the beach with sandals. They were super comfortable. Wear them with a fitted tanktop or tee to help define your waist since the pants are a little baggy.
review_summary: Chic pants for bopping around the city

review_text: This dress made my cleavage look bigger than I thought possible! Without a nubra, it still fit comfortably because the tie can be adjusted for more or less support, but it does loosen a bit throughout the day. I have a 29" waist, and the 6 fit like a glove (the band around the waist is a bit unforgiving) so any bigger or bigger busted, I think you could safely size up. The convenient buttons up the front allowed me to comfortably play beach volleyball for hours! I might rent this one again.
This is a fun dress - Rented it for beach vacation.  Did a lot of walking and felt like the dress was durable yet reasonably light.   NIce in photos as it has a lot of color.

Loved the color and quality of the fabric. I tend to be a size 10 with sometimes wider hips for a size 10 but this Large was a tad big on top. Otherwise, loved the color and great for my vacation to BVI.

Not the best pic, but best pic I have of the jacket. I loved this so much that I considered buying it! It fit perfectly, there's enough stretch in it to feel completely comfortable, and it works with every outfit. I wore it pretty much every day in Paris and felt casually stylish and. I have nothing negative to say about it all, and I still want it!
review_summary: Perfect for a fall European vacation!

review_text: Unfortunately I did not keep the romper on all night, since the part that crosses the bust kept gaping and exposing my bra. While it may be a simple solution to add tape, it did not feel comfortable, especially since you can't pull down the shorts well to fix the solution. If you have broad shoulders, you may also have trouble keeping the halter-esque cross top in place.
review_summary: I planned a Las Vegas weekend with a best friend and wore this romper out on the Strip to a show.

review_text: Loved this romper once I got it on, but I needed my friend's help to do it! Zipper is a bit flimsy and the back buttons up. It also wrinkles super easily. BUT the print is adorable and I got so many compliments!
review_summary: Difficult to get on but super cute

review_text: Very comfortable and forgiving fit.  For short ladies like me, I wore it with a belt when wearing flats as it did not drag on the ground.

Loved this dress! Received compliments everywhere we went in Gruene that day. Love the bow detail in the back and the lace detail. The only downside was it was a little big in the bust, but you definitely couldn't tell in the pictures. It photographed beautifully!

This was the PERFECT black dress. It accented all of my curves. It was definitely a head turning dress. The only thing is, for me, I have very athletic and muscular legs and a big bottom, the dress was right around the thighs and butt. 
I will absolutely rent this dress again though!
This dress adjusts to the body very well and is the perfect dress for a small waist. It gives your body a beautiful and sexy shape with a very refined and elegant class. #iloveit

I ordered this dress to wear to an outdoor concert on vacation, it was perfect!
The comfort of this dress made me wear it twice and a friend ask if she could try it. I wore it in the evening with wedges and then for my flight home with with flat sandals. The neckline allows a regular bra and is flattering. The length and slits on the sides work on any height without looking too heavy the way maxi dress sometime do.
The color and design on the fabric make it stand out. It looks luxe but is a very thin lightweight fabric. Not too sheer but it doesn't feel as expensive as it looks. Great for packing as it doesn't wrinkle.
The Kate Spade Aqua Geo Necklace was a perfect pair with this dress.
review_summary: You'll want to wear it again

review_text: fit well.  It's quite short which is great for the beach, but not all other places.
review_summary: Great comfortable summer dress or beach cover up!

review_text: Perfect for a late August, early September evening outdoors.
review_summary: I had so much fun going out dancing in this top.

review_text: Pretty snug but not in a bad way.  Short in a cute way but maybe not for more formal lunch places.  Easy piece accessorise to dress it up for casual evening.

I wore this dress for our first day in Cuba! And I LOVED it sooooooo much. It was the perfect vacation-type dress. It's a bit short (I wore bathing suit bottoms just to be comfortable) and it's looser than I initially thought it was going to be (a bit boxy in shape) but one of my favorite outfits in Havana and dresses on RTR!
review_summary: OMG LOVE THIS DRESS! Perfect for Vacation

review_text: So cute! It is smaller in the bust, so if you are larger, then this isn't a good choice for you. I was nervous about it since I'm petit, but looks great. Can't wait to wear it!
A little snug at the top.
I am normally a 6 or 8 and the medium fit perfect.
review_summary: I rented this for a Vegas trip and it was perfect!

review_text: I wore this during the wine tasting part of my bachelorette party weekend.  It looked great!  I wish the conditions of these items were better. The small came a little worn looking and I question whether it made it to the cleaners before getting to me.  Both of which (frayed looking and not clean) have happened to me before using RTR.  The medium was more pristine, and clean, but I fit the small better.  It was a great choice in terms of style.

Surprisingly flattering fit.  Fun print, and good length for work vacation event. Can be as casual as you want or go like the model for bit more dressed up.  Did not wrinkle too quickly either, which was also surprising and nice.

I read reviews Bc initially I wouldn't have thought I was a small, but in the end, the small was perfect. Dresses were in great condition, and return instructions were very easy to understand!! I wore this with a nubra, which worked great for the lace back!
review_summary: Having two sizes to pick from was awesome and stress free!

review_text: I rented this for a short vacation. Perfect for a nice dinner out. Loved it
Very slimming.
review_summary: Gorgeous dress! Received numerous compliments! LOVE this dress.

review_text: Loved this dress! Was a little unsure about how flattering the ruffle in front would be, but spoke to a RTR stylist and she said the fit was great. She was right! Wore it in Hawaii and loved how lightweight and stylish it was. Will definitely rent, again!
review_summary: This dress is different in a GREAT way!

review_text: I rented this dress for my 30th birthday in Palm Springs. I wanted to take advantage of the $50 birthday promo (with the PRO membership), even though we weren't doing anything crazy. It was over 100 degrees, so I wanted something loose and flowy. I wasn't expecting much when I rented this dress, but it exceeded my expectations and was a lot cuter than I thought in the pics. The back has a criss cross with a metal loop (no one posted pics of the back, and I realized I forgot as well). I didn't have to wear a bra. It was the perfect length with sandals (didn't drag). And it didn't cling to me in the heat. I would highly recommend this dress for any casual occasion.

I LOVEEEE this jumper. I am so tempted to just buy this. It was great for my LA trip as fabric is light and cozy. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner with sandals and it was perfect. The breast area was a little tight but anything larger would have been to big.

I absolutely loved this dress. The colors and lace detail are gorgeous. I wore it many times during my unlimited wardrobe. I got compliments from strangers. It was a little on the thicker side but still cool enough for the summer as long as it's not 90+ degrees.
The fit was amazing and felt expensive. I wore this for a girls trip to Vegas and felt like a million bucks!
review_summary: I loved it so much I considered buying it! I tried it on for my fiancee and he was sad it's a rental

review_text: Wore this during a bachelorette weekend to the Hampton Classic Horse Show! As other reviewers have described, the dress is much more vibrant in person. The photo here makes the dress appear to be a softer, peachy pink. However, it is much closer to neon in person! I typically wear a 6 but went with the 4 in this dress. It fit perfectly! I wore a stick on bra and felt secure.
review_summary: Great dress with a dramatic back!

review_text: Fits well.
review_summary: Cozy and goes with a lot of outfits.

review_text: This top is really great. I'm a 36DD and it was able to accommodate the girls (I didn't even wear a bra!). I originally had ordered this in a 10 but I sent it back for the 8 and the 8 was perfect.
review_summary: Fun, unusual, highlights the waist! Definitely an awesome rental.

review_text: This dress fit like a glove!! I wanted to keep it. It was so flattering and made my waist look tiny. I wore it out for vacation in San Diego and was a great dinner/out dress. Would definitely rent again.
It's beautiful in person. Loved the back. Fit great.
review_summary: Wore this for the Britney Spears concert in Las Vegas. Loved it! Very short.

review_text: I wore this on a vacation to the pacific northwest where it was about 40 degrees everyday. The coat was warm, and has big pockets for you to put your hands in. The snap buttons are handy for when you're in a hurry, and the overall appearance of the coat is adorable.
Great fit.  True to size.
review_summary: Easy relaxed fit.  Perfect for the beach.

review_text: This dress is really versatile! I was able to wear it for four separate occasions. I originally bought it as a fun dress to wear to a luau while vacationing in Maui (seen in picture), but while trying it on right before the trip, my now fiancé proposed to me in it! Then I was able to wear it to a family engagement lunch, and for a quick engagement ring shoot that same day. The dress itself is a pretty light cotton and is extremely roomy. I would size down to a 4 and I normally wear a 6-8 on the top and bottom. Ladies with a bigger bust will feel comfortable EXCEPT that it cuts fairly low so you would have to find a bra that can hide. It's a very casual dress, I would wear it to an informal wedding or lunch/brunch date. Note too, there are weird ties at the arms that I don't think are functional/useful.
review_summary: Ended up as my engagement dress!

review_text: I was wary about this dress, but very glad I ended up choosing it! It was definitely a simple dress with respect to typical Vegas ware, but it was beautifully simplistic and the mesh panelling was very well executed and showed just enough skin. I wore this dress with statement shoes and therefore chose to tone down with regard to jewelry. I order a 6 to size up, which was too large, and the dress was stretchy enough that the 4 left just enough room to move around in. Definitely a pleasant surprise!
review_summary: Love the mesh detailing - simple but unforgettable!

review_text: Fit very well.  Very comfortable.
review_summary: This was a great addition to my vacation wardrobe.  Wrinkle free and can dress it up or down.

review_text: Perfect romper for vacation!  The pattern is pretty and the material is light and airy.  I got a lot of compliments! Will definitely rent this again this summer!
The dress fit great, arrived new with tags still on.. SCORE!  Wore it to jazz brunch in NOLA and then for walking around the Garden District.  It was airy and light, perfect for the 78 degree day.
review_summary: Nice light dress for jazz brunch in NOLA.

review_text: Pretty dress and great color. It's a little short and snug throughout the torso.
It was good quality but too big.

Did not wear the dress - it is absolutely adorable - but huge!  I wear a 4 in Milly - sometimes a 2, but the 0 looked like a bag.  Again - dress is very cute and comfortable and love the sparkles but could not wear.

This dress is prettier once on. The colors are beautiful and the fabric is very light. I definitely recommend wearing a slip because it is very see-through. I went have dinner with my family, there was plenty of daylight and we were outside. I took it for vacation and forgot my slip, so I wore shorts underneath, but I tried no to separate my legs too much while standing because it shows your legs pretty well underneath the dress. Also, It would look better without a bra or a nubra because the back opens a little. I wore a regular nude bra and it showed the band a little bit in the back. Despite those little details, I enjoyed wearing it. I am about 5'6" and wore this dress with red flats. It was a bit long, but nothing too bad. Again, I was on vacation and I didn't really have many choices, but it was perfect for a family dinner and pictures!!
Perfect dress for a weekend or vacation. I ended up belting it with a brown belt as the dress did flare out towards the bottom. I would definitely wear this again.

This was the perfect Vegas cocktail dress. I loved the subtle sparkles. The A-line fit was perfect for me because I'm a little larger on the top. It was comfortable for me to eat, drink, and dance in. I got so many compliments on it from my family and friends when I posted a picture on Facebook of it.
review_summary: Perfect Vegas cocktail dress. Comfy. Sparkly. Flattering Cut.

review_text: The straps are very comfortable and while a forgiving dress, it doesn't look sloppy and certainly does show off what you want. There is not a possibility of a bra, but the straps and the shirring inside the dress were helpful for a B cup.
review_summary: This was incredibly comfortable and fabulous to wear on vacation!

review_text: I have problems with jacket fits, but this was a dream. I was strapped for space in my carry-on, so I didn't want to have to pack a whole extra jacket for the one day that it was going to be raining while I was in the city. This jacket was a perfect rental! It is high-quality and easy to wear. It kept me stylish and dry while traveling to-and-fro, while strolling the city during the day, and on my way to a show in the evening. Will rent again!
review_summary: This jacket was a perfect rental for a weekend in New York! Pairs well with casual and formal wear!

review_text: I wore this for a weekend getaway in Vegas! It was amazing! I am typically a 6 or 8 in dresses. So I ordered the M and S as a back up (if the fabric stretches I can fit in a small, which was the case here) I wore the S because the straps on the M were too big and would've had to wear a bra. With the S I didn't and was definitely snug! but looked amazing. I sat through a 2 hour show, and stood at a bar all night. Someone even asked my BF if he was a celebrity of some sort (I attributed that to his model looking companion...ME! :)) I also received a bottle of free champagne from a stranger!!! Ha!!! It definitely runs small but it's worth the rental, this is my 4th time renting with RTR and have not been disappointed at all!!!

Let me tell you--this dress is the absolute best rental I've ever had from RTR to date. The fit was perfect, the print was to die for, and the style is edgy and cute and sexy at the same time. It was perfect for a 24/7 shindig: conference during the day, cocktail party in the afternoon, and the bar at night. I got sooooo many compliments on this dress. I wore the skirt a second time on my vacation with a different brightly colored crop top and it worked amazing.
review_summary: I loved this dress so much!!

review_text: Loved this dress!  The train takes it from a plain white dress to something glam! Fits quite well and true to size.
review_summary: Loved this dress! Train is fab!

review_text: Overall I liked this jumper, but the material had a bit of a faded look to it, which I was not expecting (that or it's faded in cleaning). I ordered a size up and it was just right. The neckline is pretty low, so don't expect to be able to wear a bra.

Even better in person. I wore this on my vacation in Italy, and it was an awesome layering piece. Very hip. The collar frames perfectly, and although I never used it, but there is a hood zipped in there. The pattern is stand out, but not obnoxious. Highly recommend. I'll be renting it again this fall for sure!

I normally love equipment tops but I think this one needed to be pressed on the lower collar. It kept flipping up and really bothered me because I work it during the day on vacation and we were taking a lot of pics. Still a really cute top though. Definitely not see through. I think that I truly needed a medium but ended up getting the large because if I don't the buttons pull cross my chest.
Perfect amount of stretch and ruching that hugs every curve, but hides every bump. Very pretty dress, great for a garden wedding.  Worn with a strapless bra.

I rented this dress for a Vegas trip and was a bit overwhelmed by the attention it caused. fit wise, It was a little big on me, the xs wasn't available so I took my chances and rented the small which I ended up belting at the waist to give it some definition. I don't think I've ever gotten as many compliments in one night as I did wearing this dress. It was a little overwhelming, other reviewers were NOT lying when they said all eyes are on you in this dress. Very true, so much so that I ended up changing my outfit after dinner. It was still a night, and a dress that I will never forget!
review_summary: Feeling like a celebrity all night as people complimented me (and my boyfriend) on my dress

review_text:
Really cute little romper with just enough detail to make it stand out.
It was super low cut so either pin it or wear an undershirt if you don't want to gap open down to your midriff. The length was perfect for me, not too short. Loved wearing it around San Diego!

This is a beautifully made dress.  It is really exquisite and I felt very pretty in it.  I wore it for a dressy dinner in Mexico and it was perfect.  I usually wear a 6 and it ran a tiny bit large through the hips, but still looked nice.

I rented several dresses to wear to the fancy cruise dinners on our voyage. RTR was unable to fulfill my original order, so they sent this dress instead. And boy I'm glad they did! I got so many compliments! I loved the color and fit. It was a wee bit tight in the bust, but hey, it worked out because it supported the girls, and I didn't need a bra! The long length was great for about 2 inch heels (i'm 5ft 10in) . And that slit? SO SEXY
review_summary: THAT COLOR! This is a head turner

review_text: As others have mentioned, it runs a little large on top. If you're flat-chested, I'd advise sizing down.

This dress is a showstopper - I received so many compliments! The dress does have a lining so it's a bit heavier weight than it may look and it is not forgiving in the belly area, for example you could literally see my belly button and belly ring...that I didn't like, but a little spanx or shapewear would solve that issue. Loved the lacing detail along the sides and the high neckline - very flattering for your shoulders and collarbone area. 

And the color - it's a vibrant lime(ish) green and looks stunning at sunset and in the evening. Perfect for a wedding, fancy date night, or vacation.
review_summary: Stunning curve hugging dress with a flattering neckline.

review_text: This dress fit great overall. However, it was not as tight in the top and I was hoping for, so I wore it with a plunge bra and lots of padding for maximum cleavage. This was my second Herve and as expected the fabric is thick and sturdy, yet stretchy and very flattering. Got tons of compliment. Felt like a princess.
review_summary: Perfect for standing out in Vegas

review_text: I wore this as a bathing suit cover up for vacation recently and it was awesome! It is too short for me as a normal dress but I loved the preppy look which worked well for my beach style.

This dress has an upbeat, fun pattern--- that really does not do flattering things for a big bust. I was disappointed that I had to return it since it would have been perfect for my vacation to Florida, but it made me look even bigger in the chest than I already am (36DDD).
Cute shirt for weekend fun.  Fit true to size but I wore a cami underneath.  Not sure how to keep arm ties out of the way at times,  but would rent again.
Wore it around town on vacation in Costa Rica. Very comfortable... but sort of felt like a artsy grandmother wearing it.
review_summary: I thought this dress was OK.

review_text: Wore it in Vegas and strangers came up to me to compliment me on the dress. My husband commented that in all our years he has never seen so many people stop me because of what I was wearing. Made me feel great!
i rented this dress for a trip, and I felt beautiful in it.  It fits perfectly and is very comfortable!  I definitely recommend this item!
review_summary: I love this dress! The colors are vibrant, and it's very flattering

review_text: I liked some things about this dress and some I didn't.  Pros: fit true to size and flattering, comfortable, soft thick material great for a chilly night in Vegas.  Cons: sleeves were way too long but easily remedied by folding them in, not as short on me as it was on the model, hard to zip up where the satin banding is, zipper was very thick and would create an unattractive puckering at the side that I would have to pull down the dress to get rid of,  mesh cutouts are very small and virtually unnoticeable to others, and none of the detailing shows up in photos.  It looks like a plain black dress in photos, so if you want a dress that stands out in photos, this is not it.  I could not get the banding or mesh to show up both without and with flash.  Other than that, it was a cute dress.

I wore this to see Britney in Vegas! It was beautiful. The sleeves were a little tight so I'm glad I got the XL backup size. My only complaint was that the sequins did scratch the back of my legs a bit, but nothing that would prevent me from wearing this dress!
review_summary: PERFECT DRESS FOR BRITNEY SPEARS IN VEGAS!!!!

review_text: The dress was tight enough to be flattering yet lose enough to be comfortable.
The fit wasn't perfect for my body type.  I have a relatively short/wide torso so I believe that was the issue but the dress was beautiful and flowed away from the hips which was very forgiving.
review_summary: I wore this dress on vacation to a rehearsal dinner and got MANY compliments!

review_text: Love the vibrant color of this dress. Fits true to size

Rented this skirt for a Vegas trip. Ordered two sizes up as it was all that was available and mini skirts tend to run small. Would have been okay with a size down as it was large but still worked. The sequins were fun but had to make sure they were all laying flat. Great for a fun evening out, would rent again but in a smaller size.
I wore this as a beach cover up and it was nice. I didn't realize that it had buttons the whole way down the front.

I stood out in this gown, was not A typical gown for our second Captains dinner which I loved about this gown. The only downside is in the 2R I rented the zipper was a challenge. It took my boyfriend and I 20 minutes to get it up with a very sweaty, frustrated me by the end. He was incredibly supportive and helpful. Without him I would have been in a heap on the floor having given up.
Fit great with side zip to keep waist visible.
