Short in bodice doesn't fit if you have even a little bit of booty. :( I recommend sizing up.
review_summary: I had to return without wearing it. It wasn't comfortable to wear.

review_text: No cons--simply amazing
review_summary: Perfection. With the structured bodice it was comfortable and gorgeous

review_text: I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and it fit and felt great. The dress is true to size. The detail of the lace was so pretty. There was a small hole on the shoulder but you couldn't tell with the detail. The color is a really bright and flattering. Can wear normal bra but the dress is a bit see through so nude undies are a must :) Would love to keep this dress!
review_summary: Perfect fit, very comfortable, love the color!

review_text: Lovely, off white, shift style dress. Easy to dress up or down. Heavyweight. True to size. Would probably recommend sizing down rather than up for backup.
Went great with sheer, black tights!
review_summary: Gorgeous statement dress, was perfect for my sisters 21st birthday weekend in Vegas!

review_text: I wore this for a night out in Atlantic City. I received tons of compliments on the dress and it fit quite well. I loved the pockets.
review_summary: Great for Night out in AC

review_text: I wore this to the fancy dinner night on a cruise to Mexico with my family. I received tons of compliments all night. It was so comfortable and I felt great in it all night. Very true to size, I wore it with spanx just to smooth out the unflattering parts under the jersey like material of the dress. I also rented the clutch which I absolutely loved as well! Loved the flat envelope style of the clutch, fit so much but was super lightweight.

Beautiful off the shoulder style that adds a feminine touch! Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for back up. There is comfortable room in the bust area and this style should be worn with a strapless bra. It is cinched at the waist and loose throughout the hip area. Pair with minimal jewelry and wedges for your next day time event or warm vacation!
Very comfortable, light and airy. True to size. I enjoyed wearing this top with a pair of jeans. It was casual with a touch of elegance. I wore a long vintage necklace with it.
review_summary: I received several compliments at a family reunion while wearing this top.

review_text: I originally got this as my back up dress to Hervé Leger's Kane Dress but found that this dress is actually way more flattering for an hourglass shape, it really cinches in your waist and emphasized you hips and bust ( although I feel like it does run a tad large up top).  I ended up loving this dress way more than I expected and would definitely recommend renting it especially for ladies with curves.

I rented this dress to wear at a resort in Punta Cana. This was perfect to wear to evening dinner where everyone dressed up a little. I go so many compliments!  The dress is nice and airy, ideal for the warm Caribbean weather.  I dressed down with silver sandals.  It was a little confusing to understand how the flap at the top of the dress goes, but I figured it out!  Love!

This is one of my favorite Maxi Dresses! Great for vacation or a picnic! This runs true to size and we recommend going down a size for your backup, since it has an adjustable waist tie. This fits loose and there is comfortable room throughout for hips and curves! This may be worn with a standard bra and the fabric has some stretch. Pair with a delicate necklace!

Really loved this skirt for vacation! I'm 5'2" so it's floor length on me, much longer than on the model. It has an elastic waist so it's very comfortable. The XS wasn't available so I rented a Small. I would have preferred XS because there is quite a bit of fabric and like I said was very long, so I think XS would have been more flattering. But it still worked even in the larger size!

I got nothing but compliments of this dress. If I could've kept it, I would!
Fit: It overall fit really well, except for the straps and underarms. I'm pretty muscular, so the straps were pretty tight when I moved. Also the material comes up very high under the armpits which caused some of the tightness of the dress. The bodice does have a wire in it to keep the top up so just a heads up. The fit around the rest of my body was great.

Length: Was a little long for my height, but I think the short would've been too short. I wore flip flops, but I definitely could've worn heels and not have them show.  

I did LOVE this dress and I'm going to rent it again!
review_summary: Gorgeous summer dress you can dress up and dress down.

review_text: Beaitufl dress that is PERFECT for vacation. The fabric is so soft and its incredibly flattering on. Wish I could buy it. FYI the dress runs big - I sized down and it was perfect!
So beautiful! But it runs large. Looks great with a wedge sandal and a great cuff. I wore the spanx strapless bra and nothing showed. Great dress!
I loved this jumper and got a ton of compliments. It was comfortable and looked great even after being packed for a couple of days.
No bra!

Size up 1. The dress fit but was definitely too tight, it is lined. Was cute on and loved the look just didn't enjoy the fit. I ended up just sending back. Would look great with a blazer for work and the back detail elevates the dress.
review_summary: Wanted this for a summers day to night event

review_text: This dress fit perfectly.  I loved that it was not too tight around the hip area.  Right now, I wear a size 14 in pants and usually have to wear a 14 in dresses that are fitted around the hip.  Not the case with this dress.  I was able to go down a size and wear the 12.  Who doesn't like wearing a smaller size?  I would definitely rent this dress again!
review_summary: I received lots of comments while in Vegas!!

review_text: Rented this for a bachelorette party in Cabo. I received tons of comments!  It fits pretty true to size, but I had a hard time zipping it up, but made it in it!  I do have a larger chest though (32D).  I wore with sticky boobs. Would definitely rent this again!

i'm a 34C which makes this shirt impossible to wear without a strapless bra. it shows a ton of cleavage. i wore a black one so it matched, but this shirt is definitely cuter on someone with a smaller chest

I loved the details on the long sleeves of this awesome dress.  It was perfect for a winter European vacation and went well with boots and tights.  Great shift and fit my super wide athletic shoulders with ease.

Gorgeous gown. Stunning color. Flowing, light, forgiving and fancy. However, be forewarned, it is a bear to zip. It's a design flaw in that the zipper is delicate and the rouching at the waist catches. It took two people and lots of grunting. It also runs a little small. Size up to accommodate the zipper.
Waist is a little small, but looked great. I recommend ordering a back up size!
review_summary: Wore this on vacation in Italy!

review_text: Hold up, they don't love you like I love you. SLOW doooown they don't love you like I love you.
review_summary:
I felt like queen b in the music video "lemonade" wearing this bay-b.
Go a size down - trust me.

review_text: I thought i was taking a chance on this dress. It isn't something i would typically pick out and I was worried that it would run small based on the reviews. It fit like a dream. The length, bright color and the watermelon detail made the dress absolutely perfect.
silky fabric-comfy-since it was way to long I was able to tuck the fabric up into the belt looking fabric to make it the right length and no one could tell.
review_summary: very pretty pattern.  many compliments.  Very long.

review_text: The dress was cute but a little short. I tried to wear it with stockings but it didn't look as nice so I wore without.
review_summary: Cute dress but a little short

review_text: I wore this with a rust bralet under so that I didn't have to worry about tape. It looked even nicer.
review_summary: the slit when it blows in the wind

review_text:
This dress looked a lot different on than in the pictures. The top secures with a snap which kept on popping open so I wore a bandeau. The front of the dress is also a wrap style so I would be careful wearing it on windy days. The back is quite low as well. Think this may work better with someone with a smaller bust. 

Compliments: 1
Would I rent again? No
Styling suggestions: this dress is more revealing than it seems- choose your foundation garments carefully, think it would look great with a necklace.
I loved the flowy fabric, and the glitter lines that's weaved in the fabric. Gorgeous. I wished it had a slimmer waist line though - I felt a bit like a beta fish.
review_summary: Brought it to the vineyards and wow!

review_text: The construction of this dress is amazing. It's unique and very comfortable. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner in Cancun and got compliments all night. Definitely eyeing the solid-colored versions of this dress for the summery next night out.
Stiff fabric. Lots of compliments. So cute. Love this one!!

I'm a huge fan of this dress!  I ordered the Small and Xsmall after reading all of the reviews.  I tried both on, and there was only a VERY slight difference between the two.  The XS seemed a slight bit shorter than the S and was a bit slimmer in the waist.  All and all, I would have gone for the XS if I would have wore the dress out.  The dress was in great shape and the sequins were a bunch of different colors - which you can't really see in the picture.  Sadly, the other dress in my order didn't fit so I will be mailing all of the dresses back.  I would absolutely rent this dress again though!
review_summary: Great dress with beautiful sequin colors!  Fit is amazing!

review_text: I loved this dress, it was perfect for a winter weekend getaway in Vegas. It shined under all the lights around town and I had strangers coming up to me to tell me how much they loved my dress. It was *slightly* itchy around the arms when I rouched the sleeves up because of the sequins but that was minor. The sequins are definitely multi-colored so you could add accesories in any color. I could wear a standard bra with this and it wasn't so tight that I felt the need for spanx. I would absolutely rent this again!
review_summary: So many compliments and stares - even in Vegas!

review_text: These pants were too long for 5'4", even with 4 inch wedges. Also big in the waist. But they were so cute and comfy. I wish they made a petite size!
review_summary: Got these for a night out in Miami.

review_text: Extra room, but can be fitted at the waist with the belt. Very pretty pattern and nice neckline that can be worn open on closed. Perfect length for a maxi.

I was so thankful that I read the reviews.  I typically wear size 2 and have 34B chest.  I rented a size 4 and 6.  The 4 fit everywhere except in the chest.  I couldn't get it zipped.  The size 6 fit much better.  I will rent this dress again.  I loved every inch of it, and got so many compliments.  I got engaged at the end of the night and was so thankful to have this on.
review_summary: I got engaged at the end of the night.

review_text: Moves really well, photographs well. All that is at the waist is a string tie, which I used but if you want something more substantial you might have to add a belt. Length was fine with heels because it was supposed to be flowy and fun, might have been too long with flats.
review_summary: Dress is a great color and has lots of fabric.!

review_text: I liked the look of the sleeves on this but I was mostly wearing a coat over it so you couldn't see the sleeves.  It's better for warm weather when you wouldn't need a coat.  Also, when I posed for pics the gaps between the buttons open up when you turn to the side at all so be careful of this :).

I rented this for Vegas and it was the perfect cut for my body. It was classy but the sparkle was not too much. I didn't give it 5 stars due to it being a little itchy under the arms but otherwise comfortable to wear.
Loved this dress. I'm a 8 on top and 10 through the hips, could have worn this in an 8. Colors are vibrant and it flows nicely over the body.
review_summary: great alternative to floral for vacation

review_text: This dress was a great vacation rental. The material does is heavier, but fits like a glove. The straps are a little long, but at 5'7 the dress length was perfect and even with a DD cup size, it wasn't too tight or revealing. The dress is comfortable, easy to move in, and I would definitely recommend it for a weekend/casual event.

The dress fit perfectly - runs true to size. It was also very comfortable - I had to wear it for several hours. The skirt portion was flowing and loose fitting which was perfect for all the walking and sitting then standing I had to do throughout the night. Great party dress!

+Unique pattern and hem line
+Fit well and was figure flattering
+Adjustable straps
+Light weight 
- / +The bust wasn't the most flattering for me, since I have smaller breasts. It looked cute when styled with a tied t-shirt.
Took this on a vacation to Nice. Loved that the dress had pockets. It is a little short but I was wearing it as a beach cover-up and sight seeing with sneakers.  Dries quickly since its polyester.
I rented this dress for one of the events during a destination wedding weekend. It was comfortable and flattering. The color was perfect for Mexico. Would rent again for another festive occasion.
review_summary: Fits true to size. More hot pink than looks in photo. Flattering and forgiving.

review_text: Small in the bust, but cut like a dress. Really cute coat. Would have worn with a dress and over the knee boots, but the weather was too warm. Did not wear. Pretty coat, though.

The embroidery on this dress is really pretty, and it was very comfortable and easy to wear to a theater performance while on a vacation in Mexico City. I'd expected it to be cotton (my fault for not reading the fabric description); instead, it's a medium-weight synthetic material. The quality is great, but the dress is kind of an odd combination of a very casual style and a somewhat dressy fabric.
Fit was snug, but very comfortable.  Great length for Las Vegas; however, I would probably only wear that short of dress for certain events/locations.  Would be a great New Years dress!
review_summary: I wore this to dinner and a show in Las Vegas.  It was the perfect dress for Vegas!

review_text: This was a pretty print, but ultimately I didnt end up wearing it. It was a bit bag like, quite unfitted. And it was quite a lot more formal than I anticipated because of the heavy weight of the material. I didn't want to pack it and take up that much space & weight in my suitcase.
This dress was perfect to throw on on vacation, very comfortable. The fabric is not like other clover canyon dresses - it is much thinner and therefore less tight.
I thought it ran a little big on the top. It did not stop me from wearing it but if you are smaller on top you may want to think about a size down.
review_summary: I love the material. The dress had a nice weight to it.

review_text: I loved how this romper was roomy and flowy. It was super cute over a swimsuit when I was at the beach, and it was easy to throw a cardigan on with it for dinner later that night.
review_summary: Perfect for an oceanside resort getaway.

review_text: Such a fun skirt to wear! Fitted at the natural waist this style is comfortable and easy to wear! You are able to dress this up or down depending on the occasion. Being that the fabric has no stretch, size up for back up.

This jumpsuit was perfect for a formal birthday dinner in DC. The fit was perfect. I was afraid the length would be awkward with my height of 5'4", but it actually hit perfectly when worn with heels. The V-neck revealed just the right amount of skin to be sexy without revealing too much. The buttons on the sleeves are very small and difficult to do when the jumpsuit is on. I buttoned before I put on and was able to fit my hands through without any problem. I received many compliments on this beautiful jumper.
review_summary: Great formal option for upscale dinner!!

review_text:
I am 6 months pregnant and rented this for a weekend away. Even with my growing belly size small was huge. I could have easily worn an XS. It was also very long. I'm 5'8" and it dragged on the ground.
But it was a gorgeous color and the fabric was light and cool in the hot weather.

Pros: comfortable, pockets, lightweight, love the back of the dress!
Cons: you can't wear a bra, which poses a problem because there's ZERO support for your chest (unless you wear a stick on). I didn't have this, so I found myself covering my chest throughout the night.
review_summary: Such a comfortable, free flowing dress!

review_text: Wow, I want to live in this romper! The fabric is so comfortable and flowy. The fit is non-restrictive and the band at the waist accentuates the waist line perfectly. I also love the lower neckline and the way the shorts go up a little on the outer leg to make your legs look longer. Great for vacation!
Fit my large, 32 G bust well, and was perfect for my short torso and long legs.
review_summary: It was perfect for Miami weather.  I could dress it up or down.

review_text: Rented XS and S. I ended up wearing the XS. I really like top part but wasn't too crazy about the flap opening in the back. I wore it with a belt. I probably wouldn't rent this dress again. The print was as pictured and the shape of the dress was rather forgiving however I don't like the flap in the back. When it gets windy, it would open up like wings.

Comfortable, colorful and easy to wear just about anywhere. The cut was great, and the issue about the loose fabric in the back that others mentioned was not an issue for me. It made it more comfortable on a hot summer day.
I'm 5' 7" and size 34DD- tight in chest- I should have rented a Large. Need a slip underneath if you're tall.

The fit was great. The elastic band allowed me to adjust the dress to the length I desired. I'm 5'3" so it did feel like it was more on the shorter end when the middle band was more scrunched together than stretched out. The fabric was great! I was worried I would get hot or sweat in it since it is still warm out, but I was pleasantly surprised to find that it was breathable. I highly recommend and will likely rent again :)
review_summary: The colors in this dress were so beautiful! I wore this for a Sunday afternoon wine tasting in Napa.

review_text: These pants are great, and I actually found they ran true to size. The waist was a little loose on me, but I was able to use the sash to tie it tight. I will say though... these aren't the most flattering pants. Especially when sitting. The front kind of pooches out in an awkward way.
I found it a little big in the chest and so my strapless bra would show at times.  However, the dress was a lovely color, fit as expected and nice to wear on a warm night out on the town.
review_summary: Wore this out on vacation to get dressed up and go out on the town.

review_text: I absolutely love this dress! The fabric has a little stretch and fit my smaller waist/bigger booty in a way that is hard to find in clothing! It's a very flattering shape, and surprisingly comfy to wear. I will definitely be renting this dress again.
Pros- in total Herve Lerger style it sucked in all the right places and created great curves, excited to rent more Herve Lerger.
review_summary: Wore this at Mr Chow, Liv, SLS, and Space in Miami- Attracted attention everywhere.

review_text: This dress is simple and cute! Perfect for the summer.  It runs very true to size.  The dress fits nice and loose and is only fitted at the waist (it stretches at the waist too).  Feel free to size down for your back up size.  Any body shape and any bust size would look great in this dress.  The material is light so you will be nice and cool on a hot day!

Yes this dress runs small; I tried S and M and the S was feeling too much like a sardine can.  The medium was comfortable and still mostly flattering, though the dress bunched up a little in the front of the armpits.  The design on the front and back is gorgeous.  It looked navy to me in the pictures on the listing but was black in person.  The material is thick and good for cold weather.
Cute romper. A little tight in the hips and thighs but it's a nice print and a good length that I felt comfortable in. I didn't wear it off the shoulder and it worked really well.
The dress was a little big in the breast/under arm area, but other than that it was the fit of a traditional shift dress.
review_summary: Perfect for a nice dinner on vacation!

review_text: I wore this dress on a girls trip/Mother's Day vacation to Bermuda. My girlfriends said it was so stunning on me that I had to buy it!
review_summary: Great dress! One of those that looks even more amazing on than in the photo or on the hanger.

review_text: Fun and summery dress, super cute and flowy.

The dress is beautiful and fits true to size. There are slits on both sides that are not too extreme and stay mostly closed while walking.  There is a black sheath that comes separately and hits mid thigh.  The lower part of the dress is fairly see through in the sunlight.  I wore a light sweater since I am old and do not like my arms to show.  It would look better without the sweater, but it was a delight to wear and I will rent it again.
review_summary: I wore this to an informal conference in Hawaii

review_text: I wore this out in SoBe on a date with my man and he loved it (as did I!). I wore it once more to a reunion and got rave reviews from all of my friends. It was definitely a hot piece, which I do not typically do, but the feedback was so positive. I felt great in it and it looked lovely. It is definitely form fitting, but it is supposed to be!
review_summary: The closest I will ever be to Barbie

review_text: Perfect vacation dress
I found the dress to be a little large at the top. The way the dress flares out at the waist where the pockets hit was not the most flattering look for me.
review_summary: The pattern is really fun! I wore it to a family dinner over the Thanksgiving holiday.

review_text: I am 5'10" and the long was long enough in the legs that I could wear heels (!), but the torso was a bit short on me so it was constantly giving me a wedgie, which was annoying. It was also very tight in the rib cage as there is a built-in corset in it, which gives you LOTS of lift though. I am a B cup and it was very busty on me! But the fabric was a great quality. Would be best for those that are straight and narrow.
review_summary: Sexy and chic, runs a little small in the ribs

review_text: Really enjoyed wearing it on vacation for cooler days!
review_summary: Very fun jacket that goes with everything!

review_text: The dress was short on me since I am tall.  Otherwise, it was great.
review_summary: I wore this to an outdoor, casual work event.

review_text: This is a great, loose fitting shift dress that can be dressed up or down for any summer event (or for work!). I wore it to a pool party. The most form fitting part of the dress was around the bust- the seam landed a few inches below my neck so it might be a tough fit for larger bust sizes. I'm 5'2" and the dress came to a modest length right above my knee. I'm typically a size 4 and could have probably worn an XS so it would be a touch more form fitting. This was super cute- I got a compliment from a coworker on the dress while just taking this pretty number out of the garment bag!
review_summary: RTR TEAM REVIEW- Great staple for summer!

review_text: I liked this, but did not love it as much as I expected. It's a little loud to wear, but it looked quite stylish and was comfortable.  Size up.
Although the fabric pattern / color is gorgeous and perfect for vacation - I was a bit disappointed by how shapeless the dress is. In addition it is much longer in real life than the picture shows.

I love the colors of this dress, but unfortunately, it runs a little large. I am typically a size 6 and ordered a medium. It's not SO big that it is unwearable, but I would prefer a small for a better fit.

I rented this in a medium and large because I'm often in the middle with dresses. Im a little smaller on the top. This dress was SO TIGHT and not what I expected from the photo. The medium was so tight I couldn't even fit it over my shoulders. I thought it would be more like cutouts with a layer underneath. It is a very heavy, almost knit material and the pattern is in the fabric. Definately size up and I would not recommend this for anyone with a decent sized chest.
review_summary: Different than expected. I rented this dress for a short trip to Vegas.

review_text: Fits well. I have a little extra in my arm pit/chest region so if my arms were by my side I didn’t look as good. I mostly kept my arms back and chest out. Not too short and my bit is pretty big which can make dresses short in the back on me.
review_summary: Very festive for Mariah’s all I want for Christmas concert

review_text: I adored this dress.  I wore it on vacation and forgot to take photos, but people were actually stopping me on the street to tell me how much they loved the dress.  It fit like a glove and the cage bottom added a unique detail.  Great rental!

The fit was perfect.  It is extremely well made and falls in all the right places with a full bust.  The pockets in the legs were not distracting to place a cell phone.  You will not need to carry a handbag if you on vacation when you wear this outfit.  Your phone and sunblock fits in the pockets.  You wear a scarf around your neck...voila and you are ready to go sight-seeing.  You are comfortable on a bike, sedgway or just walking.
review_summary: I would have bought it because it was definitely a keeper.  The color was perfect for Florida.

review_text:
The dress is beautiful and photographs really well. I got so many compliments.
It was also great for travel. I will definitely rent this one again.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for my 4th of July!

review_text: Love all Equipment shirts/dresses. Their silk is so light and luxurious. This dress fit me perfectly and didn't show around the bust or arm holes. The length was perfect on me but would probably be a bit short on someone who is taller or has longer legs. Loved it for a hot Florida vacation.

This dress was great for a girls weekend getaway in Ojai. I wore it belted but I also loved the look of it just big and flowy. I would recommend sizing down as it runs large. I got a lot of compliments while out shopping for the day.
review_summary: Beautiful and comfortable, perfect for a relaxed weekend getaway.

review_text: I rented a 10 with a 12 as a backup and the 12 fit great. The 10 was a little snug and I just felt more comfortable in the 12. The dress laid beautifully and was very comfortable and had a nice swing to it. Beautiful color for the summer. Loved how the ruffled moved when I walked. I would definitely rent this one again.

Love, love, love this dress! Rented this for Vegas and felt excellent in it. It only went up to a size 8, and I tend to hover in between the 8s and the 10s in the hips, so I had my fingers crossed. If you're hippy like me, and worried about the badonkadonk, eh! Yes, it's short, yes, it seems like it might ride, but nope! Fits like a glove, super comfy, is absolutely form-flattering, and makes you feel like a million bucks. Only downside? It's HOT! The jersey layer underneath really starts to heat up if you're dancing in 100 degree weather with people packed on a dance floor like sardines. This was the dress that made me thankful I spent most of the night playing Craps and drinking gin. Would absolutely rent again, for play or for a cocktail event. Easy to dress up or dress for partying.
I rented this dress for vacation in the Caribbean. This dress is so gorgeous and so fun that I wore it two different nights! The fabric has little give so I would be sure to size up.

Loved the color of this jumpsuit - definitely bright and pretty. Fit well, maybe a bit big if anything. I am 5'3" and it was pants length - not cropped. You can wear a regular bra, and I didn't find it to difficult to get in/out of in the bathroom. Very cute!
I adore the pattern and color of this dress, much better in person. Adorable and fun

This dress is super comfortable with just the right amount of bling without going overboard.  Easily dressed up for a night at the club or down for a date night.  I didn't experience any sequin rubbing of the arms as others mentioned.
I went braless because of the open back.
review_summary: Perfect combination of chic and comfortable

review_text: Rented for a formal dinner during a girl's weekend. Cute dress. Lace is unbelievable.  Really pretty neckline.  If you are hippy like me it's not the most flattering cut because the waist is pretty high, but the dress is so pretty it doesn't even matter.

Lovely print. Light breathable material. Very versatile. Worn with white converse during the day to walk around town and have lunch and later worn with brown wedges for dinner at a nice restaurant and drinks at a bar. Very low cut. Had to pin a bit in order to wear a regular bra underneath. Otherwise great dress!

I love this jumpsuit! It is cute with the designs and details on the shoulder and the material was very comfortable it almost feels like wearing pjs! But the belt made a lot of difference once it cinches on the waist as without the belt would definitely look like pjs! The material is very light so perfect for summer or early fall weather! Great for a day of walking outside (used it for vacation). I did not mind the buttons as others had mentioned. It was still easy to get it off and put it back on compared to other jumpsuits that I wore.

When the coat I really wanted for my trip to Paris wasn't available, I settled on this one as all the reviews raved about it's warmth. They weren't lying!  I used it on an almost month long trip in London and Paris in the dead of winter and it kept me warm and cozy the entire trip.  It was a great choice and the leather details give it some restrained but well proportioned style.

I usually wear size 6-8, but in skirts that are flowy like this decided to size down to 6 and it was perfect. I wore this to a few events- going to the theater and to luncheon. Was able to easily pair it with tanks/blouses from my closet. Would definitely recommend.
review_summary: Great! Felt very fun, but sophisticated

review_text: This is a great dress for those who love the Herve dresses, but are on the short side.  It was a great fit and made very well.  I didn't get to wear it for very long, so I might rent it again for another event.
review_summary: I didn't wear for too long, so no unforgettable moments....sorry!

review_text: I usually wear size 0 and this one was a tad snug. (I am 5'4", 117 pounds, 34A bust.) For some reason I did not receive a backup size 2 so I could not compare. As some other reviewers have noted, the dress had a very strong stench when I got it, unclear what it was from. I almost returned it but decided to wear it. The dress is also a thicker material than I expected. Despite the imperfect sizing, it worked overall and my boyfriend liked it! Paired it with the pink Kendra Scott earrings that RTR suggested upon checkout for a nice pop of color that brings out the pink in the dress.
Runs really large...could have gone down another size. Pretty beach dress!
Super cute and fun. Wore this to go see a show in Vegas and it was perfect. Fit great and the bra part stayed up well.

I was a bit self conscious in this, but I generally keep more covered up.  It's maybe for girls that are more confident showing off their bodies or look more like the model in the listing.  Still, I loved the dress, it was comfortable and well made, and my boyfriend was very interested in purchasing it.  I rented it with the Oscar de la Renta Luxembourg necklace and loved that too.

Rented this for a vacation.  Looks great with a tan.  Dress is roomy in the middle with a sexy neckline and shoulder cut-outs.  The hemline also adds some interest.  It was a good length for me, might be too short on a taller person.
Dress is beautiful! Great color and super flowy. Only issue is the waist area is super tight while the rest of the dress is kind of loose.

Fits true to size. Very flattering on. Perfect amount of stretch and sparkle. Agree with another review that said a little scratchy (from the sparkles) in back but not enough to be uncomfortable. I wish I could keep this dress. AMAZING!
review_summary: This dress was perfect for vacation in Vegas. Just enough sparkle without the tacky.

review_text:
I rented this on Unlimited with the intention to bring it with me to Puerto Rico. I never wear rompers so was pretty excited to try this, but I think the outcome was I learned rompers don't quite fit my short body type haha, especially if the shorts flare out at the hem.  

Like other reviewers said, it's quite low/loose in the bust area, so I think it's necessary to layer a cute bandeau or tank top underneath it. Other than that, the fabric was super comfortable and breathable, and the design was very unique, which drew me to it in the first place :)
review_summary: Fun, editorial, might be better for taller women.

review_text: Wore this to brunch the day after a beach wedding. Great dress to be able to looked dressed up, but not having to put too much effort into getting dressed! I'm 5'4 and was able to wear it comfortably with flat sandals.

Fit just a little loose on me but I am petite. Dress added just enough sexiness to make my Vegas night out a hit! Worn with black stilettos, white and gold clutch, gold earrings and nubra. You could just barely see the clasp of the nubra in front through the sheer material but the club was dark so no one could tell. Love and would rent again!
I wore this top for  a night out in Las Vegas on a company trip. The fabric is amazing. I couldn't get enough of the collar, it was perfect. I am normally a small in tops and this fit perfectly.
review_summary: I didn't want to return this top.

review_text: I paired this top with skinny jeans and a cute pair of sandals for a Saturday afternoon during a vacation weekend away.  It was so cute and comfortable!  I highly recommend it.

I didn't get to wear this on my vacation, but it was nice.  I rented a medium, but with my 36DDs, a large would have fit better in the bust area.  Overall, if I'd gotten to wear it, I would have made it work.

I thought I was going to hate this dress! RTR sent this to me when one of the sizes of the dress I had originally ordered was damaged. It wasn't one of the backup options that I had sent them and one I had intentionally passed up because I knew I wouldn't be able to wear a bra (not an option for a 34DD) and the pattern just didn't really stand out to me. BOY, WAS I WRONG! This dress is absolutely gorgeous. The silky fabric is luxurious and high quality. The colors are extremely vibrant. In general, the photo of the model does not do justice to the dress. And guess what. I was completely comfortable without a bra, especially with the help of the adjustable straps. I wore 4 inch wedges and had to carry the dress when I walked. I tripped a few times, but I'm short, so I expected that.
review_summary: Turns out RTR knows me better than I know myself.

review_text: I absolutely adore this dress! I rented it for a girls weekend in Napa in early October. I paired it with flats and a cute wrap bracelet for a more casual, easy-to-wear look. I was so tempted to wear a pear of wedges or ankle boots, but I knew I'd be tromping around the vineyards and that just wouldn't do. I never wanted to take it off and wish I could've worn again and again! It was comfortable and I felt so good in it all day long. My only complaint was that although it says you can wear a normal bra, mine showed a bit. Looked fine with a black bra underneath and no one even knew it wasn't actually part of the dress. Just FYI though! :)
review_summary: Perfect! Top contender for favorite rental so far!

review_text: wore this to mexico and the print was perfect! i'm usually btwn a 2 and a 4 and found the 4 to be great with plenty of room to spare, very comfortable on a plane! it's an inch or so above the knee and can be worn with a regular bra, although the straps may sometimes peak through a little, it was nothing that bothered me because the print was so bright. this isn't necessarily a sexy dress or one that shows off your waist, but is perfect for a casual night but can be dressy w heels. it is thick, but the material breathes well. overall, great choice when you need a dress to just throw on
The dress fit true to size, although it was a little on the shorter side. I did not mind though..it was perfect for a night out in Vegas!
review_summary: Had so much fun wearing this dress!

review_text: Fit was perfect, very flattering. I'm tall and usually cannot wear strapless dresses like this, but it was long enough and I felt comfortable in it.
At 5'7" this was still very long and I had to hitch it up while walking around - even with heeled boots.  However, I love the casual style that can be dressed up and was perfect for my occasion.
review_summary: a wonderful dress paired with leggings and boots and most of the bottom half left open.

review_text: Amazing dress.  Comfortable and easy to wear.  Got many compliments.
review_summary: Wore for a girl's night out in Vegas.

review_text: Loved this dress! It's a medium weight cotton that is appropriate for a variety of occasions. Awesome print and eyelet detail piping. I am mostly a 10 and rented the 12 because the 10 wasn't available for unlimited-- it was a little too big (still cute though) so I'd say go with your normal size. Bust area fit very comfortably for 34DD.

This jumper ran small and short. I don't have a long torso, but this felt short on me even though I ordered it long. This was my backup size and I'm glad it was a size up from my original choice. It was very low cut in the front and I struggled with getting a safety pin to lie right. But, once it was fixed, I felt like a million bucks. I wore it on the last night of a cruise and loved the way I looked. The back has a piece of fabric going across to hide a bra strap. I only had to fix it once. Moral of the story, go long and go big, but definitely wear it.

I knew I was taking a risk when I rented this because of the fit.  When I tried it on, I was just swimming in it.  I have a large bust so I knew this would be the risk, but it just wasn't flattering at all.  It doesn't fall completely straight either so the way it flares on the side just added to the tent feeling. Just not for me!
Rented this dress on Unlimited and wore during vacation it Italy. It's not form fitting but really comfortable and a fun style! It runs a little large. I'm typically a size 6, and this was perfect.
Fit great. Felt very fancy. It kept me warm for the most part even in December in NYC.
This top was beautiful and very well made. The fit is pretty true to size. I would say it is more of a baggy top by nature and not tight, but so classy.

I rented this for a trip to SF/Vegas as I figured I could get the most wear out of jacket over vacation vs one single night of a dress
Boy was this worth it, I rented the 8 and the 10 since sometimes my bust is an issue, while the 8 was a little snug across my shoulders the 10 was far too bulky so I went with the 8 
I wore it everyday, if I could marry this jacket I would! I was able to button the jacket (a rarity for us busty gals!) and it gave that extra little edge that I was looking for without being too bulky or hot
The back comes up a little but only a few inches above your waistline/not super cropped so it was very wearable with jeans/dresses etc
I got lots of compliments!!! Highly recommend and totally would love to buy this jacket in the future, it is AMAZING!
I'm on the bigger bust spectrum and this top was mega tight so I would definitely go up 1 or even 2 sizes when ordering.
review_summary: Beautiful and elegant fitted top perfect for a formal occasion, too!

review_text: I loved this dress. The colors are vibrant, the cut of the dress is beautiful, and it's completely unique. I didn't look *too* busty in it, I thought it was fairly slimming, and it's super convenient because it can be worn with just a strapless bra (no tape needed!). I wore it in Greece and my husband was laughing at how many women turned their heads to check it out.
The only things that were wrong with the dress was that one of the buttons was mis-colored (white) and that the seam up by the back slit was coming unraveled. Otherwise, perfect dress.
review_summary: Got so many compliments on this dress. Fit perfect and was very flattering.

review_text: This fits perfect. I would recommend this dress to anyone. This is a very flattering dress.  I am bringing this dress with me to Vegas. I will wear this out to a fancy dinner and dancing with my husband. This dress can also be dressed down and worn during the day with flip flops / wedges to a vegas pool party or day party.  YOU will NOT feel fat in this dress as it is very forgiving with the treatment in sleeves and fabric on the sides (think tunic style). I might even wear a white tank top dress underneath as the v neck does go a bit low for my liking.  I will rent again and might even purchase this one!

I was unable to wear this dress - when zipped the bust was entirely too tight, waist and hips had ample room, there is zero stretch in the material.  34DD is way to large, best guess is anything beyond a B maybe C is not going to work.  Shame, the rest of the dress looked amazing.
review_summary: Didn't wear - 3 stars is for the size, I typically wear a 6, an 8 should have fit

review_text: So cute and comfortable. The back is racerback - needs a strapless bra.  Length was perfect and I wore with no heels.  Wore this out to dinner for a beach vacation and it was perfect! Loved the colors.

This dress runs slightly big, but fit very well. I wore this on vacation in Vegas. A Thunder from Down Under dancer told me I look like a disco ball, which obviously is the look you are going for with this dress. It scratched a little under the arms but was very comfortable otherwise. I loved it!
review_summary: I wore this on vacation in Vegas

review_text: This dress is beyond comfortable, so flow-y, and can easily be dressed up or down. Two watch outs: it runs pretty long, so plan to wear heels. And not sure if the dress sent to me had been worn quite a bit or if it's just poor craftsmanship, but one of the straps broke 5 minutes into wearing it :/
review_summary: Dress is absolutely beautiful! Wore it to a rehearsal dinner in Hawaii, totally perfect.

review_text: This dress was cute, loved the color! It was pretty shapeless and a bit short. However, I received lots of compliments in it!
review_summary: Cute dress, fun for a nice dinner!

review_text: The fit was very nice.  It looked nice on.  My husband noticed how good the dress looked on me and complimented me. I would highly recommend this dress for a nice dinner event.  I wore the dress on a caribbean cruise for dinner.
review_summary: i like how i looked and felt in this dress. It fit perfectly and was comfortable to wear.

review_text: The body fit was perfect but, beware, the dress is very long.  I'm 5'8" and had to wear 3" heels to keep this 6R from dragging on the ground.  The colors look pretty in the picture but they're much more beautiful in person.  I wasn't sure that I'd like the see-through areas but they really add something special to this dress.  I was surprised to see that the neckline has beading, it's subtle and pretty.  Rent this one!
review_summary: This is a gorgeous dress!  Rent it!!!

review_text: I loved the dress. I wore it for my 30th birthday. I usually wear a 10 but it was a bit small so I wore the 12 (Thank god for the free extra size).  Only thing to be careful of is snagging. The material makes it so that you can sang it on stuff pretty easily. Overall I loved the dress and would rent it again!
review_summary: Super cute but runs on the smaller side

review_text: I ordered a small and a medium. I am tall but slender. The small fit me everywhere, except it was TOO short. My butt cheeks were almost poking out when I was standing straight up. So I tried on the medium, the fit for the overall length was much better. It was a tad looser on the rest of my body, but not too loose by any means. Still fit really nicely, and showed off my shape. I wore the medium and I felt so cute and stylish. Just made that day that much better.
review_summary: This romper is the best romper!

review_text: This jacket runs a bit large so if not sure I might suggest the size down.  I typically wear a 2 or 4 and the 4 was very roomy.  I am an RTR lover and unlimited client and HUGE fan!  This jacket got 3 stars from me because I didn't really care for the collar.  The very thing that attracted me to the jacket I didn't really care for because I felt like the furry collar looked cheap.  We went on vacation to London and a more real fur look is in fashion.  However, when I paired this jacket with a rabbit fur vest from RTR it worked (I also unbuttoned the collar and took it off) and was very warm!
Length was great.  I wore the smaller of the two i ordered and was able to wear a strapless bra with it as well.
review_summary: Love love loved this jumpsuit.  Brought it with me on a trip to london and it was perfect.

review_text: I liked the color and cut of the top and wish I had gotten a S.  I may have liked the fit a little bit better and been more inclined to wear it. You definitely can't wear a normal bra.  I wore a strapless with a bandeau over it.  It still looked super cute from the back.  I'm not one to go without a bra, but I'm sure that's what would work best... or a NuBra.  The top is a beautiful shade of pink and definitely a standout, but I personally didn't like the way it fit around the stomach.  This could have been because I needed a small - I'm not sure. But it poofed out very strangely - just a little too much. Also, the top of the back was a little weird with how angled the cut was, but still cute and definitely made it more dressy than casual.  Maybe if I had put it with white pants or something, it would have been better.

I rented for a trip to Hawaii for a friend's wedding. The color and cutouts are show stopping. The reviews are accurate that the dress runs small. I rented a 14 and I normally rent a 12. While the fabric is stretchy the dress was still tighter than my preference, which would have been ok with a darker color.
review_summary: The color and cutouts are stunning!

review_text: fits like a glove

I rented this in a 6 because it was the only size available. I am typically a 4, but often order a 6 for slim fitting dresses due to my hourglass shape. It was too large on the top, so I was unable to wear it. But, the fabric and design are lovely, so I am considering renting it again in a smaller size for an upcoming vacation or next summer if it is available.

I typically wear a 0 or xs in flowy tops. Rented this in a 0. Had plenty of room except in the chest and shoulder area.. and I don't consider myself broad shouldered and I am definitely not large in the chest! The fabric above the chest/below the neck line was super tight and bunched up so I unfortunately wasn't able to wear it. Disappointed because the top was really nice. Great color and the fabric was flowy without being too thin.  I recommend but suggest renting a size up!
This dress will really show off a tan.  Beware if you have any tummy pooch...shows all.

This dress is really interesting. You can't really tell in the pictures, but there is a frilly trim on one one of the shoulders and on one of the seams across the front. It is a pretty thick wool material. Don't wear if you are going to be at a warm party!

Beautiful top - the sequins are subtle and in a beautiful pattern. The top is comfortable, which is a nice change from most sequined pieces. The only con was that there were some holes in the top - looks like the sequins had caught the main fabric and torn a few holes. But hardly noticeable and I was able to wear the top.
review_summary: Rented this for an extended three-month vacation in France.

review_text: I didn't think the straps would work for me because my arms and shoulders weren't very firm. BUT, it was awesome.
review_summary: It was a perfect fit and hugged my curves!

review_text: I brought this dress with me on my girls trip to Vegas! It was gorgeous and I received so many compliments. The top is tight so keep that in mind. It is so shimmery, perfect for a party!
Comfortable dress with long sleeves for warmth. Lots of flash and room for "the girls." This dress runs very large.
review_summary: The way the light reflects off the sequins changing the shimmer.

review_text: Fit loose & comfortable. Wore it on vacation and it was easy to dress up or dress down. It does run a little short but I still found it a comfortable length.
Fit well, was flattering. I like that it is short and not too tight in the midsection. I would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Loved the print and the fit of this Clover Canyon ensemble!

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation in Israel. The weather was so hot, and this dress worked really well. The material is very light-weight. I loved the pockets and the buttons all the way down the front. I did not understand the belt loops (no belt) - the dress does not need a belt. It can be worn with flats for day-time or with a pair of wedges for a casual dinner.

Wore this for a weekend getaway with the hubby. I am almost 8 months pregnant (gained about 18 pounds) and normally wear a size xs (pre-pregnancy). Ordered a M and wore with maternity leather leggings. Looked chic for a contemporary dinner and was comfy. Fit over the bump and my butt!

This romper is AWESOME! The material is heavier, but still cool enough for the Carribean! I wore it to dinner one night with a gold and diamond belt and gold and diamond jewelry.  It runs pretty true to size and since I'm usually between a 4 and a 6, I sized up because it is a romper. It was a little roomy, but I felt so comfortable, I would definitely order this size again! It's so classy and elegant and is perfect when you have a glowing Carribean tan!
Really pretty and confortable dress. I usually wear small but the XS was a better fit on me.  I'm giving it 4 stars because my bra was showing with some moves, other than day I recommend it!
review_summary: Pretty dress - wore during a vacation!

review_text: Feminine, soft, beautiful and comfortable. Has pockets, too. No Spanx needed. What more could a girl ask for?
The regular length was perfect for me with 3 inch heels, but I often wear petite.
review_summary: Loved this dress.  It is light weight and comfortable.  I wore it for formal night on a cruise.

review_text: This top is fun, flirty, and comfortable. No need to dress up the outfit, the top makes a bold statement all by itself! Put on a pair of jean capris and sandals, you are good to go! I am tempted to buy this top to add to my wardrobe. I dont want to give it back! I usually wear a small, but I ordered the Medium based on other reviews. It fit perfectly.
review_summary: Best piece in my vacation wardrobe to the Caribbean!

review_text: This dress was perfect except for being a little too long in flats. I rented it to wear to Catalina Island on my birthday and got so many compliments. I'd suggest wearing heels (2-3 inches if you're my height) in order to avoid tripping on the dress. I would buy this dress in a heartbeat if I could find it online!!

no, of course not! but, i was SWIMMING in this dress. its beautiful for sure, but even the extra small was too big. i couldn't wear this dress. i even tried using a belt to help with the excess space/fabric around the mid-section, but it was still too big. my suggestion, don't rent this dress if you are smaller than a size 8. i did not take a photo as it was just too ridiculous looking.

Rented this for a beach vacation and wore it out to dinner. Even though the fabric is heavier and long sleeved, I still felt cool even in a tropical location. Beautifully made, expensive-looking. Lots of compliments. Meant to be loose fitting. The top is low cut but easy to hide if you tie the top strings.

Absolutely the most glitzy and glam romper ever.  I rented this from the RTR store at The Cosmopolitan in Vegas.  The boning in the top part + scratchy sequins aren't the most comfortable but it was totally worth it.  You'd need to be pretty well endowed on top to fill it out properly but I appreciated that the shorts didn't ride up and it didn't look too "hoochie" on my curvy frame.
review_summary: Perfect for VEGAS!  So glam and glitzy!

review_text: The fit was perfect. I'm a slender, petite girl, and I have yet to find a jacket that fit this perfectly. The look was classy but not stuffy with just enough edge but not overboard biker-y. I wish I could find this to purchase for myself because it's so classic.
review_summary: lovely buttery leather with edgy sophistication

review_text: Like other reviews, the torso area is "short".  It worked for me but I can see how this won't work for all.  Besides being a challenge to go to the bathroom without help, this jumpsuit is awesome.  I wore it in London in the evening and it was perfect everywhere we went.  Love the opening in the back.  Perfect length for my height with 3 inch heels.
Rented for a trip to Vegas. Loved it! Fun and comfortable
Fits wonderfully. Love the structure - felt like I was wearing a piece of art.
review_summary: Love it. Wore it to a birthday party and on a vacation - so many comments

review_text: This is my 2nd time renting this romper...its just perfect.  It runs true to size, I had to wear a belt with it because I sized up.  Its short and sexy, but not too tight or revealing. The material is expensive and feels luxe!
I wore this one of the nights on my honeymoon in Amalfi.  It was a bit too tight in chest/stomach, but was able to zip it up! wore it with jeans and a pashmina would order again in size 6
review_summary: a good mix of sexy and cute

review_text: It was too cold, so I didn't get to wear this.  It also came dirty ( gross) and the phone lines were down. BUT if it had been warm and the dress was clean, I would have loved wearing it and you will enjoy it too.

After receiving my first choice and it not fitting, I contacted RTR panicking as my Birthday dinner was 2 days away in another city. They helped me through the process and offered to ship it to the hotel. I selected this one and it was perfect! I am large busted and it still fit beautifully and I even received compliments. It was a little colder that night the heavier material and long sleeves were perfect! The arms can be a little tight but was okay on me. Thank you RTR for another successful dress!
review_summary: 2nd Choice turned out the Best Choice

review_text: Fit a little big on the top but the straps are adjustable. It was so perfect for a summer day, night, vacation plane ride. Really versatile too! I got tons of complements and may have to rent it again!
Wore this in Switzerland and it was perfect. I wore it once for all day sightseeing and another day on a boat. Loved it.
I am definitely a girl with hips and small waist/bust and this dress flattered it all! I usually wear a Medium in dresses but this is more of a form fitting dress so wore a Large for my hips

This dress has a very flowy relaxed fit, and hit at about ankle length.  I absolutely loved this dress! While on vacation... I wore it as a beach cover up, out to a nice dinner, and for a relaxed day on the boardwalk. I am not one to typically re-wear an outfit over and over on a week long vacation, but it looked that good.

This is a simple blue linen shift with a cute and conservative neckline. I was hoping to take it on vacation with me but it's a little business casual for that event. This would look awesome for a summer work day, a luncheon or religious function with family as it's lined, hits the knee, and is very tailored looking. It's a little large on me and I'm a consistent 8 across most brands, but I wouldn't change sizes.

Throw on some sandals and head to the beach or boots and head to brunch in the mountains! This versatile dress stays wrinkle free during travel and is very comfortable.  Loved the off the shoulder look, and unlike other reviews, I found the sleeves to be too long.  If you look at the model vs customers that have rented this one (myself included), you can see that the waistline has more material than it shows in the model pictures-so I pinned some material up.  Nevertheless, good weekend getaway dress!
review_summary: Love this loose and fun dress!

review_text: I wore this dress to a wine tasting event while on vacation.  It was lovely!  I had a couple ladies ask me who made the dress so they could buy it!  It runs slightly large (I could have definitely sized down), so if you are between sizes, go with the smaller size.

It was great for dinner in Miami. Very light and can easily be dressed up or down. It does run short so be aware if you're super tall or shorter but don't like to show a lot of leg. I'm on the short side and thankfully used my napkin at dinner to conceal a lot of thigh. But would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Very versatile dress that was great for humid weather and could work for a day or night event

review_text: Straight out of the 70s and loving it in these white culottes! I rented them for a weekend to Palm Springs and was very pleased with how little they wrinkled in my bag. I rented in the 0 and found they were a little tight after a big dinner. I would recommend sizing up for back if your waist/ hip area can cause you problems.  At 5'7" these pants hit me just below my knee which was great for me. Added bonus there was pockets for my phone!! I've had a great experience renting Tibi through my unlimited  subscription and these pants did not disappoint. They worked great for a fun dinner but can totally be dressed up for a party or dressed down for work.  If you're hesitant about the wide leg trend these are a great start as they almost look and feel like a skirt! Also the jacket can also be found on site under Vince.

I got so many compliments in this dress, and I felt like a rockstar! The fabric was amazing. It was the perfect length with flats (no dragging, but no awkward ankles). I really didn't want to send it back
review_summary: The dress was so comfortable!!! I had a hard time sending it back.

review_text: I rented this for a vacation in Italy. The dress was super cute, light weight and traveled well. I wore a few times while on vacation and found it to be very comfortable, chic enough for nice dinners and low key enough for day time exploring. Would definitely rent again!
Just a little tight on the arms but overall a great fit and not too tight around your middle so you don't have to suck in constantly.
review_summary: Loved the vibrant pattern for a tropical vacation. The length was short and perfect.

review_text: Fits a bit small in the crotch so I recommend sizing up. The cutouts and neckline were very flattering. I'd love to rent this again.
review_summary: Didn't get to wear it, but it was a great LBD alternative

review_text: I rented this dress for a night out during a video game convention. I was able to wear big boots and even leather bracers (not pictured) and still look completely put-together. I put a ton of braids in my hair (a la Vikings) and generally felt like the most amazing version of myself. I would love love LOVE to buy this dress and wear it to everything. It does run large, like the other reviews state. A small fit me perfectly, and I normally wear an 8 or a 10. Will definitely rent again!
Loved the way it fit.  very feminine.  True to size.

Rented this as part of unlimited for a Caribbean cruise vacation.  The tags were still on the blouse when it arrived and I wore it twice I loved it so much!  Very comfortable.  I wore a strapless bra with it since the fabric is light and even thought it's lined, my nipples were visible without. The color is deep turquoise and the flutter detail is so pretty.  I would definitely rent again!
It's a cute top but not for a long torso. It seemed too short for me
review_summary: I ended up not wearing it.

review_text: Lining on the tight side while outer dress is baggy.
Was a little loose in the stomach area and a tad itchy, however was really light weight. Awesome sparkle, and photographs so well. I got so many compliments!!
review_summary: This was my back up dress for a Vegas trip, but ended up being the star, just runs a little big!

review_text: Dress was so comfortable, but just snug enough to be slimming! I felt great in it!
review_summary: Great night is Las Vegas (all three in RTR!)

review_text: The perfect pattern for an evening on vacation in Africa.  Light and breezy fabric, form fitting without being too tight or uncomfortable.  Perfect length.
review_summary: Soft, comfortable fabric that was light and breezy - wore on an African safari vacation.

review_text: loved it. great for cocktails or causal.
review_summary: great dress. but i'm 5'2" and it was too long.

review_text: Loved loved this dress and so bummed I didn't take a photo in it. I had to wear a stick on bra, due to the back being all lace. Wore it with black shoes as there is some black threading in the lace.

Many compliments on this top! I planned to wear this for a night out, but ended up wearing it to work also and felt really chic and comfortable in both venues. Very stretchy top could accommodate a range of sizes. May have been a little more flattering in one size down on the bottom portion. Also, a little more yellow than it appears online.
This maxi wasn't necessarily the most figure flattering, but it was so fun to wear. It is a great color and great material. Would still recommend for a casual or dressy look.

I am almost 6' tall, and while this dress was adorable and fit well, it barely covered my bum.  The looseness of the dress makes it even more dangerous for exposure.  I was really sad I was unable to wear it.
review_summary: Don't even bother if you are tall!

review_text: Very dressy but not flashy. 5'5", 170 lbs
review_summary: Wonderful experience. This is a good service

review_text: I wore this to a drag queen show at La Te Da on Duval St. in Key West on the night of Thanksgiving.  It was awesome!  I love the when you brush over the sequins with your hand and it makes a pattern because they are white on one side and silver on the other!  The drag queen spotted me in the crowd and said she "had competition" hahha!  Def rent this on....beware...it's very very short, but you only live once!!!  Thanks RTR!

This dress was a gorgeous, thick fabric and the pattern was beautiful. But it a true "garbage bag" fit dress - very loose and no shape. I wore it to the beach on vacation, which was a little dressy. But it was too unflattering to wear to an event.
review_summary: Nice thick fabric. No shape, so not flattering but perfect for beach.

review_text: 5'5, 140lbs, 34C/28/36- fits great!
review_summary: Beautiful Dress. Great quality. Fit was amazing. I may buy this one!

review_text: I absolutely loved this dress and wore it twice on my vacation. It does run a little big, but the 4 still fit me well. It's also short!! But, I liked that it was short given that I'm on the shorter side. The dress was comfortable and so versatile - you can easily dress up or down. I would highly recommend and definitely rent again!
I rented this dress for my Bachelorette/Caribbean vacation.  I loved it!  I felt trendy and sexy.  My girlfriends loved it and I got a lot of compliments.  The detail around the neckline is gorgeous.

The sequence add a flair of formality while keeping the dress fun! The top was a little bit stretched out so be sure to wear the fashion tape on the open back so that the look from the front is preserved. This dress should not fit too tight and the 4 was comfortable, the 2 may have been too short unless its on a very straight frame. I loved the paired dropped earrings that were part of the mystery bling. I would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Very attractive dress. Catches just the right amount of attention!

review_text: It was comfortable and fit well.
review_summary: Loved this dress! I wore it in New Orleans on a hot summer day.

review_text: Stylish and cute dress, perfect for a fall day in LA.
True to size, might be a bit short for some tall ladies. Overall very flattering and fun to wear.
review_summary: This dress is super flattering, body hugging, and a perfect bold color!

review_text: I wore this dress on a trip to Spain. I thought the pattern was beautiful and the dress was unique. I thought the dress was a bit fitted in the bottom but otherwise I was happy with this rental.
Loved this dress!! Rented it for a casual night in Miami. It was really comfortable, but still fun and sexy with the cutouts. Definitely need a backless bra.

I had rented another dress for Vegas that I ended up not liking and this was the dress suggested at the RTR shop.  I came out and my husband eyes got big and he gave a big thumbs up.  I'm regularly a 10 and maybe should have gone with the 10, but he 8 fit so I jumped on it.  I was a little worried about it rolling in the waist when sitting but it wasn't a problem.  The dress also requires a little maintenance to keep the tulle straight, but its worth it.  Great effect.  Wore with nude pumps and a statement necklace that wasn't too big.  Was so glad she picked this one for me!

This romper was SO fun for our Vegas trip. It fit perfectly! It was great that it had the plunging neckline, but wasn't too short or tight around the thighs, so you don't look too scandalous. I wore with over the knee boots and RTR earrings. It was my favorite outfit of the whole weekend! Will rent again if I have a need for something flashy.
It's incredibly comfortable. Not alot of shape to it but that what you want on the beach, right?
review_summary: This was perfect for the pool and going to dinner!

review_text: I rented this dress for a night out in Vegas from the RTR store in the Cosmopolitan.  I LOVED it so much that I wore it 2 nights on my trip.  It is incredibly figure flattering and hold everything in comfortably.  I occasionally had to tug it down when it would slide up but it was a total non-issue.  I LOVE this dress so much (and so did my husband).
I rented this for a bachelorette trip. It was a little too tight in the bust but the sister of the bride wore it for dinner one night. It was a adorable to twirl in.
I absolutely loved this dress! fit me perfectly! very cute and fun! I would totally consider buying this.
i wore this dress on vacation to the beach. It was breezy and comfortable. It was flattering and pretty with the option to unbutton the lower skirt. I loved this rental!

I loved this dress! I rented this dress through Unlimited membership for my honeymoon to Nicaragua. It was the perfect choice for an upscale, romantic dinner. My husband loved the open back. It runs a bit small and the skirt is  definitely on the shorter side, so if you are tall you might want to size up. I'm 5'0, so the size was perfect for my petite frame. I paired this with black flats, but you can easily dress it up with heels or down with sandals. Added bonus: it travels very well and managed to make the trip while staying wrinkle-free.  I can't wait to rent this again!

This dress was so fun and fabulous!  I got tons of compliments on my birthday and it was perfect for celebrating in Las Vegas.  It was pretty big, I ordered a S and M and ended up wearing the S but I could have worn an XS had I ordered it.  The only negative to this dress is the sequins material really rubs the insides of your arms - I had a lot of red marks the next morning.  Ouch!  Thanks Rent The Runway for making my birthday great!  My friend also rented and wore Herve Leger in this photo.

I'm short, so this dress fit longer than the model in the picture, but the side slits made it easy to move in.  I wore it once out to dinner with a black leather biker jacket to give it edge, and again on a road trip to Vegas with white slip-on sneakers for casual glamour.  The silk fabric is lightweight and doesn't wrinkle--fab.  I loved the 4o's vibe of the pattern and will rent again--maybe try to size it down a bit.  My first Equipment but not my last.
review_summary: Love the way this Equipment dress is slightly fitted.  Comfortable and laid-back fabulous.

review_text: Nice top.... NOT a sweater. Has nice structure to it and looks great with jeans. Nice a relaxed.
The sleeves wouldn't stay up but other than that great piece
review_summary: Very flattering and comfy to wear

review_text: I rented this for a family vacation in Hawaii and it was perfect. Soft light fabric. You will not be disappointed. It has a wide neckline, I did not mind.

The top portion runs large and the bottom portion runs slightly small. I am a 32DD and the top was a little loose, I'm a 4 on bottom and the bottom portion fit snug. The silhouette is best suited for someone thin or generally small. I would not rent this dress if larger than a size 6. The length is slightly long in my opinion. It looks short on model, but in reality hits closer to the knee.
review_summary: Fun and flirty. Good for a vacation or party - somewhere warm.

review_text: Loved the color. The length was accurate to the photo and I am 5'7. If you have a spanx that is a thong you can see it through the dress, had to wear a full slip dress spanx. It is a nice material but not super thick.
Will def rent again!!

I suppose this dress looks like what it looks like on the model, but I didn't love it. It's a bit snug around the neck and does nothing to flatter your figure. It was also much more orange than I expected (seems like a silly comment but seriously, it's VERY orange). Not an awful dress but I definitely wouldn't rent again.

I picked this dress because looking through the review pictures, I didn't see one girl that looked bad in it. I got it and it was even better than I had hoped, fit like a glove. I ended up wearing it two nights because I liked it so much. If it goes on sale, I'll be buying it.
review_summary: Great dress for pear shaped girls!

review_text:
Loved everything about this dress!
I'm 5'3", 130, 34DD, and the 4 was great.  Note: if you have athletic or "fleshy" arms...you might want to size up (it was JUST barely ok for me and I would have gone with the 6 just for the arms, but the booty looked a little funny on me).
Great dress for a fun night out with friends.  The waist is a tad small but not very noticeable.  Would rent again.
review_summary: Beautiful dress for a great evening

review_text: I'm a little too short for the torso of this one piece, but I still wore it for a brunch date and got compliments! It's very comfortable, light-weight and not at all sheer because of the liner. I could have considered buying this one if I were over 5'3'' and it fit me! Easy to dress up or dress down - definitely worth the rent for your vacation or just to have a weekend option in your closet!

The lace is really soft and has a nice stretch to it, without getting stretched out. Really fun to wear, flattering on most body types and long enough in the torso for someone tall to wear. A great, fun piece.
Loved this dress! Had so many compliments! It was true to size at a size 10, very fitted but flattering. I didn't have to wear a bra which is rare but it fit great!
review_summary: This amazing dress was one of a kind!

review_text: I rented this for vacation in Charleston, SC. I had my eye on this dress for a while and was really happy with the rental. I would have prefered a size 0 but only the 2R was available. It was larger than I would have prefered, but would definitely rent the 0R again. I'm 5'3" and wore this with flats, didn't think the length was awkward at all. Paired with a big sun hat I loved strolling the streets of low country in the dress. I recommend it!
Perfect for a date night or a party
review_summary: Loved this dress. It fit nicely. The detail is great too.

review_text: Fits like a glove---great for tall women, length was just right!
review_summary: Love this orange dress--perfect for a night out with friends in Miami!

review_text: My husband will actually request me to wear this dress, I've kept it for 3 months because he doesn't want me to send it back!

The adjustable straps really helped make this a great fit. I'm really short, so I needed high wedges but the length was great. I packed this for a trip and just didn't get a chance to wear it - which I'm still regretting! I ordered it as Unlimited and almost saved it for a wedding that I have in a couple of weeks, but I think that it is too white to wear as a wedding guest.
Vibrant color, material is very rich, very fitted but fit like a glove! So many compliments!
review_summary: Perfect dress for the occasion, wore it to a yacht party for a destination wedding weekend!

review_text: I rented this dress for a girls trip to Vegas, and it was perfect! The cut of the dress was flattering, and the fabric had some stretch to it to hug your curves. I would definitely rent this dress again!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a girls weekend in Vegas

review_text: very pretty and flattering
review_summary: I loved it but it was really tight

review_text: beautiful dress but runs small
The fit was cute but the dress was super faded. Unless they get more of this in stock, I wouldn't recommend. Nevertheless I wore it day drinking in Vegas.
review_summary: Cute fit - old and faded dress

review_text: I loved the style and the print on this ...I just couldn't get the top to fit properly. The side-tie was not located in a good place to actually close the wrap, so I was billowing open across the bust. This also made the waist very lumpy looking. I liked the length on it but it was too wide in the top section for me.
great for a rooftop party!

Beautiful dress! It was  the perfect outfit to wear to a sunset beach picnic. Received so many compliments. Fit true to size. I am about 5'3" and did not feel like the dress was too long or dragging beneath me. You will not regret renting!!
Fit well
review_summary: loved the dress and got compliments

review_text: wore this with gladiator heels and felt amazing! i'm only a 34B so got away not wearing a bra, but any larger you'll want a NuBra for it.  super comfortable and flirty!
Loved this dress!  Comfortable and casual.  Perfect for vacation or work.  Fit true to size.  Slightly tight in the rib-cage but not enough to order up a size for me.

I wore this dress to my bachelorette party in Vegas in late August. I was initially worried about the long sleeves and how I would feel in the heat of Vegas, but decided to take a chance. I'm so glad I did! The dress was very breathable and light. I never felt hot, sweaty or (most importantly) itchy. The dress is well made and I got many compliments. One minor con (which isn't really a con unless you're in Vegas) is that the dress is a little long by Vegas standards (it fell 4 inches above my knees).  But other than that, it was perfect for the occasion!
Very nice fabric texture. Not as fluttery and a slightly more dusty pink than as it appears in the photo. I would take a size down next time.
review_summary: feminine and flirtatious to pair with a slim trouser

review_text: Top is a little big if you are small chested. Didn't find it too short (and I have a big butt!) LOVED IT! so comfortable!!
review_summary: Loved it for a night out on vacation. Comfortable and light weight! Dress it up with wedges

review_text: I am curvy with a larger bust but it fit perfectly, it was sexy yet classy and the color was great. I love this and will rent again.
review_summary: Bold Color unique cut, made it very classy but still a lot of fun

review_text: This romper is too short even though the fit was loose.  The fabric easily rumples and was asked if I slept in my clothes.  This is not an outfit to take on vacation if you are not wearing it to the beach.
review_summary: This outfit was for a  road trip within Florida.  The car was 2 hrs long.  Comfortable but rumpled.

review_text: This dress fit wonderfully.  I ordered and 10 and 12, the 10 fit perfectly but had a hole in the back right over my bum, so I couldn't wear it.  The 12 fit,  you couldn't tell it was big in the hips from the photo, but it was.  This dress was also in disrepair and had a safety pin holding together the hole on my hip.  A bit frustrating as this was a very special evening, just glad it was dark and not as noticeable.  Other than that, the quality of the fabric was stretchy and felt good.  I did wear spanks, but wouldn't have had to.  I did not wear a bra as it was snug enough.
review_summary: This dress fit like a glove!

review_text: In love with the material. It is slightly shiny but I loved It! I was worried that the sleeves would be to tight, but fit pretty well. It was just enough to stay in place.

I really cannot think of a single negative thing to say about this dress! It was absolutely jaw-dropping, extremely comfortable, and super unique. I received compliment after compliment all night. I ordered both the Small and XS, but didn't even bother trying on the Small after trying on the XS. The dress has plenty of stretch and will hug your curves. If you are the type of person who needs to wear a bra, this dress may not work for you, as it is backless. I have a small chest, and wore one of those "sticky" bras, which was perfect. Rent this dress!!! You will not regret it!

This dress turned out to be one of my favorite rentals so far!  My husband loved it, it fit fabulously and was super flattering. The fabric was super comfortable and flattering. I loved it so much - I still might purchase!

Love this dress! So beautiful and comfortable. Has button front so great if you have a large chest like mine (34DD). Great bright colors. You can easily dress up or dress down with jean jacket for a walk on the beach. Fabulous dress that hides tummy  area with loose fit. Definitely a great dress.

I love jumpers and this one is extremely flattering. I got a ton of compliments from people.  I will say I normally wear a 4 but I definitely couldn't have worn smaller as the torso would not have fit.  The length was great and it even has zippers at the bottom of the legs to help get you in.  People have talked about the zipper and it isn't terrible to do by yourself but its not super easy as it goes all the way up the back so it gets a little awkward in the middle.

All of that being said I would definitely rent this again!
The dress itself was amazing. I loved it.

I brought this on a week and a half long vacation and don't even know how many times I rewore it. On colder casual nights just a slouchy sweater over it with sandals, for a nicer dinner just wear heels. I got compliments every time I wore it. It's really nice and airy, great for warmer weather. I'm 5'10 and this hit me right at about the ankle. Strongly recommend.

This dress is more flattering on than I thought it would be.  I have a petite frame but curves, so I thought it might be too tent-y.  Instead it flattered my body type!
