I do recommend wearing heels with it to give a little extra height because of the hem length, but it's such a versatile dress.  I wore it during a road trip from the Hamptons to my home and it was comfortable during the car and looked nice when we got out of the car for meals.  I could have just as easily worn it to a wedding or to run errands.  I wanted to buy it so badly!  One note is that the fabric would wrinkle easily, so don't travel with it unless its on a hanger or in the garment bag.  See more of my Rent the Runway unlimited finds at @thehllw
Snug but forgiving. Material feels light and soft. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Received many compliments. Wore it on a trip to Belize with a group of friends. Very comfortable.

review_text: Rented this for a vacation to New Orleans. Just tried it on quickly (hence the messy room shot) and loved it, but haven't worn it out yet. It is lovely material, really flattering. My problem area is my stomach and so jumpsuits and rompers usually accentuate that area - but this one was really flattering (could be all the patterns) and worked on my short torso. Thought it was effortless and cute.
It fit really well. Very comfortable. A little low cut, but that's a personal preference.
review_summary: Really liked this dress. True to size.

review_text: I wore the dress for the formal nights on our family's Christmas Cruise.  We decided to have formal portraits done and I feel the dress just made it even more special.  I felt like a million plus bucks.  The only problem was that I am 5'6 and I ordered the 14R, which fit everywhere except in length.  I had to wear flats otherwise the dress was about 4 inches too short.  I also had to pin the bust area as it was so deep of a V in front that I was showing way too much of the girls (mind you I am also a 38DDD).  I would rent this dress again in a long and remember to pack the safety pins.
review_summary: The dress was beautiful.  I got so many compliments. Great Experience!

review_text: Got this as my Birthday promo with pro account. I normally wear a 10 but chose to wear my backup size of 12 for this. The 10 was pretty tight around waist. I wore with sandals otherwise any kind of heel would have been too short on my 5'9" frame. Loved the colors. The halter tie seemed a bit complicated and on the 12 the gold ball was missing on one of them. I just tucked it all in in the back. All in all great for vacation.
review_summary: Great colors but a bit short

review_text: Beautiful top. Runs a tad small in the boobs, so didn't end up wearing a bra. Overall great fit!
review_summary: I got a lot of compliments on this top. I loved it!

review_text: Wore this in Vegas on my bachelorette trip! Was perfect for a girly night out (Thunder Down Under & dinner!). Was very comfortable. The darker shade of gold is really complementary to skin tones. The dress is way less tulip-y in person FYI but very pretty!
very comfortable.  Rides up some when you walk, if you have booty.
review_summary: Vegas trip with my friend for our birthdays.  She wore a rent the runway too.

review_text: Fit perfectly and felt great in the dress. I wore it dress for a night out in Vegas....the dress was thick and kept me warm on the chilly night

Great day to night jacket did not want to give back! Denim is as popular as every and I found this Vince jacket to be perfectly over sized and really comfortable. I rented in the S and felt like for the look I was going for it was perfect. I could have maybe worn the XS but I wouldn't have wanted to. I rented it for my weekend trip to Palm Springs and it traveled great. Hooping to rent again when real spring rolls around.

I wish I had a better picture of this dress because I honestly had so much fun in it! I wore it on the last night of a vacation in Turks and Caicos and it was great for both a semi formal dinner and a night full of dancing afterwards. The dress has a lot of fabric, so I'd recommend sizing down. Also when you wear it, be sure to really tie the dress (kind of tight) around your neck - it looks much cuter that way. All in all, this was a very fun dress for a vacation evening out!

Absolutely loved everything about this dress.  It was comfortable, hid any tummy problem areas, perfect length, the cut around the neck made me feel super feminine and diminished the wideness of my man shoulders.  Favorite RTR yet, and I received lots of compliments! You want to rent this one.
review_summary: Wore this on a River Boat Dinner Cruise in Nashville!  Incredible!

review_text:
I'm in between sizes and sensitive about my weight gain. This dress emphasized all the wrong things on my body. Included the humiliating picture to help others. Maybe I should've sized up or thrown on a pair of spanx, but since I have an unlimited membership I just returned it for something more flattering.
This was my first time ever getting a brand new dress with tags still on and I was excited about that. Its a nice dress, but I can't imagine paying anywhere near the suggested retail price for it, it is not that sort of quality.
review_summary: Nice new dress w/ tags, fit just wasn't flattering for me.

review_text: The pants were visibly worn, but I still loved them. The fit was great for a short girl like me, and I felt like I stood out in the crowd. I wish I could have kept them.

It was a great dress for a wedding. The flow of the dress is the best part and makes you stand out. Its fits snug on top which is perfect for me but also makes you look top heavy if you have anything over the size of a C cup. Clors are true to the picture.
review_summary: The flow of the dress is amazing

review_text: I'm in love with this pattern mix. It was long enough in the shorts (usually I have an issue with my thunder thighs). I had to pin up the front all the way since my boobs (34DD) really could've used a bit more room. But still wearable and comfy!
review_summary: Super cute & comfortable! But pinning necessary for big boobs :)

review_text: Very cute.  Wore it it in the day as a casual look and was able to dress it up a bit for evening.  Fits more like a small than an xs.  Quality is great, thick material.

This was an adorable one shoulder cropped top with gorgeous ruffle detailing.  It is hard to tell from the photos that it is slightly pinstriped.  The shell underneath is quite cropped so i recommend high waisted jeans with this top.  It is also a bit snug if you have a large chest, but a bra isn't necessary.  I received many compliments on this top & would really like to own it!
review_summary: Unique, on trend, eye catching top!

review_text: It was a great dress for family photos.  Photographed well and I loved the mix of casual elegance.
Fit well, comfortable.

The small was perfect size for me. I originally ordered XS and I'm on the smaller side. The XS would have been too tight, especially around belly. I don't have much of a belly, but if you want to feel comfortable, small is a lot better. The color was beautiful. I wore this in Las Vegas with my boyfriend and he said I was smoking hot. I walked by a row of men at the Encore Casino in Las Vegas, all their heads turned to check me out. This dress stops traffic. It made me feel so sexy, and you will get the compliments and remember this feeling forever.
review_summary: This is one of the best dresses I have ever worn! Many heads turned when I walked in the room.

review_text: I rented this dress for the Belmont Stakes. It was SUPER flattering, nice amount of stretch and a thick fabric that covered flaws. However, it was long (I'm 5'6" and it hit below the knee) and the heavy fabric can be a downfall if you are at an outdoor event (it was 80+ degrees the day I wore the dress and I was definitely sweating a bit). But overall I loved it and would highly recommend.
review_summary: Elegant dress for an elegant event

review_text: I wore this on the plane since we planned on going out the minute we arrived in Vegas!  It was perfect!  I wore a size up to make sure the torso was long enough and it worked great!  Definitely short and showed off a lot of leg.  I wore with some flowered wedges for a bit of color!  I felt so sexy!
review_summary: It was comfortable enough for the plane and hot enough to get just the right amount of attention!

review_text: Amazing fit. Incredibly flattering.
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in Vegas.

review_text: I rented this for a night out for dinner and drinks.  I have a bigger butt and legs and the Medium fit perfectly.  Very comfortable but I did notice how stretched out and baggy it got throughout the night.

This was the perfect vacation dress for a semi formal tropical night. Fun and a little flouncy. Super comfortable and easy to dance in. I wore it with no bra at all because I was a little sunburned and the dress held me in perfectly. Really pretty from the back. I received a lot of compliments. More interesting than a typical black dress.
review_summary: Beautiful fit and details! Very Classy and fun!

review_text: I read the other reviews and I was looking for something comfortable yet classy for our 15 hour trip to France. We were going over for the last 2 weeks of Le Tour de France and we had several formal and casual dinners , plus shopping in Paris. I got more compliments on this jumper and it was so comfortable and looked very classy.  I loved it so much I bought it. :)
review_summary: Rented this for our 2 week trip to Paris...LOVED IT!

review_text: Fits like a comfy oversized hoodie on a petite girl - definitely runs large but not too large that it can't be worn by someone my height. Great extra layer for outdoor winter activities. Super soft fabric!

Pretty colors and nice light weight fabric.  Although, wrinkles easy.  Wore this as a beach cover up on vacation.  I am usually a Medium/Small but when not fitted definitely a small so it does not look like a tent.

This is the 2nd time I have rented this blazer. It looks so expensive and tailored on! I wore this is in Paris twice, it goes with everything (a dress, overalls, skinny jeans..) I will be renting it again

I loved this dress! I originally ordered the XS through unlimited, but the armholes and neckline were way too tight so I got the Small shipped to my hotel in Miami. I was worried even the small would be too tight but it was much roomier than the XS. The dress is very stretchy, comfortable and flattering. The cut out in the back makes it just a step up from your typical bodycon dress. It didn't ride up at all which is a big plus as well. I also wore no bra due to the cut out in the back but the dress was thick enough that I was comfortable with it. I loved the color and pattern, perfect for a summer/vacation party. Would definitely rent this dress again!

The color of the dress was stunning and perfect for a formal dinner. The dress doesn't have a lot of stretch though, so not super comfortable up top. Would recommend going up a size, I did.  There is a built in slip under the dress, so no need to wear one.
review_summary: Beautiful color and wound rent again!

review_text: Fit great and didn't need a bra. The skirt rode up a bit while walking. Hard to dance in with your arm being stuck to your side. I did love it though!

I loved the fit of this except the length. It was about an inch too short for me to wear with flats, and 3 inches too short to wear with heels so I wasn't able to wear it unfortunately. The color is absolutely beautiful and a real stunner!

This fit perfectly. I wore this out in Key West and it was cool and breezy for the hot weather, just the right amount of skin showing without being overly revealing. It would be great with heels and jewelry to dress it up, or throw on flats for a more casual look.
review_summary: This is cute, sexy and classy all at the same time! Perfect for a fun night out!

review_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress. I am between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 fit perfectly. My only complaint is that the zipper stuck, I couldn't get it up myself and I wouldn't trust my husband not to break it. Fortunately was with other ladies who could lend a hand.
I would recommend having fashion tape on hand as I was self conscious about the top slipping off to the side of my breasts.
review_summary: I was comfortable and felt dressed for the occasion of a very nice dinner!

review_text: This dress fit well and was fun for going out to dinner on a warm night. I wish RTR would carry more daytime- appropriate sundresses like this one!
Cute and fluttery, but didn't add any bulk.  Missing a button though..... (the chest one at that!)  but easy to hide a pin in there.
I wore this dress to the ballet and received so many compliments. I also loved the side pockets

I could have worn either the 16 or 18 there was no real difference in fit, i chose the larger size just because the hook and eye on the back was better. The only thing id change is that i wish the dress had pockets but otherwise i loved it.
review_summary: Went on vacation in Puerto Rico and wore this for my boyfriend's birthday dinner

review_text: It was very comfortable and flattering. The best part is that there's no bra required!
review_summary: I went to New York and this was perfect to go from day to night.

review_text: I LOVED wearing this romper. The material is nice and thick which made me feel extra comfortable all night. I could easily move around and the fit felt very flattering. Usually zipping up rompers is such a pain but I actually had no problem getting in and out of this. I do think it ran a bit small so I'm glad I sized up for my backup size.
LOVE LOVE this outfit! I ended up buying it because I loved it so much. Sophisticated yet sexy. Beautiful and very well made. Highly recommend!
review_summary: NYC girls weekend - perfect outfit for it!

review_text: I am having so much fun with the unlimited plan. I had to go to a screening and wanted a fun top. I popped into the store near me and I saw this in the dressing room. I do not normally wear this pattern but I loved the design so I figured I would try it on. So glad I did! I am a 36D so it was a bit tight on the boobs but honestly it was fine. Felt like a corset. It was much sexier on then you would think. Would rent it and wear again! Boyfriend liked it too!
review_summary: Great top. Beautifully made. So fun to wear! Loved it! Surprisingly Sexy!

review_text: runs a bit big, but so comfortble. I love the print, style and lenght.
review_summary: Very very comfortable, love this dress.

review_text: Definitely order a size down. . Wore a size 2, normally in between a 2-4, and I definitely could have worn a size 0. The dress has some stretch to it, so it is VERY comfortable, but cute and flirty at the same time. Its hard to wear a nude bra with this because the bra is very visible in the front. Opted for a sticky bra, and it didn't look quite as good.
review_summary: Perfect dress for a cruise dinner!

review_text: I rented this for Fourth of July at the beach with cut off white jean shorts. My daughter and I got rained on and although my hair ended up on top of my head in a ponytail the shirt still looked adorable at the very end of the night. My shorts came up to just below my belly button and the shirt still covered my stomach so while it's a shorter shirt,  I still was extremely comfortable and there was no patch of skin showing.  Strapless bra or sticky bra .  The embroidery is very beautiful.
review_summary: Adorable ruffle w/ hints of red for Fourth of July!

review_text: Amazing jacket that will definitely turn heads! Runs true to size, and is very warm. Wish this jacket was available to purchase!

Really pretty and flowy and can be worn as a cover up or day dress. It's boxy, but its a really cute look with sandals. I'd say it runs really large since I'm usually a small/medium and the XS was even a tad too big (but I was wearing it as a cover up).
I wore this with jeans and a statement necklace and it paired nicely. It's quite roomy which I think is the style but might consider a size smaller next time.  Great to wear out to a big dinner ;)
Comfortable fit and easy for travel with big pockets
I could have used the 0L but it was damaged, the 2L was a little big. I got tons of compliments on it and it was perfect for a New Year's eve party on our resort.

I found the medium didn't fit in the waist as it was too tight so I had to size up to Large which made the top too large.  The lower shoulder was way too low to be appropriate so I had to keep pulling it up.  It wasn't a quality issue and the romper was well made.  Just not for someone who's 5'1''.
review_summary: Not for short people with short torsos.

review_text:
I absolutely LOVED this dress.  The only downside is that it was a bit long for me and even in 4 inch heels it wasn't enough to keep it from dragging.  

I felt glamorous and received a number of compliments.
review_summary: Gorgeous dress for a 40th birthday celebration on the beach

review_text: I had so much fun with this whole process!  I wanted something special to wear for a night at a club seeing a show.  I ordered this thinking Herve would be the best choice for Vegas.  This dress fit true to size and I was comfortable in the L.  I could have squeezed into the M, but I knew we were having dinner, too, so I didn't want to push my luck.  Any issues I'd have with the dress are my own body insecurities, not the dress, which does a great job making a curvy girl look hot!  My husband loved it!  When I do this again, I'll likely go with a brighter color, which actually was the recommendation of the stylist...I was just too nervous to go bright this time around.  RTR service was exemplary.  I had the dress delivered to my Vegas hotel and shipped it from there as well.  I loved all the little "extras" in the package and the mystery bling (earrings) was a great addition.  Will definitely rent again!
review_summary: So much fun for a Vegas night out!

review_text: It does run short FYI

This is a really fun dress! I wore it while vacationing in New York. It fits true to size and is very comfortable - I literally wore it all day. It's fairly long, so I would recommend wedges or it will be dragging on the ground. I would rent this again in a heartbeat!

I rented this for a trip to Park City with my girlfriends. Looked cute with leggings and boots and kept me really warm - no need for another jacket. It's definitely over-sized and runs large, so size down accordingly.

The size 8 is big. I don't know if its stretched out or if it runs big but it was really big in the waist and I could have used a belt to cinch it but I rocked it anyways... still was perfect for the occasion.  I was at a party in Nashville.
review_summary: Tons of compliments, It was comfortable too!

review_text: I read the other reviewers who said it ran tight at the waist, not for me. I didn't take it on vaca because it was too big, but I wore it out to a brunch and it didn't even touch my waist. Super cute color and fabric. The loose fit made me feel small.
It's one of my favorite items I've received from RTR.

Comfortable and colorful dress. Beautiful details and crisp cotton. The dress never wrinkled even with warm and humid weather and prolonged sitting. I plan to wear this one more time before I return it. Had to skip it for a luncheon due to chilly weather. This dress was great with wedge sandals and beaded flat sandals. Love it!  Many compliments received.

Beautiful dress but I decided not to wear it because it accentuated my tummy SO much!! I tried spanx underneath but it still wasn't working. If you're super skinny, wear it! If you have even the slightest belly, skip it.

I run between a 6 and an 8, and the 6 was even a bit loose.  Maybe just stretched out from wear.  The straps also constantly fell off my shoulders, and honestly, it would have been pretty without the straps.  I loved it.  Very sexy - sequins, but almost a leather look from a distance, which gave it that added edge.  Its fitted, but no so tight that I felt self-conscious of my pudge all night.  Comfortable, but rubs under your arms from the sequins.  I wore it to Kinky Boots in NYC, and got lots of compliments.

This dress is very beautiful in person and has excellent detail in the pattern. It definitely runs small, however as it's extremely fitted in the bust and waist. Curvier women should size up if fuller in hips. Should be worn with a racer back bra. Dress is perfect tea length.

This dress was absolutely perfect!  I was a little skeptical at first since this was my first experience with RTR but it was perfect!  Sizing was a little off so it runs large but perfect- I just had a baby and it was very comfortable and easy to wear!  Loved it!!
Fit perfectly in bottom, a little big on top.
review_summary: Lots of compliments!  Cute for outdoor event at work conference.

review_text: Beautiful and classy, and still absolutly stunning.  You'll feel and look like a million bucks.  The dress shell is lined and comfortable, the sleves are not lined and can be a little scratchy, but you get used to it.  I wore this in Las Vegas at Tao restaurant and night club, everywhere we went I recieved compliments.  You really stand out in this dress.
The dress fit true to size and was not too revealing in the chest. However, I have a big larger chest (32DD) so I imagine the top might run a bit large on someone who is smaller chested.
Felt like an Instagram princess who spends her days on exotic islands and mega yachts. Got tons of compliments.
Loved the dress!  Super flattering and loved wearing it! Fit like a glove!  I'm 5'6 and the length was perfect when wearing it with wedges.
review_summary: I wore it for a night out in Vegas ... I got lots of compliments and felt great in it!

review_text: Gorgeous dress - wide cut, romantic, innocent, with playful details. Worn for a beach wedding.

I loved this dress.  It was comfortable as the fabric had some give.  I don't say this about many RTR's but I wish it had been a little shorter.  The cutout mesh helped create the look of a longer torso and leg.  Overall the dress is fairly conservative and would feel comfortable renting again for a wedding.

I wanted to love this dress!  But, being 5 feet tall, it just wasn't the shape for me.  The cut at the chest is strange and made wearing a bra impossible.  Beautiful print though - if I was six inches taller, I think this would have been great!
review_summary: Beautiful print.. but not for petites!

review_text: Good fit - used double stick tape for the bust, as it was a little lower cut than I like (even for Vegas :))
review_summary: Wore this for my husband's birthday in Vegas. Loved it!

review_text: Perfect fit. Looks just like the pic.twirly and fun. Unfortunately the order came after I had already left town on vacation, so didn't get to wear the dress. Would order again.
review_summary: Being with friends and family on vacation.

review_text: I got this to wear on a winery trip. Super casual and comfy, although it definitely needs a belt or something around the waist to tie the look together. Thanks to the other reviewers for the idea!

Absolutely great dress for an hourglass figure woman. It made my waist look tiny, while still having room for my 38F+ bustline. Fantastic color and extremely comfortable to dance in as well! I got tons of compliments on it. My only caution is that the dress runs short. I am just shy of 5'5" and had to wear the flats I had planned to use for the after party all evening because it hit at the ankle. A taller woman or one whose heart is set on wearing heels definitely needs to order the long!

Overall another RTR hit.
review_summary: I wore this dress while officiating a black tie optional wedding.

review_text: Fun print my boyfriend loved it
review_summary: Stretchy and no worries of making sitting fold marks, great flow. I just pulled it out of my bag

review_text: I can see where this dress would pose an issue for girls with larger breasts as its a tad snug in the bust area.  luckily, not the issue for me & could be worn safely without a bra. ....but its too pretty to not rent!
review_summary: loved this dress! wore it for vacation in St. Lucia!

review_text: Super cute detailing and styling. Deep navy blue, unique sleeves / strap concept. Loved.

It's hard to find the right dress for a "nice night" on a beach vacation, when you know the restaurant is upscale but you also know that other girls / women will be wearing anything from white jeans and sandals to a nicer dress. This Trina Turk dress fit the bill! I simultaneously felt elegant while not feeling overdressed next to a table of men in golf shorts and Tommy Bahama shirts. The bright colored skirt and crocheted top give it a beachy feel, while the cut is flattering and sexy (but still very classy). A definite win!

I love Shoshanna dresses, so I was excited when this more casual style came up on my email. I rented it for a wine tasting day and it was great. Usually I wear an 8 in Shoshanna but the top part of this dress ran a bit small and lacked stretch, so I went with the 10. I am only 5'2" so I did wish it was a little shorter, but thats not really an issue with the dress. I got a lot of compliments and was very comfortable all day. The way the skirt lays makes it very susceptible to catching the wind, but I quite enjoyed playing Marilyn.
review_summary: Great dress for a girls day out wine tasting!

review_text: Of all the pieces I have received in my unlimited orders this was by far one of my favorite pieces. The jackets is high quality, very interesting and fit beautifully. I wore it all day and wore it out at night. It fit just like the picture with the model- loosely.
Fit a little large in the armpits. Was nice that you can adjust the strap. They slip easily though
review_summary: Cute dress for a beach dinner

review_text: Great fit for my very curvy body. Wore a racer-back bra and the dress showed off my newly tanned shoulders.  Lots of compliments. It has great coverage, while not looking dowdy or matronly. It looks cool and hip and youthful, but not inappropriately so.  The sequins did scratch my arms a little, but not bad (and I'm picky about this). Overall, I loved it and would rent it again for another formal event.
review_summary: Dressy and Fun, All in One

review_text: Fit as expected in the waist but a little large in the top. It's a unique, large and bright floral pattern  - perfect for renting b/c it's very in now but it's a pretty loud print that I"m not sure will still be in next season.
I have trouble with jumpsuits fitting well some times, but this was no problem.  It was comfortable, sleek, and sophisticated. I would definitely recommend it.

This dress is super comfortable and photographs really well. I got tons of compliments. I was afraid to rent this dress because of the color and I thought it wouldn't work with my skin tone, but I was wrong.
review_summary: I felt like a Goddess in this dress.

review_text: This romper is a  nice change from fitted, but it is still fun.  Very comfortable.
review_summary: Amazing.  I wish I could have the option to purchase this item!

review_text: Really fun print and different style. Was fun for vacation dinner. Fits well.
Have rented three times. Cannot say enough good things. Makes every outfit fabulous!
I ended up wearing the size 2 only because the size 4 was unavailable.  The 2 fit, but snug; I think the 4 would have been perfect.
Comfortable, fit dress.

I am usually hesitant to try maxi dresses because I am 4'11, not to mention a little busty for my short frame (32D) but with the slight high/low detail I was able to rock this dress. The small was almost a little too snug in the bust but the medium was wayyy too loose so I stuck to the small. The length ended up being perfect for me.
review_summary: Great maxi for us short girls!

review_text: I liked the sweater a lot. The color was much more grey than expected but still enjoyed. I work a long sleeve t-shirt under it because of the way the sweater gives.

This dress was fine.  I typically wear a 4 or a 6 in brands like J. Crew or Bananna and I didn't think this fit like a designer dress.  The 4 was even a little baggy in the elastic waist -- maybe from being worn so many times?  It felt like the waist could have benefitted from a drawstring to cinch it a little more tightly.  If between sizes, I would definitely size down.  It was not the most flattering thing I have ever worn, but it was sparkly and fun for one night.  It hit mid-thigh and was short without being too short.

I was headed to Hawaii just 5 weeks after having my son and I was so nervous about fitting into clothes. This dress fit like a dream. It's fitted around the waist and make you look tiny! I would totally rent this again...I may actually just go out and buy it!
review_summary: The colors were amazing. Fit like a glove.

review_text: Very comfortable and love the pockets!

I wore this for a trip to Napa. It was a great dress to wear in the heat. The leg openings made the air flow, also gave it a ton of character. The top part was a little tight but it zipped and didn't rip. Colors and pattern were great too, nothing too over the top.

I love this dress. The colors and the style of it are simply amazing.  Although the dress runs very true to size, I would recommend sizing up for your back up size.  Its very comfortable and perfect for vacation. The length of the dress met me at my ankles.  A strapless bra can work, although I chose not to wear one at all.  I will definitely rent again.

Loved this.  It has a very "sporty" feel to it because of the racerback and black trim, so pairs easily with jeans.  I took it to Vegas for a long weekend and it was a fun daytime/early evening outfit to walk around in before getting glammed up for dinner.  Note that I am a size 4 on top and the size Medium was NOT big.

The fit was okay, I would of been able to wear the 8 but the lace around the arms and shoulders was just too tight. That would be the only con on this dress. I did not wear a bra since it comes with cups in it already.
review_summary: The company made the event unforgettable.

review_text: The dress was gorgeous. It did smell like it hadn't been cleaned well (smoke and really strong perfume) so that was a bummer, but it was worth it because I felt like I looked amazing which always makes for a better night. The dress is VERY short but not tacky short, just make sure you have a tan on your legs and wear high shoes.
review_summary: I went out in South Beach  and I got a ton of compliments. I wish  I could find where I could buy it

review_text: I wore this to dinner in Vegas and it looked great! I ordered a size up based on previous reviews but I would say this is truer to size rather than super small. The 2 was form fitting but still had some give at the arms and back. A 0 would have fit tighter but not unflattering. I would take what event you're wearing it to into consideration since the loser fit is obviously less provocative a look. The top is fitted enough that I didn't really need a bra. I tried it w/ a strapless bra which fit but the padding kind of ruined the lines of the style for me.
Nice and warm poncho top.

Fun printed romper by Joie! Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for backup. The stretchy fabric and relaxed fit make this piece great for various body types. With room in the bust, this romper works for larger cup sizes, but it requires a strapless bra. The waist and shorts have a loose fit that is pulled in the an elastic band on the hips. With a tight elastic trim on the short sleeves, we recommend sizing up for athletic arms. This piece hits about mid-thigh on my petite frame. I love this romper for vacation or everyday wear in warmer months. Pair with flat sandals and simple gold jewelry.

A great LBD! Gave 4 stars vs. 5 because the arm holes were very big so my bra was visible. It didn't bother me too much as I wore it out with the girls in Las Vegas but if I had wanted it for a more formal occasion I wouldn't have worn it.
The inseam & neckline are perfect standing. A bit tight when you sit down.
review_summary: I received many compliments about it being all one piece. Perfect and feminine

review_text: This dress is very cute but it was really uncomfortable. It was really tight around the neck so I had to leave the top neck button open all night to keep from feeling like I was being choked. The top rode up under the armpits so it left a little rash from rubbing. From the chest down though the dress was flowy & light weight. There is a liner underneath too though, which was a little too warm for nigh time in Arizona.
It was so sparkly and hugged in the right places! Definitely size up, it is tight but it works!

I loved this romper!! I wear a 4/27 for my waist/hips, but am a D/DD cup, so I went with the medium. For larger busted girls, it definitely shows some cleavage--use some tape, if you want it a bit more modest (I didn't.) The medium, without the belt, would have been loose in the waist, but once tied, it was perfect. I didn't think it was too short and I have pretty long legs--I wore it with flats and wedges. Maybe due to the fact it was a medium? I got SO many compliments from random people and my friends on it--I actually ended up buying it from Revolve! Totally worth it.
The fabric was too sheer to wear in bright sun. The top was too difficult and uncomfortable to keep up. Looking cute shouldn't require so much effort!

the reviews are correct, this is a tough one to send back. the color is amazing- very bright. i wore it on vacation but you could also wear it to the office with a blazer. size is true, i went with a 0r and it fit fine (i am generally between a 0 and 2). i will rent again!!
review_summary: Amazing color, light fabric, great details

review_text: I felt so confident in this top. I wore it with high-waisted jeans while sight-seeing in San Francisco. It was perfect for the unseasonably warm temperatures there in September. It's comfortable and stretchy around the arms. If I order again (let's face it, I will) I will order the XS since I have lost weight since then, but the S fit well at the time.

My husband who is an artist LOVED this dress, I don't typically purchase such bold designs (moreso classics) but this is exactly the benefit of renting! The fit was not ideal, but it was good enough. I would think this dress may fit best if you are petite or short-waisted and have either broad shoulders or chest because the dress is very short and I found it riding up, yet the open back means the top needs to be stretched to drape properly, so you may find yourself adjusting here and there. I am short-waisted and broad shouldered, so it worked out okay for me, but I did size up to get as much fabric coverage as possible. The whole thing is stretchy, so I could have worn the 10, or maybe even the 8, but I went with the 12 for this one due to the length. Typically I wear a size 8 or a 10 if it runs small or has no hip room. I had read this dress ran short, so I ordered the 10 & 12 anticipating I'd want more fabric. Basically I would not recommend if you are a long-bodied person or very tall because it's just not long enough. Sitting at dinner I felt I had to cover my lap with my napkin so no-one could tell there wasn't much dress still under me. Overall, super cute, loved the pix, glad I rented it, but also glad I don't own it. Get this one for mostly standing occasions!
review_summary: Fun summer Vegas dress for dinner & a show

review_text: The fabric was gorgeous but a little heavy and not for 80 degree weather. It fit my large, 32 G bust well, and was perfect for my short torso and long legs.
review_summary: I wore this to brunch in Miami, and it was perfectly fashionable!

review_text: I received this dress as a replacement for my original order which was returned damaged. However, I was very happy with this one! It had sexy detailing, like the cut-out sides, but still had a sense of sophistication and sleekness. Runs true-to-size, and obviously a high-quality and well-made dress.
Fit true to size. Hug my mini curves nicely.
review_summary: I absolutely LOVED this dress. Wore it for my 26 birthday in Miami. Made me feel so sexy. MUST RENT!

review_text: I got this dress to wear out in Vegas and it was perfect! The dress is beautiful and is gathered and draped in such a way that it hid lumps and bumps and accentuated all the good things! It's especially flattering around the waist and cleavage, and drapes nicely on the shoulders. It hit right above the knee, which was perfect. I got compliments all night long, and into the next day!
review_summary: I got tons of compliments and head turns all night, but I think my favorite was the next morning when I ran into some people that I'd met the night before when I was wearing the dress. One of them yelled "Hey it's golden girl! That dress was bomb!" and the whole group chimed in with "Yeah you were sparkly hot!"

review_text: loved this shirt, easily dressed up or down.  Only giving it four stars because length is a bit short, if you have a long torso, might want to consider wearing something high waisted,
This dress was the embodiment of a desert vacation. It was breezy, sexy, perfect for Palm Springs.  I am in love with this dress and will rent again for my next vacation.
review_summary: Perfect summer dress.  Fits like a glove.

review_text: was back up, but would rent again
review_summary: A little big, but lovely dress

review_text: Wore this top for 4th of July festivities. I love Parker, and this top is very on trend (I saw it for sale in Saks last week). The embroidery is nice and the quality is good- it is 100% cotton, although the fabric has a slight sheen that made me think it was synthetic. Overall, I felt this top was a little large, especially on someone who is small chested, but not overly so that it was slipping down. Its adorable but doesn't really have much shape to it. I'd say its more of a statement top than something meant to accentuate your figure. So glad I got the chance to wear it for July 4th, but probably wouldn't find another occasion to wear it to.

I really liked this romper! I wore it during the day on a vacation, and it was flattering, comfortable, and cute (especially the pattern/print and the details on the shoulders.) As others have mentioned, the biggest issue is how tricky it is to use the bathroom in it - you have to unbutton 4 buttons and untie the waist to take it off. So, I would not recommend for a outdoor festival or anything else with suspect public restrooms!

Loved this dress! The pattern was beautiful and a real standout while I was on vacation in Florida. It was comfortable, a great length (even on someone who's only 5'1''), and could be easily styled many different ways. I would definitely recommend renting this one!
review_summary: Beautiful bright pattern and a great fit!

review_text: Wore this for formal night on a cruise, and absolutely loved it.  As other reviewers have mentioned, it's heavy - and I usually ended up holding up part of the dress as I walked so I wouldn't snag it in my heels.  I'm 5'5", and the 12R just hit the floor with my 3 1/2" heels, so consider your footwear choice as you're deciding which length to rent!
review_summary: When else can you really get away with wearing sequins head to toe?

review_text: Wore this dress to a luau on Maui, Hawaii - needless to say, it was perfect for the occasion! Loved the front knot and keyhole. I am 5'5, and wore with sandals so it was a little long, but it was not dragging nor was I stepping on it. Would definitely rent again!
The top was a little big but I used double sided tape and it was fine.
review_summary: It was for my engagement pictures

review_text: Ability to unstap at the bust to make it a deeper plunge for going out, or button up when sitting down for dinner. I paired this with a jean jacket and wedges - it was so comfortable and flattering. Didn't need a bra which I loved!
review_summary: I loved this dress! So comfy, such a beautiful color for spring

review_text: This dress is incredibly flattering and very comfortable. The elastic waistband is a plus and you can easily wear a strapless bra. Good length on long legs - long enough not to be uncomfortable but short enough to be fun. I would definitely rent this again.
review_summary: This dress is so cute and fun! Perfect for a night out in Las Vegas!

review_text: Rented this for vacation. Ir definitely. is more like a cardigan than a top.  Wore a tank underneath and it was perfect for airplanes since I always get cold.  It was colorful and worked well with jeans and other pants.  I'm busty so I ordered a large but probably would have been happier with a medium as this is a very room style.

I've rented this twice now and I love it.  It fits well and doesn't show too much so its a pretty classy casual look.  I've worn on date night with jeans and heal and also to a concert with shorts and flip flops.

First,the good: the print was gorgeous (though it's black, not navy).  The box pleating was neat.  Okay, the bad: the fabric of this dress was so thick, stiff, and heavy - like a blackout drape.  Definitely not appropriate for a nice spring day as I had planned! And because of the thick, stiff fabric, it's quite tent-like.  I've had an Unlimited membership for nearly 4 months, and this is the first rental I've sent back immediately without wearing - it was that unflattering.
Loved the fit and style, really cool patterns. Wore it out and walked around, only rode up a little bit :)

This top was exactly what I was needing for a night out with the girls. I loved the perfect fit to it, and believe it would be so flattering to any shape. I usually wear an XS/S and the S was VERY fitted. Size up if in doubt. I would love to own this top!

This dress was a great one for a weekend in LAX.  The chest fit well and is adjustable due to the back tie. It wasn't clear to me that there were cut outs on the side, but they were cute. The length is a little weird. I am 5'5" and it hit above the ankle, which worked ok as I wore some funky wedge sandles.
Got a ton of compliments and loved wearing it!

Great dress for Scottsdale. Sexy yet classy and gorgeous bright color. Fit was lose but comfortable. Good for post pregnancy. Great mini length. Can dress up w patent leather neutral pumps or down with tie around ankle nude wedges. Very cute!
review_summary: Still trying to conceal a post twins baby bump. Got lots of compliments, pretty color!

review_text: I loved the color and the back of this but I'm a little small chested -32c and this was too big on top, I didn't wear it. Also the zipper on the XS was in rough shape

The top was cute, but didn't feel as special as other RTR pieces that I've tried. It was a little short on me.
Compliments: 0
Would I rent again: No 
Styling suggestions: I wore it with dark jeans and Stan Smiths for a casual Cali vibe. Since it is so floaty on top, would recommend fitted jeans or a pencil skirt on bottom.

The material is on the heavier side, but it was great for an early March trip to Nashville. I paired it with cowboy boots and was comfortable all night. This is definitely a less formal dress, but was great for a night of dancing at the honky tonk bars.

I ordered the 4 and 8 (as my actualy size 6 was not available). I wore the 8 which was a bit baggy in the bodice (elastic waist) but it worked as I wore it under an olive green "cargo" jacket. It was the perfect casual day to night outfit for my visit to Asheville, NC which is more of a casual beer town. The material was thin but nice quality. I found the rental very pricy (got it free due to an error on my previous order) and would never rent nor even buy this at full price... this is definitely a dress running on the designer name for the price. I did not get a photo, sadly.
wouldn't wear this as a dress but made a perfect cover up

i'll order this again and buy it.
perfect for work, vacation, everyday. love this dress.

As soon as I put this on and buttoned it up, I knew I couldn't wear it.  It was way too short for me.  It was okay, but a little uncomfortable if I was just standing still.  When I walked or moved my shoulders, it was tight in my crotch. It's super cute, but I didn't get to wear it.
review_summary: Not a good idea for girls over 5'7"

review_text: Had a retro girly feel. Loved this dress. Perfect for Labor Day weekend at the beach. Wore this out to dinner and then a bar. Got several compliments. It was a little tight on the rib cage so I wore my backup size, 6. Would definitely rent again!

I rented this dress for a Cancun vacation and it was perfect.  The blue is bright, the dress is delicate and lovely.  I rented it through the Unlimited program and ended up buying it.  My midsection is my problem site and it wasn't too tight there.  Nice length, about 2 inches above the knee.  Love it!
review_summary: The colors and patterns of the dress were just perfect for my trip to sunny Mexico!

review_text: Great dress for a nice dinner out while on vacation. Very feminine with an elastic waist that is very comfortable and forgiving. The silk moves beautifully when you walk. Runs large and felt more comfortable in my sized down back up size. Key hole neck line results in subtle cleavage. Can be worn with a razor back bra for support.
Perfect fit.  Very short, but it was exactly what I wanted!
review_summary: It was absolutely perfect for a very special night in Las Vegas!  I loved it!

review_text:
Neck kind of chokes you.

Flattering!
review_summary:
Amazing, but tight around the neck.
Probably not well suited for large busts.

review_text: I wore this for 10 days in France in the early winter and it was perfect with a few layers underneath. It's more grey than it appears online but it's a really great dark, neutral grey. I definitely could have sized down, it was still quite large in the shoulders, even with a sweater underneath. The coat was pretty bulky but, styled well, it worked nicely. The button & pocket flap detail are positioned perfectly to give the illusion of shape yet still hid all the croissants and cheese I had while wearing it. Would recommend!
review_summary: This coat was bulky but fantastic

review_text: sexy dress, but so comfortable to wear! The color is  the perfect bright candy apple red. The waist has two snaps for closure and a belt. Loved the length, just short enough for a tall girl (I'm almost 6'0") . Would suggest sizing down if you are short, but sizing up if you have a larger bust.
Fit true to size, love the draping on the back
Slightly larger fit on top than bottom.  I have a large chest (36DD) and the 8 was a little big on me.
review_summary: LOVED this!  Flirty and fun - so many compliments!

review_text: Loved the cut and feel of this jacket.  Big downside is that the studs in the jacket caught my (long, curly) hair and pulled it out.  Would only recommend if you have short or straight/silky hair.  Sleeves were on the short side as others have said, but I'm short so it was a nice fit for me.

A unique romper that got compliments all night! A little short for a taller girl, would suggest sizing up with you have a longer torso. Loved the ruffle and mesh details, adds something special to a little black romper.

I sometimes have trouble with Maxi's being long enough but this was perfect with flats! Loved the colors!  It's not exactly "figure flattering" it's pretty loose and flowing.  I actually used it as a beach cover up/casual dinner dress and it was perfect.

Pros - flattering on my figure, not too constricting as it allowed me to eat on the cruise, cute back straps
Cons - really thin material so will need a cardigan or jacket in cooler weather, dress is pretty short
review_summary: Cute pattern. Summery feel to the dress. Got lots of great compliments wearing it on the cruise ship

review_text: I absolutely loved this jumpsuit and would rent it again in a heartbeat.  Something that I would never purchase but it was amazing for a special beach welcome party at a destination wedding.  It fit so comfortably and yet looked very chic.  The color is a bright almost neon pink which I loved.  Not for a wallflower.  Material is a bit thicker which lays really nicely.  I have a curvy figure (round booty and 34 DDD chest) and the 10R fit like a dream.
review_summary: I LOVED this jumpsuit!  You will definitely stand out in the crowd!

review_text: Fits true to size and looks beautiful with gold jewelry.
review_summary: Great color for the spring & summer!

review_text: Wearing this sweater is like wearing a cozy tent.  I wore the XS and was swimming in this.  But it's super warm and cozy feeling.  If you're looking to layer this under a tailored leather jacket you may have issues with the bulkiness.

This romper fit like a glove. I loved it so much! I wore it to multiple events and it was great. I loved the detail on it and it definitely helped it look more formal but still relatively casual. I was worried about the length and it not being long enough in the torso but it was great. Def would rent and maybe even own! Great color too.
Light, casual, easy to wear.

This dress fit very well. If you have a larger bust be aware you will show all of your inside cleavage since the see through lace is very low cut. But I felt comfortable enough to pull it off since I was in Las Vegas. So I would say it depends on the occasion and what you are personally okay with showing. Overall a fun dress to wear! I was worried the skirt would be too short but it was perfect in length.

This is the perfect dress for a tropical vacation! This dress runs slightly large. It has a relaxed fit throughout the bust, waist, and hips. There is plenty of room in the sleeves as well. I recommend ordering your typical size. The fabric does not have any stretch, but it is a very light and breathable material. Very airy and comfortable. I wore this dress without a bra, but it can be worn with a standard bra. Pair with earrings and wedges for the perfect look!

I rented this for vacation, and got multiple uses out of it! One caveat: it is (very) short, so I think it's better for more casual settings. For me, it was the perfect thrown-on sight-seeing outfit and I got a lot of compliments.
It's fitted, so not bulky and sort of cropped for a chic look. I'd rent it to wear for a weekend or longer - it's that great.
review_summary: Just perfect. I wore it all vacation - it works for every outfit. I got so many compliments!

review_text: I can't begin to describe how amazing this coat was to own. It was super soft, I couldn't stop petting my own arm..haha. And it was so cozy and comfy for the drive up to Lake Placid. It was a little loud, but I mean look at my shoes here...a load coat such as this needs attention to be paid to. Kinda reminded me of a tiger crossed bred with nemo. I pared it with comfy sweats and a light grey turtle neck.
review_summary: This coat was just the bomb!

review_text: I would but this if I could. It was absolutely adorable! So many compliments!

It fit's very well, it is long though. I was torn between the small and XS, but I am glad I got the XS because if the small were longer, it would have been too long. With platform wedges, it still just barely grazed about the floor. Which is perfect!
review_summary: It was the perfect Hawaiian vacation dress!

review_text: The fit was nice, easy to wear. The slit was not too high. Flowy and beautiful!
review_summary: This dress was amazing! It flowed in the breeze perfect for vaca! I felt really beautiful in this!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation in New Orleans recently, the lace made it perfect for the southern and feminine feel. The color is absolutely beautiful, much more cobalt than navy. I wish I would have worn a NuBra and spanx with this because I felt a little "soft" but I didn't have those with me on vacation but all worked out alright. Wear a bra with this if you're worried about filling things out - I trusted other reviews about the support level but it wasn't really that great, but that was my fault. I had no problems with the lace vs hemline.
Sexy, but classy all at the same time. Will rent again!
Fit true to size. The top is asymmetrical which is a little awkward, but overall a great dress and I would rent it again.
review_summary: Got so many compliments on this dress! Trendy and fun!

review_text: I wore it wine tasting in California. I loved it!! Such a great dress.
Didn't end up wearing, the white wasn't bright in the dress, it almost looked worn so many times so it was greyish and the other colors didn't pop as much. Unfortunate because the fit was great

I felt this fit perfect! I am 5'7, perfect length, not too short, I hate short dresses! I wore 4 inch wedges.The fit covered up my "c-section" pouch on my lower abs so I didnt need to wear spanx. The v neck was a bit much, I had to use a safety pin to hold it together so my girls didnt pop out.I am a 36D and wore a push up. I have an athletic body w a booty and this flattered! The dress is great quality and didn't itch like a lot of other sequin gowns! I did have a twin at the concert though! We both rented haha! I got the 10, but was too tight in the rib cage. I would recommend! It an attention grabber!
review_summary: Wore this to Vegas to see Britney Spears in concert! What a vegas dress!

review_text: When you and your friends have unlimited subscriptions and similar taste... you end up matching. Aside from the accidental twin moment, I loved this dress and got a ton of compliments on its fit. It was super feminine and flattering — it's A-line but also cinches at the waist. I loved how lightweight it was for summer — very on-trend. I would recommend sizing up as a backup size, as there's no give in the waist.
This is a very classy but sexy dress.
review_summary: I wore this dress to a nice dinner in NY, but then it was still sexy enough to wear out after.

review_text: As other reviews stated, this runs a little big so I was really comfortable in the 8, although I have been wearing mostly size 10 lately. This was very feminine and flattering. I wore it with flip flops on vacation with my family and with heels on a night out with my husband and some friends. The color looked great with my summer tan- probably couldn't pull off the pale pink when my skin is paler. The cons (which were definitely outweighed by the pros) were that it was a bit difficult to snap in the back on my own and wrinkled easily when sitting.
Best for shorter girls.
review_summary: This fit like a glove! I absolutely loved it. It is very short though, and I'm only 5'1.

review_text: This dress was fun, but very fitted - especially through the waist. The mesh material is a bit more fishnet like in person and is black while the rest of the dress is navy. I loved that this was a great fashion forward piece, with a classic silhouette that was sexy without being too flashy. I rented this for a Vegas weekend with my boyfriend's parents so it was important that I didn't get the run of the mill low cut, Vegas sparkly minidress. Overall, this designer runs a bit small so order a size up. Not the most comfortable dress ever, but definitely hugs in the right places, with a bit of stretch so you can move and dance just fine. Wear a strapless bra, or none at all if you can!
review_summary: Great dress for classy Vegas weekend!

review_text: Beautiful design and lovely fabric. However, the bust was so tight the button wouldn't close, causing the waist to ride up unflatteringly.
review_summary: Very tight for a 12. Sadly couldn't wear for vacation as planned.

review_text:
classy yet party outfit.  very cute for vegas dinners, and you've moved on from being in a skimpy bandage dress.  I am 5'9 and ordered the 4 & 6.  I went with the 6 for length purposes.  Us tall girls get the infamous "camel toe" with majority of rompers; this if you sized up was on the cusp, but not noticeable.
Would definitely rent again and again and again.
review_summary: it was so cute for vegas!

review_text: Very nice dress.  The fabric was exceptionally soft and comfortable.  It did arrive a bit wrinkled but I think that's just part of this type of fabric.  The top is a bit tight if you are fuller in the chest.
Mostly true to size but very little give in chest
I had to wear it with a strapless bra
review_summary: loved all the colors in the dress, fits nicely

review_text: Perfectly flattering on my hips (which are bigger than they should be on my frame)

This dress was good thick quality.  Both the 2 & 4 fit but the 2 (a bit more snug) looked best because it didn't bunch.  It's a pretty blue and photographs VERY well! Comfortable too.  I wish this was my dress to keep :)

Adorable as pictured but two things to note:
1- it's way shorter on me than on the model and that's usually not the case. I'm 5'5" and the small is very short
2- it's sheer. I'd never wear this as a dress as you can see right through.

That being said it's a perfect beach cover up, very light weight (silk) and very cute. I'd definitely rent again for the beach.
review_summary: Very cute- beach cover up only

review_text: All of the other reviews were spot on. The reason this did not work well for me is my petite stature. So bummed, because it is really cute!
review_summary: This romper was cute with fun fabric, but did not work with my body type.

review_text: This dress was so very beautiful, made out of a heavy material but with lace on back and sleeves that lightened the look. I bought this to wear to a ballet in Russia but my trip was cancelled unexpectedly so I had to return it unworn. So disappointing!!
Wore this to a casual beach party and it was comfortable, light and breezy. Did not make me sweaty as it didn't ever stick to my body.

I originally ordered a different dress for Vegas, I wanted something AWESOME for the Britney Concert! I got a call the day before, letting me know that one of the sizes I ordered was not available. So they gave me the option to pick ANY dress I wanted and they would overnight it for free. I went with the Milly and OMG I am so happy I did! The 6 fit perfectly, I loved the sparkle and the open back was very Vegas! I was able to dance and enjoy myself with lots of comfort! I didn’t even bother with the other dress I ordered! If you’re looking for a fun dress that will turn heads, that is the one!

This dress will always have a close place in my heart. I got engaged in this dress! I felt amazing in the dress the entire night. It wasn't too short and I was comfortable in it. At first I thought the lace might get itchy but it definitely did not. I felt so beautiful in this dress, definitely recommend it!
review_summary: Beautiful color, great fit and very comfortable!

review_text: This dress fit me like a glove. I think its better suited to woman who have straight or hourglass figures with narrow hips.
review_summary: I wore this to a themed charity event. It was a beautiful event .

review_text: Runs small in certain areas - I typically wear a size 4 but the dress would not zip up around my ribcage (which is larger than average). Otherwise, *very* cool vibe to this dress. Subtly sexy being low cut and with the leg slits.
This is the perfect vacation dress and can easily be worn to the beach or out to dinner. My only complaint was that the fabric was very susceptible to static. I loved the bright pattern!
review_summary: Easy and comfortable. Love the colors!

review_text:
The dress was beautiful and bright.  It did have more of a balloon style, I simply added a little belt to give it a bit more fitted look (rather than making me look bigger than I am).  Definitely could wear as cover up or out with some wedges.
I'm 5'8" and the dress grazed the floor in flats.
Very flattering
Love the print and texture of this shirt - it ran a little big, so I rolled up the sleeves and tied up the bottom. Got several compliments at brunch!

I rented this through unlimited for a beach vacation, wore it all day touring around and one more time to a bbq.  Definitely fits tight but the back has a big stretchy panel making the dress really comfortable even in the heat.  Girly and cute.  Nice stiff cotton material with a pretty, lacy bottom hem.  I will rent this one again.
Fit loose and very comfortable
review_summary: Very cute weekend dress! Wore it for a weekend getaway.

review_text: Loved this top for a long July 4th getaway. I wore it with white skinny jeans and it was perfect for dinner. The cut is so on trend, and the fabric print is really unique.  I felt the entire top was a bit large, especially for those with a small chest. I will size down next time.
Sexy, shows off your legs!

I wore this dress on a helicopter tour and short hike in the Grand Canyon. It was the perfect choice because it's light, flowy, not too formal, yet an upgrade on your standard tourist apparel. I felt like Princess Diana on a trip to Africa in this dress.
review_summary: Perfect casual dress for any afternoon.

review_text: This dress was pretty blah. It had nothing particularly special about it and decided to send it back. Wasn't impressed.
This is a great day dress! I wore it on my bachelorette weekend to brunch and then we went sailing. Its comfortable and light, and I could see this being a great dress for a summer night date.
EASY, FUN, CASUAL. WORE IN ON A FAMILY TRIP IN CALIFORNIA
This jumpsuit looks so cute online but when I got it I realized it was not. It has a long crotch and then is short. Not for me. Plus the top was a lot lower than shown.
I wore this to wear for a day of shopping while on vacation in Austin TX.  It is super cute and comfortable but very short side. I had to hold if down in the back when the wind blew strong.

So I'm not sure whether to rate this dress as true to size or small. I say that because the dress fit perfectly everywhere except in the chest. Right on the widest part it was tight which caused the sleeves to bunch up oddly as a result. It's such a shame because this dress is beautiful and feels so luxurious! I have a larger ribcage so I guess big-chested/busted wearers beware

I saw this dress at the beginning of my Unlimited subscription and waited well over a month for my size to be available.  Based on the pictures and reviews, I could not have been more excited.   When it arrived, I was a little let down.  The pictures show vibrant colors, but the fabric is really faded.  I am not sure if this is from a lot of wear or the style of the fabric, but even if I hadn't seen pictures and expected it to be a certain way, I would think that the dress looked a little too worn and faded.  I also had a hard time finding the right opportunity to wear it, as it was too casual for a beach wedding I was invited to, due to the fading colors, but too fancy for everyday.  Lastly, I am usually size 4, sometimes 6, but the 4 was quite snug.  I wish I had gotten the 6.  I so wanted to love this dress, but I was left a little disappointed.
review_summary: High hopes for this dress, but did not deliver 100%

review_text: i've rented this multiple times because it's so awesome. easy to dress up or down, comfortable, has pockets, looks great. can't say enough about this. don't hesitate to rent this. i bet you will wear this multiple times in one rental because it is truly one of those dresses that is v easily transformed!

I rented this for a family vacation to Hawaii and loved how fun and comfortable it was! It was great to wear for a day out. I normally wear a size 10 and ended up wearing a size 8 in this dress, so I would definitely size down.

The medium actually fit slightly better overall, but the risk of camel toe was  a little too real.  I went with the large just to be safe. I really loved this jumpsuit though! It was comfortable, and the waist of the jumpsuit hit my natural waist, which is rare for me due to my height. A great jumpsuit for tall ladies!
I rented this dress for a Caribbean vacation.  It was comfortable and very cute.  I got a lot of compliments.

The color of this dress is gorgeous and people made comments about it all day.  I wore it comfortably all day while exploring Chicago.  We visited the Murakami exhibit at the MCA and I fit right into the color scheme :) The sleeves are thick enough that you could wear this to work at most offices.  It's also a material with give, so it's breathable.  I didn't want to give it back!

I was so excited about these pants, but a little bummed that 10L was not an option to rent. Rented the 10R as I can usually fudge the length in a high waisted pant by pulling the waist down a bit. I was able to get away with it while wearing flat sandals, but any shoe with a heel definitely requires a long length if you're tall (I'm 5'11").  Super comfortable, flowy, and effortless! Because the print is so outside of my comfort zone, not a pair I would see myself wearing often, otherwise I would've bought them!
review_summary: Long length is a must if you're tall!

review_text: I love the cut of this dress, and the crisp but fluid fabric. Unfortunately, it was swimming on me (especially under the arms). I compensated by wearing a black bralette underneath, but I wish it had fit better. I'm short and small-boned, I think this dress works better on a taller lady! It is very chic though, the fabric is dreamy and it kept me cool even though we were visiting Texas (in August!).
review_summary: Wore this for a dinner out at a work-conference weekend.

review_text: My fiance and I were going away for New Years to celebrate our recent engagement, so I wanted a dress that would really wow him and still be comfortable for a late night. This dress was a perfect choice. At first I was worried when the dress came out of the bag that it would be too small, but the dress stretches to show off my figure in a good way - I felt very confident and beautiful.
Fitted at waist, then flares. Dress is a heavier knit, so good for fall or winter events.
review_summary: LOVED this dress. Great fit and very comfortable.

review_text: This dress fit perfectly an was very comfortable for a night out while on vacation. I had no idea I would have been proposed to, but I'm so happy I was wearing a fabulous dress to mark the occasion!
review_summary: Perfect dress to get engaged in!

review_text: Great top, but I think the one I received needs to be retired....
review_summary: Very comfortable, soft peachy-pink color and gauzy material.

review_text: I love the emerald green color, & the asymmetric neckline.  I also liked the long sleeves & the length of the dress.  As other critiques mentioned, the zipper doesn't lay flat at the bottom & that is why I didn't give it 5 stars.  It does hug your curves, but the ruching helps!!  It is a very pretty dress & comfortable to wear.
review_summary: We were going out for Thanksgiving dinner & I wanted to glam it up!

review_text: Super comfortable - really cute.  Could be dressed up or down.  Can be worn day with flats or night with heels and jewelry.
Wore to a music festival in Austin- it was the perfect look!  It was a little short in the waist, so if you are tall, I'd order a size up.  I should have gotten a medium.

I really wanted to love this dress.  The design and cut (based on the photos) looked perfect, but when I got the dress (a small), the arm holes were much too large and the fabric was too heavy to wear in hot weather.  I'd probably rent it again in the winter and wear a long sleeve shirt under it, but unfortunately I returned it without wearing it this time.
review_summary: Love the design but couldn't wear the dress

review_text: I wore this top 3 times while I had it—it was so versatile. I did have to put a temporary loop of thread round the back straps to keep it sitting a little higher to minimize the side and under cleavage.
review_summary: Structured, summertime top—perfect to go from day to night

review_text: I am usually between a 4 and a 6, but usually size up for rompers.  This was a good fit, but it is very low cut. The material is very comfortable.
review_summary: Wore this for a dinner on vacation

review_text: This dress fit like a glove and was super fun to wear on a girls vacation to Mexico.  Highly recommend this for a cocktail party, chill wedding or night on the town!
I loved this top!! It fits great! runs short but I paired with high wasted shorts so it was perfect! Very bright and vibrant! I would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Considering I got engaged, on the beach, in Hawaii, in this top, I'd say its one of my favs!

review_text: This was a super comfortable dress. Nothing too tight or pokey. However, I have both a long torso and long legs and found that it was pretty short and the skirt part sat above my belly button making it that much shorter. I was pulling it down all night. I paired it with simple black flats and I wore a backless bra (those sticky cup things). I really like the cutouts and that it was bare, but not totally bare.
Very true to size, fun detailing and easy to pack in a suitcase.
review_summary: I LOVE this dress! Rented it for a beach vacation and it was absolutely perfect!

review_text: Super comfortable and easy to wear.  Very flattering.  Wish I could buy it!
review_summary: Great romper that can be dressed up or down.

review_text: I needed a simple coat for a trip to Paris, and this one was perfect. Incredibly flattering, and the material was heavier than imagined (looks and feels expensive -- which is surprising for the price point). It's the first RTR item I've considered purchasing!
just way too small
review_summary: this dress was so small it didn't fit over my shoulders, and I am a size 2.  it was unsually tiny

review_text: Wore it with silver strappy heels, silver clutch and sparkly silver earrings. It was such a great color and the shimmer in the fabric made it perfect for a night out.  It's a very comfortable flattering fit. Not too tight, not too short, etc. Would definitely rent again
Rented this for a trip I took, but did not have a chance to wear it. I did try it on before I left town and it fit great. Will rent it again another time.

Loved the weight of this dress for a cold night out in Vegas - it is THICK sweater material, so it wouldn't work well for warmer temperatures. Wish it came in an XL (I'm usually a M/L) as the large was a little tighter than I'd hoped in the midsection, but with shapewear it wasn't noticeably tight. However, it is SHORT!!! I wore tights and booties to balance out the length, obviously not out of place in Vegas but I wouldn't have worn it to a more conservative event like a wedding.

Meh - it was okay. The fabric was heavier than I thought so I didn't wear it. The cut was nice - so if you have some curves it would hide it pretty well. It gave me more of a box shape than I wanted - so I didn't wear it.

I rented this for a vacation dress but it ended up being much cooler out than I anticipated so I added leggings and a denim jacket...perfect casual day wear!  The dress is lined and the neckline is such that I was better off not wearing a bra at all.  I'm a bottom-heavy size 4 and the size 2 was definitely the right size.  If you're looking for waist definition, this is not your dress!  I'd also be careful in windy conditions...it tends to fly up.  However this was a nice comfy casual dress that I enjoyed wearing.

i'm typically a 4 and the small fit w plenty of room to spare. it fits a little like a shift dress, so even though there's no stretch, i have a large waist and i fit the small with plenty of room. in hindsight the XS may have helped w the strap issues i had. when i move around or even shrug, the straps would fall off, which made it difficult to wear comfortably, but i still wore it because the dress is so so so cute! the color and pattern are great and it was flattering. i didn't bother with a bra since there was plenty of support.
review_summary: straps too long for me but so so cute!!

review_text: The dress has a bit of an A-line skirt, but overall a beautiful and fun dress for a day of exploring a new city and a nice dinner out.
review_summary: Beautiful print and the silk so comfortable!

review_text: The dress was very flattering and was tight in all the right places. Loved it.
review_summary: Great for our weekend in Miami!

review_text: Although this dress is beautiful and comfortable (not heavy like you'd expect a sequined dress to be), I did not care for the fit and did not wear it.  I found the gathering at the front to look a little odd (like I was trying to hide a baby bump or something).

I tried this on at the RTR store at the Cosmopolitan in Vegas, and was so happy that it runs big. I typically wear a 6, but was able to fit the size 2. It is quite stretchy, so I think it would look good even if size 2 is your normal size. I absolutely loved the dress, and I received countless compliments on it. I will definitely be renting it again! The staff at the RTR store were friendly and  went out of their way to help me find the perfect dress. Excellent experience, fabulous dress.
review_summary: I wish I owned this dress!

review_text: The top fit beautifully and was really cute on. It was not too short, so did not reveal any skin. I wore it with jeans and it looked great. The quality of the fabric was good and sturdy, I recommend  renting it.
I definitely stood out in this dress. Must wear sticky boobs though. There is no support in the front.
Very cute dress, but definitely runs big, I would recommend sizing down.
review_summary: Great vacation dress or cover up

review_text: Rented this for vacation in Vancover and it was perfect. Light weight and so comfortable. Has a little stretch. Very trendy but not over the top. Wish I could add this to my permanent wardrobe. I am a 6 and the small fit me perfectly. Can't wait to rent this again.
review_summary: LOVED and wish I could afford to buy it.

review_text: This dress seemed to have ran 2 sizes too small. I ordered a 14, and I am typically 12-14 in normal clothes, or XL, but as I order more dresses on this site I am realizing I am almost always a 14 or X; But this 14 was super tiny. I think there was a 3-4 inch gap in the zipper, and it was smooshing my boobs down. Now, it is REALLY pretty, but just not for my body type.
review_summary: Couldn't even put it on it ran so small.

review_text: I wore this maxi dress for a day of wine tasting in Napa for my bachelorette party. It's a very flattering, fun and comfortable dress. It's definitely a more casual option than many RTR dresses. I'm tall, so it was nice that the Long option was available. I usually wear a small or medium and got the small L and the length was perfect. The small was a tad bit big in the top, but still looked great. I would rent this again for vacation or another casual outing!
review_summary: Awesome maxi dress for a day of wine tasting!

review_text: The weight of the dress and the lining are very nice!  It is a fun, figure fitting dress in a quality stretchy fabric that was very comfortable to wear! With the detail of the dress, I opted for nude shoes, big earrings and a clutch to match.
review_summary: I loved the vibrant colors of this dress!! I wore it to a dinner party while in Arizona. Perfect!!

review_text: I wore this to a fancy dinner on the final night of our trip to the Amalfi coast in Italy.  It what the cherry on top of a perfect evening.  It was the perfect combination of classy and sexy.  If in doubt I would definitely recommend sizing up, it is tight!
review_summary: Gorgeous color, Quality material, unforgettable night!

review_text: I'm very petite and without a waistline, this dress balloons around me, adding 10 lbs. and it totally dwarfs me. It isn't flattering.

I LOVED it! I'm glad I sized up to a 6 (I'm usually a 4) because the fabric is thicker than I expected with very little stretch. I wore it from 9am to 2am the next morning which included 2 flights, dinner, a baseball game and dancing and I was still comfortable when I finally got home.
review_summary: Was comfortable enough to wear traveling from New Orleans to Baltimore

review_text: Dress is very short!
I felt like a QUEEN in this romper. Sexy, elegant, and the red is a showstopper. The fit was perfect. Great for hourglass figures!
Dress was a little short but overall I loved it!
review_summary: This was a great dress for a formal dinner my friends and I went to!

review_text: Loved this dress - it was perfect!  Wore it in Vegas with Sandy Hyun Catalina Island Cuff and the Oscar de la Renta Capetown earrings - great combo!

Wore this dress out to a fancy dinner and evening in Paris. The fabric stretches a bit but is not flimsy - a great combo. Was very comfortable for walking around the streets in the evening/night. Wore with fancy flat sandals and dangly earrings.
review_summary: Very unique, flattering, and comfortable dress.

review_text: I wish I had ordered the 0 as a backup size -- it probably would have fit better than my normal size 2.  This was one of 4 dresses I rented for a Vegas vacation, and I chose it for color (which was amazing!), cutouts, and fabric. I love neoprene dresses & generally find them comfortable, sexy, and easy to move in. Unfortunately, something about the fit/length made my round booty look flat, and I wasn't comfortable, which put a major damper on this night out w/ my girlfriends because I couldn't dance in it.
review_summary: This is NOT a dress for dancing =(

review_text: I got a small and medium in this dress, but it is meant to be tight, so I opted for the small as the medium hung on me loosely. I'm 5'6", 125 lbs, with an hour glass figure. This dress is SO flattering. It is snug, so Spanx/control top panty hose were helpful since I wore this out for a nice dinner and drinks. I felt like a total bombshell in this dress. The cutouts are not as noticeable as on the model and the dress is not as short either. I was comfortable and warm in this, so it passed my standards!
review_summary: Great dress for my birthday dinner/drinks.

review_text: Fits very snug through the arms. Could not lift my arms well to dance, but it was worth it for how flattering it was otherwise. Very thick material and well-made. Wish I could own this!
review_summary: Gorgeous dress! Great quality - received many compliments throughout the night!

review_text: This was a great dress...very comfortable and flattering.   The top seemed a a little big compared to the bottom.  I wore a Small and it fit great on the bottom.  But I probably could have worn an XS on top.  Definitely requires a strapless bra.  But, overall, I loved this dress!
I couldn't wear the dress, the fit was quite a bit smaller than the size.  I'm a size 6 or 8, and the 8 wouldn't even zip.  Order at least one size up, maybe 2.  Beautiful dress overall.

Fun silhouette, definitely meant to have that oversized look. Running large, I'd recommend sizing down. The size 2 was a bit large, I would have preferred the 0. There is plenty of room in the bust and bodice, but the deep V and loose material provides absolutely no support in the bust. To get the model's look you'll need to go bra-less or wear an adhesive bra. This style is great for a dressier daytime event or for a vacation look.
The dress was great for travelling. I wore it a couple days on a recent trip to Spain.
Fit great.  paired it with a black belt and black heels.  Really cute.
review_summary: Fits well, comfortable and not super short.

review_text: This dress is cute, but crazy short! On the model the dress appears to be knee length, but it barely covered my bum with my arms down.
