If I raised my arms at all, you could literally see my underwear. For reference, I'm 5'7". Aside from the length, the fit was otherwise good. It wasn't too loose nor too tight. I couldn't get the ruffle to stay off my shoulder, but that's a common problem for me with this particular style.

This dress is so cute! Very comfortable and trendy. The waist band & top are very stretchy so I think each size would have fit the same, really. I wish I could have kept this one, I could see myself wearing it all the time! The fabric is flowy and light, very nice for warmer weather. Definitely recommend this dress!
The fabric and print are awesome.  Received lots of compliments.  The shoulder straps were a little big for me but did not fall down.
review_summary: Wore this to dinner on vacation.

review_text: Loved the colors of this dress! The shoulders ran a little wide, but the back is super cute. The length is good for petite girls like me!

As a 14-16, I wasn't too worried that this would fit based on the relaxed cut. It did, and was a great vacation look at a Mexico resort. My issue with this dress was that the shoulder straps were too long, like way too long, like I gave up after an hour of constant readjusting and just tucked them inside to make it look like a sleeveless dress. The dress stayed up despite this due to the fitted bust area. If I were to buy this however, the straps would have to be altered. To be fair, straps being too long is a reoccurring issue for me - so others may not have the same experience.

I rented this dress for a Mexican vacation and it was so fun to wear this dress for a night out.  The coral color is amazing.  The dress isn't lined but the fabric is on the surprisingly heavy side.  It seemed to run a little large...I'm usually a 2/4 but the 2 had plenty of room.  I did have to adjust the shoulders several times to keep it sleeves from popping up.

I fell in love with this maxi!! It's so easy to dress up or dress down - I ended up just wearing it to dinner at the beach but have already rented it for my friends rehearsal dinner. The fabric is light and comfortable, making it a great option for a summer night. One thing to note on the fit, it's basically backless so you  either need to wear a Nu bra or nothing. You're able to adjust the straps in the back though to make it tighter if you want - that's what i did and I felt fine!
The back had bows and was very fun. The colors were fun. It was a little "loud" for my occasion, so I didn't end up wearing this. The fit and pattern were not very flattering on my curves.
review_summary: Didn't end up wearing this dress.

review_text: Although the dress runs a little small, you couldn't tell it was snug because the material is so stiff! The quality of this dress is AMAZING and it doesn't show any flaws on you! I'm rerenting this dress in a size up for an engagement party next weekend!
review_summary: This dress is a show stopper!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation to the Caribbean with my family over the holidays. This was a fantastic rental that was very versatile for traveling. I am busty and cannot go without at least a traditional strapless bra, so I wore a nude bandeau top to cover that up underneath. It still looked good in the back and I was happy how I could wear the romper. The design is very fun and different. I received so many compliments, and would rent again.

The color on this dress is absolutely beautiful and the fabric is a nice thick stretchy material that isn't too hot. I suggest wearing a bra because the bust area can sag a bit as the night goes on. A classy standout dress!
review_summary: Stunning color that stood out and classy fit!

review_text: Pros: Well-made, sparkled so it stood out from the LBD crowd and was the right length. Cons: The top didn't fit well and I felt self-conscious in it. Great dress for women with more on the top. :)
review_summary: Love the sparkles, but not for my top size.

review_text: It fit true to size - the 4 and 6 both fit me, but the 6 was more forgiving. The cut outs can be a little tight so some extra skin was being squeezed in the 4. The material is fantastic and the dress was incredibly comfortable, even after wearing it all night. I'm really short and it was a great length on me. Highly recommended! Wish I could keep it..
review_summary: I wore this to dinner and a club in Las Vegas with a sparkly necklace - absolutely loved the look!

review_text: This was a perfect fit and so comfortable. It was perfect for my beach vacation to Cabo.
Awesome dress for a summer event!
Fits true to size.
review_summary: Perfect for a night out on South Beach.

review_text: This is a loose, flowing fit.  comfortable during super humid weather.  I did wear it traveling for several hours and was a bit wrinkled.  It really needs to be transported on a hanger:  needs to be ironed after a short time in a suitcase.  The print is bright and different.  The shoulders are cut in a bit so have to choose the right bra.  I wore slip shots underneath for coverage and comfort: a slip would have shown with the generous side slits.  Sorry no photos.  I would definitely wear this again; considering a purchase.
I felt like a tropical princess wearing this dress.

The fit was true to size.  I'm 5'8, with a 36d chest and it showed all my curves!  (in the right places)  Lots of sequins so dancing the night away was a tad bit painful on the skin, only because the dress would rub.  I received lots of compliments from both women and men in Vegas at the clubs.  Overall, perfect Vegas dress- I would wear it again.
review_summary: I wore this amazing dress to Vegas.  Lots of compliments and I felt amazing!

review_text: So comfy and got tons of compliments. I'm short and it was OK with 4 inch wedges, but I also wore it with flats by pulling one of the layers up and tucking it under the bust...looked great.
Was a bit tight in the bust area for me, but fit everywhere else.
The fabric was super light and very breathable.  Perfect for really hot days in California. In fact, it was 103 degrees and I still felt comfortable and dressed appropriately for the wineries.
review_summary: This romper was the perfect outfit to wear for a fun day in Sonoma County touring the vineyards.

review_text: I rented this top as part of my Unlimited subscription for a trip to Spain. I ended up wearing it multiple times - with jeans during the day, with shorts for a trip to the beach, etc. The color is great and the detailing is beautiful. Highly recommend! Fits true to size, though there isn't much give in the fabric & it's definitely a cropped fit.
review_summary: Perfect top for vacation / summer - RTR Team Review

review_text: This was a truly amazing dress. Perfect fit and length for a night out in Vegas!
review_summary: This dress was amazing!!! Fit like a glove!!! I received tons of compliments and it was super comfy!

review_text: I love this maxi dress! It's beautiful and the design is unique (back part). It fits perfectly and the length is great with just flat sandals. I'm 5'4".
review_summary: Beautiful maxi dress with amazing colors and design

review_text: Loved the pockets and loops over the shoulder to help hold back bra straps.  Dress ran true to size and fit perfectly.  Easy to dress up or down.  Versatile piece.  Fun to accessorize because of all the great colors in the dress...you could go so many directions with it!
review_summary: Super comfortable, flattering, pretty and well made dress!

review_text: This is one of my favorite rentals, I wish I could wear it year round! Unlike many off the shoulder styles, this dress actually has enough stretch so that it's comfortable and easy to move around in. The babydoll look is super cute, yet the bare shoulders add appeal. It's the perfect length to be worn as a dress or even as a tunic with jean shorts or pants. Great dressed up or down or even as a cover up. Lots of room in the bust, waist, and hips. The one thing I will say is if you're bustier you may want to size up to ensure the off shoulder detail lays correctly. At 5'7" the length hit about mid thigh. The material is also thick enough to go bra-less without anything showing through. Looks great with gladiator sandals, heeled boots, wedges, you name it.

I rented this dress for a Maui vacation and found a way to wear it way too many times. Material is nice and silky. I usually wear Medium or 6 but small was even large but that's how it was supposed to be. Felt so tropical and fun!

Very happy I read the reviews because I ended up wearing the M (and I'm a size 2). You'll need a strapless bra with it, and it's short -- the high neckline compensates for that, but it's a consideration if you're conservative (I'm not). I'd definitely rent it again, and it's perfection with the Slate & Willow Crystal Shards Earrings!

I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas with my husband and I received so many compliments on this dress that I hated giving it back. The pictures do not do it justice. The dress dazzles in person, is extremely comfortable and flattering. I wear an 8 in everything, but reading the other reviews that mention it runs large, I ordered by backup size in a 6. The 6 fit perfectly, like it was made for me.  I would absolutely order this dress again :).
Tight around the bust, room/puffy in the hips. Was more flattering with a cardigan to diminish the poofiness of the hips. Definitely low cut/shows off the boobs if you have large boobs.
review_summary: Gorgeous dress. Kind of a weird fit.

review_text: perfect for walking around college campus's on a day that was sunny 75, i paired it with a jean jacket when the wind picked up and the sun went down.  love this one may have to buy it.  lots of color, fabric so light and airy and the ruffly added some pazzaz
review_summary: cool, flowy colorful and has a lot of versatility

review_text: Love this silky, breezy dress. Wore it on a trip to Napa Valley with friends. You could wear it with sandals or booties and it would pair well with tights and a long sweater for Fall. It's very flowy, so if you're looking for something fitted, plan on wearing a belt.

The fit was true to size. It was so flattering, the sleeves were not tight on my biceps but just right. I LOVED the way the dress flowed with the wind and how my waist felt tiny. I want to buy this one for sure.
Was awesome, rich material.  would rent this again.  Wore for a summer whites party.  Loved it.  wore with  actual denim strappy shoes.
review_summary: Great dress!  Fits an athletic body extremely well!  Size up 1-2 sizes.  Sorry no photo.

review_text: Wore for a night out in Vegas. As always, Herve fits like a glove. A must rent!

Rented this dress for the 4th of July weekend - absolutely loved it, received so many compliments! The shoulders didn't move at all, it was so comfortable and flattering. I did not think it was too short at all. Really well made.

I wore this dress out on the town for a Vegas girls weekend trip. It was such a great fit. I normally wear a 12 and was nervous about the 12 fitting for I had never used RTR before, it couldn't have fit better. I didn't wear a bra because the dress fits so perfectly, you don't need it.

LOVE every dress I've rented from Mara Hoffman! Her prints are magic and her dresses always fit me even though I'm short-waisted and short in general. I loved that this one wasn't too sheer and could be dressed up or down. I wore it in Hawaii with flip flops but it would look great with wedges or a casual heel. This one runs pretty big. I got the small but probably could have gone with the XS.
review_summary: Unique print, easy fit, great dress!

review_text: I usually wear an XS or S, or a 0, 2 and a rarely a 4. But this dress's small was still very tight and unwearable on me. Ere on the side of ordering a larger size!
This was a backup dress that I didn't have to end up wearing but I could see myself wearing in the future. It ran true to size and fit perfectly snug.
review_summary: LBD with a pop of electric blue!

review_text: Sturdy dress with a great cut and amazing print. Felt great in it! Was a little long for 5'4" but made it work.

I ordered them purposely to go to Spain.  I wore them on the plane and they were perfect.  comfortable, stylish, and fun.  These are by far the best leggings I have ever worn.  When I go the email to buy them and tremendous discount I wasted no time and made the purchase.
review_summary: best legging I have ever worn.  stylish, comfortable and fit like a glove.

review_text: I could have worn the 12, but the 14 gave me a little more room through the rib cage/waist. I loved this dress and wish I could have kept it. Very comfortable to wear all night. It was a little bit short to get in and out of cabs all night. The cut was great. I loved the plunge neckline without being too scandalous. I felt great wearing this dress and would definitely rent again.
review_summary: I rented this for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: I rented this dress for my vacation in Greece and absolutely loved it! The fit was true to size, the patter was so fun, and I got tons of compliments. I am not very busty and I felt that was perfect for the dress as the coverage isn't huge with the cutout. Will definitely rent this again!
review_summary: Beautiful dress that's perfect for anniversary dinner!

review_text: Though I ended up not wearing this dress to dinner, it was very cute.

I loved the delicate eyelash lace that I quickly toughened up with leather accessories. Pockets, perfect length & comfortable. I was right between a 0 and a 2 and went with the 0, it fit just a little snug.

The material of this dress was much thicker than I thought it would be.  The bottom does flare out a bit.  The top fit very well.  This ran true to size for me. It was also very comfortable as the material had some stretch.
review_summary: This dress was a fun way to spice up dinner on vacation!

review_text: I rented this dress for Las Vegas and it was perfect!  I normally wear a medium, but the small fit like a glove (although I needed some help putting it on it was so tight!)  It accentuates your entire body and VERY comfortable to wear all night!
review_summary: My fiancé could not keep his hands off me, worn with shiny black stiletto strappy heels!

review_text: I loved it! I don't own a heavy enough coat to visit Pittsburgh in the winter, but this coat met my needs perfectly! It was snugly, comfortable enough to wear walking all over the city, still fancy enough to wear to the wedding that we were visiting for.

I wore this on the plane trip to Vegas and it was a great selection. It was also casual and comfy when exploring when we arrived. I loved the military chic look. My only complaint was a bit of gapping with the buttons near my stomach. Highly recommend for casual weekend wear. 

Pros: comfy and not too long 
Cons: gapping with buttons, larger arm holes
Very cute romper. very good material, does somewhat make your hips look a little bigger. still all and all i loved the romper.

I wore this out to a club while on vacation in Cancun. The scuba fabric is very stretchy so I went with the small, as the medium puckered around the waist due to extra fabric. The length was perfect for me at 5'7", though as others commented, it does tend to ride up while dancing. Regardless, it's a stunning pattern and very comfortable to wear.
review_summary: Stunning dress that's easy to wear

review_text: Wore this for a nite out with friends in Chicago.  Cute and comfy dress!  Fabric has a nice sheen to it, really pretty.  Runs a little small in bust area, or maybe I'm just not used to showing so much cleavage.  This was my fire RTR experience, but definitely not my last!

The material is scuba style - which means it hides all the bumps and lumps. Its not too heavy, as this material can be - and perfectly cool (not too hot.) It is longer - I'm 5'9 and it was about an inch above my knee. I wore this to my brother's wedding welcome dinner and got a ton of compliments. You will feel modern, classy, and beautiful!
review_summary: Beautiful dress, not too short, fits like a glove and one of my favorites!

review_text: This jacket is incredible. I wore it all over Europe and Canada while traveling and just absolutely fell in love with it's effortless style and incredible warmth and comfort.  I hope it sticks around to next winter because I'll definitely rent it again!
This romper was absolutely perfect!  Runs small but by perfect one size up!  Seriously planning on purchasing this romper because I need to own it!

I loved this dress! Super easy to wear, comfortable and fun.  I had it on Unlimited and wore it to a few different dinners while on vacation and also to a charity luncheon. It has a fitted waist but is flowy over the hips so it's comfortable to wear. I'm 5'2" so it was not overly short on me (unlike the model) and hit at my lower thigh.
It's very heavy material, so it would not be good for a hot or warm environment.
review_summary: Fun, Flexible Use Dress - Loved it!

review_text: Fit is perfect and comfortable. Only concern is the cutout under chest area. Felt a little odd and would fold out and reveal black material at times.
review_summary: Fun dress to wear all day!

review_text: Since there weren't many reviews yet, I wasn't sure which size to order. I usually wear a 4-6 but I was afraid of it being too tight so I ordered a M with a L as a backup. The L was way too big but the M was almost perfect. It was a tiny bit big through the hips but fit perfectly on top and honestly I didn't mind it being a little loose through the hips because it meant I didn't have to suck everything in all night haha. I'm 5'8, 138lbs, wear a 34 D, and measure 38/28/38. This dress turns a ton of heads and while it's definitely too revealing for a number of events, it's perfect for a night out in Vegas. :) Rent this!!!
review_summary: I LOVE THIS DRESS! Perfect for Vegas.

review_text: Very strange to get into and impossible  to do it without help
did not like how cut out was centered, so return it

Nice and light dress perfect for a hot day in Orlando!! I wore this on a recent trip to Disney. I ended up wearing a strapless bra with it but I think it would also be good over a sports bra or bathing suit. The material was lightweight and comfortable. Overall loved the fit and found it true to size. The elastic waist was perfect and really made the desk.  Just be warned it is a little on the shorter side and material is thin! You could always wear a slip under if you feel uncomfortable. Would rent again!

RTR was out of my size (10) for the weekend I needed so I got brave and went one size smaller. SO glad I did! This dress fits true to size on top but the pleated waist makes the bottom more forgiving for a girl with curves, exactly what I needed! I felt like Kate Middleton all night long in this awesome lace dress and got so many compliments on it. My husband kept saying "you should rent the runway all the time!" If I hadn't been in an out of town hotel I might have added a belt but I forgot to bring one and I still absolutely loved the look. This dress is fabulous!
review_summary: I felt like Kate Middleton all night long!

review_text: This dress fit perfect!  The inside is a supersoft material that was a little stretchy.  I might have been able to go down to an 8.  I was comfortable all night in this dress, if I had a reason to dress like this more often I would buy it!  It was not short at all.  If someone was shorter than me the length might be too long for them.
Nice fit and a great length - not too short or too long. Pretty color and print. Perfect for walking around during the day, but I could have also worn it to work.
Very pretty details. Arrived exactly how it looks in the picture.
review_summary: I felt very feminine, very pretty in this flowy dress.

review_text: I rented this for a weekend in New Orleans and loved it! So many compliments. The medium zipped, but looked a little small. The large was much more comfortable, but the straps were very loose. Since I wasn't home I had to be resourceful and cut out the strings from my sweater to tie the straps together in the back. My hair covered it so you couldn't see and it was easy to have a friend retie after using the restroom. Material is thick enough to go braless. The inner liner was nice to hide my sweat because it was hawttt walkin' around the big easy. PS- The belts come in a little bag. I didn't see them till after I wore it. Ok that's all ;-)
Perfect with booties and a leather jacket in colder weather!
would be great for hiding a baby bump, or a food baby

Rented this dress for a trip to Vegas. To get the dress on you are going to need some help. Had to hold the dress together and have a friend zip me in to get it closed but once it was on it stayed still. Thick material. Great color.
I originally had a M, but it was too big.  The fabric is very comfortable.  I wore this at our vacation in St Lucia, and loved it.  Perfect with skirt or shorts.

I rented this dress for the fancy dinner on our recent carnival cruise. I'm 5 10 and the regular  (all they had available) was a tad short but barely noticeable. The draping and fabric was SO flattering, and I got complement after complement. Perfect for big bust and curves
review_summary: Flattering fit and tons of complements

review_text: Definitely runs on the small side, but a beautiful dress for a beach party!
I was able to wear it but should have sized down.  Worked okay for a casual dinner during vacation.
Nice dress, wore it casually but can be dressed up with jewelry and shoes.  Very low cut if you have boobs!!!!

This is very beautiful in person, the colors especially. I am sure it fits some women perfectly but if you are tall, somewhat busty with narrow hips, it's not for you. It's super short, tight in the chest and bigger in the waist and hips.  I wore the 8 because of the length and bust but the 6 fit my waist and hips much better.
review_summary: beautiful color and design, not a good fit

review_text: VERY short slip! Beware when sitting! Fit wonderfully otherwise. Perfect lightweight dress for mid70s weather.
This dress fit so beautifully!  The fabric is stretchy and forgiving in all the right places.  I'd rent this one again!!

Rented this dress for a nicer dinner one night of our anniversary getaway. I typically rent/wear 8s in dresses to accommodate my backside. Because of the shape and flow of this dress, was comfortably able to wear the 6 - and it held the girls in nicely so I didn't need a bra. The straps also stayed put even when sitting. The color is just gorgeous and I loved the floral. Overall very comfortable, flattering, and fun to wear!
review_summary: Summery dress perfect for dinner & a stroll.

review_text: This jumpsuit was so fun to wear on vacation. The fabric was heavier than expected, but it travelled well and was not wrinkly when it emerged from my suitcase. I normally wouldn't wear something like this, but it was perfect for Florida.

This item actually arrived with the tags still on. We planned an April trip to D.C., where weather is normally in the upper 70's-low 80's, during a surprise cold snap. RTR saved the day. I wore this cute cream sweater underneath a trench on a blustery, 48 degree day, paired with jeans and sneakers. I like my sweaters to fit oversized and cozy--which the Medium did. Came about mid thigh and covered my tush. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Cute cream Fisherman's sweater with a surprise twist!

review_text: This dress was comfortable and a pretty blue. I would purchase this dress if it comes for sale. It is extremely flattering. Bra was difficult since it was a low back and cut narrow through the chest. I wore pasties but a adhesive bra with no back would have been perfect. Loved it.

I ordered this dress to wear for a night out to a club in Vegas. I loved it! I don't usually like tight fitting dresses because of all the body imperfections they easily show, but this one hid all of that. I got the M and S, and ended up wearing the M, which was perfect. I did have to have just the right strapless bra because of where the peep hole sits, a bigger bra could stick out the bottom.

Classic herve leger sucks everything in, it's like built in spanx.  I wore it for a night out in Vegas and it was perfect, got lots of compliments.  The color of this dress is gorgeous, I loved the pink.  It shows a lot of cleavage, but I would definitely rent again for the right occasion.
review_summary: Hot hot hot Herve Leger dress

review_text: This dress was WOWZA! It is well-made and pretty, but then there is the daring slit and deep V neckline! Double sided tape is a must. If you want to wow people, this is it!

I usually wear a size 4 so I ordered the small but it wouldn't close around my back and it was way too short for my body. It's definitely cut for a shorter person but it is extremely cute for a summer look so next time I will size up and I recommend you do the same if you're a tall girl or if you're long-waisted. (I'm 5'9'')
review_summary: I rented this for my Florida vacation but it's too short

review_text: I took this dress on vacation and wore it to dinner one night.  Very comfortable pretty dress.  The lace detail in the back makes it a little dressier.
review_summary: Very nice comfortable dress.  I'm a big fan of the pockets

review_text: The shorts were super flattering, slightly wider leg for me and really slimming. It was maybe a tiny bit big (I'm usually a size 0) but because of the sinched waistline you can hike it up a bit to shorten. I loved the off the shoulder and the comfy material. I ended up having to wear a strapless bra because of the material and the hole in the front, but you could probably get away with no bra.
review_summary: This romper was so comfortable and flattering! I ended up wearing it 2 days on my vacation!

review_text: I wore this in Montauk for a day look. I read reviews about it being a little see through but with the right underwear it was fine. I'm 5'8 and was a little worried when playing corn hole because it was so short. But I was still comfortable and would rent again.
review_summary: Loved the Fabric and overall fit - a little short.

review_text: Worn at 5 months pregnant so I went 1 size up.  Fit great, and not super short like some rompers can be, but the length didn't look wrong proportionately either.  The fabric is so thin it felt great and soft.  I definitely want to own this one.  But I stopped trying to keep the shoulders down and let it sit up where it wanted to.  But that's really a problem with any off the shoulder outfit, they only stay like that as long as you don't move.

I absolutely ADORE this dress. It was perfect for a VIP concert experience for my favorite band. It definitely runs a little short, but being 5'5, it fell perfectly for me. I actually wore Converse sneakers under it. The back could make it a little tricky bra wise, and I could have gone without. But I ended up getting one of those sticky bras from Target and it was perfect. The colors are BEAUTIFUL. Fabric is light and breezy. Con, when the sun went down, with the bare mid section and back, I was freezing. So just be prepared with a cardigan or jacket! I hope I have another reason to rent this dress. It was a part of one of the best and most memorable nights of my life!
Amazing dress! Flirty and sexy and not too tight. Sparkly and sexy. Pretty much the best dress of all the ones I've rented.

Love the flow of this dress and the bold print. Something to note is that it does have a tighter fit in the bust. However the straps are adjustable with not showing too much cleavage if you are larger busted.
This dress is cute and the print is different.  I wore it to an art gallery and drinks on Vacation and it was perfect.  I got a lot of compliments.
Fit nicely,  not too short.  Was a bit on the chilly side
review_summary: It was a great fit, with comfy lining.

review_text: I loved the scalloped hem, fabric and beautiful color of this dress. I did, however, think this dress ran large. I requested a 6 and a 4 (I'm usually in between sizes) and the 4 was rather big on me.
review_summary: Within 5 minutes of leaving our hotel room, I received 3 compliments on this dress. It's beautiful!

review_text: Pretty
review_summary: Was a fun dress, Ran big but the pockets were amazing.

review_text: I never wore this dress but loved it. They only had it left in Medium and I really needed a small. It was a beautiful dress but would not work for me. I am too short and can't wear heels. I do recommend this dress for an elegant dinner .
review_summary: Gorgeous Dress but for Tall Gals

review_text:
This dress was beautiful. I received a lot of compliments. I wore it in Jamaica at an all inclusive resort... It was very light weight.
Cons: the top is very thin... and the cut is low, wearing a bra was impossible. I ended up using swimsuit inserts because the pasties showed through. The dress was the "Long" version and it still was short. I wore it with sandals. (I'm 5'8)

Pros: Very forgiving! Lightweight and flowing! 

Definitely a great rental!
review_summary: Lightweight, flattering dress... perfect for beach vacation

review_text:
Fit - Small.  I ordered the smaller size after reading the reviews, but the waste was too small.  However, one size up would have been too big for me on top, bust area because it was already big in the size 6. 
Smaller waste area.  Bigger top area.
review_summary: Great color and made with good quality fabric. Did not wear it.

review_text: Waaaaaay too much material so it's very, very baggy and has the look of a little girl's nightgown. Cute idea though!
review_summary: Cute but looks like a bag!

review_text: I tried it on, but returned it right away, the size was too small. Also, I'mm 44 and it was a little too "young" of a look. my 16 year old tried it on and looked adorable.
review_summary: Very nice material. Casul yet tailored.

review_text: I loved this dress but it was WAY too big. The top kept falling down. I think one size smaller would've been perfect

This dress is perfect for the occasion.  Can not wear bra with it because of the open back and the see thru v-cut in front, plus worked out well.  You are covered up but it has just enough skin to make you feel sexy without being so exposed.  Color is off white - so don't expect true white.  Wish I owned this dress.

Yes, all the reviews are true - your butt does hang out. Knowing this - I still rented it and wore it out. I'm built like a box and I don't really have much of a butt, so I didn't think it was too much. It's comfortable!
Great- I hated to send back!
review_summary: cute - airy wore with skinny jeans

review_text: Very comfortable and loose. Could have worn a size smaller, but it still worked great with shorts and wedges for a weekend in Miami.
review_summary: Beautiful color!! Wore it in Miami and loved it.

review_text: This dress has a great fit and forgiving fabric, but the cut is very deep.  If you aren't comfortable with your chest on display and getting lots of looks this dress may not be for you.  For reference I am 5'6" 135lbs and 36C.  I wore a M just to be comfortable.  Used double sided tape to make sure that everything stayed in place.
review_summary: Great dress but be ready for the girls to be on display.

review_text: I rented the 4 and 6. The 4 fit better but was darker, almost black, and a thinner fabric. I wore the 6 as it was a truer navy color and heavier fabric. Very cute and great for a weekend getaway, it packed really well also!
Fit was great. I could've worn the 4 too except it was a little big underneath the arms, which is why I chose the 2. I wore this to a football game/tailgate and got compliments all day.

Calling all bay bumps! This would be so stinkin' cute on a mommy to be. It also works really well for all body types - win! The dress has a baby doll shape and it is not fitted at all. Size down for your back up size. The fabric has no stretch, but I feel like it runs a little big. This style calls for a strapless bra, since the straps of the dress cut inward a bit. Pair with some fun boho jewelry and sandals!

The fit was pretty true to size. I'm a 2-4 hourglass frame and the XS fit pretty well. I did have a huge problem with the fact that the zipper puckered on the side. It made my hip look larger and I was tugging on it all night. For this reason, I gave it 3-stars. I liked the dress a lot, but would probably not rent it again because of the zipper.

This was a fun dress I rented for my Vegas trip, but I didn't end up wearing it (I did a rent one get three deal). It was a bit tight and short, and I felt self-conscious in it because it felt overly "sexy". I think if there was a larger size (XL) available, I would've been super happy with it. Also, the zipper tends to get stuck in the back fairly easily.
review_summary: My bff got married in Vegas!

review_text: The floral pattern and material are lovely as is the overall style.  The only problem I had was the length which was too long even with 3 inch heels-still dragged on the floor.  I am 5.5 so you would need to be 5.8 at least with 3 inch heels to wear it comfortably.  I should have realized this from the picture which has a tall model with the dress still touching the floor.  I could not really wear it for fear of tripping, although I did try for one dinner.
review_summary: This is a beautiful dress, but it is very long.

review_text: Wore this running errands for work (pretty casual/fashionable dress code), then met friends for dinner. Was a little wary of the drop waist and the volume of fabric as Im self conscious about my hips looking large in that silhouette, but it was perfect! Wore with embroidered Gucci mules and a big bucket bag during the day, changed to a clutch and added jewelry at night.
the pockets are hugeee!
review_summary: complimented each look well. was perfect because it was not too heavy or light for the weather.

review_text: The dress runs true to size and was very comfortable to wear all night.
I was unable to wear this as it was WAY too tight.

This was just as adorable in person as pictures! I wore it on my wedding anniversary dinner date during vacation and received many compliments. It fit true to size, very comfortable, wasn't tight or too short either (I am 5'2, usually wear a size small / size 2-4). I would wear it again in a heart beat!!
Fits snug in the shoulder and chest so if you have a broad back go a size up.  The lace and color are so beautiful!

Loved this dress!  I wore it to a show and dinner in Vegas, and had a ton of compliments.  My husband really wanted me to be able to keep it, and I felt very sexy and classy.  The small and medium were not that much different on me.  The small fit well, but I chose the medium for a little bit more length and movement.  I highly recommend it!  I loved the ease of RTR, and can't wait to look for my Derby dress!

I wore this on a recent trip to Vegas.  It stood out even with all the other flashy dresses.  I loved that I could rent this and return it because this is not a dress I would wear at home!  It fit great - definitely had some give.  It was VERY short.  Some sequins were missing - but not noticeable.  Overall - I would definitely rent again for a similar occasion.

Very flattering, no cons! Again, it is a fabric that doesn't really wrinkle so that is a plus when traveling. I had it in the garment bag to travel and at each hotel when other stuff in the garment bag was wrinkled, this jacket was perfectly crisp looking.
review_summary: Great blazer-it has a lot of structure and has a cool cut on the arms and back. AND doesn't wrinkle!

review_text: Perfect dress for a casual, low-key day on my vacation. The color is bright, the bow detail is very cute, and the dress is very comfortable. It does seem to run large though so make sure to size down. The back of the dress is a tad loose and needed to be pulled up throughout the day.

Fit was relaxed and flowy, perfect for a casual daytime/outdoor affair. I wore mine wine tasting all day and it was perfect.  Lightweight for even a warm California wine country day. I ordered both the XSR and the SR based on others reviews.  The XSR fit everywhere except it was a bit tight in the chest for me and did not achieve the look I was going for with the dress, so I went with the SR instead to keep the "flowiness." The SR was a bit longer, which I liked, hit around my ankle bones.  The only negative thing was that one closure hook near the chest area was missing and other was loose, so I had to use safety pins to keep that closed.  Otherwise, awesome dress and would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Perfect for a wine country getaway.

review_text: I wore this for a show and nightclubs in Las Vegas. It was an easy-wearing dress and got lots of compliments -- and didn't wrinkle in my suitcase. It definitely stood out in a sea of black and gold metallics! My only complaint about the fit is that the open back means the sleeves would sometimes slip off over my shoulders -- the way a bra strap does -- and I needed to occasionally tug them back up. I felt comfortable going bra-less in this dress and leaving my back completely bare.
review_summary: Cheerful and easy to wear, with just enough glam.

review_text: Fit is true to size and the slit in the front gives it a sexy, classy and chic flair.  I would definitely rent this dress again.
review_summary: Great classy dress with a touch of Sexy.  Wore this to my trip in Paris and felt amazing!

review_text:
The material is a little stiff and it a wee bit short for me. I'm 5'9 and have a larger bum, so while the dress seemed plenty long in the front, the back was something to be aware of (didn't want to flash anyone)!

Other than that, great dress!
review_summary: The color was fantastic! It was the perfect dress for Austin City Limits!

review_text: The fit was great, ran true to size (I usually wear a 2 or 4).  Lots of compliments, laid and framed nicely on my figure.  The sequins are beautiful and the drop back is a great detail.  Would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Wore the dress to a Britney concert in Vegas!  Such a fun dress for an amazing night!

review_text: Loved this dress.  Wore it to the Britney Spears concert in Vegas.  Was super comfortable!  Would rent again.  I am happy I sized down.  I typically wear a 4-6 but based on reviews I wore the 2 and it worked perfect!

I rented this in Vegas and after having heard reviews from other friends who have tried Herve Leger bandage dresses, I wasn't convinced this was going to fit or do me any favors in the "flattering" department.  I was totally wrong - it fit like a glove and the print and fabric were exceptionally flattering.  The design in the bandage helped mask any imperfections and the color was really pretty.  I actually really liked the thick fabric and was comfortable dancing all night.  I'll certainly give other bandage dresses a try after this one!
review_summary: Much prettier and flattering than anticipated!

review_text: The fit is perfect, However, everyone that saw it on me, wishes it did not include the second piece on top.
review_summary: I love the way this dress makes you feel, It's elegant and easy to wear.

review_text: This dress is great for girls with a chest.  I was able to wear a regular bra. I danced my....off all night in Vegas and was totally comfortable. But yeah, as a couple people mentioned - watch out for the sequin scratches under your arms - but that was small price to pay for looking amazing in a sea of black dresses.

Perfect for my girls trip to Las Vegas!  Honestly, where else can you where a super sparkly cocktail dress and not feel overdressed?  I ordered a M and a L even though previous renters said it ran a bit big.  I wore the M (didn't even try on the L) and had plenty of room to eat and dance the night away. The sequins were only slightly uncomfortable under the arms after hours of wear, but overall the dress' stretchiness made it super comfy.  Plus, it was great to wear a regular bra!  I definitely recommend this one!
I don't like clothes that are tight fitting so I thought it fit great (not too tight and not too loose). The top was a little big but I just used sticky tape to keep it in place!
review_summary: Wore this romper to Britney Spears in Vegas and loved it!

review_text: I will be renting this again.  I say that it runs small bc its tight in the chest (but that might just be for me, I am around a 34C/D).  If only I could combine the size 2 body/waist with the size 4 bust.  Either way, this dress is a stunner and I couldn't imagine this dress not looking incredible on you.  I dare you to rent this, and let the compliments flow!

It's a loose fit, so don't expect it to be fitted, but it's a gorgeous piece! I wore it out to the bars last weekend and I'm keeping it for a wine tasting/pool trip this weekend, I couldn't give it up!
I'm a 34DD and the chest was like a vice grip. So not good for bigger chested gals. the waist part fit just fine. But gorgeous! I was so sad I didn't wear it!
review_summary: Beautiful dress but the chest runs very small! Not good for bigger busted gals.

review_text: The color and material are great but the top is a little "saggy." Good for travel or to throw on but wouldn't wear for a day party or anything fancier.
review_summary: A good travel maxi for Mexico but not the most flattering top

review_text: I like the idea of this romper but the color is pretty drab in person and I have no idea what you would wear under it. It shows every bump and curve and you would have to wear some kind of bra unfortunately. Its really cute but not a great as I expected.
review_summary: Not for me, boring color and odd sleeves, shows everything

review_text: Wore this dress to Opera in Paris.  I was hesitant when I ordered, but it was an incredible dress.  Fit perfect and was incredibly comfortable. Looks so much better in person when you can see the detail.  It was Christmas and the dress was perfect for the chilly night.  Felt like a million!

This dress stands out in a crowd. A simple silhouette with a flattering neckline. The material is thin but a good quality, it didn't feel too sheer. The length was long on me, I had to wear a 4 inch platform heels.
I ordered the medium and large, either would have worked but the medium won out because it fit on top a little better.
This dress is ideal for a day time event or a vacation.

Loved the pattern of the sequins! The sleeves were the perfect length which I have a hard time with as I'm tall. The length was super comfortable, I never felt like it was too short. The lining on the bottom was odd though, it kind of bunched in places. Overall it was a fun, white sequin dress perfect for my bachelorette party!

The dress is perfect for a tropical vacation. I'm only giving it 3 stars because it ran very large. Instead of a sexy, sunkissed look, I felt like a mom. I attempted to use fashion tape to make it shorter but that was a complete fail. I would rent again but in a smaller size.

This top was perfect for our vacation to Mexico. It was light and breathable in the heat. The only con is that the middle button in the breast area came undone a couple of times when I was carrying my baby or shopping bags. Other than that, it's a comfy, very cute top!

I loves this dress. I wore this for my sister's bachelorette weekend in Jamaica . It was comfortable, stretchy and form fitting. I loves the subtle high low. I recommend sticking with your normal size and a size up. With this style you can also wear a standard bra!
This romper is adorable!  Perfect for vacation and my husband LOVED it!  It's very short but it's not a dress so I was comfortable in it.  I would definitely order this again.
However, the front/wrap is very loose and large. The dress is super long even though I ordered a regular size. I'm 5'4 and I cannot wear it unless i step on 5in heels.
Heavy fabric of good quality.  Fit well.  Loose but stylish.  Elegant not sloppy.
I rented this dress for a vegas weekend and I loved it. It fit perfectly and is stretchy enough to broaden the size range. I got tons of compliments on this dress
review_summary: It was the PERFECT dress for vegas!

review_text: Could be worn with flats or heels/wedges.
review_summary: Fit me well, and kept cool in 95 degree heat!

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation at the beach. This dress is as beautiful in person as it is in the pictures. However, I wrote that it ran true to size, and, for the most part, it does, but it was a little loose in the waist. For that reason, it wasn't as flattering as it could have been. Other than that, I loved the length (I am 5'8" and wore the regular length with flats--I probably could have even worn a small heel). The crocheted top is great for adding a little texture. The dress is very well made and I felt great wearing it. Would definitely recommend!
review_summary: I felt perfectly beachy in this gorgeous maxi

review_text: I loved the color and pattern, but I wasn't crazy about showing off my bra straps at a dinner party so I wore a strapless bra. The top wasn't all that flattering to begin with, and with a strapless tube bra underneath it was even worse. Still, the quality of the top was nice- and it was in perfect condition with the tags still on when it arrived, and it looked cute with skinny black pants.
review_summary: Cute top, probably wouldn't rent again

review_text: This was a really comfortable dress. The fabric was soft, the sleeves were long (which was nice since it was super cold in Vegas). The other reviews are NOT kidding about using fashion tape. I do not have a big chest, but there definitely could have been nip-slips without it. I wore pasties and fashion tape to secure everything in place. I didn't have any problems throughout the night though. The plunge was very sexy, and the rest of the dress is pretty modest, which made up for the plunge. If I remember correctly, the fabric was so soft it rode up a bit throughout the night, but I am also pretty tall, so it was short on me. Okay for Vegas though! Overall I enjoyed renting this dress and would not discourage other renters from getting it based on the deep plunge.

Loved the color and style of this dress - flirty and fun.  The top is a little awkward, though.  The lines hit right in an awkward spot on your bust, which makes your chest look a little funny.  Couldn't wear a bra with it, but was ok because the fabric was thick enough and the pattern made it so you couldn't see anything.
review_summary: Cute and fun, but awkward top

review_text: Loved the dress but wish that it tied more at the waist line and not right under the chest area. From that, has more of a 'babydoll' dress look that I don't generally care for. Also would have liked it if the collar was up more like another renter had suggested as well. Cute dress, loved the fabric.
review_summary: Loved the fabric! Very cute dress.

review_text: Fits great, like in the picture. The fabric is beautiful, the cut and fit are great. It's flowy and light and comfortable. I didn't need to wear a bra.
review_summary: I wore this dress for a photo session on the beach, my husband LOVED it.

review_text: My husband took me to Rome for my birthday, and I wore this fabulous dress for the occasion. It is made of very heavy material and literally fit like a glove. But beware, it will be an evening of holding the belly in, as this dress shows off every curve. The thing that I really liked about the dress is that it really holds the breasts in place, and flattens them somewhat, which I appreciate given that I an big busted. It is also higher cut in the front, so no cleavage is revealed. I loved this dress, and RTR!!
review_summary: Beautiful, sexy dress for a dinner in Roma

review_text: Such a pretty dress. However, it does run very small and has no stretch.  The make of the dress is very straight, so if you are curvy, you will feel that the dress is tighter in the hips. I suggest sizing up!  I am usually a size 0, but I wore this size US 2 and it was still a little tight. A standard bra works with this dress, but I did not wear one.

I absolutely loved this maxi dress from hunter bell.  Very comfortable and cute! The 2R was the perfect length for me with 1 inch sandals- I'm 5'7".  My only complaint was that the shoulder straps kept loosening. Overall one of my favorite rentals.
Wore this for a night out in Vegas. It was short but not uncomfortably so, able to walk and move in it. Looked great!
I generally wear a 0 or 2. I rented this dress in a 4 after reading reviews suggesting I size up. Glad I did. LOVED it!
review_summary: Loved this dress, but size up!

review_text: Shorter sleeves
review_summary: The arms were a little short but overall this was a great jacket for going out in NYC :)

review_text: Fit really well, very comfy and I could wear a normal bra with this. It's really a fun piece.
review_summary: I dressed it down to shop in Washington, D.C.  This would be easy to glam up also!

review_text: I am normally a 2 and the XS was perfect.
review_summary: Cute comfortable sundress for day or night

review_text: The fit was true to size, very comfortable dress.  Got lots of compliments on the style and color.  Would wear this again for sure.
review_summary: I wish this dress was in my own closet!

review_text: Quite form fitting through the body and legs.  A little looser in the top.  Then again, I am an apple shape, so that might just be me.  Great vibrant gold color.  Would rent again.
Great for my petite frame, v-neck was very low so i used a bralette. It was hot & I stayed cool & looked great too! We were at Mama's Fish House for dinner in Maui, HI & it was perfection!

Love this adorable romper. I brought it on my vacation to Munich and felt so cute with so little effort! I'm a true 6 and the 4 fit very well, still plenty of room. So comfortable! Looked great with both wedges and sandals.
Fits true to size. Cute Olivia pope-type coat
The dress is beautiful but just too much. I couldn't wear it. It is very sparkly and needs the right occasion to be worn.
review_summary: I love RtR and thankful you get multiple size and another back up dress for a discounted price.

review_text: The dress was gorgeous, just enough sexy while still being classy.  It did ride up like all the other ladies have stated and I am somewhat tall so maybe a little more for me than most but I would still wear it again.  I got a ton of compliments and felt like a million bucks.  Oh and the best part was I didn't have to wear a bra and the girls still looked fantastic!

I wore this on vacation and loved it! It's hard for me to find rompers that fit as I have along torso, but this was perfect. I wore an XS and had no room at all in my chest for a bra, but you really don't need it with this one. The length was not too short either. Overall great fit and received a ton of compliments.
This was ok- I didn't end up wearing because I wanted it for vacation and it was just blah so I returned on my unlimited in hopes of getting something more exciting before my trip.

I was the first person to wear the dress sent to me, yay! I took this with me to Puerto Rico and wore it out to the La Guancha boardwalk. Polyester lined so not as luxurious feeling as some of the other RTR dresses. I loved the silhouette and the shoulder straps. I had to iron it a bunch of times to try to get some of the creases out. But I think I did a pretty good job. It runs slightly small I would say - nothing for it given the fit of the dress, gotta wear those Spanx (check) and stand up straight (needed to do this better ha).
This is a beautiful dress - gorgeous material.  But the length and fit were not very flattering for me.

I rented the 8 and it fits perfectly. It is a truly well made and gorgeous dress.  It is slightly provocative in the chest area if you are large chested, but I rented it for Vegas so it was perfect. I believe it runs true to size or maybe slightly small, I am normally anywhere from a 4-8 so the 8 in this fit pretty well. There is not a lot of room for error in the hip area. If you aren't big boned or curvy then go with your normal size. If you are big boned maybe size up. I probably could have fit a 6 but I don't know for sure.
I got this dress as my Birthday dress from RTR. It is a cute everyday casual dress.
review_summary: Wore it on vacation in Atlanta.

review_text: It does run slightly large, however for a cold weekend it was perfect with my leggings and boots.  I wore it at least 7 times.
The fit was loose but not too much, still felt extremely sexy. Dressed this up with a belt and some wedges.
It's backless, so look out for that.   I loved the material and the colors.    Very Classy.  Wear with Wedges!

Wore this all over Tahoe for a ski weekend, in the lodge and at the casinos with black leggings and over the knee boots. Really great to rent this one for a couple weeks to work into your winter wardrobe.  Good for Aspen, Vail, Whistler, etc.
length was perfect for me being so short.  the waist came to the exact perfect spot which i usually have issues with with rompers
review_summary: I wore this to Vegas for a Bachelorette party and i loved It!

review_text: I absolutely loved this dress and it was so comfortable. Extremely low cut, but for a night out in Vegas, I was okay with that. The draping was very flattering on my curvy figure, and hid what I wanted it to hide. I ended up wearing a size up from what I ordered, simply because I wanted a little more length in the back and for it to be a little loose on me in the 110 degree heat. The green sequins were beautiful, and looked like nothing else that anyone was wearing in the room. I'll be renting this same dress for my cruise next month because I loved it so much. I would just recommend having someone around to help you zip it up. Due to the sequins, the zipper can be a little difficult.
review_summary: I felt like a million bucks!

review_text: I rented this dress to wear on my honeymoon in Hawaii & my husband loved it!  It was pretty snug in all areas and I ended up wearing the backup size up but that fit great!  It is a pretty thick material so you don't have to worry about it being see-through.  You will definitely need an adhesive bra with the side cut outs and neckline.  I would rent this dress again for the right occasion!
review_summary: Great for honeymoon or beach vacation!

review_text: Love this dress but the material is scratchy which made me have to send it back. Can't handle discomfort.
review_summary: Gorgeous Dress but Material is Scratchy

review_text: This dress was a dream come true and absolutely perfect for my anniversary dinner with my husband during a weekend getaway. Casually elegant and flirty. It stands out and fits wonderfully and might be my favorite rental to date (although it's hard to ever pick - you can't ever go wrong with RTR).

The neckline was exactly what I was looking for coverage on my chest to avoid too much sun. The over-sized arm holes were difficult and cut very wide, expect your bra to show. This dress shape did not flatter my curves but it was my best option for a hot day.
Be careful of the thin fabric, the dress did begin tearing at a bottom seam.

This is a great dress that you could wear to many occasions, it was a back up for a destination wedding so I still wore it and I got so many compliments. Its very flowy so its fun to wear and it has stretch so its a very comfortable dress as well. Loved it!

I took this dress to Vegas for NYE weekend. Wow! Many compliments! Simply felt like a million bucks!
 I will definitely rent this dress again. Thanks RTR
review_summary: INCREDIBLE DRESS! I FELT LIKE A STAR!!

review_text: No worries about falling down all night.  It fit perfectly.
review_summary: Love it......wore it with jeans and heels.   Perfect for a dinner date night.

review_text: great quality, perfect fit.

I found this a little tight in the waist for a size 6, but it was still wearable for me.  The fabric is a bit heavier, so if you are renting in the summer, look out for that.  Print is adorable and different.  Can be paired with the crop top, or if you're like me and don't love crop tops, looks great with stripes or a solid top.
Ordered an XS and couldn't even get the bottom zipped.  Returned and will try the S to see if its better in fit.
May be my favorite dress of all time.

This jacket!  Pretty much made 10 outfits out of it.  The quality is so superb, it is snug but I like to wear my leather jackets that way.  It isn't flattering or comfortable zip up so it's more fashionable than functional for me.  It's a staple must.
I wore this dress to Vegas, absolutely gorgeous. Perfect size. I'm normally a medium, or sometimes even a large, but the small fit absolutely perfect.
I sort of swam in the Small so definitely size down. I tucked it in, but it still felt a little large for my taste.

I wore this dress for my bachelorette party and it was perfect !  I received tons of compliments and would rent it again in a heartbeat.  You could dress it up with a pair of wedges or dress it down with a pair of cute sandals and wear it for any event day or night.  The only thing is this dress runs very large, I am a solid 10 in almost everything I wear, I have a smaller chest but I am broad and the size 6 fit perfectly.  The dress is low in the back as well, so I went braless which is something I don't normally do but because of the fabric of the dress I ended being very comfortable and didn't have to worry about anything.

This skirt is absolutely adorable and every person that you will walk by will tell you so. It was surprisingly comfortable and I couldn't stop looking at it because it was so cute! I would recommend pairing it with a white top and nude or white shoes. This skirt runs pretty true to size, but if anything a bit small. I'm typically a size 8 or 6 in pants, but the 10 was just a little loose.

This jumpsuit fits like a glove! It's made of neoprene, so VERY stretchy and form fitting, but smoothes in all the right places. Neoprene is a thick material, so great for fall or winter. I didn't end up wearing this only because the L was not quite long enough for the shoes I wanted to wear, but I'm 5'11" and the L was perfect with flat shoes/sandals.
Perfect for a hot summer FUN event
review_summary: Really cute romper. A little too sexy for anything but a play date because it is short and the back

review_text: I love shift dresses, and this one was beautiful!!! The fabric was perfect and it could be dressed up or down with flats or heels ! I wore this dress for a night out on the town in Miami, FL and it was perfect! I would highly recommend this dress and I wish I could buy it! Another RTR success!!!
review_summary: This dress was so much fun to wear!! Just the pop of color I needed!!!

review_text: It flowed perfectly and was effortless!

The only negative I can think of is that the deep v neck line had a stitch to keep it together, and it was really loose. I had to hunt down a couple of safety pins to keep it together. It was super comfortable and the fit was great. I got TONS of compliments from strangers! Made me feel like a star! I was lucky enough to be able to wear it on two different nights, the first to a 5 star dinner in Vegas, the second to a show. DO NOTE that this is a midnight BLUE, not black as I had anticipated, but looked great w/ nude pumps.
review_summary: Beautiful color, great fit, tons of compliments!

review_text: Dress doesn't give you any shape and is huge! I'm between a medium and large but probably could have worn an XS in this dress!
review_summary: Great color but the dress is huge and looks like bag once one. So sad as I was excited about it!

review_text: I was a bit nervous about this dress especially with the midriff but it fit very well and I wish I could have kept it!
Usually wear a size 2-4, and wore a 10 UK.
review_summary: Great dress, perfect for a Miami vacation!

review_text: Perfect fit, super comfortable, and was east to dress up for a night out!
review_summary: Completely changed my opinion on rompers.

review_text: It was a little tight across the back. I should have ordered a size 12 and it would have been perfect. It is cut in a way that hides a bigger tummy
review_summary: It was a very pretty dress

review_text: I am 5'9 and 34DD it fit like a glove!  I did have to play with it a little on the side with no strap to hold the girls up! LOL  I was not a fan of the zipper as it is on the side on on the one dress i rented it really stuck out but I got over it.  It is heavier then it looks in the pictures and is a great quality!!!!
This dress was comfortable classy and reserved, with a bit of flirt with the high low hemline.  Loved the sparkle from the silver thread that ran through the fabric. Would love to wear this again.

The only bothersome detail was the fact that the straps were a little too loose and kept falling off the shoulder but other than that, this dress was the perfect length, the material was just perfect for the steamy Florida weather.  You can definitely go from daywear to evening wear
review_summary: This is a very elegant and sexy dress!!! Will definitely rent again!

review_text: i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and the Small was perfect. love the cutout in the back, super comfortable. wore it all day and still didn't want to get out of it. i wore flat sandals but cld easily see this working with booties. it was rather short so i wldn't wear it to work, but i just know i'm going to be in it constantly during the summer because it's so easy to throw on and wear anywhere. i can't say enough about how awesome this casual romper is!
review_summary: i bought this romper because it is amazing

review_text: Runs a little large, plenty of room through the middle. Size down even if you are full breasted.  Flattering style and color. Slight pattern to the white fabric. Great sleeves! Perfect for any occasion.
review_summary: Color and style of  top, looks great with straight jeans

review_text: A beautiful perfect dress for Vegas!!  Felt amazing in it.  So comfortable!!
I got this romper for vacation in Amsterdam. It was a very fun pattern and was lightweight so easy to pack. It was a little short (I'm 5'7") but overall I was happy with this rental!

I'm a true 8 but ordered the 8 and the 10 as a backup. The dress is SHORT, so I chose to go with the 10 for the extra length. I was wearing this for my engagement photos and thought the longer version would be more appropriate for forever memories. Had this been for Vegas, I would have gone for the 8! :)

I didn't end up wearing this dress because of the length.  I'm 5'4 and even with three inch heels the dress dragged on the floor.  I'm between a 6 and an 8 and I went with the 8 - maybe the 6 would have been a bit shorter.  Other reviewers said the dress ran small in the bust (why I went with the 8) but I found it to be pretty true to size and I have a large bust.  All this being said, the dress is beautiful and very flattering and I will probably try to rent again in a petite size.

I loved the color and the lace detailing is beautiful. I loved having pockets too! A warning to the longer torso gals that you can end up with a bit of tight fit in between the legs, but it wasn't terrible. The lace is soft and not itchy. My only complaint is that when you sit the pockets are actually visible out of the bottom of the shorts.
review_summary: This was a great alternative to a dress - GORGEOUS color!

review_text: The romper was comfortable with just the right amount of sparkle to make it appropriate for nighttime festivities! A warning for the taller ladies - this romper will be SHORT on you - at 5'9" it definitely still fits but I was definitely showing some leg. If you're not into micro-minis, I would choose differently.

This red dress is just breath taking! From the way it flows and how it gives you the glam look! A definite head turner I had so many compliments on this dress every step I took! I wore this at a Napa vacation visiting Castello di Amorosa (Castle of Love) and it was the perfect shade of red against the green grass and gloomy castle. Even though the dress I received hit right below my knees -- which was supposed to be at ankle length as I am only 5'4" (see second pic), it was still perfect. The measure states that it should be around 56" from shoulder to hem but when I measured this one was only at 48". Still, a very elegant dress -- like Marilyn Monroe but ten times better with the color and ruffles!  I rented the size 42 as I am between a 4 and a 6 but I was going to eat and drink wine and so to give room I went for the 42 (6).

I did love this dress and thought it was perfect for a night out in Vegas. However, the make of the dress wasn't as structured as I had hoped. I did have an issue with the shoulders slipping off but that could be due to my smaller bust size. I'm on the taller side and the dress was a bit short for dancing.
I wore it to a night out the beach.. no complaints. it was really comfy and easy to take on and off.

This skirt was one of the biggest winners I've ever rented from RTR - endless complements, incredibly chic and expensive looking, super unique and flattering.  I wore it to Thanksgiving dinner at Mastros in Palm Desert.  Highly recommend.
Loved Loved Loved this dress! If the hem was just a few inches shorter it would have looked perfect. I am short so I need dresses to hit my knees not the middle of my calves.
review_summary: Sent this back before my event.

review_text: Wore to work with black heels and then also on a beach vacation with nude sandals. Can easily be dressed up or down. Looks a bit cuter IRL than in photos.
good quality, heavy fabric
review_summary: It was a nice piece to wear when site seeing.

review_text:
I rented this skirt for a recent trip to Europe and it ended up being the piece I wore the most because it goes with everything! I dressed this skirt up with crop tops, sparkle tanks and velvets and dressed it down with striped long sleeves, white tee with leather jacket and a flannel button up shirt. In fact, I loved it so much I bought it. 

Honestly, a must have in your wardrobe.

The fit is flattering, true to size and the skirt is a full skirt with amazing structure which makes it stand out.
My current favorite pants.  I flew to Mexico in these pants, super comfortable.  Tons of compliments! Will definitely rent again.  I'm hoping they will be available in other colors!
very comfortable, runs true to size

Thick, forgiving fabric, fitted in the waist and chest area without creating armpit wrinkles or muffin-top on the back.  I sized up from 0 to 2 and was super happy with the fit.  Comfortable and flattering for narrow hips.
review_summary: Thick fabric, fitted in all the right places

review_text: I knew I was going to love this dress as soon as I saw it! I love that it's kind of edgy and sexy but conservative enough to wear to a family wedding. I typically wear a size 10 and I thought the size Large was a bit big on me, so I'd recommend sizing down but keep in mind that it is very stretchy! I also loved that this dress is almost better off without too much accessorizing - so easy and effortless.

The dress for perfectly with one note on the bodice being slightly fitted. I received numerous compliments on the dress and it slightly flared which I enjoyed. One last bonus were the pockets! 

If you have a larger chest I would be conscious that the dress might be tighter on you.
review_summary: I loved the color pattern of the dress and it fit me perfectly. Thanks RTR for a great experience!

review_text: Because of my torso I couldn't wear it comfortably. Also the strap was slightly damaged from being pulled (assuming from girls with long torsos) and it hooks on the front right side so it stuck out

I love this dress, wish I could have kept it!  It's very short, I'm only 5'2" and it was pretty short on me!  The lining is a soft jersy material and its actually really cozy, which is awesome with a little dress, for those of you, like me who tend to freeze easily.  Highly recommend this little number, I'll probably be renting it again soon!

I loved the one shoulder style and the gather at the waste.  The glitter was not too overwhelming and had the right amount of pizzazz.  I wore it for a formal event on vacation with black strappy sandals.  I did not wear a necklace but you could have gotten away with a plain choker style,
review_summary: This was a perfect fit, I would definitely reccomend this to anyone.  Very comfortable as well.

review_text: Very body conscious, but sexy! Perfect for Vegas trip with the girls.
Gorgeous dress! Very snug around the ribcage. But other than that fits true to size
I returned and did not wear this coat.  A very pretty color but the fit was a disappointment.

Love this patterned Saloni dress that is perfect for your next vacation. It is light and fun, with the additional bonus of pockets! This dress does run true to size and the fabric has no stretch but would definitely go down a size as it was roomy in the bust and throughout the midsection. I was perfectly comfortable in the bust area with a 34DD bust size. In addition, these are not adjustable straps. At 5’5 this dress was about a foot below the knee and should be worn with a strapless bra. This can easily be dressed up or down with a strappy heel or a cute sandal. Pair it with some romantic earrings and you have the perfect fun & flirty look!
My DDD fit in there without spillage. Needed help putting on.
review_summary: Was a hit at wedding rehearsal dinner. I am 5'0 and wore flats and had no problem in length.

review_text: cute but shoulders rolled up a lot
Way too big, sleeves are too long. I don't know if I'll be able to wear this at all.

Length was great (I'm 5-5)
Waist was a bit small but I knew that before ordering (Yumi Kim always fits me small around the waist)
review_summary: Cute and comfortable. The waist is a bit small but overall was comfortable.

review_text: There is an option to clip the deep V so it's not as low cut and gives a little more lift if you aren't able to wear a bra with this. At first, I thought the slits in the legs were a bit too much...but I grew to love them.
review_summary: So much to love about this outfit, form the collar neck, to the deep V cut, to the open pant legs.

review_text: Derek Lam does it again! As always, the craftsmanship is meticulous- the dress has a multi-length, patchwork construction that could easily look frumpy.  Instead, the dress floated like an angel wherever I walked. It was also very comfortable.  This dress was versatile enough to wear for a nice dinner, as well as happy hour at a beach resort.  All I had to do was change from navy wedges for the dinner, and flip flops for the happy hour.  I would definitely rent it again!

I ordered a different dress with my unlimited membership for my vacation in the Cape and it did not arrive in time so RTR send this dress to my vacation house. Great customer service! I loved this dress. It was very comfortable, however it was long. I am 5'6 and I could have worn heels. I wore flats and it dragged a bit. It is low cut but you can still wear a normal bra. I would rent this one again.

Husband and I took a weekend in Charleston, SC. This was great for just shopping and touring. Nice open back was breezy in the humidity, the cut still allows a bra which is nice. Wore it to a nice lunch and felt great it in.
For heels only!
review_summary: Beautiful dress but super long!!  Its gorgeous, but beware, it is a lot of dress on the bottom.

review_text: Typically XS and this was too small and so long for a regular. I'm petite and can usually pull something off with heels, but this was way too long and way too small around the waist, exposing everything on top. It's cute, but not worth my rental.
Loved the fit and feel of this shirt dress. Wore it to dinner while on vacation in Maine. It was perfect for the cooler nights.  I thought the tie waist was very flattering.

I love Rebecca Minkoff handbags and was excited to wear this dress. You can easily dress it up or down with boots or heels. The sleeves are fantastic. This dress is flirty and so fun. My husband loved it and I received compliments from strangers.
iNCREDIBLY COMFORTABLE, form fitting and sexy with a classy edge. RVN makes dresses that go from date night to club effortlessly and are always flattering
review_summary: sexy and classy at the same time!

review_text: I am 5'2 and wore this dress as a maxi dress with flat sandals. Obviously meant to be tea length on regular height ladies, but worked well as a long dress for me! The colors and cutouts were perfect for a tropical vacation! It really stood out in pictures! Love Mara Hoffman dresses, this one ran a little smaller than others but still true to size in my opnion.
review_summary: Wore on my honeymoon in the Bahamas!

review_text: Warning!! This is not a cute, slender coat as pictured. It looks like a giant tent. The bottom flares out severely. I ordered a size small and it was enormous and unflattering. It is such a shame because it looks so cute in the photo. The coat is warm and nice quality, just a horrible shape.

Got this with tags still on it. As is typical with Lilly Pulitzer shift dresses, I had to order the 12 to fit my booty. The top was swimming on me even though I wore with a padded strapless. A 10 would not have fit my hips. All in all beautiful gold detailing on the top and a casual white fabric on bottom. I wore with rose gold gladiator sandals to dress it down a bit. I felt glamorous but not sure Lilly dresses are best for my body type. Classy dress though.
Very forgiving fit and comfortable. Sheer and light but not see-through. Highly recommend!
Loved the fit of this - super cute and light weight for warm weather.

I really liked the colors of the dress, and the material- and I love Shoshanna dresses in general. However, it just wasn't the right fit for me. I have a long torso, so the waist ended up hitting a bit too high on me, adding even more emphasis to my large chest. As with some Shoshanna dresses that run small, I erred on the larger size (I vary between a 4 and a 6). I'm not sure if sizing up even more would have helped the position of the waist for me. The dress is definitely short, but not inappropriate short. Overall I would have loved it had it worked better for my body shape!
review_summary: Pretty dress, but just not the correct fit for me.

review_text: This top fit perfectly with no bra, the only con was that if I raised my arms while dancing my boob could have popped out so I kept my movements minimal.
review_summary: Super cute and fun paired with the blue sequence pants!

review_text: I was a little weary about this dress but when I tried it on it fit like a glove. Sometimes FreePeople tends to run a little oversize and this dress was perfectly fitted. The pattern is kind of unusual but I loved it and got a lot of compliments on it!

I rented this for a cruise and wore it to one of the formal dinners. The bust and waist fit well (I wasn't pinched in, but it wasn't baggy either). The skirt is knee length and the neckline was comfortable as well (usually, I like a scoop neck). I found the fit very comfortable, and I really liked how light the fabric felt.
review_summary: I love this dress, the color is really striking in person. Perfect for a warm weather getaway!

review_text:
It's definitely fitted in the bodice, but it makes it secure and fit nicely. 
I usually wear between a 2 and a 4 and the XS was snug but still fit. The S might have been too big. 
Wore this to Santa Barbara and loved it.
review_summary: Beautiful dress, great fit, very well made. Loved this!

review_text: length was perfect for flats
review_summary: Nice fit, didn't care for the belt too much but you can tie it in the back as well.

review_text: I have a very small waist so had to wear a belt with this to hold it up, but it was perfect! I loved this skirt and would highly recommend!
review_summary: Perfect skirt for a beach /summer vacation!

review_text: Like other reviewers stated, the dress was a little itchy under the arms due to the sequins. But since my shoes hurt far more, most of my focus was on the pain my feet were going through, lol.  Also, there is a lot more blue and red in the sequins than what shows up in the photos.  Overall a beautiful dress.
review_summary: I wore this dress for a girls' Vegas trip.  The dress was flashy and sexy.

review_text: I would consider purchasing this one.  I really loved it!  The mesh was super fun!  The material wasn't what I expected but it was fine.  Relatively comfortable.  Wasn't super comfortable in the arm area.  The mesh was a bit challenging to zip.  I agree with the other reviews, that it runs relatively large.  I wear a 2/4 and typically in RTR items I have scored better with a size 4.  This was a perfect fit in a size 2.  You need strapless bra as well.  I definitely got noticed in this one!
loved the color and fit was true to size. i wasn't expecting the fabric to be as soft but it was certainly a pleasant surprise! super comfy and it felt like a hit. thanks, RTR!
review_summary: perfect dress for a girls weekend in vegas!

review_text: This dress was my night out in Vegas dress.  It was absolutely beautiful.  It fit really well, but the sequins were a little scratchy.  It had the perfect amount of cleavage.

After reading other reviews (and knowing that I planned to eat my weight in nachos on my Mexican vacay) I ordered a size up for this dress. As soon as I pulled it out of the bag I regretted doing so, the 0 would have been a much more comfortable fit. 
Luckily it was nothing that some fashion tame and (a whole lot of safety pins) couldn't fix. The abstract print made pinning the dress in (on both sides) easy with out anybody noticing. I received a ton of compliments on the dress, and might have bought it (if it was my true size.) I felt  like a star, and would happily wear it again.

Wish I had a better picture of myself in this beauty. Wore it out during my bachelorette party. It was so comfortable and easy! Great to move/dance/be picked up and carried over the threshold in. Sheer back gives it that extra pop!

The sweater runs a bit short so I wore a longer shirt under it but tucked it in my jeans.  I wore it for a sailing day on SF Bay and it was simply the right occasion - it is not a thick sweater so perfect

Gorgeous gorgeous dress! Perfect for resort, spring, or summer. I ordered the UK size 8 (US size 4)  thinking a European brand would run smaller, but it actually runs true to size. It was a bit large, the UK size 6 (US size 2) would have fit better. This dress gives off an effortless bohemian vibe, yet is clearly well made and perfectly tailored. The material is thick enough to go bra-less, but you can also easily wear a nude strapless bra underneath. There is enough room in the bust, waist, and hips so that it should be comfortable for a variety of body types. At 5'7" the tea length hit at mid-calf. Looks great with summery heeled boots, wedges, and sandals.

The dress runs small, so I ended up wearing the larger size (6) or else everyone would have been able to see the outline of strapless bra in vivid detail. However, it stayed in place through an entire night of walking and dancing without a lot of adjustment. It was comfortable and sexy! I'd considering buying it to own if it became available!
