review_summary: I rented this for my future sister-in-law's bachelorette in Las Vegas

review_text: Fits snugly but hides bumps well because of the ruching.  I felt like a bombshell even in the middle of freezing Toronto winter!  Tights or bare legs, doesn't matter - this dress is killer!
review_summary: An amazing night at the bar feeling like a hot mama!

review_text: Easy, summery, and a fun print! Loving this shirt dress by Mara Hoffman. We recommend ordering your true size and one size up for backup. With room in the bust, waist, and hips, this style is super comfy and flowy. The fabric has a slight stretch and the cut makes it easy to wear with a standard bra. Pair with sandals and a satchel!

It fit great, but was too long on me (even with heels!)
For reference, I'm 5'0
review_summary: I rented this for a beachy vacation get away.

review_text: Loved this dress. It sucks you in everywhere you need to be sucked in. I got tons of compliments on this and felt great. I love this designer! Definitely could not have worn a bra. So, if that is a factor, this is not the dress for you!
review_summary: Perfect for vacation and very flattering!

review_text: This romper was true to size and was perfect for a night at Vegas clubs. I normally wear a size 4/6 and the small fit perfectly. It does show a lot of cleavage, so I used fashion tape just in case. But honestly, my 34 DD chest fit fine and I did not need the tape. The straps are half adjustable, but not for the full length of the straps.

I wore this dress to dinner and a show in NYC.  It was very comfortable and warm, and also very forgiving!  It fit like a glove but the material was thick enough that it seemed to hide the flaws rather than emphasize them.  The pattern was eye catching without being too crazy.  I would recommend this dress!
review_summary: Comfortable and warm for a December night in NYC

review_text: This dress is stunning but it is what I'd call a "high maintenance" dress - it required so much fashion tape and pinning, b/c of both the plunging neckline and the length that I just couldn't give it 5 stars.  Despite renting the "Regular" length and wearing 4 inch heels, I still had to pin the bottom almost 2 inches.  And to try to make the bottom even with pinning and tape was very difficult.  The deep V also is very revealing, and while you can make it work with fashion tape, I had to use a TON to get the girls to stay in.  So, while the dress is gorgeous (and I got a lot of compliments) it's just too difficult to wear.

Very flattering dress for a beach trip. Nude undergarments are a must. If I were wearing this dress to a more well-lit event, I think a slip would have been necessary. Nude strapless bra was fine for a beach resort at night. The elastic waist helps make the fit more flattering. I have an average-length torso, and the torso was a tad long for me. Loved the embellishment.

I only received one size since I have an unlimited membership so I got the size 6. It was a little loose but not enough to deter me from wearing it. The base pattern of the dress is an interesting navy/black herringbone pattern. I wore this with nude heels and carried  a tan bag. This is a beautiful dress!
review_summary: Everyone LOVED this dress! I got so many compliments and felt beautiful!

review_text: Definitely short, but it was Vegas, so that was fine with me!  You can tell it's a bit stretched out from being rented, but that didn't bother me.  Overall was very comfortable and fit really well.  Would definitely wear/rent this again.
review_summary: Got sooo many compliments on this dress, even from complete strangers!  Made me feel like a million$

review_text: PERFECT, didn't flatten in the suitcase, traveled surprisingly well and got MANY compliments.
review_summary: Wore this on a Disney Cruise and felt like a PRINCESS!

review_text:
In this instance, sizing up seems to have worked out.  I'll wear it with jeans, a dress, and on vacation on Whidbey Island.  Everyday.  It's that lightweight and fabulous.  The large will allow for a thin sweater underneath.    

In the meantime, I have worn it to work, to a tour at the American Folk Art Museum, and suspect I'll wear it to The Possibility Project opening night.
I rented this for a spring vacation. The fabric isn't almost canvas-like and doesn't stretch much. It's very small for the size, it was tight and like a miniskirt! I would size up.
Great for an evening beach event on vacation!  Careful with the slit-- it can surprise you if you move around a little! Comfortable to wear :)
Size runs large - so looked a bit 'sack-ish' from the side - will order medium next time. But will definitely rent this again!

Great material and super flattering. Fun print and the striping makes the waist look small. I felt like it ran a little big and it rides up like crazy. (Never to the point where anything was showing but just endless tugging down). If I rented again it would be for an event where I was mostly sitting or standing, not hotel bar hopping. All that walking was rough! Otherwise perfect for a night out!
review_summary: Fun and flirty for a night out in Miami Beach!

review_text: This is a beautiful, well made sweater.  I was a bit bummed that the weather turned warm and this sweater was a bit too thick to wear comfortably.  But I run hot :) I thought it ran a little large in the shoulders but skimmed the rest of the body nicely.  The detail on the back makes it look very well constructed.  Could dress up or down, I really liked it.
Super comfy, wore it a Mexican fiesta on the beach, and the colors set the mood and the material kept me cool.
review_summary: Vibrant colors make it a stand out!

review_text: I really loved the way that this dress fit my body. Additionally, when you look at the fabric and details up close, it is very beautiful. I thought that it was a great dress for formal and everyday wear.
review_summary: Great material and cut. The fabric is luxurious and hugs your curves in a very flattering way.

review_text:
This sweater is very comfortable & quite warm. Perfect for early spring or fall. It's definitely boxy though, and runs on the shorter side which would be the cons in my opinion.

The actual sweater though is very well made and the weave on the front adds some dimension and character. I wouldn't rent it again, but it did come in handy for a brisk spring vacation in Vermont.
Beautiful! Absolutely gorgeous. The print was intricate. I will rent again.
review_summary: I loved this dress. It fit perfectly!

review_text:
Pros: Exquisite fabric and style. The sheer bottom of the dress moved like a dream.

Cons: I found this dress to be uncomfortable on top. I am not large chested, but found the chest, neck, and armholes to be very tight. Ultimately I did not wear this dress for more than 2 hours because it was uncomfortable.
The dress was cute!
review_summary: Wore this to a Beatles Vegas show

review_text: This fit well, and looked just like the stock picture. The skirt had nice form to it. Wore it on the weekend - would have worn it to work but the skirt was a bit too short.
I LOVE this dress.  The sleeves run a touch long but I felt comfortable and pretty in it.  I rented this dress again in a size 2 and preferred the easy drape of the 4.  I would buy this dress.
review_summary: I rented this dress for a trip to London.  I wore it out for dinner with business colleagues.

review_text: It should be obvious from the photo that this is A LOT of fabric.  I felt like I was swimming in fabric.  I liked the idea of the dress, so that it why I rented it, but it is difficult to wear.  Maybe a belt or something would have helped.  The service from RTR was excellent.
review_summary: It is a lot of dress (Fabric)

review_text: I rented this for vacation, intending to wear it sightseeing as well as dinner, etc. but ended up just wearing it for dinner.  If you're busty, it doesn't have a lot of ease in the top so I ended up wearing the sleeve part  up on my shoulders instead of down around the arms.  No matter, it was cute and my husband loved it.  It just wasn't;t something I could wear for a whole day in the hot weather, hence it didn't give it 5 stars.

I picked this up from the Rent the Runway store in Las Vegas for a night out. It had just the right amount of sparkle with some sequins, but a lot of the dress was covered in matte sequins and beads, so it wasn't an overwhelming amount of sparkle, and it had great depth of color. Looked great with bold black accessories.

It was super comfortable, a bit stretchy, no scratchiness around the seams, once it was on I forgot all about it.

This top runs very short, but that's clear in the photos. I wore with high-waisted jeans for a trip to DC. I did wear a cami under for work b/c my waist showed when raising my arms. One of the many buttons was missing, but RTR Unlimited sent me an extra top as a  sub and I was still able to wear the top with the missing button.

I rented this for vacation.  I liked it more on than I thought I would.  The cut is very flattering.  It didn't show too much cleavage which was my main concern.  The only negative is that, as another reviewer stated, the bottoms do ride up a bit so I would suggest sizing up if you are between sizes.  It might not work that well on someone with a long torsoe.

Rented for dinner while out on vacation. Very cute, definitely shows off your curves. Wasn't a fan of the tank cut arm design. better if it was off the shoulder or something. Didn't photograph super well.
review_summary: Cute dress, perfect for a warm summer night out

review_text: I wore this dress for a show during a recent trip to Vegas.  It looked awesome and I felt great!  It was very flattering.  I usually wear a 10 lately so I got the 10 and 12 to be safe. The 10 worked great, so I would say the dress is true to size. I could wear a regular bra with it. I do have an hourglass figure so I was worried about my hips in this dress, and the dress does not have much stretch to it so it was tighter on me in the hips than the rest but it did not bother me. Would definitely rent again, wish I could buy it!

My ONLY complaint about this dress is that it strangles you when you sit down. The high neck is really uncomfortable when you are seated. If you go up a size surely it won't fit as nicely so not advised to make the neckline more comfortable. The 6 fit my body perfectly and I am 5'7" 135 pounds with a small waist and bigger hips/small bust.
review_summary: Perfect for a bachelorette party brunch in Laguna Beach

review_text: This dress is a real winner - comfortable, light-weight, perfect for a sunny vacation and great for walking around. Fit true to size!
I definitely recommend this for flat chested girls cause this top is very low cut. I didn't wear a bra with it. However, its very flattering and was so fun to wear.
LOVED this romper. Wore it in Vegas with heels and I felt super hot. It was also ridiculously comfy. The sparkly straps made it dressy enough for Vegas. Highly recommend this.
review_summary: So fun and cute - but still sexy.

review_text: I rented this for a Mexico trip that was cancelled so I couldn't wear it. I would say I may not have worn it anyway because it was very long. I'm 5'4 and I don't think this dress was very flattering on my short frame even with sky high heels. Also, it didn't quite fit on the sides where I'd like it (more on my lower obliques and not the top of my rib cage which would have been more flattering). I won't be renting this again unless God grants me a growth spurt (at 28 I doubt that happens).
review_summary: Interesting color, thick fabric, longer than you'd imagine.

review_text:
I am 5'7 and weigh approximately 120 pounds. I rented a size 2R and wore with 3 inch heels. 
measurements are 34-24-36 
Hope this helps
review_summary: I am usually not a sparkly kind of girl but this dress was perfect. Lots of compliments.

review_text: Fits wonderful, don't know what any complaints about material could be. feels great. pulls you in, wore it with a dress shaper that leaves room for your own bra and it was awesome.
review_summary: Loved it, great, sexy hot for Vegas. Wore it backwards! Sexed it up big time! lol.

review_text: The details are amazing. The faux fur keeps you warm and is fully lined through the body. I am 5'2" and a large hit a couple inches above my ankle. So much better than wearing a plain puffy jacket. Great for formal wear in cold weather. Please keep in mind that the jacket is very heavy because of the wool and the faux fur. The beads are sewn with thick fishing wire so they are sturdy. The embroidery is with thick thread in gold and silver.
review_summary: Took for a vacation to the snowy mountains. Definitely a show stopper coat unlike no other.

review_text: I got the extra small and back-up small and I was swimming in the extra small. If you're petite or less than 120 lbs. I do NOT recommend this dress. Otherwise, if you're on the curvy side-- go for it! We were celebrating my bachelorette weekend with a "sparkle" night and this dress fit the bill!
review_summary: The dress was amazingly sparkly, with multi colored sequins which was great!

review_text: I liked this one, though, as others have commented, it runs very slim through the hips and is pretty short. I'd say that it's more for apple or straight and narrow shapes. It was a little spacious on me up top, but it didn't allow much room around the hips. I'd caution girls over 5'5" about wearing it without tights because it exposed a lot when I bent over at all. Otherwise, I liked the pattern and was satisfied with this rental.
review_summary: Bold choice for a night out in NYC.

review_text: I just adore this dress!  It is incredibly flattering, very unique, and well-lined and has a little weight to it.  And perhaps most impressively, it is incredibly comfy to wear... it's almost like lounging around in sweats or a robe.  The material is super soft.  I felt gorgeous in this dress and I'm looking forward to wearing it again in the springtime (if I can wait that long!).
review_summary: Incredibly soft and comfy!  A joy to wear.  Very flattering.  Elastic straps.  Well-lined.

review_text: Loved this dress, was missing the belt, however, when shipped. It was a bit long and had a large ruffle on the top so I was able to tuck it into my strapless bra for the ideal length. Sounds like a pain but it was nbd.
Heavy.
review_summary: Beautiful, but it was too big.

review_text: Wore this for my friend's bachelorette, overall fit well but a little loose in the bust (I have a small bust line). There is an opening in the top layer under the left arm to allow access to the zipper that I safety pinned to make it sit more comfortably.

I rented this dress for a Miami beach concert. I was nervous about the length as I am tall, with a long torso. The fit was perfect. It's a little stretchy, which is great, and helps smooth over any problem areas.
This dress actually fit my petite frame perfectly!  It was a knockout in Las Vegas.  I loved it and would wear it again and again.
review_summary: A fun, fashion forward dress for a night out with friends!

review_text: The dress fit a little big, I probably could have worn the med.  Because I am short, the arm holes were a little long and I had to use hollywood tape to cover my bra on the sides.  Overall, it was great and I would recommend for a girls night out or a bachelorette party.
review_summary: This dress was awesome!  Got so many compliments and it was also comfortable.

review_text: Conservative, flattering, simple (definitely not a wow dress- hard to see the pattern).  A little longer than I like (past my knee).
review_summary: Flattering, but a bit long for a shorter woman (5'3")

review_text: Fit accommodated my bust without looking squished (34D).
review_summary: Great colors, received a lot of compliments
I would love to own this dress.  Fit, color, comfort is all flattering and sexy

review_text: This fit is close, flattering, and it you pick the right size very comfortable. Totally gorgeous. I wore it in Vegas and even in Vegas it stood ou!
review_summary: Beautiful dress, I went a size up because it has no stretch in it at all! But comfortable!

review_text: Rented this because from the photos it seemed like it looked good on everyone! It was super comfortable and made me feel classy. My fiancé kept saying how he wished I could purchase the dress because he loved it so much.

The dress fit nicely and is true to size. It is made from a very thin, soft material and was extremely comfortable on a hot day. I have a longer torso and the waist was slightly high. I also feel that the dress gave me a pooch that I don't have which isn't the most flattering in pictures but I still liked it. Definitely recommend getting the Kate Spade necklace with the dress because I received more compliments on the statement necklace and was able to wear it with a different dress!

i liked the style of the dress a lot.  my only complaint is that the top portion of the dress was way too roomy: i couldn't wear a bra (even a strapless), because i did not have one that would not show on the sides, and without a bra i was really worried about the material exposing too much of me.

Yes, this dress is expensive to rent, but the high quality and WOW factor it possesses is undeniable.  This dress is stunning and will turn heads everywhere you go, I promise. Definitely a stand out.  I am usually a 2 or 4 and rented the 4 and 6 in this dress after reading the reviews.  I wore the 4.
review_summary: One man approached me during dinner and said "That is the most amazing dress I've seen!"

review_text: Even works for short girls!
review_summary: I love this dress! Well made and great fit. I just recommend going a size up.

review_text: Loved the fit!  Wasn't too tight and sat well on my curvy shape.  The length was perfect and hit right above my knee.
review_summary: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments! Great length and fit!

review_text: Open back and low cut top.  Very sexy.
review_summary: Wore this dress in Atlantis in the Bahamas.  Fit like a glove.  The lines on it are very slimming.

review_text: I totally loved this dress! The fabric is much thicker than I thought, however, it was super soft and comfortable. The 6 was a little big on my body but fit my chest area nicely. It was the perfect dress for my sister's birthday dinner. The only issue was it smelled really weird.
review_summary: Amazing dress for a birthday celebration!

review_text: I loved how this dress fit me and it was perfect for my bachelorette party. My only concern with it was that it seems very worn. No holes or stains but it's definitely on it's last leg. Still worked out perfectly!!
I wore this for a New Year's party.  Loved it and sad to send it back.  It is very flattering and can easily be dressed up with slacks or dressed down with jeans.

The chest area was UNFORGIVING. I'm a 38D and they only way I got it on was by zipping it up around my waist and then stuffing my boobs into it ( a trick i learned from the reviews, thanks girls).  It was tight, and I felt that if I moved too quickly I might tear the damn thing but in the end totally worth it because the dress is gorgeous.
Just wish they would make clothes with bustier girls in mind.

This dress is the perfect little party dress.  It's sparkly and super fun!  It has quite a bit of stretch to it, so I went with the smaller size.  I'd recommend sizing down if you have a short torso and a smaller chest.  It's a little short and the back is very open, so it's definitely a party dress.  I thought I would hate the shoulder pads, but they looked awesome!
review_summary: I needed something fun and sparkly for a night out in Vegas to celebrate a friend's bachelor party

review_text: Although I didn't love the way it fit me around my bust, I LOVE the style of this top. I love the color and the awesomely unique sleeves. This top is really fashionable and comfortable and super easy to style since it doesn't require much accessorizing. It's also really easy to dress up or down, so it's a very versatile fun look. Highly recommended!

I rented this to go to a nightclub in Vegas.  I usually don't wear rompers but I wanted to try one out.  I didn't realize how much sparkle this dress had.  I kinda felt like I had a fight with a glitter bottle and lost.  It was comfortable but every time you went to the bathroom you have to take the whole thing off.  I wore the 6.  The 4 fit too but it came in damaged.
When the light hits the glitter, it shows all tummy imperfections- so plan to wear with spanx if you don't have a flat tummy!
review_summary: This dress gets compliments! It's fun, flitter and cool.

review_text: I rented this for a trip to NYC because I knew it would be cold.  The sweater is very warm and cozy.  The only thing I didn't like were the designed holes in the front and back.  It made it hard to wear a bra without the straps showing.  I wore a shirt under it for more warmth on my shoulders.  The sweater also arrived with  a small pull which I wrote to RTR about.
review_summary: Cozy sweater, holes a little odd.

review_text: This top is a showstopper and voluminous! This style is right on trend with an off the shoulder cut and statement ruffles. However, I would suggest sizing down due to the sleeves were loose and the volume of  the ruffles can be a little overwhelming.

Bright and fun summer colors which I loved. The dress is on the shorter side so be careful when getting in and out of a vehicle. It was really comfortable and fit well. I could have gone down one size to better accentuate my waist, but I realize the cut of the dress is rather forgiving. Great quality and I was not overheating in the dress at all.  Such a cute number that is perfect for spring or summer day!
review_summary: I wore this on a wine tasting tour for a friends summertime bachelorette party in Mexico.

review_text: This was my first experience with RTR.  I wanted a fun and sexy dress to wear on our Cancun vacation, but something that was still flattering since I haven't lost all the baby weight yet. This dress was PERFECT! Highlights the curves of your body but hides the tummy with the ruched front! The dress is very forgiving. I ordered a 10 and a 12 (thinking I would need the 12 as I have wide hips) but the 10 fit perfect. Love this dress and want to buy it!

I LOVE this dress.  I rented it for a weekend trip to a resort and it was perfect.  Very beachy and casual, but super elegant.  You can wear this dress while hanging out by the pool, or to a formal dinner.  A note about the length.  I am 5'6'' and the regular was the perfect length.  I can wear it with flats or a little heel.  If you are over 5'6'' and want to wear the dress with a heel, I recommend getting the long.

Also, kudos to RTR customer service on this order.  I had them ship the dress to the wrong address.  I contacted customer service when the dress was already en route.  They were able to change the shipping address and it still arrived at my house on time.  Super impressed.
Fits great and looks sexy but classy. Only down side is getting it undone to go potty. Just get some help from the fellow ladies!
review_summary: Great romper...wore it to Vegas...perfect for dancing.

review_text: strech , fit like glove, elegant, beautifull fabric, nice colors, u can wear any time and any station of the year.
review_summary: in Love of this one, so far my favorite rent.

review_text: Loved this jacket! Great for mildly cool weather. The leather is so soft. Loved the look of it unzipped with jeans or a casual dress. I kept this jacket for over a month and wore it tons!

Beautiful dress, however, it runs SMALL. I'm 5'7, 135 lbs and am a 34C. I could not zip up the back in a size 6R. I had to have RTR send me an 8R which finally fit. The band around the waist hits right around the rib cage so if you have big ribs like me definitely size UP. Otherwise, a beautiful dress that truly shined on our vacation to Hawaii!

Wore this on vacation in Florida! AMAZING print!! Got many compliments when I wore it to brunch. Fabric is very soft and super stretchy. Regular length was perfect for my height with sandals. I loved the v-neckline and cutout!  Perfect for a vacation or wedding!

This dress was perfect for vacation, I ordered the L and XL because I was unsure of sizing. Both fit, but I ended up wearing the L because it was slightly more fitted. If you are larger in the bust or are in between sizes, you may want to go up a size.

This is a lightweight drop over dress.  I will warn that it is very low cut in front requiring hollywood tape for me to wear and kept slipping from one shoulder to other.  Plus it was super comfortable on an exceptionally hot day when we were walking around town.

It was the perfect length to wear with wedges.  It was comfortable for wearing all day and was perfect for a weekend of wine tasting with friends.  I loved this dress so much, I looked into buying it.
I rented this for my honeymoon but ended up keeping for so much longer. I really still contemplate buying it. Yes, it's a Lilly shift, but for whatever reason I loved this one.
review_summary: Showed off my curse on my honeymoon

review_text: I rented this dress for a destination wedding "boat party". It was perfect for the dressy-casual event. This shift style dress fits nicely, isn't too short and looks expensive! I would normally wear a size 2, but rented the 0 for a slimmer fit and I'm glad I did!
review_summary: Expensive looking dress with beautiful details!

review_text: Adorable! Looks a bit worn though, and is a tiny bit bulky. Overall, I love love this!

I wore this dress to an evening party while on vacation. It was perfect! The dress fell to just the right length on my legs. I never felt like it was too short or that I needed to tug it down. The fabric is very soft, and the way the sleeves hold their shape is very flattering. I received many compliments from ladies asking me where I got it from!
I am normally a size 4 and got the small but the extra small would have been a much better fit. I wore it anyway though - looked cute even if loose!

LOVE this dress! Perfectly breezy for a hot day & the colors are beautiful in person. I am not into florals typically, but this one wasn't too girly. I wore with flat sandals but would definitely dress up with wedges as well! Be careful if its breezy, it will flip up : x
I rented to wear in Vegas during the day. It was fabulous. I probably could have worn the XS, but the small worked. Need a backless bra.
review_summary: I rented to wear in Vegas during the day. It was fabulous!

review_text: Fabulous color, comfortable easy silhouette. Running true to size, I'd recommend sizing down for backup. There is plenty of room in the bust and bodice, but the silhouette is definitely meant to be slightly oversized and drape seamlessly over the body. Fabric is thick enough to wear without a slip, but I'd recommend an adhesive bra to avoid anything show through the deep v. Great for a daytime event or vacation.

Here are the pros: pretty pattern, nice length, good coverage, and excellent lining

Here are the cons:

1)The underarm area is really large. I do CrossFit, so I have to be careful when ordering clothing as my arms and shoulders are broader than people who do not have basic muscle accumulation. This is why a large usually works for me. I would have had to pin the under arm area just so much bra wouldn't stick out. 

2) The slits are unflattering. The model makes it look like the slits in the dress are understated. They are not--it's one of the main focuses of the dress. I love showing my legs, but I just thought that these slits were too flashy for such a sweet, classy dress and print.

3) The waist area is too large. It acted more like a sack than a form-fitting, empire waist should do.

I give the dress three stars because the fit may have been wrong, and it may be really nice if the size is appropriate. I would definitely order a size down.
review_summary: Fits well in some areas, not in others

review_text: The outfit is super cute and perfect for a summer vacation. I really liked how it fit, but the only thing that bothered me was that the material bunched a little bit in the back where you tie the bow. The medium was definitely a good fit, and it was adorable for the occasion I wore it to. Would definitely recommend.
review_summary: This romper was perfect for a fun dinner party by the beach.

review_text: Color is true to the picture.  Very fun to wear.  My only complaint would be that I'm not taller!  I'm 5'4 and it was a little long.  Also, there is a lot of fabric so it kind of swallowed me at times.  But it was definitely something different and fun!

Overall the fit is roomy and very comfortable.  Although I could have worn a small, the medium still fit well.  For reference I am 5'2", 150 lbs and am a 36DD bra size.  I wore this in Cabo for my vacation, and it was cool and lightweight enough for the climate and soft against the skin.   It does have a deep v-neck, but I didn't find it to be problem.  If you're self-conscious about it, just put on a pretty bra to peak through or pin/tape it.  This shirt dress is great casual, dressed up or even as a cover up for a bathing suit.  If you're on the fence, get it.  I think you'll be very happy w/ this rental.
review_summary: This dress is everything!  The pockets really made it even better!

review_text: I got the dress to wear to a nice dinner during a family vacation in Florida. It was very comfortable and the color was lovely but I found that the armholes are cut very large and showed my bra. I had to leave my light coat on to cover it which was less than ideal in the Florida heat.

I wore this dress out for drinks in Vegas and loved it! The fabric is a thick knit and fits very bodycon. I didn't even need to wear a bra which was nice. The skirt is tight so I left it unzipped a little towards the bottom for better movement. I have a shorter torso so the openings on the sides weren't as noticeable as the photo but still noticeable enough to get the effect of the style.
light, comfortable, pretty. i wore this to a hawaiian evening party. i wore a strapless bra.
The only "bad" thing was how itchy the sequins were on my arm/shoulder area. Other than that I absolutely loved this dress!
review_summary: I wore this at my bachelorette party in Vegas. I got so many compliments on how it matched my eyes!

review_text: I've always wanted a Lilly Pulitzer dress and finally had the opportunity to rent one for my recent Florida vacation. This dress is fabulous! If you want to channel the '60s, turn heads and exude a tropical, beach vibe, this is the number. Just be aware: It's SHORT. I rented the 2 because the 4 wasn't available and had to be very, very careful about sitting, bending, etc. The four may have worked better. At any rate: have great legs and be willing to show them!

I originally wore this dress while traveling in Europe over the summer. It's a great travel dress - it doesn't wrinkle and is cool enough to wear while out walking in the hot weather. I kept thinking about it over the next two months because I loved it so much (great fit, beautiful colors) and ended up buying it. I'm a 4 and probably could have worn the XS but I liked a bit of extra room in the S.
review_summary: Loved it so much I bought it

review_text: This dress was so cute on. I loved the cut out panel in the back. The dress made me feel summery and sexy. I also liked the color in the middle of the dress; an orange red.The lining of this dress stops above the knee which adds a flirty feminine effect. Since it is a maxi dress I enjoyed my legs could be seen in the lower lace panel. I would rent this dress again.
review_summary: Pretty and effortless. This dress can serve casual function and you can dress it up using accessorie

review_text: Dress seemed to be true to size, but due to the cut/style of it, I am unable to wear it. It is a little boxy and has too much room in the chest and not enough room in the hips. This would be cute for someone with less hips than myself.

It was a great dress and made me feel special.  The only issue is the sequence rubbed on my arms and by the end of the night, I was ready for some lotion!  I am 5'7 and about 135; it was a good length and fit. Loved the deep v, but could still wear a bra with it.
Fi perfectly. True to size.

Comfortable fit (compared to a Herve). I will say if you plan to walk at all, it does start to ride up. I had to pull my dress down all night. Mesh detailing is small but very sexy. I was able to eat dinner and not feel uncomfortable in the stomach / waist area. I felt gorgeous and got a lot of attention all night. And my boyfriend popped the question!
review_summary: Gorgeous little black dress I rented for a classy night out on the town in Vegas!!

review_text: this dress was just ho hum for me. fit and quality were nice, but didn't wow me.
review_summary: nice dress...but not a stand out

review_text: Wasn't that comfortable to wear, probably because of my body type.. but looked great standing up in pictures.

It is possible I should have sized down, but I wanted to leave enough room for my athletic thighs (and cute, but big butt!) Unfortunately, it left too much room from my non-existent chest. I recommend this one for someone over 5'3'' and with a small to full B or more. Just want to make sure you fill all the important parts out.... especially the top since it is lined/padded on the inside and will be pointy if you don't.

In love with this maxi by Natori! The color and print in person is absolutely gorgeous. Running true to size, we recommend sizing up for back up. This style is pretty loose fitting throughout the bust, midsection, and hip area. It should be worn without a bra or with a NuBra. Pair this style with simple accessories and wedges for your next vacation or day time event!
I looked like I was pregnant, it did not work for me at all. The print was beautiful tho.
Wore this during a day in Puerto Rico. Dress is soft, colors/pattern are beautiful.

This dress is beautiful.  I received tons of compliments on the color and style; the blue is a little darker in person.  It was comfortable, however my one issue was the difference between the 2 and 4.  The 2 was tight and SHORT- it definitely clung to my curves! The 4 was not as tight (though it still accentuated my backside) and just as short, but the stomach area was really bunchy.  If there had been a 3 I think it would have been the perfect size...but who makes odd sizes?! I ended up going with the 2, because when in Vegas, why not.  It was really pretty and a great find!

Realllllly tight across chest in the medium, and sleeves too short. Length was okay for vacay at 5'10'' - but ultimately I returned without wearing, should have gone with the large. Super cute though, so bummed!!
review_summary: I should have gone with the large!

review_text: Everything about this romper was amazing.
review_summary: I LOVE this and will rent it again. Never had so many compliments. So comfortable.

review_text: I loved this dress.  I ran into a few other people wearing mara hoffman on the same weekend as well, which made it feel like a secret club.  This was a perfect summer music festival dress and it can be worn without an issue with a racerback bra.  I have large athletic wide shoulders and this dress fit me super well.

I wore this out with friends to celebrate my last night in my thirties! The small fit well, but I contemplated wearing the medium for a little more length as the dress is very short. However, the top for the medium was a bit too loose. I used tape to keep the front of the dress down and did not wear a bra. Overall, it was very comfortable. If you don't like attention though, this dress is not for you! It is quite the head-turner! It got me a free shot of tequila!

It might just be my body shape and height but this wasn't super flattering on me. The cutouts exposed and drew attention to a rather fleshy part of my waist, and the lining kept peeking out of the back, creating a black line that distracted from the sexy open back. It fit pretty well (although I do have a small chest), other than the length, which was about 5 inches off the ground (although other reviewers warned about that so I knew to expect it). Everyone I encountered loved the print, but ultimately I was happy to send this one back.
review_summary: Vibrant print but not super flattering

review_text: It fits well, the fabric is great, it's a bit racy if you're big-chested but not scandalous. You could see a little bit of boob from the keyhole opening but not terrible. No need to wear a bra.
I had the MOST fun in Vegas wearing this jumpsuit. I was in a sea of black party dresses. Great fit, my butt looked great and had many, many compliments. You will want to keep it.

I liked this dress, the only issue was the zipper was difficult to zip. Not only on me but on/off the hanger.
I really appreciate this service. Rent the Runway.

The fit was totally true to size. It was a little longer on me than the model, however the back didn't drag on the ground.  The back is open and has a super cute tassel tie.  This dress would work for a bunch of different occasions but is a little more white than it appears in the picture if you are planning on wearing it to a daytime wedding.
review_summary: I wore this dress for Mother's Day brunch. It was the perfect dress for an outdoor occasion.

review_text: Do not wear a bra. I repeat, do not wear a bra. Either don't wear a bra or buy nipple covers. other than that, this dress will draw attention onto yourself because the the plunge is that deep and wide.
Loved everything about this. Great fit. Not much of a difference between the 6 and 8. Length was perfect with a 3 inch heel so I chose the 6.

I will definitely wear this dress again. Also this dress runs small, I usually wear either a 4 or 6 , and I ended up wearing a 6, but that was pushing it. I wished I would have ordered a size 8 because it would have been more comfortable. The dress was tight around my bottom end and my butt is my biggest asset so that my have been the reason why, so the dress doesn't provide a lot of give.

The dress did not come with the belt, as it was not included with the previous shipment back, but I had my own belt that worked perfectly.  I'm 5'9" and the length of the small was perfect for flats.  Dress was slimming, colorful, SO comfortable, and of course, had pockets.  The slits up the sides gave it a little extra something and made it easy to get around in.  I would definitely recommend this dress!
review_summary: SO many compliments! First dress I wish I could have kept!

review_text: Wonderful maxi dress for tall women -- and made my boobs look big, too!! Super comfy. Great for dressing up or down.

The dress fits very snug - I didn't have a chance to try on the medium but I think I might have been better off. The fit made me very aware of my belly - which isn't 100% model flat but isn't normally bad either (I'm normally a size 2). I liked the long sleeves because I didn't need a coat, but they too were snug so I did get a little warm inside and couldn't really roll them up or anything. The material and sequins are very nice and comfortable - the lining on the dress is excellent so I didn't feel poked by the sequins, though they did tend to catch on each other - my arm got stuck to my chest/side more than once; probably a sign of wear on the dress.  If I were going to do it over again, I'd still get this dress - but I'd bring Spanx or get a size up.
review_summary: Vegas baby! Wore to a fancy dinner and a to a show!

review_text: Fun dress to wear! Straps are long which worked well for me as I'm tall.

This is a pretty dress.  The fabric was a wonderful silky fabric with a fair amount of strength.  I was surprised by how big it ran.  I could belt it, but the dress would look much better if it was more "fitted" rather than big.  I am between a 22 and 20 and I normally size up, but I could have used the 20 in this instance.  Customer service was very helpful.

It wrinkles VERY easily however. I'm 5'10", 140, and one of my girlfriends told me that it def showed some leg in a good way. I wore wedges so I probably could have toned it down with flats if I wanted to. I'd rent it again.
The fit is a bit loose, that's why it comes with a belt. I would order a size smaller next time.
review_summary: Very unique sleeves, got lots of compliments

review_text: I loved this dress for my vacation.  Wouldn't normally wear something this bright but fit right in on the island!  There are even little pineapples on the ties in the back!  I danced all night in this - it spins and flies out when you twirl - loved it!
review_summary: Stunning Colors - Perfect for Beach Vacation!

review_text: The fit of this dress is unbelievable! It's comfortable, flattering & gorgeous...lots of compliments! I ordered the 8, but the 6 was better. The larger size bagged under my breasts, which was not flattering. Like the other reviewers, I would have kept this dress if I could have!
It was very comfortable
review_summary: I didn't end up wearing it but I loved it. I normally wear size 6 went with a 2 P

review_text: One of the best dresses I've ever worn - so fun, and comfortable! I got so many compliments - people stopped me to ask where I had gotten the dress, and friends were texting me asking me the same thing after I had posted an Instagram. The dress is an absolute show stopper - fits like a GLOVE! I wore Spanx (old habits die hard), but it was unnecessary - the dress itself will hold you in place in all the right places! The midi length can be tricky, especially with flats (I've found), but not with this dress - the flared hem is so flattering, not matter what shoes you wear (and I wore flats!). Bottom line - ORDER THIS DRESS if you want to look and FEEL fantastic all night. It's amazing. I wish I could keep it!!

This dress felt very well made and was comfortable in addition to really fun to wear. It's short and fitted, but still glamorous. I felt like the dress ran a little small in the waist and a little tight in the bust, but not so much that it was unwearable.

Rented this dress for Las Vegas!  I usually wear a size 8 and got the size 6 as a backup. The six fit me better in the bust area so wore the 6 and was comfortable all night in this dress. Gets little scratchy under the arms. Will def. rent again!
The romper is really light and travels well.  My only issue is that it wrinkled a bit and was really short.  Overall, however, an adorable jumper!
review_summary: Cute jumper in a lovely print!

review_text: I'm 5'7 - 5'8, but the dress was a bit longer than I expected since the shown photo was to knee length. Would look better with heels, but still a great dress!
review_summary: Great dress, longer than I expected

review_text: This is a total head turner. Shows off legs. Flattering fit. Looks great w a little straw hat and black platforms. Wore to the pool in Vegas. So cute.

I would totally buy this dress if I could. Its perfect for a summer vacation or wedding. It was super flattering and easy to move in. It runs large so I would size down. The colors are not as bright as I thought they would be, which is a good thing. Absolutely loved it!

The dress is simply stunning. Vibrant colors that really stand out. The fabric is so light and flowy. 
Worn with pastel pink flat gladiators and royal blue shades. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Perfect for a hot summer day

review_text: When UPS failed to deliver my original order, RTR saved me, overnighting this selection to my vacation hotel. It was for the best as this dress fit beautifully and was perfect for our evening out. I fit into the 2 but felt most comfortable in the 4. This is a heavy cotton but note it is unforgiving! It's very fitted so lines and problem areas will show! Even the petals I used showed faintly through bodice. Feel confident in your body or invest in shapewear if you opt to rent. I received a ton of nice compliments on the look.  Paired with simple nude pump and minimal jewelry and let sleeves and dress be the focus!

I wasn't sure about the different sleeves on the dress when I received it.  Once I tried it on it look interesting and is incredibly comfortable.  Especially in humid weather.  Paired really nicely with turquoise jewelry.
review_summary: Light and airy for an island dinner

review_text: Perfect! I wore this on vacation! Super fun and casual but can also be dressed up! Loved it! I normally wear a medium but the small fit me better.

This dress was so cute. I couldn't believe how light the fabric was, which was nice. I could've probably gone up a size (the top was very snug on my DD chest) but other than that it fit great. Great for hourglass figures because the waist is pretty small compared to how the rest fits. I loved that it was easy to dress up or down - paired it with sandals for a day of sightseeing in Salzburg!

Rented for a mother daughter trip to California.  It was the perfect travel top.  Very well made and cut but comfortable.  Could wear with slacks or jeans.  I chose to pair with black skinny jeans and several long necklaces. I almost bought it.

This dress is SUPER cute and very lightweight.  I am usually between a 4-6 and I rented the 6 and felt like it was easy to move around in.  The elastic waist band I think would make it that if you are in between sizes you could go either way.  I do agree with other reviewers that they shoulders come up quite a bit.  Overall love this dress - I rented it with my Unlimited and have already worn it twice.

I absolutely loved this dress and wish I owned it!  It was perfect for a special dinner on our honeymoon.  I'm short (5'2") but with 4" shoes the length was almost perfect.  The halter fit great and a little double-sided tape worked great to ensure it didn't gape open in the front.  It was so flowy and comfortable and I'd highly recommend this dress!
Very comfortable
review_summary: Got many compliments night of and next day someone recognized me from the dress.

review_text: Wore this to lunch while on vacation to Maui and loved the fit, pattern, and material for a breezy Maui day!

Its a gorgeous dress but the top part gapes to the point that even a safety pin probably wouldn’t fix it. I’m a D cup and I think I’d have to wear a cami underneath. Unfortunately I’m on vacation so I ended up sending it back without wearing it. Shame because it’s a beautiful dress.
review_summary: Beautiful but not for busty women

review_text: easily one of my fav vacation dresses. the pattern is fun and the dress can be dressed up or down. i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4 and the S is large on me. if you're smaller than me beware that this dress may be too large. i wore it with a thin belt and without, both looked great. i really can't say enough about this dress. it's also a beautiful silk so incredibly comfortable and light. i've rented this dress a few times, i love it!!

Loved this dress and it is adorable on and so much fun!!  I rented it for a vacation though and the fabric is not cotton but a silky fabric so it was to dressy for me to wear.  I will for sure rent it again though!!  I loved it!!
review_summary: So adorable but the fabric is dressy!!

review_text: Internal corset helps the dress stay in place so you're never tugging/pulling/etc.
review_summary: Perfect for a Moroccan getaway. Went to celebrate my bf's 40th bday at a fancy hotel in Marrakech.

review_text: It was such a simple complete outfit, the colors were subtle but bright and easy to throw on, and head out for the day or night!
Long torso makes rompers tough to do, but this one is great! VERY light fabric so excellent for a super hot day or when it might get wet (swim cover).

Fit perfectly and was a nice and comfortable fabric. I wore this to a weekend trip to Charleston and it was so so perfect! I received a ton of compliments from strangers just while walking around. It was definitely a hit!
I am usually a medium and sized up due to previous reviews. I'm glad that I did, because the large fit perfectly. Zero give to this dress.
review_summary: Didn't end up wearing this dress, but it was cute on.

review_text: I'm 5'3.. and about 140 lbs. this dress made me look great!! Its very short- but holds everything in perfectly. It looked great with a tan.. I think its perfect fun sexy flirty dress. Wore it out to the club.
review_summary: This Dress was perfect. I wore it the fist night in Vegas. Received many many compliments. fun dress

review_text: I rented this for a trip to Vegas with my husband and friends and to be honest, I wasn't in love with it when I ordered it but I figured I'd give it a try.  I ordered the 4 and 6 - both fit, but the 6 was a little more comfortable. I ended up wearing it out and got so many compliments - my husband loved it so much I'm trying to find it online to buy!  The fabric is amazing - stretchy but on the thicker side so it hides imperfections. The high neck is conservative but the lace cutouts and lace make are the perfect balance for those.  I wore a backless sticky bra (just b/c I needed some cushioning) and it was great.  Overall a great rental and dress!

I rented this through my unlimited for a vacation to Spain. It's a great dress, but the color wasn't right for my skin. It's a little brighter than I usually go. Would recommend sizing up if you're between sizes, as Elizabeth and James make very form-fitting dresses.

It's not that the dress isn't pretty -- it just has a very specific cut that didn't really work well to flatter my figure.  Also, make sure you have someone else to help you when you're getting dressed because I had to tie the bow by myself and it was a nightmare.  Even when my boyfriend's glamorous, mom tried to help me fix it, she even struggled with it.

HOWEVER -- chances are if you can normally wear off the rack without an issue, you should be just fine fit wise.  Also, it's a Lilly Pulitzer dress. It's beautiful, fun, and the perfect shade of pink!
review_summary: Pretty pink color, flirty fit, beautiful lace detailing

review_text: Fit great, very comfortable.  From the reviews I knew that I was going to have to wear a tank top underneath.  Glad I had planned for it because the snap at the chest wouldn't stay snapped(too busty).  I would definitely recommend this dress for any size and shape.
review_summary: Perfect for casual day to night.

review_text: It was not comfortable or flattering to my body type!

The dress is excellent quality.  It is quite heavy with all the beading.  The dress is not as form fitting as I would have liked, the waist line does not come in much at all in the size 8.  Still it was very fun with all of the feathers.
review_summary: I wore this on formal night for a cruise.  It is a very fun style.

review_text: I was on vacation in Miami and had brought this (and another RTR dress) with me.  It was a beautiful fit; although tight, it moved well and was very comfortable.  I loved that the sequins were so small that it fully complimented the look of the dress without taking away from the cut.

I rented this dress for my birthday weekend in San Diego, CA. I received lots of compliments all day and night.
I rented the Medium & Large, ended up wearing the Large, the Medium was too tight. I could have worn the Medium, but the Large was much more comfortable. I normally wear a size 8 dress, so I was a little surprised that I needed the wear the large, but happy I ordered it. Unfortunately the large was a little too long for me. I'm 5'6" and with 2" heels had to watch my step. I didn't wear a bra with it, but if my chest was larger a strapless bra would be required.
The material was flowed nicely, it wasn't too heavy for a summer evening. Would have been great for a tea party.
This dress is amazing. The way it flows when you walk definitely makes it a head turner. I've actually ended up buying this dress because I love it so much!

This dress is wonderful I rented it for my anniversary photos in Puerto Rico and the yellow color was gorgeous and photographed beautifully. The high-low style is always a great option for me, I'm on 4'11'' and the length was perfect. I wore sandals and so it was floor length on me but didn't drag on the ground. If I wore heels it's still be at a flattering length. This is my second time renting this dress, the first time was when it first debuted and so the bodice was a lot more tight. This time around it was a bit more loose so it fit more true to a 0 instead of a 00. I would still recommend sizing up for the free back-up size if available. The greatest thing about this dress, it has pockets!! One of my favorite rentals!
It fit true to size and wasn't overly short.
review_summary: I wore it for a tropical vacation dinner. It went perfect with wedges and my tan. It fit comfortably

review_text: This dress was definitely a tighter fit and very short. I ended up wearing boy shorts under it so that I would be more comfortable. It is beautiful in person and very flattering!
review_summary: Such a pretty dress for vacation!

review_text:
I was visiting a friend in LA and needed a dress to wear out to a fancy club. I'm glad I ordered a size 0 and 2 after reading reviews about the fit. I would usually order a 2 and 4 but the 0 hugged my figure just right.
I have a small bust, small waist, and wider hips so this dress accentuated my figure nicely. I'm a little taller than 5'5" and the skirt it my mid-thigh. I like to wear short mini skirts so this dress felt more classy and elegant than my average girls night out dress.
The v-shaped neckline was good for balancing out my small chest and gave the illusion of cleavage- nice! The straps were a bit long and kept slipping but since the dress fit so nicely, it didn't bother me. I recommend ordering your regular size and one size smaller- the dress looks best when it hugs your curves.
review_summary: Strutting down the streets of LA in a new designer dress was unforgettable.

review_text: Only con was that the sequins around the legs rubbed some but I didn't notice it too much. I wasn't able to wear a bra with the dress.
review_summary: The dress fit well and was very sparkly!

review_text: I rented this dress for Vegas, but did not end up wearing it. Fit is true to size, and style is great, but beware that the color is construction worker orange! I felt like a walking traffic cone and decided to send it back.
review_summary: Rented for Vegas but didn't end up wearing it

review_text: Lovely fit. I felt so feminine and elegant in this dress!
The dress is a bit of a sack, but I wouldn't have been able to size down because I needed the room in the shoulders/chest. The embroidery is very beautiful! Was cute for a casual day.
Lightweight (leave room for layering if traveling somewhere cold and rainy), not too baggy, basic shape, fun color. Has an adjustable hood too!

I loved the fit of this dress. I decided to size up because it was a bit tight around my tummy in the size 14. We were in Las Vegas in March - so it was a bit chilly at night and this dress kept me pretty warm while still looking super cute!
review_summary: Looking for a comfortable dress that makes you feel sexy? This is the one!

review_text: Paired with jeans, comfortable, hides problem areas and can eat a large meal without showing.  Low cut so had to wear a cami.

LOVE! Of all the things I've rented, this is probably the one I've loved the most. Everything about this sweater was amazing. I rented it for vacation, and I think I ended up wearing it every day. I wore it on the plane, and people stopped me as I was looking for me seat to compliment me. I wore it out to dinner, and someone came over from the next table to ask were I got my sweater. I wore it curled up talking to my family, and my sister and niece kept asking if they could wear it for a bit. And the whole time I was fielding compliments I was comfortable! The body of the sweater is oversized, which I liked, as I could wrap in tight when I was cold for cozy warming, or leave it loose to allow airflow. But the sleeves were fitted, which is turns out is a genius way to make you not look like you're wearing a sack. The colors and patter went with everything, which was a surprise to me. It was soft, and surprisingly light weight, kept me plenty warm in 50ish degree temperature. I'm not sure it could get much colder, but I'm also a total cold wuss. I could wear it with leggings, skinny jeans, dresses, or sweats. I could go on and on, but to sum it up, rent this sweater! You'll be glad.
Fun shirt - wrinkles easy - but it does't ruin the look.  Fit's great.

This was my go-to dress for our Hawaiian vacation.  It can be really casual with flip flops and a sun hat, or dressy with heels and the right chunky jewelry.  Comfortable, stylish and easy to wear- I received tons of compliments.   I really should own this one.

I wore this to an elegant dinner on a cruise for my birthday. I wore the 6L. I normally wear a 4 and the 6 fit like a glove. I am 5 foot almost 11 and the dress skated the floor. I would not have been able to wear heels but that was okay for me. The dress was just drop dead gorgeous. I got so many compliments on it.
review_summary: I felt so amazing the whole night!

review_text: Fit perfectly.  Shoulders, arms, waist length.  If I lived in cooler weather climate, I would own this wonderful warm coat.

I don't have much of a waist but felt the pattern helped provide one but of course it always helps to suck it in and work an angle if you're taking a picture. The dress itself bunched a bit at the waist - I don't know if it's because it's been in rotation for a while or I actually needed a small.
review_summary: A striking dress sure to make it a great night.

review_text: It runs a little small. I wish it was a little stretchier since it does bunch up right under the breasts.
review_summary: I loved taking this dress up to Ojai for the weekend.

review_text: Have rented another skirt and top combo before from a different designer and loved. Wanted the same look, but this skirt looked awful on me. I have wide hips and it just seemed to accentuate them. The top fit, but no reason to wear it alone!

Brittney, a go-to-girl, at the Vegas showroom was soooooo amazing!  She recommended this dress for me, and at first I said no because I was afraid of the color.  She had me try on some other "risque" and just risky (for my taste ) choices and those did not work out.  I was so set to wear Herve, but they just looked horrible on me.  I decided to give this dress a shot since I'm in Vegas and....why the hell not.  IT LOOKED AMAZING!!!  I was shocked!  The fit was good, the length was perfect ( mid thigh) and with my 5.25" heels this dress was a knock out!   The open back was so much fun.  I did use double sided tape, but the good stuff they ran out of so I bought the second best.  It showed a little, which was probably just user error, so I decided to take the tape off and be stuck adjusting the sleeves all night.  I DIDN'T CARE!  This dress was THAT FABULOUS!  I tried on a used size 0, but that was more gaping than the brand new size 2, so I went with the 2.  If I were to purchase this dress new, I probably would try out a 0.  RENT THIS DRESS...it will not disappoint!
Usually wear size 0/2.  Fit perfectly in the waist/hips but the top was way too billowy for my 32C chest.
Loved the colors of the print, it looked beautiful in photos.The cover up runs large, I would suggest sizing down.  Was so easy to wear and extremely comfortable.
i loved the length, i am 5'3". the fit was perfect and the colors were the perfect pop of fun for a night out with friends on vacation.

Very flattering!  This has a nice thick material with a hint of stretch that makes it very comfortable and flattering.  The ruffle is strategically placed to conceal the belly.   The neckline was perfect and very flattering for my chest (34DD)... I wore it on a night out and was wanting to show off the girls a bit, it was great for that.  Based on reviews (& the fact that I knew it had a little stretch), I ordered 2 sizes: 4 and 6.  I wore the 6 but felt like I was a sausage squeezed into its casing.  I really wish I had the 8 to compare... I might've chosen it over the 6 given the chance.

Love it so much, I've rented it 3x! With room in the bust, waist, and hips, I'd recommend ordering your true size. For backup, I'd size up if you're curvier and down if you're smaller framed. The bust area has room, but the open back does not allow for much support. You also need to either go bra-less or wear a nubra. The criss-cross back is the best part and is also adjustable! At 5'7" the length was perfect (not too short or long). Looks awesome with wedges or sandals. Perfect for vacation, spring/summer brunch, or a daytime party.
It was perfectly short
review_summary: This dress was amazing in every way. It was a little short, but I was in Vegas so it was perfect

review_text: Great dress! More comfortable than some of the other herves I've worn. This hot little number will be getting on a plane with me soon to head to Vegas for the weekend.

the fabric on this dress was great! the chest is pretty low cut, i didn't wear a bra, but did use tape... when you lean over, the light fabric gives way a bit. my boyfriend (on the advice of other ladies) put safety pins in under the slide adjustors on the straps. this was a wise move! dress is very long, as i wore flats, i was conscious of this and picked it up when needed as not to trip. the colors are very vibrant and gorgeous!
This top is so comfy and cute. The arm holes are big making it perfect for undergarments that are meant to be seen.
review_summary: This was for a vacation trip to the coast and it made it easy to go from car to the resort.

review_text: LOVE this dress! Rented it for a vacation but didn't have a chance to wear it. Will definitely rent again.

I rented this dress to wear to the opera. I'm usually a 6-8 but rented the 12 based on reviews, which fit perfectly (I think it was because it was European sizing but it was awhile ago so I may be remembering wrong). I am OBSESSED with this dress. It clung in all the right spots, very sexy but still very classy. Hid my belly pooch even without spanx because the material is very thick (which was rough since it was 95 degrees out the night I wore it, but still totally worth it).
A little short but I'm 5'9 and wore heals. The dress is heavy but not uncomfortable.
review_summary: PERFECT for a night out in Vegas!

review_text:
Normally I would be a size small but this dress is made of the kind of material that really sucks you in so I wore a size XS so that it would be form fitting (I have a small rib cage and small chest so the S was too big up top but it fit nicely over my wider hips -- XS fit the same down below too although it was about an inch shorter). 

I got so many compliments all night. It fit like a glove and the print is amazing.  I highly recommend this for a night out.

The material on the inside is satin and feels really nice, although I have long legs and it did feel a little short. I would have bought this piece, yet another RTR I fell in love with!! Can't wait to try out another!
review_summary: Perfect night out outfit for Vegas!

review_text:
Love the print and color of this dress. It's super versatile. Easy to dress up or down. Running true to size. I would recommend sizing down because the style of the dress is more over-sized. With room in the waist and hips, this dress is great for a variety of body types. The bust is comfortable, but more fitted, so maybe you would prefer a larger size. The fabric is light and comfortable which makes the dress easy to wear. The high neckline and longer hem make it suitable for mobility. At 5'4 this dress fit about knee length. Love it with heels, flats or sandals. 

As for my measurements; 13" from shoulder to shoulder, 13" from shoulder to waist, 20" from waist to knee, 17" from hip to knee.
Adorable for cover up...free flowing and comfortable. Very simple piece which received many compliments
The fit is perfect! The only reason I could not wear this piece for my night out is because my plans got canceled. Well made and creates a beautiful shape.
review_summary: Beautifully fitting jumpsuit. Did not wear for my night out, though.

review_text: I am pretty curvy in my butt area so a few of the jumpsuits I've ordered from RTR are a bit too tight - but this one fit like a glove.  The top cuts down quite a bit and it was a little large in that area, but I just used some fashion tape and problem solved!  I added a different belt to dress it up a little, but overall great fit and super comfortable!!
review_summary: Great for a night out in NYC

review_text: The dress fit really well! Exactly what I wanted.  The fabric on the dress held in everything superbly. I just wouldn't recommend the strapless style for girls with smaller boobs though, unless you've got a good push-up strapless bra, as one of my friends tried on the same one, and it totally flattened her out.
review_summary: Had a great time in Vegas with my girls, in my Herve!

review_text: I love the weight of the material. It was very light and airy. Wore it with cut offs and red wedges!

I didn't get a chance to snap a photo but the dress was beautiful, comfortable! It was a little tight around the neck for me. I did wear a regular bra with the dress but the clasp in the back of bra was visible.
review_summary: Worn For a Day Date In Roma!

review_text: Comfortable to wear, flowy

Overall I loved wearing this jumpsuit and the way it looked.  The fabric is thick and forgiving, and the openings in the top give a sexy look without going overboard.  My only complaint is the length.  I am 5'7" and wore 2 inch heels and wish I had packed flats, because the pants were a bit short on me.
review_summary: Felt great in this jumpsuit in Vegas!

review_text: This dress is amazing! Runs small but is very flattering! Able to wear a regular bra with it. Wasn't too short for me but I am only 5'1" Will likely rent again!

The dress was an easy fit with a little stretch in the fabric. I like the color and pattern. There was definitely some wear and tear in the dress--the lining in the front was longer than the dress was.
The only reason I'm giving this a 4 is because it was a bit too big on me and I'd prefer if it were a tad shorter. Great dress for vacay, dinner, party etc. I wore it dressed down w/ flats.
review_summary: Love the color + cut - sexy in a subtle way.

review_text: Fun, easy dress for the summer! I liked the deep pink color and the ribbon tie in the back!  My only complaint is that although the dress fits loosely and comfortably, the high neck felt a bit like a turtleneck.  Otherwise, it was a fun rental!

This dress is well-made. There's boning along the sides of the top to help keep it up and prevent it from "digging in" to my chest. The fabric is of good quality and the silky lining makes it comfortable to wear. The straps in the back have hooks with eyes and it fit me well, but for those who might need it - it could be adjusted with a pin. LOVE this dress!
Fit perfect, except short when sitting down.
review_summary: On a warm day at the Napa Valley vineyards it was super comfy and fun!

review_text: This dress doesn't mess around. It looks sexy and has that, 'I am a strong woman!" look. Bold and beautiful and classy all at the same time. I didn't end up wearing it though, because another dress I recieved was the better choice for the look I was going for.
review_summary: Nice stretch to it. Strong looking.

review_text: I love this top! Its the perfect weekend top. You can wear it to a summer festival or to brunch! It has an elastic band around the opening, making it very adjustable. Because of the beautiful and detailed  lace overlay, it can be considered a crop top. You can pair it with high waisted shorts for a casual look.

This dress was perfect for a summer weekend in the mountains. The dress is super comfy and can be dressed up or down. I wore it with high heeled strapy navy heels but it could easily be worn with flights for a day look. This was also a style I normally would not wear, but it was really cute. There is a hint of pink in the pattern that I didn't notice in the pictures.

Great dress! wore it in Vegas. I was worried because it was a bit heavy on the hanger but after you put it on it's ok. The sequins might get a bit scratchy at the end of the night but it was manageable. The dress looks great on and walks well. I wore a M but could have also worn the S. The difference is how busty you want to look, the dress has a nice stretch in it.

I love, love, love this dress. I wore it to dinner on vacation with my boyfriend for our anniversary. My only disappointment was that the size 2 was not unavailable because I wish the fit was a bit more snug. Otherwise, I wish I could own this dress and wear it everyday.
Great for layering and perfect length for wearing over skinny pants or leggings.
review_summary: In love. This cape was amazing for my vacation - stylish & warm and perfect for walking about.

review_text: This dress is comfortable, interesting and easy to wear. The fabric is sort of thin and white (other than the print), so I am glad I sized up (and why I gave 4 stars. Who wants a potentially tight white dress? ;) The cut out is sexy without being too much. I wouldn't mind this being in my closet! Fun!
review_summary: Easy to wear and unique. Tons of compliments!

review_text: I rented this for a Memorial Day weekend trip to Austin. It was about 90 degrees or more while I was there, so I really needed an outfit that would make me feel comfortable in the heat while touring around. This dress was just what I was looking for. I love the pattern and the lightweight fabric--although for that reason, it's not a good dress for a windy place! The bust had a lot of room in it (I am a 36DDD and did not have a problem with the buttons). As a whole, the dress runs large. Would rent again.

Pros - The lining in the dress and the sequenced outer layer hide those little flaws on the curves.  It supports very well with its spandex-y feel.  I'm a C-cup, didn't wear a bra and had absolutely no problem with lift or "headlights".  I'm usually a Medium, but felt comfortable in a Large.  Definitely a show-stopper!
Cons - The sequence is a bit rough around the underarms, but not enough to cause any damage.  Honestly, the dress barely has a Con.  It was fun and comfy!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a night out in Milano, Italia and it was perfect fit with the city's vibe!

review_text: bizarre length
review_summary: couldn't even wear this, the cut of it was so weird.

review_text: Made me appear larger than I am, and that's never a good thing! I would have sized down, and perhaps that would have made a difference. Definitely not figure flattering.

I wore this on vacation. It traveled well and the silk felt wonderful on my skin. It was just a little too short, but I'm used to that and it didn't bother me.  The long length wasn't available so I knew going in that it would be too short.  I didn't wear a bra with this which is unusual for me but the dress was loose enough that I felt comfortable.

Snagged this maxi originally for tropical vacation and kept it for a few other wears.  Nice, flattering fit and the fabric pattern is bright and cheerful without being garish.  Despite the R-regular length, this maxi is extremely long even when worn with large wedges.  This style should compliment any array of body types.
Loved it
review_summary: Stunning dress and very body flattering

review_text:
Fit: Runs small; no zipper in the back so had to squeeze into it (I think a S would be too large on me)
Pros: Love the rose gold color of this dress
Cons: Hair kept sticking to the dress; it was longer than I expected (almost to the top of my knee)

Overall, great dress to wear to Vegas.
review_summary: Wore this for a Vegas show and got a lot of double takes with this dress!

review_text:
I rented this dress for a bachelorette trip to Vegas. I usually wear either a 12 or a 14 in dresses, depending on the fabric and construction/style. The 14 fit better on me because the waist was structured (not much give, which is good for this kind of material).  It was a beautiful color and the cut was incredibly flattering - hides hips and stomach.  The sequins are VERY sparkly (I wanted them to be a little more matte/subdued since it was head-to-toe sequins).

Unfortunately, I didn't get to wear it since it was my 4th dress for only 3 nights, but I would have if we stayed another night.  You definitely don't need many accessories since this is a statement piece on its own.

I wore this to a dinner with my fiance while we were on vacation in the DR. Let me tell you - he could not take his eyes off me. The dress is super sexy, made of a scuba type material but was definitely comfortable even in tropical weather. I was able to eat a full dinner and didn't feel like I was being constrained. Only thing is it was a bit short for me since I have a decent booty, so if you're not comfortable with that, I might proceed with caution.

I rented this for vacation.  It is comfortable, flattering, and the material is soft.  The neckline seemed a bit stretched out, but that was OK.  I wore it out at night for a casual dinner and drinks and it was perfect.  Great summer outfit.
Loved this top! Wore it during my 4th of July trip to Nashville. Really low cut but it worked for going out on vacation. Very flattering fit and super cute pattern. Almost wanted to buy it!
review_summary: Sexy top for a night out

review_text:
I wore this in Vegas out celebrating my birthday.  It was very comfortable and I felt so sexy.  I received a bunch of complments from complete strangers.  I would highly recommend this dress.

The size small was not available so I tried on a medium which was pretty baggy.  I didn't think the extra small would fit, but the dress was so stretchy it fit perfectly.  It hugged all my curves and I wasn't spilling out anywhere.  Definitely a great dress for an hourglass figure.
The back is very low so I could not wear a bra with it. Runs large.
review_summary: This is a great dress and the pattern is awesome.

review_text:
Bought this because: 
-Did not wrinkle in luggage
-Modest-sexy
-Fun with waist slits
-Easy to sit in
-Hides tummy and hips

The shoulder pads were really puffy which me look like I had big shoulders. I rented with my unlimited so I sent it back right away and did not wear it out. The material was sturdy and color very pink.
review_summary: Very pink color. I ended up sending it back right away due to the shoulder pads.

review_text: It fit perfectly
review_summary: So fun.  Wore with a cute pair of yellow sandals!

review_text: Adorable romper. Tons of compliments. It does run a tad big. I am a solid 6 and the 4 was my back up and it was big..loved it!

True to size. I typically wear 6-8 and have to get long but the 6 R fit well, plenty long. 

Zipper was a little frustrating but nonetheless a great dress
love the back

Beautiful dress but the top was huge. It looks like a nice clean halter in the photo but has this extra piece of fabric that sorta hangs down. I was a little bummed when I tried it on. Maybe if I size down I'd like it more.
great flowy dress that is perfect for a beach vacation

this dress was for a night in Vegas. As others mentioned the sequins do rub under your arm a bit, not awful and it does run a little small. Doesn't fit like a shift would. It was fine but didn't love it.
This was perfect for a night guest bartending for charity and for a night out with the girls.  Not just another boring black top. Rather cropped so I wore it with a black tank top.
review_summary: A more interesting dressy black top for a night out

review_text: The print on this dress is gorgeous and the fit is so flattering and feminine.  Sexy while still ladylike.  The top needs tape if you have a larger chest.  I am keeping this for another event. I love it!
review_summary: I wore this on vacation in Mexico

review_text: I was hesitant about this dress because it was so loose and I tend to like things a little more form fitting, but it really was perfect.  I had to wear a bandeau because the arm holes were so large, but I expected that from the other reviews.  The material was thick, but not too thick.  It wasn't too heavy - just plush and nice.  The pockets were good to have - as usual - who doesn't love a dress with pockets? I wore simple flats since we were in Palm Springs, but this would have gone great with wedges or heels too.  The dress is really universal and would look good one anyone. I only got an S so I didn't get to see how a larger or smaller size would have looked or what the differences would be, but it's definitely true to size and I could have probably easily worn a size up or a size down and only had a length difference pretty much.  I also ordered the Yumi Kim Blue Liz Romper and my friend is wearing it next to me in the photo, so if you are considering renting that one, there it is.  And it is just as fabulous as this Mara Hoffman.
review_summary: Perfect for Palm Springs (and my sunburn)

review_text: Perfect for vacation! Loved this beautiful print! This style runs true to size. I had plenty room for give at the bust for a B cup. The elastic waist band cinches in at the smallest part of your waist for a very flattering cut. The neckline plunges just at the bust I would recommend going bra-less due to the very open back. I am 5'3 with a 3.5 inch heel and the style still ran quite long on me. The fabric has little to no stretch and is best for vacation, casual event or everyday. This is best paired with a bold lip and a metallic bangle.
Dress was cute however i felt the little ribbon didn't do much justice for the dress. For a short pear shape figure not a flattering dress

Absolutely love this romper. I rented through unlimited and it's the one piece that I just can't seem to let go of. It fits great, is super comfortable and light (even it's black, it'll keep you cool), and incredibly flattering.

My sister and I went to Vegas to see Britney Spears and this jumpsuit was perfect! It was incredibly comfortable and sexy! The V-neck was on the lower side, but with the clip attached, I never felt uncomfortable or too "out there". My sister even rented a matching jumpsuit from the Rent The Runway store in Vegas and loved her's as well! Highly recommend!

I rented this for an upcoming vacation and am sending it back for a smaller size. The color is beautiful and it's lined which makes it easy to wear wherever. However, it definitely runs large. I ordered a medium, which is my usual dress size, and the elastic waste was hidden by an overly blousey top. I think a small will end up being perfect.
review_summary: Very cute dress but runs large

review_text: I loved the fit of the dress. It was small through the chest and I was slightly concerned with my chest slipping out at bottom, a sticky bra helped. I would not rent if you are large chested; however, overall a cute dress. The lace and cut outs gave a basic LBD a unique twist.

I didn't end up wearing this as the fit was not quite right. The material is nice and the cut would be great though my feel is it works better for straighter, smaller chested figures. Would be beautiful with nude or black pumps! RTR had great replacement dresses in stock for my trip
