First time renting a non dress item, and not sure if I will do it again.  The shirt worked okay, but I normally live in such soft stretchy fabric it was weird for me, and just don't think I'll do it again.

I was super excited to wear this jumpsuit on my vacation in Las Vegas.  However, when I received it in the mail both sizes ran way too small.  I'm 5'3", athletic build with a small bust (34A) and weigh 125 lbs...typically wearing a size 2R.  The back and chest area run extremely tight and I could barely get the zipper zipped up all the way.  It would have been next to impossible to go to the bathroom without a friend assisting.  The crotch was also very loose for someone my height, which makes me think a size 6R would have been way too big in that area.
The length of the jumpsuit was pretty good, and the cut of the neckline was very flattering.  I just wish I would have been able to wear it.
review_summary: Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear the jumpsuit due to it being too small.

review_text: I am 5'2"/ XS, and I ordered according to the sizing chart, and the dress was huge on me!! Even with platforms there was a few inches of fabric pooling around the bottom, and the top was not fitted at all. However, it is a gorgeous dress that can be dressed up or down, so if you rent it I would suggest going a size or 2 down and I'm sure it would look fabulous:)
review_summary: I you are 5'4" or smaller get the petite!!

review_text: I wore this on a beach vacation. The print is gorgeous! I am usually a size 6 and the size 6 fit like a glove. I was worried it would be super short because of my 6 foot frame, but it wasn't! The material was semi-stretchy and thick. I would say the bust runs small. I am only a 34A/B and it was fitted. Awesome dress, would love to own!

This is the cutest romper, the pattern is adorable, I love the slit in the back.  The material was a really nice lightweight silk, so comfortable.  I only wish this would have fit better, the rise was super short so I felt like it hit at a really unflattering spot on my waist, however if I would have sized up the whole thing would have been too big....
I was worried I wouldn't be able to keep it on, but it has a great unique structure to it that makes it seem like some dark magic is keeping it on your body.

At first I was worried the dress wouldn't zip so I called RTR for help. They were great! Since I was in Vegas they offered to exchange the dress at their Cosmopolitan store. Luckily with a little tug. the dress was a perfect fit. Hig hugging and very slimming. Another success from RTR!
review_summary: Perfect for a Vegas trip with the girls!

review_text: Lots of compliments and can be dressed up for work, or worn casual on vaca.

I loved this dress. It was so much fun!  Perfect for Vegas!  Think it would also be fun for NYE. I did not want to take this dress off.  Flattering cut, this is second dress I have rented by Mark & James by Badgley Mischka and both were gorgeous sparkles and awesome fit. Beware its very very shiny and attention getting, but I loved being a disco ball for an evening.
runs small
Very cute.  Really need a navy tank to match
review_summary: Very flowy and fun vacation skirt

review_text: I think this is my favorite RTR rental to date. Sorry, the picture turned out dark and doesn't do the dress justice. I wore this out on a cool Vegas night and it kept me warm while still being super sexy. As other reviewers mentioned, the zipper on the left side of your body does tend to stick out a bit, but I was able to smooth it out enough to where it didn't bother me. Other reviewers also mentioned husbands/boyfriends loving this dress and it couldn't be more true. My husband kept commenting on it all night. Ladies, you're going to love this dress, and it's super comfortable. I wore it with black swede ankle boots since it was cool out, and it was super cute!
review_summary: Look HOT on a cooler night out!!!

review_text: Easy dress, darling cut and fun to wear white.
Elegant with jeans or black capris! I wore it with black satin shorts. Beautiful color, not a harsh maroon.
review_summary: This is a gorgeous top. The style is very flattering, longer in the back and sides. Will reorder!

review_text: This dress fit me perfectly! I even had random strangers tell me how much they loved my dress, just walking around Las Vegas. I wore it on two different days, I loved it that much! I can't wait to buy this.

I loved the print of this dress. I wore it in Greece and it was perfect for a night out, but I decided to wear it while walking around the towns. The dress was a little short on me, but besides that, it was great! Would definitely wear it again.
review_summary: Beautiful print and perfect for vacation!

review_text:
I adored this dress, plus I got engaged in it, so it's extra special! 
Despite its tight fit, this dress is quite slimming. The material is light and stretchy so it was perfect for a tropical climate. The dress is quite a bit shorter than it appears on the model. I am 6' and the large hit my mid shin.
review_summary: Unforgettable dress, for an unforgettable night!

review_text: I liked this dress a lot, although it was very heavy for a beach vacation. It really looked great on and the cut out at the stomach is a perfect detail to add something interesting without being over the top. The only downsides were that the material presses against your skin a little too much around the cut out which can look kind of unflattering and that it really was heavy for a warm day.

Fit was AWESOME! I am very busty (34DDD) but this dress was so well constructed that I could go without a bra. That being said , I think that if you are smaller chested you will need some type of double tape. But it is very rare that I can wear something without an under garment and still feel like I have great support. The detailing in the form of the dress is amazing, if you have an hour glass shape this dress just drapes amazingly. Probably my most favorite dress to date with RTR. Sorry for the crummy photo...I am not usually a picture taking girl :)

I got this dress for a nice dinner on vacation. I loved it. I wish I could share the pictures but my phone got stolen on vacation. But it looked really flattering for someone like me that is big everywhere. It made my stomach look smaller and made me feel very sexy! It fits true to size. At first I thought it was going to be too tight around the bust but it zipped just fine and then felt great. May want to wear Spanx or something to help smooth out and for the record, my bf said that it wasn't short enough lol

The fit was a bit tighter than I expected, probably because the sequins are clingy. Also shorter and more low-cut than I anticipated (but that was fine for Vegas!) Definitely need to weak Spanx to smooth things out. Otherwise, it was comfortable and fun for a long night out.
review_summary: This was a great dress for Las Vegas...I felt like a disco ball!

review_text: Easy, summery, and bright! Loving this shirt dress by Mara Hoffman. We recommend ordering your true size and one size up for backup. With room in the bust, waist, and hips, this style is super comfy and flowy. The fabric has a slight stretch and the cut makes it easy to wear with a standard bra. Pair with sandals and a satchel!

When I saw this dress I fell in love and I had to have it for summer and vacation! It was so comfortable and the 10 fit great! Only thing was its super long if you are short. I didn't mind though I just lifted it anytime I had to walk. I am an unlimited member and this is going to be my staple peice for the summer!

I wore this in New Orleans for brunch and walking around the french quarter. Felt at home sipping coffee at Cafe Du Monde in this number. It fit great i wore it with sandals and a gold belt to accentuate my waist.  Would rent again.
review_summary: super cute piece. Casual and stylish. very easy to wear.

review_text: Do not order if you have a tum. Better for tall girls.
review_summary: LOVE this dress! Felt chic, fun and flirty

review_text: Not able to wear a bra with this one, and I'm a modest 34b so it's not like I usually have this problem. Size up, it's a cute vacation dress if you can get your boobs into it and breathe.

I got a size 8 at the store so it ran large on me. A smaller size would've fit better. The top was comfortable but it bulged a bit in the front, above the drawstring waistline (Could've been the size that is too big for me). It was very pretty and a perfect summer top that can go from day to night.

Loved the pattern and the pop of color. Nice and fun for Miami, but not form fitting and is a true sheath. My only complaint was that the material is not the best for warmer weather, as it does not breathe at all.
unless your under 30...wear spanx.  This will showcase all the curves

Modest but pretty, pretty cut. Runs a little bigger around the waist, so you may want to consider getting the size down as a back-up, depending on how fitted you'd like to wear this. Appropriate V-neck and length for a conservative office environment as well. Highly recommend!
review_summary: Perfect day to night dress for vacation

review_text: This dress is a very thin, cool material and very flowy.  The fit was great.  I would recommend this dress
Soft fabric, runs true to size. Effortless comfort and style. Love!

Unlike most maxis, this one is figure hugging and really slims at the waist. If you like to show off your curves this is a good choice. The fabric is thin so probably won't be super forgiving. 
It is also not too long for me, I was able to wear this with almost flats(1 inch off the ground).

Loved this romper. The quality is great and was comfortable to wear all day. The waistband was a bit tighter than I thought for a size medium, but I pulled it up to be at the smallest part of my waist which worked well. I would rent it again!
despite it running large in the top and legs the waist is tight. I loved it!! it was So comfortable!
review_summary: I wore it out in vegas. It was cute, the cleavage made it sexy, but so comfy!

review_text: The color is stunning and the fabric is so light and airy; it's just perfect for everyday wear! It was versatile enough to dress up or keep it casual and it withstood packing beautifully!  I would love to own this on and hated to send it back.  I will definitely rent it again.

I had originally ordered this dress for a girl's night out in Vegas to see Britney Spears. RTR contacted me a week before the rental to let me know that my dress would not be available, and to pick another few dresses to chose from. When my order arrived, it turns out that they still sent the backup size of this dress along with the new dress. Although the new dress looked great as well, I decided to go with this one. I have to say customer service was A+++ on this!!

I'm usually a 6 or an 8, so I originally thought medium would be the best choice for me. However, I liked the fit of the large. The dress was very cleavage intensive and rode up quite a bit during the night, but I never felt uncomfortable or exposed. I'm generally not a flashy dresser, but this was the perfect time to go all out! I would NOT suggest this dress for a wedding, formal gathering or family event, but it is definitely a "hot date" or night out dress.
review_summary: Great dress for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: This dress is fits true to size and is easy to wear and extremely stretchy.  It great for a summer daytime or nighttime occasion. The v-neckline comes down to a nice point and the bust area is stretchy and supportive.
I wore this as a beach coverup on my honeymoon and felt so sophisticated, even just lounging by the pool. This dress goes best with a pina colada and a cute suit underneath!
It's a lot looser than I expected, but I liked the comfortable larger fit and it was very warm! I didn't realize it came with black sleeves, which were a really nice detail.
review_summary: Perfect to wear on our wine tasting trip with cold weather!

review_text: This dress was so beautiful and fit perfectly.  I thought it was super sexy while still remaining classy.  Perfect for a fancy night out in Vegas.

Very versatile...I wore it over a swimsuit for boating and later with Brown satin shorts and wedges. With a nude strapless bra, this shirt is not as transparent as it seems. It's a keeper!  I may buy this one!

Had this dress delivered to wear on Easter during a vacation to California.  So nice to have it show up in CA without having to pack a dress in my luggage.  Very nice quality and appropriate for the casual occasion.

I ordered the XS and S. 
Very flattering in black, being 5'7" it was super short though. I ended up wearing the XS. I thought the S would give more length, but the only difference between the two sizes was the S was baggier in the waste.
There's a button near the chest that you don't need to button, depending on the look you're going for. I would definitely rent this again. Very easy to dress up or dress down.
review_summary: Loved this. Wore it on a caribbean vacation.

review_text: The color, fit and length are really nice for a tropical vacation.  I was extremely comfortable in this dress.
review_summary: I rented this for vacation.  The color is vibrant and it was a lightweight fabric for a warm evening

review_text: Fit is perfect and comfortable. Only concern is the cutout under chest area. Felt a little odd and would fold out and reveal black material at times.
review_summary: Fun dress to wear all day!

review_text: I brought this with me for my trip to the beach. Wore it all day, and then transitioned it into night by adding makeup and accessories. Very comfortable, very cute. As other reviews say, the top is a little tight if you have boobs, but I just left one button undone and wore a cute black lace bralette. Was a little disappointed it didn't come with the waist tie.

This dress definitely had that Vegas flare. Very pretty and sparkly. Although the comfort level just wasn't there. There was a bit too much fabric in the shoulder straps, so I was constantly adjusting my top and trying to put my boobs back where they belong. The sequins irritated my underarms. I still received compliments from a few women in the casino, saying the dress was stunning.

I go between a 0 and 2, but the 2 was unavailable.  The 0 was super tight in the chest (even though I am small chested), but then too shapeless throughout the rest of the dress.  The fabric was really pretty, but the style just did not work for me.
review_summary: Too tight at the top, pretty fabric

review_text: As noted it's pretty short. The size that fit me in the bottom and middle was pretty tight across my chest and arms, however I have broad shoulders. The material is VERY thick, so do not plan to wear this in a hot climate. I brought it on vacation to Miami and there was no way I could wear it!

Three weeks traveling Italy, and this dress was a trooper.  Never wrinkled.  Relaxed/sheath waist meant enjoying pasta was not a problem. Always looked crisp.  The lining is a tad heavy, which meant the fabric did not breathe well, so maybe not the coolest option if you're going to out in the sun for an extended period.  Hem hit mid-thigh on me.
Wore it for the day during a girls weekend out. It was very comfortable. It did run a tad bit loose on the waist but was snug on my chest

I was SOOOO nervous about the cut out, but it turned out pretty conservative.  Being somewhat well-endowed in the chest, the v cut turned out a little lower than I would have liked, but I only packed 1 dress per day!  I actually got a ton of compliments on this and apparently shouldn't have worried about the risqué factor.
Fit well, and the fabric was very thick so it was warm and also hid problem areas well.  But fashion tape doesn't stick well to this fabric, which-given the neckline- made it a little uncomfortable
review_summary: Great sexy dress that fits well and hides problem areas because of thick fabric

review_text:
I loved wearing this dress.  It was very cold in NYC just before Christmas and this dress, with gloves and coat were perfect for a night out on the town.  The dress is a fun little sexy number.  Only downside was zipping it up by myself as the sleeves are tight around the upper arms but I finally managed.  Men and women complimented me on the dress and my date absolutely went gaga.  
Runs a little tight around the upper arms and rib cage but accentuated my figure and legs.
review_summary: Wore this to Broadway show in NYC.  Strangers were complimenting me on the dress.

review_text: I"m normally a size 2 but based on reviews I ordered the 0 for my backup and good thing I did! The size 2 ran large and the 0 fit like a glove (I'm 5'4" and 119lbs).  The size 2 also had a hole on the chest and was about 5 shades lighter than the size 0, it looked like it had been washed a few too many times...luckily the size 0 looked almost as good as new (apart from the lining at the bottom coming away from the lace but that was easily hidden).
review_summary: Overall I am happy with the rental however I would expect better quality in rentals for the $$.

review_text: The sizing ran large. There was too much material on top and my bra/breasts were constantly popping out. Tried to fix with Hollywood fashion tape but the dress was a double layer so it had trouble staying in place.

This dress was a replacement for a dress that wasn't available to ship.  It's probably ok for someone who is very tall. It was weirdly long overall (the pockets were almost at my knees), and the straps were just too long for my petite frame.  I was able to use dress tape to help hold it up (and I wore a denim jacket) so I could make it work.
That said, the back is really cute and the fabric has a nice feel to it. If you're into long, loose dresses, this could be a good pick.
Loved the fit of this dress and the material had a slight stretch that made it comfortable while not sacrificing the overall look.
review_summary: Great mix of classy and sexy!  Got so many compliments!

review_text: Initially I got the small and it kept falling down (the top isn't too tight which is great because it doesn't cause skin to hang over but my waist is pretty small so the tight midsection didn't hold it up enough) but when I got the XS I fell in love. It's so slimming but it still is not super form fitting. Beautiful!
review_summary: Loved this dress so much I bought it!

review_text: I loved this dress! One of my favorite rentals so far. The bell sleeves are super cute and the drawstring waist helped flatter my figure. Only negatives to this dress were the sleeves were a bit tight on my upper arms (I also need to hit the gym so maybe that's just me!) and print is unique to each dress, and thankfully I liked the way the print was on the size that fit me best. Wish I could buy this!!
Loved the different pattern and texture of the dress. A nice one to kick off a vacation or summer night out.
review_summary: A cute dress for the honeymoon

review_text: Slightly tight, but overall great fit. Super flattering and fun.
review_summary: Great fit! Was so fun for our bachelorette weekend.

review_text: I wore this dress in Vegas for a night out - dinner and bar/casino hopping. It was December and chilly outside, and I appreciated the long sleeves. The dress was a little big on me in some places (shoulders, back) but also very short (it rode up when I sat down), so I don't think I would have sized down. The color is very vibrant and the cut is really attractive.
review_summary: Sexy lace dress for colder weather

review_text: This dress is so beautiful and so much fun! Know that you most likely wont be able to wear a bra, even a strapless bar was visible in the front and back of the dress. This dress is very heavy with a ton of fabric and was pretty tricky to shimmy into - size up!
It was a bit snug and I normally wear an 8, but it was manageable and I enjoyed wearing it.
review_summary: I absolutely loved the color and style of the dress. Classy but fun

review_text: I rented this for my trip to Paris but I actually wore it to see Hamilton in Chicago and then all day touring the Louvre and then straight to dinner. It was very figure flattering on and comfortable. I would rent again and would consider purchase
Loved it. Very flattering.
review_summary: ordered the mystery bling (bracelet shown) complimented the dress perfectly.

review_text: Very flattering and true to size.  Was right at my knee, at 5'2.

I wore the dress to dinner at the beach.  The fit was fabulous.  I usually wear a Medium but having a larger bust I needed the Large (my backup size) in this dress.  The material does wrinkle quickly, it even arrived a little wrinkled.

Great piece and super fun to wear.  I would have liked a little extra room in the 2, but it was way too long even with pretty high heels (and I'm 5'6/5'7), so I wore the 0.  Still comfortable and easy to move in.

This is a super striking and bold choice for a jumpsuit.  It is very long though and you definitely cannot wear flats with it.  I wore it for a photoshoot in Portugal and it stood out without a doubt!
Fit and flare.
review_summary: Super cute black skirt with some flare

review_text: It is very "in " item but if it is hot outside the long sleaves will not work and when its cold the shorts dont seem  adequate

Odd stitching on the dress that cant be seen in the picture. Loved that it had pockets, but it also has pockets on the chest...cant really notice them, but interesting. Did not end up wearing as was too tight in the waist area. and no give in the fabric If you have larger breasts, would not recommend as the fabric gaps on the side.
The medium was a little big around the under arm but it wasn't a big deal at all! The dress was beautiful, you can dress it up or down depending on your event! Loved it!
review_summary: I wore this dress for my birthday weekend!

review_text: This dress was very pretty but I definitely should have gotten the 0 because the 2 was way too big. It just didn't give my body any shape at all. I also thought the material was going to be more sheer, lightweight and flowy but it was much thicker, heavier and stiffer than I had imagined. So glad I have the unlimited membership to try out as many dresses as I want!
review_summary: Pretty lace and nice detailing, just a little too big.

review_text: I wore this to my birthday dinner in Miami and my husband loved it so much he wanted me to purchase it. Perfectly fitting, flattering and so much fun to wear!

I rented this dress for vacation as a birthday dress! I rented a size large. It fit great! I love the cut and the strap in the back came up high enough to hide my one area of bulging back fat! Lol The only thing I will mention that I noticed after wearing the dress is that it had an additional clasp at the top near your breasts to adjust the degree of cleavage. Had I known this, I would have used the extra clasp as I am a bit busty. However, everything else was great! The cut in the front is a bit high so you can’t wear any shapewear or it will show. But honestly the quality and thickness that the material of the dress provides  allows you to go without it. It was definitely a glittery showstopper that made me feel absolutely stunning while wearing it. I am a curvy girl and had gained a few lbs so I had my reservations about it possibly fitting too snuggly, but it fit perfectly! I totally recommend it! I felt confident and stunning ✨✨ also received so many compliments when I wore it!

The fit was perfect. This style dress flatters my figure the best. It was on the long side, well below my knees, but that's what I was hoping for from reading the other reviews. The colors were very striking, as well.
review_summary: Great dress for a vacation night out with coworkers

review_text: Great fabric, clingy but still comfortable. Only con the slit be cautious when walking.
review_summary: I ordered this dress for my birthday and loved it so much! Hopefully it's around to order again.

review_text: Overall great dress for a vacation. Fit was great. The sleeves are held up by a tie in the back (versus an elastic on similar styles) and it would occasionally loosen up which was annoying, but overall I enjoyed it.
I like this dress, but I am normally a Large and a Small is still way too big in this style. Very confortable dress however.
The fit was loose and flowy.  I wore my usual size S.
review_summary: Great for a casual outdoor day.

review_text: It is tight and form fitting, but the material isn’t too stiff so it is still comfortable to wear.
review_summary: I wore this for date night out in Vegas.

review_text: I am short, but I felt tall and glamorous in this dress. I did wear nearly 4" platform sandals and it hit the floor, so don't expect to wear this with flats unless you are nearly 5'8"!  I have a narrow shoulders, a large bust, small waist and large hips, and find long dresses hard to fit--but this worked so well. I got a lot of compliments!
got lots of complements - really fun to wear
review_summary: so fun to wear - perfect for dancing in

review_text: Love this quirky dress by Saloni! The way the dress moves makes it so breathable and easy to wear. It does run a bit small so I would recommend sizing up or at least sizing up for your backup size. This is completely different from my original style but I am really into how unique this is. There is a slip underneath and is at the perfect length to make this ready to wear. Make sure to pair this with some simple shoes to a chilly music festival or even sightseeing on vacation!

I love this dress!  Unfortunately, I haven't had a chance to wear it yet.  I was just getting some ideas for an upcoming trip to Maui.  I usually wear a 6 or 8 dress.  I ordered the 6 and it fit perfectly.  With the open lower back and short skirt, I thought it wasn't appropriate for work, but will be great for an evening out during the summer or even for a daytime party. The fabric was very thick and beautiful.  Loved the colors too.  Will definitely rent again for my trip!  I just hope it's available when I need it.

I wore this dress in Key West.  It was comfortable and lots of fun to wear.  Like all Clover Canyons that I've worn, it did need to be pulled back down from time to time but I wore it on the airplane to Miami, in the car as we drove through the Keys, and then out that night.  It was comfortable the whole time, didn't wrinkle, and looked great.  It was shorter than some Clover Canyons so it wasn't too hot, but the material is definitely that scuba material that stretches with your body.

I rented this dress for my husbands work trip to Santa Barbara.  The fabric was so nice and I loved how the dress flowed.  Per other reviews and being 24 weeks pregnant I rented a large and that was exactly the size I needed.  I gave this dress a 4 star because the neck was so tight!  If you hate things tight on your neck, this dress is not for you.  This dress would be perfect for a outdoor wedding or bridal/baby shower.  And yes it is bump friendly at 24 weeks!
It fit absolutely perfect.
review_summary: It was the PERFECT outfit for going out! I was the center of attention.

review_text: Now I am not skinny (195 lbs at 5'9") and no super model, but I felt like one in this dress. I also got the 16L and was able to wear the 14L for my size and height. I could do the 14R next time, but I did like the formal feel of my dress dragging on the floor with my High heels. I did not trip, but I will just get the 14R next time for all my dress's. True fit. During the week of Cursing I had 3 dress's on board, ladies night after night were waiting to see my next fabulous dress all from Rent the Runway. What a great experience and hope this comes to Canada in the near future. Thank you for making me feel beautiful.
review_summary: 12th Anniversary Cruise and I felt and looked great all week with all the dresses I had to wear.

review_text: I wore this dress during a vacation to New Orleans. The material is thick, so it is good for a cooler night. I usually wear size XS or S in shirts and dresses. Even the small was very tight and short on me, so I paired it with black tights. Overall it is a great dress for a fun night out.
At 5'10" it's really only suitable as a bathing suit cover up---but very cute!

Heavier fabric tolerated windy environment without fear of the skirt blowing but still comfortable for warm, humid weather. Fitted torso covered regular bra but bottom flowed well and flattering to legs.
I loved the cut and silhouette of this jumper. It was a great fit, super comfortable and light enough for the Miami heat.

Okay, I loved this dress. However, I'm glad I went with a size up (6) for my second size instead of a size down or I would have been out of luck. It was pretty tight fitting. My only other complaint is that the dress is surprisingly thicker than you would think from the pictures, it made dancing at the clubs all night in Vegas a little toasty. I guess for a cooler occasion it might work better. I would probably rent this again if I knew I wouldn't get too hot. Got a lot of compliments and felt like a 10.
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in Vegas.

review_text: I took a trip to Arizona and it was so hot! This dress was really pretty, and the slits up the sides (both) made it really easy to walk/ move. The dress was a little damaged by the time it got to me (slits had ripped a tiny bit further up the sides). I would totally rent it again if it was repaired/ new.
review_summary: This dress is so breezy; PERFECT for hot days.

review_text: This dress is really cute on.  I wore it twice on vacation and was very pleased with the dress.  The fabric is soft and style is very feminine.  The cut out shoulders make it interesting.  The print and color is perfect for a fall/winter dress.   Wore it with boots on one occasion and nude pumps at another.  Both looked great.  This is perfect for dressing up or down.  Highly recommend it.

This was perfect for vacation-- a great cover-up for the beach, and worked for resort dinner with some jewelry.  It is not form fitting, so other than the cleavage I could have been 10 lbs up or down--in other words, a bit of a sack, but it moves really well and I got compliments even though I could have been pregnant and no one would have known. I am glad I got a small--at 5"4 and narrower on top, I would have drowned in anything bigger.
The pockets made the outfit flair out, so it created an illusion of larger hips.
review_summary: This outfit is gorgeous! Runs really small, so go a size up.  I didn't like the pockets.

review_text: I rented this for our summer vacation, and ended up wearing it for brunch, vacation, a lunch meeting and would live in it if I could.  It's comfortable in the hot Texas summer and saw me through one the most humid days of the year.  It's simply stylish and super- tropical chic.

What a roller coaster of emotions this dress was.

When this dress first came, my heart sank. It was terribly, unwearably, wrinkled. I planned to take it on vacation, so I assumed that if it was so wrinkled out of the bag, it would just be a mess out of the suitcase. The colors were a bit more muted than I expected and yeah, the fit was super large. I had sized down, and it still was pretty big. My picture is from it right out of the bag.

But, I hung it up for a couple days, and then crossed my fingers and put it in my suitcase. It was perfect! The wrinkled fell out from the hanging (it did take 3 days though) and I wore it ALL THE TIME. Out to dinner, walking around the town, cocktail hour. Wore it with sandals, boots, and heels. You name it, I wore it. Super comfortable, super stylish, and so easy to dress up or down. The fabric was heavier than I expected, which meant when the wind came, and all the other ladies were clutching at their skirts, I was fine. However, the loose fit of the dress also allowed air to circulate so I stay cool when it was hot out.

This dress is basically the amazing magical unicorn that makes you feel great and look good at any occasion. Just wish I owned it. And remember...SIZE DOWN!
review_summary: So comfy, so versatile! Wish I owned it!

review_text: It was a little unflattering on the hips... a bit too much material there while it was tight in the bottom. Not much adjustability in the waist-would have liked to have been able to tighten it with the drawstring. It was good, but not great.
review_summary: The material is great, very thick and well made.

review_text: When I traveled to Costa Rica this summer, I needed a dress to impress. After a couple of days in the sun, I tried on this silky number and felt like a sun-kissed goddess. This is the first dress from my RTR experience that I actually wanted to purchase to own--and I've had quite a few stunning rentals. Great fabric and stunning print.

Usually wear a 4, but it was unavailable.  Wore the 6, which was loose around the chest area, yet the snap kept coming undone.  Really cute and perfect for a beachy getaway.  As with others, this was a bit tough to get in and out of even being in a size up, but expected at the same time for a one piece.

I wore this dress to dinner while I was on vacation at Disneyland. It is certainly a vibrant dress and I got compliments. I'm not sure it is entirely flattering on a larger person, but it was unique. The chest area was a little tight, but I have a large ribcage. It could be a problem for those with larger chests.

Mara Hoffman stuff is a bit loose for my tastes, but this made the perfect beach vacation cover-up.  It does wrinkle easily so I wouldn't plan on taking it to wear to a dinner or anything other than poolside.
Longer than expected which I loved. Great dress.
review_summary: Favorite rental yet! Great dress for Vegas. So fun!

review_text: I absolutely loved this dress.  It was so flattering on, and I received so many compliments.  I am already hoping I have a reason to rent it again.

Great dress for a night out in Vegas. It fit almost perfectly. I used fabric tape at the top after reading reviews of other women having to pull it up, but it wasn't a huge issue. I will say the dress was def obviously worn many other times as the top part was a bit stretched. But otherwise it fit like a glove and made me feel sexy.

I ended up receiving this dress when an alternate dress from the same designer was unavailable at the last minute.  I absolutely loved it and wish I could have kept it!  The slight A-line skirt was flattering and the scalloped edges added a little extra interest to the dress.  Herve Leger dresses are always skin tight (they kind of act like a full body Spanx) so size up.  The XS wouldn't fit over my hips (size 25 waist, 35 inch hips).  The small was snug in the right way.  I felt like a million bucks!
It was a little heavy. It isn't a dress to wear in warm weather. I wore it on a breezy night at the beach and it was perfect. It was also a snug fit that still felt extremely comfortable.

I loved this romper! It was the perfect length - not too short but not too long. Perfect for roaming around on a warm day in Charleston! It definitely has a looser fit (which was why I chose it) and is great for a warmer day - the material wasn't clingy even though it was a very hot August day. I have a fuller bust which sometimes makes you look a bit bigger in looser clothing up top, but this didn't have that effect. I will definitely rent again!
review_summary: Perfect for a girls trip to Charleston!

review_text: This dress was great for Vegas!!  I turned heads like crazy.  It was super comfortable, kept me warm in the casinos, and made me feel HOT!  The only con, there was a tiny hole on the side at the seam but you couldn't tell unless you were looking for it.
review_summary: Love, love, love this dress!  Wish i could buy it!

review_text: This was my first RTR experience and I'm so glad that I chose this for our girl's weekend in Vegas!  The dress is extremely comfortable because of the stretch material, which also makes it very flattering on the body.  I worried that it might be too short for me, but it was perfect and fit true to size.  I ordered a M and also got a L as a back up size, I ended up going with the M.  A friend ended up wearing the L the next night and also loved the dress.  I would, without hesitation, purchase this dress if  I frequently needed formal/party attire.  It did ride up a little when walking, but it was a small price to pay for how amazing this looked on.  I'll be renting again!
review_summary: Form fitting, comfortable, true to size, great for a party or vacation

review_text: Rented this for a cocktail JA date night and it was the perfect color! It a true Herve dress as it leaves no breathing room after dinner but I received many compliments!
Perfect because it's loose and so comfortable. An all-day type dress.

This dress would be flattering for everyone.  It is A line so it doesn't hug curves but it isn't shapeless and boxy.  It has a flair that hangs wonderfully.  You can wear a regular bra but show a hint of shoulder so it's amazing in the comfort department.  It feels like a very light weight denim so it doesn't wrinkle or show wrinkles (which makes it perfect for packing).  It also isn't see through.  While it is largely khaki, the red/coral stripes make it a colorful, eye catching outfit without feeling like a super dressy "look at me" outfit.  You can wear this to the boardwalk, out to dinner, a casual beach party, around town or dress it way up.  I haven't returned it yet because it keeps working for everything!
review_summary: Super Versatile and Beautiful for showing your tanned shoulders!

review_text: If you are tall and have a longer torso this romper will be too short on the torso even if you size up. Was not able to wear...
Just perfect...really hard to let go!
review_summary: You'll be glad you rented it

review_text: I do not know that a more perfect skirt exists.  The layers of fabric made it a little warm to wear in Texas in July but I didn't care! I had originally rented this skirt from my Unlimited subscription to wear for Father's Day, but our plans got changed for that day so I had to wait another month to wear it. It was worth the wait. it can  be worn to a black tie event or a simple brunch as I did. All depends on the top and accessories you choose. I wore mine with a Herve Leger cropped bandage tank top, black wedges and through my hair into a loose wavy ponytail, and voila midday attire. I received so many compliments. I will be renting again!
review_summary: Worn to a lovely brunch with great friends during Summer in Texas.

review_text: The colors in this dress are outstanding! The hips fit just a slight bit tight but other than that it was perfect! The length was great on me also! Will definitely be renting again.

I absolutely LOVED this dress and I am so so sad that I couldn't wear it! I recently had a breast augmentation so I am still figuring out what sizes work for me in certain cuts! It definitely was a tad tight around the girls. I might have sported this size in my younger party days, but it didn't seem to be an appropriate fit at my age. Should have gotten the 4!
review_summary: Great dress! Love the fabric and cut! Warning!! Order a size up if you are busty!

review_text: I have worn other Milly dresses so I knew the fit ran pretty true to size. It is a great dress... fully lined. A lot of the reviews said it was short, but I am pretty tall and just found it to be "average" short! Definitely is going to hit you several inches above the knee. I do wish I had realize that the cut of the shoulders requires either a strapless or t-strap bra, but I survived! Great dress overall!
This is a fantastic lightweight piece for any tropical vacation.  Dress it up or down and be comfortable anywhere!

It was a beautiful dress and fit wonderfully! I absolutely loved the color and the design, the fit and the flare. Would rent again and keep this style and designer in my mind for my next family affair.
The overall fit of the dress was great!  The top fits tighter than I would have liked but it still looked good.  I'm 5' 5" and wore with flats.  It was maybe a little too long but still worked.
review_summary: Love the slit in the front!

review_text: Material was lovely, color was great.
review_summary: Love the material, however my chest is too big for the dress....bummer.

review_text: This dress came as a mistake in my order. (I only ordered one dress and got three!) So I ended up having a dress for both of my girlfriends. This one was worn by my taller friend who would usually wear a large. But the extremely flattering cut, matched with her fearlessness made this dress a hit.
review_summary: Striking color with naughty cut outs.

review_text: I've rented this dress to test out for my bachelorette weekend. I wanted to try it ahead of time, to make sure it's perfect. The dress itself, once on is very pretty. The material is kinda weird, sweatpants-like, which I wasn't expecting. I could tell in the models photo that the dress is textured, which appealed to me. However, there is zero structure to this dress, it's basically like a fitted, sweatsuit. The top with the sweetheart neckline and wide-set straps is very flattering. If you are trying to hide any "problem areas" this dress isn't for you, since like I mentioned there is no structure ie., nothing to hold you in. All said, I will be renting this dress again!

I accidentally ordered the XS in my unlimited order, which was too small, but I managed to get into it. The Small would have been perfect, but I didn't have time to send it back and get a new one for my vacation. The fabric and print is perfect. It has a vest like top that zips in the back that slims your figure. Would definitely like to rent this one again!
review_summary: Gorgeous dress for a lake summer vacation

review_text: I'm on the left in the phone ;)  The dress was fantastic!  Runs very small, I wore a large (would usually be a M).  Being short, the length was a bit on the longer side, which I liked since the neck was such a deep v.  Unless you have one of those crazy strappy bras, this one is going to be a no-bra dress.  Very fitted but in a good way, held everything in (of course, spanx were involved as well).  The sequins under the arms DID scratch as other wearers have noted, but if you have a cocktail, you'll be fine.  Overall, I felt very cute and got a LOT of compliments.
This jumpsuit has clearly been worn a lot (bottom of pant legs were dirty). It is really adorable. Fit great. I'm 5'4, 135lbs, 34DD and wore the 4R with 3 inch heels.

This skirt was adorable for a day around Dublin! The front makes it more unique than your standard plaid mini. Only complaint is that while I'm a XS/S, my hips did feel a bit too snug in the S. I could habe daily fit into a medium, which is not my usual. Runs small!!!
Sat through a show in this and wanted to go dancing later - it was so comfortable. It is short but you dont feel it!

I rented this dress for a girl's trip to Vegas but didn't end up wearing it. The dress is beautiful and pretty flattering, but it was a bit heavy for the 105+ temperatures and seemed more suited for a super formal event than a night out. I did find some of the pleating around the hips to look a little odd, but that was minor and not my main concern.
Fit great!  Loved the pockets.  The mesh top is really flattering.
review_summary: Loved it!  This is the first romper I have ever really worn, and I loved it!

review_text: I know this is a sheath dress, but the 42 was quite roomy.  I would have felt more comfortable in a smaller size.  the lace is a little snagged already...even though it is a strong weave.
review_summary: easy to dress up or down...

review_text: Garment is well made.  I did not want to wear shorts every day, so this was a nice way to dress up a casual affair.  I wore them with a black tank top and cute black wedges.  I got lots of compliments on them.  They are comfortable to wear.  I think the taller or more long waisted you are the better with these.
review_summary: Great substitute for shorts on vacation

review_text: Loved this jacket - super versatile and comfy!
Very sexy and form fitting!
review_summary: Really flattering dress. It hugs all the right spots. My husband loved it!

review_text: Dress looks exactly like the photo. Very pretty and nice material. Unfortunately it was too big. The dress is designed for a relaxed fit, however, it had way too much room. I would suggest sizing down for this piece. The colors are vibrant and really great for spring. Wish I had ordered smaller :(
A bit long in the leg- I am 5' 3" but fit perfect up top- super comfortable- dressy glam look but easy to wear.

So this was a backup dress. My first choice (a white one) was damaged or not returned so this is what I got and while I'm still bummed about the white dress, this dress is PERFECT. It was either a size 0 or XS can't remember but same thing. Fit true to size. It felt like I wasn't even wearing anything. It went right on and fit like a glove but wasn't binding or too tight or anything. It was short but not too short and I could wear a regular bra with it. The material was amazing and I absolutely loved it. It was perfect. I did have to pull it down some throughout the night but it wasn't too annoying and I have a booty so maybe if you didn't have a butt it wouldn't do it? I dunno. I would totally rent it again for a night out. I think it would be too short for corporate events ;). Wish it came it white lol.
review_summary: I wore this for my bachelorette party in Key West

review_text: This was a great dress as long as the wind wasn't blowing or I didn't have far to walk. The wrap element is beautiful, but as I was walking around San Francisco in this dress I wished I'd pinned the slit. It's high and even the smallest breeze blows the dress wide open.

My friends and I had the chance to shop at the new store in Vegas. 

This dress was a success. I wore it to Tao where it was appropriate. Half of the reason I rented this was because I was able to squeeze into the 0. I could have used the next size up, but inventory is very limited at the store. 

I am glad I stopped by; I had so much fun and it was convenient.

Dress is beautiful and flattering.  The sequins did not scratch. 
Bust area ran large,  as did the dress,  but bust was still large.  Very low cut,  bring a safety pin!

Perfect for a night out in Vegas.
review_summary: Beautiful,  sparkly and lots of compliments.

review_text: Wore this on a trip to Vegas and it was comfortable and sexy without having to let it all hangout. I wore a regular bra with thin straps. It was very comfortable and lightweight. I would rent again. It is very long. I'm 5'9 and it hit my ankles so would not recommend for shorter people unless you wear with tall heels.
review_summary: Fun Sexy Dress w/o Being Over the Top

review_text: Light weight, cute dress for summer. Fit true to size.
Took this to Costa Rica and it was perfect for nights out to dinner at the beach!

I rented this dress for a night out in Miami. It was classy enough for a nice dinner and sexy enough to wear out dancing. I'm not usually a fan of pink, but this blush tone was bright and brought out my fresh tan. I loved how fitted it was but it was a bit tight at the midsection cut-out. I would size up for your backup. I paired this dress with nude heels and some gold earrings. I wish I owned this dress!!
review_summary: My favorite RTR rental of all time!

review_text: This romper could easily be dressed up or down. I elected to wear it at a pool party as a swimsuit coverup. Although black, the light fabric and low-cut v-neck made it the perfect selection. The small size fit well, but if you have a longer torso, you might want to go up a size as it will ride up. Hanger strings are long, but not a deal breaker; I tied them around my waist. Admittedly, the romper was difficult getting into, I'd think twice before wearing this for a night out as it would be inconvenient to go to the restroom.
review_summary: Pool party at Encore in Vegas

review_text: I recently went to Vegas for a wedding and this dress was perfect for seeing the sights in the daytime. It's true to size, flowy and no fuss.

Fit perfectly. I'm not usually a fan of showing my legs and normally wear long dresses, just because I'm so tall, but this made me feel comfortable showing some leg. Very sexy and flattering dress! My husband loved it!
review_summary: I wore this for formal night on our cruise. It was absolutely stunning! I got compliments all night!

review_text: I usually get an 8 but I got a 10 worried that the arms would be too tight but an 8 or even a six would've been fine as it is a true wrap. If anything the shoulders and arms were a little too big for me. Real silk this is a quality fabric that allows you to feel classy while being free and fun.
review_summary: Felt so fresh pretty and fun in this dress!

review_text:
This dress was great!  The sequins were not too flashy.  It felt a little like business sequins, because the cut of the dress was similar to the sheath dresses I wear to the office.  

I was able to wear a normal bra, which is great for those with a larger bust.  This isn't a dress that makes a huge splash, but is still fun.
review_summary: This dress was great for quiet night on the town in Vegas.

review_text: I definitely loved this piece. It can dressed up or down, and this pattern makes you looks sophisticated than you see in the pics. Runs shorter and tighter, so I rented 4 (usually wear 2) but even 6 might work fine. Strongly recommended!
I ordered a M and a L. The large fit great. The medium was really tight on me, especially through the booty!
review_summary: This dress was so great for a bachelorette party in Vegas.

review_text: I loved the color and print of this dress, as well as the lightweight feel. It was perfectly breezy for a casual dinner in Miami. The straps are adjustable which allowed me to wear this without a bra. There's also a snap so you can choose how much skin you want to show, I went unsnapped and was not worried about revealing too much. It was a bit short though!

The dress was perfect for a night out in Vegas. Extremely form fitting i felt sexy yet sophisticated. Being an hourglass figure it did make my hips look a little bit fuller than they normally do because it was very fitted in the waist.
review_summary: What happens in Vegas goes on Facebook these days...

review_text: PROS: I hardly ever wear cut-outs, so just renting it for the weekend was the perfect decision! I tried this own in SF at the store and realized a larger size was perfect for me, since I don't like wearing low cut dresses. I definitely recommend it!
review_summary: This dress is the perfect RTR dress! I loved the simplicity and fun of it!

review_text: This is one of my favorite RTR dresses! I wish I could buy this dress somewhere. It is simply the perfect holiday dress for Christmas or NYE. It's sparkly without being too flashy, sexy without being too showy, and a very comfortable fit (not tight and the sequins aren't too scratchy). The open back is simply darling and is what makes this dress. I think it is also the perfect length for petite girls like me. Love, love, LOVE it.
Fits true to size.
review_summary: The perfect piece for Miami, and great to rent for vacation as you can wear the pieces separately!

review_text: I ordered this dress to take with me on my honeymoon in Thailand. I loved it sooo much, that I wore it on two different date nights! It was light and comfortable - and was formal enough for fine dining, but also was perfect for a more casual dinner on a touristy boat. I have broad shoulders - so the top was a little constricting on my shoulders/armpits.......but that was fixed easily by simply not wearing a bra! And I would def recommend wearing this dress WITHOUT A BRA! Very sexy - but still classy and appropriate!
review_summary: Stunning yellow dress - Perfect for my honeymoon!  ADVICE - WEAR WITH OUT A BRA!

review_text: I loved this dress and will definitely rent again! The fabric is nice and thick and the cut is very flattering. The top is very accommodating for larger chested girls.
review_summary: Rented for an event in the Hamptons

review_text: It is SO comfortable. I wore it in Charleston with a pair of black booties in February, but I plan on renting again for when it gets warmer! I loved the material, in some of the pictures I thought that it looked a little cheap and like cotton, but it's not! I got a lot of compliments and its easy to wear casual or on a date night.

I loved this dress so much that I found one and bought it. It fits perfectly and is very flattering. The long sleeves really balance the length and cutout detail so that the dress is sexy without being too over the top. If you're thinking about it - do it!
review_summary: Just the right amount of sexy without crossing the line.

review_text: It was surprisingly flattering! And very unique! I wore in Palm Springs in the summer and it was perfect as it's very light. Not at all lined, so be ready with nude undergarments!

Don't get me wrong...this is a beautiful dress, but not the best option for my body shape. I am 5'1, 146 lbs, and a 34F (not so perky) chest. There are so many more flattering options from RTR.
It was a well made dress and true to size. I love that you don't have to wear Spanxx under it.

I loved this dress so much I bought it. I don't think the photo does it justice. The size 0 fits me perfectly, and the back is just sexy enough without being too much. I wore it with one piece of fashion tape across the middle of the back for a work event, and open for a couple of dates on vacation. The pattern is pretty, the chest coverage is perfect for a 34B with somewhat wide shoulders, and the neckline is very in style. Loved it.
review_summary: Perfect fit, elegant but still sexy!

review_text: Wore this around a resort in Hawaii, got some admiring looks. :) For my taste, too much fabric in the hip/butt area, but the front slit helped keep it sexy.
If you have large breast it won’t fit.

Great dress for a night in Vegas!  Overall true fit for the dress.  The 4 fit a bit better, but it was riding up a bit when I walked and given it's a shorter dress as is I didn't want to risk it.  Difficult to sit in as the sequins cut into your legs, but perfect for standing at the Craps table and gambling!  I had been wanting to try this dress again, and would definitely rent again
This was cute, comfortable and perfect for antiquing and shopping on vacation.

I loved wearing this dress for a friend's bachelorette party. It had pockets, so I didn't need to worry about a purse or anything the whole night. At 4 months pregnant, this dress accommodated the bump really well, but didn't make me feel too small up top. I'm small chested to begin with, but this dress didn't really swamp me at all. Overall, I would definitely recommend this dress!!
More casual than it looks; lightweight fabric; slightly tight under arms but overall really cute. Very long.
the dress is cute but definitely cut for a petite person.  The chest darts were way above my actual chest and the waist was high.  I ended up not wearing it since the darts fell so strangely.
review_summary: it didn't work out for me, i had to use another dress i had.

review_text: I wore this dress during the day at my bachelorette party.  It was so comfy, the material was a little thicker, which was great because you couldn't see undergarments,  but it did make it a little warm ( I wore it in San Diego in August). The fit does run large, so I recommend getting your regular size and a size down.  I got so many compliments on it, but there were a couple of downfalls: the sleeves can pop up over your shoulders, which can be annoying, but isn't a huge deal, and if you have a bigger butt like me, the back can get caught and make the back stick out a little. I would definitely order it again. though!
review_summary: So cute for a bachelorette party

review_text: perfect for my beach vacation. looked faded but i think that was how the dress was designed. i wore it as a cover up and to a laid back dinner.
The dress fit true to size and the pattern and the color makes you feel like a princess
review_summary: The dress was beautifully made and I enjoyed wearing it every minute

review_text: The only con is that it is definitely very worn in.
Fit was exactly as expected- very form fitting.
Really low cut but great dress

This dress was perfect for a dinner while on vacation in the Caribbean. It was very easy to wear with adjustable straps and a loose belt. I'm straight and narrow, so the mix of fabrics on the lower half gave me hips :)  Overall, perfect vacation dress!

I loved this dress but there are some things you should know when choosing a size. This dress runs small so you may want to size up. If you are 115 lbs or more, I would recommend a size Small or larger (depending on your body type). I am a pretty small person and the X-Small was too tight for me. That size is meant for a very petite body type. The waist band on this dress is very small/tight and does not have stretch to it so keep this in mind. The other reviews regarding the slit are spot on - it is VERY high. You will need fashion tape or safety pins to keep the top closed (and not show the goods). I used a couple safety pins. This dress is so cute and I received many compliments. Just know you need to be careful with the size you choose.
Really pretty detailing.  the belt is beaded.  wore with a racerback bra.  Length was good flowy and pretty.

Its heavier than I expected it to be - material wise, but with that you cannot see through it. Im smaller on top ( 34b) with wide hips and a butt, the top was too big and the bottom was tight. Hard to find the perfect romper with my body type but overall good.

This dress is perfect for a cruise.  It's formal but comfortable.  It worked perfectly for a dinner with my husband.  It's really long so make sure you have heels (I am 5'8" and it was still long on me).  Got lots of compliments from my fellow cruisers and felt great in the dress.
The top was hard to button but I had a ton of friends at the event and someone was always in the bathroom to help me :)
review_summary: This was super fun on vacation!

review_text: Fit very well considering i am just getting my figure back after twins.  I am short and curvy and quite surprised it even fit!
review_summary: This fit really well and concealed problem areas. Great for curvy folks.

review_text: I LOVE this coat. Rented it for Christmas vacation in an unusually cold South California and I wore it every day. It was so versatile. The teddy-bear blue side kept it casual with jeans and a t-shirt and the gold side provided me with just the right amount of holiday glam for nights out. Everyone in my family was urging me to buy it but as I live in Miami it's not practical - thank goodness for Unlimited! Be warned - it runs LARGE. I ordered a size 6 the first time and returned it for a size 2 which was perfect.

I wore this for one of the formal dinners on a recent cruise.  It was perfect.  While others were in black or red, I stood out in this jewel.  I wore it with nude heels and it really popped.  The fabric is a heavier weight, which might be too hot for outdoor events, but for indoors, it was fine.  Great fit.  It skims the body without looking or feeling clingy.

First things first: This dress is beautiful.  It's very sparkly, but not over done and comfortable to wear.  People complimented me all night (including a little girl that just had to touch the sequins :)  I have pretty light skin tone, but I got a spray tan before the event and it set of the dress beautifully.  Now the nitty-gritty details: I was in between sizes, so for comfort I wore the larger size.  I have a short torso, so the dress was big in the shoulders and had a very deep v-neck.  Again, it didn't stop me from wearing the dress, but if I owned it I would have taken it to a tailor before the trip.
review_summary: I needed a glam dress for formal night on my mom's 60th birthday cruise in the Bahamas!

review_text: It was hard to get into it, but what a dress! Loved it and would absolutely rent it again.
Loved the quality of the pants, they looked very cool. They just run large. While I am a small in pants, I would have definitely gone XS on these.
review_summary: Love the pant quality - runs big

review_text: Dress fit like a glove
review_summary: Wore this for my birthday in Miami.

review_text: This dress was awesome. I was able to wear it with a normal bra. It does run a bit on the smaller side so I'm happy I chose the Medium. It was extremely comfortable & I felt very sexy for my date night with the hubby in Vegas!
Length was great; however, the bust was slightly loose.
review_summary: I wore this to dinner in Las Vegas.  I got so many compliments on the dress.  It's a classic.

review_text: This dress is super gorgeous but the v neck is very low. You need a tank top  or camisole if you want to wear this appropriately. The material is heavier than expected - its a lot of dress. but still very dramatic. It was a little long for me.
review_summary: Super elegant but low v neck

review_text: This is beautifully made! It was not flattering to my 5'4" curvy figure. The sides hung very low so wearing a bra was not an option for me. I might have been able to go down a size but am on unlimited so I only go the one size.

I rented this on a whim as part of my Unlimited subscription and wasn't sure if I would like it, but I love it. It's flowy and light..definitely a beachy vacation dress perfect as a cover up at the shore but also can be dressed up to wear to daytime events. It is very comfortable, I like the buttons on the front so you can show as much or as little cleavage as you'd like. The fit is pretty loose so I think it'd fit a range of sizes and is pretty forgiving. I went with the XL because I'm bigger chested, (36 DD-DDD) and it fir great.
Very cute dress in soft water colors. Fits very tight on the chest and it's a lot shorter than I expected. I wouldn't consider myself to have long legs but I felt like it was very short.
review_summary: While getting away from the crazy city I thought this dress would be perfect.

review_text: This ran large for me, I am a pretty standard size 12, hour glass with a large chest and larger than average arms. The sleeves were loose on me which was a surprise. I would size down but let me tell you this dress got a lot of compliments
review_summary: Low cut, I rented three dresses and this was the stand out.

review_text: The shift dress accommodated my late second trimester bump easily. I rented this for vacation and was happy with how comfortable it was. The dress does not wrinkle either - big travel plus! For my height, it was definitely shorter than the typical dress I’d wear. I actually contemplated wearing it as a tunic with white jeans, but it was hot! Overall, I’d recommend this to anyone traveling somewhere warm in need of a cute maternity-friendly casual dress
review_summary: Great for a momma at 26 weeks!

review_text: I typically wear a size 8, and so after reading some reviews decided on the 12 and it was a great fit. This dress is so fun and different, a perfect pick for vacation where I want to feel little extra special. The off-the-shoulder sleeves (cap sleeves?) were comfortable, and there is a small elastic included so that they stay on your shoulders properly.

I am pretty small on top (32B) so managed to pull this off without a strapless bra.  The cut outs on the sides and the deep-V in front make hiding a bra a little challenging, and I didn't want to be pulling at it all night.  If you aren't comfortable going without a bra, this may not be the dress for you. But the dress itself was very snug, and good thick material, which made it work out totally fine for me sans bra. I felt comfortable in it, and not too revealing..
review_summary: I exchanged another RTR dress for this one in Vegas. I felt awesome in this! It was sexy but subtle.

review_text: The jacket closure was a little smaller than I would have liked, but I had plenty of room through my sleeves. The sequins detail made the jacket look high end and I received a lot of compliments.
review_summary: I wore this on vacation in Vegas during colder months.

review_text: I rented this dress as a backup in case I did not like the other dress.  However, I did not end up wearing it as the events I attended were far more casual than expected.  I rented this dress in both a size 4 and 6.  I am short and slender but have wide hips.  I could not get the size 4 on because the waist was very tight.  The size 6 did fit but since it was tight around the waist I felt like I could not take a deep breath.  I think if I ordered a size 8, then the dress might have been too loose around the bust.  It would have been nice to have a little give in the waist line.  I also think the dress looks a little odd without a belt around the waist.  I had a thin gold belt on hand just in case I wore this dress.  I would keep this in mind if you decide to rent this dress.  I would also suggest ordering one size up.
review_summary: Pretty dress but tight around the waist

review_text: Was too short to wear. I am 5'8 and it showed my butt cheeks.
It's a little tight so I need to go up one size. Runs small but super flattering!
Fits true to size. Rented this for a birthday dinner and it did not disappoint. Perfect length even though I'm on the taller side. Highly recommend.
order one size up. I was a bit on the busty side in it which I did not mind. If revealing isn't what you are going for, I would stay away from this style if you are big chested.
review_summary: Good fit. I am glad I ordered a size up based on reviews.

review_text: This was amazing. The material is super thick and well made. It was easy to dress up or dress down. I hated to send it back. The fit was perfect. I don't have one bad thing to say about it.
review_summary: This was the perfect top for vacation.

review_text: Beautiful blouse, subtle elegance.  Looked great with white pants.

Ladies- this dress is a showstopper!!!!!!

Badgley Mischka's dress is heavy, but beautiful and sparkly... just the right amount of attention grabbing shimmer, without feeling cheap. I wore this gown during the evening on a trip to Las Vegas and I received compliments from the first person I encountered at the Palazzo, in the elevator. She kept going on and on about how beautiful I looked. 

This became the theme of the evening. 

I felt statuesque, beautiful, goddess-like and just plain fancy! 

The dress is very scratchy under your arms, where it rubs the gown... a small price to pay. 

I wore this gown with patent leather, peep toe, nude colored Christina Louboutin's... and it was the perfect pairing. The gown itself is more of a rose gold color than gold... and gold jewelry with the dress looks odd, in my opinion. 

The dress is a little open/large in the bust, as many reviewers have mentioned, but some fashion tape and it's just fine! 

I just had a baby a few months ago (my 2nd in less than 20 months) and so I feel  a touch self conscious, as I am a size 6-8 normally... and am currently wearing a 12-14 and finding clothes that I don't feel like a whale in, can be challenging... particularly dresses... but this Badgley Mischka number was flattering, confidence boosting and spectacular! 

Thanks RTR!
review_summary: This gown is absolutely stunning. I got compliments on it all evening! I felt fabulous & sexy!

review_text: The leather is very soft, and the lining is comfortable. The negatives were that the buttons were quite tight to button, the jacket is very cropped, and the removable shearling collar comes off all the time, even while simply walking through town.
review_summary: Beautiful jacket. Took it to Europe for a three-month spring vacation.

review_text: Light and airy, great for vacation. Beware fabric is a tad thin. Had to iron at the hotel. Loved wearing this dress.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for the beach. Matched well with nude flip flops. Received many compliments!

review_text: This dress is a stunner, but at 5'8" it was so short on me it was obscene and I literally had to hold the hem down while I walked to avoid showing my butt. The nude lining rode up around my waist so I had to awkwardly pull it back down while sitting in a restaurant booth. I used double sided tape to hold the front down and did not wear a bra. I wore it to dinner and a club in Vegas, would not have worn it anywhere else. I was afraid to move in it.
review_summary: Sexy but so self conscious in it I shouldn't have worn it.

review_text: Nothing bad about it but I would size down.  I'm usually a medium but went with a small because of the other reviews.  So glad I did!  I wore as a cover up several times because of how easy it is to get on and off.  If you're a busy mom in the summer this is also a great long dress, keeps you covered up while you chase the little ones around!
review_summary: Great everyday dress for summer or for a beach vacation!

review_text: Rented this baby for a Vermont ski trip. I sized up to give it an oversized look. Was freezing cold, so had to layer it with a wool sweater underneath. Definitely not warm enough to wear alone. Would be great for chilly New York days in April/May- it's definitely not warm enough for winter.
Excellent Easy Breezy, light and airy casual dress. Wore this during the day on a hawaiian vacation.  Was comfy and bright! the V neck makes it still feminine without being fitted.

I rented this for my vacation to San Francisco.  It is definitely warm...and wool...so a bit itchy to the skin.  Not the most comfortable, but does keep you warm if it's not terribly cold.  As far as the cut of the jacket, it was good, just a little too bulky for my taste.  Overall, though, a good piece!

Rented the dress for a beach vacation and wore it a lot. Perfect for hot summer days, can be a beach dress - or an evening dress, depending on how you style it. Great quality and fabric.  Not too long- I'm 5'4" and could wear it with flats easily.

Wore this cool sweater at lunch in Paris, with an edgy leather jacket, jeans and leather boots. I was surprisingly a fan of the high-low hem, however I found the sleeves to be a bit too short on the Large, so I wore the Medium instead (Weird right?).  Grey piece overall. Hope RTR buys more into this brand in the future!

I wore this out to a casual dinner in August while on vacation with my boyfriend.  I love the print, the color and the fabric, but overall the dress is tricky to wear with a bra. I ended up going braless and was a little uncomfortable at how loose the dress was on my chest. Otherwise, I thought the dress was adorable.
review_summary: Great print for my summer vacation in Maine.

review_text: Awesome jacket.  Dress it up or down.
This dress was very pretty. It hugged my body just right. It doesn't have stretch to it, so size up. It was lightweight for summer weather.

Great dress - cool pattern that pairs with anything, heavy well-made fabric.  A bit on the short side and a tight fit, but flattering.  I may try a medium next time.  Would look great with tights and boots, quite heavy for summer.
review_summary: Love it - great for fall, spring or winter.  Consider ordering a size up.

review_text: These were SOOO comfortable!  All the reviews were so accurate.  I wore these all day on the first day on my trip to San Francisco; from the airplane to walking around the city, into dinner and drinks that night.  They look fancy, but are very comfortable and stretchy.  Thick material and high-waist so I could wear a cute, more cropped blouse at night.  I will definitely be renting these again!

My dress was a little snug at the waist, a 14 would of worked a little better, but the 12 was fine. The dress DOES scratch a lot. I wore it for a night out in Vegas and picked up in store, so convenient!
review_summary: Great dress! Got tons of compliments!

review_text: People are right about the button - other than that, i am obsessed with the romper and paired it with a red blazer for a fourth of july boat ride
review_summary: I wore this for vacation with the fam over the fourth - I got so many compliments.

review_text: Loved the fit, it was true to size. Cut outs are in the perfect places, I felt stylish but not uncomfortable.
review_summary: Rented for our vacation to Las Vegas perfect for dinner & a show!

review_text: I thought this would be too short on me and had I not been daring enough to try this for my vacation (at my age, the short stuff just isn't awesome...) but after a bit of a tan I was surprised to see how much I liked this and it wasn't as short as it looks on the model (I'm 5'9"). Got a few compliments including one from my husband.

I love Herve Leger, and his dresses are perfect for Vegas. The color of this dress is great, I loved the dark purple. But the fit is small! I have rented other Herve Leger dresses in size S and they fit great, this one however took 2 people to zip. I would recommend this dress, just make sure you size up!
review_summary: Rented this dress for a girls weekend in Vegas

review_text:
I loved this daring look - only in VEGAS.
Got a bit itchy towards the end of the night, but totally worth it.
review_summary: I looked better than the model - HA.

review_text: The dress fit perfect and was sooo comfortable!! It fell right above the knee. I received lots of compliments on the design and color!
review_summary: Rented this for a night out in West Hollywood on vacation with girlfriends!

review_text: The v-neck makes that baggy feel of the dress a little sexier without being too revealing
review_summary: It is so adorable and flirty on

review_text: Fits great, quality construction and figure flattering.  Only downside i would say is that it looks light and flowy in pictures but it is a heavy fabric.  Thought it would be nice for evenings in the islands but might be to heavy

Wore this to go wine tasting.  The MR was a little big, but when I go smaller in pants I sometimes run in to length being too short.  The length was perfect. I am 5' 7.5". The back slits open so I wore bandeau underneath to be able to wear strappless bra.   Material was very light weight so had to wear cardigan with it for warmth.

I loved this dress so much that I just bought it from Saks Off 5th so I could wear it again and again. I rented it for a weekend in Vegas and it's perfect for pear-shaped bodies and smooths everything out. It's classy, sexy, and fun. It could work for all kinds of events.

I don't have a photo of this but will try to get.  It is super low like everyone else said but super sexy for a night out with the husband.  Loved the details but the straps did fall down all night so wish they were more fitted.  Loved this one too.
review_summary: Another hit ~ loved this sexy number :)

review_text: I am nearly 5'7" and couldn't wear this dress because I was stepping all over it.  I love Parker's dresses and this one is fabulous, but there needs to be a shorter option.

Wore this for a day out in Sonoma!  I feel like I'm a disproportionate size--short legs, but long torso.  I ordered the medium petite, but in hindsight, I should have ordered the regular medium for the length alone.  The dress otherwise fit my body!  Fortunately, the straps are a bit adjustable in the back so I was able to fake the length a bit...and I didn't trip on my hemline, so that's a plus!
Perfect length and cut for a summer get away!
review_summary: So many compliments on this adorable, effortless dress!

review_text: The dress was adorable, and I got lots of compliments. The fabric has a bit of stretch, so I wore a size smaller than normal. Besides a super sticky zipper that almost caused me not to be able to wear it, and a bit of itch under arms, it was awesome!
review_summary: Great dress for a dinner in Vegas!

review_text: This shirt is super cute! I wore it out with some friends on a weekend back home. The sleeve and tie-hemline details make it an interesting version of a chambray/jean shirt. It's cropped so it pairs well with high-waisted jeans or skirts. The fit was definitely a little tight in the arms (and the sleeves were short - but I AM pretty tall) and I wish I'd ordered a M.

Such a flattering fit. I would suggest going down a size. As the evening went on, the jumpsuit stretched more and more leading to fears of bosom liberation. Unless you have long legs, it will be long. Even at 5'7", and heels, there was too much length. I used fabric tape to hem up. 
The suit pulls on- no zippers or buttons. I did love it!
review_summary: The look on people's faces with this unique outfit

review_text: I normally wear a small, but a medium in Alexis tops fits me perfect.
review_summary: comfy, cute, packable, just right for Hawaii

review_text: Beautiful dress, but not a great fit if you have a large cup size. The top part flares out so with my my D-cup I felt a bit like a lamp shade.
Not for really busty women, but I'm a size 32DD and wore a size 2, fit perfectly!
review_summary: Love this dress! So soft and flowy!

review_text: Wish I could have kept or purchased
review_summary: It was just right for my wknd visit with my Son  at college

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation. It's so feminine, classy, and unique, absolutely loved wearing it. However, I am on the short side (short torso, wide ribcage, too), and am glad I sized up to the 2. A 0 would have been too tight across the chest, but the straps on the 2 were a bit long. Nothing unmanageable, just thought it was worth mentioning for any other shorties out there.

This is not normally a style I would wear, but since I had a 9 month old and was breastfeeding, I thought it would be flattering.  It totally was!  The dress ran small, I rented the S and XS as backup and wore the XS, even with 3DD breasts.  I am 5'3", 135 lbs and normally wear a 4/6 in dresses and the XS was great.  (FYI: the S was really too large in the armholes.)  The color was so festive, my husband and I went to Sonoma on a couples weekend away, and I had so much fun in this dress.  I paired it with gold jewelry and metallic flat sandals.
review_summary: Festive, fun, flirty dress - perfect for couples weekend away!

review_text: What more could a girl want than a sparkly dress when going to Vegas! This dress was the perfect Vegas dress. It did get a little scratchy under my arms, but other than that, it was a perfect fit!
Wore this in Austin bar hopping, was adorable with black ankle boots.  Cute dress, loved it!
review_summary: Great dress for a weekend out!

review_text: Agree with other  reviews-- works for long torso. Fun, elegant.  Lots of compliments from strangers.

Very  comfy.  fits like most Badgley Mischka.  A little low but but nothing too showy.  Super Long for me.  I can usually wear these dresses with heels and not have a problem but this one seemed a bit longer than normal.
great dress and fit...a bit too low cut for my comfort.
review_summary: Great dress for a formal occaision

review_text: Rented this for a special European vacation this summer, and ended up keeping it (Unlimited) for three months for other events (Board meetings, baby showers, date night), and then bought it. I absolutely love it. Comfortable and classy enough for a cross-Atlantic flight and European adventures.
Very cute, just a little too flowy to show off curves.
