I absolutely loved this dress.  It was so flattering on, and I received so many compliments.  I am already hoping I have a reason to rent it again.
Runs a little big. I ordered the medium and small ended up using the small. Perfect Vegas dress. Wore it for a girls weekend. Tons of heads turn when you walk by in this dress.
review_summary: Beautiful dress. Loved it. Easy delivery process.

review_text: I received so many compliments on this dress from both men and women. I took it with me to Brazil for vacation.  It was the perfect dress to roam around the Santa Teresa neighborhood and the Escadaria Selaron steps.  It would be a great dress for a date night, too, because it is so girly and versatile.  Can be dressed up or down.

Love this dress. Really cute and comfortable for vacation. I am a curvy size 8 and wore the Medium. It fit well, but the waist is elastic, so I probably could've gotten away with wearing a size small. Good room in the bust (I'm a 34DD it was fine for me) and you can tie the straps tighter/looser to adjust for your size. Did not wear a bra since the back is low enough that it shows. Length was too long for me to wear without heels but was perfect with some wedge sandals.

This dress was made from the most comfortable materials.  It stretched where I needed it to stretch and fit like a glove.  The zipper detailing made me feel incredibly sexy.  I had so much fun wearing it that I forgot to get a good picture while wearing it.
It fit well - better than I expected and it had pockets.
review_summary: Work event/vacation - loved this for the beach party - fit well and received lots of compliments

review_text: I had a hard time returning this one. I wore it on 2 vacations, both beach, and didn't want to take it off. It's so light and airy, and the high-low hemline makes it fun and makes an entrance everywhere. Even as a cover up, it turns heads. Away from the water, I wore a black bandeau underneath to avoid side boob peeks at the cut outs. But with the bandeau, the cutouts look really cool and show a little skin at the sides of ribcage. I love the button-up front too. With something underneath, it's cute to undo the top button to mix it up. Definitely wish I could wear this around my land-locked house everyday! Apologies for the dark lighting in the photo. Doesn't do it justice.

I would definitely rent this again! But I may go with a smaller size next time.  It gapped where the sheer part is in the waist, which kinda bugged me, but it fit everywhere else.  It was still really fun to wear.  I was a little worried about the sleeve length bc i'm so tall, but they were plenty long!
Very comfortable and loose!
review_summary: It was perfect for our weekend in Miami!

review_text: The size was right by This jumpsuit gave me a camel toe and didn't support by bosom at all. The top just kind of hung on me; I'm a 32dd. Might be better for smaller chested women. Just wasn't flattering in any way on my particular shape.
review_summary: The size was a little big in some areas too small in others but still didn't fit properly.

review_text: I really loved this dress. I wore it on vacation in Nashville styled with a jean jacket, cowboy hat, and gold Jack Rogers espadrilles. The pattern is beautiful! I'm 5'2" and the size 4 went to my ankles, but I wore it anyway. Tons of compliments! Very unique and pretty, casual, comfortable dress.
It is definitely form fitting. It is true to size but a tight fit.
review_summary: It is a very special dress!

review_text: pros is i figured two ways to wearing it and changing the straps around
Fit: True to size, though the top portion is loose. The button kept coming out. Overall, very comfortable to wear and the color is great for summer
review_summary: Wore this for an evening out

review_text: Very soft and warm enough for a chilly late summer night

Lace is soft, almost cotton-y in its feel. It hangs beautifully and feels very feminine. I would definitely rent this again and if I had enough events I would just buy the dress, it's that great! My mom tried it on and wished she had rented this dress over the one she chose. Like others have said, you can wear your black bra under the dress with no need to wear a strapless bra. On my 5'5" frame, I thought the length was perfect.
review_summary: Comfy like loungewear and no Spanx required!

review_text: Very comfortable.  Material is very thin and there are cut outs under arms .  Perfect for the beach, but not something more formal like a wedding. I'm 5'4" and even with 3 inch heels the back touched the ground.  I loved wearing this!
Would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Fun outfit, easy to wear and was perfect for our wine country weekend!

review_text: This jacket feels like butter; immediately tried to figure out how I could purchase it. The P was a good fit, but keep in mind this is not a fitted jacket. The cut instantly upped any outfit and saved me from looking grungy when in jeans and t shirt.
review_summary: Rented so as not to freeze at my best friend's wedding weekend in coastal Oregon.

review_text: I loved this for travel and my vacation because it was comfy yet stylish and made the whole outfit look put together. Its not very warm, which I really liked.

I loved the look of the jumpsuit, and the quality was great, but I wasn't able to wear it. Unfortunately, it seems to run small and was very tight around my hips. The fabric pulled and made the front seam stick out.

The fit is true to size, thick and comfortable fabric which was surprisingly forgiving. Long sleeves balanced out the rest of the dress well.  I did not have an issue with length or sequence snagging. I wore it for a night out with friends while on vacation in Las Vegas, and it couldn't have been more perfect. Lots of fun, flattering, and loud without being over the top. (disclaimer: this is a PARTY dress! Would be entirely inappropriate for daytime or formal) Felt great in this dress, thanks RTR!
review_summary: Great for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: The coat runs large. I'm a size 4-6 and I rented a size 2, surprisingly it fit fine.
review_summary: Really happy I got to wear this coat during my trip to Ireland. It made for a nice statement piece.

review_text: Great quality heavy fabric and forgiving in the tummy area.
review_summary: Great color that was fun to wear on vacation.

review_text:
Very comfortable. However rode up when walking. Would definitely size up next time for extra material.

Great colors & pattern

This was great for a night out in Carmel / Monterrey, CA... nice to have sleeves for cool evenings. But y'all, it is SHORT!  I'm almost 5'9" and it was clear I couldn't (or shouldn't) bend over or raise my arms.  But I felt beautiful and got a genuine "WOW, you look AMAZING!" from my S.O.  I'm between a size 4 and 6, and based on the reviews I went with the 4 which I think was the right decision. So, fits true-to-size or slightly large.

I loved this romper and wanted to wear it so badly, but it was too large! I'm 5'6 and the length of the pant was great. I wear a size 4 pant and the waste of this romper was too big and slumped down below my waste. I'll get a smaller size next time I have an opportunity to wear something like this!
review_summary: Great color! Easy Fabric. Very flattering.

review_text: Cute and comfortable. I rented it for a vacation that got cancelled. I did try it on and it was true to size. I will definitely rent in the future it is really cute.
Will need spanks possibly if you are on the thicker side like me.  This dress lays on you so imperfections and lumps will show.
review_summary: loved the fit. Not too snug but pressed all my curves in the right spots

review_text: he cut-outs were not too big and looked flattering. If you have a very large bust, size up. If the dress had been any smaller, the bottom of my bra might have been visible in the cut-outs. I really liked the neckline and the color. The bottom of the dress was not form-fitting enough. There was a big gap of space between my knee and the where the dress fell, making it look a little more boring and less sexy. I wanted to wear it for a night out in Vegas but chose not to because if the poor fit in the legs. This sizing issue may have been due to the fact that I had to size-up to accommodate my large bust.
Comfy and roomy, doesn't wrinkle, great for travel. Can't wait for warmer weather to rent again.
review_summary: Comfy dress for vacation. Great for day or night.

review_text: This gorgeous printed shift dress is perfect for a daytime brunch or tropical vacation! It runs true to size, but has little stretch, so we recommend going up one size for your backup. This style works best for A to C cup sizes as it is very fitted in the bust area. It is sleeveless and fitted throughout, with a little stretch in the fabric. This style hits between mini and mid-thigh depending on your height, You can also wear a standard bra.
definitely runs large, I could have likely worn a smaller size. Due to the shape of the sweater, it didn't make a big difference.
review_summary: Comfortable and perfectly chic. Wore for a mountain weekend in Vail!

review_text: The material has a very slight stretch to it, very fitted. Holds you all together! There's a slit on one side which makes it nice and easy to walk around in. The length, with heels on, was perfect for me. Sexy, yet classy, I highly recommend this dress. It is very fitted, if you are in between sizes I recommend going up.
review_summary: I felt so sucked up and tight. This dress fit like a glove!

review_text: medium was great, could fit over sweaters without looking too bulky.  So comfy and surprisingly warm.  Will definitely rent again!

I absolutely loved this dress. I rented the 6 without getting my usual 4 as a back up, and although it was a tad loose in my waist area you couldn't tell as the material is stretchy and flattering no matter what. I would say it runs true to size. It was so comfortable and easy to move and dance in. I definitely recommend this dress!
I absolutely LOVED this one. Great for travel. Didn't wrinkle. Fit nicely (sized up for a little extra comfort).
review_summary: Went from work (casual Friday) to the airport with ease.

review_text: Fit great and super comfortable. The slits are a little higher than I expected so I felt like when I walked my legs were super exposed. Otherwise, great dress
review_summary: Striking at first site but the panels are a little weird

review_text: fit perfect and really cute
review_summary: Loved it so much I bought it.

review_text: sized up to a medium per reviews on the length. I have a long torso and often rompers fall short in length. Shorts felt a little wide through the hips and the waist was a little more billowy then I'd want. able to use the drawstring to bring the waist in a bit. would try a small next time. normally wear a size 4-6. Loved how easy it was to get on and off.
Only complaint the sequins rub under the arm a bit. But...definitely not a deal breaker.
review_summary: Was easy to wear and super comfortable. Flattering without feeling self-conscious.

review_text: I found the arms to be a bit itchy and the dress to be too tight in the hips for comfort.  On the plus side, the color was stunning.  If you have smaller hips, this could be a great dress for you, but if you're on the curvier side, you may want to select something else.

fit perfectly. i was expecting it to be short, but being 5' 3" it was great. could definitely be dressed up or down depending on where you are going. the fabric is not very breathable but it is soft and comfy. would definitely wear this again
review_summary: so flattering! fit just as expected based on other's reviews.

review_text: Didn't get to wear this because the size XS felt more like a M. Not a slim fit. Also, be prepared for the discomfort of those sequins rubbing up against your skin and arms.

I ordered a Small, I am normally 6-8/Medium and from other reviews I knew it would run big. My height is a big factor, and it was just too big all over. It is however, very pretty and the material is wonderful. I wish it looked better on me.
Rented for Mexico but totally did not fit, runs really small .if the neckline was adjustable that would have helped.
review_summary: did not fit well and unfortunately didn't wear it

review_text: LOVE LOVE this outfit! I ended up buying it because I loved it so much. Sophisticated yet sexy. Beautiful and very well made. Highly recommend!

Great dress for a tropical vacation!
East to throw on and go to dinner with some cute flats. The fabric is more on the casual side so I wouldn't suggest this for a formalish event. I must say it was kind of short. I'm 5'8 and it hit me right at my ankles so there is not way I could wear this with wedges and not look awkward.
Great for a girl with a large bust (36G).  Needed a few safety pins because the dress is so low cut, but with that quick fix it was perfect for a night out in Vegas!
review_summary: Wore this for a bachelorette party in Vegas--it was perfect!

review_text: I am 5'6 and the large was way too short to wear out in public.
Great for the cocktail hour destination wedding in Cancun

Unfortunately, the SP was large in both the torso and legs. I'm not the smallest petite (5'3 1/2) , so I was surprised that even the petite small was too long. I may reorder if the XSP becomes available. Overall the material was nice and It would have been a fun one to wear.
review_summary: HUGE--didn't get a chance to wear.

review_text: This dress is well made and fit perfectly!  I didn't get a chance to actually wear it on my vacation as planned, but I did rent it again a few weeks later for Easter Sunday/brunch.  BTW...its more of a cream/tan color than white as the picture shows.
Great, easy fit for a night out with friends.  Can be dressed up or down.  I wish I owned it.
review_summary: So nice I rented it twice!

review_text: Great shoulder width, love the length, great for tall girls. Fabric is light but not see-through. Loved!!
Really comfortable and attractive. Perfect for a beach getaway.
Pretty and mod with a unique pattern. Flattering cut and color. Comfortable but also cute. Wore to a winery in summer. Liked the lace detail on the front. Great length, even for shorter gals.
review_summary: Fun, airy, good vacation dress. Wore to a winery.

review_text: Fit well. A little tight in the shoulders, if anything. It's a little see-through so not a great bathing suit cover up (you could see my gold and black patterned bandeau through the top).
review_summary: A unique, beachy, super-on-trend *shoulder pop* piece.

review_text: Great choice, even tough the back fits was biger wich is weird cause the rest of the dress it's for petite bodies , anyway I felt like million of bucks on that one, i love the fabric and style.

I rented this for a weekend trip to Traverse City. It was snowy there, so this was the perfect layering sweater. I wore it with a cute gray tee underneath, and then I wore it again with a flannel underneath. It's the perfect sweater to keep you warm in the cold winter months! My boyfriend loved it! I will definitely rent again.
The fabric is a heavier weight, which was nice.  Overall just a very flattering dress, great for my Hawaiian vacation.
review_summary: So comfortable and very flattering.  I highly recommend this dress.

review_text: This dress might be the shiniest dress you might ever wear, it's beautiful! It photographs silver but it has quite a bit of red sequins and even some blue ones. Speaking of which, those sequins do get stuck to themselves, so sometimes I'd find myself stuck to my sleeve or other sequin-wearing parties (everyone in my group). But that was a small price to pay for such a beautiful dress. Loved it!
review_summary: Loved this dress!! It was perfect for a weekend in Vegas with the girls.

review_text: My only complaint is that is was pretty short and I do not have a long torso at all.. Luckily the ruffles on the bottom help make it look not so short!
review_summary: This romper is very fun and you will receive a lot of compliments!

review_text: Very cute, sexy, casual and flowy.  I wore this dress around the pool and lounging around for a Bachelorette weekend in Palm Springs.  I received lots of compliments and recommend this dress!
I wanted something that accentuated my chest while hiding my stomach and arms and this was perfect! I wore it with black skinny pants and peep-toe pumps. I got a ton of compliments :)))
review_summary: Dinner at a beautiful Seattle rooftop restaurant with a gorgeous view of the Space Needle.

review_text: I rented this dress for a beach vacay and it worked out great. SO glad I got the XS option because I was swimming in the S (and I am not usually a 'small'). I would definitely recommend that you size 1 to 2 sizes down. The length was great for me, even though it does run long. I could have gotten away with wearing a wedge in the XS Long and I am 5'8. The fabric was flowy but not sheer and the pattern is bright and fun. Super roomy in the top if you aren't chesty. Over-all I would recommend this dress to anyone wanting a fun, casual day dress.
review_summary: Fun and easy to wear day dress, runs large and long

review_text:
This dress fit me perfectly, as do all of the DVF wrap dresses. It is so light and airy, completely lovely and flowy for a vacation dress. I was actually stopped by a couple of strangers who told me that they loved my dress, which never happens!

It was a little low cut for my style, but that is usual for these dresses, so I put a camisole underneath it, and it was fine. The hem hit me an inch or so above the knee, so very flattering. It nipped in at the waist, and had a lot of flow, but was not too flared.

This dress was perfect for my birthday dinner in Vegas. Loved the color, the fit was perfect and it was sexy.
My only complaint is the sequins scratch the heck out of you!
It fit perfectly and was very figure flattering
review_summary: It is a very comfortable and versatile dress, great for many occasions.

review_text: This dress is unique and stylish.  It fits well and is true to size.  I have been keeping it longer than usual so that I can take it to New York and London later this month.  It is a little confusing to put on initially because of all the various folds.  The size 2 was a perfect length for my 5'5" height.  I wore a BCBG camisole underneath because it is open on one side which was not age appropriate for me but would be perfect for a young thin person.
I love this dress! The cut out is so flattering and the light weight material was perfect for a hot night in the Bahamas.

I brought this dress on a warm weather vacation and ended up wearing it multiple times. I love it. The back is sexy and interesting, and the dress is lightweight enough for warm weather, but substantial enough to feel put together. I could think of endless events to wear this, from a casual even with a jean jacket thrown on top to a wedding with more formal jewelry.
Lined, made with great detail. I rented this for a trip to France, wore it on a rainy day, felt like a million bucks!

I loved this top for casual wear. The back is long and flowy (longer than the front). The pattern is very tropical. I gave it a three, however, because the buttons are "snap" buttons and I am busty leaving me to constantly worry and re-snap them.
review_summary: Great for summer or beach trip

review_text: Love this jumpsuit -- fabric is high quality and styling its awesome.   It runs small around the bust area and couldn't quite get it zippered; I am a large b to small c cup so keep that in mind when you rent.  I did unlimited, so didn't get a back up size, but would rent it again if I had the specific event in mind.
The color of this jumpsuit is so rich and deep - loved pairing it with some black heels and gold accessories to really make a pop. Fit like a glove!

Dress was beautiful - a true shift, easy to wear.  The only complaint is that the lining kept creeping up in the chest area - I was constantly fussing with it, and pulling it down.  Also - it was tighter in the hips and looser in the bust area (this could just be a quirk based on my body) - but when worn with a navy blazer, you couldn't notice and I received a ton of compliments.

I love this dress. I wore it for my Post-Wedding Brunch at the beach. The fabric feels great and the colors are gorgeous. Dressy yet casual. With the right accessories, this would also look pretty dressy. It was really long on me (But I'm only 5"2) and dragged around even with heels. Other than that, I wish I owned it. So many different events I can wear this to.
review_summary: This dress is easy to dress up or down!

review_text: The dress was pretty tight and short but it's supposed to be - that's the style.  I may have been more comfortable in the size up but the M worked fine.  I thought the sequins would be scratchy but it wasn't bad at all.
review_summary: I loved wearing this dress.  I got tons of looks and compliments.  I would totally rent it again.

review_text: Super cute, comfy and stylish. Be sure to order 1 size down, this dress runs large. I originally ordered a small and ended up wearing and XS.
review_summary: Fabulous birthday weekend at the Madonna Inn!

review_text: This did not work at all-was very short.  I am 5'7 and would not be able to wear this without shorts underneath.
This dress is very cute.  The pattern is cheerful and it fits pretty true to size...a little snug in the bust and waist.  Love the pockets.

This dress was a success! Comfortable, flattering, flirty and "dance all night" friendly! I received sizes 8 & 10. I typically wear a size 8, and could've worn the 8, however I ended up  choosing to wear the 10 due to having a larger bust and for more movement flexibility in my arms and legs.  Even though I am larger busted, the boning was comfortable and gave me the appropriate amount of lift and coverage for the occasion. I paired the dress with simple jewelry, nude ankle strap heels, and a bright blue clutch for a pop of color.  The only CON is that the inside lining to the dress arrived ripped near the bottom of the skirt. It was noticeable when I put it on, but once wearing it, no one else could see it. I can't wait to rent my next dress!

This romper fit like a dream. I have a larger bust but didn't need a bra, the romper did all the work to hold everything in nicely. And it was surprisingly comfortable! I dressed it up with some wedges but this would be cute with a more casual shoe and a jacket as well. Highly recommend.
This is a great top. I love it. I wore a size six and that is normal for me. Nice detailing and the back is amazing.
fit very well, Plenty of room. The sleeves were so well made they had a hook so you could turn them up for a new shorter sleeve. Color is vivid and gorgous.
review_summary: When I vacation, I am all about fashion from the minute I leave the house. This was my traveling top

review_text: Modest bodice but flirty length.  Shows off legs.  Fitted cut but fabric had nice amount of stretch to prevent feeling confined.
review_summary: Comfortable for a nicely fitted dress.  Packed in suitcase well.

review_text: It was tight through the waist and short enough where I did not need heels. I was able to wear flats which never happens! Next time, I would have rented one size bigger to be a little more comfortable. Loved this dress!
review_summary: Perfect dress for a beach vacation!

review_text: This brand runs small.  I rented a previous dress by this same brand and had to send it back.  This dress wasn't quite as small as the first, but definitely want to consider going up a size should you rent this.  It is very flattering in both the length and the synching around the small of the waste.  Because it was a bit on the tighter side, it was pinching under the arms.  I didn't end up wearing this dress because I felt as though I'd be too uncomfortable wearing it for several hours into the night.
I am 5.7" and it ran a bit short with my heels even if i did order the 4L
review_summary: I didn't get to wear it unfortunately :s

review_text: This dress was cute, runs small and very short. Worked ok for vacation!

Fantastic length for 5'2" at size 2R. Extremely comfortable and flattering. The clasp at the top of the zipper was broken, but I just used a safety pin instead, which worked out well. Would definitely recommend!

Loved the backless aspect. Unfortunately this dress was a bit too snug in the thighs for me (I am definitely an athletic body type) and I could tell it would ride up as the night went on. Returned without wearing it, sadly.
review_summary: I couldn't wear it and had to return.

review_text: Sexy jumpsuit - soft pants  with pockets.  Not as cropped as the model, but perfect for my 5"4" frame.  Your back & side boob will def be exposed so get a good bra to hold the girls up! I loved it and got lots of compliments on it.
review_summary: HOT! It was sexy & perfect for a night out in Veags

review_text: It was too heavy and did not fit well.  Ended up not wearing it
Very pretty dress. It fits a little snugger in the hips and tummy than I wanted it to, so just make sure you have a pretty flat tummy if you want to wear this.
The scuba-ish fabric of the dress is gorgeous. Fitted and flattering in the top with lots of movement in the skirt. Plus, the green and dusky red is a nice colorway.
review_summary: Tons of movement and good colorway

review_text: Great for a casual evening on the town!

Super comfortable and cute. The S was loose but hung beautifully so didn't look "tent-ish" at all. Wore it once with over the knee boots and once with heels. Wish I'd gotten better photos because it's really adorable on!
Being broad in the shoulders with athletic arms, the initial fit was snug around the arm-holes. Fabric gave and contoured nicely after dressing, however.
review_summary: Cute, flirty, fun...perfect Cali weekend getaway dress

review_text: Beautiful color and design!
review_summary: Comfortable, travels well and perfect summer dress!

review_text: I got a small and a medium as a back up in this dress, but unfortunately my size was somewhere in the middle. The medium was a bit too big around the waist, belly, and back and just didn't seem to fit right. The small was just small everywhere. I ended wearing the small since we were in Vegas and short and tight is acceptable for Vegas. But it was VERY short. I am 5'11" and it barely covered my booty. The lace was pretty, but it was starting to pull in a lot of places and looked a bit worn. I wore Nubra with the dress, but some could get away with wearing nothing. My husband thought I looked beautiful, but this was not my favorite dress.
I am in love with this cardigan. I took it on a trip to Michigan and it was perfect for the chilly nights on the porch. It was both elegant and comfortable with soft and functional pockets.

I was wonderful! I felt SEXY in it, and it still covers your butt. I have massive boobs on a small frame, and usually have to size up for them, this dress has room. I wore the top unbuttoned with some pearls and wedges for our plane ride to Bonaire! My husband REALLY liked how it made me look hourglass. Its a neat dress! However... untie the waist when going through TSA!  I had to get patted down AGAIN!
review_summary:
Sorry I don't have a picture! i wore this with wedges for the airplane ride to my honeymoon
! <3

review_text: The color is gorgeous and the fabric is thick "scuba fabric"... it is form fitting but the thick fabric makes it more flattering in my opinion.  The cutouts in the front are very low...  but not overtly sexy.  Would rent this again for another holiday get away.
review_summary: Beautiful color; I loved the shape.

review_text: Great winter dress.  Lightweight fabric - look out for wind if outdoors, because the skirt will blow up!  Comfortable while being chic.  I wore this to walk around Savannah and it was perfect.
The see through panels made it have the look and feel of a shorter dress which was very interesting.  The beaded necklace added the right amount of sparkle and no necklace was needed.
review_summary: This dress was beautiful for a beach vacation

review_text: This dress is extremely cute in person.  I rented for a long weekend in Nashville, TN.  I could have worn this during the day with some flats too, but just wore it out at night with the Kendra Scott Harlow Necklace (also rented) and my cowboy boots.  The color is perfect for summer and it had pockets, which I didn't use.  The lining is a nude silk and very comfortable.  It does run large.  I'm typically a size 4 and very small chested.  The 4 was too big in the rib cage area and the straps kept falling down.  I contacted RTR and they had a 2 and shipped it overnight.  It fit like a glove.  This was my 7th rent and I'm never disappointed.  I've already bought one of the dresses I rented (took 4 weeks to find online)...this orange lace dress is another I will be looking to buy! A++
review_summary: Great color! Perfect for a country night out!

review_text: This romper is really pretty. Keep in mind, it's short. I followed other reviews and decided to size up based on bust measurements and I was really glad I did. If you have a larger bust or broader shoulders I would definitely size up just because it will be more comfortable. The zipper was impossible to zip on my own and I had to have a friend help with that. There were some snags in the lace when I received it, and I also listened to reviews that said to avoid jewelry that might snag the fabric. Overall it really is a beautiful romper and I received a lot of compliments!
review_summary: Great for a fancy night out with the girls!

review_text: The slip was too tight, but the dress itself fit well in the xs, which is a side smaller than I would normally rent. The midsection details on the dress fit odd and was uncomfortable. I didn't end up wearing.
I rarely can pull off red, but I loved this dress.  I loved the shoulder detail.  It was flattering and sexy, yet covered.
I usually wear a medium and am a 34D. Medium wouldn't zip around my bust so I couldn't wear it. Should've gotten a Large. Otherwise, super cute!
review_summary: Size up if you're bigger busted.

review_text: Worked very well! Normally wear an L and ordered a M because I heard it runs big - so glad I did! Leather is super soft, but the coat itself is VERY heavy (weight wise).
review_summary: Wore this to a football game where I needed a very bright, red, statement piece.

review_text: The dress is a great color, flattering fit, I wore it on a boat day cruise and then into the evening for a date night. I would rent again! Only warning, dress is thick material that doe snot breathe. As soon as I stepped into the sun I started sweating.

I wore this dress to my friend's bechelorette party in Las Vegas, and it was amazing!  I got told I looked like a disco ball, but it Vegas I took that as a good thing.  My only minor complaint is that it was so hot the sequins under the arms started to bother me a little toward the end of the night, but other than that...perfection!
review_summary: The confidence this dress gave me all night was unforgettable

review_text: I am hourglass shape, and I love the romper style but it rarely looks good on me. But I took a chance on this piece and I'm so glad I did because I LOVE this outfit. The fabric is heavy and great quality, the fit is generous enough to be comfortable but fitted enough to be flattering. And the print can be casual or a little more dressy depending on how you accessorize it.  I think it is such a cute, comfortable, versatile piece, that I decided I needed to own it. I would highly recommend it to any size or shape girl.
review_summary: Looks great, even on an hourglass figure!

review_text: I had a little trouble with the zipper sticking halfway up,  even though the dress wasn't super tight. Other than that,  the dress was fun and had a slight shimmer to the fabric,  plus it has pockets.

I rented at his for work because in the photo it looked like a crisp cut and fabric. It was softer in fabric and cut than expected and not formal enough for my office so I wore it on vacation and for plane travel. Very comfortable, classic cut fits comfortably and feels soft. Fit is true to size and fairly generous.
review_summary: Linen blend light fabric with casual fit

review_text: Wore this in Vegas - it was very comfortable and sucked everything in. It feels really tight when you're pulling it on but that's how bandage dresses are, I suppose!

I received SO many compliments from random women who looked stunning themselves. I wore this out to dinner then a show in Vegas and it was very comfortable and the perfect amount of "dressy" yet still casual enough to wear without going to a club. I wore a nude bra and you could see it in the back but with my long hair, I didn't worry about it. 
I got a medium after reading reviews. I would have considered a small except my butt/hips are larger than average. It was a little loose in the bust because of but I'm glad I went with the medium.
review_summary: The amount of compliments I received made me feel even more confident rocking this-my first romper!

review_text: Romper was okay but it was too tight in the midsection and too large in the bust area. Had to use fashion tape for the bust area.

This dress was everything I imagined it would be! I am glad I ordered a M and a L because I ended up wearing the Large. It was absolutely gorgeous! Sequins sparkled, back was just enough drop to be super sexy. It was also comfortable! Wore it to drinks, dinner, a show and walked the strip for hours!
review_summary: I rented this dress for a night out on the town in Vegas for my 40h Birthday!

review_text: Rented this for a vegas vacation and when I tried it on I determined it would be too warm for 80+ degree weather. The fabric is super comfortable and the dress is beautiful. Would definately recommend for a winter ocassion.
review_summary: Very thick not a summer dress

review_text: I loved this dress for a night out in Las Vegas. It fit very well. The only issue I had was the sequences slightly scratched my arm but it wasn't too bad.

I rented for a mother/daughter trip to California.  I did not end up wearing it.  The waste is short - I am 5'8" and it just did not sit correctly.  If I had the right belt it might have worked.  Material is really nice and thick.  It would be great for a luncheon or shower.  It also needs a belt to finish the look.
review_summary: Really pretty but waist is short.

review_text: The jacket is a nice piece to wear with jeans and boots. It is actually pretty heavy so keeps you warm in 40-60 degree weather. Comfortable, well-constructed. Nice colors for fall.
review_summary: Fun trip to NYC where layers were a must!

review_text: The fabric is light and airy and stretches perfectly around your body.  Its lined and the subtle print is great for anytime of year.  I received many compliments!
Loved this dress! Runs a little small but hugged all the right places. Fun ruffles at the skirt and sleeves!
Way too long for my 5'2 frame, even with  4 inch heels.  I'm 116lbs and the small was too big up top.
Legs were more baggy then I would have liked
The dress fits like a caftan which looks great or can be belted for a more fitted look.  It is a great vacation dress.  The material travels well.
review_summary: Super cute belted for a more fitted look and unbelted for a caftan look.  Perfect vacation dress.

review_text: It is just a cropped as it looks in the photo and shockingly comfortable (there is knit under the sleeves to make the fit more pleasant. Very sharp look.
review_summary: This was cute and practical for a weekend in Vegas!

review_text: Wore this to a bonfire on the beach during a destination wedding weekend. Love the length because it's not too long (more midi length) so not tripping over it. Fits true to size. More fitted than I expected which I liked because it was flattering. Would definitely rent again.
This dress is sexy & was figure flattering on me, however; it was just a bit shorter than I'm comfortable wearing.  This was my backup dress, so I didn't wear it.
Fits tight around the bust but that's ok - it's supposed to be fitted. Ultra feminine and perfect for a California Christmas! So many compliments! Want to own it. :(
order one size up or it will ride up your shoulders
This dress is really cute.  I am typically a size 6,but this dress ran a little small in the waist, so I wore an 8.
Loved that I was able to wear a normal bra with this dress. Was a comfortable and sexy dress.

This dress looks amazing on.  I would advise that if you are larger up top, even though it looks like you can wear a bra with it, I found it hard to wear a bra and not have it be seen.  It was easier to go braless
review_summary: This dress is a true show stopper.

review_text: I got compliments all night long in this beautiful dress! I wore it to a musical and uptown bar in the art district afterward and people could not stop fawning over it! I am typically a solid 10 (sometimes a 12 on bottom thanks to my very curvy hips and hiney) and the 8 fit me great! Like some other reviewers stated, one of my sizes had a stitch to help hold the dress closed over my chest, the other did not. No matter, it was fine either way and provided comfortable coverage up top. The generous cut around the hips and the tiny bit of stretch allowed for my extra junk in the trunk and made the smaller size a very comfortable fit. :-) Rent this dress and feel spectacular!
review_summary: This stunning dress makes you feel like a million bucks!

review_text:
Pros: Fun, colorful print, yet not too wild if you are a conservative dresser. Top is figure flattering/fitted while legs were roomy and comfortable (amost like wearing pajamas!). Dress up or down, depending on shoe and accessory choice. I didn't tug at the top at all, which is hard to find with strapless pieces, so that was an added bonus.
Cons: the boning on one side was poking me a bit, though nothing that I couldn't bare for the day
review_summary: Loved this jumpsuit! Perfect for vacation (or any summertime occasion). Figure flattering and fun.

review_text: Great for any hourglass figured ladies. Very flattering and sophisticated, lots of compliments.
review_summary: Wore to a show on Broadway and it was the perfect number to stand out.

review_text: Overall a cute jumpsuit, but I ended up sending it back and not wearing it. Beware - the top is not for a larger bust. I am a 32B and could have gotten away with wearing either a strapless bra or stick on pads (or braless), but I could see for a larger bust this area may be a problem. I liked the jumpsuit except the legs were very wide, which is depicted pretty accurately in the photo. I did not like the way it looked on me and ended up sending it back unfortunately.
review_summary: Cute but the legs are VERY wide

review_text: I wore this with faux leather leggings. This top skims your bum, so you are covered. The top is elegant so a nice balance to the leggings. Great for travel, never wrinkles even when I pulled it out of the suitcase. Loved it.
review_summary: Wonderful top, great quality and fabric

review_text: Fit great overall, but it did flatten me a bit in the chest area. I would say this is best for maybe a B cup. Dress felt very comfortable.
review_summary: Loved the bright colors, and unique pattern. Looked great with a black leather jacket.

review_text: This top was very cute and different.  I liked that it could be paired with the matching skirt or mixed up with other pieces of clothing.  Ultimately, my build is just not great for crop tops, but for those who like them, this one was very versatile!
Ran very small, didn't fit like other Amanda Uprichard dresses I have worn. I would have needed the M when I usually wear a S.
review_summary: Didn't end up wearing it -- it was way too sheer to wear anywhere other than as a beach cover up.

review_text: this dress is really well made, so chic and super feminine, its a little short and has pockets so a little wider on hips but its super cute! i loved it.
review_summary: so cute very preppy loved it!

review_text:
Loved it so much - I wish I owned it and will definitely rent again. Comfortable and the sleeves are not restrictive. Its very flattering!  
The top is fitted enough to get away without wearing a bra (34B).

I used this dress as a backup and only
Tried it on. It fit amazingly and the color was gorgeous! I wish I had it longer so I could have worn it to work!
I really liked how this dress had pockets and the fabric felt nice, but there wasn't any shape to it.  I ended up not wearing it.

This material is super fun and I thought it was a no-brainer. It looks just OK, but I felt like the front draping towards the sides made me look round and wide. It might have worked if the top were more fitted, but for my small bust, both drape-y bottom and loose top didn't work. I wore another dress.
review_summary: I didn't wear this dress- the draping was unflattering and the top was stretched.

review_text: I loved the fit, the style and how sexy it made me feel. Renting it again for an upcoming night out! Wish I could just buy it!
missing a button but still cute

Loved these pants they had a warm lining in them which made them perfect for a cold night out in Nashville for my friends Bachelorette party! I paired them with a solid black top and black heels and received so many compliments. They didn't itch or feel scratchy because of the liner in them. I would definitely rent these again!
review_summary: These pants MADE my outfit!! I loved them and got so many compliments!

review_text: So I said it runs small as I don't generally need to buy clothes in an XL (granted, I rarely buy designer clothing).  It was a great fit though and my body looked awesome. You could totally go braless if you don't have a plunging one, but it looked way better with it!.  I loved that I felt so sexy, but I actually ended up with some minor scratches on my arm from the sequins.  All in all, a great dress for an event where you want to look really hot!
review_summary: I was headed to a nightclub in Vegas. Nuff said!

review_text:
Fit great, the waistband was in placed in a great spot for a slimming effect. The pleats took a little getting used to, the skirt is extra full and a short liner underneath. Definitely wear no show panties because even with all the pleats lines show! Also, be sure to check the liner every time you stand up, if it gets slightly twisted you will have a very strange line across your rear.
Length was great. Would drag with flats (what the photo is of), but could wear up to a 3" heel. I would not recommend a long for anyone under 5'10".
review_summary: Great for a garden party or summer daytime into evening event.

review_text: Wore it out for a night of partying and was very comfortable. Material is very thick and held everything in place.

I really loved this jacket, and I was very tempted to buy it! I will say it runs large; I could have sized down and maintained the oversize fit I was going for. The cherry red color is killer. It adds style and flare to any outfit. I wore this jacket almost all weekend with black booties, black jeans and white or black turtleneck. Highly recommend
review_summary: Cherry red color spices up any outfit

review_text:
I absolutely love this dress and I may end up purchasing it!! I am a regular size 14 with a 38DD chest so very rarely can I fit a size 12. With this dress I fit the size 12 which was amazing. 

The dress is extremely cute but please note that the top front and back half of the dress are very low cut so you may need to wear fashion tape to hid a larger or smaller chest. For me, the top part was large so fashion tape is a must and I would say if your chest is any bigger than 38DD you may not be able to fit in the top. You will not be able to wear a bra due to the low back but fashion tape and nipple covers should work. 

The waist was snug but comfortable and I was able to wear spanx and they did not show!!  The waist of the dress may be snug but the bottom half is very light and not restrictive at all which is great because I have a large butt (45 inches) and smaller waist. 

Overall, this dress is beautiful and it will work with any body type and esp works well with bottom heavy women!!!
review_summary: Beautiful and flirty dress. Perfect for women with wide hips or slim and slender girls

review_text: It fit pretty well overall, the hip area was a tad snug but still wearable. Make sure you have a sticky bra because of the key hole back.
review_summary: Loved this dress and the flow of the skirt!

review_text: I would love to buy or at least rerent it if I could find it on your dress list
review_summary: It fit perfectly was very figure flattering. I would buy it in a minute if it was for sale.

review_text: Great outfit.  Fabric is very soft and style is very flattering.  I wore this on two different days, both while on vacation, touring different ball parks and sightseeing.  It was easy to wear and I felt great in it.  This is a 2 piece outfit with a dress and a separate shirt.  Both pieces look great together although they could be worn separated if you have the right pieces.  The dress has an elastic waistband so it can be as short or as long as you want.  The neckline could be buttoned but felt constricting when I tried it so I left it open.  I wore it with black tights and boots since it was chilly.  I would definitely recommend trying this one.  Wear it with a strapless bra since the shoulder cutouts will show when the strap slips down.

Loved the color and size of this dress - I love short dresses, and this is pretty short. Sequins and color were perfect for a night out in Vegas. My one complaint is that the sleeves out fall off - not a very structured dress, so unless you are standing and perfectly straight backed, the sleeves were loose. Overall a very fun dress!
review_summary: Got a lot of compliments! Wore this out in Vegas. Loved the sequins and open back.

review_text: I rented these pants for a vacation, but they looked a little heavy on me, so I saved and wore them to work one day.   Let me say that these are awesome pants, and I can appreciate their design.  On me personally, they were tight around the waist and not flattering (I have a tummy!).   They also were a little wrinkly, and not stark white (when you hold them up to something stark white).   I think that this could be due to the amount of wear/dry cleaning.   I decided to send them back without wearing a 2nd time.  I might try to rent the darker color in the future with my unlimited.

Say hello to my all-time favorite off the shoulder top! The unique, intricate and ruffle details add a feminine yet edgy look. Running true to size, I recommend sizing up for backup. The elastic band at the bust line is super comfortable in terms of free range yet constricting enough for it not to slip above your shoulders. Although that fabric itself has no stretch, there is a comfortable amount of room at the bust and can be worn with a strapless bra. I paired with black jeans and black strappy wedges and received many compliments!

The dress fit perfect to size. I liked how the sleeves were tight so they didn't fall.I am smaller on top and sometimes run into that issue. If you are larger on top i can see you wanting to size up since it could be snug. The material was a version of cotton which is perfect for a spring/summer day. I would say it could be a fun summer day dress or a casual night out dress.

LOVED this dress!  I have found that RVN is a great designer for my body shape.  The stretchy material tends to hug my curves just right.  This dress looks so sexy while not being overly risque.  I got compliments all night long.  "HOT!"  "WOW!!"  Runs true to size for RVN styles.  Nice that you can wear a regular bra.
review_summary: RTR and RVN Deliver for Vegas Again!

review_text: This is a perfect summer dress, great for an occasion and/or going out. It was very lightweight (perf for HOT Vegas), flattering. I do think that the top was pretty snug for me. It definitely compressed my chest and would have been more flattering in terms of shape if my chest wasn't so smooshed. I love the straps and skirt details.
review_summary: Super cute, perfect for a graduation - though a bit tight in the chest.

review_text: It was comfortable yet still fit like a glove!
review_summary: Perfect dress for Thursday night party before a wedding

review_text: Fun, unique top by Viva Aviva. I rented this for my vacation to Ocean City, Maryland and had so much fun swaying the added fabric detail! Running true to size, I recommend sizing up for backup. There is a hidden side zipper on the left side of the bodice under the one shoulder ruffle sleeve (which I was unaware of) and the S had just fit over my C cup bust. The fabric overall has no stretch, making me recommend for smaller cup sizes and does not need to be worn with a bra. I paired with light high waisted jeans and can't wait to rent again!

Overall, I liked the dress and the reason I gave it three stars was due to the shape of the dress. The photo on the model doesn't reflect the "cape like" drape that is tied in the back towards the neck. As a result, the dress was very boxy and had no form. Thankfully, I had a brown knotted belt that I tied around my waist to provide a more flattering figure. Dress was comfortable and good for multiple occasions, including lunch outing, dinner drinks while vacationing, running errands, etc... You can wear a sweater or jean jacket to dress it up or down.
review_summary: great pattern and fun dress for vacation (spring/summer)

review_text: Having loved my previous jumpsuit rental from RTR, I decided to try another for Memorial Day Weekend in Vegas. This was the perfect way to kick off summer. The top and waist fit very snug, but the legs were a little roomy as you can tell in the picture. I have skinny legs though, so if you have muscular legs you'll fill them out perfectly. I wore a nude strapless bra. Would rent again come summertime!
review_summary: Great way to stand out in the summer!

review_text: the zipper in the back is similar to a more formal dress, but this is a super casual style - so the combo didn't work for me.
review_summary: I rented this to wear in the summer to the beach, but it's not stretchy or comfortable enough.

review_text: Elegant and comfortable for a night of fun in Las Vegas 😉

I wore this for my Bach party in Austin, TX. I am 5'2 and 110lbs the 8 fit perfectly. It was a little long on the hem since I'm so short, but not horrible with heals. The bust fit perfectly (I'm a 30D) . Dress is made of an amazing fabric that is very thick, but breathable. The overlap of the skirt doesn't have a closure, so you need to be modest. It looks just like the picture. Would definitely recommend. The details are amazing
The small was true to size, but a little big in the waist for me; the length was good with 3 inch heels.  The skirt flows nicely and is very feminine.  A pleasure to wear.

It was a bit of a struggle to get in and out of this dress - but totally comfortable on. A pretty snug fit, so it rides up a little bit when you walk - but overall a fun and sexy option for a night out.
This top was cute, but I didn't find it particularly great. The back is shorter than the front, which I didn't love, and the fabric is heavier than I thought it would be.  Still, cute for everyday.

This was a fun dress I rented for my Vegas trip, but I didn't end up wearing it (I did a rent one get three deal). It was a bit tight, and not as flattering as the other dresses I got. It felt a bit "matronly" on me as I was going for a fun and youthful look. It's also super scratchy to put on, and it kind of hurt! It was a good dress and if not for the others, I still would've worn it.
review_summary: My bff got married in Vegas!

review_text: Fit like a glove but tight in the bust. Could wear a bra but didn't need one. The cut outs didn't highlight my squishy bits in fact was very faltering! I wish you could filter by dresses with pockets because they are awesome and I always want them. These were nice and deep and with the flare of the skirt I could carry so much in the pockets without any additional bulge. I would absolutely rent this again.
EXTREMELY flattering and comfortable. You can make it your own by playing with the buttons on the outer layer. Loved this dress and would definitely buy it - very versatile!
review_summary: Perfect dress for a laid-back night out or vacation

review_text: I wore this dress on vacation. I was a perfect outfit for dinner at the resort. I have a larger chest size and I was able to wear this without a bra. I didnt feel self conscious and I got some great compliments.
review_summary: A great fitting dress that is super comfortable.

review_text: Fit: based on other reviews about it running small, I ordered a 0 and 2 (I'm usually a 0). I actually found it to be true to size, if not a little bit big, and wished I had ordered the 00. The bust is maybe tighter than average, but waist and rib cage is true to size.
This was the perfect jacket to wear to dinner one night while we were on vacation in the mountains!  The color was great for evening and I liked the collar to made it stand out!
Great material, fit like it was made for me. Perfect for an early spring day, I wore mine with a bright silk scarf.

I like oversize clothing on warm days and for comfort. But this dress is very voluminous. It is very well made. It is a light weight denim almost like a chambray but a tinge heavier. If you are petite steer clear of this dress it's like four sizes too big. If you are expecting this may be the perfect dress for you in your third trimester. It must be worn with a camisole underneath because the V is very deep.
review_summary: Huge but well made and with attention to detail

review_text: Great jacket to dress up jeans or dress down a long sleeveless dress in the spring/fall.  Very versatile.

Pros- The top fit me very well and I received a number of compliments whilst wearing ti on my family vacation.

Cons- The material it's made of wrinkles easily, so I had to be very aware of how I sat and moved whilst in it.  Also, the white fabric at the bottom is somewhat see through, so you could see my highrise jeans through it. 

Overall- I would rent this shirt again and just wear it with different bottoms.
review_summary: I loved the fit of this shirt, but wasn't thrilled with the material.

review_text: Wore it with ankle jeans - cute look.  Glad I rented it on my Unlimited subscription.  Cute but not worth the money to buy.

This romper was super cute! I'm very busty and have a long torso and it fit pretty well. The lining sort of rolled out at the bust (probably wouldn't happen if I wasn't so busty!) and on the bottom a bit. However, because it was sort of "consistently out" it didn't look bad. I'll definitely rent again!
loved this dress, it was easy, effortless and the perfect amount of sheer

I wore this to an outdoor Christmas Festival in cold Northern California. I wore it with tights and black boots (basically as pictured in the RTR photo) The item looked a bit worn- but definitely added to the true rugged Lumberjack feel. It fit well with large pockets and was extremely warm with the woolish interior layer. Good for outdoors only- too warm for inside
I have a short torso; the back was a little slouchy on me.
The ties in the arms didn't have much give, but I didn't have any problems with the slit in the front.  The waist is super slimming!
review_summary: Was perfect for a Cabo vacation! Got compliments all night and felt like a sexy senorita.

review_text: Very pretty dress but ran too small, I wasn't able to wear it.  Maybe next time I'll try a larger size and see if that works
Fits true to size.
review_summary: Great dress!  Really comfortable.  I wore it out in Vegas and it was perfect.

review_text: I loved this top.  A little sheer, but I liked being outside my comfort zone.  I paired with white jeans+bright pink high heeled sandals and thought I looked great.
This is cute top I am petite and just had issue with the V neck that drop down to show my bra. I recommend a tank top.  I like the ruffles hid some belly issues.  I thought this is ok top.
review_summary: Cute for Casual or Dressy event

review_text: I had read reviews and wanted to size up because I didn't want it to be too tight in the chest area, so I got the 4R but I should have gotten the 2R. It fit OK and I still wore it on vacation, but I had to really tighten the straps (so they were doubled in the front), and it was loose enough that I had to wear a padded strapless bra underneath.  Also, the very thin straps looked like the stitching was coming undone and I was afraid they'd pop off, so I put a tiny safety pin to hold them in place just in case. That said, I LOVE the look of this dress. It's comfortable and a beautiful fabric and pattern. I could have gotten away with flat sandals underneath, but I wore some wedges to appear a little taller. But if you were much taller than me, you'd have to wear flats.
review_summary: Gorgeous flowy dress, but I should have stuck with my normal size

review_text: It was easy to dress up or down.  I loved it!  the only down side is that it wrinkles pretty easily.
The six was a bit big and overall, not too flattering for me.
It was a little long on me (I'm 5'4") but it flowed beautifully and I got tons of compliments from strangers. People were stopping me on the street asking me about the designer!

I really scored with my cruise picks from RTR Unlimited. I am not a huge fan of maxi dresses as they typically run short on my and I'm not always thrilled with the style in general. When I saw this dress though I knew it would be a great fit for one of my casual cruise dinners and I am a sucker for cut outs. First things first, I really wish I had sized down to a small. The dress doesn't have any give but I wouldn't say it 'runs large' like some of the other reviews. I'm typically a 4 (sometimes a 6) and thought it was a touch loose in the waist. Next, the dress came really wrinkly. It's evident that its the material and not really RTRs fault. I used a mini steamer on it and the wrinkles came out immediately.

I got loads of compliments on this number. At 5 foot almost 11 this dress just touched the top of my feet. I enjoyed that I wasn't tripping on it and people could see my sandals. The slip under the top layer of the dress was not too short (a first for me) and the pink is a real bright coral color. I would buy this dress in a heart beat if it was still summer as the price is actually not too shabby. No pockets on this number though ladies and a sticky bra or petals is a must. I also recommend nude underwear even with the slip.
review_summary: Great maxi for us tall girls.

review_text: Runs very true to size. If you have a larger bust, will be slightly tight but nothing to change sizes over. I loved wearing this dress but didn't get to wear for long and will rent again. the length was perfect on me and I'm 5'5.

If I lived in a colder climate I would own this jacket.  I think it runs a tad big.  I got the M, I am 5' 10" and the sleeves were still a tad long.  If I were going to wear it again and not layer sweaters under I think I would get the S.
review_summary: I love this jacket!  So many compliments.

review_text: The dress was super cute, but the dress runs small so my skin was bulging out of the cut outs so obviously I opted to not wear it
this looked amazing on my sister who has a very small bust. I rented it for myself and my DD just didn't fit in.
review_summary: good if you have a small bust

review_text: Perfect length for flats if your a little tall and SUPER comfy, hugs you just enough to show off what you would want it to. The cut out just below the bust is super sexy but still conservative...and the wide straps allow you to wear it with virtually any type of bra. This dress is a must!
review_summary: I want to buy this dress!

review_text: I wore this on my vacation in Mexico and I just loved this dress. It shows a lot of cleavage and leg, FYI. Really lovely fabric.
Rented for a ski trip.  It was snug.  I recommend ordering a size up.
Fit was relatively true to size, a little loose - but for this silhouette it definitely worked.  The fabric is soft and very comfortable.
review_summary: Wore this on vacation in New Orleans.  So comfortable, adorable, casual and chic all combined!

review_text: Party on the front and the back! This dotted romper is perfect for the summer! The print is super fun, it is very comfortable, and the fabric is light, making it ideal for a very hot day. My favorite part of it is the back! It is open and shows a bit of skin, but you are still able to wear a standard bra underneath, and the buttons gives the romper its charm! Nevertheless, I would suggest using nude undergarments, rather than colorful, so they don’t appear through the material. The shorts are short but at 5’8 it did not bother me and did not look vulgar at all. Another great detail is the pockets! Pair this romper with sandals or some white sneaker for a fantastic summer outfit!
It's well made, but I personally felt it was too tight and short (I prefer either short or tight, this dress was both).
review_summary: I didn't end up wearing it because it was tight and I was uncomfortable with how it looked

review_text: I used this on my unlimited and LOVED it!!   I wore it casual to a game with jeans and I have worn it to dinner with skirt and heels.

Where this for a night out in Old San Juan. It does run a little big through the top and I had to pin the straps quite high to make it look ok through the bust and waist. Lining over the hips fit correctly so I can't size down.

The reviews said it runs big but also tight in the butt.  I don't trust designer sizing yet as it has failed me in the past so I stuck with the 12. It was big!  I still wore the dress but had a cross over bag that helped hide the extra fabric. I'm fairly straight up and down so I had no problems with tightness anywhere.  I'll get dress again but in a 10 or maybe an 8.
5'5, 140lbs, 34C/28/36- fits great!
review_summary: Great Dress. Very Comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. Nice stretchy material.

review_text:
pros: color, fit, length
cons: wrinkles easily
The romper is classy but the bottom is so short that I decided to wear a Small but its true to size a bit lose though on the top but overall its a pretty beachy vacation outfit
review_summary: I would have worn the XS however the bottom is so short that it can show your butt cheeks

review_text:
This piece is top 5 all time from Rent the Runway. I absolutely loved the style with the long sleeves and front cut out with a light ruffle neckline. Such a unique piece, I am actually still contemplating purchasing it I loved it so much. 

The fit is very true to size, and unlike some rompers, this one does not ride up in the front or back making it very comfortable and flattering for the entire evening. 

The black detail along the bottom and neckline gave even more of a flattering look and with the long sleeves it's great even for a chilly evening.
review_summary: Showstopping sassy romper - perfect for a night out.

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation and absolutely loved it. Sadly I didn't take a picture in it, but plan to rent again. The fabric is thick and the fit is true to size. I found the dress to be super flattering and comfortable to wear. I'm 5'4" and the SR fit perfect with about 4 inch wedges. I highly recommend!
review_summary: Absolutely loved and will rent again!

review_text: Perfect fit. I'm 5'9  with a long torso so length can be tricky! But this fit me amazingly. I was definitely a head turner. The lace detail on the arms and back is gorgeous and adds to the LBD
review_summary: This dress fit me like a glove!

review_text: Perfect fit, I can imagine it fitting very short on taller women.
review_summary: Loved it, classy, cute and comfortable.

review_text: Flowing and loose fit that was very fun to wear.  Pockets and front slit made it move well when walking. It was pretty shear but tasteful - I wore a black skirt slip and strapless bra.  I would not wear for work event but it was perfect for vacation weekend with my husband.

Denim and I have this thing so I of course had to rent this English Factory dress! Running true to size, I recommend sizing up for backup. The overall fit of the dress was great and used the front buttons for closure. Although there is no stretch in the fabric, there is a comfortable amount of room in the bust and can be worn with a standard bra (if something is worn underneath). The flared hemline adds a sleek, feminine detail and was great for my vacation. As pictured, I paired with white long sleeve shirt and black mules. I will most definitely be renting again!
Loved this light easy dress. It was perfect to throw on during my beach vacation
Much prettier in person.  I planned to use it just as a beach cover-up but liked it so much that I wore it out, too.  Very versatile, unique cut, and very flattering!
True to size, soft, comfy, and flattering!

The dress is very comfortable overall. It has a bit of a stretch to it. It is so incredibly shimmery and so much fun to wear. The dress is very well constructed and lined and is guaranteed to be a sparkly hit! People kept commenting on how gorgeous it was. Can't wait to rent it again!
review_summary: I wore this in Las Vegas on a trip with my husband-- no less than 20 people stopped me and loved it!

review_text: This dress is very flattering - the zipper is slightly hard to get zipped up around the waist due to the amount of fabric and small zipper size.

Great dress - the fit and stretch were perfect - nice heavy fabric.  Only thing I found odd (which is just the style that I didn't see before ordering) is the straps are cut very square (instead of round between your boob and armpit) so you can see your bra on the side, but isn't a big deal as long as you're not wearing a hot pink bra.

After reading many reviews of women who were similar to my height and body type, it seemed that the Lilly dresses ran small and having just rented a Lilly dress a few weeks prior, so as a person who usually wears a 0-2 in dresses, I went with the size 2.  Overall, the dress was light and comfortable like the previous Lily dress I rented.  I don't know how a fuller busted (C and over) could wear a Lily dress in the same size...same goes for the other Lilly dress.   Again, waist could've been more fitted, but I have a very small waist, so that's my fit problem.  I was press/media photographer for high goal polo at the International Polo Club in Palm Beach, and Lilly Pulitzer is one of their main sponsors, so I wanted to rent a LP dress for the occasion.  Since the print was so bright and the neckline was decorated with the gold embellishment, I didn't wear any jewelry.  For makeup, I did a triple cat eye in turquoise, green, and pink with the Urban Decay Electric Palette, which completed my look.  LP dresses are great.  Very comfortable to move around in and sit in.  Would rent LP as a designer for another polo match, or if I was going on a cruise.
review_summary: Wore it as press photographer to the U.S. Open Polo Semifinals at the Palm Beach Polo Club.

review_text: Wore this dress to visit some art galleries on a vacation. It was wonderful - I didn't feel too hot, it was nice and flowy, and was able to style it both casual and dressy depending on where we were. One issue was the button-holes around the waist were really loose, and occasionally a button or two would open. If I hadn't worn black biker shorts under the dress I would have been showing a little bit of my underwear, so I would consider taking the same precautionary measures!
review_summary: Great dress for playing tourist in!

review_text: I ended up buying this before I even wore it out.  Tried it on twice to be sure and just love it.  The colors are beautiful.  I am 5'4" and love the length.  So many maxi's just drag around.  The tie in the back and adjustable straps make it easy to fit.  I got the two and it fits me perfectly, but I think the 4 would work as well.  I have been losing weight so that's why I got the two.   no bra needed (34b).  Cant wait to wear it on vacation and everywhere all summer
review_summary: This dress is stunning. Comfortable and fun.   I bought it!!!

review_text: This was a fun dress to wear in Vegas.  I'm not sure where else you could pull off this skimpy and sparkly number!  It runs big so I would order a size down.  I am truly a medium but thanks to the earlier reviews I also ordered a small and it was great...actually still had some room...but was fairly short.  Nice  for us bigger busted gals because you can wear a normal bra with it, has good coverage on top. Enjoy!
review_summary: This was definitely a show stopper- as I walked to dinner I must have had 15 people stop me!

review_text: I wore this for a trip to Savannah, GA! We toured all day and it was VERY comfortable! The length is  modest enough for church tours, but also fun enough for an afternoon wine tasting!  The fabric is stretchy and a bit silky.

This dress was so comfortable. It did run a bit larger in the middle & if the XS was available I would have rather had it. Overall it was actually my husbands favorite of the three dresses I rented for Vegas. I was able to dance all night and felt confident in this dress. I would definitely rent it again.
review_summary: Sparkly Eye Catcher! Fun Vegas Dress!

review_text: Rented this for summer vacation. I ordered the large and felt it was very baggy and needed to be accessorized with a belt. The light fabric was perfect for a hot summer day though!

Really easy to dress this up or down. I wore it during the day with comfy booties while walking around NYC! I literally had someone stop me on the street and say they loved my outfit. Makes RTR unlimited so worth it when that happens!!!

I've put on weight recently and was skeptical about heeding the other reviews and sizing down to an XS, especially since a S wasn't available for my backup size. The XS fit great, however, because the cut was loose enough that I did not feel at all constricted. The armholes are big and the material is quite thin, so I recommend a pretty bralette and boyshorts for underneath.
review_summary: Perfect festival dress - flowy and fun!

review_text: Everyone complimented me on this dress in person and later on photos in social media. BEAUTIFUL colors in person. Super comfortable. Love the buttons down the front and the pockets. Want to buy this for real life!!
review_summary: Wore to rehearsal dinner for destination wedding

review_text: I loved how this draped and the colors are beautiful.  It took a little figuring out once I had it on but it really is a gorgeous top...I'd rent this one again.
review_summary: Awesome vacation up the Pacific Northwest and into Canada!

review_text: I originally rented in Medium and had to re-rent in a small. Even with the small I needed to wear a belt (wish I had a little gold one) to keep the pants high. With a belt, the look was fantastic! I wore this for a weekend in Napa- paired with a floppy hat and casual sandals, the outfit worked great. I wish I had an occasion to wear this with heels for a night out on the town but I didn't :(
I can't get enough of Herve Leger! The small fit great! It's a very fitted dress but still comfortable. Definitely order a larger backup size just in case.
review_summary: Love the color-blocking! It's a very "all eyes on you" dress. Pairs well w/silver heels.

review_text: Usually dress size 0 but bust area was a bit tight so i just went with size 2. It was super simple yet elegant. Fabric is neither too thick nor thin. Would definitely rent it again!
it was roomy in the bust (which is a phrase ive never had to use, im big chested) but it was good!  very long - but manageable.  everyone loved it.  looked great with the necklace I rented as well.
I wore this on my bachelorette weekend to brunch. Not too short (and I have a booty) or tight. I could see this not working for  larger chested women, but overall this was a great romper.

I wore this for my friend's bachelorette getaway and it looked great! You can close or open up the front to your liking/comfort level. I taped the dress down so it looks tasteful. I love the pockets- every dress should have pockets.  The dress had a lot of room for an xs. I would have liked it more if it was xxs, but that's not an option. Overall fun dress to wear.
I rented this top for vacation in Italy. It is a great effortless style that you can throw on with jean shorts or dress it up for dinner.

So it's short!!! But I love it!!! It's also super low!!! But that doesn't bother me either!!! My only complaint is that the arms are awkwardly short. And you can't pull it up at all. I wish it was either 3/4 sleeve or full sleeve. But it's a great dress!!!
review_summary: Night before my wedding in Las Vegas.

review_text: I wore this on my birthday for a girls' trip to Epcot's Food & Wine Festival. The 2 was a little snug on my butt, but not too much to keep me from wearing it. The 4 was a little too shapeless on me. It was extremely comfortable to wear, especially with eating and drinking all day! It looked super cute with my Evil Queen-themed mouse ears!
This dress flows beautifully when you walk. This color has been everywhere this season and I fell in love with it as soon as I put it on. The fabric feel and cut feel expensive and well made.

I would give these 5 starts if the liner/material would have been just a TAD thicker. With no back pockets, I felt slightly self conscious that everything was visible underneath the light weight fabric. But I LOVED these. So versatile, and they traveled well. Would still rent again. A bit out of my comfort zone with the high waist, but my friends really loved the look. At at 5'10'' they weren't too short in the rise.
This dress was amazing! I will rent again. Wore it to see a concert in Vegas and it was fun and comfortable. Beautiful details. Fits true to size.

I LOVE this dress. I rented it to wear while on vacation in Florida. It was technically my backup dress for a wedding, but since I knew my regular dress would work, I wore this on a sunset cruise with my boyfriend. We sailed out on a catamaran, and it looked stunning in the wind. The underskirt/lining is fairly tight and hit about midthigh and the overlay of the dress was loose and flowing. I wore it with a nude strapless bra since the top of the yoke was tan and sort of sheer. I wore the MR but the LR was probably the better fit. I wanted it to be a little shorter since I wanted to be able to scramble around the deck easily. The underskirt was stretchy so it didn't really matter that I wore the smaller size. Loved it!

This is my perfect summer dress - a great print, a flattering fit, and both comfortable and stylish!  I received so many compliments on this dress and I felt great wearing it.  I am tall and the small fit well and was plenty long - this would probably be too long on anyone under about 5'6 or so.
I love this dress! It was just perfect for my beach vacation! This was just the perfect length!
review_summary: Gorgeous, cute dress perfect for vacation!

review_text: I am a Florida girl and wore this sweater for a ski vacation in Vermont (temp around 16 to 20 the whole time). The sweater is warm, not itchy, and not super bulky. Definitely recommend. Great ski sweater/ lodge vibe with a modern twist. I would rent again if going up north.

First off: neon glow in this gown. Obsessed with the colour, I can never get enough of highlighter shades. I also love neoprene dresses and maybe could have gone a little tighter on this, but it was comfy and perfect for daytime Vegas events. Good length on my short frame, too, and did not need a bra even with a larger bust.

Really liked this dress for a night out in Vegas.  Rented the M with L as backup.  Both fit but I went with the L for a little extra room.  Fairly basic, not a lot of bells and whistles on this one, but sometimes less is more.  It's a great blank canvas that you can really dress up with fun heels and accessories.
This outfit is super unique and fun I got tons of compliments and it's comfortable to wear!!

I wore this for a night out in Vegas.  It was comfortable - it did ride up a bit, but I was dancing so I expected that to a degree.  Unlike a different Versace dress I rented from RTR, this one did come with the telltale button on the back and the colors were vibrant and fun.  I would recommend this dress for a night out, bachelorette, etc.

This dress was so comfortable! I wore it for my birthday in Vegas. I ordered the small and medium and felt more comfortable in the medium. The fabric was thick enough I chose not to wear a bra. I am tall and this dress is short but it worked for my occasion. I wore it with the Phoenix necklace which I got lots of compliments on!

I have athletic arms and a wide back and this fit perfectly. It got looks everywhere I went in Vegas. I would get this again- works with jeans, but can be dressed up. Wonderful tailoring. Quality material.

I rented this under my unlimited membership and intended to wear it on vacation.  The fabric is pretty thick and heavy; ideal for cool spring nights on the beach.  However, the body of this dress is HUGE.  I tend to gravitate toward the cape look as well as oversized, but this was beyond.  I would definitely recommend ordering a size down, though I am unsure how well the upper portion (arms and chest) would fit.  Overall, a really cute dress, but you'd be lucky if it doesn't look strange while wearing.  I sent it back the day after I received in the mail.

I was scared that the dress would be too long for me as I am "petite". ( 5'3) I can see this dress easily being worn for weddings, bridal showers, baby showers, date night.. etc. I am not a pink dress kind of girl but feel in love with this dress- more of a blush, nude color. I def recommend heels! Bisous :)
review_summary: I had a shoot for an article-In love with this dress and was so sad to have to give it back!

review_text: Wonderful dress that is very slimming, however very short!  I almost did not wear it due to the length, but my boyfriend liked so I gave it a try and am glad I did because I was complimented all night long!
I think that its a nice flouncy pant.  Great for summer with little tee's and flip flops or heels like in the RTR photo
Wore this top with black skinny jeans and heels.  Fits well, but the shoulder ties do slip off.  Will rent again!
review_summary: Very cute top for an evening out!

review_text: Very light weight and breezy, comfy!

Three words: best rental EVER. I ordered this for a trip to Vegas and absolutely fell in love. The lace is high-quality, the cut is flattering, and the piece is an absolute show-stopper. I've had unlimited for a few months now, and this is the best thing I've rented yet. If you're thinking about it, do it!
Fits very true to size. The top of the dress is stretchy so it will fit most bust sizes.
review_summary: It is very flowy and comfortable which made for a night of fun and no wardrobe malfunctions.

review_text: Cute and comfortable but not overly flattering. I wore a slip with it to be safe but I'm old-fashioned.
