This was a very pretty dress but it has two under layers under the skirt to help it be 'flowy'. These layers are heavy and make the dress noisy when you walk. They also make the dress very hot. It was a 100 degree day the day I had planned on wearing this, so I couldn't wear it otherwise I would have been way too hot.

this dress is much prettier in person, the color is a wine burgundy and very flattering on skintones.  This fabric is UBER soft and the interesting neckline makes it fun.  wear with heels to dress up, flats to dress down, but just a comfy dress that looks quality for sure ;)

I am obsessed with this dress! It fits a little tightly, like a sheath. I usually wear a 2/4 and this one fits more like 4/6. I wore this to a fancy dinner in Cancun during vacation. My fiance couldn't stop staring all night!

I normally wear a 2 or 4, but if i wanted the dress to fit like it does on the model, I would have had to wear at least a 10. The 6 was skin tight and not at all what i wanted. Returned it without wearing it.

This was a very nice, not flimsy dress. I did have a few people think it was a swimsuit coverup, so it's definitely casual (although I could have probably dressed it up more). Very comfortable and I liked the way the tie at the top was adjustable. I would rent this again for sure. There was plenty of room in the size 4, I could have worn a 2

Got this with the tags on it still which is my favorite thing whenever I use this service! Stunning dress, photographs really well, is versatile for multiple occasions, and is an overall showstopper. Only slight problem was I was a size too busty for it to really look amazing but if you're a B-C this will be perfection. Didn't mind looking slightly full on top and would definitely rent or buy again!
Light and comfortable, but runs large. I kept joking that I looked pregnant, so if you don't like a baggy look this dress isn't for you.
review_summary: It's a great dress! I wore it wine tasting in Napa. It's light and airy, but does run very large.

review_text: What an amazing summer dress! This dress at first may not call your attention but once on it is so flattering! I am obsessed with it! It is super lightweight, has a great cut and length. There is a gorgeous open back, so I would recommend using it with a NuBra, petals, or a low back bra. Running true to size, I would suggest sizing up for back up. I love how you can wear it casually or dress it up by putting some heels and adding accessories with it. I would suggest using simple gold tone jewelry since the dress already has a statement print. Prepare yourself to receive a ton compliments!

I love love this dress. It was so much fun to wear out in vegas with my girlfriends.  It's an attention getter for sure, so be prepared to have a lot of people look at you and make comments all night. The dress has a good amount of stretch in it so it was very comfortable to get on and dance in all night long. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it was soooooo short. I think that's because my 36ddd chest took up a lot of the fabric. It barely covered my butt standing, don't even think about sitting in it. Such fun!
review_summary: It's a dazzling, disco ball dress!

review_text: I've never worn this brand before, but I am a huge fan now. I wore this for a concert and night out in Vegas. I love a subtly sexy dress, and this one fit the bill!
Precious jacket
I love this romper. It's short, but flirty.
review_summary: I've rented this romper multiple times, and it's perfect for summer occasions.

review_text: This dress was the perfect length for me, and I didn't have to wear heels! I'm 5'1 and I wore this with sandals for a girls day. Everyone loved it, and I got compliments on the beautiful colors on the dress.
review_summary: Perfect Maxi dress for shorter girls!

review_text: Love this top. Will pair it with some white pants.

Talk about a full skirt. It was definitly on the heavy side. I mean common its a leather skirt, so don't expect airy and lite. I should've gone with a 0 instead of the 2. since it was a little loose, but since I have hips it kinda just dangled there. Do wear with tall shoes, I'm short and you can see how it would look on a shorter person.
Nude undies for sure
review_summary:
Great romper for long waisted
Very comfortable
You can wear a normal bra with it

review_text: If you are looking to feel like a goddess/princess/romantic and flowy then this is the dress for you! I rented it for a vacation I recently took and wore it while touring vineyards. Received so many compliments, made me feel so beautiful and luxurious. One con is that I wish the straps were adjustable because I found they fell off of my shoulders easily, but that is a small complaint against a list of so many reasons why I will likely rent this again.
Material was neoprene and stretchy.
review_summary: I loved this dress! I got so many compliments, comfortable, and a great color for tropical place!

review_text: I made the 2 work but the 0 would have been better. Loved this dress. Beautiful fabric.
review_summary: Too big but the 0 wasn't available

review_text: Definitely a bit big, but it fit me across the shoulders and bust so I'm not sure I could have sized down. Just long enough for me. I liked that the V neck balanced out the dress so it didn't look like it was swallowing me. Wore with tights and Adrienne Landau Grey Rex fur poncho on a freezing sightseeing day in South Dakota, and I was perfectly warm and cozy. Recommend!

As mentioned by many others, this gown does run slightly large. I'm typically around a size 4 and the 2L fit me best. I'm 5'6" and with 4 inch heels, the LONG is exactly what I needed. This gown is absolutely stunning in person and in photos. I received many compliments throughout the night, as I'm sure any one would in this gorgeous gown! The sequins never rubbed under my arms, but I could see where that may be an issue for others. This gown was perfect for the formal night on my cruise. I was beyond satisfied with my choice and would definitely recommend this gown to anyone else looking for an elegant yet sexy gown!

I got a 4 and size 6 for back up- While the fit itself didn't make a HUGE difference (obviously, the 6 had more breathing room), I had to go with the size 4 because the 6 was just too long. The slit on the side is something I'm not used to so it took some getting used to.
review_summary: Got a lot of compliments- Gorgeous & Classy, with a hint of sexy :)

review_text: I LOVED this dress! It was so comfortable and perfect for a day at the wineries! Runs a bit large.

Could've gone down a size. Normally don't wear "W" sizes, but opted to go with that with formal wear since I've found they tend to run small in "regular" sizes. Beautiful dress. I'll agree with the comments that it's not very shapely (even with shapewear). It kinds of just hangs. Not heavy at all. I did get many compliments though.  Only real complaint was the pain in returning it. Kind of a hassle to find a UPS authorized return sight when on vacation. Minor problem, but finally tracked one down open on weekends to return.
review_summary: Great for formal dinners on cruise

review_text: Fit exactly as expected. Comfortable and easy to wear. I wouldn't recommend it for a drinking event, as it is sort of a pain  to unbutton yourself.
review_summary: I wore this for a wine tour with my girlfriends to celebrate my bday. Such a great time!

review_text: Loved this dress and wore it on a recent trip to Miami. I usually am between a size 10 & 12 and opted for the 12. The 10 fit well but the elastic piece in the back was a bit more snug than I was looking for.

Wore this at a beach party and it couldn't have been more perfect.  I will be shopping from this designer in the future.  The fit is perfect, and no fuss.  The dress stays put, right where it needs to be.  Wore the  small petite with flats, the small regular would have been perfect if I'd worn wedges.
review_summary: The fit of this dress is what makes it brilliant.

review_text: Yes its short and tight but its constructed very well and sucks everything together in all the right spots
review_summary: hot dress. great shape almost like a corset throughout the body.

review_text: I loved everything about this dress.  It is outside my usual style but yet was perfect for my vacation to the Islands.  The length accentuated my legs, the dress showed the appropriate cleavage without being too much.  It is the perfect dress for travelling, picnics, beach or party.  Cannot wait to rent this dress again!
review_summary: The epitome of casual chic.  This dress was fun, effortless but sexy and a show stopper!

review_text: Easy to wear and not too bad to get on and off - really enjoyed wearing this romper on vacation.

I was sent a L as this was all they had so it was definitely on the bigger side, a M would have been better, But thanks to the adjustable straps it was do-able. This is a great dress for a vacay night out!
review_summary: A great combination of girly, feminine and fun.

review_text: Super cute dress, wore it to a music festival in 80 degree weather, the fabric was great because its heavy so i didnt sweat through it. The fit around the neckline was great because it held in place without being tight but its very long and very roomy so it felt a little like a sack, probably could have sized down.

Wore this dress in the evening while on vacation in Punta Cana. The fit was great. I have a larger chest and am always hesitant with thin straps but this gave enough coverage. I wore it with a NuBra to give it a little bit of support. Overall it was great in the hot weather and very cute.
Absolutely gorgeous!
Fit was perfect and so was the length.
review_summary: Got so many compliments on this dress!

review_text: This was a great dress to wear brunching on shopping while vacationing in LA. It's a short maxi so it worked perfectly for me -- I'm 5'2". I loved the cut outs! The only thing is that it felt like I was carrying around a lot of fabric. I ended up feeling hot and sweaty underneath the dress at points. But it's beautiful. And it's casual enough to wear just to brunch or nice enough to wear to a wedding.

I did not like this item at all.  The fabric is a decent weight, and I wore it on a day when it was 85 degrees, so it was too hot.  Also, the shoulders do not stay down, I was constantly tugging at it.  Finally, it made me look like a balloon.  I didn't expect it to be fitted, but I also did not expect it to fit like a tent on me.
review_summary: I love off-the-shoulder but didn't love this.

review_text: The cut is SO flattering, but if you have large boobs, I would pass on this. If you are a member if the IBTS (itty bitty titty society) then this is the dress for you. It does run small though, the 8 fit but the 10 would have been better. Perfect length for tall girls and modest despite the cut out detail.
review_summary: Perfect summer casual day dress, tight on chest

review_text: I am 5'5" 120lbs and wear a 32c bra. Fit perfectly but was a little long. Would rent again :)
review_summary: Napa + wine = NOTHING CAN GO WRONG

review_text: So comfortable and stylish! i felt amazing in this jump suit! i got so many compliments. the color is rich looking and the fabric is light. I wanted to keep this so bad! love love love it! Fits true to size!
review_summary: Sexy  and fabulous in New Orleans!

review_text: I am not normally one for big prints, but this one is very flattering.  True to size.  The placement of the straps is very flattering as is the hemline.  I was on a beach vacation, so no where fancy to go.  Dressed it down with sandals and had a great dinner out.  Would rent this again.

This dress fit perfect! I was worried about the length but I just wore my wedge heels with it and it was great. This has a semi deep v cut so either you would want to go braless or wear the bras that are made for that. This was a beautiful maxi dress and I will definitely rent this again.
review_summary: Cute and Sexy Vacation Maxi Dress!

review_text: I rented this also for my Vegas trip, however I don't think it's as flattering as the model portrays. It definitely clings to your hips, so if you're sensitive about that, don't get this. Also, you'll need pasties or go braless as it has a deep v-neckline. Very sparkly though. It also scratched my under arms a bit with the sequences, but that's to be expected.
review_summary: need a special bra, and it clings to your hips

review_text: Beautiful maxi that I rented for a recent vacation. The color and cut of the dress is incredibly flattering and beautiful. I got so many compliments. Only downside is the dress does run a little big and is very long. If you are a tall gal - this is your maxi dress! I'm 5/7 and unfortunately this dress dragged on the ground a lot. Great otherwise!
Rented it for a weekend on the bike.  I absolutely love it, I will rent it again.

This jumpsuit seriously was awesome. Such a statement piece that I was excited to rent. I received countless compliments. Fit perfectly, would rent again. I am usually between a 4-6, but I rented a 6 and it was very comfortable. Safety-pinned the neckline so it wasn't too low cut with my small chest.
review_summary: Stunning, statement jumpsuit- perfect for many occasions!

review_text: I rented this for not one but two vacations this summer and wore it regularly to pool parties, the beach and just for everyday. This may be one of the most comfortable and flattering dresses I've ever worn! Would recommend highly!!
review_summary: Fabulous frock for frolicking in the sun!

review_text: I wore this dress in Las Vegas for a dinner and show and I got stopped by strangers to compliment me. I will definitely rent this dress again.
review_summary: The fit on this dress is amazing. It hugs your curves!!e

review_text: This dress is gorgeous and versatile.   Can be dressed up or down.  Great for vacation as it could be worn for a dinner party or a beach party etc...  I will def rent this dress again.
I wore this dress to the Pacquio fight in Vegas.  It was very comfortable and looked amazing.  The slit is very high, but makes the dress.  It fits very tight so order one size up for backup.
review_summary: Gorgeous dress fit perfectly and shows every curve!  Extremely flattering!

review_text: Beautiful dress. Fit perfectly!
review_summary: This dress made a Vegas night out great.

review_text: Can't wait to rent this in pink!
I really enjoyed this top. I'm a 36DD and the 8 was a perfect fit. I wore a strapless bra. You can adjust the length of one of the shoulder straps (the thin one), so that's nice. Highly recommend!
review_summary: Flattering, unusual, dress it up or down! A great rental.

review_text: I was a little unsure about this, but it turned out to be super cute. I was afraid it would look like I was showing midriff, but the bottoms are a bit high waisted. It actually ended up being more covered up than I thought. The one thing is that the rise in this felt kind of short.
review_summary: Very unique option for girls weekend in Miami.

review_text: I loved this jacket! It was perfect for the cool Nashville nights. I paired it with an all black outfit once, and another with a purple top. The silver sheen of the jacket almost reflected what you wore, so with the purple top it looked lilac. Super great fit, not too tight in the arms.

I rented this for a seminar / dinner in Key West.  I ended up not wearing it only because the group and outings were super casual and it actually got pretty cold.  Honestly, this isn't really my style anyway but I wanted to try something out of my comfort zone of strictly maxi dresses and shorts for the beach.  It was a cute dress.  I liked that it was form fitting but still felt light and comfortable.  I think it might be more flattering for women with bigger busts than mine.  I felt like I was having to move the top part around a lot before I was comfortable with how it looked.
review_summary: Not the right choice for event.

review_text: The color and fit was fantastic. I wore it to dress up jeans for a casual dinner with family.
review_summary: Great Way to Dress up Jeans

review_text: This dress was just meh. The waist was much more flattering than I expected, but it wouldn't stay off my shoulders. It looked great when I pulled it down, but it moved up each time I moved.
Overall very nice lace shirt. I felt like it was short in length in the torso area. Went well with jeans for causal day.

I gave this dress a 4 only because the lace doesn't have much give, and it was snug in my arms.  I think if I went a size up it would have been too big.  Otherwise.. I loved it so much.  I wore this dress on my bachelorette party in Texas, and it even worked with some brown boots!
Took this coat to Alaska on vacation, wow! Stylish, warm, great pockets. This coat had some great outdoor adventures in 8 degrees!
review_summary: Did not even need the button on fur trim to look great!

review_text: Comfortable!

This is a beautiful dress, not too heavy.  It is a little long, I wore it with 5 inch heels and it was still on the ground. Also be careful with the waist line because it cut me a little higher than I normally like. Be aware if you have a smaller waist.

I have a small waist yet this dress still was pretty darn snug around the band. I was hoping it would hang a bit looser. Loved the neckline and loved how flowy the bottom was. If there was one size higher, I'd rent again for a bit looser fit. I normally don't have a problem with things being too tight around the waist, so that was a bit of a disappointment. Still photographed great though (also, it should be known that I was in austin eating tacos so maybe that's why it's so tight 😂) See more on insta of my unlimited subscription: @iamsarahwebb
N/A
It was perfect. No complaints and he loved it!!  Loved the open back. Fit true to size. Did not need to keep adjusting this dress. will rent again.
review_summary: Dress was perfect for a well needed vacay in Vegas with my fiancé. Was able to visit store, Thanks!!

review_text: I felt like I was wearing body armor.  The dress was so heavy it instantly made me hulk up.  Overall, just okay.  Definitely ran a little large.
a little big on me
review_summary: it was lovely and fun color !

review_text: The material had a stretchy quality to it to help it fit just right, but was also form fitting.  I received many compliments on this dress!

I have actually ordered a similar dress to this one made by the same designer, so when I ordered, I had confidence that it would fit. Well, it didn't and I needed a size larger which proved problematic since all the other sizes were out rented due to New Years Eve. I eventually got the dress but didn't even wear it the whole night. I had dress tape but it kept gapping around my bust, showing my bra and the straps were loose and didn't stay in place either. The sequins ended up being itchy too. It wasn't my favorite but it still made heads turn as I walked around Vegas which is always nice.
Fit well, fun to dance in
Fit perfectly in the waste. Wore while out and about on a weekend trip with friends.
review_summary: Very cute with a simple black tank. Comfortable too!

review_text: Rented for a vacation but ran really big and was not flattering. Didn't wear it.
review_summary: Didn't fit the way I wanted it to

review_text: Fit pretty true to size. The bust line came down pretty low. I had to use a pin to cinch it together so my boobies were not hanging out.
review_summary: Great dress for a fancy occasion. Sparkles!!

review_text: I actually loved everything about this except for the extremely awkward fit on a tall person if you know what I mean. 5'8 and above don't waste your time renting this it's not gonna fit, 5'6 and below this is going to look so cute on you!
review_summary: Do not rent if you're above 5'8!

review_text: It fit perfectly - hugged all the right areas and highlighted my curves very well.  Only gripe was using the bathroom in this thing - the buttons are kinda hard to un-do.  But that's the cost I'm willing to pay to look fab in this!
review_summary: This romper is super cute and fun!  I rented it for a night on the town in Vegas & it fit perfectly!

review_text: I am always worried with jumpsuits that the waist/rear combo isn't going to be quite right with my athletic thighs and butt.  There was nothing to be worried about with this piece though!  It was incredibly flattering, super comfortable and I can't wait to have a reason to borrow it again!
review_summary: Flattering even if ya have a rear

review_text: This dress was so comfortable and cute! I got tons of compliments while on my trip, so I also wore it to a dinner date when I got back home. I'm 6'-0" and curvy, but it still hung well on me. It's not super long, it hit me somewhere just above my ankles, but still looked good (similar to the model). I wore a black strapless bra with it, it was slightly visible under my armpits, so if that bothers you, you may need a bandeau.

This dress is so flattering - I got tons of compliments. I wore it on a vacation with my 65 year old mother. It covered just enough that she was happy, but had some sex appeal thanks to the wrap silhouette. The fabric is smooth and slippery and it has great movement. I would definitely rent this again.
Very comfortable dress!!!
review_summary: Such an easy process and the dress was in great condition.

review_text: I absolutely adore this dress! Unfortunately, I rented it to wear to a dinner on a beach vacation and it was just a bit too formal. The good news, though, is that I now have a favorite dress and I can't wait to rent it again! It would be the perfect dress for a nice dinner or a fall / winter wedding. The purple color is even prettier in person and the waist is incredibly fitted and flattering. My only word of caution is that the arms run REALLY small.
review_summary: Classy, sexy, and elegant all at the same time!

review_text: These pants are so cute and soft and so comfortable but not for the ladies who have bigger thighs- those vertical lines did no justice.
Fit well.   Great length for my 5'8 height.  I didn't love how the black belt didn't go across the back of the jumpsuit. But cute overall.
I ordered this to wear on 2 long haul flights, and it was awesome. It's ultra comfortable, but also SO chic.
The dress fit like a glove, but was definitely mini. Back was a great detail. The material is thick enough that you can wear it without a bra and was extremely comfortable.
review_summary: Great dress for a girl's night out!

review_text: flattering & don't need a bra! the perfect dress :)

Rented this as part of my Bday dress. I celebrated my 30th in Vegas and this was the most appropriate dress for it. I felt hot and looked the part too. I was able to wear a regular bra with it. I knew I was going to have a big dinner the night I wore it and the peplum help to hide my bloated stomach afterwards. The dress hit me right above my knees. It was just perfect and my husband loved it. Sad part was that I did not get a picture of me in it but its my favorite rental to date. Had not fitting issues at all.

I wore this to my Brother's wedding rehearsal and LOVED IT! It was super comfortable. It did run a tad bit large and was long, but I wore 4" wedges with it so it sat perfectly on the floor. Sorry, I do not have pictures :( The sleeves stayed put and I had plenty of room to eat and drink wine and didn't feel like it showed! I would rent this dress again! //  I am 5'4 and weigh around 140 lbs.

I rented this for a trip to Amsterdam because I knew it would be cold.  Didn't have the belt though when it was delivered.  It still looked cute without the belt.  I wore a black turtleneck underneath.  Very cute and warm!
review_summary: Overall very good.  4 Stars because no belt.

review_text: Loved this jacket but wished I had sized down 1-2 sizes. Went with a 6 to add layers underneath, but easily could have worn a 4 or maybe even a 2. Got lots of compliments and it was very warm.

Wore this dress to a BBQ.  It was extremely comfortable and it stayed off the shoulders without any fidgeting. It was short in length (I'm 5'7), but it was perfect for me.  Received so many compliments.  Will certainly rent again.

I normally wear I size 4 but needed a 6 in this so keep that in mind. This outfit is FUN - it's unlike anything I would normally wear at home, but for a crazy night out in a town like Miami or Vegas it's perfect! Or a disco party. I felt great in it and got lots of compliments. For the right event/town, you can't go wrong!
review_summary: Girls weekend in South Beach, FL and wore this to a nice dinner out and a club night - nailed it!

review_text: This was a stylist pick and I actually ended up wearing it over my pick. The back is a bit confusing with lots of ties, but one I had it all figured out, it looked amazing!. The length in the back allows you to wear wedges with it and the light material looked great "fluttering" in the wind. My only warning would be you run the risk of some side boob showing, so might not be ideal for busty girls. Wish I owned this dress!
review_summary: Love the back of the dress

review_text: Great fit.   Wore with western boots.
review_summary: Wore this to Arizona.  Loved the western feel.

review_text: The dress fit well but was snug. Like a lot of reviewers mentioned the cutouts weren't as prominent as I would have liked but they were a fun subtle touch.

I love the way the romper looked. It was perfect for going to a Britney Spears concert in Las Vegas. I got lots of compliments. However, I wouldn't wear it again because it made me too nervous that I might have a wardrobe malfunction--I kept having to check that everything was in place. Double sided tape is a must but even then, it's very little material to cover the girls. I'm pear-shaped and it was hard to squeeze it over my hips too.

pro: cute, casual, fits petite people well.
con: hard to take on and off, suffocating after you eat.
I love it that the bra is not needed.
review_summary: The dress is gorgeous and fits dinners with parents as despite the lace it doesn't look overly sexy.

review_text: I really loved this dress.  It is simple with a fun print and a flattering cut. I read that this dress runs a bit big so I ordered the medium long and it fit perfectly. I was able to wear a small wedge heel and the dress hit the floor perfectly. Luckily I wore this on vacation to Mexico in February so I can definitely rent this again in the summer!

I was apprehensive about a jumpsuit since I have never worn one before. I ordered the size 2 & 4 and ended up going with 2 because I wanted it tight enough that I wouldn't worry about it sliding down. It definitely was snug - no bending over possible - but comfortable enough to wear through dinner, a broadway show, and drinks afterward. There's nothing overly striking about the outfit itself so you can take it ANY direction with statement accessories - shoes, jewelry or a great bag. I paired a RTR necklace with it!
review_summary: Such a perfect NYC-night-out outfit!! So easy to accessorize and fun to wear. AND THERE'S POCKETS.

review_text: Very pretty, worn for out of town venue.
review_summary: Pretty dress, glad I can rent different designers to see what I like.

review_text: Runs a little large. I usually wear a small but could have worn xsmall. It is cut large in arms and a bit revealing in that area. Overall, great dress for travelling and summer.
review_summary: Great summer dress for vacation in Croatia.

review_text: Cute romper, perfect for an evening in Hawaii.  Not the easiest to fasten (rompers are so tricky in the bathroom!).  But adorable and festive.
Ran a litle big, probably could have done the 10. But loved the way it made me feel! Super sexy, a little shorter in front than back. Can't wear a bra due to kind of open back.
review_summary: Perfect! Loved it! Felt so good and cute!

review_text: Fabric is a little think so it's good for a chilly night.

I usually end up in the smaller size, but in this case I had to go with my larger backup size 2. The side zipper doesn't run the full length of the side, so I couldn't even get my shoulders through the 0. I would definitely suggest sizing up for your backup for that reason. Once I was in the dress, though, it fit perfectly, and even had pockets! I got compliments from strangers all night. It was a great dress for dinner and a show in Vegas - sexy but still elegant.

I really loved this romper. It's super bright, and was perfect for a day on the beach that turned into dinner with friends at a restaurant. The fabric is thin (wear nude underwear) and it ran small. I am normally comfortable in a 6 in Lilly Pulitzer, but this was tight in the waist and and shorts. I wore the 8, which was better in the shorts part but still tight in the waist. Definitely order a size up.
review_summary: Cute romper, but Lilly Pulitzer's sizing has been weird lately

review_text: I loved this dress - wore it for a day out in San Diego. The only minor minus on this dress is one button would pull on my bust even though I had plenty of room in the bust. I had to adjust quit a bit.
Very Missoni, great breathable fabric, superb quality, just the right amount of shimmer. I'm usually a 4/6 in dresses.  Went with a 42 for this one, but definitely needed a smaller size.
review_summary: really pretty dress, but runs large

review_text: Wore to the Russian tea room and a Broadway play when recently in NY in September during fashion week. Received many compliments. This dress made me feel very fashionable without being over the top.
review_summary: Such A BEAUTIFUL DRESS AND COMFORTABLE.

review_text: This dress was definitely cute for a casual affair however the lining was much tighter than anticipated, making sitting down rather hard. The fit was weird and it didn't seem like it was made very well. I would choose another dress over this one!

This romper was so comfortable. I have quite a long torso, but the romper fit perfectly. The fabric is soft and cool on a hot day. Usually I don't wear such short styles, but I felt adequately covered up.
review_summary: Well dressed on a hot day.

review_text: perfect dress...tons of complements really comfortable and felt great in it
review_summary: perfect dress...tons of complements really comfortable and felt great in it

review_text: wore this maxi for work with a light jacket. loved it so much i brought it on vacation with me! The material is top quality and its a beautiful pattern

The dress was pretty tight on my big bust.  If you are bigger than a 36DD, I would go up a size.  It was a little high in the waist, which is why I gave it 4 not 5 stars, and only because that's a personal thing.
review_summary: Tried it on for a future rental.

review_text: I was in Vegas and there's a Rent the Runway store in the Cosmopolitan so I was able to try on a lot of different dresses. This dress was great for a Tiesto concert at Hakasan.
review_summary: Awesome dress to attend a Tiesto concert in!

review_text: Great dress for casual vacation wear.  Long enough and loose enough.  Worked for walking around all day.  Great rental.  I am never a small and the small fit great.

The dress was not stretchy and was very thick.  It is not  fitted through the waist as you would think from the photo.  It has shoulder pads, which, surprisingly were fine.  It was really really short, which makes up for the fact that it wasn't fitted through the waist.    I loved the color blue and the pattern.  It was great for Vegas.
It is a shirt dress that is feminine. Fit was good, great for summer!

It's a cute romper with dressy details; definitely more for a night out than for every day.  Pretty much looked exactly like the pictures with the model and is great quality.  Only complaint is that the sleeves are a bit on the short side, but you couldn't really tell when it was on because of the extra ruffle.

Terrific skirt! Loved the asymmetrical hem and the weight of the denim. Be prepared for an asymmetric waistline as well (keep in mind when pairing with a top). I wore it with heels, flats, dressed up and dressed down. A very versatile piece - I am considering buying it. The only negative was the zipper - the zipper felt cheap, and the zipper pull was out diagonally, it didn't lay flat.
review_summary: Rented this for an extended three-month vacation in France.

review_text: I cannot find a fault with this dress. It fit perfectly and complemented my figure perfectly. I wore it on a flight to Texas and was completely comfortable and stylish.
review_summary: Perfect Fit.  The fit and flare worked perfectly on my figure.

review_text: Loved wearing this..it's so chic for summer. Endless compliments! Please don't belt it ladies!! It's so beautiful and fashion-forward on it's own, I adored the fullness of it. The arm detail CAN be a bit restricting, but the nice part is, you don't HAVE to wear them. When I went to dinner, I left my arms out of them and they just fall normally to the side. Perfect Summer Dress!

Definitely runs small. I typically wear a 4 or 6 in most dresses, and the 6 fit like a glove.  If my bust was any bigger (I'm 5'7", 145#, and 32C), the 6 would not have fit.  The lining was nice and hid any panty lines or anything else.  I felt fabulous in this dress - highly recommend it!
review_summary: I felt amazing in this dress!

review_text: I rented this jacket for a weekend music festival in Chicago in mid September. It was PERFECT. I love the floral touches in the pattern and the weight was just heavy enough to keep me warm when the sun went down. It paired great with every outfit I wore. I highly recommend renting this jacket.

This is a super cute romper. I could see how some folks would have needed to size down but I stuck with my normal size because I have a very long torso and need the extra room. I wore I twice - on vacation and again for a casual summer dinner. Perfect.
This was my first time wearing an off the shoulder shirt so I quickly learned it is hard to wear a jacket or a bra. This shirt has cute details but the fabric was more synthetic than I expected.
review_summary: wore this on a long weekend getaway

review_text: I loved this dress.  The fit was right and I received tons of compliments from friends, family and strangers on the cruise.  Wore it on formal night which coincided with my 30th anniversary.

This runs a bit small through the body. If you're tall (I'm 5' 9"), the length might be a bit too short. Additionally, if you have a large(r) rear, it might not fit all that well! I would have ordered a size up, if I had known.
review_summary: The romper is super cute and the material is great!

review_text: This was a fabulous dress! The fabric and cut were fantastic! I thought it was pretty true to size. I normally wear a size 16, and this felt great on. I do have a thicker waist and so it was a little snug there, but hips and bust space were ample. If I had a really small bust, I might hesitate with this dress, but otherwise it is gorgeous. I wish I could buy it!
review_summary: I wore this dress at a nice dinner on vacation in the caribbean. It was colorful and fun:)

review_text: This coat is thin - I wore it in Frankfurt in Spring. It was a good layering coat, but the layer underneath couldn't be thicker than a blouse or very thin sweater, as the arms are very narrow. The neckline was more open on me than on the photo, so if it had been colder I would have needed a scarf for sure. The first coat I received had a filthy belt, but RTR overnighted another coat that was clean.
review_summary: Everyone loved this coat and told me I should buy it.

review_text: Fits great, a little scratchy at the armpit because of the sequins but nothing terrible. I enjoyed wearing it and got a lot of compliments.  It looks MUCH more of a 1950s silhouette in person because of the way the skirt sticks out.  Also, I am not leggy like the model is and I'm not sure if it's the horizontal lace stripes or what, but it was not a particularly slimming dress on me.  Still pretty.

This dress runs small- I typically wear a size 6, but I ended up wearing the size 8.  The dress was SO comfortable and stayed in place nicely - though the leg slit is somewhat high I never had an issue with it, even when sitting down.  The material is nice and thick so I didn't have to worry about underwear lines; I did, however, end up wearing adhesive silicone cups because the cutout on the side did not allow for a strapless bra.  I loved this dress- highly recommend!
review_summary: Perfect dress for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: This is the second time I rented this. It is so comfortable and can easily be worn for daytime or evening events. I wore an 8R, and it was the perfect length for flats. I dont think it would have looked right with heels, but it was perfect for what I what I wore it for.  Very flattering and a wonderful color.
review_summary: Love this, dress up or dress down!

review_text: Loved the top, but you have to watch that it doesn't open if you your trying to avoid baring your midriff :)
Great little romper! Runs slightly big, but it's super soft and comfortable.
I love this romper!  It is super cute and flirty.  Major plus is that you do not have to wear a bra with it.  I am keeping it a little longer because I just am not ready to part with it.

I absolutely loved this dress!  It fit great (like a glove!) and was perfect for a day of wine tasting in Napa.  I could also see this being perfect for 4th of July!  The fabric was also really great- soft as well as held up well!  Can't say enough good things about this dress!
This shirt was amazing - super comfortable and trendy for my vacation!

Great flowy summer dress for vacation.  I packed it and wore it while I was away and it traveled well. 
So much fun to dance in and hits the right balance between fun and casual, but also can be dressed up.  The neck is pretty high, no necklace needed and the waist has an embellished detail, so I only wore it with earrings
review_summary: Amazing dress to wear on vacation

review_text: I love Nicole Miller. This dress was so effortless.  It hugs your curves, sucks you in, and has a sexy mesh back.  My husband loved the dress, and I felt beautiful and fashionable going out during our vacation.  It looks fairly conservative and modest in the model photos, but this dress is not work appropriate. The mesh part cuts in at the waist to give you more of an hourglass shape.
Loved it was perfect for Vegas!
I normally wear a S-M but got the XS which I was very happy with!
review_summary: This dress was so cute and perfect for a beach day with the pattern and pockets! Need to buy ASAP.

review_text: This jacket is great for going out in the winter because its casual, sleek, and warm! The design has a high neck, which hit my neck in an uncomfortable way. I don't think it would have been a problem if I had gotten the next size up. My main complaint is that this jacket does not have pockets! Not very practical.
review_summary: A heavyweight leather jacket great for a night out!

review_text: I liked this dress but it wasn't super flattering on me. It would probably look great on someone taller and slimmer than me!

I loved this dress.  It is super cute and I received a ton of compliments on it.  The quality of the material is very high and perfect for a vacation / summer night out.  I wore it during my wedding week at a family party.  After reading all the reviews, I opted to rent the size 4 which actually fit perfectly.  I'm typically a size 2 in just about everything else, so definitely size up if you are on the fence.
review_summary: This dress is beautiful, but fit is definitely on the smaller side!

review_text: I wore for a girls trip and loved that it wasn't to short for my long legs.  I would say it run one size small.
review_summary: This dress is amazing and so comfortable!

review_text: I wore this to Vegas for a Britney Spears concert.  I definitely got a lot of compliments from other ladies.  The only thing I would say is that since it was so shiny, I felt like I looked a little bloated in the midsection, so if you're into spanx it might not be a bad idea to bring a pair.  Definitely a fun dress!
I really wanted to love this, but unfortunately it was way too tight in the chest for me.
review_summary: Really cute, but not for larger bust sizes

review_text: Wore this dress to dinner on my birthday! Beautiful!!
Fit perfectly and was super comfortable. Made me feel good wearing it out with a pair of wedges.
Very comfortable. Paired well with a long casual sweater and fun necklace for a cool Cali beachside evening.
review_summary: Christmas eve dinner on a cool evening in Southern Cal.

review_text: I liked it but was uncomfortable with the backless bra I had to wear.  Fit and shirt cute and fun!
Both the 4 and the 6 fit but I ended up wearing the 6.  A little extra room for a big dinner doesn't hurt.  Fabric was nice and the jumpsuit was very comfortable.
review_summary: I wore this out to dinner on a recent trip to NYC.

review_text: The shirt is great! The straps at the top are wide enough that you  can wear a normal bra instead of a strapless one. It isn't too cleaveagey unless you want to pull it down in the front and make it that way. The shirt is nice and light even with the long sleeves. 100% recommend!
review_summary: Perfect shirt to throw in my suitcase for vacation to Spain!

review_text: Rented this for a Vegas girls' weekend, and loved all of the pics so much I found it online and bought it. Basically my favorite dress I've worn all year...just wore it again last weekend. Very flattering, very comfortable, totally sexy, but still a covered-up-ness that make me feel at ease. I don't like to have to tape dresses onto me, or pull them up all night, or down! This dress has no such issues. The fabric is stretchy but has a firmness to it that makes you feel held in, no Spanx needed. Also I love the lace sleeves that make it kind of seasonless... perfect LBD. I wear it with Cobalt blue patent pumps for a fun pop of unexpected color.

This was such a fun dress!  I read the other reviews so I was prepared for the low cut sides and wore a strappy black sports bra with it.  I like the way it looks with a denim jacket too.  Love the hi-lo hem (and the pockets!) and the material is so comfy!  I wore this to a BBQ and got compliments on it the whole time.  Would love to buy it!
Rented for a January weekend in Chicago - it was so chic and cozy.

This was a super fun dress for a night out in Las Vegas. It was comfortable, although some of the sequins kind of rubbed against my back which wasn't great. The back is really low cut, so while its a fun dress from the front, it has some va-va-voom in the back. It was really well fitted for having a low back. I didn't have any problems with the shoulders slipping like some others mentioned. Only funny thing was that the waitresses at the Cromwell Casino wear dresses in a similar sequin colors, so we had a good laugh about that.
Pretty cute, but just too long for a 5' 2" foot woman. Even with 4 inch heels, the dress would still be dragging on the ground.

I rented this sweater for my weekend trip to Chicago. Its a little bit of a funky fit...cropped, wide through the shoulders/chest and then tapered, but I like it!  Its a bit of stiffer/scratchier wool blend fabric than cashmere for example, but I love the look and it certainly kept me warm! I wore it with high waisted leggings and white sneakers and felt very stylish!

I'll be returning this for a smaller size, but it's an amazing dress.  It's extremely lightweight polyester that looks and feels very silky.  The floral colors are bright and the ruffle is just enough to be flirty without being too much.  I love this dress and, when I find my size, I may want to buy it!
Great for vacation, travel. Fits super well. I'm between a 6 and 8; ordered the 8 and it was a little large. So pretty!

I usually wear a size 4 so I ordered the small. The medium was not available.The dress ran very small. My breasts were too large to fit the dress and it was too tight. I could have stuffed myself in and been uncomfortable all night but chose not to. I did not wear the dress.
review_summary: Not flattering unless you're very thin

review_text: I have a long torso, so the Regular size was almost exactly the right length on the 4 and the 6.  I have a fairly big ribcage, so the 4 was too snug to close properly, which is too bad because the rest of the dress was a little snugger.  In any case, the 6 fit almost perfectly.
review_summary: I got so many compliments both on the cruise and online with the pics!  The color really stands out.

review_text: Lot of fabric in the skirt!! True to size and oh so flattering
This jumpsuit is super cool and gorgeous.  Everything about I love. The fit is perfect.  I wear a sz. 6 and 6 fit like a glove.
This does run a bit small, I think. The waistband is pretty snug, I don't think I'd rent it again.
I rented this dress for family pictures for my parent's 40th wedding anniversary and then again to take on vacation with me. Very on trend with the cut outs yet still conservative.
review_summary: I rented this dress 2 separate times!

review_text: Great fit and looked great dressed up or down.
Kinda low cut which can be sexy, and the length of shorts was versatile enough for dressing the piece day to night.
review_summary: Very lightweight, perfect for rooftop drink at the new public hotel NYC.

review_text: I chose to wear the size 14, since the 12 was a bit tight around my bust.
review_summary: Britney Spears Show in Vegas!!!  We all wore sparkles!

review_text:
This piece is quite fluffy, being doubled everywhere and with the extra layer on top, so it won't be flattering - but it is very cute, and the colors are also nice for taking pictures. The zipper is not easy to close by oneself if you're not very flexible, so something to consider since, like any romper, you will need to remove it completely if you go to the ladies'.
Pockets are very confortable and usable (glasses, keys) since they come quite low in the short. make sure you wear a strapless or sports bra, since the top is quite narrow at the shoulders and a regular bra will show. Overall, perfect piece for a vacation day!
super soft cotton lining makes this dress lay beautifully but still maintains the sophistication of lace. Great fun color, easy to dress up or dress down.

Love this dress because you don't have to suck in your stomach all night! Very comfy but not frumpy. I would definitely recommend this dress for a fun night out on the town. I rented it for a weekend out in Vegas and it worked out perfectly.
review_summary: Fit great. Length was perfect. Not too short at all. Does not look as short as on the model.

review_text: Very elegant and comfortable.  I ended up choosing another dress that I ordered instead.  Just needed a little more pizazz for a night out.
review_summary: Beautiful dress, but needs a little more WOW!

review_text: I must have an extra long torso compared to other tall girls, since I did feel this was a bit snug in length. Also, if you're busty, you may want to pin the top more than just the button provided. But it is quite cute and a great color!
review_summary: Great Color. Not quite long enough.

review_text: true to size
review_summary: i loved these pants.  its like stepping back in time and they are so comfy

review_text: This dress was perfect - small enough to be fitted and yet comfortable and modest!  It wasn't short on me (I'm just under 5'1) so no issue there.  I wore it on vacation for Valentine's Day.
review_summary: It was our first married Valentine's Day!

review_text: Loved this dress, I didn't wear the 8 because I felt it was too short, but this looked great.  You can also wear a regular bra with it and the ruching helps hide any mid body problems!  I got so many compliments on this dress; it's sexy but very classy.  I've rented a few Nicole Millers before, but this was my favorite.  I will rent this dress again, loved it! (The picture is dark, but I'm standing in the back and I think you can get the idea of the dress)
Perfect for a day in the Hamptons or day date. Very well made and beautiful. You can dress this up with wedges or wear flips for a beachy look. Loved it!
I loved the perforations at the bottom! The neck was a little choke-y, but didn't bother me too much. Loved the length of the dress as well!

Barely squeezed into the size 2. Loosened up after a while but still tight, so don't count on it. 
Material is a bit stiff, but that is what helped the skirt keep its shape. Photographs like a dream.
review_summary: Bright colors against bright summer backdrop is beautiful.

review_text: This dress is a little above the knee.  It is tasteful (not too low cut).  It has a flattering fit especially if you have a smaller waist.  I am an older woman, but I still loved the youthful feel of the dress.  I wore it with high heels and a gold choker and 2 gold cuffs.  If I can figure out how to get pictures downloaded I will do that soon.  The dress was beautiful even on my rather large frame.
review_summary: Comfortable fun look that can be dressed up or down.

review_text: Rented this dress for a night out in Vegas. It was so much fun to wear! I received so many compliments from strangers. My husband loved it. I wore the XS and it was perfect. Right now I am usually between a small and medium so I would have to say this runs large.

I wear a 4 or more often a 6, and the 4 fit perfectly. It was not scratchy on my arms like some sequined dresses are, and I felt comfortable with the slightly longer length. The material has a little stretch, but it didn't feel too tight. This was super fun to wear.
review_summary: This dress was very flashy and fun. I loved it and got several compliments.

review_text:
I read the reviews about the skirt running a bit large and ordered my backup size smaller than my normal. I ended up wearing the size I thought I would, but the smaller size was close to fitting. 

The skirt definitely has more of a poof effect than on the model, which I loved!! Pair with a form-fitting tucked in top for the perfect silhouette. The skirt was very lightweight and comfortable for a long day at Magic Kingdom for Dapper Day, and I got SO many compliments. I wish I could keep it!
review_summary: Perfect for Dapper Day at Disney World!

review_text: Comfortable, gorgeous, lots and lots of compliments!
Wore this dress to a show in Vegas... it is made for Vegas with all the sequences, so shiny. Received many compliments. It is a low V in the front.
Great for cooler weather events.
review_summary: The dress was very comfortable and stylish.

review_text: This dress is thin, but not too thin! You can definitely wear nude undergarments and be totally fine! I doubled this as a swimsuit cover up and received so many compliments! You can unbutton the entire dress & let your swimsuit totally show through! I would definitely purchase this dress because it was so versatile.
review_summary: So breezy!! Can also be the cutest swimsuit coverup! I wore it for both!

review_text: I rented this dress for a bechelorette dinner in Las Vegas.  It was very comfortable.  It had a classy shimmer to it, which is what I wanted for the evening.  It had pockets which was fun.  The chest area seems to accentuate the size, so I felt bigger than usual.  This might be good for someone looking to add some volume.  I didn't need added volume, but the dress still looked cute.  I did have to wear a shaper underneath to prevent the skirt portion from puffing out too much.  I had a baby 4 months ago, so I have some extra fluff there right now.  Overall it was a nice dress for a fancy dinner out in Vegas.
Nice big roomy pant legs, and I wore it with no bra.  I wore it all day on a catamaran and it couldn't have been more perfect for the day!
review_summary: So easy and flowy, and so many compliments!

review_text: This was my complete night out jacket for each of my nights in Las Vegas, went with everything. The leather is heavy and the jacket feels very well made.

I went to Las Vegas with my husband and 2 other couples. We went out for a fancy dinner and club and I wore this dress. I actually got stopped in 2 casinos (Bellagio and Wynn) by women complimenting me on the dress!
review_summary: Wonderful dress for a fancy night out!

review_text: I love this jacket. The leather is soft and the pockets have fleece inside which feels great on a cold night. I rented a Medium but would probably size up to a large so I could wear a bulkier sweater underneath. The one drawback is that when zipped up the waist was tight on me, it's sort of a triangle silhouette, which is flattering but impractical depending on your weight and outfit. Wearing the jacket out I honestly felt I got better service than I normally would - either this jacket says treat me well or I was acting more confident in it. I was trying it out to see if I'd actually wear a black leather jacket and the answer is YES!
review_summary: I took the jacket on a trip, it made me feel tough and classy, even at fancy restaurants and hotels.

review_text: This dress was absolutely perfect! I am 4"11 and 110 pounds and I am usually in between a 0 or a 2. Both dresses fit very well but the 2 had a bit more room for expansion so I went with the 2.  It was like  2 inches longer than I wanted, but, I am very short so that doesn't apply to most regular sized people. It was unbelievably comfortable and the details were very nice. I felt pretty all night! I would def. rent this dress again. It goes very well also with the Ella Carter Ashley Necklace if you are looking for a necklace to go with it rent that one.
review_summary: I wore this dress out to dinner and for a night out in New Orleans.

review_text: The dress does run large in the waist as others have said.  I grabbed a skinny belt before we left and used that to cinch the waistline so it was a bit more flattering.  You couldn't even see the belt because the top blouses over, so it worked perfectly.  It's a very pretty dress and I felt sparkly!
review_summary: Wore this dress for a night out in Vegas and it was perfect!

review_text: A cute romper, but slightly boxy on me due to the cut. It was perfect for putting on for a coffee shop run after the beach and I think you can dress this up to wear to a more casual dinner. Very nautical!
review_summary: Cute from-the-beach outfit for a vacation.

review_text: Got this for a weekend in Vegas  and ended up wearing it to dinner in NY.  Really trendy and fun. Super comfortable to wear.  I am 5'7" and wore the regular with kitten heels. The only weird part were the seams down the front - wasn't sure if I should wear a belt / cover them up.

This dress turns heads! It is super luxe and comfortable too.  I loved it so much, RTR came through yet again!! it is fully lined inside with pale pink fabric. The quality is really there as well as the design.  I loved the little red heart on the left side - very subtle but interesting detail.  If you want to stir up some trouble, wear this dress :)  It will fit any body type probably, curvy as well as tall and boyish.  I'm pretty busty and size 10 was just fine.  I've had many, many really terrific finds on RTR, but this one is one of the TOPS!!!
review_summary: European edge - not for wilting violets

review_text: I LOVE this dress.  One of my favorites so far that I have rented.  It was the perfect length for me, as I tend to look shorter with a longer dress.  Shorter dresses help emphasize my legs and help me look more lean. I did not find that it was overly showy due to length.  it was comfortable.  It photographs very well.  I had no issues with the zipper or sleeve catching on anything.  I felt like it was sexy but classy.  it helped hide my mom-tummy (I had a baby this year) and yet still fit nicely without being baggy.
review_summary: I wore this on a short cruise for family pictures.

review_text: perfect fit. felt great.

The material is soft, almost like a microfiber, and not too thick. It was loose and flowy and perfect for dinner on vacation with the hot weather at the beach. There is a zipper-pull on the front so you can adjust how much cleavage you show.

I ordered this as a backup dress and didn't end up wearing it. It's pretty fitted and after a day of eating and drinking in Vegas i couldn't pull this off =). I would suggest ordering a size up just in case, i wanted to but they didn't have it in stock so i rolled the dice. 
Would recommend as it's a very cute dress but a bra and spanx are probably out of the question with how the dress is cut.
This dress is perfect for the beach: breathable and comfortable.

This dress was beautiful to wear. I liked it because it had a little shimmer, but wasn't too sparkly. It fit perfectly and has a very figure flattering shape. The sequins do rub your underarms a bit, but that's the price to pay for looking so fabulous!
love this dress.  very flattering fit.  I never wear yellow (I'm fair/blond) but this looked great even with my complexion.  highly recommend.  I think this dress would look great on most figures.

The dress fits well and the longer straps were not as problematic as other reviewers seemed to indicate; they mitigated the dreaded arm fat bulge. I only ordered the size 2, although I could have gone down a size to tighten the torso,  this size fit well and allowed for a well-padded strapless bra. You can create ample cleavage in this dress! The thick material has a nice sheen. This may be too formal for some affairs, due to color and material, but was perfect for fine dining and post-dinner cordials. Choose an elegant statement necklace, then enjoy the splendor of this beautiful dress!
review_summary: This dress was a lovely choice for a fine dining restaurant.

review_text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this dress! I want to buy it. I got compliments all night long. I have a curvy/hourglass shaped body and I'm tall, and this dress was super flattering.
review_summary: My bff got married in Vegas!

review_text: I bought this as a casual dress to wear on vacation. It fit the bill and was super comfortable.  I loved the print and colors. Since it is so flowy I think it would work great on pregnant women too.

I ordered this dress to take with me on my honeymoon. It was GORGEOUS - but I should have ordered two sizes larger.  I had read all the reviews and decided to order it in a size zero (my normal size is zero or 2).   I am not busty (34B), but I have very broad shoulders and a very narrow waist. This dress was NOT ideal for my body shape because the top was very tight and constricting. I couldn't wear a bra with the dress - and it cut into my arms (giving me a weird muffin top around my armpits).  Even if I had ordered the size 2, it would have been to tight in the bust/shoulders. I think a size four would have been A LITTLE better --- but overall, the cut of the dress is not meant for broad shoulders. 

I ended up wearing the dress with a black camisole to cover my shoulders/arms - but it was super warm outside and I was uncomfortable, so I didn't wear this dress for very long. 

If I could have fit into this dress correctly - it would have been AMAZING......but just not for my body style.
review_summary: Beautiful dress - the skirt is very flattering, but top was too tight

review_text: I rented this dress for a cruise vacation. I could have worn the 12 or 14. It was a perfect knee length dress for me (I have long lets) and there was plenty of room at the bust . As a matter of a fact, I have rented similar Badgley Mischka dresses similar to this, and I've LOVED them all.

After reading the other reviews, I decided to give this dress a chance. The color is fantastic along with the lace detail. It's not entirely stretchy or forgiving, but it was a fun dress for a nice dinner.
review_summary: Loved the color and worn for vacation.

review_text: I didn't actually end up wearing this dress. It was a little too full/frilly for my taste. And just FYI, the top lace is not lined so you can see right through to undergarments! The fit though was true to size and it would be adorable for a different occasion.
I felt comfortable to dance with the dress.  It's truly a unique dress that will make heads turn.
review_summary: I wore it for a night out in South Miami Beach. I felt glamorous and beautiful.

review_text: What a great dress, length is perfect!
Sizeable, adjustable, may need safety pin to keep the front closed
review_summary: Perfect for my vacation in Costa Rica! (not sure if it added my photo?)

review_text: I ordered the dress in one size, it fit perfectly. I wore it during the day for vacation in the city. It was great for the hot weather. The pleated bottom was gorgeous and I received compliments all day. The dress is very flattering and even accentuated my curves. I paired it with tan wedges and a RTR necklace. It was beautiful.
review_summary: This was my first time using RR.....and I had a great experience. It was exactly what I needed.

review_text: I got the medium and the large and ended up wearing the large. It wrapped around perfectly and there was a hidden snap to help it stay in place. I loved the wide collar. It was the perfect light weight coat for mid fall. I'm sure I'll rent it again.
review_summary: Beautiful coat that I loved to wearing on my vacation!

review_text: Super cute. Material is not what I expected - more of a thick cotton, but it's comfortable and perfect for a night out at the beach.
review_summary: Cute, but size down! It runs big.

review_text: This dress was a great choice for the occasion. It could be dressed up more with jewelry, but I wanted a simpler look. Paired it with black pumps for a great night out!

I thought the scuba fabric would be uncomfortable and I was soo wrong! It's a compression fabric that means you don't have to wear spanx. This dress was comfortable and eye-catching. The colors didn't pop as much as I expected but otherwise this was a great dress.
The top transitioned seamlessly between day and night. The fit is true to size but a little tight in the arms, limiting freedom of movement slightly. Loved wearing it.

I wish I could have kept this dress. It was so flattering. I am always nervous with a wrap dress because I have a very small bust, but the fit was fantastic! There's a little hidden snap in just the right spot so there were no wardrobe malfunctions.  It was a bit long. I'm 5'3" and I wore the tallest shoes I have and it still touched the floor. Overall, a great dress! Loved it!

Really fun, pretty and comfortable except that I didn't receive it in time in my unlimited shipment to take on vacation. Didn't really have another chance to wear it so ended up sending it back. The MR definitely needs heels and I didn't have anything high enough that I liked with it. Pants are wide leg and flowy and give the illusion of a maxi dress. There is a small hidden button in the front to keep it from being low cut but the back is open so you either have to go bra-less or do a nu-bra. Would be great for a casual summer or spring wedding.
review_summary: Beautiful but didn't have a chance to wear

review_text: I had so much fun wearing this dress! The casual print, but heavier, formal fabric make for a combination where this dress could be appropriate in many different situations. I wore this on vacation in Vegas with my husband. Fits true-to-size, and has adjustable straps to accommodate height.
Loved the unique detail in back. Pretty shapeless, but great for an evening on the beach. Super cool and comfy.
Simply loved it!

Way too small at size 6. I don't know if mine was shrunken but it rid up the front and back (not in a flattering or comfortable way) button in front wouldn't stay closed and the lining kept showing (which makes me think it shrunk?). Went straight back to RTR once I took it out of the bag.

I wore the XS and it fit perfectly.  I loved that I could wear my normal push up bra and given the cut of the dress, I didn't need spanx.  The pictures don't do the color justice.  I received many compliments on this dress.
review_summary: The color and fit were a perfect mix of sexy and classy!

review_text: Didn't love this one, I sized down to a 6 after reading the reviews and that was a mistake as it was rather tight around the bust, back and arm holes, so it meant that it  wasn't that flattering. If you are busty I would stick to your usual size.
review_summary: Tight around the bust and back

review_text: The fabric was great because it was thick, but not too heavy for the heat. It didn't wrinkle or gather like lots of rompers do. I was happy with the torso length, and I was able to reach the zipper on the back myself- no bathroom assistance required.
fits great and true to size, but I am 5'6 and it came to my ankles
review_summary: super cute and fit great, but way too short

review_text: I loved this dress for a night out in South Beach.  I am petite, but have a bigger bottom, so the size 0 was a little tighter on my butt than I felt comfortable with.  Plus I decided to wear the 2 for a little bit more length.  This dress is backless, and going braless is not an option for me at 42, so I wore a nu-bra.

Great vacation dress but a few things to beware of. There is no elastic in the neckline so the off the shoulder look is a little more work and doesn't stay up very well. I ended up turning the tassels in the back into straps. You cant really tell in the picture but the bottom has a great body hugging cut so even though its flowy it shows off your figure. This might be a problem if you are worried about having a little belly showing.
Loved this top!  Beautiful fabric.  Fit perfectly- can wear up on your shoulders for work or more formal event or down for a sexier vibe.  Rent this one. You won't be sorry.

This fit me really well. It was a relaxed fit and looked great day into evening. It was comfortable enough to wear while toting around my 8 month old. It also unbuttons in the front, which made it super easy to breastfeed (though that probably doesn't apply to 99% of you). It was the perfect length for me in flats. It did not wrinkle. It comes up high enough so that my cleavage would be considered workplace appropriate. The placement of the pockets was very nice and added a little detail.
review_summary: Relaxed fit- great for day into evening on vacation

review_text: This dress fit perfectly and made me feel great! I wore this for my rehearsal dinner and out to dinner on my honeymoon. It was comfortable and I would definitely rent this brand again.
review_summary: The detail in this dress is unbelievable in person!

review_text: Very comfortable.  Light, soft fabric with pretty colors.
review_summary: Great for dress for Cabo in July

review_text: love this romper! Very cozy but flattering. I wore it with fancy heels for dinner out in NYC, and then threw on some Black Converse for a late night immersive theater experience - both worked, though totally different looks!
review_summary: Flirty, sexy and cute all in one!

review_text: Has a short torso so if you like wedgies then it's cool.   Also I'm only 5'5" so it's also pretty long on me.
review_summary: A bit of  a clown suit

review_text: I took this dress with me on vacation to Mexico. Wore it out for a night of dinner and dancing, the fit is so lovely, very snug on top and in the waste, very flowy on the bottom. This dress is especially flattering if you have a small waste and wider hips.

Las Vegas for Easter...what does one wear to go to a nightclub on Easter?? This dress, and coordinating pink bunny ears. Dress was so bright it looked wonderful. Material was light and so comfortable. Love the slight flare in the skirt. Would not hesitate to rent this exact dress again and the necklace I rented to pair with it made the entire outfit come together. Loved!

Love this dress! I think I kept it for a month with my Unlimited membership because it's so perfect for summer--I wore it to a wedding in Hawaii, a college reunion in Philly and on a trip to wine country. The material is fast-drying and flowing (great for hot weather), it's not too short and the colors are super bright. Note: I wore a sticky bra because the back is so low, but also works great with a bathing suit underneath.
review_summary: Bright colors, flowing fabric, low back--perfect summer dress!

review_text: Received many compliments on this dress. The most comfortable dress I have ever worn and it looked great too! Doesnt get much better than that.
review_summary: Great summer dress and SO comfortable

review_text:
Pros - Lots of compliments, cool for an outdoor event, great color for my skin tone, pretty print.
Cons - The lining would ride up on the inner leg when I took more than two steps. The style seems more fitting for a woman with long slender legs and no booty/hips. The pockets at the chest fell kind of weird looking to me. The arm hole area seemed big too, had to lower my bra strap (opted for strapless)  so it wouldn't show.
review_summary: Super cute pattern. Although I didn't feel like this was my best look I got a lot of compliments.

review_text: Very comfortable
review_summary: A fun dress!  Wore this in Vegas, very comfortable, wish I could have kept it :)

review_text: The loose cut, off-shoulder neckline, and horizontal stripe combine to make this a rather unflattering look. Didn't end up wearing.
review_summary: Runs large and is not a flattering cut

review_text: I wore a 2x. I normally wear a size 16 jeans, or an XL top, so the dress does run small. One side on the bottom is fit to your leg, and the other side kind of flares out a bit. I found this to be odd, but I guess that is just how the dress is cut. Otherwise, the fit was great. It is NOT forgiving if you have a stomach, so just be aware of your body type. I felt that Spanx did not really help as it is such a body-hugging outfit. I wore it with nude heels, and I felt fantastic. It's a great dress for curvier girls.
review_summary: I loved the color! The green-black shimmer was amazing for photos!

review_text: I rented this for my 30th birthday. I loved the romper. Only thing is, if you don't have a very large bust you may want to consider wearing something under it or putting a safety pin in it to keep the chest area closed. Its a pretty deep V.
I'm 5'1" and it was too long in the body (the black horizontal stripe beneath the model's breast was more at my belly button!).
review_summary: The dress is beautiful, but I wasn't able to wear it.

review_text: Fits true to size...form fitting but comfortable!  True to other reviews, it runs SHORT!  I'm 5'8" and wearing it out in Vegas for dinner and a show is about the only place I would wear it comfortably...hard to sit down in but okay when walking!  The color is a vibrant, beautiful blue...much brighter than the photos show!  I'd definitely rent again for Vegas or if feeling really sassy...my hubby loved it and with the color and neck, it didn't require any jewelry.
review_summary: Loved but SHORT if you are tall!

review_text: This dress fits like a glove! The sleeves are cut in a very flattering manner and the stripes are placed perfectly so you don't look wider than you are. The material is a beautiful linen cotton, so it breathed well in the hot weather. Highly recommend this dress!
Very comfortable!
review_summary: It was not as heavy as I thought it would be.

review_text:
I rented this dress for a weekend in New York just before Christmas. It runs true to size and while it is short the material is thick and warm. I didn't need to wear a bra at all and you really can't with the lace detailing anyway.

We had plans to go ice skating and then to a lovely dinner  so I wanted something sexy and season appropriate to change into after skating.  He ended up proposing on the rink and so this was my celebratory (and now I think "good luck") dress for afterward. It matches diamonds perfectly!
Wore an XL and although it is stretchy I wouldn't order this if you are larger than a 10/12. It is very short.
review_summary: Super sparkly and fun for Vegas. Very short

review_text: Great for a girls weekend in Begas, I am generally a size 2, but that size was out so got the 4 it was a little big which is why I selected that it's true to  size.

The photos on here don't do this dress justice - the only reason I rented it is because I saw it in Cusp and it is stunning in person. It ran very small, so I would suggest sizing up. The fabric is really thick so don't rent it for a hot day. And it's either no bra or sticky bra.

runs small - and was WAYYYYYY too small for my chest. i was absolutely spilling out and the top design with the cross over did not sit right. i put it back in the bag and returned it that same day. it was such a lovely piece, but i was afraid to size up. so because of my big boobs, it just did not work for me. unfortunately RTR does not even allow me to select a bust size larger than D. style was A+, the fit was a fail.
Absolutely love this dress! The whole night I received compliments on how chic and fabulous the dress looked. Fit amazing around the butt area and the material was amazing.
review_summary: Best dressed in the whole wedding!

review_text: This is the second Trina Turk jumpsuit I've rented and I love this one just as much as the first.  It was perfect for a long birthday weekend in Mexico.  The color paired beautifully with my tan.  My only issue (and it's relatively minor) is that you do need to be careful with respect to your underwear (i.e. anything other than nude/flesh-toned will show through).  I found that a strapless bra worked best and to avoid VPL, I wore light compression spanx - it worked like a charm.
This dress is gorgeous on--very flattering. Great for daytime and night! I wore it for both occasions. Would rent again!

the coat was great for our trip to spain.  perfect weight for 50"s.  the buckle was a tad annoying so most of the time had it closed up.  It was roomy enough to layer under it.  I loved the length not too short or to long.  can be worn with many different outfits.
review_summary: stylish and warm without being too bulky

review_text: Super slinky and at the same time holds you in nicely.  I love the high cut neck and halter style straps.  I would NEVER have chosen this dress off the website - but when my stylist brought it to me at the showroom, I was super surprised at how good it felt on!  Effortless, classic, but gorgeous!
review_summary: It was our last dinner in the British Virgin Islands - and everyone thought it was my wedding night!

review_text: Got lots of compliments on the dress though I didn't love how it fit around my lower stomach, which is my bad area.  I wish I had also received the size 2, which never came, to see if that would have been better.

The dress fit really great! Exactly what I wanted.  The fabric on Herve dresses holds in everything superbly. I just wouldn't recommend the strapless style for girls with tiny busts though, unless you've got a good push-up strapless bra, as one of my friends tried on the same one, and it totally flattened her out.
review_summary: Perfect for a fun girls night out in Las Vegas!

review_text: Such a darling romper!  Fits beautifully, although I should have tried the L becasue my torso is long.  It is low cut, so beware large breat women if you don't want that look.  Also, the shorts are pretty short for my age (49) so I would probably not choose for anything in with family, but my husband absolutely loved it!
I got so many compliments on this jumpsuit! Wish i could keep it! I love that it hides the embarrassing midsection and love handles. Overall, true to size and great fit!
review_summary: Rented this for an all white photo shoot on the beach with my sisters.

review_text: Wore to a Luau in Hawaii.  After dinner I had to open the zipper on the side because I was STUFFED.  Lots of skirt fabric so it swishes when you walk. It's too long for flats, so plan on wedges or heels. Did not have an issue with the slit opening when I walked ever, wouldnt have even known it was there.
Beautiful dress!!
The dress is very flattering! The colors and design are great for summer!
review_summary: This was a great dress for a summer wedding!

review_text: I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas. It was PERFECT! I got so many compliments and I felt great in it. I wore an XS, typically I am either a S or XS and the XS fit well, maybe even a little loose. It's a little more low cut than I am use to but was able to wear a normal bra with it so that was super convenient and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this dress!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: I love fit and flare dresses, and I loved the Clover Canyon dress I rented in the past, so I was excited to try this.  Unfortunately, I couldn't wear it because I am short-waisted, and the 'waist' on this dress hit well below my hips, causing fabric to bunch up around my waist.  My husband wasn't a fan of the print on the dress.  He said I looked like a geisha.  The sleeves on the dress fit really well, and the length on me was about one inch above my knees.  I would recommend this dress for someone taller and straighter who is willing to try an unconventional pattern.
review_summary: Not the right fit for my frame

review_text:
I rented this dress to wear in California on the beach. The material feels amazing on and I like the attention to detail. This dress is flowy I could have gone down another size if I needed to. If you button all of the buttons, the fit of the dress looks strange so I left a few undone. 

Compliments: 1
Would I rent again?: No
How to style it: with a dress this long, I think some type of heel would look best

Confession. I only rented this because I like to fly in things that look nice ( better chance of an upgrade) and feel like pajamas. This jumpsuit totally fit the bill. If you have any soggy bits, this won't do you any favors, but it was perfect for my needs.

I received this from a stylist since the dress i originally ordered came back damaged.  i didn't end up wearing this because we were in miami for a bachelorette party, and this dress was a little classier/dinnier(totes just made that word up) than the occasion called for.  regardless its a gorgeous dress. would be perfect for a wedding, dinner, or charity event!

Absolutely love this easy, breezy, casual summer dress. It has elastic on the back, no zippers or buttons. Beautiful red embroidery. I wore this at the beach for the 4th of July weekend and received many compliments!

After reading the reviews I ordered the small so it would fit up top...however I would have liked the dress to be longer...not sure if a medium would be too baggy though. Creased a bit when traveling but wrinkles eventually fell out. There is more pink and blue in the pattern than the model pics show.

The top fit great, could've definitely gone with an XS but the small worked just as well. Paired it with a long sleeve denim dress and a bomber jacket. Had so much fun wearing this top. Comfy and cozy!
Rented this for a cruise. Ran very large.
It was light weight and didn't wrinkle badly during travel. I was worried about the length being too short, but it was great with flat sandals for a casual look.
review_summary: This was the perfect daytime dress for bouncing around Havana, Cuba!
