review_text: The top was big and the hip area was slightly clingy. I'm bigger in the hips, so this wasn't shocking. I only wore the top to work, otherwise wore the sleeveless dress alone for going out. Will def rent again.
review_summary: Wore this on vacation and it was super comfortable

review_text: definitely belt it if you plan to wear as a dress
review_summary: would be a cute bathing suit cover-up or a dress if you belt it

review_text: This was quite loose around my mid section, and also quite short. I found it perfect for brunch on vacation. The fabric and details are great, and you can tell it's a high end piece.

This dress was perfect for a night out in Vegas.  My husband and I went to see Ka and I loved getting all glammed up in this glittery dress!  The 8 fit perfectly and easily covered the tummy area.  It is a tad short but again was perfect for Vegas.  I even saw another girl wearing the same dress for her bachelorette party the same night!  Another great experience from RTR!
It felt very warm and the fabric was high quality. However, it fit VERY large and I couldn’t wear it. Likely not a good choice for petite women.
review_summary: For a fall trip to NYC!

review_text: The fit is attractive & comfortable.  Received many compliments from both male & female.  attention grabbing.
True to size. Very low but used body tape and was not a problem.  Truly stunning
review_summary: Wore out in Monte Carlo.  Head turning!!

review_text: Perfect top for my shape. Details are meant to flatter with the V shape and peplum. Great color
Perfect fit and very flattering cut.
review_summary: I felt like a million dollars in this dress. I'm sure my boyfriend would have liked me to keep it.

review_text: Too large and a bit long for a petite woman.
review_summary: A very nice dress, but too large for me as a size 2.

review_text: My other Unlimited dress wasn't available, so RTR sent me this one.  Even though I love DVF, I was skeptical.  It looks boring in the pictures.  In person, it's perfect.  I wore it for a night out in New York, and the material is soft and kept me warm.  It's incredibly flattering, and the lace detail is stunning.  I still have it in my closet, don't want to send it back!

The fabric was stretchy, a bit thicker, but very comfortable. I normally wear a 2, so an XS wasn't as forgiving in the stomach. I have a smaller chest, so I found that the armpit area was stretched a bit and therefore sometimes exposing my bra. Overall, great choice. I like the style and cut.
review_summary: The fabric was stretchy, a bit thicker, but very comfortable.

review_text: I recently finished my chemotherapy regimen and to celebrate, my husband and I took a trip to NYC. I haven't felt beautiful in a long time and this romper helped me feel my best. I'd recommend it to anyone. I'm 5'3", 115 lbs and got the XS.
Pretty short!

An original take on florals for Spring! This tea length style was so flattering and fun to wear, the pairing of  this bold floral print with the subtle ruffle detailing was so different yet completely approachable. The fabric on the style is very stretchy and truly comfortable against my skin. It fit true to size and I would suggest sizing up for a backup size. It must be worn with a strapless bra or NuBra, there is room in the bust so it is great for any cup size. There is a tie to cinch the waist in but it is not fitted at all and there is ample room. Spanx or shape wear are suggested but not necessarily needed, I would recommend this dress for the following body types - Apple, Hourglass, Athletic, Pear, Petite, Straight & Narrow, Full Bust, Bump Friendly. I would wear this style on vacation to a nicer dinner, on a date in the Spring/Summer, to a wedding or semi formal brunch. I would pair with simple accessories and not deviate from the colors used within the print (lots to choose from; prink, orange, navy, turquoise).

The sequins are GORGE! This dress photographs extremely well and no one will have anything close to it! I wore this for my friend's bachelorette in Vegas and it was a showstopper. Didn't pay for drinks all night! I felt incredibly sexy yet modest because the dress still went a little above my knee. However! Ladies with a good sized chest and rear.. beware! After reviews I was thinking the M would be perfect and it was extremely small. Sooo glad I got the L as a backup size. Regardless, you will need to be zipped in!! There's a tiny zipper and too much fabric to do it yourself.
Loved this dress.  Very flattering and not see through.  Very comfortable.  I would rent again!

I thought this was black when I ordered it, its definitely more of a brown or brown black.  The rise is also short; I didn't really have enough fabric above the waist to create a blousy effect like on the model (it would have involved giving myself a wedgie!)
Overall a success!

I wore this on vacation in Cabo for a date night. It's conservative yet sexy (it's definitely short!). Wore it with flat sandals since we were in Mexico. Would be great in Vegas or Miami with heels. Legs for days!

I was completely smitten with this dress, although the other reviews are right-- it is pretty long in the straps. I spent a lot of time adjusting and trying to stop them from falling off my shoulders. Despite that, the silk under was soft and cool for summertime and it was perfectly fitted at my waist so overall, very flattering

I rented this for a couples weekend away.  I don't like summer time dressing - too many loose fabrics and no structured tailoring. Don't get me wrong, I love the boho look, I just can't pull it off with my height/shape.  This was a great warm weather style that was still fun and pulled together.
review_summary: Cute, tailored look for summer dressing.

review_text:
Wore to a night club with colored tights. Felt sexy but not too short. Hugs your curves and cut outs look good on a curvy figure 
Stretchy so I'm sure it fits lots of sizes

Just a gorgeous dress!!!  Wore it out in Vegas for a nice dinner and drinks out!  Sexy with the cutouts but the length makes it classy!  Everyone, including our female taxi driver, was complimenting it!  Runs true to size but I would be cautious if you have a larger bust...I'm an A/B cup and was covered perfectly but any larger chest would definitely need to size up!  I was a little nervous since I chose the 6R as my backup based on reviews but it wasn't available, but the 4R fit perfectly!
Fits in all the right places, with enough hold to suck you into a beautiful Coke bottle. I wore it twice on vacation...it was THAT good!!
I love Equipment dresses. This was perfect for sight seeing during a tropical vacation. It was light, airy and provided a little pop of color. I have a broader back, and the medium fit perfectly.

Got this for a vacation to South America but unfortunately didn't get it in time. Ended up wearing to a work event with a white blazer and then out to dinner and drinks. Felt appropriate for occasions except that it cuts sort of low in the front so I had to keep the blazer fastened at work. If you have a smaller chest can definitely get away with not wearing a bra. There is a small black tie that gives more structure to the waist but my husband didn't think it did my for my figure - I wore it anyway because it was comfortable!
review_summary: Comfy, can be dressed up or down.

review_text: I wore this dress on the plane to my bachelorette trip. It was extremely comfortable and breathable. I am not sure I would have purchased this dress if I were out shopping around, but I am glad I rented it for the trip.
review_summary: This dress is super cute but it does run a little large in the waist.

review_text: Really diggin' this look. I would pair this with enormous sunglasses and a giant chunky bracelet for the perfect cool accents. The elastic waist of this style helps to give the dress it's shape, but also makes it very easy to wear. However, the neckline required you to wear a strapless bra (not the end of the end of the world). And the slit on the one side of the dress gives some relief in walking and visually. I found a 3" heel to be the perfect height needed on my 5'6" frame. The fabric has no stretch, so I'd say this is a go for everyone but baby bump ladies.
The way the sequenced fabric flowed was elegant.  It fit almost flawlessly, the dress molded my torso beautifully, complimenting my shape. I had so many compliments.
review_summary: Beautiful dress for a night out on the town.

review_text: I rented this to have nice photos taken on vacation and didn't want to take it off! The regular length was a bit long but I wasn't wearing shoes. Truly more beautiful in person than in the pics online. Very elegant and fun to wear!

I wore a medium but should have worn a large (it wasn't available on my dates), which is to say there is a lot of give here! The romper was comfortable, flirty and easy to wear. Since it was a bit tight, the front snap keeping my girls under control came un-done a few times. I wore it for a friend's 30th in Palm Springs and actually just bought it online because I love it so much. Strongly recommend!
review_summary: Fun, flirty and easy to wear!

review_text: Pretty dress, fits well.  Can wear with my regular bra as the straps line up perfectly.  Love!
Loved this dress, but I wished the straps were adjustable

I rented this dress for vacation in NYC with my boyfriend. I didn't get to wear it because it was SO cold on the night I had planned to debut it :) but I tried it on in our hotel room and my boyfriend thought it was awesome. Like other reviewers suggested, the sizes in Elizabeth and James are decidedly NOT vanity-sized. I normally wear a 0 or a 2 and I ordered a 6. I may have been able to wear a 4, but not without some Spanx and definitely not if I was planning on eating an actual meal - the fabric is not thick and the tummy area is not forgiving. Size up at least 1-2 sizes and prepare to feel fabulous!! I regret not taking a photo in this dress and will probably rent it again this Spring!

I rented this for a ladies' weekend in Las Vegas in May, and I absolutely loved wearing it. I typically shy away from "sexy" outfits, but this was a perfect compromise for me. The material is on the thicker side, so I don't know that I would have been as happy had we gone in the summer, but I felt amazing and confident while out at dinner and going dancing afterwards (PS - I'm a full 34C, but the material was so sturdy that I was actually able to go totally bra-less that night).  The jumpsuit is actually a lighter navy color than it appears on the model, though I think the one I rented may have just been cleaned one too many times, and had begun to lighten somewhat. I loved the jumpsuit so much that I actually tracked it down and bought it for myself!
review_summary: Great outfit for a trip to Vegas!

review_text: This dress may be simple, but it's amazing :) It fits great. It has extra space for a "food baby" and is so comfy- you won't want to take it off. Pair it with a great pair of patterned heals and low key jewelry and you will be all set.
This was a great dress. I got complements all night, and wish I could have kept it. Not itchy at all. The gathering at the waist was very forgiving. Not too short but definitely fun.

I wore this dress for a casual cocktail celebration the night before my friend's destination wedding in Newport, RI.  I love the print and the fact that even for a size regular, it was somewhat long because I was wearing tall wedges with it.  However, I wore an XS and I was swimming in it.  I can't imagine that someone without at least a medium bust would want to wear it.  It didn't give much shape at all.
Very cute romper! Runs a little large..I usually opt for size small with Free People but found I had extra room particularly in the bust which is unusual for me.

It's a very casual and comfortable romper. The little dots are bright and it's different with the back. It was a bit too large for me on top but the waist fit fine. I would probably size down bc the waist is elastic.

The color was gorgeous, it looks great with a tan. The fit was figure flattering, it hugged every curve and sucked everything in. I wore a push up bra with the dress and that gave me the perfect amount of cleavage. I wore it on a vacation to Las Vegas and I thought it was perfect.
review_summary: I loved the color and the fit was fantastic-perfect for Vegas!

review_text: This dress was very comfortable and the print was so nice. I wore with flat black sandals. Definitely size down as I think runs large.
review_summary: This dress was very cute! I wore to dinner one night while on a cruise to the Bahamas.

review_text:
+Embroidery and beading is beautiful 
+Able to be dressed up or down
+ True to size
+Interesting colors
- Small area to fit your head in
- No zippers or buttons
- No way to adjust the sizing besides the tie at the waist
- The tie was below my natural waist, it wasn't figure flattering
review_summary: Nice details, but not a favorite

review_text: I am not tall (5-6) but this jacket was Very short waister.  Other reviews are from XS girls which it it probe great on.  I didn't even wear it.
review_summary: Beautiful embroidery but very short jacket

review_text: This romper is ADORABLE.......I paired it with a red belt/shoes. It is VERY difficult to get in and out of by yourself, though.......so going to the bathroom is basically a 15 minute ordeal. I would definitely rent again! I did wear a black bandeau because it's pretty low cut and it wasn't a Vegas type vacay LOL.
review_summary: Cute Romper....hope you don't have to pee, though LOL

review_text: Dress was a little bit short, but worked well for Las Vegas.  Would probably be too short for some events, especially if you are on the taller side.  Dress was tight, but fabric was very flattering.  Back was very cute.  Did not wear a bra.
review_summary: Fun dress to wear out In Vegas!

review_text: Fantastic.
review_summary: It had pockets, great fabric, and the knotted shoulder made it the perfect fitted jumper.

review_text: I left the belt off and wore it open with jeans and heels. Got a lot of compliments
review_summary: This  is so much cuter in person than in the photo!

review_text: wore this dress in Hawaii to a luau. It was so comfortable and fun!

This dress is soooo comfortable for being so short and tight. The material is soft, thick and stretchy! The back is amazing! Wish I had a picture of it. It does ride up when you stand up from sitting like most short dresses do. Seriously so great, got so many compliments. I wore a sticky bra with this dress but you could get away no bra if you're perky enough!

I loved this--that said, I will definitely order again.  Easy to dress up to down.  I dressed it up for a night on vacation and then wore it running casual errands once I returned home. As a bonus--it was perfect for traveling because it didn't wrinkle.
review_summary: I love this jumpsuit!  Super comfortable and stylish!

review_text: I ordered the 6 and the 8 and tried on the 8 first. It was a tight squeeze so I didn't even bother trying the 6 on. The dress is awesome if you like cleavage, We were in Vegas going to a club so it was perfect for that. Only thing I didn't like is the sides of the dress near your arms show your bra a bit in the front, luckily I was wearing a black bra so no one else noticed. It was a little clingier than I liked or am used to but was good for Vegas! I would recommend this dress but size up as there is not much give to the material.
review_summary: I loved this dress! It shows all your curves.

review_text: I wore this vest wine tasting on the central CA coast over New Year's weekend. It was perfect - it kept me warm and was casual, yet super chic. I got tons of compliments- I loved the detachable hood. I would definitely rent again
I LOVED this dress. I was very tempted to buy this one. The pattern is perfect for summer and I thought the back of the dress was unique. This dress was very comfortable and I would rent it again.
review_summary: Beautiful floral dress with lovely back detail

review_text: Perfect for a day date, Day casual party
review_summary: Day event, loved it! Got a lot of complements.

review_text: The dress looks brand new. Very nice fabric although the dress runs big.  It's more casual than it looks.
review_summary: Very cute, nice pattern on the fabric

review_text: This dress was very flattering, yet forgiving.  It fit true to size, and I really loved it!
review_summary: Fit great, true to size., love it.  Forgiving, yet flattering.

review_text: Comfortable and cute.  Always get compliments on this one.  Did have to have my husband follow me to the bathroom to zip up the back.
review_summary: Second time renting it so that says a lot.

review_text: This is a pretty dress but the size XS was really big in the waist and I am normally a size 6.
Great for disguising mid-section. I am on the shorter side and needed to wear heels to counterbalance the overall larger fit.
review_summary: Very flattering color for all! Ran a bit large.

review_text: I wore this dress on vacation and chose to wear this for New Years Eve. I thought the fit was great, and the dress materials is stretchier. I am 5'3" and thought it was an appropriate length, but it could look shorter if you were taller. I wore a turquoise beaded statement necklace and gold flat sandals.

Wore this to a Chvrches concert in Vegas, PERFECT!!!  It was super comfortable and the perfect length....short but covers everything.  The wrap tie kept coming untied which was a pain and my boobs weren't big enough to fill in the size small!  It also smelt a little musty so I was happy to finally take it off.
It's definitely tight but that's great because you don't have to wear a bra.
review_summary: Such a unique dress! I felt fashionable and sexy.

review_text: It is less fitted than other rompers I've worn before so if you are looking for something that is super form fitting, this is not the outfit for you. The zipper down the front and the crisscross pattern in the back really take this outfit to the top. Got compliments all night! Also, if you search hard enough you can find the right strapless bra that does not show!
review_summary: This romper is so cute on! Got compliments on it all night!

review_text: The dress was beautiful. It was really fun to dance in for the wedding. There was not much fabric in the check, so it left little to be desired.
review_summary: Beautiful dress. Received a lot of compliments. Not for big-chested women.

review_text: Loved the slim cut and long length, sleeves were nice and long too. The red color is fun on a rainy day. Waist can be adjusted and nipped in. Great style and fit for a utilitarian item!
review_summary: Light weight, perfect for rainy humid days.

review_text: I rented these leggings for a bachelorette party weekend and they were perfect! I rented the small and the medium (I am usually a small/6) but I ended up wearing the medium - the small was WAY small (I could barely get them on). These leggings are extremely comfortable and the faux leather aspect made me feel as though I wasn't really wearing leggings. I would highly recommend them to anyone and everyone!
This dress is perfect sun dress. If you have wider hips, it does fit a little snug but not unwearable. I couldnt go any bigger because it would be too big in the stomach/waste area.

I am absolutely in love with this dress, and have gotten SO much wear out of it so far. I rented it for my college reunion as part of my Unlimited subscription. I paired it with a jean jacket and sneakers for the daytime, and got SO many compliments. I ended up purchasing the dress and have since worn it a thousand times - dressed up for date night, bridal shower, bachelorette, weekend brunch, etc. It's a very flattering fit and fits true to size, though there isn't much give in the fabric.
review_summary: Loved it so much, I bought it - RTR Team Review

review_text: This dress is absolutely gorgeous, but as other reviewers have said, it runs very short. I wear a 0 or XS in most dresses from RTR, but I felt more comfortable in the S of this dress. I wore this to see the Backstreet Boys in Vegas and I fit right in with all the other women in their sparkly dresses. It hugs the body tight, so there is no room to hide anything if you're hoping to do so.

I rented this for a Memorial Day weekend trip to Austin. The dress was really great day-to-night option and was very appropriate for the weather (mid 80s in the evening!). Easy to pack, too! It runs large, particularly in the bust, which I appreciated (36DDD). Definitely runs on the long side (I am 5'10 and wore flat sandals and the hem brushed the ground). Only downside is that the armholes are kind of big, so you have to be mindful of the bra you wear otherwise it will peak out. Nothing too egregious though. Would rent again.
Fits true to size but could easil go up or down a size since its not tight on arms
review_summary: It goes with everything and can make a basic jean and t-shirt into a this chic day- to - night look.

review_text: This is an awesome dress to stand out.  And it's supportive for a large chest without wearing a bra.  I was able to dance in and not have to pull down the bottom too much.
review_summary: Fabulous dress!  Loved it!  Too bad some other girl in the club was wearing it too!

review_text: I rented this dress to wear to my birthday dinner on a vacation to NYC. I normally wear a 2 but this was a 0 and I was able to squeeze in. The 2 would have been much better but even the smaller size looked great. Since it was so tight I was able to get get away with not wearing a bra

Wore this in Mexico for vacation and it was perfect. I love to wear loose dresses especially on a tropical vacation,. This was a mix of comfortable and slightly sexy since it has a cute cut out in the back. I would definitely recommend this and wear it again!
review_summary: Comfortable and perfect for vacation - received many compliments!

review_text: Get this dress - it's so beautiful.

The color of this dress was more cream and less white than I expected.  It was also more conservative and and formal than I wanted.  This dress would have been perfect for work, but I wasn't thrilled wearing it on my Labor Day vacation.  Oh well.  It was still a great dress, and I recommend it for conservative functions.
review_summary: Cute, but not what I expected

review_text: The back zipper was a little tight while the front was a little loose. It worked for a night. I couldn't wear a bra because of the back. The length was perfect!
review_summary: Gorgeous patterns and colors are perfect for a beach vacation

review_text: I was obsessed with this. It is SO fun to wear. The picture on the model doesn't do the hemline justice. It was a blast to dance in! My only complaint is that a lot of people in reviews said that it ran small so I got a 6 and an 8 as my back up (I am typically a 4/6). I ended up wearing the 6 but wished I had gotten a 4. It was a little roomy in the ribcage area and a tighter fit would have felt more secure in the bust area! Regardless, I was still sad to have to send this one back.
Such a cute dress. Boxy and runs big but perfect for after the beach.

fits true to size.  i'm normally a 2 and the 4 was just a little too loose. no stretch whatsoever so don't get a too small size.  also, there are pockets.  but the lining of the pocket kind of throws the look off a bit.  try to tack down pockets with safety pin for flawless look.

Wore this dress for girls weekend. The fit was great, I ordered a size up to be more comfortable. While it was my backup dress I'm so thankful I got it! I didn't need a bra as the front material is very thick and supportive. It is the right amount  of sexy and class. Lots of compliments.
Great off-the-shoulder style perfect for summer.  Color was intense yer amazing.  Typically not a fan of yellow  on me - but this changed my mind.  So many compliments!
review_summary: The color is AMAZING!!! Summer Favorite!

review_text: Size up! I'm usually a size 10 but needed the 12, it is very fitted so the extra room was needed. Great quality, the while it was body hugging and it has the side cut out, I felt great in it!
review_summary: Great dress for a night out on the town or a party.

review_text: The sheath fit worked well, added tights and boots to keep it a little more casual.

I had so many compliments on this dress. It was comfortable and flattering. I do wish I had tried a size down because it was a little large in the chest (although I am extremely flat-chested). But it was perfect for dinners out and a good length for bike riding!

I. LOOKED. GREAT. This dress was everything and more! I rented it for vacation in California and ended up wearing it to a super chic brunch. It does run small, so even though I was able to squeeze into the size 6, I would've been way more comfortable in a size 8. The bust area was super revealing and probably works best from small cup sizes, so I had to pin my bralette to the dress fabric to hold everything together. Other than that, this dress is amazing and I wish I could keep it forever; it's absolutely stunning.
Was a tad thicker dress, but fit well and looked great!
review_summary: It was a great night our in Vegas

review_text: Loved the dress, wore it to a night on the town in Vegas. Very comfortable, however it is not a "fitted" dress as it appears on the model on the website. Maybe more fitted with a smaller size down???
great fit and great outfit. got lots of compliments. the bottom half was a little too flowy for my taste for a romper. Overall though great look and great quality

The stock photo of this dress truly does not do it justice.  It's flowy and fun and gorgeous.  I especially loved the beading along the neckline - amazing.  I wore this while on vacation in Greece and felt like a Greek Goddess.  I would go one size down from your normal as I found it to be a little bit of a looser fit.  Also, the length was a bit longer than I would have wanted, but I was wearing flat sandals with it.  A wedge sandal would probably work better with this.
review_summary: When you want to dress to impress on a warm evening

review_text: Fantastic top - fits true to size, stays in place, color really pops.  Lots of compliments.  Perfect for travel, as the fabric never wrinkled despite 3 weeks in a suitcase.  Will rent again, maybe in red next time!
I originally ordered the 0R and had to return it for the 2R. It was super cute,and the legs were only slightly too long on my 5'2'' body. I really liked it a lot, and the fabric is very comfortable.
It was slightly stretched out on top. So if you have a smaller bust you may need a thicker/padded bra. I loved the cut outs & the blue color!
review_summary: Perfect Vegas dress! Fun & flirty with the cut outs.

review_text:
If I had not eaten five burritos my tummy wouldn't have been poking out a little. Otherwise - perfect fit!!! I didn't even have to wear a bra! I ordered the 4 and the 6. 4 was too small. 6 fit perfectly! Definitely will order this again! Perfect for a trip to Vegas, a girls night out, a fancy dinner at a nice restaurant or an evening wedding guest 

It's absolutely fabulous!
review_summary: Sizzle and dazzle them! Wore this dress in Vegas. Fits like an hourglass.

review_text: Good fit, I'm between a 2 and 4 and the 2 fit perfectly.

This dress was extremely comfortable and has high quality material. While the material is thick, it was not too hot in the summer. If you have any curves, this is extremely flattering. The top was a little big in the chest and I am a 34C. I could probably have fit into a small if I wanted it tighter but the M still worked. Loved this dress!
review_summary: Gorgeous summer dress that was perfect for Clearwater Beach vacation!

review_text: The dress is stunning! The cut outs and print make the dress feel perfect for summer. However, you need to have a long torso to wear this dress (I don't think height matters). Because of where the waist hits, it made me look like I was pregnant. Because of how the top lays, I looked flat chested. If you are curvy like me, this probably isn't the dress for you.
review_summary: Beautiful; but need to have a long torso to pull it off

review_text: soft, thin fabric, drapes beautifully.  it is a bit short when you are tall, but depending on the occasion, it is fine.  I loved this dress.  I will rent it again.
review_summary: Perfect for dinner on a sailboat in Hawaii.

review_text: This is a great romper however I have too much junk in my trunk....I wish the shorts were a little longer.
review_summary: Too much junk in my trunk!

review_text: I ordered this to bring with me on a trip to Florida. I wear between a 12/14 normally but I am large chest (DD). This was really tight across the chest but HUGE in the stomach area. It looked like I was wearing a sparkly burlap top. I was SO sad b/c in the photos, it looks light weight and perfect for warmer weather, but the fabric was thicker and stiff, not flowy at all. It looked cute on smaller girls in the photos, but for me, not a good fit.
Ran a little small in the top but overall fit well.  Heavy material.  Loved it so much I wanted to wear in the daytime but it's too formal.
review_summary: Love the fun print and cut of this dress!

review_text: This dress is wonderful and worth renting, but here are a few important notes. The fabric is lightweight, doesn't wrinkle, and the pattern is beautiful. Great for travel. The attached slip is the perfect length and doesn't get in the way. The dress is long. Granted, I'm 5'3" but usually with 3 inch heels, a maxi dress will work. This one is a little longer. The material is light enough that it was fine to have it hit the ground. The waist has no stretch. This helps to hold the structure, but would be a problem if your waist is not small. A thin belt really helps with the shape of this dress (not included, but almost every reviewer chose to wear one). Bust is also small. I wore a cami with top buttons open in Napa, partially for warmth and partially because the buttons gape. I am a B/C cup, so this was unusual for me. I still really loved this dress! Also wore to work and got tons of compliments!  If you're tall, consider sizing up.
review_summary: Must rent, but some things you need to know

review_text: I rented this in both a 2 and a 4 for my beach vacation. I usually wear a 4 in dresses from RTR, but for this outfit, the 2 fit perfectly, and was even still a tad big in the torso if I wasn't standing up straight. Overall, a near perfect fit, though. The material is very soft and stretchy; super comfortable to wear all night! I was able to wear a normal strapless bra with no problems. I would definitely rent this again!
review_summary: Perfect party outfit (especially for the beach!)

review_text: Wore it to dinner on vacation with flat sandals. It was cute and comfy. Unfortunately, there was a stain/mark on the shoulder that I didn't notice until I had it on. It's also bad to wrinkle, so plan to iron!
Fits true to size and is the perfect length for a romper.
Love this girly fun dress! I paired it with a belt. SO cute!

This was the perfect dress for a casual vacation with friends. It wasn't too short (good for tall girls!) and the fabric was light and easy to move in. The colors were great too especially if you have a tan!

WAY too short. The hem has a lower in front and back and higher on the sides. I ended up returning it as I have two little boys and there was NO way I could bend over or squat down to interact with them.
review_summary: Cute details, just don't bend over.

review_text: This was a backup dress for a Napa weekend getaway, and it was my favorite! The colors and pattern are brighter and sexier in person, and the silk breathed beautifully on a hot day. It's very low-cut, which I loved, but there is a clasp to make it more modest if you want (my husband was like "nooooooo leave it open"). The decorative buttons didn't make sense to me and I think the dress would be better without them, but it's a perfect dress for wine tasting, date night, or any event.
review_summary: Sexy, comfortable, and bright colors make it pop

review_text: The shoulder straps kept falling down and the top 2 buttons would come undone, lucky thing I was wearing a shawl for the most part so it wasn't as obvious.  Very fun and has a tropical vibe.  The ruffles are very fluffy which I thought was really cute.  I wore a size Large, I'm a 36b/c, 31 waist, 39 hips and 5'2 in height.
Fit perfectly true to size - I'm a big curvy so it was ever so slightly tight across the hips, but I just had to readjust the pockets occasionally. Great for a daytime event.
I wore this dress on vacation and the colors were so great for Florida weather.  It was a great fit and true to size.

I wore this on a recent trip to Art Basel in Miami, and it totally went with the vibe. It was actually very flattering for a jumpsuit, and I shockingly did not have to wear a bra. I would definitely rent again come summer or for another trip!
I wore this on vacation for family pictures. The material is a bit thicker and more stiff than I originally thought. I really did like it, and it turned out great for the pictures.
The dress is super comfortable and very flattering, but it is much longer on shorter girls than shown on the model.
Didn't like the fit at all, or color, overall just not a good shirt, especially for my body type.
I needed a coat while vising family in the North East.  Loved this coat.  Fits great and keeps you warm.

It's so pretty, but it is very short and if you're have a larger butt and thighs it doesn't cover much.  That said, I was in Vegas so I wore it anyway to see Britney Spears and I loved it.  Probably wouldn't wear it at home though.
review_summary: I saw Britney Spears in this dress, so will love it for that reason always.

review_text: Loved the dress but it runs very large. I am 5'7 and normally a 2/4. I sized down to a 0 which fit great but was still very long. I wore with 3.5 inch heels so it didn't touch the ground but if you are short I would steer clear of this dress.
It was great beach vacation dress.
review_summary: Loved the fit and the color. It was perfect for a beach vacation. It could go with flats or wedges.

review_text: Fit was large, but tighter in the sleeves. I did the realize there was a cutout in the sleeve, I wore a standard bra, but it was visible if my hair was pulled back. Very comfortable and bright color.
review_summary: Received several compliments and told others about rtr!

review_text: I have a very large chest and I'm curvy in general...and i needed a small. I ultimately had to wear a tank underneath, as the top was draping off of me. It's a LOVELY print though, and I got many compliments on it. It was perfect for our beach vacation.
This is super cute and is made with BEAUTIFUL fabric.  The only down side is that it is a bit short ( which i didn't mind) This is best worn to the beach/  on vacation.
Rented vest to potentially wear on ski vacation. It was very warm for the quick cold weekend we got in Florida but I will not be using it for a ski vacation. Thick weave with a very fuzzy wool.
review_summary: Looks great in a picture but very fuzzy/furry in person.

review_text: Fit true to size, and I loved it, but there is a built in corset and the metal boning was coming through the fabric and was quite painful.  I tried covering with band-aids, but it didn't really help.  Otherwise it was a great outfit, and I loved it.
review_summary: Wore this for Vegas girls trip - LOTS of compliments and head turning!

review_text: My fit choices were  between the 8 and the 10.  The 8 was probably a little tighter than I would prefer on top, but my boobs are bigger than normal because of breastfeeding, and the 10 was looser (translated: messy) than I wanted overall.  Because I really only wore this for photos, the fit didn't really matter as it was on for no more than one or two hours. I would have preferred it to be a little longer, but this doesn't come in a long length. Overall, it was really comfortable and I'm happy with the way our pictures turned out.  It also hid some of that lingering baby weight because of the higher waist, but I still wore Spanx anyway. Overall, a flattering dress for a causual event.
review_summary: Worn for family beach pictures.  I chose it because of the flowy design and breezy, casual feel.

review_text: I wore this for a fancy gala dinner on a cruise.  The 6 fit fine as well, but the 4 was definitely better as it was more form fitting.
review_summary: The color of the sparkles on this dress is one of a kind.

review_text: I wore this cute romper out to dinner in the Hamptons and was definitely adorable, but where it cut me in the mid section was uncomfortable at times. Other than that, it's really cute and great colors!
It's tight across the chest. Nice fabric but a bit tight
review_summary: I ended up not wearing it

review_text: Very comfortable. Loved the showy sides. Very flattering!
I could have fit an 8R but I'm top heavy. Beautiful dress. Several compliments.
review_summary: Great night and Beautiful Dress. Loved the fit and feel.

review_text: very cute casual romper. I have a long torso and rompers can be hit or miss and this worked out well. It does fit loose but its still cute for a casual occasion. Great for an easy vacation outfit (though it does wrinkle easily, so weary of this)
review_summary: fun romper, great for east outfit

review_text: I received so many compliments in this! It runs super big and the sleeves are still a bit short but that's what made it work with so much in my closet. I paired it with a turtleneck, a plain white tee, and a yellow long sleeve - all looked great with it.
I love the look of this top on the model, but it ran too big on me to wear.  I think if I rented this again I would get a smaller size.  It is a beautiful top, but the fit unfortuately did not work.
review_summary: Too much side boob to wear!

review_text: The fit is great and it was perfect for the tropical weather while still being dressy enough to go around town.
review_summary: I wore this for a tropical vacation and for a heli tour of the Grand Canyon. I keep renting this!

review_text: Rented this for a long weekend trip with girlfriends in San Francisco. Perfect fit all around with really nice sheer detailing. I wore it during the day with a camisole underneath and just a bra at night. The gold embroidery is a special touch and really pops under lights at night. I would rent again - may just buy it!
review_summary: Sheer and sassy top for all occasions!

review_text: Rented this dress for a birthday trip to The Parker in Palm Springs and it was perfect!  Super chic yet very comfortable - I had no problems eating a full birthday meal including dessert which isn't always the case with fancy dresses.  Would definitely rent again!

I was in Vegas and a RTR store was in my hotel so I figured I'd just go in since it was there. I didn't originally pick this but one of the stylists did for me and it was my favorite dress I ever rented. It fit me like a glove. The slits on the side were awesome, didn't need to wear a bra, just everything about it was perfect. I will be renting this again, wish I could just buy it.

Unfortunately, this item was even larger than reviews indicated! The moment I took it out of the bag, I thought it looked huge and had to double check the tag! It was totally unwearable, at least 2 sizes too big compared to the fit of other jumpsuits/rompers I've tried.
review_summary: Way too big - bummed I couldn't wear it!

review_text: This was a fantastic dress. I rented it for a Hawaiian vacation and also wore it to work a few times at the end of So Cal summer.  Look forward to renting again next summer.
review_summary: Every time I wore this dress I received multiple compliments.

review_text: everyone loved these pants. they are so fun and comfortable. they are fitted in the waist and flowy in the legs
I loved this dress. I wore it to 2 events because it was so great. I wish the waist was a little more defined but that's all. the sheer back was stunning
I will definitely rent this again for another occasion , it was SO sexy and flattering!
review_summary: Such a gorgeous dress but didn't want risk it dragging in the sand.

review_text: It fit perfectly in the waist, but was very tight in the butt area and hard to get on (i was afraid it was going to rip as I pulled it up!)

This dress is true to fit. Based on photos, I thought it was a true fit & flare style dress but there is a ruffle at the hem of the dress that gives the dress more curve to your shape. The halter shape was a bit big on me -- might be better for a larger bust -- but was fine with some fashion tape. Overall, loved the dress!
review_summary: Loved this dress. Wore it in Spain! So flattering and fun!

review_text: comfortable!
review_summary: a fun, sexy day to night option

review_text: Great dress, so flattering! Usually size 6, M fit perfect!

The high quality of this dress in conjunction with the coloring and construction made me want to keep it forever! Definitely plan to rent again- it was easy to throw on with some earrings and look amazing!
review_summary: So comfortable and perfect for a nice dinner at the beach!

review_text: I needed a size 8 but it was sold out so I got a 10. A tad too big but it worked. Super comfortable and sexy. Wore it to a vegas show and it was perfect. No bra needed with this dress as it holds you in well. Would rent again in a heart beat!

LOVED THIS DRESS! gorgeous color and beautifully structured, alas after 3 days of partying in Miami, i wasnt up for stuffing myself into such a tight little number and opted for a simpler dress that night. will rent again when I have a fun night out in the city... maybe in the fall since its pretty thick.
This dress traveled well, was flattering through the waist, and super comfortable.  A great summer dress!
This dress runs large. Wouldn't suggest it for anyone under 5'7" or 120 lbs because it is very flowy.

I was looking for a dress that wasn't too form fitting, and this one was great! I ordered both a 6 and 8, and ended up wearing the 6. I wish that I had ordered a 4 and 6 because the 6 still felt a little big. My only complaint is that I was the dress was a little tighter around the waist.

I ordered both the size 2 and the size 4 for my vacation.  It was a girls weekend and we had plans for a fancy dinner out.  The size 2 fit but was really tight so I went with the size 4.  I wore it with a fun statement necklace and got tons of compliments.  It is a little short but since I am petite less of an issue than maybe on someone taller.  I would totally rent this again!

I loved this dress and got sooooo many compliments! I brought it to Mexico and it was perfect to wear at night when it was in the low 70s. The top is very sheer, but I was able to get away with a nude bra (a black cami didn't work with the low V cut). Would love to buy this dress if possible.
received soooo many compliments on this beautiful, cozy, and warm coat!  great fit true to size.
Very tight, don't plan to eat too much at dinner but it looked and photographed super well.
review_summary: Free drinks in Vegas!  Can I keep this dress forever?

review_text: I loved this pattern, but unfortunately wasn't able to wear. There is a belt sewn in at the waist that I wasn't able to secure. It also was very low cut. Length would have been good (about 2in above my knee). Would order up next time. A shame, since it's so cute!

I rented this to wear for New Years Eve at the beachy resort in Florida. The color is beautiful, I would call it persimmon -- it is a tad more orange than in the photo. The fit was amazing for my shape. The v in the front was the perfect depth, not too conservative but definitely not too low. The fitted waste with the slightly flared skirt was extremely flattering. The length was a tab longer on me than the model, I would say an inch above my knee. I received compliments all night and would absolutely rent again.
This was adorable, new with tags, and a great Tory piece!  Will be renting again.  I think this would be maternity friendly as well!
review_summary: Super pretty for a weekend at the beach!

review_text: The dress had some stretch, so it was comfortable to sit down in.  The ruffle along the waist was nice for hiding an area I'm not crazy about.
review_summary: This dress made me feel very elegant for going out to dinner to celebrate our 5th anniversary!

review_text: True to size. Beautiful cut. Love the pockets. I dressed it up for a night at the ballet and also wore for a weekend of wine tasting. This is the perfect dress for a fancy baby shower. The cut is very flattering, but conservative. The length is longer than a cocktail dress (hit me just below the knees).
review_summary: Classic, classy dress for a day time event

review_text: arms a little long- hard to wear with a jacket

This dress wrinkles very easy and was not as simple as expected to steam. It's a unique maxi dress and perfect for my vacation (a cruise). I belted it since it wasn't the most flattering otherwise. This hit a few inches above my ankle on me and I am 5 foot nearly 11. Overall would rent again for the right occasion.

Overall, I really liked the look of this cover-up and am happy with my rental.  However, I have a lot of Missoni in my personal closet, and this fabric feels really really stiff relative to anything else I own.  Not sure why.  The kaftan is super cute on, runs large (as a cover-up should, in my opinion) and could be worn as an oversized top or even dress with something other than a bikini underneath (it is see through).  But I didn't find it terribly comfortable and as such didn't wear it as much as I expected during my vacation.  Overall, cute! ... but the feel of the fabric is a deal-breaker for me!

My husband and I went on the cruise for our anniversary. I worn this on Formal Night and had so many compliments! It made my boobs look really good ( my husband loved that part!) the only down side is that zipper kept getting stuck in the fabric (my husband hated that part because he was zipping me up)  and it was a little too long, but I'm short so I was expecting it :) I also crossed the straps in the back because I have a short torso. Very happy!

I wore this dress for dinner and a show in Vegas. It is seriously the most fun dress ever. It is like wearing a disco ball. That being said, this dress is a spectacle - I got a lot of attention on the Vegas strip. Everyone from random people on the street to our hostess for dinner stopped to tell me how amazing it was. It made me feel a little shy ;)
The dress fits pretty true to size - I sometimes worry that body con dresses will be too tight because I have some hips but this one has some stretch and fit perfectly. I felt like a million bucks in this dress.
I don't think I wore a bra with it because it's so low cut so probably not best for bigger busts. I loved that it was shorts because it's quite short but I didn't feel like it was too revealing.
review_summary: It felt like a boho dream wearing this romper on vacation. Loved everything about this piece!

review_text: Rented this for a bach. party in Nashville where the bride wanted us to wear a LBD.  I wanted a fun dress that could wear with cowboy boots and still look dressy.  The flouncy skirt helped that look.   I'm 5'5" and it was slightly short - sexy not revealing so long as you dont bend over!  The fabric was thick which worked since it was chilly, but I wouldn't wear this in August.  The 4 fit, but was snug and after eating BBQ for 2 days I was happy to have the 6.  I could have worn an 8 to have some room but was happy with the fit of the 6.  The pins actually un-clip so you could wear it as a crop/skirt combo.  My husband also loved it too, so hoping to rent again for a date night.  Can easily wear with tights, heels, booties, etc.
review_summary: Fun dress for a bachelorette party in Nashville!

review_text: This dress runs small but it fit like a GLOVE, i.e. no bra necessary. The cut out back was my favorite along with the neck line. BF complimented me all night long. Definitely renting again!

I really liked this dress. The colors, fabric and pattern were perfect for my Nicaraguan honeymoon. The dress was super comfortable and helped keep me cool during a long day of sight-seeing. It runs a bit big (and long), so it fit more like a maxi dress on me rather than tea-length. I loved the off-the-shoulder sleeves! I wore this several times during the trip.  Be careful though: the dress wrinkled A LOT in my bag so an iron is essential if you plan to travel with this dress.

Will buy this! Such a beautiful dress and the color is perfect. I don't think I will wear the choker for personal looks but the length and coverage blends well with the boho sexy. May go down a size before I put in the credit card but this is going to be in my closet long term.
Loved the pockets! Compliments all day. Super comfortable...although a tad bit itchy since it's made out of wool.  Not enough to take any stars away though! Try it!
review_summary: Sized down and it was perfect

review_text: It is a little short but was perfect for the beach!
review_summary: Wore the to dinner at the beach. Cute, fun, perfect little dress.

review_text: Fun dress. Very comfortable, but short! I wore boy shorts underneath so I didn't have to stress. Also, a racerback bra would work. Strapless not necessary. I loved it. Would recommend!
fit perfect, felt like Judy Jetson. ;)

I loved this dress so much I almost shed a tear when I had to send it back! I ordered a size 2 with a 0 backup, and thank goodness I did! The 2 fit okay but wasn't as flattering. Also, I have very narrow shoulders, and the shoulders on the dress are a little wide and fell down on me. The size 0 fit very well and was surprisingly comfortable and great for dancing all night long on my birthday in Vegas. I might have made some other questionable decisions that night (final shot of gin and Tabasco??), but this dress was not one of them. I would rent it again in a heartbeat!
It is a lovely dress, but it runs small. I am a solid 6 and I had to keep pulling it down because it was bunching in the back.
review_summary: Wore it in Spain because I liked the lace detail.

review_text: I love the fit of this romper! It's perfect and can be dressed up or down. The off the shoulder style is the perfect style detail to make this daytime piece standout!

This was so easy to wear, you can slide right into it.  Only thing is if you have to use the bathroom you have to take the whole thing off (which really isn't a problem, more of just an inconvenience).  It was hot on our trip to Italy, and what better outfit than this awesome cool and breezy silk romper! Love it! Now that i'm looking at the model photo, I wasn't wearing it properly, I should've pulled down the sides to show the shoulders...more sexy. Oh well, next time!
Very sung fit but with size medium it was perfect :)
This dress was wonderful.  Very attractive and slimming fit.  Sorry the pic is hard to see.  Many of our pics didn't come out from that night. :(

I wore this tons on my trip to San Francisco.  Super soft and cozy and looked great with lots of my clothes.  My son loved to rub his cheek on the sleeve because it's so soft :).  I might rent it again to buy it, I would get the most wear out of this item out of all the items I rented.
review_summary: Warm and cozy for San Fran

review_text: I love this dress as the pattern on the fabric is adorable and high-quality. And, although it did not make me look stumpy, it did not cut off in the right spot above my ankle, so a strange length on my 5'2 frame. The arm holes are rather large (it is just how the dress is made), and since I am busty and don't like strapless bras, I paired with a jean vest. I received lots of complements, but I think it would be best suited for someone with a longer, thinner frame.
review_summary: "Accordion" style fabric; recommended for tall and thin

review_text: Loved this dress. I wore this dress on vacation for a night out. The dress was good quality and strong material. I was worried the material was going to be too heavy for the warm weather but it was perfect.  I have a large chest so the v-neck style flattered by body type. I was able to wear a normal bra. Also I am short (5'3) but the dress fit just like in the picture, right at the knee.  Love it!

I am only 5'2 and the length was perfect as a Maxi for me. It would be a Midi on someone above 5'4. The front is pretty low cut, but I was out in LA for a bachelorette, so I did not mind it being revealing. If I was going somewhere more conservative, it would have definitely required a safety pin. There is plenty of room for busty girls, may gap a little if you are smaller chested.
review_summary: Perfect dress for LA nights in the Winter

review_text: I rented this dress for a Vegas trip and the black sequins were perfect.  I am a curvy girl, but somehow the 4 fit better than the 6 they sent me.
It fit true to size!
review_summary: I loved this romper! It was so flattering and perfect for a beach getaway.

review_text: The fit was a bit weird-- tight in the shoulders and arm holes but even more billowing than it looks in the photo. Hits at an awkward angle. Back was super cute, though.
Flowy fabric, was amazing in the breeze.  Beautiful details and fits busty girls like perfectly.
review_summary: The design is gorgeous and flowy. I love this dress.

review_text: This is a great quality jacket and in a fun color!  I wore for vacation at a ski-resort... fun statement piece.. it is heavy enough for a quick out to dinner trip!
Fit true to size, was a little short so wear higher waisted pants with it.
review_summary: Just the right sophistication, fun detail, wore with jeans

review_text: Runs a bit boxy but is warm and the pockets are super helpful! Basic but stylish coat.
review_summary: Wore this on a cold weather trip to an outdoor football game.

review_text: I absolutely loved wearing this dress.  It is so flattering, it made me feel beautiful!  Very comfortable, and a perfect color for fall.  I normally wear a size 8, but went with the large . The medium was a bit too snug for my liking, and with the cut-out I didn't want any unnecessary bulge.  I would definitely rent this dress again.

The fabric didn't breathe at all so it was a little too warm walking around NOLA in it.  the shoulders needed constant adjusting so it was a hassle to wear.  It was really big and long, almost long enough to pass as a dress.  The sleeves were a little long on me as well.  It wasn't nearly as comfortable as I thought it would be.  I would pick something else.
Fits great, however, the sequins ended up giving me a bit of a rash on my underarms.
review_summary: Fits great, beautiful dress for my Vegas vacation;

review_text: Loved this dress! Although fitted, it was comfortable and easy to dance in. I have a small bust, so I'm often pulling up on strapless dresses; unfortunately, this was not an exception. I would recommend it nonetheless!

This dress is a jaw-dropper while being completely appropriate in coverage. The only down size is while it fit everywhere else it was a little too small in the shoulder area since I have broad shoulders. Otherwise it was a perfect dress for a perfect night.
Just didn't fit right on me. Didn't wear it.

The embroidery on this dress is more vibrant than pictured. The blue and aqua stand out against the black. The fabric is delicate yet has a good amount of stretch making the dress very comfortable to wear. The cutout shoulders and back add a sexy edge but it's balanced by the high neck and length of the skirt. I am almost 5'7" and the dress hit a couple inches above the knee.  I planned to wear this in Vegas but had to cancel my trip. Will certainly be renting again for another occasion.
review_summary: Much more beautiful than the pictures!

review_text: Fabulous dress, fit and detailing.  It is fully lined.
review_summary: The fabric is beautiful and really "pops" in the sunlight.

review_text: Dress was awesome!  I wore it on my honeymoon for a night out on the town.  The size L was perfect.  I thought it was going to be too short but it fell mid-thigh and I never felt uncomfortable.  My husband loved it!

Perfect length for the height of my mom, 5'4. 10R and 12R were rented and the 12 was worn. Beautiful color that looked between navy and green depending on the light. Lovely lace detail that really comes through around the neckline.

This dress caught my eye and I rented it just because. I changed into it at a rest stop on the highway and got complimented on the dress as I exited the stall! I went a size up from my normal size and was really comfortable all day. The length fell a few inches above my knee, a little shorter than it looks in my pic, which was perfect for me. The dress was a little snug just below the bust, and my bust/waist are on the smaller side, so consider sizing up if you need more room in this area.

NOT made for tall people - beware if you're 5'11 and above (I'm 6') this is a SHIRT- I actually wore it as a shirt one night with white jeans and heels and it was pretty cute - but if you're tall and looking for a dress go elsewhere.
review_summary: NOT made for tall people - beware if you're 5'11 and above (I'm 6') this is a SHIRT

review_text: I absolutely loved this romper!! I got a size 10 because the 8 wasn't available, and even though I think the 8 would have fit better, the 10 was fine. I just tied the drawstring pretty tight and it was all good. I honestly felt like I was wearing pajamas it was so comfortable, but the sequins on the top made it cute to wear out for dinner and drinks in St. Thomas. I would rent this again in a second, and would absolutely buy it for myself!

I absolutely loved this jacket! I rented it for a winter trip to Germany and it was the perfect outdoorwear for my vacation. There is an inside pocket and 4 outer pockets. Could easily fit an iPad in the outer pockets as they are that large. The detachable hood was great and provided option for a different look. The leather detail on cuffs is a nice touch too. I had a hard time sending this back.
Straps were a little big on me, I had to use a safety pin in the back
review_summary: Great color, love the eyelet fabric. Perfect for dinner out on vacation somewhere warm.

review_text: I rented this to take with me to Paris but ended up returning it instead.  The coat was a little thicker than most trench coats, but I expected that after reading the other reviews.  The "skirt" fell beautifully, but it was a little longer than I expected, almost a tea length on me, but definitely below the knee. It was a little tight in the shoulders, but I have broad shoulders.  It was beautiful! If it wasn't going to be so cold where I was going I would have planned to wear it open, but it was going to be too cold for that.

This dress is amazing! It's probably the most comfortable dress I have ever worn. Stretch material, hugs your curves in all the right places. I got tons of compliments all night long. The only complaint that I have is that you have definitely tell that the dress has been worn and stretched out around the thigh area. The nude seams are popping through the black part of the dress (you can see it in my pictures), and it was also visible while the dress was on the hanger. Other than that, I would definitely rent from RTR again and this brand as well!

This was not a print I would normally wear, but I thought it would be a fun going-out dress for the beach.  The material and lining are fantastic.  It slims you out and the neckline makes your chest look amaze ;)  I really loved the coverage; the cut is perfect and doesn't leave any part feeling too exposed.  Great for the one time, but it probably won't be a repeat.  Overall, a perfect rental!

I rented this dress to wear to a dinner while on vacation in Italy. It was the perfect amount of fun and funky, but completely acceptable for an upscale restaurant. The back is really what makes this dress - it's so different and unique. The fabric was lightweight (though no stretch) and great for a warmer evening. I paired with gold sandals and wished I had packed some gold bangles to wear with it!

I am 5"5 and 36C, and short wasted. This was a perfect fit. It stores well, no ironing required. This was a perfect selection for a cruise vacation. Casual, but unusual. Very trendy. Loved the compliments. Short waisted girls will love the fit. Very fitted but I wore the size 8, and it fit very well.
It fit very true to size. I wore with a strapless bra but probably could have gone without since its pretty supportive. It was perfect for our warm-weather vacation!

The fit of the dress was wonderful. I rented this this dress for our baby announcement photoshoot on the beach. I was really nervous about renting a dressing since, being 5 months pregnant, there was a high risk I'd just look huge or the dress wouldn't fit. I took a risk on this dress since I loved the color and cut and it was PERFECT! Beautifully slimming, great waist, a little flowing in the tummy. I felt so great in this dress! 
Other Pros: Travels really well, light weight, flowy
Cons: I am 6'0" so the dress was calf length. Fine for a beach event :-)
It was a tad long on me but was manageable with high wedges, I got tons of compliments and I loved the different layers
review_summary: The dress is extremely unique and comfortable

review_text: This dress is very beautiful; the colors are as vibrant as the photos. I wore this to a casual picnic lunch and it fit the occasion perfectly. However, the fabric felt a little cheap and gave the dress slightly odd shape. Overall though, pretty enough to rent for a daytime event.
Gorgeous material, perfect fit, fun hemline, lots of compliments, everyone(from my 66 year old mother to my 19 year old cousin)wanted to know where I got it

If you are going to Vegas, get this dress. I had a girl compliment me before I got in the elevator, and many other strangers compliment my dress throughout the night. I wore a regular bra and used garment tape to keep the low neckline in check. It is super figure flattering, and the gold is perfect. I did get a little scratchy under my arms, but it's the price you pay for such an awesome party dress!

This was absolutely perfect for vacation.  Very nice and cool for my tropical vacation, but covered all the way down to my feet to help cover up for mosquitos! Great pattern. Did not wrinkle easily so came out of the suitcase very well. Make sure to wear the straps (adjustable) long so that it hangs quite low in both the front and back.  It looks much better that way.  You can fancy it up with jewelry and some heels or wear flat/thongs.  Looks great with a denim jacket too (if you need it).
True to size.
review_summary: So great I bought it!  Make sure to wear it correctly!

review_text: I normally wear a medium, but at last minute it was out of stock and didn't arrive. Good thing my back up size in Large came, and it fit perfect. Totally comfortable and perfect for casual day wear with sandals or dressing it up with heels and jewelry for going out at night! I loved it so much I called to see if I could purchase it, but am not a member so the option wasn't available. Definitely would rent this time and time again if I can't find one online to purchase!
Very pretty dress. Wore on vacation.  Have to move strapless bra lower to hide; unusually large arm holes. Overall very cute!
review_summary: Cute! Easy to wear.  Loose fitting.

review_text: This jacket is fantastic, great fit and the cropped cut makes anything instantly current and modern.  I would give it 6 stars if I could and would love to own it.
review_summary: Rented this jacket for weekend fun with girlfriends

review_text: The stress is very elegant and very easy to wear.  I was able to bring it on a cruise and on a destination wedding.
review_summary: I wore this dress to dinner on a cruise, and a beach wedding. Couldn't be more comfortable!

review_text: Definitely need a cute bra/bralette, because it WILL SHOW. The fit was great, otherwise, and it was super comfortable.
review_summary: A unique romper for  a night out!

review_text: Rented this dress for a cruise with the fam.  It totally fit in with the vacation/fun vibe, while still being classy.  It's certainly not a dressy dress, but definitely appropriate for drinks with friends or going somewhere warm on vaca.
Fit really well and was comfortable to wear.
review_summary: RTR sent my this dress by default and I ended up loving it and bringing it on vacation. Loved it!

review_text: It is a very cute and unique sweater. I got a lot of compliments on it. It is incredibly warm.
review_summary: I rented this for a ski weekend.

review_text: Slightly big but so comfortable, didn't have to wear a bra which was amazing. Loved the print.
review_summary: Easy beachy romper, perfect for a cover up or casual dinner

review_text: The sleeves fit great and the sequins were not a bother. My conservative self did think it a tad short even on a 5'3" frame. Due to ordering issues, I had to stick with the Medium even though the Large would have been a more comfier fit. Stayed at the Cosmopolitan and walked down to the Eiffel Tower restaurant--there were thousands of people and it seemed like everybody was staring at it. My bf loved it and of course said that he liked it tight. When dining at the Eiffel Tower, there is only one way to shine, and this dress out-shined them all.
review_summary: THE party dress! First trip to Vegas and never had that many eyes stare at me as I walked past.

review_text: Fits and looks beautiful

This maxi dress is intriguing and comfortable. I love the transparent parts in the bottom half of the dress. This dress is definitely bump friendly, as I am heavier throughout my midsection and it still felt comfortable. It was a bit more snug on top since I have broader shoulders. It also comes with a lining inside so keep that in mind. Its a great maxi for a more formal event or a yacht party/ wedding.

This dress was fantastic! It runs true to size, and since its a shift, it would be flattering on every body type. The color was beautiful and I got a bunch of compliments on it. The men of Chippendales especially loved it lol ;)
review_summary: Awesome for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: This is a really warm coat, that is also cute. I wore with tan leather leggings out one night and during the day wore with jeans. I got so many compliments since it's so unique. I'll definitely rent again.
review_summary: Rented for a weekend in Vail and it couldn't have been more perfect!

review_text: Sort of fit me like a mumu (sp?), but it was a fun option for casual dinner out on vacation!
review_summary: A little large, but I think it's meant to be.  Great for vacation!

review_text: The dress is beautiful.  It did look worn when you take a closer look.  I got many compliments when wearing the dress and I felt so pretty in it.  The dress is really long though, even wearing 4-5 in wedges.  It would be perfect if it came in petite.

This is a beautiful dress. It compliments women with curves very much. You cannot wear a bra with it unless you are cup A as it is very tight there. I simply tightened the straps and wore it without a bra. Love it. Will deff rent again when going to vacation.
review_summary: Beyond flattering for women with curves.

review_text: Snug in the crotch and loose up top.  Only suggest wearing if you are very comfortable with the appearance of your thighs.  Super cute and summery, though!

I rented this dress for an upcoming vacation. The print and colors are so fun - they're tropical but also stand out from typical floral prints. Unfortunately the fit of the dress was funny on my. It's loose fitting (I had to belt the waist to add shape) but then tight through the bust.

I rented this dress for a girls weekend in Vegas. I wanted something sexy, with sparkle, but still age appropriate. This dress fit so well and I got tons of compliments on it, especially the back. I would order true to size or even a size smaller since the back is open....you have a lot of room. If I would have wore the 6 it would have been frumpy in the back.

I loved this, i rented it for a bachelorette weekend in Cuba but I ended up giving it to the bride to be to wear because she loved it so much and it was her weekend after all. TIP--- she tucked the shoulder sleeves under her arms and it looked even cuter than above as pictured on the model.

The overall dress is beautiful and the color is a rich rust. However, it was too baggy in the midsection for my liking so I ended up not wearing. Since I am on the shorter side, longer looser dresses with no defined waist tend to swallow me up. If you are a little taller, I think it would be a awesome dress!

This dress was great for a casual evening dining out during my beach vacation. The dress is not fitted and the drop waist is not always flattering. But, the fabric is thick and silky, the colors vibrant, and there are subtle elegant details - like the pineapples at the ends of the strings. I am 6'2". I wore the S, but I also had to wear shorts underneath because it was so short.
This shirt definitely runs large. I am usually a 4 across the board, but wore the 2. Size down! I thought the shirt was cute from certain angles, but it definitely made me appear larger than I am.
review_summary: I wore this top on vacation

review_text: This dress was perfect for Vegas. Other women stopped me in the club to compliment my dress, and I have to say I did feel like a million bucks. My husband still talks about how much he liked it, and the whole Rent the Runway experience was good old fashioned putting the customer first, which is rare these days. It was effortless to have the dress delivered to my hotel so it was waiting for me when I arrived, and it was great to send it back from the hotel when I was done with it. I will definitely use RTR again.
review_summary: Dancing the night away in Vegas

review_text: I absolutely LOVE Milly, so for my recent trip to Vegas I knew this would be the perfect dress. I wear a solid size 6 in most dresses, and the 6 here fit perfectly. I'm a bit busty (34D), and while the dress was a bit tight around there and the shoulders, overall the fit was great. Another great thing about this dress is that you really don't need to wear Spanx or anything underneath it - the body is straight but not tight, which is really nice. The dress IS short, so I'm not sure if I'd wear it to a formal event/wedding. For a night out in Vegas, though, it's perfection. Highly recommend for a fun night out.

I. Love. This. Dress. It fit incredibly true to size and didn't ride up or really shift around at all, I attribute that to the thicker material. The top, as you can tell, isn't shy on cleavage so I also ordered the Braza Reusable Adhesive Clear Reveal Bra that came with some double sided tape and with that I was set for a whole night of dancing in Vegas. I got a ton of compliments and felt all-around amazing in this dress. I highly recommend it for a night out.
review_summary: This dress is AMAZING!! It fit like a glove and with a little double-sided tape I felt gorgeous.

review_text: Great structure and fit.  Very flattering and comfortable.
Dress was perfect for a weekend in Vegas. It is heavy, so it can be warm, but it was very comfortable. The material is thick, which helps make it very forgiving!
This was a beautiful dress. It was weighty but a show stopper!
review_summary: Wore it to the Captain's dinner on a wonderful cruise.

review_text: The dress has a mini-skirt underneath, so if you have long legs BEWARE. You may want to consider wearing tights or hose, if you're modest about showing a lot of leg. The slit is very high and prominent. The size was great, and it fit perfectly!
review_summary: Beautiful colors and the pattern stood out!

review_text: This shirt was cute, and pretty true to the description.  The bell sleeves are rather large, so be prepared for that.  I usually can wear a small or medium, but I was glad that I got the medium in this one. It does wrinkle a bit, so just be okay with that.
I am right between a 4 and a 6 and the 4 was too tight but the 6 fit perfectly. The skirt is really pretty in person and looked great in Vegas with a black top.

This was my favorite RTR rental so far! I would have loved to purchase this dress. I wore it on vacation at an all inclusive resort. One of the restaurants you had to dress up to enter. I will say that I tried to dress this down with sandals, because of the vacation vibe... but cute black strappy heels would have been perfect for any other occasion. 

The top fit great... I didn't need to wear a bra or pasties! The bottom was so flattering. I never felt uncomfortable. I absolutely loved the pockets. It is a little bit heavy, but nothing crazy. I wore it in Jamaica and wasnt hot. I received so many compliments at the resort and then even more when I posted photos from the trip! 

I am 5'8 and wearing flats in the picture, so I recommend the Long.
review_summary: This dress is amazing! Flattering fit and POCKETS!

review_text: This dress is gorgeous, figure flattering, and sexy. Hugs the curves but doesn't accentuate the flaws. If u are looking for a sexy black dress....u found it!

I was actually able to wear a strapless bra with this dress by wrapping the top portion around my bra in the front to secure it. (That will make sense when you have the dress) At 5'9", I could have worn low wedges but I stuck with flats. Endless compliments! I don't typically do pastels, but these really popped. Recommended for lots of body types, but if you have large breasts or a wide rib cage, size up!

I absolutely loved this dress. I was staying at the Cosmopolitan where there is a RTR store and while I had a dress for the night, I wasn't excited about it so I ran down to the RTR store and found the perfect dress and wore it out of the store. This dress fits true to size and has such a flattering cut. It was an eye catcher and now I think I'll have to start wearing more sequins when I go out! Perfect for a fun night out clubbing with the girls.
review_summary: This dress did the trick! Perfect for my last night in Vegas

review_text: A little loose, generous fit. You could size down!

I usually wear an 8 or 10 for dresses, but after reading other reviews ordered a Size 6 and was glad I did.  It was still just a smidge large, but so awfully comfortable!  It's got a cute, short skirt with lots of flouncy pleats--was worried about it making my hips look big but I think it still worked great.  It kept my tummy looking neat and showed off some cleavage, leaving room for a great statement necklace.  The top is structured enough that it didn't feel like it was slipping.  Really happy with this dress.
review_summary: Needed a hot but stylish, age-appropriate dress for a night out in Vegas.  This one fit the bill!

review_text: Loved this dress! Has some structure which is nice, but is pretty light overall so great for summer! Wore this in Europe - easy to dress up or down. Highly recommend!

I rented this skirt to wear out to dinner in Costa Rica.  For the occasion, it was perfect.  It was a little bit tight in the waist since there is no give, but, the fabric was beautiful.  It was also a little bit long for me and I am 5'6".

This definitely runs small (go up a size if you have hips and/or booty!), but it's a flattering, comfortable dress for dancing the night away. I tried a racerback bra, but the straps peeked out, so I went with a strapless and was thrilled that I still had a smooth silhouette.

Very comfortable! Wore it around Vegas and to a show. Only con - the zipper would not stay zipped and since I was on vacay I didn't bring any tools/safety pins to fix the issue. Material was heavier than I expected, but not hot  because it has cutouts.
review_summary: Very Vegas. Glam without being too fancy.

review_text: The material was lovely, the pattern was gorgeous but the torso and chest was proportionally way too big. It fit fine in the waist (on the larger side but passable) however the chest area was large, boxy and unflattering. I might try a size down and see if that works better
review_summary: Beautiful dress but way too big

review_text: Very tight around the ribcage. Pretty color and lace though, and perfect for a cocktail party.
review_summary: Really enjoyed the dress - Only the 6 arrived though, the 8 didn't (and I would have preferred the 8

review_text: This dress was so flattering, the material is thick so be careful in too hot weather but I wish I could buy it!  I got so many compliments and felt very confident wearing this!

This little romper was super cute on, but I couldn't actually do that myself. The zipper kept catching on a seam about halfway up.   It's a little short, but well lined so no risk of exposure. The wine color is absolutely beautiful
Fit was perfect. Comfortable. Flattering. Would absolutely wear this one again!
review_summary: Wore this a couple times, to work and on vacation and received tons of compliments.

review_text:
I absolutely adored this jacket - such a stunner. The tailored fit makes it perfect to dress up a casual look and then easily transition to the evening. The body of the jacket is soft and quite warm, and the leather sleeves really punch it up a notch.  Of all the RTR pieces this would be one I would buy - it's easily an every day staple piece.

I paired it with jeans during the day while walking around the city and in the evening over a dress and it was perfection for both. I didn't want to send it back!
review_summary: Stunning Jacket - Fits like a glove

review_text: This dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable.  Loved the pockets, the fitted top, and the flow of the bottom as it was non constricting.  So many compliments...just a lovely dress.
loved this shirt and got a lot of compliments!  The sleeves were a little short so I would size up if your tall (or have long arms).  Very colorful and breezy.  Perfect for vacation or a BBQ.
Great for a slightly cool summer night, ect.

The dress looks beautiful in person and flows very well.. Got great pictures on our vacation to the Bahamas and received tons of compliments. Felt like a celebrity, turning heads as I walked past. Beautiful Beautiful dress, might end up buying it. Its very comfortable as well.

The perfect outfit for my Birthday dinner at the beach. It really made me feel special because it was so unique!

The cropped halter was not available during my rental period, so I wore the skirt with a plain black tank top...paired with some gold jewelry and turquoise accents....PERFECTION!!! The skirt is high waisted.  I recommend getting your extra skirt one size up. I normally wear a 6/8 in a dress. I made the size 8 work, but I would have enjoyed a size 10 for little extra breathing room.
This dress was great! The lace cutouts were an amazing step up from your regular LBD. wore it in Vegas and got many compliments.

One of my favorite RTR rentals so far -- rented this for Unlimited and kept it for a month!  Kept trying to find other places to wear it (wore it to wedding shower and also brought it to the Bahamas with me).
