Normally I wear a 10 in pretty much everything, but I got an 8 in this (b/c had tried it on in the store) - I would size down unless you want the fit to be super baggy.  Even the 8 was still flow, but fit just right around the chest area.  Because of the lace-up top portion, you need to wear a low-cut or no bra with this, but it also makes it a little bit sexier than the typical maxi dress.  So, so cute and can't wait to rent more from Tanya Taylor!
fits true to size. very comfortable. loved it. runs on the shorter side, which was fine for me (i'm 5'4") but might be an issue for taller ladies.
Fit was great, it's more silver-y than I expected, but the dress fabric/structure was quality and flattering
review_summary: I got engaged the weekend I wore this dress! It was perfect!

review_text: I wore this in South Beach for drinks and dancing - it was a little heavier than I imagined it would be - my suggestion is to wear this in cooler weather.

I unfortunately didnt get a picture that really shows how the dress fits. Its DEF fitted though!! (if you arent looking to show off all your assets dont rent this dress) Its very pretty and was great for my occasion- a nice dinner. I wouldnt recommend wearing this to an event where you would be dancing, Its not the easiest thing in the world to walk in. Material is thick and looks nice but isnt very giving so if in doubt order a size up. I love the dress though! You need sticky boobs for it.
review_summary: Eye catcher for sure!! Wore on vacation for a nice dinner.

review_text: The material and pattern/colors of this shirt were better than the picture makes it look. Everyone I was with complimented me on it. I have a longer torso so my stomach showed a tiny bit but not a lot.
This fit was perfect. I am 5'9" and I was able to wear this with flat sandals!
review_summary: I wore this on a cruise. It was perfection! I received so many compliments!

review_text: You can dress it up or down, its comfortable, great fabric and looks great on!
The fit of this dress was just odd. The hips are very large but the bust very tight. Ended up not wearing it.
Fit is true to size.  I am not super busty, 32 C/D and didn't think this was too revealing.  Perfect with jeans for a girls night out or sexy date night!
review_summary: Perfect for night out in south beach!

review_text: Great piece for a vacation getaway! Looks great with flats or a small heel. VERY comfortable walking around Chicago! No itching at all (:  I do agree with other reviews with the lace overlay at the top. Wasn't a big deal but would not stay put! A great rental though. Thanks RTR gals.
Wore to a concert in Vegas. Perfect combination of trendy and comfy. It does run small but good thing I ordered an extra size up.
review_summary: Such a cute and comfortable outfit. Loved it!

review_text: I really wanted to love it, but just didn't.  My husband kind of made a funny face when he saw me too (he's an honest guy and he loved the replacement dress).  It did nothing for me, but sparkle.  Did nothing for my chest, butt, hips.  The length was boring considering the lack of fit.  If you really don't want something form fitting and REALLY sparkly, maybe it will work for you.

Really liked this dress.  The material is high quality and won't wrinkle easily.  I loved the zipper down the front because I nurse and this easy access is convenient.  Fun and pretty dress.  The skirt is very full so I had a little trouble pairing it with a cardi.  Otherwise, solid pick for a day event and I may end up renting again.
Great for layering, surprisingly warm, but mostly just delightfully fun.
review_summary: Fun and a little dash of edge to any outfit!

review_text: It hugged all of the right places on my slim, hourglass figure. It was comfortable and Honestly i would love to buy the dress to wear it over and over!
review_summary: I felt beautiful! (And my boyfriend loved it haha!)

review_text: I felt the dress ran large. I have an athletic body shape, and small on top. I ended up wearing the XS because the small was a little big on top. Get the free second size just in case.
review_summary: I felt amazing in this dress. I wore it for dinner out with friends on my bachelorette.

review_text: I had to rent a large since medium was out of stock, I would have preferred the medium and there was much room in the armpit area. I think the medium would have fit perfect. I paired it with a denim jacket as the air was cool.

After the two original dresses I ordered for pick-up in the Vegas store were too tight, the attendant help me find this dress as a replacement. And OMG, it was awesome. It fit perfectly, the cutouts were placed strategically and it flowed when I strutted my way through Vegas. I felt slim (even though I'm not the tiniest) and beautiful. I wear a 36C, but I had no problem wearing the dress without a bra, which you probably want to do with the cutouts. If you have a bigger chest than that, I wouldn't suggest this dress. Paired it with a studded clutch and wedges. Am already plotting on when I can rent this again!
Love this outfit! You can dress it up in so many ways or dress it down for a casual day of touring!

This dress has an amazing fit and looks amazing on. Perfect for Las Vegas, or even a wedding, depending on the theme and level of formality. I gave it 4 stars because I have to agree with previous reviewers about it being scratchy. I only wore it for a couple hours so it was fine, and wouldn't deter me from renting it again, but I wouldn't want to wear this for a long time or for dancing. That said, I had at least 4 people stop me and say how much they loved the dress, so that's saying something!  Fit was true to size for me, cinched in nicely at the waist which is always a challenge for me (some dresses tend to be too baggy in the waist area - not this one!). Dress was overall comfortable, lining was soft and it had a little stretch to it.  Except for the scratchy sequins under the arms and at the slit in the back, it would get 5 stars. Still loved it though!
review_summary: Stunner!  People stopped to compliment me :)

review_text: Rented this for a beach vacation.  Perfect for a swim cover up but probably would not have worn it over anything else (low cut and pretty short).  Would rent again!
Cute dress, but be careful- this is my second RTR dress in a row that didn't come with a belt.
review_summary: Decent dress, can dress up or down

review_text: This dress is very comfortable!  Love the pockets!  Fits true to size.
review_summary: Love this dress!  Took on vacation to NYC.

review_text: It runs true to size and is very figure flattering. I have had so many compliments today. I love this dress. I just might buy it.
I agree that this dress was relaxed and kinda cute. Its a good length. But for me it was too sheer- I had to try to dig up a slip to wear with it- not low maintenance enough!

Wore to a bachelorette party- sequined themed night.  I received SO many compliments on this dress.  It was in Austin, TX, so I ended up wearing tall brown cowboy boots with the dress- worked out perfectly.  Very cute!
Ordered the 2 and 4, usually a 2 but wore the 4 for length purposes being a taller girl. Wore on Christmas Eve and was the perfect dress for family dinners and church services.
review_summary: Tis the season! Perfect for the holidays!

review_text: This was a beautiful jumper.  I bought it for a trip to Wine Country in CA but when I tried it on it cut me severely in the rise, therefore I had to return it unworn.  If you have a long rise, it's not for you.  I may give it another try and size up but not sure.
review_summary: Could not wear but it was beautiful!

review_text: This dress looked beautiful on but I was so uncomfortable. It was large so I'm glad I listened to other reviews and rented the size down also. The sequins rubbed and scratched me all night. I spent more time adjusting then enjoying my night. Would not rent again.

The pattern of the stripes is flattering and the material is nice (heavy but not too thick).  I was even able to go braless (36B/C), which I never do, and be comfortable.  Wish it were a little longer (but I am tall with a long torso), but other than that it was a perfect choice for a day out during my vacation in the Bahamas!
review_summary: Great Day to Evening Casual Dress

review_text: Wore this out for dinner on a Palm Springs vacation.  It's cute, comfortable and fits true to size.  It was really flattering as well - looked great with a pair of heels for a fun, family dinner out when the weather was crazy hot.

I rented this dress for a trip to Vegas. It was the perfect dress! It's low in the back which makes it sexy. The only complaint I had was the lining. It is tight and not connected to the dress. The lining would ride up and it was hard to keep it pulled down. It made the dress a bit uncomfortable.
review_summary: It was the perfect Vegas dress!

review_text: This dress accentuated all of my curves. And the material is heavy weight therefore it smooths everything out.  I felt glamorous in this dress. I would definitely rent it again.
Great dress, fit a little longer than on the model (of course, I'm short.)

Rented this dress for Vegas, had such a great time a forgot to take full body pictures but I did like this dress. You get tons of attention as it is both form fitting and cleavage baring. One con I will say  is while it does suck you in it still does show every curve so  I don't think that it's necessarily as figure flattering as I was lead to believe in other reviews and I still wore my spanx with it.

This dress is a thicker material and pretty color but it was really big through the bust and arm openings. It was gaping open on me so I was not able to wear it. But I did like the dress, color and fabric. Size down a size it may be perfect.

My friends and I rented dresses at the store in the Cosmopolitan out in Vegas.  At first I thought I wanted to wear sequins, but when I tried this one on, there was no contest.  You never think a dress so tight could be so comfortable!  I'm a fan of Herve leger for life now.  The fabric and cut of this dress is extremely flattering to curvy figures.  Also, a HUGE plus for me was that at a 34DDD I didn't have to wear a bra!!!  I'm not saying I was 100% covered up, but I definitely felt 'supported'.  And I'm pretty sure the many people who commented on my dress (men and women) thought so too...
Rented for a vacation and got many compliments from strangers! Beautiful color and good fit. Would rent again!
The fabric perfectly kept all of my curves in check and was comfortable all night long
review_summary: Ready for a classy night in vegas

review_text: I planned to wear this piece with dark denim jeans, a white tank and loafers when we vacationed in Seattle. It ended up being a very warm Memorial Day weekend and I didn't have the opportunity to wear it only because it was so hot. I did try it on and it was true to size, very comfortable and high quality. I am definitely thinking about renting it again if we have a cooler weekend coming up in the PNW soon.
Wore this to drinks during a weekend girls' getaway and gots lots of complements!
review_summary: Perfect for patio drinks in the fall!

review_text: I'm usually a 14 so was pleasantly surprised this garment fit. It was roomy, so if you prefer a tighter fit I would size down. Will have to reorder this now that I'm back in a warmer place.
review_summary: Unfortunately I didn't wear it. My vacation ended up being way colder than expected.

review_text: I loved this dress online, but when I put it on I decided not to wear it and returned it right away. There are 2 slits (one on each side) that went up way too high. I watched myself walk in the mirror and the slits looked inappropriate.
review_summary: I got this as a part of my unlimited subscription for vacation. I did not end up wearing it.

review_text:
This dress is beyond comfortable, packable, breathable, flattering, and looked amazing right out of my suitcase- I wondered for a while what the big deal is with Missoni, but now I know. The quality is unbelievable, and the color, fit, construction, and fabric knit are all worth their price tag once you see this dress in person. My only cautions:  1) I ordered the 40 (US size 2, I think) and it was too big in the shoulders/arms/chest, so I had to keep pulling it up in front and checking to cover my bra on the sides and under my arms. It wasn't very fitted on the bottom, either. I don't know if the 38 (US 0) would've fit better, but I thought Missoni would run small so I didn't get a backup size. I'd order a size down if you're short and/or small chested.
2) I couldn't tell the front from the back of the dress, so I had to look at pictures on RTR to see it on the model. Maybe I'm just a novice, or maybe I was having a moment of idiocy, but the lining inside the knit overlay is cut the same way front vs. back and the tag is sewn into a side seam. Anyway, crisis averted. 
This was one of my favorites so far- I LOVED this dress and I'd definitely rent Missoni again!
review_summary: First anniversary dinner at a gorgeous formal restaurant in Bermuda :)

review_text: Fits great! love the pockets

I will definitely rent this again this summer.  While it runs a little big on me, I am also very narrow in the shoulders, but would still not size down because of the length.  I am a mom of boys and 5'8", so the super short style doesn't do it for me.  The elastic waist allow you to pull it down and wear on your hips or on your natural waist.  I wore it down on my hips to give me the length.  The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars was because the elastic around the shoulders seems to get very loose and was falling down.  Mine arrived with tags, so this was brand new.  I think you just need to really adjust the tie at the top to help make the fit a little tighter around the shoulders.  Wish I would have snapped a picture of this cute number!

I ordered both the 2 and 4 and they both fit, I went with the 2 because I felt the sleeves wouldn't slip as much, and used a little fashion tape on the back.  This dress was SO comfortable and looked perfect for a night out in Vegas.
I wore this in Vegas for a night out with friends and it was comfortable and fun.  Color is great.  It's a little plain on the front, but really fun on the sides with the cut-outs.

I can't say enough about this jumper. It's lightweight and of great quality -- looks expensive. The cut is sophisticated yet sexy at the same time. I'm 5'3" and the length worked great with my height. Great rental!
Loved this comfy super trendy jumper. Wore to a chic dinner in NYC. Only wished it was a little longer in the leg, but that's what happens when you're 5'8 and wearing the XS.
review_summary: 2nd time renting I loved it so much!

review_text: Fits true to size. Lightweight. The blue really pops. Perfect for my trip to Iceland where it was summer, but still colder than LA typically gets.
review_summary: This sweater basically made me realize how crappy all the sweaters I own are.

review_text:
I've never given a dress (or for that matter, anything!) five stars before but I love this dress. It was stretchy enough to be comfortable but hugs curves in a flattering way. The blue interior gives it a great pop of color. I wore this to synagogue and out to dinner twice in D.C. and it was perfectly appropriate everywhere. It would also be reversible if you owned it and could cut the tags off.
The only minor problem I noted was that the third time I wore it, I noticed a slight pull in the knit on the front.
perfect boyfriend short jacket
I wore this to a casual brunch with friends while out of town for a wedding. A little short on me (I'm 5'6) but definitely not unmanageable!
I wore this for a day of wine tasting, and it was great. Note that the dress runs huge - I'm either a 4 or 6, depending on the dress, and I wore the 2 with room to spare.
I should have sized down. It was too big. Wearable, but too big.
review_summary: Super comfy and cute!!! Would rent again in a smaller size.

review_text: I've rented this twice now, because it's the perfect dress that looks great in an outdoor beer garden and a Napa winery. It's sexy with the deep V in front (I wore no bra, but you can wear a normal bra), and comfortable with the floaty sleeves and the way it skims your body. I'm 5'2" and it came almost to my ankles, which was a great length on me; on taller women it will be more midi-length.

It's a beatiful dress.  Its very short tho!

I decided it was too much (too sparkly) for my event. Plus way too short, so I decided not to wear it at all. Sent back.
This coat is magical, seriously get it. It did fit snug in the wrists, but I think that because I am do tall (5'9")
review_summary: Felt like a princess! And super warm for London over Thanksgiving.

review_text: Fantastic rental for an easy beach vaca outfit!  Easy to wear with a very relaxed fit that makes it super comfortable for any number of settings.  It pairs really well with a wide variety of shoes for maximum versatility on a vacation. I loved the look and the versatility.  As for the wrinkles as noted by other reviewers, I didn't have a problem ... took it out of my travel duffel at night and it was dewrinkled by morning.  My only complaint is that the weight of the denim is heavier than it appears in the pictures.  I was expecting very thin, soft and flowy denim based on the pics, but it's actually a bit heavier and stiffer ... less ideal for the heat and humidity on my beach vaca (especially given the long sleeves!), but still wearable!  But the "heavier" weight is my ONLY reason for not giving it 5 stars (and for not purchasing it!) !!
The fit was perfect.  It was loose fitting and very light weight.  I wore it with flats and its wasn't too long (ended a little above my knees).  Great for a destination wedding!

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner in Mexico. Loved the fit - although it was a little snug in the waist so I suggest to size up. I also suggest picking a long if you'd like to wear heels. The MR was too short for heels even with my short legs!
review_summary: LOVED THIS! Great alternative for a dress for an event.

review_text: I rented this for a beach getaway and found that it's very versatile.  It works as both a beach coverup as well as dressed up for a brunch.  I also wore it with leggings once the temp dropped.  The top was loose-fitting but the bottom half fit my curves well so I couldn't have sized down.  I liked the flowy look of it anyway.  Plus the drawstring waist really helped adjust the fit.  And it has pockets!  I'd rent this again.
review_summary: Can be dressed up or down!

review_text: I wore this dress for a cocktail night on a cruise.  The black side panels were really flattering and slimming, and the dress looked really good with silver and opal jewelry   It packed easily and came out of the suitcase wrinkle-free.  I wore a standard bra.  The only negative, not really visible in the picture, is that the darts at the bust came to a very exaggerated point.  I was concerned that it looked like large nips.  If not for this, the dress would have gotten 5 stars.

Everybody wanted to know where I got the dress.  I rented this dress for my beach honeymoon and it was a perfect dress for a special dinner.  Make sure to wear the right undergarments because it will show.
It is comfortable to wear. The deep pockets come handy when traveling (they can hold my wallet and iphone 6 without look baggy!)
review_summary: I LOVE the pocket of the dress!!!

review_text: Loved the design, fit was loose but thats expected. Did look a little worn but overall loved it!

I loved this fun & colorful maxi! This style ran large and I'd suggest sizing down for a backup. It works best for any cup size and is roomy in the bust. This style has comfortable room throughout the midsection and hips and should be worn with a strapless bra. The length of this dress runs long. I am 5"5' and wore a 3 inch heel and it still touched the ground. This will work best for Apple, Hourglass, Athletic, Pear, Straight & Narrow, Full Bust, and Bump Friendly body types.

I wore the 8 though it was a bit snug in places, it fit better than the 10. I loved this dress. The fit was great, very flattering and received loads of compliments from strangers. I would purchase this dress to dress up or down!
review_summary: Super cute, fitted dress. The color is outstanding and the cut is very flattering.

review_text: Great dress for the beach. Wore it to a beach party in Cabo and received numerous compliments. Also has pockets which is a plus.
cozy for a snow trip!
review_summary: The jacket was overly worn. Wish they took better care of it!

review_text: It was a little long but 4 inch stilettos finished the look perfectly!!!
review_summary: I felt elegant and received tons on compliments!!

review_text: I wore this while in Vegas on a friendversary trip with my best friend.  I freaking LOVED this dress.  The only thing I wasn't super crazy about was that it felt like the sleeve was trying to slip off my shoulder.  Not a big deal.  There isn't much stretch in the dress at all.  And it's pretty short if you're on the tall side.  If you don't want to overexpose yourself just get a pair of boyshorts or Spanx to wear underneath.

I don't think this dress photographs well, but I did love it on. It was comfortable, light, and I wasn't at all concerned about the length (I'm 5'7.) I could have done a much better job of ironing it, and for a long day, I'd put some double sided tape in between the buttons at the chest. I loved it so much that I ended up buying it directly from Kate Spade!

I loved how this fit.  The nude underlay was beautiful and the maroon purple lace layer perfectly no matter how I stood or sat.  The length was really nice and allowed me to squat down to talk to some of the little kids at the party as well.  I paired it with a nude belt, nude heels and gold and pearl jewelry.  This is the second time I rented it and I will definitely be renting this again!
Great fit, true to size! The collar chokes you a little while sitting if you have  larger neck. Overall wonderful fit! Got tons of compliments!

This dress is beautiful. The length and fabric make this maxi more glamorous than your everyday floral dress. It was actually a little too long for me. I'm 5'3'' and wore 3'' heels and the dress brushed the ground. The bodice is fitted with little stretch, but it fit perfectly. I rented this for vacation thinking I may also wear to work. It was a little too flowy and glamorous for work. Not a bad thing!
Great looking skirt made of heavy wool.  Nice weight and quality.

Rented this for a weekend in NYC and it was great. Would recommend wearing it with high waisted pants and a slim, tucked in shirt. Unfortunately it was too cold for a slimmer shirt underneath so it looked a little awkward with a  loose, longer sweater underneath but it worked and at least looked good with the turtle neck style. Everyone said to order up a size for fit and I don't think that is necessary unless you wear something thick underneath. All in all, fun unique jacket!
sexy without being sleazy- the fabric is thick so it hides flaws easily. Wore with wedges to brunch and to after work drinks. The perfect LBJ
It was perfect, warm and stylish. Perfect for traveling.
Absolutely love this dress. The fit is perfect, I ordered the regular and I wore this dress with wedge heels. I loved the flow of the dress and will definitely order this dress again!

This dress definitely has an old glamour feel - pair it with red lips and you'll be channeling the 1920s! Beautiful detailing on the front, particularly with the scalloped bottom. The cap sleeves were also very comfortable. Now, the dress is backless and you have to be completely comfortable wearing it that way. My boyfriend wasn't feeling the backless look (boo hiss!) so I alternated between showing the back with my hair to the front (first picture) and wearing my leather jacket (second picture). Both looks were great, although there was definitely more of a "Wow" factor sans jacket. You will not be able to wear a standard bra, obviously, so either invest in a NuBra or if you completely forget to pack one (like I did), you will have to go sans bra. I'm also a 4/6 and the dress was slightly tight as a size 6. Again, this may be attributed to my hitting up the buffet quite a lot while I was in Vegas, but I can't be exactly sure so definitely do size up if you choose to rent!
review_summary: Love the old Hollywood glamour feel of this dress!

review_text: Very loose fitting.
review_summary: Super combination of comfy and yet sexy!

review_text: Easy to wear, comfortable, and perfect for a special dinner in San Francisco on the day we got engaged. And who doesn't love pockets?

I am in love with this jumpsuit. I wore while in Vegas to see a show and bar hop. The top looks see through where the clasps are but it's really not. I even received compliments from women in the bathroom. It also didn't drag, which is important for someone 5'2.

I didn't love this dress. I have worn Herve dresses before and know how tiiiight and form fitting they can be, but this one was a little too tight even though it was the medium. I also got a small, but couldn't eveb begin to get my body into it. The strap at the back on the dress I got was loose and worn out, which sometimes made it drape weirdly, which I didn't like. I wore this dress for a night in Vegas with my husband. I did not have to wear a bra or tape. I wore nude wedges.

This dress was so fun to wear.  It's loose but sexy with the open sides and back.  I wore a bralette under it and it worked great.  It was the perfect beach dress and I definitely want to purchase this!

This dress is very forgiving and the fabric is stretchy. I wore the 0 and had plenty of room to move around, it was flattering. The lace around the neck can fold. I ironed the lace around the neck, then it looked fine. You can wear a regular bra with this dress. The boat neck was a little large so one side continued to fall over and expose one shoulder. I didn't mind because it looked very cute. Wear a bra with cute straps (or a color that matches the navy/white), just in case it fits like that on you. Good choice!
5'5, 140lbs, 34C/28/36- fits great!
review_summary: Sheer black mesh with white knit design. Great Texture. Expensive feel.

review_text: it was a bit heavy and hot for the beach but very cute fitting. i wore it to a beach bachelorette
review_summary: it was a bit heavy and hot for the beach but very cute fitting

review_text: I had fun wearing this top! It sort of runs a little big...but I am not sure I would have sized down, since I am an 8 normally. The pattern, the ruffles, and the colors really made this a fun shirt! I wore it with white shorts and navy jeans, and my boyfriend loved it! It was fun for our tropical vacation :)

I wore this in Vegas - which was perfect.  I wore it to a Sports Bar where my group held our fantasy football draft.  I wasn't too "dressed up" for the group and was grateful I was wearing this because we decided to go to Britney at the last minute and this outfit seamlessly transitioned to a dressier venue.  Plus, it was comfortable!  LOVE!
review_summary: Comfortable and easy to dress up or down

review_text: I am so obsessed with this Mara Hoffman dress. Wore it out to dinner in South Beach, Miami. Easy, easy fit. Wore a normal bra underneath and very flattering for my pear shape. Highly recommend!

Pros definite attention getter with the sparkles.  
Cons if you are tall it is short and the sleeves were short on me but i have long arms.  The overall fit was a loose which wasnt bad just a lil unexpected.  I also would state that it is impossible to wear your hair down with this dress as the sequins will snag it all night long and it will snag other people and drop earrings and anything it can sang it will so be forewarned.
review_summary: I got lots of compliments on the dress, its a true vegas party dress.

review_text: The material is very nice! I wore it the whole day on a vacation and it is very comfortable and versatile as far as dressing up or down! I love how the dress is made as it definitely you would definitely would want to twirl in it (as  other reviews states) as the bottom part is so flirty and pretty!!!
Hugged my curves in all the right ways! It had my friends drooling <3
review_summary: It made me feel super confident!

review_text: Wore this visiting some friends in San Francisco! Excellent quality, never slid down, only rode up a little while dancing. Unfortunately I don't have any pictures of me wearing it. Overall a great  strapless dress. I would recommend.

The top part of the dress fit great.  Cleavage, shoulders, back, and waist, and side cut-outs were all perfect.  The bottom part was a little too tight, I have curvier thighs and a larger butt so the size 4 may have been a better fit.  They were out at the time of my event.   Overall I got many compliments.
review_summary: I wore this for a work trip to Vegas.  It was classy and fun.

review_text: Loved this one! Wore it out and about Nashville during my 4th of July trip. Really flattering, intricate detailing, but also super breathable. I wanted to keep it but it's a particular "look" that is not really timeless. Still, a great blouse, highly recommended! Perfect with shorts and jeans alike, you can dress it up or down.

Loved this dress for a night out on vacation. It definitely hugs the figure, accentuates the booty. I think it ran just a tad small but you want a tight look with it. I'm a 6-8 and definitely needed the 8. The print is so fun!

I rented this dress for a vacation in Florida which sadly got canceled, so I didn't get to wear it.  However, I did try it on and will absolutely be renting it again!  It fit true to size and was super feminine and figure flattering.  The colors are beautiful and would look even better with a tan!  Can't wait to get somewhere sunny so I can wear this cute dress!

I rented this dress for an upcoming beach vacation and think it will be perfect for that.  The fabric is very light 100% silk, the dress is unlined, and its shape is very flowy.  It has a zipper in the back, but it is easy to get in and out of the dress with the zipper closed.  I am usually a size 10-12 with RTR (158 lbs, 5'7", 36C) and this dress fit perfectly in size 12. Therefore, I would say this dress runs true to size. The only cons are that this dress is very short (at 5'7", I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing this in a city, but fine at a beach location) and that it doesn't have straps to hold the bra straps in place.
review_summary: Very lightweight summer dress. Fun style, but very short. Runs true to size.

review_text: I received so many compliments on this dress. I wore this for formal night on a cruise.  The back of the dress flows nicely when walking and floats beautifully
It was a comfortable, well made dress - it fit true to size and i loved the waistline.

Loved this dress! It's comfortable, light and perfect for summer. I wore it with a black racer back bra, which worked well. I recommend this dress for vacation or a weekend day time event. Super comfortable, true to size, and easy to wear!

I am totally grabbing this when it goes up for sale!  My husbands eyes bulged out of his sockets.  The bust are was definitely a feature.  Casual enough for Napa Valley dinner scene.  Fit great.  The bra was a bit of a challenge.  While I was able to wear one, it kept showing towards the bottom.  It was nude colored and dark so it didn't really matter.  Very comfortable but if you have to use the bathroom, prepare to completely undress and re-wrap the belt area!
Fit very well, the sleeves ride up the shoulders a bit but it wasn't too much of an issue. Overall very comfortable and beautiful top!!

This top was super cute and has amazing detail, unfortunately it didn't fit since it runs small. Definitely recommend going one size up. It's very fitted and works best for A-C cups. It's tight in the waist due to the cinched belt and no stretch. It can be work with any standard bra though.

Only con - this is VERY long. I am 5'4" and if you look at the hem in the picture, I had to use double-sided tape to take the bottom up a good 6 inches. It's very easy to do though since the fabric is so thin. I wore a regular bra with this. It was super comfortable. Very light, perfect for a beach cocktail party. I was surprised at how flattering this was - the waist was so slimming and the neckline is beautiful. This is a dress I would really like to own.
looks amazing on. I rented it for a girls trip to las vegas and looked amazing in the clubs

Fit was true to size, very flattering and forgiving, stretchy but thick fabric, feels nice on. The lace front showing cleavage is very attractive yet somewhat modest as well, I didn't feel like the boobs were hanging out all night. I wore this out in Vegas, and there is SO much walking in Vegas, the dress was riding up all night. I had to constantly tug at it or hold the dress at my leg to keep it from riding all the way up and showing my underwear. If you didn't have to do much walking, it would probably be fine. This happened both when I wore the M and L, so it wasn't a sizing issue.
review_summary: This dress is a stunner! So comfy and easy to wear!

review_text: Short fit at the waist.  Cute cut with great neckline. Stretch panels throughout the jacket make it a comfy easy piece to wear. The leather was soft but didn't feel like a butter leather that I expected.  It had a slight crinkled feel to it, almost like a less expensive jacket.  Judging by the price tag I would have expected a super supple leather.  Either way it was a cute rental for my week vacation in the North in December!

In love with this dress.  God bless Herve and the "I'm wearing 3 pairs of Spanx" feel his dresses give.  This dress really lifts & accentuates the 'girls' up top.  It was perfect for a Monaco F1 party, but I probably wouldn't choose it for a conservative event if you have large breasts.   I thought I'd be a Medium (typically I'm a 6-8), but chose Small... I ordered both, but the Small was much more flattering on me.  Whatever size you think you'd be, pick the smaller size for your back-up to compare.  I hate when the entire dress is a tight bandage from top to bottom  (it makes my butt look a mile long), but this has the perfect amount of 'fit and flare' to avoid that butt-hugging look... it was very flattering!
True to size, comfortable and super sexy. Love, love, love!
review_summary: Loved everything about this dress--perfect for my birthday trip to Vegas!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation in Hawaii. It was perfect! It flows nicely in the breeze and is comfortable while also showing off your figure.
review_summary: A gorgeous, lightweight dress that is very flattering.

review_text: Fits true to size and is super comfortable.  I'm 5'11" and would definitely recommend the long for anyone over 5'9".
review_summary: Wore this for a photo shoot in wine country and received so many compliments!

review_text: Nicole Miller usually runs small so I ordered a 6 instead of my usual size 4. The dress fit perfectly. It was sexy and classy. I was overwhelmed with compliments. My boyfriend asked how long I got to keep the dress. This dress is a homerun.

I rented this dress for vacay in Mexico. It was perfect after a long day in the sun full of drinking *cough* water, and then wanting to feel sexy at night. Loved this dress. Great length. Top is a little stretchy.
review_summary: Comfy & Sexy After a Long Day

review_text: I rented this for a spring break trip to NYC and wore it every single day. Absolutely loved how easy it was to use and it was the perfect amount of coverage. Looked pretty cool, too!
review_summary: Wore it every single day in NYC

review_text: Beautiful, thick, green crop sweater. Nice quality and fit.
Was not too long on my 5'3" frame. Fit perfectly, and is right on trend. High recommend this dress!
review_summary: The perfect dress for vacation in Mexico.

review_text: true to size
review_summary: My first RTR dress, absolutely loved it.  Very comfortable easy wear.  Many compliments all night.

review_text: I rented this dress for a night out in Vegas an it was perfect, I got compliments from total strangers all night long! The sequins are a little scratchy and by the end of the night my arms were feeling a bit raw from rubbing them, but since the dress was so pretty I let it slide. The back has a great V-neck as well which is a nice detail. I liked that it was sexy without being super tight so (aside from the sequins) I was super comfortable. For a busty girl you'll definitely end up showing some cleavage, but that's exactly what I was looking for (it's Vegas) so I thought it was perfect.

I had an all white party on the beach for a rehearsal dinner, and this dress was perfect. I normally never wear formfitting things, but the fabric is thick enough to feel like you're not showing every bump and lump. I received so many compliments and would rent it again!

This dress is a gorgeous pop of color and super comfortable.  I brought it to Cancun, and it was perfect bc it didn't wrinkle and was a great dress to be casual or dress up. There was a pretty thick slip underneath and the material is a bit thicker, not sheen...so I wouldn't wear it in balmy weather, but I will definitely rent this again.  It's a fun, comfortable dress!
Very COMFORTABLE to wear- I wore with Cowboy boots for a fun look!
review_summary: Super fun dress to wear!  You can dress it up or down.  The color works in summer of fall!

review_text: Rented this for a weekend in Las Vegas -- it's certainly a very flashy dress! The overall fit was great -- however, the sequins and dress material became itchy over the course of a few hours.
review_summary: Looking flashy for a group dinner on the Strip!

review_text: This was a nice lightweight coat that is perfect for fall weather.  It would have been nice to have some lining on the inside but the material was soft enough and not scratchy.  There was a dirty napkin in one of the pockets, so that was a little concerning if it hadn't been washed after the last use.
review_summary: Lightweight jacket perfect for the fall

review_text: I had to send this back in my unlimited shipment...camel toe galore. Top half was gorgeous, though!
review_summary: Not long enough in the torso

review_text: Loved the colors of this dress, was perfect for a sunset cruise in Aruba during my honeymoon.  I wish i had ordered the size 4, the 6 was very large and boxy, no shape at all.  I had to pin the sides.  I did receive a lot of compliments on the colors. very lightweight.

I am typically between a 0 and a 2 and I could barely get the 0 on! I ending up wearing the 2 wine tasting and it definitely feels like a designer dress. I am not sure it was flattering on my mid section, but I imagine if you have a longer middle then it would look great.
I'm 5'5 and found the M was way too short so I wore the L which was a bit longer but not as form fitting. The color of the dress is very pretty.
review_summary: I wore this dress for a day of wine tasting in Sonoma. It was great, lots of compliments.

review_text: Such a comfortable fit! Airy and flowy.
review_summary: Great for a night on the town or vacation, especially spring or summer!

review_text: I loved this dress, it was classy and sophisticated. It was a little longer than I expected but that was still OK. I didn't have to wear a bra with it and the sequins didn't bother me all night or leave any type of rash. The open back is very sexy. I would definitely rent this again.
review_summary: One of my favorite RTR dresses EVER!

review_text: its a thin sweater-comfy
review_summary: rented for a cruise-I thought it was so cute

review_text: This dress was FIRE for a hot summer, outdoor, birthday party. I was having a hard time choosing between RTR dresses for this party, but this one was my husband's favorite so I went with it! This was really loose fitting and flowy, which was great so I could wear my bathing suit underneath (I'm typically a size 4, and went with a Small). I'm 5'2", and you can see it the dress came to right above my knee...I could have probably gone with the XS if it was available. You can wear normal underwear and a strapless bra with this. I loved the bright red color and the gold hardware down the front definitely lends it to being accessorized and dressed up for a more formal event or night out too!
review_summary: RTR Team Review- perfect for a summer party!

review_text: I'm a solid 8 in most RTR/designer clothing and was swimming in the 6.  SIZE DOWN.  I also tried the blush pink version in an 8 recently and didn't make the connection it was the same design - but had I remembered I would have ordered the 4.  Beyond size issues, though, it's a lovely little romper. Cool, comfy fabric that still has a bit of a dressed up look.  The neckline has a lace-like detail -- it's hard to see from the photos but it's not sparkly/shiny as it might appear.  I'd rent again, but in the correct size...
Dress was great had lots of stretch, was a bit warm because the fabric was so heavy but I wasn't dancing so it was fine. Wore it with black tights and booties, got tons of compliments.
review_summary: Wore this to The Beverly Hills Hotel for dinner at The Polo Lounge!

review_text: great fit...a perfect dress for a black tie event...I received many compliments!
Super comfortable, very flattering, easy to wear and dance in.  Got compliments on it all night long!

The dress was great overall. Better if you have boobs to fill it out. That's the only complaint I can come up with for it. It otherwise was perfect. Runs small - though it is stretchy as most bandage dresses are so you can likely still for your typical size. But a size larger wouldn't be bad as long as you have boobs to fill it out.
review_summary: Compliments by strangers on the streets of NYC

review_text: Love the fit. and got SO many compliments on it :)

It was my first time in Vegas and for triple special reason I went all out on my outfits; rented this one for dinner/cocktail/ clubbing. and another gorgeous white dress. 
The dress fits right in all the right places. The dress looks a bit short on the model but it was the perfect length even for my long legs and "shapely assets". The fabric looks and feels expensive and the dress is very well made. 
I recommend a sticky bra as the back has a nice decent scoop.
review_summary: This dress is a show stopper and I felt very sexy and comfortable wearing it!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation in South Beach and wore it out one night.  The print is stunning and the cut is very flattering.  The dress does run small, so size up.  I was stopped in the street by people telling me how much they liked the dress.  Cannot go wrong with this one!

I loved this outfit so much I might rent it again right now. I wore a statement necklace and white shoes. Amazing. It does require the two people to use the restroom though. Luckily I have a partner that new the drill.

This skirt was a big hit during a vacation I took to the Hamptons this July.  I wore it in the car comfortably, but it was a great statement piece for a vacation wardrobe.  I paired it with a Reformation crop top.  It looks great with any crop top because of the belting and high-waisted design.  It has a lot of stretch/give, so it's very breathable.  So many people came up to me to tell me that they liked my skirt.  I would definitely rent this one again.  See more of my RTR finds at @thehllw!

Loved the neckline on this dress! I rented the 4 and the 6. The 4 fit a little better, but I probably could have fit into a 2 as well. It's not skin-tight, and the fabric is a bit drapey and thick, but I wore spanx underneath anyway.  It's definitely a versatile dress.

I really liked this.  The bust area was a bit awkward because the bust had padding that probably just has been dry cleaned and used too much? It was fine though.  The fit in the legs/thigh area was a bit snug and I am pretty trim.  I didn't have a back up size so I can't say for sure if one would have fit over the other.  Overall, the fit was fine, it stayed up which is a plus.  I wasn't sure about the elastic ankle area but it was cute as well.  Great staple piece.

Pros: Beautiful dress
Cons: if you are 5'2 like me, the dress will come to your ankles. I didn't wear it.

This romper does run small, especially for the long torso women out there.   Per previous reviews the arms were also tight and I consider myself to have long slender arms. Overall if you size up with that in mind its definitely a wearable piece and absolutely beautiful on.  I love how the shorts flute out to look more like a dress, it is very slimming to the legs.  Can also be dressed up or down. Planned to wear it in Vegas but had to cancel my trip due to a family illness. Will definitely rent for another occasion.

I rented this to wear to NYC and it was perfect!  I normally wear a S in coats, but ordered this in an XS after reading reviews - it fit fine over silk blouses and thin sweaters, but I would have needed a Small to fit heavier sweaters underneath. The collar adds a nice touch to this coat.

I rented this dress to wear on my babymoon.  Wore it out to dinner one night with my husband.  He loved the bright colors, really makes it stand out from a lot of the other dress options.  The fit of the dress is pretty loose, especially in the tummy area which is why I chose it.  I was 20 weeks pregnant at the time but I think it would work if I was further along as well.  I would rent this again.
The fit was tight in the top and showed too much cleavage for my taste. The fit was loose in the waist.

Unfortunately I did not get a photo, but this dress is AMAZING. It was true to size and I was able to wear a sticky bra underneath. The quality and cut was perfect, I wanted to buy it! I am on the shorter side, but I didn't think it hit at an unflattering length, the slit helped with that as well.

The color is beautiful.  The 0R fit fine, but a 2R probably would have been better.  At 5'2, the pants did not really look cropped but it was still cute.  I found that it was a little unflattering in the stomach area and was pretty see-through in the back.

Ended up loving this dress so much that I rented it twice. Once was for a night out in Vegas, and then because that had been a girl's trip, rented it again to wear for a fancy anniversary dinner with my husband. It was very flattering and comfortable.
I wore this during our trip to Mexico. It stayed in place all night, which says a lot about a strapless dress. Loved this rental!
Way too long for me--I'm 5'6", 140lbs, , and hourglass shape-- pants look great overall and the fit was perfect, but they were several inches too long--maybe I'll try them again in a medium.....
review_summary: They were for Thanksgiving, but I couldn't wear them due to length

review_text: I rented this dress for vacation and absolutely loved it. Sadly I didn't take a picture in it, but plan to rent again. The fabric is thick and the fit is true to size. I found the dress to be super flattering and comfortable to wear. I'm 5'4" and the SR fit perfect with about 4 inch wedges. I highly recommend!
review_summary: Absolutely loved and will rent again!

review_text: I got this at the RTR Store in Vegas-- it was light and comfy, and I LOVED the open back! I'm 5"6 and it did feel a little short, and if youre chesty you might need a little backless bra, but other than that I loved it!
Not made for short women. The length is awkward and the bottom of the dress is bulky.

I thought it would be more formal. but the fabric is very thin and cheap, and the dress itself is very transparent (nude underwear is required). I ended up using this as a beach dress during a vacation. Great for that purpose.
Wore this with heels one night and with sneakers during the day. Easy to throw on and perfect for a weekend vacay.
review_summary: Comfortable. Dress up or dress down.

review_text: The dress was perfect! I rented it for a night out in Vegas during February when it was still a little chilly and the sleeves and thick material were great. It fit amazingly. I really wish I could've kept this one!

I wore this dress while vacationing in FL.  I typically wear a size 6 in store brands because I am bigger busted and the M worked fine.  It was snug in the torso and my bust, but that is how I like it.  The dress did come with the belt.  It was packaged separately from the dress; maybe people are not seeing the additional package. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Beautiful dress.  I received lots of compliments, especially from my husband!

review_text: My fav part about this dress was that it was effortless yet classy!
This dress was extremely comfortable and flattering.  The belt really gives it a shape.  I would absolutely rent this again.

I wore this out for dinner and just hanging out in Miami for a weekend with the girls. I'm pear-shaped and ordered the size up from what I would get in a top or a-line dress, but down from what I'd order in a pair of bottoms. It worked out great. Looser up top, but the sleeves stayed put and the shorts fit well. This epitomized a great rental item for me - fun to wear on a vacation but not a practical item to have in my closet.

As the other reviews have said, it was indeed pretty tight in the bust, so I couldn't wear a normal bra... had to go with a lightweight nude sports bra to be comfortable.  It does kind of fit like a bag, but in a cute, breezy way.  Wouldn't buy and probably won't rent again, but that's what I love about my Unlimited!
review_summary: Cute dress & pretty color - great for Hawaiian vacation!

review_text: It's long, would be great to use with wedges or high shoes.
review_summary: Perfect for trip to vineyards and wine tasting.

review_text: If you're stuck between sizes (especially 14 and 16), size down, as the dress is boxier the bigger it gets.  Definitely for the bustier gal as long as you are not modest!  I'm a DDD and it draped perfectly.
review_summary: Wore it on a cruise and was still getting compliments on it even the next day!

review_text: Loved the fit of this jumpsuit. Impossible to wear a bra but I was comfortable without given the fit of the top. As others have mentioned it's a bit long. I wore 2 inch heels for my 5'7" self and it was perfect.
Would be flattering on a tall slimmer person.
review_summary: This was so cute on the hangar but made me look enormous.

review_text: Perfect athleisure look. Wore with leather leggings and tennis shoes while walking around barcelona. The neck line made for great pictures. The weight of the jacket was perfect for the mild/chilly weather.

This was perfect for exploring San Diego, grabbing lunch, and shopping.  It was light weight, comfortable, and the pattern and ruffles were adorable!  I got a terrible sunburn the day before wearing this and it was the only thing I wanted to wear after that because it was so light and breezy.  I really don't have any cons for this one... absolutely loved it!

Love this versatile top - I got it for a big city trip and got so many compliments from friends and strangers alike!  I ended up wearing it to work as well and it was the perfect blend of classy but fun, definitely brought an edge to the office environment.  The material was so soft too, so this shirt is the ideal combination of cozy and stylish.
The body is way to big and boxy. Is not a flattering cut, Unfortunately, I was unable to wear this.
Great colors, material and fit!  I received tons of compliments.  I would say the dress ran a bit large so I recommend sizing down if you are in between sizes.
review_summary: I wore this dress for tea on vacation in London and it was perfect!

review_text: Fit true to size, but a bit snug at the waist (probably not great for people that are thicker through the midsection - size up if so). Otherwise, light linen pants that held up well (didn't wrinkle too much), were pretty flattering, and were super fun.

Fitted but not too tight.  Comfortable to wear.  A little loose under the armpit/boob area and did some weird bunching on one side around the hip area but was manageable (these 2 factors are the only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars).  My date loved the dress!  Very sexy but still classy.
review_summary: Wore for date night in Vegas

review_text: It ran a little big through the chest and sides. Also, the dress kept creasing between my legs when walking which was super annoying.
review_summary: I wore this on a beach vacation. It drew a lot of attention :)

review_text: I wish it was more fitted so I added a belt. Love the nautical theme, soft cotton on top and the lace element on the bottom. Love the length, too. anything longer would be too frumpy but this is perfect.
review_summary: Amazing "Summer in New England" type of dress!

review_text: The dress runs small across the chest area. I had to size up to not feel compressed in the top of the dress.  The material is heavier I would not wear on a hot day.
review_summary: The dress was perfect to wear for a wine tasting event outside in mid April

review_text: Very comfortable, stretchy.
review_summary: It was very comfortable! Tons of compliments! I love this dress!

review_text: Fit well, fun to dance in
This romper is very flattering.  I am 5'3 and it was a great length.  I received many compliments when I wore this.

This was a great dress to pack in a suitcase - it had such an easy fit and perfect for every day. I wore this to London and paired with sneakers and a jean jacket but this can also be worn with heels and statement jewelry for a more formal occasion. This has no stretch in the fabric so I recommend sizing up.

I wore this to a daytime bridal shower in March and it was perfect for the occasion. I'm pretty tall so the long size was perfect. The neckline is pretty low so I used fashion tape which worked well. It was very comfortable and the color was great, I received lots of compliments!
Not great for hourglass figure. Runs small on the hips and chest but very baggy in the waist. Beautiful material that doesn't wrinkle. Would be perfect on an athletic figure.

The size 0 was a little tight for my bust and a little shorter than I wanted so I wore the size 2 and it was a perfect fit.  Definitely a classy dress that looked like it came straight from the runway!
Very comfortable!  Love it!

I wore this on formal night of a cruise and received so many compliments.  I don't have a stomach worthy to show off but the little cutouts on the sides added a nice touch of sexiness without concealing any extra muffins around my midsection.  I usually rent a size 8 but they only had 6 which worked out great because even the 6 was a little loose. I would highly recommend sizing down.
review_summary: Gorgeous unique dress, I would definitely recommend!

review_text: Glad I got the size down as a backup since it fit just a little snugger.  Since I'm 5'1, I knew that it would hit lower than I would have preferred but it was still lovely.  Got tons of compliments.  My arms are a little chubby so I did have some rubbing issues with the sequins but  nothing too uncomfortable.  I wore a bra that 'sticks' to you.  A strapless bra wouldn't work since the back strap would show.
review_summary: I wore this for the formal night on a cruise vacation. The color was beautiful!  Felt great in it!

review_text:
I'm typically not an XS, but this fit around my ribs okay.
Because I was wearing a size too small, I got some boob wings on the fabric and had to use fashion tape to keep them in check. I think I would have fit better into a size small, but it worked without climbing like rompers tend to do.
I'm short too, but this romper didn't make me feel disproportionate at all.
review_summary: I wore this out for a ladies' night dinner. Easily dress up with heels or dress down with flats.

review_text: I wore this jumpsuit to a friend's birthday dinner in New Orleans. I wanted to mix it up because I don't normally wear things like this. I received tons of compliments on it. It was very comfortable. The only downside is the difficulty when you have to use the restroom! I usually wear a 2 or 4 and I went with the 2 after reading the reviews. It was a perfect fit.

Rented this as part of unlimited for a 7-day cruise.  I felt super confident and received lots of compliments on this dress.  Very comfortable, easy to wear a strapless bra.  I am 5'5" and wouldn't have minded a little more length, but I wasn't self-conscious.

I loved the idea of this dress, but it didn't work out the way I'd planned. It was much too long for my 5'4" frame and the sleeves were too tight and itchy on my sunburn. What's worse is there was this ginormous slit up the middle of the dress that might have worked, but I was on the beach and the breeze caught me at the wrong time. Not to mention that the breeze made all my photos while I was wearing the dress look like I was wearing a tent (breeze + billowy dress = circus tent). It's a nice dress, but it was not the right choice for me.
review_summary: Worn for vacation, but quickly changed due to the beach breeze

review_text: Great length, not too heavy, but the one I received has been dry-cleaned or laundered one too many times so the material seemed a bit "beat up".
review_summary: The red/orange lining is a fun detail

review_text: Loved the neckline and the short length of the shorts.
review_summary: Perfect for a fun little outfit when you don't want to show too much skin!

review_text: True to side, at times a bit more cleavage bearing than I would have liked but flattering fit and very comfortable! I wore this for a brunch event on a cruise, this was the perfect dress.

Wore this for a weekend in Vegas with the husband's coworkers. Great choice for a weekend where I needed to look hot, but respectable. The fabulous guy in the group said I looked fierce and that is certainly how I felt!
Great dress!  Very Flattering

I rented this dress but ended up sharing it with my BFF (who had rented another HL dress from RTR, we swapped the second night!) and we both looked awesome in it. See my body type/measurements above, I'm not exactly "bombshell" material, but this dress did help me look more sexy and less straight up and down. My BFF really looked amazing in this dress; she's 5'2", size 0, 34C, and has a booty. This dress made her itty bitty waist look like nothing, and she truly looked bombshell in it! Men and women would not stop complimenting her! It wasn't too long on her either, but it wasn't too short on me. Would absolutely recommend this dress

I have a large chest 36DDD. The dress was a tad too tight in that area otherwise, I would have said it is true to size. I'm 5'5'' and short waisted, the dress did not flatter my waist line. I would have given it one more store if it had a silk or cotton lining. I can't stand polyester linings ;)
review_summary: This dress would flatter a medium chested, longer torso woman.

review_text:
I wore this for a Bachelorette trip to Vegas. This dress was SO cute. I would rent this dress again and again!! It's so pretty, that I only wore earrings/bracelets for accessories. Didn't need a necklace at all because of the silver shimmer.

PROs: 
- The pattern looks good in person with just the right amount of shimmer and is very flattering (I'm curvy, so this doesn't make you look bigger than you are like some prints).
- The fit is great. The length is just right at mid-thigh (I'm in my late 20s, so I don't like micro-minis).
- Dress has decent lining. I didn't need to wear a bra and it's thick enough that the dress lays really nicely top to bottom.

CON:
- Don't really have much. Only con was that the cap sleeves would sometimes slip a little on my shoulders (but never fell off my shoulders). That could easily be fixed with double stick fashion tape, which I didn't have with me during this trip.
review_summary: So comfortable, flattering length and fit

review_text: I'm 5'1 and it hit below my knees. It's a pretty dress but I had to send it back.
review_summary: Unfortunately, this dress was way too long for me to wear it on my birthday.

review_text: Short when raising arms, not a lot of give in arms.  Short when sitting.
review_summary: The color is fantastic!  Cool mauve color under layer through eyelet.  Many compliments!

review_text: This is two pieces.  A slip and then the blouse is separate.  I loved the material, the flirtiness, and cuteness of this dress.  Easy, breezy, and light dress.  I only gave it 4 stars because the cinched waist is too high for my liking.  At 5'4" it made my trunk look very short, which would probably be great if I had long legs to show off.
This was a nice fit for me. I wore this dress for a night out in the club. While this dress is very nice, it is very hard to dance in it. Best for a dinner party.

I wore this romper on a weekend trip and loved it.  It transitioned well from daytime to casual evening.  The item was brand new and really high quality.  I didn't have a problem with the fit, but I have a short torso and am petite, so the proportions and the length actually were just right.

I rented this to take on vacation.  Its simple but the shoulders give it something fun.  I loved that you can wear a regular bra with it.  I would say it fits a little on the big side so I went with an XS instead of a S and it fit great.  It could be a little short if you have a long torso, but I thought it fit great.

I rented this dress for our vacation to Vegas. I wanted something fun and sexy, but not too revealing. I figured every other girl would be in a LBD so k wanted to try something different!  Dress ran relatively true to size in busy and length, but the middle bunched terribly. I am usually a 4 and wore the 4, but the center was stretched out and did not fit at all.  I recommend getting your back-up size a size smaller, maybe that will fit a bit better in the torso area!

Overall, great experience!  I've used RTR quite a few times and have never had a problem!
review_summary: Came on time and was super easy to ship back!

review_text: It's very short, so wear flats if you're taller than 5'5.    Also wrinkles easily so u may want to press again before wearing.  Loved everything about this.  More for the slender framed I'd say...
review_summary: It's ultra chic, material and color - on point

review_text: This dress is sexy but still conservative.  Wore with black heels out to dinner on vacation.  Will definitely rent again!
The dress fits great and almost acts as its own spanx, but the shoulders dont stay down very well.

There is a lot of material and I wore it more like a cowl neck sweater. I did love it, and wore it almost every day during the week that I had it. Looked great with skinny black pants for a nice dinner out, wore to work with a plaid skirt, looked great with jeans, and wore with yoga pants on a long flight.
I didn't get to wear because it was too small.  I am busty and there was no zipping this up.
review_summary: 2 night stay at the Venetian in Vegas

review_text: Comfortable and cute.
review_summary: Fit well and was even cuter in person!

review_text: I got tons of compliments. I added gold jewelry but honestly the details on this dress are so beautiful that you dont need anything but the dress.
review_summary: It is such a beautiful dress!

review_text: Wore this dress on a sunset cruise in Tahoe and it was perfect! Good thick material, nice A-line fit and a decent length. I was also able to wear a swimsuit underneath which was a plus! Definitely going to be renting this beauty next summer.
review_summary: Adorable ruffles make for perfect getaway dress!

review_text: This dress was perfect to throw on on vacation, very comfortable. The fabric is not like other clover canyon dresses - it is much thinner and therefore less tight.
the fit was more of like a boyfriend style. very loose and flowy
review_summary: obsessed with this coat I was able to use it day and night. the wool and length made it perfect

review_text: The cuts and patterns are extremely flattering. I needed to wear a nude bra and underwear because it is a little see-through.
review_summary: Flattering cut, fun slits for a day out

review_text: Loved this dress, it is light and very cute!  Great day dress.
review_summary: Wore it for a stay-cation, it was comfy, and cute!

review_text: This dress is a little short (at least for me), but it fit like a glove, I wore it with a pair of 5" heels and I got a lot of looks and compliments.  Very sexy, loved the dress and would rent again
Liked the sleeves and color.  A great basic top for a casual night out with your girlfriends.

LOVED this dress! If you are thinking about renting it, do it! I am very small but fit into the smallest size perfectly. The colors are amazing & gold jewelry/makeup looked incredible with it. I wore this on my honeymoon in Palm Springs, CA & I couldn't have asked for a better day dress. I wore it way more than I thought I would, and paired it with a leather jacket to switch up the look at night.
review_summary: delivered straight to my hotel on my honeymoon!

review_text: This was a great dress to wear out in Vegas! I chose to wear it with the "v" in front, but I could see it being cute with reversed with a statement necklace. I wore the medium and it was a little big in the waist but fit great in the hips. It did ride up a bit as I walked but it wasn't a big deal.  I would seriously consider buying this dress as I could see it working for a ton of occasions, even to a work event with a blazer!
review_summary: A luxe, unique and comfy dress perfect for girls night out!

review_text: This wasn't my favorite rental, but I did get a lot of compliments on it. The waist kind of hit me oddly--not at my true waist, and not an empire, but it was cute. True to size.

Cute dress, great pattern! Perfect for Vacation because you won't have to pack many other accessories since this dress has a lot going on at the collar and straps. The top was a little snug around the shoulders and bust, but overall this was a great casual dress for vacation or a date night.
The cut is perfect for transitions from day to night.
review_summary: The sparkle of this dress was perfect for Vegas!

review_text: The cut is great. I sized up one to ensure the length would be enough since I'm tall and it fit perfectly. Well-made and a fun cut. I love it so much I may purchase it!

I liked this dress and appreciated that it came in petite. I am 5'3 and was able to wear this with flat sandals. I am usually on the fence between a small and medium (4/6 dress size), but the small fit well. Fun dress for vacation.

This dress was amazing! It made my boobs look wonderful but it flattened up my backside which It didn't bother me much. I wear a size 10 and got a M I think I could have even done a S because I still had a little space but overall the dress was PERFECT!
review_summary: Herve in the Middle East wht more can a girl ask for!

review_text: I felt like Beyonce! Very flattering and comfortable. True to size. Expensive looking and great quality!
Rented this for a formal cruise dinner. Ran true to size. No stretch and very narrow bust . I'm an A cup and it fit perfectly. Larger busts wouldn't work well with this dress.
It fitted well, it was a little tight on my breasts.
review_summary: Wore it on a night out with my boyfriend and got tons of compliments

review_text: Rented this for vacation in Mexico and loved it. It wasn't as short as I thought it might be so I was relieved about that. It's a very light breezy material so very comfortable in the heat. Overall, loved it and recommend it for summer!

This dress fit me beautifully, I received both the size 4 and 6 and chose to wear the size 4.  I typically wear a 4 in dresses so this beauty fits very tts.  The dress is more beautiful in person than the photos, and is constructed really well.  It hugs the curves and manages to hide the flaws.  I recieved numerous compliments.  The best part is it's ridiculously comfortable for a formal dress.  Don't hesistate to rent this one!

Pros - pretty color and fun night out outfit.
Cons - not a good fit for long torsos (bad camel-toe).
review_summary: Not a good fit for long torsos.

review_text: Save this for the tall thin women. I am petite and narrow, but even my husband (who loves to say I look good in everything) had nothing nice to say about this. Disappointed as this was one of my first selections in my Unlimited subscription. Going back.

This top was picture perfect for our island vacation.  I loved the cut and print, very tailored and crisp.  With this kind of bold pattern I would only end wearing this once or twice every few years so it was the perfect item to "rent".
Comfortable dress.  Nothing too special.
Beautiful dark green color.  Very soft leather.  Next time, will get a bigger size just to be able to layer.  It's actually pretty heavy and very warm.  Comfortable for air travel.
review_summary: Very cool jacket.  Recieved a lot fo compliments.

review_text: I absolutely loved his dress. If all E&J dresses are like this I'll rent them more often. Sexy, classy, fit like a glove. I wore this out in Vegas and to dinner, casino, etc and also out in NYC. Dual successes. A real head turner to say the least. This dress is possibly magical haha. I liked the length (not too short) and the slight stretch in the material but it's also thick. No bra or spanx needed but still be mindful of good posture or the tummy area can look defined (aka pooch out). I don't even think you need to wear petals or nu bra with this one. I will say that the inner lining was loose (maybe from being worn many times) but only noticeable to me. Apparently E&J runs super small but I found it to run true to size or maybe one size small but definitely not 2 sizes in my case. This dress was also comfy and I didn't want to take it off. Would consider buying it.
review_summary: Obsessed. Rented this dress twice in 1 month

review_text: It fit great!

I was surprised how much a liked the color. It is much brighter though, then it appears in pictures. As with all Elizabeth and James , I recommend going up a size or two. Pair a fun necklace with this bright dress and your ready for a fun summer party.
I wore the small because the XS was not available. It was forgiving in it's fit.  Wore it with pair of Pedro Garcia black heels and really liked it.
review_summary: Cute and easy to wear.  Could have worn it on multiple occasions.

review_text: Very dressy but not flashy. 5'5", 170 lbs
review_summary: Wonderful experience. This is a good service

review_text: Fit great, though a bit roomy on me.  I'm usually between a 2 and 4.  I rented the 4 and 6, could have worn the 2.  It is definitely SHORT (I'm not even 5 feet tall and it was quite short on me).  very sexy.  Loved it so much I rented it again for another event in a few weeks--but this time I went with the 2 and 4.
review_summary: I wore this for a night out in NYC with my husband.

review_text: I rented this dress for my honeymoon in San Diego because I wanted a fun, comfortable and stylish daytime outfit.  It was perfect.  I actually wore it twice - once to the zoo with a baseball hat and flip flops and once for a beach walk as a bathing suit cover up.  I didn't mind the lower cut front and the snapped pulled it together.  I could see wearing a cami underneath if needed.  My husband loves this dress and wants me to buy it.  Thanks RTR!

I took this to Vegas with me; wore it to a sushi dinner and to see a Vegas show. I absolutely LOVED this dress and wish I could own it! The fabric was heavy, but not hot; I felt like it was more supportive than anything else. It came to my knees (5/10") which was perfect for hiding my legs, which I hate. I did have to invest in a backless bra, as the back drops pretty low, but I felt great in it. I also work some Spanx but honestly I could have gone without. Would rent again for any occasion!
Looked nice, straps slightly too long
did not wear dress, had other  better for what i wanted-fabric is very nice , its have some stretch , fits well & very nice neck detailing

This was my first time wearing a romper--EVER. I had a lot of fun in this; it was nice to be able to dance without worrying about flashing anyone. One thing to note about the shorts is that they really do cut off at the widest part of your thighs, which didn't turn out super flattering in some pictures. Very fun outfit though!

I'm 5'9 and I wore the XSL with flip flops, you can see how long it is. I am a 32C and this dress had pretty much zero support but it worked without a bra - as you can see when I slouched, not cute, if there was an XXS it would have worked up top but too tight elsewhere. In fitted dresses I'd be a M or 6 so to be an XS, I'd say it runs a bit big. The pockets are awesome and the dress is so much prettier in person I would definitely rent again.
Way too bulky in the middle .... I think even if I had gotten the small it would have been an awkward fit.
review_summary: I rented for a weekend wine tasting .... not a fan. Didn't end up wearing it.

review_text: 5'5, 140lbs, 34C/28/36- fits great!
review_summary: Nice dress. Can be dressed up or down based on event.

review_text: This dress is well made and very pretty.  The material is very nice and drapes well.  The detail on the front and clasp at back are very nice.  It is hard to see, but there are pleats on the front that are from the overlapping fabric that creates slits that are not very revealing and allow for more leg movement.  Unfortunately it did not fit my body shape.  I am athletic (and a little pear shaped) with small bra size of A.  The material has zero stretch.  The size 6 didn't work for my hips/thighs.  It was a little loose for my top half, but still nice looking.  So in order for the dress to fit properly around the hips, I would have to size up and have an even looser top half.  I think this dress would be great on someone with my shape and with a larger cup size so you could fill out the top.  Or someone who is straight/narrow shaped.

Ended up wearing the last day on vacation to a brunch and then wore it on the plane, very comfortable and would rent again! Very casual... ordered it as a back up for a casual rehearsal dinner but is more of day time dress or for the beach/pool.
The dress was comfortable, stylish and so easy to wear.  This would be a great wardrobe staple.
review_summary: I rented this for multiple dinners in NYC during the winter.  I needed sleeves and this was perfect.

review_text: This fun tropical shift dress is perfect for a daytime brunch or wedding! It runs true to size and we recommend going up one size for your backup. This style works best for A to C cup sizes as it is very fitted in the bust area. It is sleeveless and fitted throughout, with no stretch in the fabric. This style hits between mini and mid-thigh depending on your height, You can also wear a standard bra.
Lovely comfortable dress that looks very nice on. I don't have any pics to share or I would.

I just love this! This is the only item I've ever rented 2x and I can't get enough. It is so comfortable and flattering. I feel sexy but still covered, I've worn on a night out and summer day chasing my twins around. Just versatile and rent it!

I packed this dress with me on a girls' trip to Nashville. I wish I could wear it every day! The detail is even more pretty in person and the colors are so flattering. You will need to either not wear a bra or wear something that does not interfere with the back straps - you definitely want to show that part off! I am usually a size small, but I think I could have gotten an XS in this dress as my chest is smaller and it felt a little bit loose. I would wear this dress to formal events or even less formal events. You can't go wrong with it.
review_summary: Team RTR Review - Beautiful! Must Rent

review_text: Wore this out for dinner on vacation in Costa Rica. Comfortable, striking and really fun to wear with gladiator sandals and a fun necklace. I would rent again!
review_summary: Great vacation dinner outfit! Pair with fun jewelry and sandals and BOOM!

review_text: I normally wear a size 6. I rented the S and XS and ended up wearing the XS. The S landed at my waist better, but the top was way too big so I had to go with the XS. The top is very loose. I loved the open, sexy back, but had to be careful not to flash anyone. You might want to use fabric tape or something to keep the front secure. Loved the soft material. And pockets! Was perfect for my beach vacation.
review_summary: soft, flowy, sexy...top runs very large

review_text: I have rented this twice now! Once for a daytime party on Cape Cod, and another time for a daytime event in Cape Cod. Many compliments, great fit, and awesome quality.
The dress is skin hugging but it accentuates your curves and makes you look slim.   The thickness of the material is perfect, can be worn in cooler climate but also in Caribbean.
I was able to wear with or without a bra. It is extremely comfortable and the material is not warm or see through. Great dress! I loved wearing it!

This was less tricky to wear than I feared it might be. It's a little blousy, and the cutouts are well placed to expose spots that are not too fleshy on most people. It has an elastic waist and is generally stretchy and easy to get into. On me, it looked better with a belt, but because the waistline hit just above the hipbone it was tough to get a belt to sit just right. And the side panel didn't totally cover my bra (I just wore a black one, halter-style, and in a dim nightclub you couldn't tell). I felt relaxed and hip in it. But if you're petite, it might run long on you. I'd definitely order a size down.
I squealed with excitement when I tired on this top and it fit perfect! I'm on the shorter side and the top is still relatively short one me- so taller gals beware!
review_summary: Adorable top - perfect for cute dinner outfit

review_text: Loved this dress. It is super comfy and easy to throw on. The colors and bright and beautiful, and I loved the fun sleeves ... it was perfect for my vacation in Tulum, Mexico. Wore with fun earrings and strappy sandals.  The only thing I would say is the fabric is on the thicker side and a little heavy, and if you're on the taller side it is a bit short. Rent this!
The dress is beautiful, fits well and flows nicely. The material is thick so looks nice.. a couple of inch heels needed for my height. can be work with flats as well. loved it for my birthday.

Super cute and comfortable romper. I wasn't sure about the pleats in the shorts area when I first tried it on, but the fit is really flattering and looks great in photos. Would recommend sizing up if you're apple shaped - the belted part does not stretch and is more snug than the rest of the garment. I added a fun beaded belt over top the existing ribbon and it was perfect for a night out in Vegas - got lots of compliments!

I normally wear size 6 for dresses, but sized up because I am curvy on the bottom. The 8 was still too tight through the hips, but the top was almost too big on me.  Husband said it made me look "Blocky".
review_summary: Very interesting and edgy dress - different than anything else I have ever worn
