review_text: While this romper has a revealing front it is till long enough to not look too revealing. Very comfortable and breathable material.

The other user reviews were super helpful.  As others mentioned, I found that it runs a little large.  I usually wear a size 6 but ordered a size 4 as a backup - so glad I did as it was the one I ended up wearing.  The detailing is fab but was hard for me to catch in my photos (zoomed in on one of the pics to try and capture).  Very comfortable, too!
review_summary: Wore this dress for a girls' night out in Vegas - it did not disappoint!  Felt fabulous all night!

review_text: This dress is beautiful in person. The color and pattern of the stripes make it really unique. It fits close to the body- like a fitted ribbed sweater for your entire body. The fabric has enough weight to it that you don't feel super exposed but it also quite warm as a result. I had planned to wear it to dinner in Vegas but was already quite warm just trying it on. It would be really cozy when the weather finally starts to change. I would say it fit true to size for the style. I wore an XS and didn't feel at all constricted. For petites, the length went to my ankles. The sleeves were also a little long but I was easily able to cuff them.

I wish there was a larger selection of stylish pants.  Might want to size up on these.  The material is thinner than the picture appears and the pants are a bit see through with a shorts under lining.  I wanted these for vacation but when they arrived wrinkled I figured that they would not travel well.

I wore this on a flight from Atlanta to California, where I then wore it with white jeans around Sonoma. It was light and comfortable, but nice enough that I felt dressed up enough for wine tastings. The front tie is very trendy right now, and the detailed sleeves made it a unique top. Loved it!
review_summary: Great top – I received so many compliments!

review_text: The fit was for a much shorter woman then me proportionally. I felt as though the waist almost was empired on my long torso. I choose to wear a different dress I ordered that fit better. Overall the cut of the slv and the way the bodice draped just wasn't flattering for my long large frame. Perhaps a different size would have helped but overall the dress was big in places I needed it to be small and short in places I needed it to be longer.
review_summary: Looked great just not on me

review_text: The romper fit well.  I would size up if you are unsure because it is a one piece.  Pockets were great and I found it easy to take on and off as rompers can sometimes be tough to use the bathroom.
review_summary: Perfect for a girls night out.

review_text: I love this dress so much! It's comfy and elegant.
This jumpsuit was the best. I dressed it up with wedges for dinner....then paired with converse and a sweater for sightseeing in Oregon. A great piece that is cool and comfy.

On a bachelorette party in Las Vegas, we stopped by the RtR store for going-out dresses and to try on dresses for the black-tie wedding. First of all, it was a total blast. I found this gorgeous dress to wear to dinner and to a club. I felt absolutely gorgeous, and the dress was actually comfortable! They didn't have a size 14 in the store, so I sized up, knowing that Vegas means lots of drinking and eating. Wish I would have sized down instead. Like everyone else says, the sequins scratched my underarms, but not until the end of the night and plenty of dancing (which was very easy to do in this swingy dress). Loved being able to wear a real bra.

I felt so great about myself in this dress, and I'd highly recommend it!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in Vegas

review_text: This is definitely a fun and standout dress that is also extremely comfortable. This dress runs true to size and is great for any cup size as there is plenty of room throughout. I am a 34DD and has plenty of room. The fabric has no stretch but we would recommend going down a size for your backup as this is not fitted and can be overwhelming for someone with a smaller frame. We would recommend a NuBra or wearing no bra as this neckline does have a tie with an open slit in the back. The necktie has an amazing fringe tail that adds a little something extra to this piece. This dress was 2 inches above the knee and can be paired with a strappy heel or a cute wedge!
Beautiful print and nice fabric.
review_summary: I took this dress on vacation to Mexico

review_text:
Pros: looks great, super sexy, nice color, good thick material. Felt really beautiful!
Cons: Absolutely no stretch! I normally wear a 4 but barely squeezed into the 8! Definitely size up!
review_summary: This dress is super hot, but runs VERY small. I typically wear a 4 and the 8 JUST fit.

review_text: I rented this romper from the RTR Vegas store for a night out on the strip with my hubby. I felt like a million bucks wearing it. For the large chested women: remember your fashion tape!!!

This dress was so fun to wear.  Its almost a denim like material so could definietly be dressed down with flats.  I love the unique criss cross neckline.  I did wear a strapless bra because the top was a bit large, however there wasn't any give in the waist so the next size down would have been too tight.  Overall I loved wearing it and got lots of compliments!

Okay, let me start by saying that this dress is SO cute, and that it would get 5 stars if that's all my review was based upon. Unfortunately, its cuteness didn't outweigh how difficult it was to wear. This is a wrap dress, so the only thing holding it together is the verrrrry thin string that ties around your waist. I am not kidding when I say my bathrobe covers far more. There are two snaps (one at the bust and one mid-thigh) that literally wouldn't stay together for more than three seconds, and that's not even an exaggeration. This was by far the most "difficult" article of clothing I have ever worn. I was messing with it all day, trying not to reveal my entire body to the people around me. I am giving it two stars because it really is an adorable dress, but you MUST have 7,642 safety pins in order to wear it appropriately. I wish I could rate it higher!
review_summary: Cute, but very difficult to wear!

review_text: Fit perfect.  Is a little short so if you are tall it would be super short.   Cute and comfortable.
Very comfortable, what you see is what you get kind of dress!

I love the fun pattern and the blue is very pretty. The dress was not available in 2 petite which probably would have worked a little better. I am a size 5.4 1/2 and it was very long. The dress also fits very, very snugly in the waist. I am usually a size two and sometimes a zero depending on the dress. Unless you have a very slim waist I would go for a size up. Dress is beautiful and I fully enjoyed wearing it! I did wear a black camisole underneath.
review_summary: This dress is beautiful and was perfect for a dinner out on a weekend away.

review_text: What a gorgeous dress from DVF. The silk fabric and bird print are very nice and the bias cut, flowy style feels fresh. There are interesting details to the dress such as trailing/draped ruffles of fabric on the sides and an uneven/handkerchief hemline. I rented on unlimited this for a vacation to Mexico and found it to be a great choice day or night.  I wore a strapless bra because the one shoulder is a spaghetti strap. This dress is very forgiving if you want to eat and I could see it being flattering on many body types. Definitely wanted to buy this one and will surely  rent again when the NY weather warms up.

I wore this dress to Australia. It didn't travel super well but a quick iron later and it was much less wrinkled. I paired it with lily gold wedges. My husband loved it. Definitely recommend for C+ cup because the v neck is very flattering.
review_summary: Perfect for a wine country vacay!

review_text: The dress is missing that stitching right under the boobs so it flattens that area out. As my chest is my most redeeming quality, I chose not to wear it.
review_summary: Didn't wear it, as it wasn't very flattering on my body.

review_text: Wore this during the day, but also dressy enough for night. Got lots of compliments, like wearing a piece of abstract art on a dress. Fits like a shift dress so nice and flowy. Def recommend as a rental!!
review_summary: Perfect for 4th of July party in New Orleans

review_text: This dress was certainly something outside of my "norm".  The dress is designed to be snug. I ordered a M and a L as back up. The M looked better.  I'm a curvier girl with emphasis on the bottom and it looked great!  I got several compliments and it was actually quite comfortable.
review_summary: Dress is awesome - tons of compliments!

review_text: I wore the 6 as the 4 was too tight in the chest. The 6 had a bit of room in the hips but was really comfortable and because the material is heavy, still looked nice and structured. Also it was nice to have a bit of room around the cutouts. Wore for a night out in Vegas and felt sexy without showing too much. Loved this dress - wish I had a better picture to show how great it looked!

This dress was perfect for dinner on vacation. It fit in all the right places. I have a small bust and a very athletic build and it fit perfectly. The colors of the dress are perfect! I received compliments all night. I wish I owned this dress.
review_summary: Loved the colors of this dress!

review_text: This dress was perfect for my bachelorette party! It is classy and fun at the same time! Definitely an attention getter! The dress runs a little large and the sequence rub a bit under the arms, but other than that I have no complaints. Definitely would recommend this fun, gorgeous dress!

I love everything about this dress. I've rented it multiple times and am always sad when I have to send it back. It's light, flowy, well made and has unique details that make it a standout. The beading around the neck takes it to another level. The see-through panels on the bottom give it a hint a skin to make it not your normal maxi. It's also versatile. You could dress it up or wear it for every day. I'll definitely be renting (and maybe buying) this fabulous dress!
review_summary: One of my flowy, fabulous faves

review_text: Very comfortable, runs true to size, perfect for curvy girls... The navy color looks very rich and chic :) x
True to size though a little bit longer than what i would have wanted. Fabric is nice and the beading was a nice touch.

The neckline (which is sadly hidden in my pic) is just what this simple LBD needs to make it fun and flirty.  I wore this for a night out in Vegas and was SO comfy, yet still felt uber cute!  Highly recommend.
Loved the sheerness on the neckline. I liked the little bit of puff to the skirt.
I should have ordered the size 2 because the shoulder kept falling down. Skirt rides up as well.  Double sided work would work as well.
Fits true to size, but I will warn you that it is baggy on the top. I think it would fit a bigger busted woman better.
Beautiful dress, wore it for a gender reveal on the beach early in my pregnancy.  People asked if I was getting married the dress was that pretty and light.

I have previously rented a similar, sleeved Badgley Mischka dress (Navy, sequined) and I like that other dress better.  I wore this dress to dinner and a show in Las Vegas and received several compliments. The sleeveless/shoulders are a bit weird on this, I wish the straps were smaller or rouched in. But all in, it was comfortable and worked for the event. Sadly I don't have any great photos of that night!
review_summary: Cute dress, a touch short for me but very pretty!

review_text: Definitely go with all of the other reviews and get a smaller size than normal. I rented an XSL and SL and wore the XSL, it fit great! The fabric was great and flowing in the hotel summer air. Definitely recommend for anyone!
review_summary: Very cute and comfortable for a hot day!

review_text: I wore this for a night out in Vegas for my friend's bachelorette party. The dress was surprisingly comfortable for a sequin covered piece.  It has an ombre affect to it, which is hard to see in some photos.  It's dark blue and slowly changes to black.  The stock photo shows it, but it's less subtle in person.  It was a nice v-cut but not too low that you worried about falling out or scrambled to find the right bra.  The back is high.  I felt like it was longer than I would have liked, but it wasn't a problem.  It was pretty good at hiding flaws because it wasn't skin tight.  I had a baby 4 months ago and I didn't need to wear spanx with it.

I'm usually a pretty regular size 4. This dress was beautiful but difficult to wear - too low / loose at the top. I'm ok with very low cut fitted tops but the fact that this was also loose was a little difficult.

I am 5'5" and usually wear a 2. The small was just right. The extra strap on the inside made the dress stay in place. You could probably wear without a bra, but I did wear one. It's a gorgeous dress. The one thing you must be aware of is keeping the line down the back straight but definitely worth it!
review_summary: The dress looked and felt fabulous.

review_text: I would pair it with a belt to cinch in the waist.
Loved this dress. The colors are bright and beautiful (definitely a statement piece) and this is one of the very few dresses I've ever worn where a bra is not necessary. Perfect for summer.

I was 34 weeks pregnant when I wore this dress during my babymoon.  It is comfortable and can be worn with sandals (which is mostly what I fit in at this point).  I didn't wear a bra with it because that was my preference (and I could get away with it due to the material and  if color of the dress), but you can wear a strapless bra, if necessary.  One thing to keep in mind is that it is short.  I'm 5'7" and it was just long enough for my taste.  If you have a larger bump or are taller, you run the risk of it being too short.
review_summary: Maternity Review!  This was a great dress for a date night/vacation--super comfy and flowy

review_text: I wore this during the day during vacation. It was very lightweight and material was very comfortable.
Very fun, just as pictured. You must wear it on your arms and not on your shoulders- won't work that way. It was a little tight on my arms but not a big deal as I wore as a cover up
Big across chest and abdomen.
review_summary: I didn't end of wearing this dress out. I thought it wS kind of baggy.

review_text: I was skeptical about how this would compliment my frame, but I absolutely LOVED it! Wore it for vacation and received many compliments! Very complimentary to petite, slim frame. I tucked the ruffle sleeves under my arms and just used the spaghetti straps, wore with a strapless bra.  The material is excellent for hot weather - it doesn't wrinkle easily while wearing or while packed in luggage for travel.  I highly recommend! I complimented it with necklace and flat sandals. I would rent again.

Although the fabric of this dress made it ideal for vacation (wasn't fussy - felt like it was durable for walking during the day)  it wasn't a great fit  - I put a belt with it but for a person with a small bust and straighter build it didn't really provide the illusion of bust or curves.    It was a very comfortable dress however - and you can easily wear it with a jean jacket for a cooler evening or day.

This was a great maxi dress to take me from daytime beach to bridal shower. Flowy and fun. The open back is a great detail - not too sexy, perfect for when it's super hot out. I wasn't worried about not wearing a bra and just tightened up the straps in the back to hold the girls in.
review_summary: I LOVE THIS DRESS - fun for the weekend

review_text: Wore during a Christmas weekend. It was very warm and soft. I was able to wear bulky things under it and leave unbuttoned for a more fashionable look with a scarf. High quality and beautiful blue that is eye catching.
review_summary: Very soft and warm. Beautiful Blue.

review_text: This is a great party dress. Great color. Thick material, so it can be a little hot. The only issue was how short it was--my butt was fully on the chair when I sat, and I couldn't bend over at all.
Fits well.  Be prepared because it is short!
review_summary: Great girls night in Vegas dress!  Love it and fits so well!

review_text:
This dress has a gorgeous pattern: if I could make it into a wallpaper I would. However I think it would be much more gorgeous in a different fabric. This is a thick, "wetsuit" like fabric and unlike the model picture, will come down to your knees. Not that I don't like being demure, but the collar is high as well and there isn't anything aside from the pattern to keep it cute. No embellishment or anything. Heavy fabric drags it down.

This would be stunning in a light chiffon high low dress-but for this one it hung weird and heavy on me in too big a size with a high collar and low hem. Pretty print but not my favorite.

Really liked this dress! Rented it for vacation and found it to be very comfortable. I'm short so it's hard to find long dresses/skirts that I can still wear. This one was great, it hit above my ankles and it's not too much fabric so it still feels manageable and flattering. I'd rent it again!

I wore this dress on vacation and I got a lot of compliments. I am 5'4" and it was just about the right length to wear with flat sandals. I wasn't tripping over it, but if it was an inch shorter, it would've been perfect.

The top fit perfectly - it was not too tight, but just tight enough where no bra was necessary. Very flattering look with the skirt. Overall a great look for pear shaped women who are smaller on top and hippy on the bottom.

I wore this out in Vegas for a weekend with the girls and was so happy with how it turned out! The piece is very flattering (read: no need for Spanx), it covers your legs but is definitely still sexy with the tapered leg, neckline, and cut-outs.  I got so many compliments from strangers saying they loved it - which is always the best! I wore this with booties and a statement necklace (the AV Max Gold Tetra Necklace from RTR) and it was so perfect for a night out.
The only negatives I have are the zipper and the fit in the rib-cage.  It was a bit tight in the rib-cage and felt a bit off when I was sitting down, but definitely got more comfortable as the night went on. Same with the zipper, the jumpsuit fit but the zipper was hard to get up and down the first time I put it on, and needed some help from my girlfriends in the ladies room. 
Overall, amazing rental!
review_summary: AMAZING jumpsuit that is a great, unexpected twist on the usual party dress!

review_text: I wore this dress on a vacation in Napa, CA. It was a little overcast, so the thicker material was perfect. I loved the fact that you had a lot of control over the fit. The dress has ties around the waist so you can synch it up to show off your waist, or wear it loose and comfy. You also have control over how deep the "V" goes in the front, it is controlled by a series of hook and eyes.
It's designed to be loose and flowy, but it definitely runs a little large. I would suggest sizing down.
review_summary: Comfortable dress for vacation! It's lightweight and worked great for dinner on the beach.

review_text: I wore this out while on vacation and the size was slightly larger than anticipated - even knowing that Free People tends to run large. Another reviewer mentioned that she tied the back string around the waist and doing that really helped. It was really flirty with the ruffles in the back, but the sophisticated neckline balanced everything out. Suggest during the day with flats or with heels for a casual night out.

I loved this dress.  It is not something I would have normally rented, but since some girlfriends and I were going to Palm Springs for a bachelorette party, I went out on a limb.  We were supposed to have a crazy night out, but had some technical difficulties - including lost luggage - and just never did. I ordered the 4 and the 6 was my backup.  Both fit perfectly but still different.  The 4 was more form fitting, so the cutout looked better in my opinion, but I could have worn either and still looked just as fab.  I am sure I will rent it again... I just hope to actually wear it next time.
review_summary: Perfect fit even though I didn't end up wearing it.

review_text:
Fit: Rented an XS and was extremely happy with the fit; this dress made me feel glamorous!
Pros: The style & color. It hugged me in all the right places! Loved the scoop dip on the back but was a bit tight at the front neck area
Cons: Friends complained that the sequins scratched them if I sat/danced next to them
Overall: Great flashy dress especially for a Vegas club hopping Saturday night out! :]
review_summary: Looooove this dress! Got a TON of compliments on how great this dress looks (and I in it ;)

review_text: Runs small in the chest area, if you are full busted, also I was 10 weeks pregnant in this photo, be a little swollen might have had something to do with that.
review_summary: Loved it. I got so many compliments one this dress. It's sassy but with class.

review_text: The back opening made it more interesting/received compliments. I did have to pin the back opening sides to make it a little less revealing (i.e. hide my love handles), but that worked out fine. The color was great and it hit just above my knee. I usually wear a medium and carry my weight in my stomach - body of the dress was true to size and comfortable, not baggy, not too tight.
review_summary: This dress was fun/easy to wear for a day out while on vacation.

review_text: This maxi is made of extremely soft fabric and I love the adjustable straps. I am 5'2" and have to wear this with really high wedges.

This dress isn't made of Clover Canyon's usual material - this is more of a jersey material. But the dress fits well and the pattern is fun. The cutout is just enough. It's definitely long. I am only 5'2" , but with the regular length I needed 5" heels for the dress not to drag.

I wore this dress to dinner for my 1 year anniversary in Napa.  Like others have said, the dress runs SHORT but it worked for me since I'm only 5'4".  I got it as my backup dress but decided it had more personality than the one I originally rented.  The comments scared me so I ordered the 14 instead of my normal size 12.  I wish I had rented the 12...  The 14 fit but I think the 12 would have been just a little more fitted through the waist.  The pattern definitely says LOOK AT ME! but it's really, really fun.  I would actually rent this dress again, just in the smaller size.  Also, the Rebecca Minkoff "Keep Your Cool Clutch" matches PERFECTLY.  The yellow really pops but the size keeps it subtle.  Loved it all!
Runs large but still comfortable. a little low cut if you don't tie it in front.   Would have been a fun dress to wear during my pregnancy.
review_summary: cool dress to wear on the beach

review_text: I rented this dress for a weekend of relaxing and shopping. It was the perfect sun dress on a hot day, and super comfortable to wear. It ran a bit long (and I am tall), but if you wore heels it would be fine (I wore it with flats).

Really cute pattern- but the fit was just not for me. I ended up not wearing it.  I think for somoene more apple shaped or straight up and down this dress could possibly be good, but on my hourglass figure it was baggy around the waist while being tight acorss the chest, shouldres and hips. I tried belting the elsatic waist to make it more flattering, but there was so much extra fabric right below the elastic waist that the bunch under the belt looked unflattering. Not for me, but very cute fabric that was thick and looked expensive. Coudl be good for someone with the right body type.
It runs a little small, but the fitted look is chic.

This top is so cute. The sleeves are really stylish without being over the top. I rented a 4 (normally a 2 in suno dresses) as it was the only one available but I actually really liked the fit. It is long as other reviews mentioned. I wore it once with jeans and then once with shorts and just tucked it in a little  so you could see the shorts!  Loved it! One note - this came spotless but did have a strong smell of cleaning products (maybe starch?) which I'm guessing is standard to keep this crisp & white, I got used to it but if you are very sensitive to smells this may bother you.
review_summary: Suno is fast becoming my favorite brand!

review_text: Received lots of compliments on it. Overall, the size is great, but my chest is too large for this romper. The top button is too tight and it stretched open. I wound up wearing it to the beach as a coverup and kept the top button open, which worked just as well :)

The fit was very snug, but it expanded a bit throughout the night. Spanx aren't necessary, but they certainly help since the dress is VERY fitted. I wasn't sure if the Small would fit, but it hugged all my curves perfectly. Unless you're very busty and can fill out the neckline, I recommend a bra (maybe even pushup bra). The color is gorgeous too. Overall, if you want to turn heads, this dress will definitely do the trick.
review_summary: I worked out extra hard so I could look great in this dress, and I succeeded! I felt stunning.

review_text: Fit really well. No complaints just enjoyed wearing this pretty piece! A twist on traditional eyelet.

So unfortunately none of my pictures turned out well, but this dress was gorgeous! I ordered the 2R and 4R and both of them fit.  However, since I have a large bust, the 2R was choking me so I wore the 4R.  Other than the neck/chest areas, the dress basically fit the same.  It was super comfortable to wear and even strangers were complementing me! Definitely would recommend this dress for a wedding or formal event.
The material on this dress is what makes it really special, thick without being heavy or hot. Loved it! The halter neck and open back make the dress feel sexy even though it's not fitted.
super cute, can dress up or down. stretched out a bit as others commented but wasn't a big deal for me. very flattering fit. would rent again.

This jumper would be perfect for a pear shaped women. It ran tighter through the chest area and was loose in the stomach and bottom. I could have warn a size smaller but my chest was to large. I am 5'4 and 138 lbs and hourglass shaped.

Unfortunately the weather wasn't quite as warmed on vacation as hoped, so I didn't wear this dress.  I loved it when I tried it on, though.  Comfortable, beautiful rich colors, wonderful material -- feels special, yet relaxed.  Runs a little large.
im hourglass, no flat tummy here, but if you arent confidant.  dont wear this.
review_summary: Everyone loved it.  My husband wanted me to buy it.

review_text: True wraparound dress fit my pear/hourglass well.  I am much smaller on top than bottom, though with full hips-I am glad that I got the medium as there was plenty of length on my thighs (I am almost 5'5" and with a full lower half, it might have been too short in a small). Because of the wraparound, I was able to make it tight enough on top, and it fastens at the cleavage. I would buy this dress!
I usually wear a 12, but should have sized down. The armholes where huge on me, but I wore it anyway with a little white sweater to cover the poor fit. I think I'll try it in a 10.

The fit is tailored, yet comfortable.  I wore this jacket with jeans and a white T, then jazzed up a blue-cocktail dress for a night on the town. On more than one occasion, I received multiple compliments on the jacket.
review_summary: This jacket gave me the fun, funky edge I wanted for my first time in Vegas

review_text: Very unique, and it stands out so much that people randomly came up to me and asked about this dress. I've got so many compliments on this dress. It's sort of see-through, so you don't want to wear colorful undies.
review_summary: So many compliments on this dress!

review_text: A little big for my liking. I wish it was more fitted and shorter...
review_summary: Cute and perfect for a County show!

review_text: I liked this top but boy, the tag in the back was very itchy.  I had to cover it with a band-aid to get through the day :)
review_summary: Cute top, I likes the straps in the back.

review_text: worn it out in Vegas.  Comfy and cool. no special undergarments required! love the zipper- you can cover up or show off the girls.  add nude accessories.

The dress is very comfy, felt a little baggy on my tummy area, but the dress was still flattering and def made it more comfortable. Runs true to size, if back up size I would go one size down.
Dress is short but does not ride up.
Would not recommend for bustier ladies, does not seem to be a lot of room for the girls. Worker really well for being small chested and was able to use a stick on bra.
Highly recommend for a girls night out or a casual date. I took this beauty to my vacation in Thailand.

I rented this dress for a girls weekend in Nashville.  It's the perfect daytime dress. Comfortable to walk around in and very flattering.  I usually wear  0, but the 0 was a little tight around the bust.  The 2 fit perfectly however!
You really need a statement necklace with this dress.  Other wise it's a little plain.  I rented the Kate Spade daytime jewels pink necklace and it went perfectly.  I got a ton of compliments on this dress, even from random people on the street!

I normally wear and 6 and the M fit great.  The material is heavier than I was expecting, but because of this, it does stay in place well (no wind moving my dress all around).  The colors were a bit different than I expected, darker grey and coral, but it was very pretty.

I wore this on our mini honeymoon. I have always been reluctant to wear jumpsuits because I'm high waisted and they tend to hit me in an awkward spot, but this one was perfect!! It was slimming even with the wide-leg pants. It was beautiful and so comfortable-I never wanted to take it off. The back is extremely low cut, so just make sure you have a sticky bra. I'd definitely rent this again!

The top is very cute but with the buttons it makes it difficult to move your arms around a little bit. So better for just an night out than a dinner, but super cute. Tight around the chest on me personally probably because of the buttons.
review_summary: Memorial Day Weekend, cute with white shorts :)

review_text: This is such a fun dress! I'm 5'11, and it was higher than shown on the model, but not too skimpy.  I have my hand on my hip, so it looks higher.  This is such a fun dress and it was perfect for travel because it didn't wrinkle and could be dressed up with heels and dressed down with flip flops.  I'll get this dress again...it's comfy and flattering.

I wasn't sure about this dress from the photos, but I loved it in person! It has a bohemian feel and the silhouette fits nicely and isn't too slouchy. The fabric is silky soft and the print is beautiful in person. I wore it during the day in Vegas and again on the plane. I may even rent it again! 

Worked best with no bra and flats with my body type. Could also probably dress it up nicely with wedges.
review_summary: Bohemian style dress with great print and fit! Flattering and not slouchy looking!

review_text:
I decided to rent a dress to visit a girlfriend in San Diego, just because. I knew I wanted a red dress. As soon as I spotted this one, I knew it was "the one"! After reading the reviews, I decided to rent a size up, i.e. Size 10 with backup Size 12. Unfortunately, they only had my backup size (12). However, they sent me that AND two additional sizes in one of the black backup dresses I chose. So they gave me 3 dresses for the price of 1!

I am 5'2 ½" and 145 lbs. I'm normally a Size 8. That said, the Size 12 fit me wonderfully! I think I could've fit in the Size 10; however, it would've been rather snug. So I'd say it runs a little small. Definitely, definitely go at least one size larger than you would normally wear, possibly even two sizes larger.

I wore it without a bra and it looked great. I decided last minute to wear a nude, strapless bra, just for a little added support. The dress has some spandex, so it was great for going to a nice dinner, sitting for cocktails, and eventually dancing at a club...which is exactly what I did!

I love everything about this dress. I would highly recommend it and would rent it again in a heartbeat. I may never purchase another expensive dress again! Thanks RTR ❤
review_summary: The Perfect Sexy Red alternative to that LBD! Fits like a glove! And received many compliments!

review_text: This was the perfect little dress for a night out in Miami. Loved the multi-colors and open back. Could go with practically any color shoes or accessories. The length on me was perfect since I'm only 5'2", but think it could be a little too short for taller girls.

I rented this dress for maternity photos and was so happy with the fit! This worked perfectly with my 28 week bump and I wore the same size that I would normally, pre-pregnancy. The waistline was high enough that it easily fit above my bump. The only down-side was the extra length needed to cover my belly was taken from the length at the bottom, so would not recommend with heels if you are trying to make it work during pregnancy. This is such a great option for engagement or maternity photos- would highly recommend!

This might be my all time favorite rental. I wore this on a 2 week trip around Europe almost every day. It works in weather in the 50's and the 70's. SO comfortable I even wore it on the plane instead of a sweatshirt. The fit is great, well tailored but leaves enough room for a light sweater underneath. Worked well zipped, unzipped, or just over the shoulders. I was really sad to give this one back...if it ever goes on sale, I would buy it.
review_summary: Obsessed...didn't want to give this back

review_text: This is a fun, casual shirt for a daytime activity in the spring or a beachy vacation. It runs large so I recommend going a size smaller.

I rented this jacket to bring with me on a trip to New York earlier this spring and it was the smartest thing I brought with me.  It was warm without being too heavy, it fit true to size with enough room for me to move my arms around comfortably, it held up to heavy rain and dried like new, and worked with almost every outfit I wore.   I'll be renting it again for sure!!
Not see through, size down to keep it on your shoulder otherwise it slips up. Looks high quality with  nice stitching.
Pop in this jumpsuit. Cute but too bright for me! My hubby said it was too much.

I wore this dress for my birthday in Vegas and it looked fantastic. Definitely flashy, which is what I was going for. The only issue, which I knew from other reviews, is the rubbing of the sequins on my arms. So if you are planning to dance or walk a lot, this may not be a good fit.

This is basically the perfect dress. It puts things exactly where they should be and hides the things that shouldn't be there. I liked it so much that I tried to buy it, but couldn't find a size small anywhere.

This shawl-sweater is so cute for day or a casual evening in a ski resort town.  I wore it around Jackson Hole, WY for a girl trip, and wore it with dark brown pleather pants.  It's comfortable - but FYI - very warm.  I didn't even wear a jacket that night (in 20 degree weather) b/c it was so warm.

This dress, unlike me, is very girly in the best way! The colors, the fit and the fabric all have a very delicate, flirty feminine feel and using this dress for a bachelorette weekend (and hanging on to it for Easter, the following weekend!) helped me have a complete wardrobe to choose from. Love the neckline - you can certainly size down or choose the smaller of the two sizes you pick from because the back has elastic and everything below the chest is a generous fit. Everyone try this one!
review_summary: Best Weekend Dress for Spring/Summer Weather!

review_text: This dress is adorable. When I got it at first I wasn't sure that I loved it because it was more of a cotton blend and I was expecting something else based on the pictures... But when I put it on I fell in LOVE! It's such a fun dress that would be perfect for so many different occasions. I am actually wearing it to work today and I can't get two feet without people telling me how much they love the dress - I am excited to take it with me to Lake Tahoe for memorial day! It has a cute gold button in the back of the dress. Def a must rent!
This wrap dress fit comfortably, and the pattern was eye-catching. Lots of options for accessorizing. Great for my vacation in Bali!

Sorry- the picture sucks! This dress fits true to size, I didn't need a bra (could easily wear a strapless), slits on either side of the bottom makes it extremely comfy and perfect for a tropical vacation! The pattern/color is beautiful, I thought it would look more dressy, but definitely fits the 'relaxed maxi' description. Definitely recommend

I rented this dress for my vacation and I only intended to wear it on the beach over my swimsuit! Based on previous reviews, it does run large and I wish that it didn't because it's so comfortable and I understand why others can wear it as a dress on a nice hot summer day.  In my case, I ordered the smallest size and it works great on the beach!  So easy to wear, big and loose and comfortable.  I think I practically wore it everyday of my vacation.  I had brought other swimsuit cover-ups but honestly I couldn't be bothered with them because they're tighter or more of a hassle to get in and out of.  When this dress goes on sale there's a really good chance I will buy it just because it's so damn comfortable on the beach! The material is not crazy lightweight, it isn't transparent, so it doesn't look like a beach dress (except for the loose factor), it just feels like one and I love that.  Because then I could wear it over my swimsuit and go and have lunch in a restaurant without being super exposed the way most swimsuit cover-ups do.  If it ran true to size or just a big smaller I would definitely consider wearing this dress for the rest of my life.
Flattering fit, stretchy, and comfortable. Great for something casual or a night out.
True to size, comfortable, effortless. Could dress up or down. Would rent again!
review_summary: Wore this dress for a friend's bachelorette party at the beach and loved it!

review_text: Loose fitting allows for sizing down. Easy wear but still felt dressy and cute. Vibrant colors, received compliments. You’ll enjoy this one!
As all KSpade dresses, this one is amazing and I wish I had it in my own personal collection
review_summary: Kate Spade classic! Cute and fun but conservative

review_text: I received compliments everywhere I went.  The dress was actually really comfortable.  The zipper was hard to get up and down on the medium dress.  The small fit me but was very short.

Rented this to see Britney Spears in Vegas for girl's weekend!  It was the perfect party dress to dance in all night long.  I was concerned about the front going  a little too low and it was for sure low, but I was still able to wear a normal bra with a little tape, no problem.  I'd recommend getting a specific bra for a plunging neckline though, because you can see mine in a few photos.  Two cons that made me rate it 4/5 stars - my arms were so red and irritated at the end of the night, those sequins are very scratchy.  Might not have been a problem if I'd brought along the Band Aid Rubbing block stick that I sometimes use for new shoes.  The other con was that the lining kept riding up and looked a little lumpy underneath the sequin layer.  Overall a great rental though, perfect for the occasion since I don't have anything like it, nor will likely need anything like it in the near future.
review_summary: Rented this to see Britney Spears in Vegas for girl's weekend!

review_text: MY MOH wore this dress out in Vegas, she's on the left! I rented it for her because of the discount when you rent two. Despite being white on the bottom it's still super flattering! She's 5'2", a size 6, 34D, and she's blessed with a booty. Never would have picked this dress for her from seeing it on the hanger, and the pic doesn't do it justice (sorry I don't have any more) but this dress looked killer on her! Made her look like a bombshell and she got tons of compliments. She loved it and said she'd rent it again for the next trip to Vegas :)

Runs a bit small - am normally a 0 but wore the two because of the hips being a bit tight. I wore a strapless bra to help fill it out (I have a small chest) and that worked well. I wouldn't recommend for a larger-chested woman as it was quite tight even on my small frame. The ONLY downfall was the slit in the back - I stepped into my first taxi and it split a few more inches up the back. Not too bad where I couldn't wear it, but keep that in mind if you're going to be doing a lot of dancing/walking. I rec'd TONS of compliments and I will be renting this dress again for another event. It's a great price point for a dress I wish I could keep!

I had been eyeing this skirt for some time now and I am SO GLAD I rented it for a recent bachelorette weekend. I wore it for a day of walking around downtown. It was a little snug in the waist but since I wore it high it fit just fine. I dressed it down but the skirt could easily be dressed up. This skirt was amazing - I will definitely be renting it again and again.
review_summary: I even received compliments from strangers on the street :)

review_text: I wore this dress to my brother's military graduation and then out to lunch. The material was so soft and comfortable, breathable as well which was great for the Georgia heat. It was a little bit short, but other than that the fit was great and true to size. Overall absolutely wonderful piece that you can dress up or down!

I rented this dress for vacation with my family over the Christmas holiday. We were vacationing in the Caribbean, and this was a fun dress to wear to dinner. It is a mini-dress, even on a short girl like myself, but it was flattering, fun, and fit like a dream. I would certainly recommend this dress for a fun occasion. I think it would look great on many body types.

Romantic, flirty, fun and warm!  This was a perfect coat to take to a winter trip to Europe!  It's incredibly warm and you can wear it dressed up or down.  It's great with tall boots and a plain tee and a scarf for sightseeing!
It was very comfortable, but ran very large. It was boxy and well past my knee.
review_summary: I rented this for a ski weekend.

review_text: This dress is classic yet stands out Bc of its color! It's feminine without being frilly. It fits well and the wrap makes it very flattering. There is a snap to keep the top closed.

I was immediately drawn to the dusty rose color of this dress - so pretty! I was a little hesitant about the collar, but I laid it down instead of having it stand up and I liked that better. The fabric is very stretchy, so it's super comfortable! The neck part is really stretchy too. I ordered my typical size and it fit perfectly, although the chest part definitely fit me differently than it looks on the model. This is a perfect Spring/Fall dress!

Seriously loved this dress. It is so flattering and the material is amazing. Wore this for my bday celebration in Las Vegas. My only (very small) complaint is that the dress would ride up a bit when I walked. But I would definitely recommend this to everyone.

Beautiful bright color and silhouette - I felt so good wearing this! I paired the dress with the Alexis Bittar Jagged Marquis cluster necklace (LOVED that as well) and a pair of gold strappy sandals. I definitely agree that the body of the dress runs a tad bit smaller than what I'm used to. I typically wear a size 2 and ended up wearing a size 4 in this. The bust, however, was a tiny bit big - I found myself hiking it up several times throughout the night - but not enough to ruin my evening. I also agree that this is very slim-fitting and leaves little to the imagination, so I recommend exploring underwear options to find something that doesn't show through the material.  I would absolutely rent this dress again.

One of the most versatile styles! It was perfect for my day in Napa Valley. I paired it with delicate gold jewelry and gladiator sandals. This style runs true to size and is meant to have a more flowy look. You can definitely opt to wear a belt if you want to show off your shape a bit more. The material is comfortable, breezy, and does not wrinkle! I packed it in my suitcase, flew from NYC to San Francisco, unfolded it two days later and there was not even the slightest crease. Highly recommend this style, especially for the summer months!
This dress was perfect for hot weather!  It's loose fitting and breezy, but doesn't make you feel like you're wearing a tent.  The scarf hem is lovely.
Fits like a glove.  I am usually a size 6 but wore an 8.  It runs small.  Very sexy and hugs all your curves.  Definitely the best little black dress ever!

It did fit a little big, and it was a tad long. Wear some 3-6" heels and its perfect.  I wore this to a party, and i slayed, I slayed on the  flight. My daughter and i dropped  in on my ex-husband and his third wife and i slayed some more.  Yep i did, and let me tell you both his and the wife's chins are probably still on the ground! This garment, is definitely one to keep in the arsenal.
review_summary: Everyone who saw me in the airport thought i was someone important! which i am

review_text: I loved this dress! I rented it for my best friend's birthday celebration in Las Vegas and it worked out perfectly. A RTR stylist advised me to have the dressed shipped to my hotel- and picking it from the concierge instead of having to travel with it on the plane was an extremely convenient suggestion. I was in between the L/XL but had to go up a size because of tightness in the arms. Unfortunately the XL was baggy in my torso area, but given the style and draping of the dress no one even noticed. You're sure to be a head-turner in the dress; the only issue is that I noticed the sequins got caught on a lot of things (especially my hair)!

I rented this dress for a Birthday Cruise I was on. I was a bit nervous since it had no reviews. It came with tags on. The dress runs large for sure. I am usually a 4 but when choosing between a small and a medium I usually pick a medium since I have a bottom and broad shoulders. The dress was big pretty much all over. I belted it and pinned it to make it more fitted in the waist. Overall I loved it the more I wore it throughout the night. I love that it is at an inexpensive price point as well.
review_summary: Love the dress but runs big!

review_text: Fit great, very comfortable and casual
The top on the left side (from shoulder to collarbone) did not lay flat.
review_summary: The gold fabric shimmers a lot more than you can tell from the photos

review_text: fits great, not too short.  sequins didn't bother my arm pits.  got a ton of compliments!
review_summary: work dress for Britney Spears concert in Vegas. LOVE.

review_text: The dress was a great fit. It is a beautiful color, flattering style, and is very comfortable. The fabric is a little strange and stiff, but did not affect the overall look.
review_summary: Great night out at dinner and drinking with friends!

review_text: This jumpsuit was so comfortable! It's a beautiful, dark green, flows nicely, and stays up. I wore the 6 because I was going to be eating and dancing and there is no stretch around the waist, but the 4 fit better. Only cons for me were that it was a bit long - with 3" heels, I had to tape-hem it a good 2 inches - and the front, crossover panel can gape open a bit when you're not sitting up straight or standing. Also, it didn't come with the belt in the picture.
review_summary: Wearing this the night before January Jones wore a green jumpsuit to the Emmy's!

review_text: Fits like in the picture. It's very low cut, but I wore it with a bikini top so didn't mind that it showed a bit.
review_summary: Light and breezy, perfect for vacation!

review_text: Wore this on vacation in Florida! AMAZING print!! Got many compliments when I wore it to brunch. Fabric is very soft and super stretchy. Regular length was perfect for my height with sandals. I loved the v-neckline and cutout!  Perfect for a vacation or wedding!

Lost count on the number of compliments I received while wearing this jacket! Keep in mind that it is a bit stiff and the fabric is thick, so it does not allow for a thick shirt or blouse. Better with a sleeveless tank.
review_summary: Beautiful jacket. I wish I owned it!

review_text: I wore this dress for a trip to Philadelphia with my daughters.  It is the perfect summer dress - light and airy.  It can be dressed up or down.  It was slightly dressy for what we were doing (touring the city) but not out of place.  However, it would have also been fine for a more formal event.  I loved the fit and look of the dress, but the halter straps were very thin and they were the primary support, which meant that after a while they cut into my neck.  The discomfort was worth it, though!
review_summary: Perfect summer dress!  Slightly uncomfortable but worth it.

review_text: Wore this on vacation in a tropical climate. While the material feels a little thick to the touch, it was actually nice because it didn't show perspiration like other thinner, summer materials often do.
review_summary: true to size, high quality material

review_text: Loved this dress a lot unfortunately it did not arrive before i left for my vacation.  It's a little short for my office so I had to send it back but I look forward to renting it again for the right occasion.  Maybe a shower or luncheon or brunch or graduation.

This dress is so fun! I brought it with me to San Fran and absolutely loved it. I paired it with a brown suede moto jacket and it was great for a night on the town. Definitely size up and the slit is a tad bit high on the legs
fits to curves perfectly
review_summary: love this dress and everyone else does too

review_text: So flattering - easy to dress up and worn with jeans and wedges = the perfect vacation outfit.
I loved the look on this dress, but unfortunately it was too short for me.
review_summary: Very cute dress, but way too short for me!

review_text: XS was the perfect size!!!

This dress was perfect for a summer concert/vacation with one of my girlfriends.  Clearly quality.  My only complaint is that the shoulders are a little wide -- they seemed to be sticking out from the side.  Otherwise, a great casual dress.
Fit was true to size.  It was comfortable to wear for a night out.
review_summary: It was great for a casual night in Vegas with wedges.  Back makes it sexy not conservative.

review_text: I wore this dress for a girl's night out in Vegas...it's cute, but definitely very casual and the material is starting to look worn.  I would not recommend this dress for anything other than a girl's night out or a date night.
review_summary: Wore this for a night out in Vegas

review_text: Wore this dress for a bachelorette party in Vegas! We all wore sparkly dresses and this dress was perfect!
review_summary: Loved this dress! Felt very fancy and had so much fun!

review_text: The only problem I had with it is that in the back is bunchy and I can't adjust it.

I wore this in Vegas for my Bachelorette Party weekend to a dinner. I really liked the dress in general but it does run a bit small. I felt really self conscious in it all dinner and was even wearing Spanx. I wouldn't recommend it for a lady who is a 12/14 but if you're a 10/12 I'd order the 12 just in case. I got a lot of compliments when I was sitting down though! Loved the back!
Got this dress with my unlimited subscription.  It is long and comfortable. I wore it went tall wedges and the length was perfect.

Very short. I am 5'3" and I wouldn't have been able to wear heels. I am pretty small chested and if I took a big breath or stretched my arms, the button closure would pop. Adjustable straps helped. I felt cute and "flirty" in it. I would def rent again for vacation, day party, baby shower etc.
review_summary: cute dress. Unfortunately my dress arrived without the belt so I had to use my own skinny brown belt

review_text:
This dress was FANTASTIC for our Vegas ladies trip.  The color is so vibrant and the pattern and texture of the dress are also very eye catching.  The dress is pretty short and I've got a booty on me, so I definitely had to be careful on the dance floor.  IT was freezing in Vegas while we were there, so I ended up pairing with black tights.  I added some gold accessories and a red lip.

This dress is VERY thick, so while it smooths any lumps or bumps you want to hide, I wouldn't recommend this dress for warm weather.

Stunning full length dress with a beautiful pattern on it. Perfect for summer climates. This is a dress that better for smaller chests as it fit me everywhere except in my chest (I'm 38DD and I had to try it on without a bra). If you are a 38D I think you will be fine but my DD caused it to be too tight.
review_summary: Stunning dress. Light pink with colors throughout the dress. Perfect for warm weather activities.

review_text: Fit like a glove. Color was gorgeous. Really sucks you in, but still comfortable to wear all night. I wore a stick on push up bra (but just didn't buckle the center clasp, so it wasn't visible) but you could totally go without a bra too. The material is thick and really nice quality. I think it's hard to go wrong with Herve Leger.
I was hesitant until I put it on.  Very fun and flattering.  I received compliments all night on the town in Chicago.  Did size up as recommended.

Loved the colors of this dress, perfect for a sunset dinner at the beach. The dress is very loose and flowy around the midsection and hips, but has a polished neckline. I think wearing it with heels would have made me feel a bit more long and lean, but I wore with sandals. Overall, its a stunning dress and I received several compliments.
skirt is completely sheer, the top is like a vest - the picture is a little decieving.  I didn't end up wearing.
The pink tassels on the back are adorable.
review_summary: Easy cotton dress for a tropical vacation! Kept me cool and got lots of compliments.

review_text: I rented this for a hot music festival and it was perfect.  It's great for athletic bodies, fits really well and is fun and flirty.  I had no issues with the length or the fit and I would absolutely rent it again.

Stunning dress that is also very comfortable. I was a bit surprised by the shoulder pads when I tried the dress on but got over it quickly. The dress is a nice combination of fitted yet stretchy and breathable. It's also a nice length. I'm between 5'6" and 5'7" and it hit mid thigh.  Planned to wear this number to see Britney in Vegas but unfortunately had to cancel my trip. Will rent for another occasion.
review_summary: This dress has the wow factor!

review_text: Wore this to the VIP Britney Spears show in Vegas.  It sucked me in and I didn't need to wear a bra.  I almost never feel comfortable going braless but this wasn't a problem. It was quite comfortable for being so dressy and I received plenty of compliments.
review_summary: Covers you up but still sexy

review_text: I loved this jacket, it fit perfectly and wasn't too boxy for my small frame. I got lots of compliments all night long. The detailing on the jacket is phenomenal! Looks great with black leggings or skinny jeans too.

Rented this dress for a mid-winter trip to Florida. It was cooler than expected, so I paired it with an army-green jacket, and wore flat sandals to dress it down for the beach. The slightly-longer length (to my knees at 5'4") offset the curve-clinging material and subtle cutouts in a perfect way. The dress would also have been stunning dressed up with tall heels. No undergarments necessary, though a strapless bra would have been easy to wear. I recommend getting a size smaller for backup, as part of the dress's fun is the tight-fitting material. I would definitely rent again!

Rented as part of unlimited subscription for a Caribbean cruise and wanted to select items outside by normal comfort zone.  The fabric is basically neoprene and it's super stretchy.  As noted by others, my only criticism is that the outline of the pockets were visible, but the fabric is thick enough to hide minor dimpling so I did not need Spanx, and wore nothing underneath to avoid adding any other lines.  Because of the thicker, slightly stiff fabric, the one shoulder ruffle stands up on it's own, so it really looks like it does on the model pictured.  I figured it was a "love it or hate it" kind of outfit but I got lots of compliments on it.  Definitely worked for the occasion.
The shoulder straps slip.

I tried on another Nicholas dress in 10 and it was incredibly small, so I got this dress in a 12 - and was able to put it on over my head without unzipping. The effect wasn't terrible on, it just looked a little big, but I feel like the dress wasn't shown off to its best. Very well made with a not-stifling lining, the fabric is lovely and I loved the length. It just wasn't a total home run.
review_summary: Sizing a little weird, but cute overall

review_text: This dress gets attention - very fitted and different that your average sequined mini. It is very fitted on bottom. I thought the 10 was a bit tight, but I still wore it because the top on the 12 was way too loose. The top on the 10 was even loose, but I made do because the dress was so great. My arms were a little chaffed by the end of the night from the sequins, but hey, beauty is pain!
I never thought I'd be into the shoulder cut-outs, but they are super flattering. The fit is great although it's a bit shorter than I was expecting. The small keyholes make it a dream on a hot day!
review_summary: Loved, loved, loved this top. Got so many compliments. Don't want to return it!

review_text: Looked really cute on other people, but looked a bit like a bag on me.  I ended up wearing it with a belt to give it some shape, which helped, but definitely would look better on someone with more curves.  I liked that it was dressy without being over the top - a bit glitzy but not too shiny.  The specific one I received was definitely about due for retirement - it was snagged all over the place.
review_summary: A bit dressy, but casual enough for a night out

review_text: I was not the biggest fan of the style of this dress,  but I am so happy that I stepped outside of my comfort zone. The dress is really comfortable and roomy. The only snug part of the dress is the top band.  If you are busty, I would suggest sizing up for your back up size. A strapless bra will be best with this dress.
Loved the fit and look of this dress. Wore it on a girls' trip. Very fitted, but classy.

Beautiful, soft, almost shiny material. Running true to size with room in the bust, waist, and hips, I'd recommend sizing down for backup. Although there is no stretch in the fabric, there is plenty of room throughout the entire silhouette, giving it an oversized look. With the high neckline, I'd recommend wearing a strapless bra. Easily dressed up or down.

I wore this dress for a night out at clubs during a weekend in Las Vegas -  Its not the type of thing I would normally wear, but it was PERFECT for vegas and I got a number of compliments on my dress.  Up close, it looks a bit different from the RTR website image, but the dress looks good in photos. Its really flashy, and it helps you stand out. The fit was good -  I'm short, so the dress was a little longer on me (at knees), I got a size 10 and 12, and I actually could have gotten the next size down. The only caveat is that the sequins are very delicate. At one point the zipper got stuck in the sequins, and I had to put on the dress (carefully) over my head! The sequins come off very easily!  But overall, I was very pleased!
review_summary: All of the compliments I recieved wearing the dress!

review_text:
I rented this for my birthday over the Fourth of July weekend.  it was comfortable to wear but really short when I sat down.  The only downside to the romper was getting it on & off to use the restroom.   It has the world's smallest button and loop to close it behind your neck.  I definitely was frustrated a couple time trying to get it off.  
It was well made and comfortable to wear.
review_summary: Cute romper, beautiful print & comfy material.

review_text: As other reviewers have mentioned, this dress is tight at the natural waist. It's great to show of a small waist, and along with the deep V neckline it adds shape to the maxi. Mara Hoffman does the best prints. I loved this dress - it'd be great for parties and vacation, and plan to rent it again.
Very comfortable form fitting, backless dress with eye-catching graphic print.  Had no issues with gaping sleeves or with the skirt riding up.  Loved wearing it - hated sending it back!
The fit was perfect and very comfortable.  The top panel has a gap in the back so I opted for a sticky bra rather than showing off the clasp. I received tons of compliments and would rent this again.
review_summary: Classic black romper with fun lace inserts

review_text: I received so many compliments on this shirt. I wore it with a pair of jean shorts and cute sandals and it was perfect. It has a very nautical but trendy feel.
review_summary: Perfect for my vacation to Charleston. I wore it for dinner and drinks one night.

review_text: A bit loose
review_summary: Feeling was gross, didn't like the sequins and looked better in photos than on.

review_text: Very relaxed and flowy fit, used a little fashion tape to keep neckline in place. Loved the bright colors and tie sleeves with boyfriend jeans for a casual night out.
review_summary: wore this top during the day and night for informal summer events

review_text: It's a beautiful dress and fits true to size. However, it's super short! Luckily, we were at the beach so it didn't really matter. I received several compliments and my husband loved it. I'm a large (12) in tops and a 14 in bottoms. It fit just right in the bottom and had a little room in the top of the dress. (Please forgive the low quality of the photo that I shared. Our photographer was our 9 year old daughter. 😜)
review_summary: I wore this dress for vacation/birthday dinner. I got so many compliments!

review_text: Has an interesting, dramatic cut, which is very flattering.  High fashion without being hard-edged.  Fabric is a little lighter and less luxurious than I'd like, but on the bright side it makes it good for hot weather.
review_summary: Very fun.  Cool cut.  Light fabric.

review_text: Wore this for my birthday on a cruise, it fit perfectly.  Shows off your cleavage, which my boyfriend loved.  Perfect little black dress to wear out.

I wore this dress for a classy night out in Vegas and it was a hit!  I got so many compliments and I felt fantastic in it!  As the stylist notes recommend, if you're looking for something that's loosely fitted like the model, size up.  I'm typically an 8 and this dress was a bit fitted.  That being said, it was very flattering.

One thing to note is that if you're going to be spending a lot of time sitting (as I was at dinner), consider renting a different dress.  The lining on this dress does not run the full length of the dress (it ends about an inch from the bottom) and therefore exposes your skin to scratchy sequins on the hem, making sitting quite uncomfortable.

Overall, I highly recommend this dress as long as you don't mind sacrificing some comfort!
review_summary: Beautiful dress but a bit scratchy

review_text: I wanted something edgy for an upcoming trip with some business involved, and a black leather moto jacket seemed like just the thing! This jacket arrived new (with tags still attached), and I could barely move in it. I didn't have time to break it in, so I wore it very briefly for some photos, and that was it.
review_summary: This is a very fierce jacket. And fiercely stiff.

review_text: This dress was very pretty, but just too big for my smaller frame. The straps were insanely large, and the dress was too long and hit mid-shin.  It just doesn't work well with smaller frames. I was lost in the dress and it just looked frumpy :( I sized up based on the reviews, but maybe should have kept my regular size, not sure if that would have helped.

Beautiful dress for resort and dinners out in Morocco (where women cover up more). I am saying it runs large because it is a super forgiving, A-line cut with ornamental shoulders and a stretchy waistband, that I think overall a petite person would be swimming in! I'm almost 5'9" and sometimes wear 10s on the bottom and a 6 fit perfectly. Lots of compliments on the color and fabric. Has a slit up the front to mid thigh.
review_summary: Gorgeous, silky fabric that flows in the breeze! A great resort dress if you need a demure option.

review_text: I didn't want to return this! It pairs nicely with jeans and leggings. It has an asymmetrical bottom. I normally wear a small top and this medium was still tight in my shoulders but fine everywhere else. If the price was right I would have kept this top. I have never worn this designer Alexis before. I'm a fan!
this dress is great work work, vacation, everyday. it ran a tad big but not enough to throw off the style. love this dress.

Wore this as part of a more casual work outfit and then to the airport to start my vacation. My plane was over an hour late but I didn't care since I was soooo comfy in this sweater!  I'm always freezing on planes but this kept me warm and happy through the delay. It's one of the few sweater coats I've tried that still looks nice (not sloppy) and pretty enough to wear to work.  There is a bit of extra room (to be expected) so if you want something close fitted I would size down.
Loose and comfortable but sexy at the same time!
Such a figure flattering feminine dress!!!  No complaints!
It's a little on the baggy side, but still looks great.

This dress fit perfectly and was flattering from all angles!  I'm only 5'2" & I was concerned that the dress wouldn't be short enough in the front, but wound up being the perfect length.  I ordered both a 0 and a 2 and found that the zero fit better all over (I usually wear a 2).   The material is comfortable and breathable.  The only thing I didn't like were the zippers on each arm which kept scratching the inside of my arm.  All in all a great dress & I received many compliments.
Fits true to size. Stretchy cotton material makes it comfortable, but possibly less formal depending on how you accessorize it.
review_summary: I wore this out in Vegas and it was perfect - comfortable, but I still felt sexy and cool.

review_text: This jacket is so cute. I took it on a trip over MDW and wore it multiple times. Fit is TTS.
Fit well. Comfortable and hung nicely. A bit too much like a costume but color was nice and off shoulder trend worked.
review_summary: Pretty dress, a bit too costumey

review_text: This dress fit true to size, was so comfortable, and was perfect for vacation dinner.  Loved it!  Many compliments.

I am a six weeks post partum gal with 34-F bra size due to breast feeding. I know my current body is temporary and needed a bright dress for my family vacation photos. This dress was very forgiving on my body and managed to fit my large breast size perfectly. It is very orange and the color was originally a smidge off putting, but boy does it photograph well! Highly recommend for larger cup sized ladies.

This was a fun dress!  I rented the XL and L and ended up wearing the L because I felt like the XL didn't hug my body as well.  The sequins were a little scratchy, but not too uncomfortable.  My only issue was that I didn't have quite the right undergarments for the top half.  I either needed a lower cut bra or some way to wear no bra because I was constantly having an issue with my bra peeking out of the low-cut V.  I tried fashion tape, but it didn't quite work.  Otherwise, I had a lot of fun in this dress and liked the fit.  Got plenty of compliments!

I was surprised by how much I liked this! I wore it for a bachelorette party in Miami for a more "chill" night and loved it. It fit perfectly (arrived with tags still on) and was really comfortable all night. If you have a very long torso, I could see the length being an issue, but it fit my perfectly. the cut in the back gives it a little sex appeal, a well. I'll likely rent this again!
This is absolutely adorable, but with the length of my torso it simply didn't work for me.  Sad I wasn't able to wear this because I think it is a great outfit!
Two words: Camel Toe
review_summary: I love the style of this onesie but it was very uncomfortable.

review_text: I was in love with this romper and wanted to keep it... like most of the RTR items I rent.  The color was vibrant and eye-catching.  As with most rompers, it is a little short for taller girls, but not so much that it was uncomfortable.  I would rent this again in a heartbeat.
I order a large because I read several reviews saying it was small in the bust but it was definitely too big.  I was able to use the tie to cinch it and it looked ok but needed a medium.
review_summary: A little big but still perfect for girls weekend!

review_text: Rented this dress with my unlimited subscription for a trip to Bermuda. It definitely turned some heads. The dress is soft and comfortable, and the tie top is great for adjusting to your chest size (I'm pretty small on top, so being able to make the bust not baggy was a big plus). I did feel like this dress was a bit tight in the midsection, and had a little trouble zipping it up. But once I zipped I was good to go.

I rented this dress to wear to the rehearsal of a beach wedding in Florida. It would also work well for a non-beach wedding or for a baby/wedding shower. It was a little tighter in the bust than most 4s are on me but it still worked. There is a seam that goes around the middle of the skirt that was a bit odd. Liked, didn't love.

I rented this dress for Vegas. It was perfect for winter time with black tights. I loved the color on my fair skin tone. The cut hugged my curves in the right places (chest and hips). I would definitely rent this dress again for a cocktail party.
review_summary: Beautiful Color. Perfect Short Party Dress.

review_text: I rented this dress for our Arizona vacation and couples photoshoot. It fit well and flattered my figured. I am usually a 6 in Lily's, but opted for the 8 b/c of the length. I received many compliments from people around our resort, spa, and around town. Definitely worthy of another rental if I cannot purchase the dress.  Lily Pulitzer dresses never disappoint me.

I would have loved to wear this for vacation but when I tried it on it was a little too short and the hips kept riding up on me making it even shorter. I may have needed one size larger. Maybe a small would fit better. I have an athletic build like a gymnast.

Dress was even better in person.  Fit was perfect and the lightweight material was very comfortable.  Received a lot of compliments on it and was able to go from a fancy baby shower to a wedding in the same dress with ease.  It was a hot, outdoor wedding and I didn't feel too sweaty or hot in this dress.

It was very short in the torso on me. I kept getting a wedgie...but the piece is super cute so I wore it anyway! It didn't come with a belt so I used my own. I wish it came in a long and it would have been perfect. I could have worn a size 0 but I figured the 2 might be a little longer. Still wasn't long enough, probably should have just gone with the 0 as the 2 was just a little big in the waist.
review_summary: Good romper, quality fabric, a little short in the torso on my 5' 10" frame

review_text: Just perfection. It fit perfect, it is super cute (tons of compliments) and very comfortable. The only potential con is that it has a fully open back which made it super airy (in a good way), but maybe less suited for women with larger cup sizes.
Great material, very strong and no need for spanx! I was not able to wear a bra even though I have a smaller bust, but it wasn't an issue and the dress fit great. Loved this dress!
review_summary: The color and the fit were amazing!

review_text:
I rented this dress however I was not comfortable wearing something this low cut without a bra so my girlfriend wore it and LOVED it. Super form fitting and will not hide any flaws!
Again, you CANNOT wear a bra with this, it will show the front clasp regardless of style. If you are comfortable enough to pull this style off it looks amazing!

I wore this on a beach trip with friends and received many compliments. There is a cute keyhole in the back but I was able to wear a regular bra and not a strapless, which was nice and much more comfortable. The fabric is light for a balmy Summer day.

I rented this dress for my husbands work trip to Santa Barbara.  Being 24 weeks pregnant I needed a bump friendly dress.  This dress was so easy to wear!  The fabric was light and airy.  The length was a little long for me but a pair of wedges did the trick to keep me from tripping.  I wore the 6R and it was slightly tight around my growing ribcage, the 8R was too baggy in the chest area and was not flattering.  The back is open so you have to wear a nubra.  I loved this dress and will definitely consider renting it after baby comes!
5'4 fit perfectly other then in the shoulders- the straps fell down a lot.
review_summary: great material many complements. I would rent again!

review_text: Absolutely loved this top. I paired it with skinny jeans and houndstooth pumps. The material is actually pretty thick and I was a tad warm.

I'm still pinching myself for sending this jacket back! It's the softest and most flattering jacket ever. I could have sized up, but sadly the next size wasn't available. I wore it for two weeks straight and got tons of compliments. I'd rent it again and again.
This was a beautiful dress! The material was a great quality, it was comfortable and I received so many compliments on it! I wish I owned it!

This skirt was great, cute and festive, yet not over-the-top. I wore it to a couple of events during the holidays, with a simple white top and with a black button down. I am usually a 6, and after reading the other reviews I decided to I order a 8 to be on the safe side and be sure to be comfortable, and it fit but was tight, so size up if in doubt. Other than this, I am very happy with this item and I strongly recommend it.

This was a little large, but I think that was the style of the romper and the tie at the waist pulled it all together. Very light weight and easy to pack for vacation. I will definitely rent this again!
review_summary: I wore this while on vacation this summer in Amsterdam and it was perfect and comfortable.

review_text: I thought this dress would be more forgiving or flowy but it had a tight, narrow lining that made it bunch in the waist and pull in the hips. The chest area also was a very weird fit. My boobs didn't actually fall within the chest area completely as there's no structure to the dress and you can't really wear a bra with it. Would be a good over a bathing suit maxi for someone without curves or boobs that sit perfectly straight and don't fall off to the side!
review_summary: Not how I thought it would be - terrible fit for women with hips/real boobs.

review_text: I brought this dress down to Mexico for a bachelorette party & it was a big hit. I wore it out to dinner & a nightclub in Playa Del Carmen - the dress was sexy, classy, & low maintenance (no bra, minimal accessories needed)! It sat about mid-thigh & the lace detail was just revealing enough. The only downside is that the fabric was a little thick for the Mexican heat, but I would rent this dress again in heartbeat!
So comfortable, beautiful, fun and fitted

I'll definitely rent this dress again. It was so comfortable and so cute. It fit PERFECTLY! I wore it to a girls beach weekend and then again for dinner with my parents. The little cut out is small enough that it adds flare but still totally classy. Don't hesitate, rent this dress!
never wore, returned since it was too tight and I normally wear a size 6

Rented this to wear on the way to Mexico. It was great, especially since it covered my legs and airports and airplanes can be cold. Received many compliments. You may have to iron it as it is a lot of fabric and arrives a bit wrinkled, but that was easily fixed. Did not wear a bra, and instead used breast petals.

Fit true to size maybe a little small.  I took a 4 and I go between a 2-4. I wore it on an Italy vacation. 
It did blow up some when it was windy so maybe don't choice for an outdoor event that will be windy. But overall very cute dress.
review_summary: Very nice dress for what I needed!

review_text: Very flattering and feminine dress, especially the lace up back. Wore it on vacation in the Dominican Republic and received a lot of compliments from men. It's sexy, but not revealing (no cleavage, not a lot of leg showing).
review_summary: Great fit, I felt very pretty in this feminine dress.

review_text: Great dress, I wore with white leggings, the hips were tight on me.

I've now rented this dress in two different colors - it's that good! So easy and comfortable to wear, and I love the ruffles and the tie-waist belt. The fabric is light but not flimsy, and the length is flattering. On a two-week trip I wore this several times - out to eat, for a day exploring the city, and to a casual family event. I'm usually a 2 or a 4 in dresses, and the 4 in this is slightly roomy - I might try a 2 when I rent the blue-and-white version. The sleeves did seem a little too loose at times, and going with my smaller dress size might fix that.

I ended up not wearing this one. It was fine, but not a favorite. The detailing in the openness of the back was cool, but the front was very shapeless and quite high necked. A bit more on the conservative side if that is something you're after.

I liked it.  It was comfortable, a little large though.  My fiance on the other hand hated it (it's just a preference I guess).  We were in Vegas so I thought it would be fun but he really thought it was too much and just way over the top Vegas-y and not in a good way.  So I ended up not wearing it, but it was comfortable and nice... just a little large in the chest (and I wear 34C) and I would have been worried about them coming out allll night so I'm glad I didn't wear it.  Also, was disappointed in the color.  Would have liked it way more if it was really gold gold as in the picture but it's definitely rose gold.

I wanted the size 2, but all that I could get was a 0...I had a feeling it would be too small, and it was. However...I followed the advice of another reviewer and just left the interior zip undone! The top of the dress has an outer layer, and that is very loose and was easily zipped up. the interior layer has NO STRETCH at all, and fit really tight at the ribcage. I didn't zip it but it didn't matter. The dress is really beautiful, and I received lots of compliments. perfect for my Hawaiian vacay :) The length was just right on my 5'3 frame with 4" wedges, maybe a little long...but it worked out great.
