It fit perfectly! It was so comfortable, so flattering - I wore it multiple days just because it was so cute. I would buy this dress. I have unlimited, and this has been my favorite rental out of 20+.
review_summary: I wore this for a birthday beach weekend.

review_text: The fabric felt high quality, the fit was great, and I loved the ruffle on the side.  The only issue I have with it is I wish it was an inch longer for a little bit more coverage, but it definitely wasn't too short to wear.  I'm considering buying it so I don't have to send it back!
I rented this dress for a beach vacation and was very pleased.  It was comfortable and classy; I'd highly recommend it!  Depending on your height, I would suggest wearing with heels.
Loved this dress.  Would rent it again.  Super comfortable, and super flattering.  Disappointed I didn't take a picture.

It's definitely a fitted coat. I have a small frame but 34D chest and I couldn't wear a bulky sweater with this coat. I rented it so I didn't have to take a large coat on the airplane for my trip to Chicago. It was the perfect amount of comfort and style. I felt chic and stylish. I loved it so much I tried to buy it! I would 100% rent again.
review_summary: The jacket was perfect for walking around the city during the day and also dressed up at night.

review_text: Loved the dress. Wore it for a girls trip in Savannah. Great fabric, thick and concealing. Love the detail of the tie and the stitching down the sides. I'm tall (5'10) and this was still a great length.
Great dress! Can be worn belted or loose. Very comfy. Starting to show wear a little bit though, I rented in January and it looked much better. Now not as white and a few loose threads.
Only issue was slip underneath was showing a bit. Otherwise, it was very flattering.
review_summary: Wore this for a night out in Vegas. Really liked it. Concealed my tummy issues from having babies.

review_text: Loved the material. It was a little heavy so it didn't show any extra curves. It was a great material for a cool day in February. Fit great, and looked great.
Runs large! Crinkles easily, but that's the nature of the material. A great, crisp daytime look.
Loved this -- light, comfy.  very short in the front -- don't reach above your head!
review_summary: Loved this -- light, comfy.  very short in the front -- don't reach above your head!

review_text: True to size! Elegant! Sexy!
Can't wear a bra so be careful sitting and leaning forward!
Loved this elegant dress.  I felt like I had walked out of the 1960s in a good way.  Would be great for any cocktail party or dinner.
This dress is perfect!  And very well-made.
review_summary: This dress was fun and comfortable!  I wore it with sandals and shortie boots.

review_text: Perfect fit. wore the XS.  It was very comfortable and I did not have any issues with it.  I wore it to dinner.

Great Herve. My husband loved the white color. Only downside is the top is a bit sheer so you need to wear a bra unlike many other of the Herve styles. I usually wear an XXS in Herve but the XS was great. Highly recommend.

This dress fit like a glove.  Completely true to size and VERY flattering.  I received tons of compliments throughout the night and would definitely consider renting again.  This dress is quite form-fitting and shows a bit of cleavage.  It was great for the bachelorette party I attended in Las Vegas.  I would not recommend this for a more conservative event, such as a wedding.  Overall, beautiful dress in a lovely color and forgiving fabric.
review_summary: Perfect dress for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: I would recommend this to others.  Fit was great and did not need the extra size.
review_summary: Great dress for the spring wedding. Got lots of complements

review_text: I wore this dress during my bachelorette weekend in Vegas and it was a hit! It hugged all the right places and really highlighted my curves nicely. Would definitely rent again, the sequins were so much fun! A couple things to note, I have pretty broad shoulders and the dress kind of stopped right at the tip of my shoulders and I would have to tug it up a few times. I didn't bother me too much since the dress is so gorgeous, but something to note, it won't sit on your shoulders like it does in the model photographs if you have broad shoulders like me. Last - spanx are recommended to wear under the dress!
review_summary: Perfect dress for my bachelorette in Vegas!

review_text: Fit perfectly. Size 0 probably wouldn't be able to accommodate over a B chest though

I rented this to wear out in Miami--and it worked beautifully! I wore this sparkler with a strapless bra and felt super comfortable (and still chic) all night. The only downfall about this dress was the itchiness of the sequins under your arms. This dress won't make you feel teeny tiny because of the blousiness of the dress, but it is still perfect for a night out!
review_summary: I got stopped by someone dying to know where I got my dress. Of course, I shared the RTR secret!

review_text: The pattern and colors are beautiful, and the adjustable straps and stretch in the bodice help it fit perfectly.
review_summary: Perfect for summer day or vacation!

review_text: Comfortable. Flattering for all. Love the off the shoulders
review_summary: Such a fun outfit! I received so many compliments. Easy to dress it up with wedges or down with sand

review_text: The design & material are fun.  The fit is true to size & the length is perfect.  You can dress this up or wear casual easy!!
review_summary: This dress is an easy wear.

review_text: Great fit and extremely flattering! I wanted a top that had a little more flare and this was the perfect top for that.
review_summary: Wore this for a night out in Atlantic City!

review_text: This dress is stretchy and was too thick for the weather I was going to wear it in. Its a nice fit for an hour glass figure.
My dress was sleeveless, which is not how the dress appears in the photo. I loved the a-line skirt. It is perfect for a dinner at the beach!
I rented this for  family vacation in Hawaii and it was a hit. I felt comfortable and very well put together. Lovely fabric. Great style and cut.

this dress was a bit tight in the bust, but I have a wide chest.  Loved the material.  turned out to be provocatively see through in the sun, which was tasteful and fun.  Wore with light denim for evening.
The fit was perfect and the length was just right. im 5'8 and it was perfect! No complaints about this dress at all!!
review_summary: This was perfect for my 30th birthday in Vegas!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation to LA. The dress fits according to size, is very comfortable, and flattering. It has a flowing skirt and very pleasant to the touch, high-quality fabric.  Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Pretty, high-quality fabric and perfect fit

review_text: This dress is super fun. The ruffle makes it pretty distinctive. The fabric was thick and forgiving while still being extra comfy. I felt like the back bunched and had some extra fabric, you may want to size down if you like to show off your caboose.

Soft, comfortable dress.  True to size.  I rented for a boating trip and also for a weekend at the beach.  The sleeves do ride up causing the dress to go very short, so you will need to continue pulling it down.  Other than that its great.
Fit fantastic w/ just the right amount of sheerness.

I loved this jumper!  I rented for vacation in Mexico and it was perfect for the weather and could be casual with flip flops or dressed up with a heel.  It is a bit sheer in the right light, but perfect for a hot day.  I'm only 5'4" so it was longer on me than the model, but if you want a shorter look, you can scrunch the legs up since the bottom is elastic.  I would rent it again.

I rented this for a tropical vacation in Belize.  It was perfect for day and night and fits true to size.  The fabric is thick enough to create structure but is still informal enough to be resort wear.  I ended up buying the dress.

The dress is as expected- comfortable and easy. I wore this to a tennis tournament in Palm Spring and it worked great in the extreme heat.
The arm holes are over-sized so expect to wear a bralette that will be seen. The waist seam is not flattering in the back, it fell too low and was across the widest part of my backside. I'm short (5'3) so a platform sandal was ideal at the end of the back when I was in flats the long back was dragging on the ground.
review_summary: breezy and casual for a hot sunny day

review_text:
This fits true to size.  The short part of the romper is high waisted which makes it look more classy.  It is very well made and I'm really picky about clothes.  This is
Actually the first RTR I wore after about ordering 4 different shipments.  Would rent again!
review_summary: Wore this to Gurneys Memorial Day wknd.  Tons of compliments. Sexy & well made.

review_text: Perfect length for flats if your a little tall and SUPER comfy, hugs you just enough to show off what you would want it to. The cut out just below the bust is super sexy but still conservative...and the wide straps allow you to wear it with virtually any type of bra. This dress is a must!
review_summary: I want to buy this dress!

review_text: Had rented in blue and white already, but especially loved it in red. Worked really well with my coloring!
I got a large, but it was a little too big, not so much that it was a problem because it has a nice waist tie. It was perfect for a day out in Miami!  Would rent again for a sun dress type of thing.
Fit was a little boxy.
review_summary: Wore this on a beach vacation and it suited the occasion. Easy, breezy!

review_text: I rented this dress an an after-party outfit for a wedding I attended in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. It exceeded my expectations and fit like a glove! I felt confident, sexy and beautiful. The small sheer/wrap detailing added to the look and fit of the dress. The length was perfect as well as the overall tightness. I would 100% wear this dress again, I didn't want to give it back!  Thanks RTR for always making me feel and look my best!

This was my first jumpsuit - it was so cute and comfortable.  I just had one issue - I am small chested and felt like I didn't have enough to hold up the top.  As I was dancing the night away I kept having to yank on the top to keep my bra from showing. I would definitely rent again if I didn't plan on a long night of dancing.
review_summary: Feeling adorable but still having pants and pockets!

review_text: Fun floaty dress. Only wore it for a short time to drinks but it was totally unique. and comfortable. It was a little long on me as I am 5' 3" but that did not bother me as it was less 'full' and more narrow.  Stand out dress, good for tiki party, summer wedding or vacation.
review_summary: LOVE the pattern! Head-turner and sleeves are on trend.

review_text: The dress is all sequins and very fun to wear. I felt for a medium it was a bit smaller as I had to squeeze into it  and felt it pulled in a few places but still a fun dress for a night out in Vegas.
review_summary: Great for a night out in cold weather!

review_text: Runs big, I order a size up for a backup size but probably should have ordered a size down. It looks really cute on. I wore it with wedges and received lots of compliments!
review_summary: Wore it on the plane and during the day of my first day of vacation.

review_text: The straps were too long and kept falling down so I was unable to wear this dress. It wasn't very fitted throughout the waist either, making it very unflattering. The pattern and colors were beautiful though!
Runs large, normally wear a Medium and ended up wearing the Small and it fit perfectly!
It would be a lot of fun to wear dancing. Like some other people have mentioned it is a little loose seeming in the stomach area, but it doesn't look bad enough for others to notice.
review_summary: This is a very cute and fun dress to wear!

review_text: I thought this dress was gorgeous in person.  It flowed beautifully and was very high quality.  I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 because it is very tight at the waist - definitely not what a typical size 14 would be in that area, and it also sat higher than my true wast, which I don't think is evident in the product photo.  Overall it worked great though and i would definitely recommend!
This dress was gorgeous. It's 2 layers - the outer one being a chiffon. Snug at natural waist but then lots of comfy room for hips/butt. I am 5'6" and wore flats and it was perfect length.
I wore this over an all black outfit for a night out in Las Vegas.  It made the outfit!

This dress is a real head turner, which was exactly what I wanted for a night out in Vegas. The color is beautiful (has a pinkish tone) and the neckline sits just right to show off just a little cleavage so that it you still feel and look classy. I received compliments all night- mostly from girls. It also hugged my curves nicely but was loose enough to dance in comfortably. I would definitely recommend this dress for night out on the town.
review_summary: Perfect dress for a Vegas Vaca

review_text: Loved this dress! was a bit snug though the hips, but the waistline was very flattering. Thankfully there is a small snap at the bust to make sure the top stays in place. Would definitely suggest sizing up for anyone with a B cup or larger. The color and quality were beautiful!

This dress is so beautiful, and fit me so well. I know for a fact that it was seen on the runway recently, and currently being sold for $1800. It is a midi length and was a bit long on me, but I wore ridiculously high heels so it worked. You will definitely be seen in a crowd in this dress as it is a bright, beautiful cherry red and almost costume like. The details on this dress such as the dramatic long sleeve and the button detailing make it a one of a kind dress. If you are looking for a dramatic entrance, then this is the dress to try!!

I rented a M with a S backup size.  The M was the winner - I usually wear a size 4 or 6 in dresses (weigh 135#, 5'5").  The dress was short but not too short.  Didn't realize that there was a slit in place of a zipper on the back of the dress.  You CANNOT wear a regular bra with it bc it will show.  Super comfortable, had some bulky points around the hems probably from excessive wearing and all the sequins.  Would rent again!
review_summary: I rented this dress for my bday trip to Vegas.  It was perfect - had the glam and great fit.

review_text: I love this dress! The fabric is super shimmery in person. The sheer panel in the back upped the sexy factor. I was worried that the dress might be a little short, but it hit mid-thigh, which was perfect. I wore this for dinner in Vegas and got compliments from strangers!

Really cute, slim fitting around the legs and a bit loose in the midsection. Tight around the bust/arms but I also am very athletic. got lots of compliments. thought i would maybe wear this to a wedding but much too fitting and short.

I rented this romper for a girls' trip to Nashville. It was perfect! It is so flattering and I got lots of compliments. I loved that it hugged my body a bit more on the bottom than other rompers - definitely will show off your figure! The cinched waist was another plus. I found it fit true to size. If you are in between sizes, I would recommend going down for a back-up as I tend to go between a 2 and a 4 and wore the 2.

The color is great and this dress allows you to be casual but smart because of the fabric. I loved this dress and would consider buying. I took it on vacation and it also packed well, doesn't hold wrinkles.
review_summary: This dress is lightweight and easy.

review_text: Perfect dress a subtle statement. I rented this dress for a get away to Palm Springs and it was easy to pack and great for a nicer dinner out. The dress was flowy and not too form fitting which left me plenty of room to eat at dinner. The 2 would have been a little too over sized but I would recommenced sizing up for back up as this dress was pretty fitted around the rib cage. I loved the mid calf hit on my 5'7" frame. There were some slits up the side which is hard to see in the photo but it made walking easier. The silk fabric was soft and fit perfectly into my carry on. I would totally rent again for a wedding or another event!  If its still cold where you are you could pair it with a thin turtle neck underneath.

I rented this for a dinner and night out dancing for my vacation to Cuba. It was very cute and it generally fit, but it was so tight it was too much of a process to get on and off that I didn't end up wearing it. It is very cute though, and because it did fit (it was just difficult to breathe in) I don't know that I would recommend sizing up if you're just getting one like I did for Unlimited rental, just know that it's not comfortable.

True to size.  Dress fit well and very stylish.  I wore it on my trip to Richmond and received compliment after compliment.   The only thing I didn't like about it was the string belt that was attached.  I would have preferred to pair one of my skinny belts with the dress.  I will rent this one again.
review_summary: This dress was a perfect match for the extremely hot day.

review_text: The pre-rental experience was fabulous.  The rep was able to extend my rental period because I was going on a cruise and I needed to rent an extra couple of days due to travel.  The dresses arrived(size 4 & 6) as expected, and I was SO HAPPY that the 4 fit(been on a fitness & eating plan since January and I hit my goal!).  The dress was amazing; SO many complements and I felt like a million bucks.  My hubby was nearly speechless but repeated.  STUNNING, SPECTACULAR...what an ego boost and confirmation that I made the right choice in the dress and did the hard work on my body to get where I am today.  The return was easy and seamless.  WILL RENT  AGAIN AND AGAIN!!!
review_summary: Hit it out of the park!  Thanks RTR!

review_text: I rented this dress for a night out in Vegas.   This dress was very thick and comfortable.   The material is great on this.    The  vneck and cutouts on the side show just the right amount of skin.  Through a night of dinner and dancing I was comfortable the entire time and never felt I needed to adjust the dress at all.   I was able to wear a regular bra with it which is a plus!
review_summary: Comfortable dress that shows just the right amount of skin

review_text: I ordered this dress as a backup  option for vacation dinner plans and ended up not wearing it. It's a very pretty dress but incredibly simple. You would need to dress it up with accessories. Even with the slit, it's just a very basic black dress. The fit is true to size but I did need to wear a padded bra to fill out the top a bit more. It's more fitted at the waist but not clingy which is nice if you're worried about a tummy or any bulges.

Cute dress, great for a hot day as the fabric was really light. I wore this wine tasting in 90+ degrees. I managed to wear a strapless bra with it, I just had to pin it to the bra so that it didn't show. Great little dress!
Excellent quality dress which hugged in all of the right places! Wore 4" heels and the length was perfect!
Fits well, similar fit to other Herve. I could wear a regular bra with it, which was great!
Fully lined, with a thick-ish fabric. It is fitted through the waist, but wasn't too tight on the bust (I'm 34D).

I am between a size 0 and 2 and returned the 2 for the 0 as the bust in the 2 was a little large. I could not wear with flats but wore with heels for dinner and loved the look and feel. I received many compliments
review_summary: Beautiful dress for vacation. I am 5'5 so had to wear with heels but looked beautiful

review_text: Fit is really only having to do with the straps, everything else is completely flowy, the high neck was a bit restricting unless resettled before you sat but once adjusted stayed put.  The front is VERY easy to blow open, just FYI.
review_summary: Felt amazing on - perfect for a lovely dinner in Miami

review_text: This is a beautiful dress. It is unique and comfortable. I go the Medium because the Small was not available and the medium is a little big on me. If you are a 6 I would get the small. I am very tall and it is a great length on me. I think if you were short it might hit you in a unflattering spot.

This dress was comfortable to wear and very cute/summery/nautical. I wore it to dinner on vacation. It wrinkles pretty badly, so have an iron handy! The open back/tie is a fun detail. I would rent this again.

This dress is definitely BRIGHT! The colors are even more vibrant in person than online. I also wore a black Spanx cami underneath because the cutouts didn't feel that flattering (the one in the back was like, "Hello, here is my back roll"), but the dress itself was light and fun. It is fully lined, which surprised me, so it can definitely be dressed up. Taller girls beware: I am 5'2" and was able to wear the 10R with flats. I paired the dress with the Kendra Scott coral earrings, which provided an extra pop of color (not that I needed it!). I would definitely rent this again for a weekend in Palm Springs or something similar.

I love, love, loved this dress! So easy breezy and lovely.  I wore it for my shopping/pamper day for my 40th birthday in Nashville, and also for a dinner in San Diego with my co-workers at a meeting.  I got so many compliments both wears on the vibrant colors and the drape of the dress. I wish I could keep it! It is sophisticated and playful at the same time.  I did not belt it and still loved how it looked. Wore it with suede-y, fringe heels for the dinner and gladiator sandals for the daytime wear.  Definitely ran a smidge big.
review_summary: Was perfection for two different occasions!

review_text: The dress was comfy, flattering, and i got rave reviews about it! I"m tall, and the length was still perfect - none of my assets were showing. I wish I could buy it outright. Perfect dress!
review_summary: This dress arrived without a wrinkle, packed beautifull & hugged my curves in all the right places!

review_text: Definitely rode up a little but less than other rompers. Was great because it accommodated my butt which is usually tough to do. Was very short though!
review_summary: I loved this piece. It was glam, sexy and utterly Vegas.

review_text: Great dress! It is fit through the hips, but is very forgiving for apple shaped girls! It photographs well, and everyone complimented me on it!! I rented the dress for a formal date night in Vegas! I LOVE this dress!

I LOVED the way this dress fit in the top! I didn't even need a bra. Straps are adjustable. I felt so fun and pretty in this dress! My only con would be the length. I wore this for a night out on vacation. We did a lot of walking and I wanted to wear flats. It was so long I was forced to wear wedges. My feet were killing me the next day. beautiful dress though. I would rent again!

the vivid color of red pops up. I wear 34B bra and rented size XS. I love this romper but I felt like my bust was too small for this romper. It will fit more nicely to someone who has bra cup size, at least full C, D or up. the material was heavy too. other than these two factors, I loved this romper!

Super cute and comfy dress. Rented this for vacation to Palm Springs. While it does fit large in the body, I have wide shoulders and didn't have an issue with my normal size. Loved the dress! It's very versatile!

This was not my most flattering angle, but it was a quick snapshot.  I found another girl in the same hotel in Vegas wearing the dress!  When her drunk friend called me a b**** (for wearing the same dress?  idk), I ran over and asked the gal if we could take a pick (kill 'em with kindness).  For the fit, I am normally an 8, I'm 5'2 (short) and this 4 worked well.  If they'd had a 6, I would have maybe liked that, but it was not an option.  The straps were borderline too long for me being a shorty, but the dress did fit well.  Again, above was not my most flattering angle, but I felt cute and had a lot of fun wearing this number.  Lessons: 1) it's a popular dress, and if you're in Vegas, you might see your twin; 2) it runs small compared to your usual size, so go one or two sizes down; 3) if you are short, the straps might be too long.  Enjoy!

This was an amazing dress!  It required another person to zip me into it…but once zipped up…it was perfect.  If you have big boobs they will be squished but will look good regardless.  This dress is everything you want  a dress to be. Tight in a way that makes it sexy but floaty and flirty in a way that allows some room as well. I want to buy this dress.
Received lots of compliments. This is a beautiful dress that is very comfortable and perfect for hot weather.

Who doesn't love an über girly dress complete with pockets?! It was pretty low in the front and a little snug around the ribcage. I especially love the back of the dress, I'd say that was my favorite part.
na
Loved the dress, but if you have a pooch belly, you might want to skip this one. Also fabric looked a list cheap to me.
review_summary: Not flattering if you have a mommy pouch.

review_text: First of all, this thing was literally rolled up and packed in a backpack - and it came out looking great! I didn't have to do anything. Put it on, added some super cute Tori Burch flip flops and went to the casino. I felt great. the dress has elastic in the perfect place to suck in your belly and I felt island-y and breezy with the off-the-shoulder look. I highly recommend this dress. It's easy and looks amazing.
review_summary: Spent the weekend in the Bahamas - traveled by boat with only a backpack!

review_text: This dress is really unique. I rented it for Vegas, because it's totally different from anything I own. I really enjoyed wearing it, and felt very fashion forward. It's also very comfortable.

I wore this without a bra and it was pretty supportive and not too revealing. Just a little sexy. Completely perfect for Monte Carlo, Monaco. Fabric is thickish and that is great as it hides the  flaws.
The 4 fit fine but the 6 would have fit a little better length-wise.  This was a super fun and sexy look to wear out in Las Vegas.
review_summary: A fun alternative look to the cocktail dress.

review_text: I wore this dress out multiple nights in Mykonos and Santorini. This is the perfect dinner and clubbing dress - stretchy and comfortable (room for pasta and gyros, as well as busting a move!). I'm 35-26-37 and normally wear a 4. The S fit snugly, with the bodycon effect I wanted. The print is gorgeous and lush in person.
review_summary: This dress was perfect for my honeymoon in Greece!!

review_text: I rented this for a beach weekend and wore it out to dinner and drinks with wedge sandals. It was very comfortable. I wore the 10R because it looked better a little loose and flowy even though the 8R fit. I am usually an 8 in this brand. Would rent again!
Perfect to transition from day to night and so comfy
I wear a 10-12, the medium was plenty roomy. I sinched it with a black leather tie front belt. It was perfect.
review_summary: Easy, breezy, comfy for caribbean beach wedding

review_text: The 4 was a little big on me (especially in the chest) but the 2 wasn't available. It was too pretty to send back so I wore it anyway.

I ended up not wearing it only because the group and outings were super casual and it actually got pretty cold.  I did not have the right tops to layer and make it look nice without being either overdressed or freezing.  Other than that, I loved it.  The item itself was great.  My timing for the rental was just way off.  :(
review_summary: It was very cute and flowy.

review_text: This dress is very comfortable! Its light and airy, but not see thru. This is a midi dress length with thin spaghetti straps. The tie waist gives the dress some shape on your body.  I ordered the 38R and it fit me well (I'm very petite). You could go bra less or use a strapless bra. I would recommend for vacation or a causal event!

This dress is more beautiful and stunning in person.  I received the most compliments from this dress than any other dress I've rented.  I'm seriously thinking about renting it again for las vegas although I just wore it.  Seriously a show stopper.  Fits perfect and if you want a more classy look you can even go up a size for a less snug fit and a tad longer.
Loved this coat, highly suggest it. Dressed it up and made it more casual, worked both ways.

This was a great dress, I loved that I could wear a normal bra with it, it was short, but I didn't find it crawling up. Probably could have worn the small, but it would have been very short. So much fun, I would totally rent this dress again.

I love how fitted this dress is. I would have worn a small had it been available. I rented a similar dress by the same designer and wore it in a small.  I definitely recommend renting a backup size if available though.
review_summary: This brand is amazing! Very fitted! Definitely a dress to wear if you want to be in the spotlight =)

review_text: Gorgeous dress with very pretty embroidery. I wore it all day, but even at 5'4" and a size 8 it was a bit short and tight. I felt like my chest was a bit smashed. I would size up. It's just a straight line, so not great for complimenting curves.
review_summary: Beautiful dress, just not for my body type

review_text:
true to size with enough room in the arms to wear a sweater.
Yes,the belt is heavy,but it ensures the jacket fits snug on your hips!
got lots of compliments !

Flexible shape, able to sit comfortably. Compliments left and right; the dress was classy  with a hint of sexy from the slit. Recommending this one to anyone with an athletic build! Compliments arm tone with the neck line.
5'5, 140lbs, 34C/28/36- fits great!

Absolutely love this romper - so much so that I've rented it twice! The color is gorgeous and the fit is very flattering. I paired it with simple gold jewelry and gold clutch. Definitely recommend it!

I love this dress! When I saw it I immediately wanted to wear it. It's cute, fun and festive; however, it's very top heavy. I ended up wearing the x-small because of the length (I'm 5'7 and it was mid-thigh). I didn't get it a full 5 stars review because I felt a little bit uncomfortable wearing the dress - I kept adjusting because it was either too high or too low on my shoulders/chest!

Quite form-fitting. Solid structure though - a head-turner. I will caution that the dress I wore appeared to have pulls at the seams when it arrived.  Overall the look was good, but the seams around the hips looked worn out.
review_summary: Great dress, very short and form-fitting.

review_text: super comfortable, cute, stylish. perfect for thanksgiving since a jumpsuit and not a dress and easy to sit on floor when the family takes all the chair space. love this jumpsuit! dressy but not overdressed.
review_summary: this was a great thanksgiving outfit

review_text: Wow, I have literally never had some many people compliment and ask where I got a dress. The dress is absolutely gorgeous. The structured top and interesting sleeves really compliment the full bottom. If I could, I would buy this dress. Love love love!
review_summary: I have never received more compliments than when I wore this dress! It was a show stopper!

review_text: I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas.  I was not a huge fan.  First, the pros: the beading is beautiful and it is definitely built for someone with curves.  Cons: the lining would NOT stay put.  The class and elegance of this dress was lost on me because I was constantly tugging on the two lining layers.
Neutral dress, goes with everything. Wore to brunch. I have rented it twice, two years apart. Cute for transitional fall weather.
review_summary: This casual dress is really comfy

review_text: I lovvvvved this dress. I wore it to celebrate my 30th bday in Vegas and felt so sexy in it. Chose to wear it on a cool night where we were hitting up lounges more than club so I was never overheated. I easily could have gone bra-less with it as it is very fitted and will hold the girls in, but I happen to own a special strapless/backless bra that went perfectly with the dress. My only minor complaint was that the neckline is high and occasionally itchy due to sequins. But I would buy this dress in a heartbeat.

This was the perfect dress for dinner out on vacation in Mexico.  The materials had stretch and was very comfortable, so it will show off your curves without being too tight.  The cutout and slit were sexy but not too revealing, and it's a great dress for those of us with a larger bust!  I paired it with cream accessories.  I would definitely rent it again; in fact, I regretted sending it back too soon.  I'm an Unlimited subscriber, and there were two more summer events I could have worn it to!

The fit and quality of this dress makes it one of my favorite RTR rentals. The cut of the top is so flattering. I wore a strapless bra, but probably could have gotten away without one b/c the fabric is thick. The blue is vibrant and so fun. Probably wouldn't be great for outdoor heat as the dress is fairly thick. Such a fun dress to wear! I would definitely rent again.
This is a cute dress.  It is a little "blousy" in the middle.  The pockets are great and it's a perfect length.

This shirt was adorable. i wore it to work with a nice pair of slacks. I also wore it out on a date with some shorts. I traveled with it and it packed very well, no wrinkles. I got lots of compliments and loved the fit.
review_summary: Loved having this on vacation with me.

review_text: This was such an amazing choice.  It was a tad heavy so I constantly had to pull it up a bit to avoid the v-neck from dipping a little too low.  With that said, the material was amazing for hiding curves.  I felt it showed my shape in a good way and smoothed out the excess curves that make me a little self conscious.  Overall I loved the dress and the color was absolutely perfect and fun to wear out!
review_summary: A beautiful dress for one epic night!

review_text: This dress worked perfect to throw on during beach vacation.  Was easy to wear with or w/out a belt.  Very light weight and comfortable.  Would rent again.

The dress was super comfortable with a great neck line. It wrinkled a little bit when you sit down but wasn't too bad. The material is thicker which makes it look structured. It is a little big in the bodice area, but it sort of goes with the flowy theme. Great with flats or a pair of sandals. Perfect summer white dress.

No cons, this dress is GORGEOUS.  I took it to Newport Beach to celebrate our fifth wedding anniversary.  It was perfect!!!  First time RTR user and I was very pleased.  I had one small issue with the In Reverse Pearls which I rented to pair with the dress.  One was broken (internally - the locking mechanism).  RTR customer service handled it beautifully and I will definitely be a returning customer.  Love this dress, love this concept!!  Also, the new travel satchel is beautiful and elegant.  Cheers!
review_summary: I felt like a million dollars in this dress!!!

review_text: I rented this for a cruise and loved the fit and the feel but I the end chose a dress that was a little lighter but I would Rent this again. I'm 5'10" and usually wear a size 6 the Long medium was perfect!
review_summary: Loved it but it is heavy

review_text: I rented this dress to wear out to dinner and a show in New York City. It was incredibly comfortable and looks polished and fun! The color is a gorgeous true red and the ruffle at the top was the perfect addition. I rented an 8 and a 10 and ended up wearing the 8, and probably could have worn a 6. I am 5'2" and 140lbs with a smaller waist and large hips. The pockets were handy, too! This could be dressed up with heels and some jewelry, or dressed down for a more casual event.

This dress was awesome for a fun night out at a Vegas club. I ended up wearing the 4 for comfort- a little big in the bust area for me but easier to walk and breathe in! This was just a fun dress- I loved wearing it.

Rented this for a beach vacation and loved the pictures online, however had two issues.  
one--the romper worn by the model in photos doesn't appear to have a sheer midsection.  Much more visible in reviewer photos, but didn't see this until after the fact.
two--normally i wear small or medium, but both sizes were too short for my torso...would not recommend if you are tall or have a long torso
review_summary: Not the best choice for tall girls

review_text: I've worn other sequence dresses but this one was unlike the others, comfortable around the underarm area.  usually the sequences rub against my skin and hurt at the end of the night but not these.  the color is very flattering like a golden pinkish, wore it with golden/glittery/crystal stilettos, a gold bangle and gold hoops, no necklace.  looks great on pictures and is a head turner for sure.  My husband said it is a very pretty dress and that I looked elegant.  So if your thing is to show your curves, this is not the dress.
review_summary: Great for Vegas, formal event or a night in the town.

review_text: The fabric for this was a lot heavier than I thought. The size 6 was a little big in the hip area but I thought that the 4 might be too tight. It looked cute on, but due to the heavy material it may be a little warm for my vacation.  Had to wear with 3-4 inch heels.
Reversible!
review_summary: Cute but runs HUGE! Looks like a size 8 or 10 on me.

review_text: Rented this for my European vacation this summer, as well as for my sister-in-law's baby shower. Compliments every time, and the detail on this dress is spectacular. It may come across as a "loud" print, but it is really spectacular. Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Incredible detail, extremely comfortable and forgiving.

review_text: I wore a size 10,  this is my first piece from "Free People" brand that i've ever worn but it fit me perfectly and was so comfortable! I'm 36b/c, 31-32 inch waist, 39 hips. I loved this dress so much I bought it.

This was a great sexy short (it's pretty short) dress for Vegas! You will definitely need fashion tape to keep up the shoulders. The sequins give the dress enough weight to keep the hem straight (I also rented this silhouette in a different pattern and the hem didn't lay right).
review_summary: I was able to dance the night away, stay comfortable and feel sexy!

review_text: I love this sweater.  It's so cozy and cute.  Perfect winter/fall staple piece

I wore this to a nightclub in Vegas. I ordered an 8 with the 10 as my back-up size. I ended up wearing the 10. The dress does have a lot of stretch, but it is cut small through the butt/thighs. It was a fun dress to wear, but I felt like the fabric  did bunch/ride up as I walked.
It was absolutely gorgeous and a very flattering fit. It runs true to size-- straps are adjustable.
Fit perfectly
review_summary: Loved this romper.  One of my favorites for sure!

review_text: The fun print of this dress made it great for a summer date night in Charleston, SC. It had great structure and although others said it could be too short, I loved the length. It was a great dress to put on and go, no fuss. I would rent it again!
flattering, and very soft comfy fabric

Beware, you'll get stared at all night! The dress was true to size. Just remember sequins aren't forgiving, so you can feel a tad self conscious with the mid-section, but it's a very fun dress to wear! It really was the perfect dress for Vegas. The other girls with me both got their dresses from RTR and we decided to have a sequin night!

This dress fits great! The straps in the back make it super adjustable. It is a bit bulky to pack for vacation, but even jammed in my suitcase it came out looking close to perfect! It was a really versatile dress - could be dressed up with heels or worn casually with a jean jacket. Any way you wear this dress, it is simultaneously fun and elegant - would rent again!
This romper was a great fit - especially for larger bust. You will need fashion tape to ensure it all stays together on top.

I rented this dress for one of the formal nights on a cruise to Alaska. The size 6R was way too small - and the top clasp on the right shoulder was missing. I was lucky the 6 did not fit because I did have time to have the clasp repaired and the dress cannot be worn without it. The size 8L fit well, but was long and dragged a bit on the floor, which was not convenient on a rocking ship. Other than these minor issues, the dress was gorgeous, comfortable, and I got compliments on it all night long. It provides full coverage, and I did not need to wear a bra. You will love this dress!

This was one of my favorite rentals. I usually do not rent things twice also and loved it so much I am considering renting it again soon. I do not think the pictures do it justice and it is much more form fitting -cleavage! It is also a really nice thick material and was perfect for my winter birthday in Miami!
Bust is snug. No need to wear a bra - everything stayed put. I have a large rib cage so the band on the bodice was a bit snug but not uncomfortable.
review_summary: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress. So many compliments. Perfect to go day to evening!

review_text: The dress was very flattering, and fit like a glove. My only complaint was the bulging in the back and shoulder area.
review_summary: It was a girls weekend in Vegas to celebrate my bestie's 40th...

review_text: My new obsession!!! I am head over heels IN LOVE with this dress! Clover Canyon has always been one of my favorite designers on the site, and this dress was exactly what I expected. The scuba material is beyond comfortable while still fitting snug to my body. The length hit about mid thigh. I wore a sticky bra just because I prefer it but you can also wear a strapless bra. I also rented the KENNETH JAY LANE Cypress Cuff which is pictured. I did not want to take this dress off!!

OMG I'm obsessed with this dress.  It was so beautiful and comfortable and so easy to wear. I'm keeping my eye out for if and/or when it becomes a part of the clearance sale. It fits as it should... the only minor complaint is that the material is very simple and wrinkles easily. So be prepared to have a steamer/iron handy before you wear this beauty!

This Mara Hoffman Colorblock Midi Shift Dress is in size small. I love the bright colors. This dress could be worn on a summer vacation. This dress is body skimming silhouette and is a colorblock printed crepe which is sleeveless and has a square neckline this dress is good for a person who is tall.
review_summary: I got a lot of compliments.

review_text: i'm typically btwn a 2 and a 4, but always a 2 in rebecca taylor. this was extremely unflattering on me. i didn't find the neck to the tight. it was just massive. even if i got the 0 i think it wldnt have worked. i've worn other dresses in this tent-ish style and never had a problem, but this did not work for me. it made me look short and very pregnant. it is ok with a belt, but that isn't the look i'm going over.

It fit great on my chest but squeezed flesh through the cut outs in an unattractive way :( Also, it was an awkward length at mid calf.

I think this dress would look great on a taller, skinnier girl.

Also, it is a mint green, not white-ish as pictured.
review_summary: I didn't end up wearing this dress because the fit was a bit weird on me.

review_text: This tank was too heavy and not fitted enough. It wasn't very flattering.

This romper is really a fun piece for a multitude of occasions.  I personally rented one size up because I prefer one-piece outfits to have a little bit of a looser fit.  The pant length was perfect too.  You can definitely dress this up or down, but all-in-all a really chic choice!

This dress was lovely - very shimmery and a standout for sure. The length was great, but the liner on the dress kept riding up all night long, so that is my only complaint. Other than that, a great dress - comfortable and got compliments all night long!

Side note- I ordered the 10 as a backup, and it was obvious that the liner had been replaced with a different non-stretchy fabric, making the bottom of it fit much tighter than the 8 - so beware if you are ordering a size 10! I was a bit disappointed with that part of my order, luckily the smaller size fit me, but if it hadn't I would have been very upset.
Stretch waistband made these light and easy to wear. I'm usually a 6/8 and small was fine
review_summary: Fun pant to dress up or down.

review_text: I loved this dress. I got so many compliments and it was very comfortable. I wore a size larger than I thought I would because it was tighter than I expected. But I definitely recommend it!
review_summary: The dress is beautiful! The colors look amazing and it fits well. It runs a little small though.

review_text: There is no stretch to the dress but the medium fit just fine. Didn't wear bra with dress but it worked out. Felt great for a nice dinner!

This dress is very pretty! I wore it to a New Years Eve dinner in Vegas.  The 4 was a bit tight in the rib cage so I wore the 6 and it was big in the top. I had to use fabric tape in the v and pinned it in the back. However I loved the dress and how comfortable it was.

Love the color and design. It is very flattering.  Beware the button on the bust area kept popping open though (for bigger bust sizes).  It is also short which I didn't mind, since it was hot and sunny at Orcas Island.
review_summary: Wore it when we explored the Orcas Island

review_text: Personally wasn't too crazy about this dress. Pattern is fun, but does nothing for the girls upstairs. Looked kind of sloppy.
Easy to wear, comfortable, warm without being stifling. My husband adored it. Perfect with black tights and high heeled black booties. No jewelry needed.

The fabric is beautiful, but less vibrant than in the picture. It still made an impression though. The fit is very large. The only place it is fitted with no giveaway is at the top of the chest. I wore a 6 and was extremely comfortable, I could have worn a 4. At the time I wore it I was 5 months pregnant, so I tied the dress over the belly. Unfortunately it didn't give me a nice figure. I was a bit square with this dress. The dress is extremely long. With 1 inch heels it dragged on the floor. With 3 inch heels it would almost reach the floor. Still, I was glad I rented it with Unlimited.
I usually wear a size 4/6 but this was very large. The sleeves were too long and it puckered at the top whenever I sat down.
review_summary: It looked really chic going out to dinner in Vienna!

review_text: I wore this dress one night during my birthday trip to Paris.  It's a lot simpler that what I'd normally go for but I wanted something simple to showcase a statement necklace and this was perfect.  I'd definitely recommend wearing bold accessories and really glamming up the hair and makeup as well as wearing tall heels as I think it would look way too plain and boring without eye catching accessories.  The fit was a little strange, seemed very loose in the bottom half but maybe it's supposed to be that way.  The arms and shoulders were tight but the 0 which is my true size still worked out.  There are zippers on the sleeves which I didn't need to use at all.  The beginning of the zipper was itchy and poked my skin on one arm throughout the night.  I would have preferred no zippers on the sleeves at all.  Other than that though, fun dress for a night but not my favorite ever.

First, the leather smells amazing. The jacket is a good fit for petite women and kept me warm on a trip to Iceland. I probably could have gotten away with the small but the medium was very comfortable with layers underneath and I could snap it shut all the way up. Not boxy or too long, but it was heavier than I was expecting, which wasn't bad but something to keep in mind.
I'm 5'9 with a normal torso and it was too short to wear. If you're shorter than 5'8 I'd say you'd be perfectly fine wearing this. Fit is normal just isn't a romper that works for taller girls.
review_summary: Too short for tall girls, but very cute!

review_text: I wore the XS and it fit great. It's very form fitting and sexy.
review_summary: It looked amazing! I loved it.

review_text: Very comfortable dress, I would buy it if I could!  I think this is my favorite rental I've gotten from RTR and it's probably my 4th rental just this year so that's saying something.

Love this dress!! This dress is flirty, fun and very comfortable! Beautiful blue color and the lace with mesh deep V  is gorgeous. I used tape for my breasts...you'd probably be fine wearing  nothing if you're small chested.
Very comfortable, can be dressed up or down - quite versatile! Will rent again!

The dress is super cute! I think this dress looks a million times better for more petite girls with smaller frames. The material is pretty heavy and has some poof along with the sleeves. It's super adorable, but a size 10 has SO much fabric, it just looked like a tent on me. Strangely, though, it was a little tight up top. It cut into my armpit a little, but not too terribly bad. 
I planned to wear a thin belt to help with the tent-like look a bit, but I never actually got a chance to wear it out. Was going to be my 30th birthday dress at the beach, but I ended up getting ill which was a sad waste. 
Again, LOVELY dress, but I don't suggest it for a bigger body type that wears a 10. LOTS of fabric.
review_summary: Super cute dress, but not for my body type

review_text: This dress is simply fabulous - I definitely felt appropriately 'flashy' in Vegas wearing it - however, it does run slightly large...I ordered a small and a medium, and definitely could have used an XS, despite this the dress still looked great!
review_summary: This dress is beautiful and flashy!  Wore it in Vegas and received many compliments.

review_text: The dress fit nicely.  The color was beautiful especially if you want to stand out for a special occasion.
review_summary: The color made me stand out on my birthday.

review_text: I usually wear an 8-10 so I ordered this in a Large - it fit like a 14 so it runs really big.  It's got a nice loose cut that is very forgiving.  I'm going to get it in a Medium and see if that isn't a better fit for me.
review_summary: This dress runs really big - order at least 1 size smaller

review_text: The fit was excellent and sometimes a little shiny when there are bright lights, but overall a fantastic evening dress!
review_summary: It was a great dress, got so many compliments!

review_text: Loved this romper and if you are tall it will actually fit!! If you have boobs you might want to go up a size because this outfit does have a lot of cleavage. The best part is this is an easy outfit to dress up or down for the daytime or night! Great date night outfit!
review_summary: Perfect for a summer fun outfit!

review_text: Very well made, Trina Turk after all. You can dress it up or down, which was great for my vacation.  I love this timeless look with the color that will help you stand out.  1 piece of advice: I wouldn't recommend wearing it to a place you're going to eat a lot.

Rented this romper for a bachelorette in Miami and it was perfect! received tons of compliments - might have tried renting the 4 only because i have a long torso but thankfully the crotch didnt ride up as i was fearing.  Super cute and duper comfortable - was able to dance all night! Dresses up and down very easily!

Loved this jumpsuit but the fit wasn't ideal. The zipper doesn't go all the way down in the back and there is no stretch, so while I could've fit the small I couldn't pull it up over my hips/backside. The medium ran a bit big in the torso and the straps sometimes fell down from my shoulders. I had to wear a belt for it not to look too big. However, it is a really cute jumpsuit, and I got a lot of compliments.
review_summary: Cute jumpsuit but not perfect fit.

review_text: Well-fitting dress with lining.
review_summary: Dress was a little tight on the chest area, but at least you do not need to wear a bra with it.

review_text: I'm 5'8" so this definitely ran short but totally fine for vacation.
This is a phenomenal piece and looked fantastic, but I decided not to wear it because it was too tight for comfort. I will definitely be renting this again in a size 4 and can't wait to wear it!
review_summary: 5 star even though I couldn't wear it

review_text: Great detailing and quality. Perfect for my fall getaway in Montreal! Love it!!!

I loved this dress! Rented it for a night out in Las Vegas with my husband.  I normally wear a size 10 in dresses, but depending on fit sometimes a 12.  I want a dress that hides/slims my midsection. I felt so great in this dress.  the 10 fit great, but I wound up wearing the 12.  There wasn't much of a noticeable difference and the 12 was a bit more forgiving.  I liked that I could wear a regular bra with it.  The colors are vibrant, the print is beautiful, it was flattering to my body with a fun amount of cleavage for a night out in sin city.
Color is beautiful. I would love to keep this dress forever.
review_summary: Fit was beyond flattering, I felt super classy. Fabric was thicker than other Herve Dresses.

review_text: I wore this to a wine tasting weekend and I loved it. I needed a little bit of fashion tape to prevent a wardrobe malfunction, but otherwise the dress was totally comfy and I loved wearing it. I will rent this again, for sure.

I rented this just on a whim for a trip to a national park. The RTR stylist just reviewed my purchase history and used her stylist knowledge to pick the perfect size for me. I'm a little long, so it skimmed just over my wrists but it was not a problem. The quality of the jacket was superb. It felt and looked expensive. It wasn't cold where I was but I could tell by the lining it would be warm in a chilly situation. I styled it with jeans mostly. I did wear it over a dress with cowboy boots. I didn't want to give it back! This is 100% a fashion staple that I would purchase.

This overall has a stunning color and the cut is different! It was perfect for my vacation and had so much compliments from people when I wore it at the fair. Every woman (young and old) gave me so much compliments as the cut and design is so unique! Would rent it again!

Paired with white pants, you really can't go wrong with this top. I love DVF, and this was no exception. I'm busty and this fit perfectly. I felt very appropriate for work, and in the Hamptons the following weekend!
review_summary: I wore this on my first day of work! Huge hit.

review_text: This fit true to size. I'm 5'7" so I was torn between the regular and long size but went with the long and it fit perfectly. It was so comfortable but very flattering and stylish too.
review_summary: I wore this to a show so it allowed me to look great but be comfortable while sitting through it.

review_text: First, you can wear this dress either way. I choose high in the back and low in the front. This is very well made with all of the seams patterns matching. My only complaint is it kept ridding up. I loved that there was no other dress even close to the way this one looked.
review_summary: Very different from my normal style but felt great!

review_text: Super smooth silky material. Nice back. Loved the breathablility.
review_summary: Wore it twice it was so good!

review_text: It was flowy and roomy. But like most rompers, it takes a minute when you've got to unbutton every time you go to the restroom. I'm tall, and this was just on the verge of being too short in the torso, but I made it work. Super cute color and very comfortable.
review_summary: Perfect for relaxing in Central Park and our Circle Line tour of NYC.

review_text: Fit true to size
So fun! I would buy these in a heart beat if they ever become available for purchase!

This style is perfect for a tropical vacation! The style does run true to size and we recommend going one size up for backup. The fabric does have some stretch to it, allowing for a comfortable fit throughout the bust and midsection. A strapless or NuBra would work best for this style. At 5'8 I did find the length of this to be on the very short side, it fell about 5 or 6 inches above the knee. If you are over 5'7 I would be cautious length wise for this style. To complete this look I would recommend gold earrings and bracelets.
A little snug in the thighs. Modest length. Arm holes are big, so I needed to wear a slip dress under it. I was very happy with this little number!!!

Cute Fit! I ended up not wearing this dress because I was unable to wear a bra and my side cleavage was too much, not sexy. Super cute though! Ties around the next so it's adjustable, I would say you could wear a size smaller or your size due to the fit. would have been perfect for the beach, showers, or any summer occasion.

Loved the style of the dress.  But when I walked, it kept riding up--and it was very short to begin with--and I was in Vegas!  It was maybe a 1/2in from the bottom of my butt.  Keep in mind I am 5ft 10in.  Because of the length issues, I had to wear the large, instead of my usual medium size.
review_summary: Loved the body-con but too short

review_text: Hid my tummy! Loved it.
review_summary: Perfect for a day in Vegas!

review_text: I rented this dress as a backup for my engagement pictures. This was one of my first rentals and the size 6 was slightly big. I believe the 4 would've been more flattering on the curves. I'm a true pear with a big booty and felt very comfortable in this dress. I still wore the dress out to dinner and dancing. I would rent again at the smaller size.

Extremely flattering, but modest, for curves.  I always struggle with butt and boobs fitting in dresses, so it's great that the fabric is flexible and lightweight.  The skirt swishes as you walk, and the pattern is cheerful.  All around just a joyful, spirit-lifting dress!
review_summary: Just felt happy all day wearing this dress.

review_text: Very stiff fabric
review_summary: Was too loose in the thigh area but too tight on the ribs/waist

review_text: LOVED this top - didn't want to give it back. The only "con" - if you can call it that - is that it's super low cut and makes wearing a bra impossible. With that info in mind, don't order this if you aren't ok going braless! It is super flowy though and even as a 32 D  I had no issues going without :)  I paired it with a cute pair of green shorts and heels at a bachelorette party in New Orleans!
review_summary: Colors on this piece are incredible! So vibrant!

review_text: So many compliments!
review_summary: Gorgeous dress - great for a beach vacation

review_text: The fit was great. Loved the style and fabric, the length was a little long on me. If the hem was just a slightly shorter it would have worked. So I chose to send it back and look for something shorter.
review_summary: I sent it back before the event.

review_text: I loved this! It was fun and easy to wear (I wore it to boat party).  I would say it is a little tight on the hips/butt for those of us with a little more cushion there.  I am a tall 5'6 and the legs just hit the ground, so I wouldn't recommend a regular if you are looking to wear anything beyond a flat sandal or if you are taller.

I tried on the size 4 at the store and even that fit, so this is very generously cut. I went with the size 6 and wore it differently from the model - instead of putting the shoulder straps up, I slipped them beneath my arms - this made the dress have a less dolman-effect and was much cuter on me. Love this pattern, loved wearing something with a different style, and it was super comfortable (I wore it on a 16 hour flight).
review_summary: Definitely size down and the enjoy!

review_text: It was a great blazer to have on hand instead of a jacket/coat. Warm enough without being too bulky and added a bit of wow factor to simple dressed down outfits. I would def. rent this again!

How could you not love a beautiful dress that makes your legs look longer and your waist smaller?!? I thought it was a pretty pattern when looking at the pictures on the RTR website, but the material and pattern is much prettier in person.
Sadly, this dress is just way too long. I'm 5'4" and even with 4" wedges, it covered my entire shoe and dragged along the floor. I loved the dress so much, though, that I decided to purchase it through RTR Unlimited so that I could hem it to the right length.
review_summary: Prettier in person! But SO long!

review_text: I described the fit as true to size, but there isn't any give to this material so it is a close fit for me.  I usually have a bit of breathing room in a 6 but there's none here.  The dress is really pretty.  The lace and length make it a bit sexy but the sleeves and neckline keep it from being over the top.  Love it!  I've got to add this comment:  After wearing this for a day, I can honestly say that I've never had so many compliments on a day dress.....ever!  I'm probably going to buy this one!!
Love this shirt. Color is black and shirt is blue lace. It is a little tight in the arms but so beautiful that I suffered through it.:)
I rented this for a trip to Puerto Rico and LOVED IT!  Great fit and very versatile.  You can't go wrong with this one!

This dress was so fun and perfect for any event. I wore it to a 60th birthday party while I was on vacation and received tons of compliments. The fit is very flattering and the print was great. Would wear this dress over and over again if I could!
This dress was super comfortable and very flattering.
review_summary: This dress was super comfortable and very flattering.

review_text: The straps were a bit long, but it didn't bother me. I'm actually a nursing mom, so it make it easy to nurse in. I had a friend try it on who has a much flatter chest than me, and it's flattering on both body types (straps were loose for us both). Got lots of compliments on my photos about this outfit. Material is light and airy.
review_summary: Looked super cute in person and in photos.

review_text: The dress fit perfectly.  The fabric has some give so it was completely perfect to wear all day!  I styled it with gold flat sandals and an orange cardi.
review_summary: The whole process was flawless and fun!

review_text: I am IN LOVE with this dress! I wanted so badly to keep it for myself! I honestly wasn't sure about the dress at first because I am 5'9", small bust and curvy hips. But the dress fit like a GLOVE and I received so many compliments (rented a size 8)! Wore it out to a nightclub in Vegas and there was NO other dress like it! So many girls were touching the fabric of the dress and I received so many compliments! My friends said it looked as if "the dress were tailored for me". The top is a perfect fit, even with my broad shoulders and small bust - it actually enhanced the look of my chest! The bottom was fitting at my hips which kept the dress from riding up. I felt like GOLD in this dress and didn't want to take it off! Definitely a show-stopper and can't wait to rent again!
review_summary: I FELT LIKE A RARE JEWEL!!!

review_text: I'm 5'4" and this fit perfectly for my height. I wore semi-high heel booties and layered it with a black coat to complete the look as I took this with me to Europe for vacation. So comfortable to walk around with, plus it has hidden pockets in the hip area! Absolutely loved how gorgeous yet oh-so comfortable this was, I may have to rent again soon!

It wasn't until I shared this photo on social media of my cat photobombing me, that I noticed the design of the cat's face on the torso of the dress. This dress has a distinctive, deep cut of the armholes that accentuates the arms and shoulders. There's nothing wrong with the dress; the armholes aren't too big, as other reviewers have noted. It just might not be to everyone's taste. Wearing a bra that peeks out isn't bad; wearers should choose a lacy bra that's meant to be seen. The rayon fabric is cool and perfect for late summer, up into early fall with a sweater. I loved the dress and wore it twice. However, I saw at least a dozen of them on the clearance rack at a department store, while shopping with friends, which immediately cut the wow factor for me. It's Rent the Runway, not Rent the Clearance Rack.
I'm in LOVE with this dress. It is absolutely stunning in person and has such a cute flirty element to it. It is more orange than red, FYI
review_summary: The material and shape of this dress are fantastic

review_text: Great fit, I typically wear S but M worked for me (only size they had available). Only Con, it was very long.
I wear a 0-2 dress and this fits perfectly everywhere EXCEPT the bust.  Bustier gals - go a size up!
review_summary: Cute dress but I couldn't wear it!

review_text: Loose and comfy just as pictured. I'm usually a 10, but an 8 would have been better for this style. Did not wear, but not because of the fit. My skin tone didn't look good with the off white shade.

Something about Lilly shift dresses...even though I have a larger chest, I ALWAYS have to size down.  I'd recommend going down AT LEAST one size.  I feel like I could have done two and it would still have been cute.  That being said, great dress, very comfortable, would wear something similar again!
This dress was perfect for a night out in Vegas. I think the fit was great I am 5'6' 135lbs could have been a little bigger in the chest but overall it was great!
review_summary: I loved this dress from the moment I saw it!

review_text: The romper was great fabric and the 2 fit like a glove.  I could put the 0 on but if I lifted my arms, it was much too tight in the crotch area.  I prefer dresses/rompers to fit a little loser so the 2 was perfect.  I got a ton of compliments!  Wore to a beach dinner/dance.  I read reviews about the button being loose around the bust so I brought a safety pin just in case but ran into zero issues.
review_summary: Color was perfect for a beach party!

review_text:
This was my first time wearing a jumpsuit and I was not disappointed. For most clothes my upper body is a small or a size 6, then my lower body is a medium or a size 8 in women's. I have a large booty with wide hips and small waist. My waist is 27"  This fit like it was made for me. Fit my waist to a T. I wore a sticky bra and double sided tape for the sides. The fabric on the lower half of the body is thick and has good crepe texture to it. I danced the night away in this and everything stayed in place. 
**TIP you will need assistance from a friend to undo the hook and eye and unzip when you use the restroom. Other than that no complaints. I will be renting this again for sure, my husband wants me to buy it ;)   Had so much fun with this jumpsuit forgot to take a picture :( oh well I'll get one next time I rent it.
review_summary: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! Perfect for VEGAS felt so confident! Got compliments all night ;)

review_text: The waist was comfortable, the length was perfect. I have a large bust and needed to wear a bra, but the bustline showed any bra I tried on, so I just wore a cute bra and made it part of the look and it worked.
review_summary: Perfect mix of cute & comfortable for  a daytime date with my boyfriend in Miami

review_text: This was brand new when I got it, so it was perfect.  It dressed up all my casual stuff.  I wore it on a winter vacation for apres ski wear and then for dinner out.  It is fun and funky, looks great with skinny pants or leggings.  Runs a bit on the large size.  The medium was good for me because I like my tops on the loose side.  I really like this jacket.

I am 5'1, so I definitely need to wear high heels with this dress. With my heels, the dress is very flattering and I received many compliments for it. The material is thin and flows. The shape is very flattering - I tend to have extra weight around my waist, but this dress covers that nicely. I might try an XS next time, since is is a bit long and I have extra room up top. But still a lovely dress.
Easy to get on and off.

This sweater was a little bigger than I expected and I could have probably gotten away with a Medium.  I wore this on the first day of my trip to San Francisco from the plane, to walking around the city.  It was about 55 degrees and I wasn't hot at all.  It was the perfect weight without having to wear a jacket.  My only complaint is that it was already somewhat bigger than expected and then stretched a little.  Certainly comfortable, but I don't think I will rent it again.

I loved this dress, the fit was incredibly flattering as I have a short torso and the dress came in right at my natural waist. It was very comfortable to wear too which was great. I could see myself renting this one again.
amazing fit and went with everything i brought for a weekend getaway.  very comfortable and the lining is soft.

I took this on vacation for a fancy dinner out.  Very comfortable and very flattering. If you are curvy this might not work as well - very European cut. 
Gorgeous color.  Outside the restaurant received compliments! 
Will add this to my go to list.

I wore this dress to dinner on vacation in Key West.  It fit very true to size but has no stretch at all.  I wore it with no bra and it was fine.  I received many compliments but I felt like it wasn't very slimming.
i took this on vacation for my flying days and a few dinners out.  it was perfect and comfy

I ordered this dress at the last minute for a girls trip to Chicago.  It wasn't even my first choice but my firs choice wasn't available for the weekend.  So I "settled" for this one.  Oh my goodness, I LOVE this dress.  It was such a fun dress to wear, got loads of compliments and fits so well.  I was truly sad to send it back and spent the rest of the weekend googling where I could buy it!
The only downside to this dress is that since it has sequins all over it, your under arms may get a bit scratched.
review_summary: This dress sparkles and isn't too short. Great for a night out.

review_text: Such a comfortable, perfect dress for vacation dinners with a cute sandal or wedge.
review_summary: The green version of the red dress salsa emoji...

review_text: Fit perfectly, super comfortable, but you need boob stickies because with the back, you can't wear a bra.
review_summary: I felt amazingly sexy in this dress, I almost wanted to buy it for keeps.

review_text: Sheer but not see-through. Very low dip and keyhole in front, needs a thin nude bra. I wore this for an evening reception at a conference in Central America - it was the right mix of resort but still covered up/professional.
review_summary: Great resort dress for a little bit more coverage/cool evenings.

review_text: It is a cute dress, however, I rented it for vacation and could not take it with me because the bust area was very tight and uncomfortable.
review_summary: Too small in the bust area.

review_text: This dress is so figure flattering! It is super short and the cutouts in the skirt part can show your hoo-ha if you aren't careful. I wore a black slip under it. I love the plunging neckline on this. I am 5'8" and it was borderline too short for me, but I wore it anyway because the top part is so sexy. I loved this dress.
I'm 5'5", 130 lbs. and usually wear a size 4. The S was a little loose, so I wore the XS and it fit great. It was the perfect dress for a night out in Vegas!
review_summary: Perfect for Vegas! Sparkly and it fit great.

review_text: I wore this sweater for my recent Napa trip. Apparently I enjoyed the wine too much and forgot to take a picture. I'd say it runs true to size or perhaps a tad large. I paired the sweater with black leggings, brown boots and my Burberry scarf. Very cute.

This dress was so comfortable! The fabric was breathable and lightweight. The cut was perfect for a a growing bump. It was a little short when I sat down, but nothing that wasn't appropriate for the beach. Definitely recommend for any future mommas needing a good vacation dress!
No cons at all...very forgiving fit and a young fun look.
review_summary: This is adorable.  I got it brand new, and wore it with leggings and skinny pants.

review_text: unique print, stretchy material that is very flattering ,not too short
review_summary: My original dress was damaged do Madison helped me out by sending this unique dress

review_text: Very tight in hips for someone that doesn't have wide hips at all
review_summary: Very cute dress and fits nicely

review_text: Full disclosure, I didn't actually get the chance to wear this piece due to uncooperative weather, but it did arrive with the tags on! So, so cute. The fabric and colors are lovely. A little on the shorter side of length, but I'm short torsoed. As long as you aren't wearing ultra low rise jeans, shouldn't be a problem. Hoping to get to rent this one again.
Wore this for my bday dinner - I'm 5'3" and forgot heels so it was definitely on the long side since I didn't order the petite version. Really fun colors!
review_summary: Fun comfy dress for multiple occasions!

review_text: This was my mainstay evening wear during a vacation abroad this summer.  I wore it with simple leather thong sandals and sometimes a necklace.  The wrap style is very flattering.  I wore an XS only because the S wasn't available - and so it was a bit snug for me through the sleeves, but the bodice part was great.  Shows of the décolletage really beautifully.  I packed some wardrobe double sided tape which is nice for the plunging V of the neckline.  It kept it just in the right place and my bra didn't show.  The fabric didn't wrinkle very much, despite being repeatedly folded back into my suitcase as we went from place to place.  Wish I had photos - it is really a lovely piece!

Love this dress! Rented it to wear while having our pictures taken on vacation, loved the look and feel of the dress so much I had to buy it! I usually wear a 44 (8) or 46 (10) and went with the 46 which was a little big due to the stretchy material (the 44 was unavailable at the time). The 46 did fit since the dress does hug the skin but the sleeves were too long showing several wrinkles and it was looser in the thigh/knee portion but you wouldn't notice unless you looked for it. In all, I loved the way the dress feels, how comfortable it was to wear, and how beautiful it made me feel--I ended up buying the 42 (6) when I got home! It really is a perfect dress for any occasion!
review_summary: Perfect blue dress for any occasion!

review_text: This dress is great for a vacation / party / everyday look.  The bright color is perfect for that summer glow!  I paried with a pair of gladiator sandals.  I will say that at almost 5'8" the dress tends to be a little short, otherwise it's perfect!
The dress is so cute! It was perfect for a girls weekend to wear to brunch.
The cut is weird - wide and roomy in the top, but tight from the waist down, doesn't work if you are apple- or pear-shaped.

I had ordered another dress from RTR and when I got it, it didn't fit my bust. The stylists were super helpful and based on what I told them on my style, look and size, they overnight-ed me this romper. I was a bit weary because it looked sorta plain for a Vegas night out on the website but the stylist assured me that I would like it. She was RIGHT! I put it on, fit almost perfectly (a teeny bit to small in the bust but it worked out fine with some fashion tape) and it was super comfortable! I danced the night away and got so many compliments too. Only downside and why I gave it 4 stars, the buttons all down the back made it annoying to go to the bathroom in, so keep that in mind if you plan on drinking a lot lol.
The colors are not quite as vibrant as pictured, but very fashionable.  I got so many compliments on this.  Wore it Napa for a few wine tastings and it was just perfect.
Very comfy and super flattering. Loved the pockets, too! Hard to wear a normal bra, so ended up using silicon cups.
review_summary: Wore this to a nice dinner during a tropical vacation. Tons of compliments!

review_text: Cozy sweater with a cute neckline and very warm. Was a bit itchy for my liking, but it was a great underlayer for a chilly trip to Ireland!
The fabric looked softer in the picture. and they weren't as flattering as I was hoping.  I usually wear a 0 or 2, so I ordered the XS, but would have definitely needed the S.
Loved the fit and length. The front was a little low for me, so I had a strapless, shelf bra underneath. Many compliments.
Everything about this dress was great. Very forgiving cut, covers lots of problem areas while being very flirty and feminine.
review_summary: Wore this for the day sightseeing in Miami. Perfect.

review_text: This was a great shirt. I most likely could have went down a size but overall it was a fun shirt!
review_summary: Was a great shirt to pair with jeans and heels for a night out!

review_text: loved this dress. so comfortable. a smaller size probably would've fit my bust better. RTR didn't have my backup size available, so i wore the four anyhow. i wore this to a hawaiian event. in a sea of loud patterned dresses, this stood out. lovely! i wore with a strapless slip/bra and it worked just fine.

Great summer dress! Rented for a weekend girls trip to Asheville, NC and wore it when we toured the Biltmore and visited a few breweries.  Though it was a pretty hot and humid day and this dress was super comfortable for a lot of walking. It would be great paired with a jean jacket on a cooler night as well. Would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Comfy and cute! Perfect summer dress!

review_text: Lovely summer dress. Wore it with a denim jacket for a outdoor party in Wyoming in August and it was perfect. Really loved the pattern and colors and fit was great.

This dress was great!  I wore for a night out in Vegas.  It fit true to form, although it is a bit short, and somewhat difficult to bend over in.  It is lined with sweatshirt material, so it was like wearing really cute sweats out in public.  I would rent this one again in a heart beat.
review_summary: This dress was so comfortable, easy to wear and looks great!

review_text: I wore this to the Beyonce/JayZ concert in Chicago and it was perfect.  It was comfortable and classy!
review_summary: Gorgeous and comfortable, I got lots of compliments and felt like a million dollars!

review_text: Thick material so there weren't any lumps, bumps or lines. It really fit like a tailored glove.
Definitely recommend a slip underneath, as it is a bit see-through. It is incredible comfortable, lightweight, and very cute! Will 100% rent again.
review_summary: Wore it as a coverup on vacation, but also works as a dress!

review_text: First jumpsuit I've tried because of my height. This was perfect.  I'm 5'10" and rolled the legs slightly for a different look.
Absolutely very feminine and cool for Florida hot days! Perfect length, just above the knee, material was soft and not see through, the colors were subtle and it was just perfect.

The perfect comfortable spring / summer romper. The waist and shoulders were incredibly comfortable and the shorts were long enough for me too wear comfortably (I'm almost 6' tall). The floral pattern was pretty without being too girly and I received compliments all night long!
