I rented with my unlimited for vacation. I loved the bright and happy fabric! While we were shopping in Grand Cayman this dress was in the window of the Lilly Pulitzer store. My friends got a big kick out of that. I rented the XL because I thought I needed it for my large chest but it ran bigger than expected. It floated on my size 12, 36 ddd figure. I will definitely rent again but smaller. I did not need a bra as the fabric camouflaged well. It did run a little long so I couldn't wear sandals and had to wear wedges and I am 5'6".

Great dress!  Cute fit in that it is a shift dress but still flattering with a bit shorter length and lace on the back.  Dressed up with heels and wore as a more everyday dress with a cardigan and pink flats.  Loved and would rent again!
Very comfortable
Rented this dress on Unlimited for my trip to Portofino, Italy. It fit beautifully and was flattering and comfortable, even after eating a large dinner! I felt elegant and stylish.
I rented this dress for a Mexican vacation. its adorable very comfortable the fit is a little looser but I'm ok with that

Rented this for a trip to Greece.  The dress was flattering (slimming) and also sexy due to the back cut out.  It was also extremely comfortable and light weight.  Perfect for a sweltering cooking class followed by wine tasting and a Santorini sunset.
I got both a small and medium and could have worn either, but gave myself a bit more room with the medium. It was comfortable, easy to get on/off, and fun pattern! I got lots of compliments.
review_summary: It was my birthday and a 'free' dress from RTR made it more fun!

review_text: I wore this dress to a wedding and it looked fabulous!  I'm 112 lbs 34 B-C and the 4 fit the best.  The 6 was huge in the boob area.  The dress was a bit snug in the ribcage.  I would recommend hollywood tape as the straps are not adjustable.  I accessorized with a triple strand of pearls and black peep toe pumps.  Material was interesting and it did not wrinkle.  The dress was a hit!
This dress runs small and is tighter than I expected.. but it's beautiful and I love the open back! It is short (especially when sitting down).
review_summary: Very pretty.. Not as bright as the picture though

review_text: This is so incredibly flattering on! Perfect length and reveals the right amount of cleavage. Not terribly easy to get on and off but no need to take a friend to the restroom. Will rent again!

The dress is beautiful, trouble is it's extremely fitting but not slimming.  It's not tight like spanx.  The color block makes for a great front view but if you have a rounder mid section this dress is not forgiving when you turn to the side.  I rented two dresses for Vegas and went with the second.  Beautiful dress just not the right fit for my body.

This dress was stretchy, so while it gave me room for the girls and the caboose, I wish it would have been a bit tighter to highlight more of my hourglass.   In hindsight I probably should have gone down a size.  But super fun and certainly eye catching.
review_summary: Fun to sparkle and catch the light.

review_text: So cute!  Unfortunately it didn't quite fit in the back-- a bit too snug to zip up and button around the neck
review_summary: Didn't end up wearing it as it was a little too small/ difficult to zip up

review_text: Fit great - try to size
review_summary: Great Fun Outfit- packed easily in carryon

review_text: This dress is a winner! I felt amazing in it and received compliments all night from complete strangers. I ordered a 2 and it fit perfectly. It is short but, we were in Vegas so you have to dress for it! The back is beautiful and is a great statement compared to the front. I read a few reviews had issues with the shoulders staying up, but I just put a little fashion tape on each side and didn't have one problem with it. I highly recommend this dress should you want to feel and look gorgeous!

This dress is an easy wear, goes with many types of shoes. The pattern was so neat, got many compliments. Most importantly, there was not tightness anywhere, just a nice flowy dress. The high/low cut made is so modern and young.
review_summary: Perfect for a sunny spring birthday!

review_text: Fit was tight around chest and also difficult to wear with bra but fabric was amazing. It stretched a bit but was not sheer. I wore this for dinner in the cayman islands. I felt beautiful as it was very sexy but classy. Boyfriend loved it.
review_summary: Elegant little white dress - Flattering fit & Stylish

review_text: Super comfy and easy to wear. It's a mini dress so if you don't like short, this won't be for you. The back is completely sheer, so no bra should be worn with this. The sheer parts are made with a stretchy and breathable material. I have larger shoulders and biceps compared to my size and I always struggle with sleeves on XS garments, but these were very comfortable!

This dress is beautiful and I really wish I could have worn it! It fit really well up top and I am a 34B - but my thighs are bigger and the dress looked awful on me. Size up if you have bigger thighs on this one because it is very very fitted at the bottom.
review_summary: This was a dress I was planning to take to Vegas.

review_text: Runs a little tight in the bust!
review_summary: Super comfortable - got a ton of compliments on it!

review_text: I loved this dress when I tried it in the store, didn't love as much when I wore it. I wore it for a nice dinner out in Costa Rica, which in hindsight is way too casual a place for this kind of dress. The M was the right size for me for the most part but I had to size up due to a big ribcage. I think the larger size made it feel a little sloppy when I looked at it later in pictures.

The boning didn't bother me because I ordered a size up!  If the boning bothers you, it's TOO TIGHT.
It's a quick polished look.  Very glam.  I loved it!
I wore this dress for a dinner out on vacation.  The skirt is tight which creates a cute shape and contrast with the more forgiving top.  I got lots of compliments on this one!
I loved the colors and how comfortable it was, however it ran a little large. I would recommend going down a size!
review_summary: I wore this dress for my 1 year anniversary! It was everything I wanted and more.

review_text: Cute jacket but fits terribly.  Sized up based on reviews that the bottom is tough to zip in your size, but when I received, there was no way the bottom would come close to zipping, though I had sized up, and the top looked messy and unpolished because it ran so large on top and I had sized up.  Basically, unless you have massive shoulders and no butt and hips, this isn't going to fit you well.
review_summary: Love the look of the jacket but the fit is ridiculous.

review_text: it was adorable
So much fun in person and the fit was more flattering than I thought it would be.
Lots of compliments. Beautiful blue green color. Very flattering flow.
review_summary: Paired this with white jeans and it looked great!

review_text: Cannot believe I fit in the XS. I squeezed into an XS and it looked great. Normally wear a 2-4 but was running closer to a size 4 for this weekend get away.  Once I got in the dress (needed assistance) it fit great, very comfortable, and looked awesome.

I wore this dress for a night out on the town in Vegas. The Large definitely was more comfortable since it is a tighter dress, more of a bandage style. It's very sassy and flirty, a very fun dress. It was on the shorter side but I was still covered up. I thought this dress was great, although the fabric isn't that special and it's thicker so it keeps you warm.
review_summary: Perfect for Vegas or going out

review_text: Bodice is a little tight, and I'm small-chested. But I was still able to wear it without a bra. The long flowy skirt was just beautiful!
review_summary: Loved the dress! Very elegant without being over-formal

review_text: I loved this sexy, yet classy dress.   It fit true to size, was the perfect length, and was so flattering.  I loved the comfort and chic look of it!  SO many compliments.  The material is so rich.  Perfect!

It was a lovely material, super comfy. However, it did fit very large on me... extremely. The color is beautiful (perfect for fourth of july) and the material was nice and breathable so it wasn't hot at all. I thought it would have been perfect if not so large and also the strings used to tie the dress around the neck just aren't very functional.
I wore a M because they didn't have a SM, I wish they would have had a small. I was way too big.  Looked baggy. It was the right length though and was super cute! Would recommend if the right size.
I loved this dress - it was so easy to wear and pack for vacation. At 34DD, I often have trouble with the gap between buttons popping open, but no problems at all with this dress.
Got many complements.  I wore it with tights and boats.  Very flattering fit.  Runs a bit large but still looked great.  I would consider buying this

I received this dress as one of my backups and ended up wearing for an event. It was a lot sparkly than I expected (no complaints about that) and my friends loved it. The low back is beautiful. I went with a 6 because 4, although it fit, would've been too short. I wasn't a big fan of the shoulder pads, it made my shoulders look pretty wide. Otherwise, beautiful dress.
Cute Dress, A little longer than preferred, but served the purpose for a Valentine dinner.  Comfortable and Elegant.  More of a daytime dress, certainly not for formal evening events.

I was so excited for this dress rental and had plans to wear it all weekend on my vacation. However, I only ended up wearing it for half a day because of the extremely disproportional fit. I was really sad! I went in thinking the MR would be perfect after reading all the reviews, but it turned out that my chest was the only part that fit in the MR; the waist was sooo tiny!! I had to go with the LR and then the top was way too big! I mean I'm a 34DD.... This has never happened before. Anyway, I was able to tighten the straps and with a jean jacket it was cute, but had to keep a close eye on the ladies. I wouldn't rent it again.

Sadly, I could not wear this dress. I am 5'3" and it ends mid calf. Great flow and material. But I was not able to zip it up because the lining for under the breast and through the mid back was too small. I am a bit brought chested so it did not fit right. *Important: the dress is low cut. Would go great with black heels or sandals.
Too Big.  Fabric a little heavy for a hot night.
review_summary: Dress did not end up working, was too big and a little too boxy for my athletic frame.

review_text: It fit perfectly, but I ordered large for my usual size.
review_summary: Great dress for a night out on the town in Las Vegas!!

review_text: This dress is the perfect Vegas dress, I wore it on a girl's trip and loved it. The material is thick so it's really comfortable, but it's definitely short so I decided to size up to the large so that I'd get a little extra length.

Although it runs true to size on the chest/waist area, the sleeves could be too long for petite girls. Beautiful colour, looks like real leather although it is not. I paired it with the Navy skirt (in the picture as well) and put a huge scarf to complete the outfit and looked like a very expensive classy everyday outfit for my vacation in London. Highly recommend both pieces.
review_summary: Super well tailored jacket. Great fitting.

review_text: the fit is very loose so it doesn't run big. it is definitely a beach/california vacation dress. revealing but not and super flattering.
review_summary: love love love this dress! so comfortable and perfect for my beach vacation. and so flattering!

review_text: I normally wear a 6 or an 8 in other dresses and the 6 was a bit too big. I would have worn the 4 except it was VERY short and since I was hosting a bridal shower and would be moving around a lot/moving presents, I didn't feel comfortable wearing something that short. It was super comfortable, and I was complimented by everyone at the shower. The pockets were great to stash my phone in them and being able to snap photos throughout the event, without having to physically hold my phone all afternoon. I had the dress on for 6+ hours, and could have worn it for another 6 hours! I paired the dress with a pair of sparkly silver heels.
review_summary: Super comfortable dress for friends' bridal shower!

review_text: The dress is beautiful but as many have indicated it runs extremely small.  I would have gotten the 10, but it isn't available (I'm thinking they don't have it anymore because there was no 10 available no matter what dates I searched.)  I thought the 12 would have been way to big, but after trying to try on the 8, I realize that I could have managed the 12.  I can't even tell you if the bottom (hip area) runs big or small because the problem began with the uber tight corset top part, which I couldn't even get over my upper body.  I have VERY small shoulders, especially for a girl my height, so this was most surprising.  Dress was lovely, if you can get it on, you will no doubt be a knock out, but I recommend that you size up a few sizes.
review_summary: When the reviews say RUNS SMALL take it very seriously...

review_text: I love pockets.
High Inseam, I would order a size 4 next time.
I wore this over the holiday break and what a great cape!  So fun, festive and great quality!!
This dress was so fun and comfortable! I recommend sizing down.

So gorgeous. It is definitely olive, not brown as described but that doesn't make it any less beautiful. All the fabric was a bit overwhelming on my petite frame but I tied the sash into a bow in the back, which pulled back some of the bulk and still allowed the pretty draping details to show. Wish I owned this one.
review_summary: A feminine twist on the classic army jacket

review_text: Super soft and warm. Perfect for a casual work outfit or to stay snuggly in over the weekend.
review_summary: For a good, chunky sweater, this is fits the bill

review_text: Very narrow fit. I am slim and typically always wear a 2, however this dress was TIGHT! the positive is that even though I could zip it, it didn't look too tight. Decided on option B for the sake of being able to breathe.  Very cute dress!

This dress is definitely sexy, hugged all my curves but was still comfortable to wear, it is short though and it will creep up a bit while walking but not so high where you have to push it down. I have a large bust and even I was able to go bra less which was nice.

Loved this romper!! Didn't hug or pull. Loved the lace sleeves. Perfect for a fall night out too.  Worn to a Broadway Show in NYC! Ordered both 0 and 2. Wore the 0 as it fit better in the bottom and sleeves.
review_summary: Perfect Outfit for a NYC Show!

review_text: This company really fits my body type. The second time I have rented a dress from them. The medium fits my shoulders a little better, but the large fits my hips best.
review_summary: Perfect dress for an island vacation!

review_text: Wear with slim pants to counterbalance the roomy top.
This dress is lovely but VERY long. If I had any other size it would be too long. It was also extremely low cut so I used fashion tape. Big pockets were a plus and it was very light on a hot day.

I rented this dress for an upcoming beach vacation. I think it is perfect for that occasion.  It is a very casual summer dress made out of soft, light weight rayon (no lining) and has a loose, flowy fit.  I am usually a size 10-12 with RTR (158 lbs, 5'7", 36C) and this dress fit perfectly in size 10. Therefore, I would say that the dress runs large. The zipper in the front allows you do adjust how much cleavage you want to show.  The only cons of this dress are that the arm holes are big, which made the sides of my bra peak out (see photo), and that my particular dress looked quite worn.
review_summary: Great, easy to wear dress for hot weather. Runs large.

review_text: Perfect length for me, but this could be short on people of average height. Otherwise fits true to size. Order long if you are taller than 5'3" or want to wear heels
review_summary: Wore this dress on the last night of our honeymoon for dinner on the beach. Loved it!

review_text: This dress has amazing colors and is very flattering, but like most dresses of this fit, does show any belly bulge, so do a few extra sit-ups and wear with spanx

Rented through unlimited. I wasn't sure how I would like this as I typically go for more neutral and minimalist style - well I'm so glad I took a chance on this, it is absolutely beautiful. Luxurious fabric, drapes beautifully and goes with many different tops.  Two thumbs up from the hubby too.

I rented this for my vacation photoshoot in Bangkok and it was absolutely perfect.  It incredibly flattering, fun and gorgeous!  It would make a wonderful evening wedding dress, party dress or new year's eve dress!!

I rented this dress to take with me on vacation to the French Polynesia (thank you Unlimited).  It was an anniversary getaway and I wanted to rent something that would be special for our anniversary dinner.  I ended up wearing this dress also for our photo shoot on the island.  The dress fit perfectly, and I wore without a bra (otherwise the straps will show). The dress is made more of a thick material which is helpful if you're going bra-less, but a little less forgiving in the humidity.  Having said that, it still is a GREAT summer dress and I would highly recommend.  My favorite part was when the hostess at the restaurant asked if I got the dress on the island because she wanted to buy one too! With the language barrier, I figured I couldn't explain the rental system so I left it at that! The dress is a gorgeous turquoise blue and white and really the pattern is very Hawaiian, Tahitian, you name it! This is a perfect vacation dress (even if you're not going to an island).
review_summary: I got asked if I bought it on the island!

review_text: Fabric is great for the hot weather. Flower detail was very cute. And the beige was surprisingly a nice color and not dull. Paired with nude heels or wedges and its a very cute day or night dress. Loved! Will rent again.
Great fit, I typically wear S but M worked for me (only size they had available). Only Con, it was very long.

This is a great piece to throw on over a more intricate top for a night out. I wore it to both a club and out to dinner and it worked great for both, as it's easy to dress up and dress down. I ordered a 6 and a 4 as backup and while both fit, the 4 provided the more fitted look I was hoping for. Nothing show-stopping, but it's a versatile piece you'll get more than your money's worth for.
A classic piece to have in your wardrobe! I purchased this dress bc I couldn't stand the idea of sending it back!

I loved this shirt when I saw it even though people said it was annoying to keep the sleeves down, which it sort of was, but the pattern and comfort of it was worth it. I paired it with coral jeans and wedges and it as a really fun shirt for a bachelorette party. I would recommend going down a size so its not big across the shoulders and it has no shape but looks really cute on.

I rented quite a few dresses from RTR this was my least favorite. It runs large and I felt it just hung on me and it was heavy.  The dress is beautiful, but I didn't feel the WOW factors as I did with my other rentals .
The bust area was a bit snug so if you are big busted then there might be an issue
review_summary: I received tuns of complements.  The dress flowed and was very flattering Would be a buy if I could

review_text:
I rented it to take to Art Basel Miami and it was perfect. The white and gold detail even gives it a light nautical theme, but I couldn't stop wearing it. I have now done so with black leggings as well as patterned stockings underneath to make it work in colder weather. The material is thick, so it wouldn't be great for super hot weather, but is good in the 60s-80s range (colder with leggings underneath). 
I not only bought the romper but have been looking for other items in this style - long sleeves with shorts and a fitted waist - since.
review_summary: Looks amazing on, so flattering and noticeable without being flashy.

review_text: I call this my "Million Dollar Dress" because it literally made me feel like a million dollars. Very well made and hugged every curve perfectly. Sexy and classy, it stood out in a sea of black dresses in Vegas. The fit is very small so make sure to size up 2 sizes. Also make sure to wear Spanx, as it will smooth everything out and give the perfect silhouette. Love RTR and this dress so much I might have to come back to it for another event!

Never received on time for my vacation but it didn't matter because i wouldn't have brought it. It was too short me. I have nice legs but would not have been comfortable wearing this out and having a butt cheek show.
Colors and fit are just as shown; beautiful dress! I plan to wear it in Hawaii for vacation. Also, I would say it runs just a tad small in the bust, but mostly TTS.
Loved this dress but it runs small. I normally wear a small but definitely need the medium in this. It's is very fitted so be prepared for that!
review_summary: Sexy dress that fits great! Love the color!

review_text: Beautiful dress to stand out in.  Wore the bigger size due to the top being tight in the bust area and not giving my boobs a nice shape.  Shows off your cleavage so you should be comfortable with that if you are renting this dress.  The length was great although it was a bit shorter in the back.   Felt a little rubbing on the inside of my arms due to the material but nothing unbearable. Overall- Loved wearing this dress!
I really like the material.  It was a very laid back, but super cute dress for a vacation/day-time event.  I would definitely rent it again and wish there were more dresses like this one.
review_summary: It was the perfect dress for my husband's birthday wine tasting weekend!

review_text: Stepped out of my comfort zone with this one and was so glad I did. Loved this dress and very comfortable. Highly recommend!
review_summary: Perfect for night out in Vegas with my daughters

review_text: I loved this romper - the colors were really fun and I loved the open back. I wore a black bra, and even though it showed, it was no big deal. A red bra would have been even more fun though. I only wish the inside waistband was the same satiny-soft material that the rest of the romper had. A great rental!
review_summary: I wore this for my friend's (future cousin's) bachelorette - great romper!

review_text: Dress was super comfortable and great material. Actually wore it for a night out on the water, but could be great for a vacation day or dinner outfit. Great dress to dress up or even down. Color is a pale baby blue. In terms of sizing, it is on the baggier/free form side and you could order a size down from what you normally order if you are smaller on top.
review_summary: Perfect for a night out on the boat/vacation outfit

review_text: It was a little big. I had some difficulty figuring out how to put it on.

I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas. I love renting Herve dresses, and this one did not disappoint! The construction is awesome, and it really gives you curves in all the right spots. This dress does run small. I typically wear a size 4/small. There was no way I was getting the small zipped. The medium fit great, and my husband loved it! Would definitely rent again!

Fit nicely and I'd think flattering on a lot of shapes. I'm small chested and this fit well on top with no need for a bra- the shoulders cut in a little too so traditional bra straps would show. If you larger chested I'd reco ordering a size up.
review_summary: Fun, flirty dress with gorgeous fabric and pockets

review_text: I wore this to a casual dinner but felt like I could've dressed it up easily. I am 5'10" and it fell  a little bit short but I still received loads of compliments! The cut was perfect.
Very cute dress.  Definitely fitted but actually quite flattering.
review_summary: Perfect for a night in Vegas!

review_text: I rented the dress for a destination wedding but ultimately decided to wear another dress that felt more formal. It was so fun so I wore this to the rehearsal dinner instead and loved it! The cutout was a really fun touch, and much less noticeable than it appears on the model. I usually wear a 0 or 2, so I took a chance on the 2 since the 0 wasn't available.
Wore this dress for a trip to Miami, perfect for daytime/pool/beach. Fits slightly loose and very comfortable.

This is a great dress although I was unable to wear it due to the chest area not fitting me properly.  The cut out at the waist was a nice surprise.  I normally wear a large and the xlg was to small on top but perfect below the waist.  This dress was made for pear shaped girls.  I am top heavy 38C/D with small waist for my size .  The waist was perfect.  I'm 5'2" and the height was great, a little shorter than a maxi and the high lo hem is flattering for any height.  The XLG fits like a 10/12 size.
review_summary: Lovely dress for shorties but runs small on top.

review_text: Also, it looked different than in the picture.  More sequined than patterned.

I signed up for rtr unlimited ... I had this leather jacket in my queue and I got it in July. Luckily I was heading on vacation where it was the perfect temp to wear this light leather jacket. The leather is SO soft and this jacket is beautiful!
Wore this out to dinner after our engagement and felt beautiful and modern!  Loved the fit and the way it moved when I walked.  Love this jumpsuit, will rent it again!
Loved the colors, they photograph well and are flattering on anyone. Floral without appearing too "girly"
Fit is perfect - was hesitant to try a jumpsuit, but it fit perfectly - especially because I have a long torso. LOVE this piece!!
review_summary: I may buy this... it is adorable!!!

review_text: The dress runs very small. I am usually a 12 and even the 14 was very snug and hard to zip. The sequins are also very scratchy and the dress is heavy.  Color was not even close to the picture.
review_summary: I really wanted to like this dress.

review_text: This was a beauty but overall to large for me, I wore it but wasn't comfortable as the overall sizing was loose especially in the top

I rented this for an overnight flight to Amsterdam.  I went up a size to the M, but it was a bit baggy so I could of done the S.  I wanted to be comfortable on the plane so I went with a M.  I loved the detail on the bottom and it was very comfortable and cozy.  Would rent again!
I received so many compliments on this shirt. I wore it with a pair of jean shorts and cute sandals and it was perfect. It has a very nautical but trendy feel.
review_summary: Perfect for my vacation to Charleston. I wore it for dinner and drinks one night.

review_text: I adore this romper i wore it for the PBR in vegas and it was definitely a head turner, I paired it with gold jewelry and nude ankle booties

I rented this because I had birthday credit, and I had been eyeing it for my ski vacation. I rented it for eight days, and it was the perfect sweater to wear with leggings and my winter boots! I wore it several times and even on the airplane ride home. Would definitely recommend!

SO typically with E&J I am a size 4 or 6. I ordered the S with a M as my backup. SURE glad I ordered a backup because the slip on the small was a little tight around my behind and the material has no stretch. I ended up wearing the M slip with the Small lace overlay and it was perfect! I was worried about the material being snagged by a necklace or bracelet so I wore it with fun statement earrings.
review_summary: Happy that I ordered a back up size!

review_text: I wore this skirt wine tasting and everyone loved it. The asymmetrical cut gives it a little something extra and I felt very stylish.

Loved the look of this dress. So cute on with a pair of wedges for vacation. The waist is almost an empire cut so it was a little snug after food and wine tastings, but overall loved the look and feel of it! Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Gorgeous comfortable dress, great for vacation!

review_text:
The dress was very comfortable. I loved the color and fabric. 
The cut might complement a different type of body. Not mine. 
I had some problems covering the cleavage without looking awkward.

I was on vacation and wore  it twice.
First, dressed it up for the rehearsal dinner with some gorgeous gold plated jewelry and up do.
Then, wore it again a couple of days later on our trip to Buchart Gardens (sandals, braided hair, bandeau)
review_summary: This dress brought happiness and joy to wedding rehearsal dinner

review_text: I loved this top! I wore it with skinny high-rise jeans during a weekend trip to LA.  You don't need a bra with its built-in shelf, but you could if you wanted extra support.  I've never worn a crop-top before, so I appreciated the elaborate lace for a little more cover-up, but it was still flirty. You'll have a blast wearing this!

I rented this for a work event in Miami and although I ended up not wearing it, it was still a great find. The only reason I am deducting the star is because of the ruching which is not as flattering as a clean cut.
The dress fit great. I got a lot of compliments on it. I wore it for a night out in Vegas. It was perfect.

I loved this dress. It runs very large. I usually wear a 6 but I wore a 4 and it was still a little big on me. This dress is sparkly and gorgeous. The fit was very flattering and it was comfortable. The dress is a little heavy but it didn't really bother me. I would definitely rent it again.
So fun and easy to wear! Got so many comments on this dress. I paired it with wedges and wore on a plane to go on vacation. Was comfy but I felt fabulous in it!
Fit like a glove.  Beautiful inky navy color.  Loved this dress.

The neckline fell right on my collarbone, which was a little uncomfortable. And without the ability to adjust that, I just dealt with it. Didn't bother me too much, though. At 4 months pregnant, this dress hid the bump well. It flowed a whole lot. But because it's lined, it got rather warm in the humidity outside.

It was difficult to wear a bra with this dress so had to opt out. the top stayed in place but be careful if you are wearing in a place with high winds... Beautiful color and fun dress for a Maui vacation!
review_summary: It was a perfect lengthen with flat sandals for me! Wore to dinner on vacay!

review_text: love the off the shoulder

So comfy and perfect for daytime! The Heidi Dress runs true to size, but only slightly large. I could've sized down for a tighter, more secure fit around the bust. The dress felt so easy and comfortable, and the fabric does have some stretch. A strapless bra is recommended, and at 5'2" the hem ended right at my knees. A great dress for any body type! Pair with sandals and your favorite sunnies!

I didn't bother with a photo, because it was that bad. The dress fit well and the top was super flattering but the baggy shape just did nothing for my 5'0 frame. Still a beautiful dress and if you're a little taller would definitely recommend. I had my mom try it on to make sure (she's 5'5") and it looked amazing on her!

I'm not usually a super sparkly kind of gal, but wanted to wear something fun to celebrate my first year wedding anniversary. This dress totally fit the bill - it felt glitzy, classy, romantic and sexy all at the same time. Received many compliments. As other ladies have mentioned, the dress runs a bit large. I'm 5'9", 145 and dress size 4. The size 4 in this dress felt a bit frumpy, so I sized down to 2, which fit great everywhere save for around my ribcage, which was a bit snug but not uncomfortable. The zipper is incredibly challenging - definitely needs an extra pair of hands to help. Overall, a great rental and would recommend.
review_summary: Dazzling dress and received many compliments despite sizing issues.

review_text: loved everything about it
review_summary: Love the dress and the fabric

review_text: I rented this for my vacation in Mexico. It was so comfortable and fun to wear. I definitely recommend it!

I normally wear an 8 so I wasn't too concerned until I read the reviews. Unfortunately this was the only size they had and a backup size was not available. I loved this dress online and read the reviews with women that had close to height an d bra size. Thought I could make it work still but was unable to zip up in the bra area. I suggest getting an extra size up if available.
review_summary: One size too small, not able to wear

review_text: very pretty
review_summary: It is a gorgeous dress and loved it but the chest area is pretty snug

review_text: This dress is definitely a sassy number for a Vegas weekend.  Because of the low back, you cannot wear a bra with it, so it's best for girls with smaller chest sizes (B or under).  Despite the conservative high neckline, the back is low and it's very short, so it's still rather sexy.  Given it's completely sequins, it's a little "much" for a normal night out, but it's perfect for Vegas.  I've rented other Slate & Willow dresses in the past, and they are always a knockout.  I'd def recommend.

Ordered this as a backup and wore both dresses because it was too cute not to wear. I knew it wasn't floor length per the other comments and paired it with black platform sandals. I may have be able to do the 2R at the waist but 4R was just right for bust (adjustable via back tie). Loved the pattern and side cutouts!
review_summary: Adorable back tie and flowy fabric!

review_text: This dress is beautiful!  Fit like a glove and still was able to dance very comfortably!
Loved it! Perfect for vacation. Fit was right. Would wear again.
Soft silky lining and roomy in the leg area. Structured top allowed for no bra. Pretty scalloped edges, can easily be dressed up or down. Loved the color!
The fit was vert tight in the chest and I could not wear it. I do not recommend if you have a large chest (I am a 36D). Otherwise, the print and style is great.
review_summary: Great print and style but it runs small.

review_text: I received this dress with the tags still attached, so it was great to be the first one to wear. It is well lined. The wrap fit well, but it's definitely tight in the bust. I wasn't able to wear a bra.

This dress is a stunner! Amazing print, super comfy fabric and love the adjustable straps and tie in the front. Being so tall I'm always conscious about maxi's not being long enough. Not a problem once I made the straps a little longer. I'm not kidding when I say I have NEVER gotten that many compliments from complete strangers wearing this dress! I wore it on a Sunday out on vacation shopping and such and it was a huge hit. So much so that I am going to re-order and purchase!

This was my first time trying a romper and it was very comfortable and cute.  I paired it with a blue cardigan and sandals for a trip to Orlando.  My sister did point out that the pattern in the crotch area and the butt is a little unfortunate (it kind of looks a plant is coming out of your butt!) so just make sure to take a look at that before you rent it.
review_summary: Cute romper perfect for a tropical vacay!

review_text: This is a silk dress, super light weight, but the print and fabric is wonderful for gliding over your body. I didn't feel self conscious about anything showing through. I wasn't able to wear a bra though, the straps are a bit long as other reviewers have mentioned. I loved the pockets too, nice detail. Loved this! Rented it a second time.
review_summary: BEAUTIFUL Print! So sleek, felt wonderful & comfortable

review_text: The cutest dress. I was able to go without a bra. I ended up leaving the back unzipped, because it looked cuter with an open back!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in a beach town.

review_text: Very cute dress but it is quite short! I'm 5'8" with a long torso and it was a little difficult to sit or bend over in this dress. But I loved everything else about it.

Wore this jumper on a hot summer night in Newport RI and I felt amazing - so comfortable and unique! I don't agree with the other reviewers saying to go up a size - but then again I have a small waist and chest so that may have something to do with it.

This was a perfect dress for an evening in wine country. I wore it with a denim jacket + black heels for a slightly relaxed look; I love how you can totally dress it up though! The dress runs true to size and is flattering/forgiving, but the chest area cuts in a *little* deep. Love it!
review_summary: Super easy to dress up or down

review_text: Loved the fit - wore the XS vs. the S I thought I'd wear. I have larger hips for my height/chest size but it still fit fine. Didn't stretch out like other reviews stated, but I wasn't moving around a whole lot. I wore stick petals vs. a real or strapless bra and that worked well for my small chest. I'm 5'3" and it was mid-thigh. I loved it and got a TON of compliments!

I rented this to take on a weekend vacation for a date night, and it was perfect!  It was so comfortable and the fit was great.  It seemed to run big, so I got a size smaller, and it was perfect.  I loved the pattern!
Great dress, just too big for me.  It is sort of a baby-doll style which is a challenge for my body type.
review_summary: Too big...didn't wear.  Such a bummer b/c it is super cute!

review_text: I rented this for a vacation and it was perfect.  Flattering, fun color, got a lot of compliments on it (even though my husband thought it was a little ridiculous looking, just by virtue of the fact that it is a hot pink jumpsuit).  The material was a little heavier/drapier than I expected, but I think that's why it was flattering.  You could dress it up or dress it down.  It did run big, if you are between sizes I would size down.  The pants were also a little long on me (5'4) but it didn't matter ones I put heels on.

I wore this in Palm Springs out for a nice dinner/drinks out and received SO many compliments!  The fabric is thin so it is not super forgiving on the tummy.  I sized up as my normal sizing was a bit short, but it still looked great!

Cons: the straps were worn and slightly torn. 
Pros: still wearable and a fun summer top.
As the others have said beware of the bust situation. Beautiful and super light for a hot day otherwise!
review_summary: beautiful but bust is an issue

review_text: Wore it a couple times -- running errands, out to dinner, on vacation. Very easy to dress up or down.
review_summary: Loved it. Super comfy and flattering.

review_text: The fit was so easy - I have no complaints!
review_summary: I felt so glamorous in this dress! It was perfect for a fun night out in Vegas!

review_text: I like the fabric and how nicely it holds you in. I just didn't fell comfortable enough in it to wear it out. you need spanx for sure and you have to be confident enough to rock it . I didn't want to be pulling it down or having to hold my stomach in all night so i passed

This dress hid my trouble area ( my post baby belly) and accentuated my legs and bust.  I am a short girl, this dress hit me right above my knee. The only issue I had was the sequins were a little scratchy under my arms.. small price to pay for feeling like a million bucks!
review_summary: What a perfect dress for Vegas!

review_text: This dress was fabulous for vacation.
review_summary: This dress was great for vacation!

review_text: I wore this on vacation the first night I landed in the Middle East. I rented it because it was good for hot weather but also an appropriate length/not too form-fitting. It worked out perfectly. Would definitely recommend.
review_summary: Comfortable to eat and move in, but still flattering. Runs true to size.

review_text: I did not end up wearing this dress for a vacation with coworkers. The fit was pretty snug, but I believe it is styled to be that way, and it was not uncomfortable. It did hug my rear end giving it a weird shape, almost like a shelf. I swear it doesn 't normally look like that. The colors and patterns were very pretty and I loved the ruffle on the bottom. It is very light weight.
review_summary: My event was a vacation night out with coworkers, but didn't wear this

review_text: Wore this jumpsuit for a bachelorette party and it was perfect!  Super comfy and flattering; I got compliments on it all night.  It definitely was tighter around the middle, but since it's boned, you don't bulge anywhere.  I opted for the smaller size of the two I rented.  Would highly recommend!
Designed to be lose fitting.

Well ~ I went away for my 50th birthday & rented some fun dresses.  RTW wrote to say they only had the 10 dress with the 8 slip so I was nervous but no problem there.  The slip is small like most said but it gave it an "edge".  Very comfy ~ I would recommend this dress to those with some curves too!  Will definitely rent again!  Thanks :)

I rented this dress for a vacation to Florida at 26 weeks pregnant. The dress is definitely VERY flow-y and big, so it worked well for me with a bump. But in general, I just really liked the fit and feel of the material. It was a great choice for a dinner outside by the beach!
review_summary: Adorable, fun dress for a vacation!

review_text: I rented this game for the Ohio State vs. Michigan football game and unfortunately it did not arrive before I flew up from Florida for the game.  I rented it on my Unlimited account and it took a full week before I received it due to the weekend and holiday.  Because I did not get a chance to wear it to the game (about 40 degrees outside) I can't speak to how warm it would have been.  It seems like it would be very snuggly, especially with that awesome faux fur trimmed hood!  Fits true to size.  So sad I didn't get to wear it.  Would definitely rent it again.
This dress can be dressed up or down. It runs a little tight in the chest and I am a 34A. Would rent again!
loved the pockets. the top is pretty sheer/ see thru
review_summary: Very comfortable dress for beach vacation

review_text: It's a loose fitting trapeze style dress that looks great dressed up or down. I'm a 34 B and had to be conscious of my bra poking out as it does shift a little. It's a heavier fabric but still felt light and cool in 100 degree heat. Overall it's definitely a piece I'd love to add to my permanent collection.
review_summary: Very easy to throw on with some jewelry and head out

review_text: I should have read other's reviews more closely.  I didn't realize the back was so long and this could not be worn with a bra.  Unfortunately, that look doesn't fly for me...  Beautiful dress though - the interesting and flowing fabric was really nice.
review_summary: Didn't wear due to the bra situation...

review_text: I LOVE this dress.  The skirt makes you want to twirl, and you somehow feel prettier.   I thought it would be too much skirt, but it's perfect.  The material is thick, rich, and slightly stretchy.  Wore it in Vegas, and it was the perfect mix of class and sexy.

I've struggled to find rompers that fit well but this one was fantastic!  The fabric and details are wonderful and really eye-catching.  The back is completely open so I was not able to wear a bra.  I especially liked that the waist ties in the back so I was able to achieve the perfect fit.  This was so unique but really stood out!  I wore multiple times and was tempted to purchase.
Wore this out in Vegas and received tons of compliments. The only problem is i have long hair and i curled it this night and it kept getting caught in the sequins. IT was hard to dance and move.
Wore this out on the town in Chicago. Very comfortable and true to size. Love love love the pockets!!!
review_summary: Walking down Michigan Ave getting compliments..

review_text: Great fit.  Beautiful colors.  Very comfortable, silk blouse.
review_summary: Wanted something special for trip to NYC.

review_text: I rented this dress for our Estes Park, Stanley Hotel Anniversary getaway.  After reading the reviews I was a bit nervous as I usually wear a 10 but so many women went up 1 and even 2 sizes on this dress.  The only size they had was the 12 so I rented that.  It was pretty snug and walking up the stairs was "interesting" but the material is pretty heavy which holds everything in nicely.  I received compliments literally within minutes of stepping out of our room and continued to get them all night.  This is a classy but super sexy little dress and I would rent it again in a second.
review_summary: My husband could not take his eyes off me!

review_text: One of my favorites! I love the length of this dress. At 5’6”, it hit me 6 inches below my knees. This dress fits true to size and we recommend sizing up for your backup. This is fitted at the natural waist and flairs out. The pleats and cutouts on the bottom are so beautiful. I love the colors and the pockets! Would wear to work or an afternoon party. Very classy and fun!

I wore this dress for a family photo session on the beach. The colors were very bright and fun. The fit is loose and flowy. As mentioned by others, the material is thin, but it was not a problem. I wore multiple times before returning. Really wanted to keep it!

Love this dress for a warm vacation.  The colors are great and the material was airy.  I'm short so it hit me a little above the ankle and looked like a cute maxi dress.  The off shoulder detail was fun too.

1) If you have a bust, this top is not for you. The cut just wasn't made for bustier ladies. It's too short, too tight in the chest, very unflattering. 2) The ruffles on the sleeves are way too big. On the RTR photos it looks interesting; in person it looks circus-y.
It is loose for sure - - runs a little large.  Wide through the waist and hips.
review_summary: Loved this casual, easy dress.  Wore it over my swimsuit to a high end beach club/lunch.

review_text: i rented this for a dress up evening on a cruise i was on. TONS of compliments all night. the colors are gorgeous, they pop even more in person than they do in the pictures! i am SO disappointed i did not get a picture in this dress, and will definitely be renting again in the future. i am 5'4" and the length was perfect in 3 inch wedges. i wouldn't be afraid to size down if you are and in-between-er 2-4 dress size. the straps are adjustable, so you can make it as low as you need for your chest. the open back is stunning- must wear sticky bra!

The slits are much higher than expected, but the pattern is great. I'm 5'5" and I needed to wear 4" wedges so it wouldn't drag the ground. Also, the back comes down pretty low, so be ready to get creative about a bra!

This dress is short! and I have short legs! but it is very flattering. I have a little pooch and it completely hid it. The fabric is a little heavy, so everything stays in place. I would probably rent it again.
review_summary: I loved this dress. It is very classy and formal, but a fun pattern.

review_text: Comfortable, fun dress!  I thought it would be warmer in Miami when I ordered it on my birthday discount but it was chilly so I tried it on and took the picture with my mimosa and sadly sent it back.  Would order again again for the right occasion.

This dress is fun to wear, the fabric is lovely, and it was great for going out to dinner while traveling. Lots of compliments from family. Be aware of two things (neither are deal breakers) 1) there is a big cutout/slit under one of the arms-- I just wore a black tank underneath, but if you don't, your skin will be showing 2) It took me a long time to figure out how to put this dress on! The tag is in the bag, but the way the layers and folds lie, it is a pretty confusing dress. Eventually you'll get it, but don't be surprised if it takes you 10-15 minutes!

I got this dress for going out while on vacation in South America.  It was perfect!  Extremely figure flattering and sexy but still classy, with the higher neckline.  I got many compliments on the dress and felt great in it.  The color is a really pretty raspberry and the fit is true to size, though if you are between sizes, you should go with the larger.  A great dress I'll probably rent again!

I was surprised by how much I loved this dress.  I was afraid that the print would be too much, but it was perfect for dinner out at a resort in Mexico.  The fit flatters all of the right places and was very comfortable.  There is a tie back, which adds a little sexiness to the look.  And best of all--the length!  It didn't drag like many maxi dresses can on us shorter folks.

This dress was so much fun. The fabric was thicker than I thought it would be and was much longer on me than the model, but neither of those things bothered me. It was perfect for the occasion - a tropical cruise in the winter.
review_summary: Perfect dress for our Thanksgiving Cruise!

review_text: Rented for an anniversary weekend in NYC.  Wore the dress to dinner and play.  Very comfy and flattering.  Was true to size and looked great with a black blazer over it when it got cooler at night.

Felt amazing in this dress. The material is super stretchy and incredibly comfortable even though its a form fitting dress. The way the material wraps around makes for a perfect silhouette and hides the fact that that I wear a size 2 but don't have a super flat tummy. Didn't wear spanx or anything as those are not my thing but very confidant they were not needed since the material is not super thin. Perfect for a night of dancing and partying at my friends wedding!
review_summary: Compliments all night long! Classy and sophisticated yet incredibly sexy

review_text: This fit perfectly. It cinched right at the natural waist to give me more curves, in a good way. It was well made and I got compliments all night long!
review_summary: This is a perfect outfit for vacation - you can dress it up or down and the color is a showstopper!

review_text: I loved this top. I wore it on vacation for a dinner and wore it to work. I loved that I felt like I could wear it both on the weekend and the weekday. Would rent again!
review_summary: Wore it on Vacation and to Work!

review_text: I rented this dress for a Caribbean cruise. It was PERFECT! The material is very high end and hangs with a slight slinkiness yet still very light! It doesn't wrinkle so perfect to travel with. I rolled it up and put it in my carry on just in case my suitcase got lost..Lol! I wore it out to a waterfront lunch and didn't belt it. You really don't need to if you're wearing it for a beach day time stroll. But for dinner, I wore a thin white and gold belt which dressed it up a bit. I was wishing I could wear it every day of the cruise. I rented the Medium also just in case, but the Small fir more like a Med/Large, so if you're my sixe, absolutely rent the Small...and enjoy!
review_summary: I want to wear this dress every day!

review_text: I loved this dress a lot! I rented this dress for a mini vac to Vegas in January. It was exactly what I needed for a January Vegas weather (60-70 F). Normally I wear  size 6-8 depends on the designer. I rented both sizes and both did fit well, but felt more comfy in size 8. Beautiful colors, picture doesn't do justice. It looks great with boots or just regular pumps. I would love to purchase this dress just to have it.
review_summary: I loved this dress a lot!

review_text: The colors were fabulous and the material felt rich. The cutouts made it feel special and I could wear a regular bra.  Only reason it's not 5 stars is the zippers on the side were not the most comfortable on the rib cage during our sit down dinner!
Wore this out to dinner while on vacation. Loved the flow of this dress on a hot evening.  Pretty and perfect. I'd love to own this dress.

Loved the fabric and the design of this top, but being an hourglass, I like tops that are fitted at the waist.  This shirt, though beautiful, was a bit baggy around the waist.  I still recommend it though, and I totally enjoyed wearing it!!
review_summary: Beautiful details but didn't love the fit

review_text: I got this in a size 0 for a friends wedding - weekend in New Orleans and it was fantastic!  I'm 5'3 105lbs 34b 25 waist and 33 hips and felt like it was a touch loose but that was fine cause it made for a super comfortable dress!  It is more fitted in the bust and hips and the waist area is loose, i think thats just the way the dress is supposed to fit though. It's the perfect combo of classy and sexy without being too over the top. I'd definitely would rent this again for a cocktail party. I styled this with gold pumps and a gold clutch and simple earrings - the dress itself is a total statement piece so I just let it shine on it's own. The color is a vibrant gorgeous blue - I must've had 15 people compliment me on the streets so it's a definite head turner if you're looking to be noticed and remembered!
Beautiful

I LOVED this jacket. It does run very large, but I like the oversize fit and every detail on the jacket is incredible. I got it for a quick west coast trip and I never wanted to take it off (or return it!). Definitely recommend trying it out :)
review_summary: This jacket is comfortable, amazing quality and great for photos :)

review_text: it is sad, but it took me a shockingly long time to find the holes for the strings, but once i did, the dress was great! the holes are located close to the inner string, which i actually pulled through the holes so i could better cinch the entire dress (the original configuration is for the inner strap not to go over the front). i'm typically a 4, but even the 2 was too large so size way down. i'm also short and needed to wear 4 inch wedges to avoid stepping on the dress. i don't recommend this for ppl my height that want to wear it w flat shoes. the arm cutouts didnt bother me. you can just wear a strapless or not bother w a bra. highly highly recommend. flows beautifully.

This dress is so comfortable!! I rented the 2R because the reviews made it sound like I should size down. I wish the 4R had been available as a backup size because I have very broad shoulders and this felt tight in the arms. Other than the tightness up top, it was fantastic! I'm going to rent again for a weekend in wine country. 

Update: Rented again for wine country. The 4R fit perfectly! It's super comfortable and was easily dressed down with a jean jacket.
Kept me warm, I liked it zipped up with black /dark denim and boots

This might be my favorite rental.  I struggle to wear maxi dresses because I am short, but this dress was really cute and flattering and not too long.  It was just so fun to wear, I didn't want to take it off.  The cutout makes it a little sexy too.  I wore it for a night out in Napa and to a graduation lunch.  One time I wore flats and another time I wore 2 inch wedges.
review_summary: Loved this dress so much, I rented it twice.

review_text: too short for me!
Amazing fit!
A little boxy but overall a nice cool weather dress to wear to a casual event. I wore it to brunch in NYC, dressed up with a nice leather jacket and ankle boots.

The fit is great but the dress arrived damaged --- a clasp that holds the top portion snug and fitted was missing, so I wasn't able to use it. RTR were happy to overnight me a replacement, but I would have to return in in 4 days and my vacation was 8 days. Bummer!
review_summary: Beautiful dress, but wasn't able to use it due to damage and Customer Service weren't able to help.

review_text: It's definitely more casual than dressy.
review_summary: Easy and breezy, nice Spring weight.

review_text: I love the color and the fit of this romper! It is so flattering!

Gorgeous dress! So much fun to wear-you'll definitely be the center of attention when you walk into a room wearing this number. Had a generous fit-size down. Very comfortable for being covered in sequins. Be prepared to use some serious dress tape in the front with the DEEP-V neckline! What a fun dress!

Wore this dress out in Vegas and while it could have been a little shorter, the reviews noted that it was a longer dress so I knew what I was getting myself into. Endless compliments all night. Only think I will note that I loved, but others might not, is it really makes your boobs pop. I'm a B at best and this dress made it seem like I was a D cup.  Super comfortable, and LOVED the built in pockets. Would for sure rent again.

The dress itself is perfection...high quality and a great boho vibe that I love. The problem lies with the slip that is meant to be worn underneath the dress as the dress by itself is rather sheer. The slip is made of cotton and offers absolutely NO stretch at all. It seemed to run much smaller than the dress itself and was very uncomfortable to me. If it had even a tad bit of stretch to it, this would have been an amazing dress for me.
my dauther end up wearig instead of me because it was too big on me. she is about 130 pounds and 5'0 tall. she looked cute in it. the fabric is a bit thick but nice
review_summary: the breezy weather and this dress match well togethe

review_text: I rented it for a vacation that got cancelled. I did try it on and it was true to size. I will consider in the future.
review_summary: Nice option for summer/vacation. Colors are really muted.

review_text:
I got this through my Unlimited subscription. I am typically a S in jackets, but it wasn't available, so I got a M. This meant the sleeves were a bit long, but I just turned the cuffs up once & was good to go! 
I was the first person to rent the piece that was sent to me, as the tags were still on. I was tempted to purchase it, but the price tag is a bit outside my budget at this time. I will likely rent this again!

I loved the colors and print of this romper. I ordered a small which I was worried because sometimes I can be a medium, I have broad shoulders. Which is perhaps why this style wasn't good for me. It kept sliding up, wasn't able to keep it off the shoulders where it was meant to be worn. Very annoying. But I knew that was a possibility with this style, another reason why I love rent the runway. I was able to try it out and realize it isn't for me without spending hundreds of dollars at retail.

Runs a little large, the straps did not stay up on my shoulders for most of the day. Comfortable except that I had to pull the straps up constantly. Wouldn't recommend for more petite women, there is a lot of fabric involved.
review_summary: Comfy flowy top for beach vacation; runs large

review_text: As the other reviewers have mentioned, it does run large. I am between a 6 and an 8 and the 4 was perfection. There is an inner lining that has no give to it so you can't size down TOO much, but I would size down two sizes. It was absolutely beautiful for a beach dinner in Cabo at a high-end resort. I loved this dress so much. I can see it being beautiful for a bride to change into possibly if at a destination or other outdoor hot wedding. I loved it so much! Wore with flat sandals.
Elizabeth and James never disappoints. This dress fit like a glove in all the right places, and the color is lovely.

I was worried about a small being too tight, but it fit perfectly and the tie front is too darn cute! Held up well in the Austin heat; light and billowy-ish.

I wore with black jeans and black ankle boots and it looked awesome!
It's a trapeze blouse, so it is big and loose. It hangs nicely and looks great with a cross-body bag.

I took this dress with me to vacation in Brazil.  It was too big, so it looked a little frumpy on me, but I still received compliments from others when I wore it.  I ordered a large but probably could have worn a small.  Can be dressed up or down.
review_summary: Comfortable dress for travel.  Great color and loved the fabric.

review_text: Wore it in Vegas. Super Cute but you do have to unzip the jumpsuit every time you have to pee, which got annoying by the end of the night. Its different than the typical short dress outfit for Vegas, yet it was sexy and fun to wear.
review_summary: Very comfortable and turned A LOT of heads!

review_text: Very versatile, great for lunch outdoor, and importantly, travels great and does not wrinkle easily.
review_summary: Perfect little dress for weekend at the beach

review_text: This romper is gorgeous.  It's extremely flattering fit and was perfect for afternoon drinks in the Hamptons with strappy sandals.  I'll be sure to rent this again.
i thought this was a little more casual than expected, but perfect for lunch on vacation.
fit well; comfortable, looked great!!!

This looks more navy than purple in person. It is very short, and tight in the crotch. I have a short torso, so I wasn't expecting this problem. Extending the straps didn't help, it made the top more lowcut and it was still uncomfortable. The overall effect was indecent, so unfortunately I could not wear this piece!
It runs a bit small around the tummy. It is made for full busts.
review_summary: I ended up not wearing it because it was so hot out and the fabric is thick.

review_text: The bust area is lose. I wish I would have gone down a size in general. The dress runs large.
review_summary: The dress is a beautiful color and flowed so nicely.

review_text: I rented this as part of my Unlimited subscription for a vacation to Spain. It was such a perfect pick - the fabric is very light and airy, and the dress could easily be dressed up for a nice dinner or down for daytime. It fits true to size, and the waist has a drawstring so you can tighten as much as you'd like. It's a bit tricky getting the sleeves exactly right as you have to tie in the back and I could imagine it getting loose throughout the day, but I didn't have this issue. Helps to have a second person tie the back.
review_summary: Perfect for beach vacation - RTR Team Review

review_text: Absolutely adorable.

Unfortunately, I didn't get a good picture of this dress on, but I couldn't love this dress more! Color, fit, subtly sexy, pockets and comfy. I ordered this with my Unlimited shipment and still haven't returned it...I'm pretty sure I'm going to keep it forever. My only comment would be that it is extremely long...I'm 5'7" and wore 4 inch wedges (that worked perfectly) but if/when I took them off, I would be stepping all over it.

This dress can only be worn with a black camisole or something similar under it since the top is far too low and wide open to wear alone.  That said, it is a cut dress and nice for dinner out or a party.
Fit is large and coat is boxy. One of the unlimited rental, I wore this everyday on vacation and it was warm enough for fall temps and can be worn causally or dressed up.

I have a short torso and a little wider hips. It was a little big around the torso and then the pockets pulled at the hips. It wasn't terribly noticable and still so beautiful that I didn't really care.
review_summary: It's beautiful but does fit a little awkwardly!

review_text: I wore this for a 30th birthday party in Vegas.   Overall, the outfit was incredible.  It's classy while still being fun.  However, the small was quite large in the chest/upper body and required two safety pins to fix properly.  I'm not terribly small, so I'd go a size down if you have doubts.
review_summary: I felt great in this romper.

review_text: I wound up wearing the XL because the L was a little snug on my midsection. I didn't need to wear Spanx with the XL which was a huge plus since the drinks were flowing at the concert.
review_summary: Wore this dress to the Britney concert in Vegas. Fit was great!

review_text: I rented this for a Broadway show and it was awesome. Just the right length ( I am a little short so it worked well). Fabric was thicker so it kept me warm in the theater. Color was great and fit wonderfully. there was a rather large pen mark on the back of the dress that was pretty upsetting, but i hid it with my hair down.
Fits true to size, perhaps a little bigger a top. Wear a special or no bra as this has many cut outs.
review_summary: This is a stunning jumper. There are cutouts at the waist, sides, and back - special bra needed.

review_text: I didn't notice too much of a difference between the XS and S, but went with the S just so I would be more comfortable. The fabric is super flattering - I didn't wear any sort of shapewear and felt great! The colors were vibrant and fun, and my boyfriend loved it too! Would definitely rent another Herve :)
review_summary: I loved this dress!!! Wore it for a date night in Vegas with my bf, it was absolutely perfect.

review_text: I rented it to wear to a cancer benefit dinner, and ended up keeping it to take on vacation in Bali.  It has a looser fit with a draw-string waist, and the straps are adjustable.  The slits on the side make it easy to walk in, and the vibrant colors really make it stand-out.  I typically am between a size 0/2, and wore the extra-small.  I am 5'4", and the length was good with heels.
review_summary: I fell in love with this dress!

review_text: I rented this on my unlimited for a beach vacation.  It is so well made and the material is great.  I rented the large because the small and medium  (my usual size) were not available and I really didn't think that it would matter.  It didn't, I think I could have worn any of them.   I can't say enough good things about the quality!

Loved this dress!

Pros: Beautiful colors, loved the cut-out, nice material, can wear without a bra
Cons: Did not come with the tie detail, material does not stretch, the hook-and-eye closure dug into my back when I leaned back in a chair, and the dress was a bit long (hit below the knee, but I am 5'2")

Worn with the Ella Carter "Alex Earrings" and the Kate Spade "Garden Party Statement Bracelet." 

I can't comment on whether or not the dress is true to size because I am postpartum and I am not back to my normal weight.

One day I am just going to bite the bullet and keep the jacket!! It's great! Vince quality is always a sure thing. It kept me warm in chilly Canada weather, and I also looked and felt great! 
You might size up if wearing sweaters underneath, but fits true to size otherwise!
So great!!

The fit is big and not super flattering.  It came with some stains so I had to return it before wearing it out.  Since the fabric is polyster it does not breath.  Also, I thought it was a cutout in the front but it's a nude band.

This dress was perfect for vacation - I wore this a few times during my trip and loved how easy and comfortable it was. The material breathes and is not form fitting so perfect for tropical weather. I will say that this did fight snug in the bust area so I would size up if you have larger than a B Cup. Otherwise I would recommend for all body types.
The rose gold color was a showstopper and we got looks everywhere we went in Las Vegas.  Would defintely use RTR again.
Such a feel good dress
review_summary: This was a perfect dress to wear in Miami

review_text: I order a size up in this dress and I'm glad I did. The waist was a little loose on me, but I have wide shoulders so I needed the 4. The color is not overwhelming. The bow details are so sweet. I got so many compliments I ended up wearing this twice during my rental period (and almost considered buying!). Did not disappoint.

I liked the pattern, colors, and fit of the dress. I'm usually a 4, but a 2 fit better. There is a lining for this dress that traps the heat, so be aware if you plan to wear this when the weather is hot. The dress is able to be dressed up or down depending on shoes and accessories. Overall, I'd recommend it!
fits was right on target.
review_summary: very pretty lots of complements..beautiful color

review_text: Liked this dress a lot, though I had it with me on vacation, and did not have the correct bra.  You need a camp or a pretty bra that you don't mind showing, as the front does come down very low.
I absolutely love this dress and this was my 2nd time renting it. It is perfect for a fun girl's night out or a trip to Las Vegas. It fits perfectly and shows just the right amount of skin.
Made of very flowy, lightweight material with beautiful colors. Perfect for a trip to a warm urban location.
review_summary: A original dress for fun in the sun.

review_text: good because it covers the stomach and arms while still giving some cleavage - sophisticated but still a little wild.....loved the actual dress.

I rented this jacket to have something fun and fashionable on my trip to Ireland. It was super comfy and I thought the pattern/colors made it easy to wear with anything. I recommend sizing up depending on what you are wearing underneath - I typically will wear an XS in tops because of my smaller bust, but the S was perfect for this jacket. Even thought I found this to be a great casual jacket, I could see myself renting this to wear to a more formal event as it can be made more sophisticated if you drop the jeans.
review_summary: Team RTR Review - Dress it up or down!

review_text: Perfect fit!  It does not give much in the chest/ribcage area so if you have bigger on top (or in between sizes) you may need to size up.  Would buy this if possible!
The dress was very short.  that is the only con.  I loved the dress
review_summary: The dress is awesome.  If the dress were longer I would have purchased it.

review_text: I rented this coat to wear at Sundance in Park City, and it served its purpose! However, I didn't love the style of it. It was a bit boxy and long for me, and the wool material was a little worn. The pictures of the model are pretty accurate though - I just felt the length wasn't flattering on me (I'm 5'5".) Other than that, the coat was pretty cute and kept me warm! I'd give it 3.5 stars if I could!
review_summary: Cute coat but a bit boxy

review_text: Wore this dress on vacation in Italy. It's cute and comfortable and I love that it has pockets. Fun to rent.
This dress is gorgeous. I probably could have gotten away with a S (instead of XS) because it was a little tight in the chest, but overall great dress, great fit.
review_summary: Paired with a belt and loved it. Can easily be dressed up or down.

review_text: Sadly, I didn't get to wear this dress but it is a sassy stunner.  The size 48 unfortunately was big on me but will keep this on my list for a future rental.

Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this on vacation, but it was a nice jumper.  I ordered a large, but a medium would have been better.  It slipped on and off easily.  All you have to do is undo the buttons in the front.  The back buttons wouldn't have been an issue.
The fit was perfect. I'm 5'2 and the dress fit longer than expected, but I made a work. Would definitely rent again!
This dress was perfect for my trip to Vegas.  We went to Omnia and everyone had something nice to say.  It does run a little large, so definitely size down for your back up.

Really fun dress! This is not something I would normally wear, but I was in Las Vegas for a few days celebrating my wedding anniversary and wanted a fun dress for a night out with the hubby doing all the Vegas stuff. I made an appointment at the RTR store in the Cosmo with Destiny, and this is one of the dresses she pulled for me. It fit me really well, and was easy to wear. I got compliments on it all night!  It also photographs really well.
review_summary: Perfect dress for vacation in Las Vegas!

review_text: a little short, but it was just a fun vacation dress so that was fine

The dress fit great, but the sequins did not lie flat, so were very irritating around the armpit and neck/back area. I wore this in Vegas and was so excited, only to be uncomfortable all night! RTR was AMAZING though and gave me a $30 credit to my account after I emailed them about the problem.
review_summary: Looked like a showstopper but I was itching all night!

review_text: Great for traveling as it is comfortable and wrinkle free. Fit perfectly, I am long waisted and havebroad shoulders. I like this brand very much and I liked this dress. Not a favorite but I would definitely rent again.

I´m petite and the back of this dress just skimmed the ground when I wore it. I brought it on vacation to Florida with my girlfriends and loved it. Was perfect to throw on over a bathing suit to run to the store and could also dress it up a little for dinner at a local restaurant. Relaxed, casual and really fun. Very flowy in the breeze.
review_summary: The flowy fabric made it feel special, and the boho style was perfect for a girls beach weekend

review_text: It fits small so its not ideal for layering. Very tight across the shoulders.
review_summary: I recieved SO many compliments! Great quality and style.

review_text: The sleeves were a little long on me, but fit well in the shoulders. I like the long length - covered my booty! Very warm and cozy. The shape is pretty boxy, which I didn’t mind, but it definitely isn’t fitted. Love the slightly asymmetrical zipper.
review_summary: For a fall trip to NYC.

review_text: Didn't end up wearing this because the skirt didn't fit properly
True to size, pretty color
review_summary: Conservate-ish, nice length, well made dress.  Looks just like the photo

review_text: The fit was comfortable and forgiving for the tummy/thigh area.  Loved the fabric - the sheen definitely makes it dressier. Did not wear a bra.  The dress is lined and just falls beautifully. Would rent again for sure.
review_summary: Beautiful & comfortable dress. Perfect for work event on a tropical island.

review_text: The fit is great, and this was easy. I went from flying to the car to meetings and I had no problem. The dress is longer in the back and the sides which helps to make it a work tonight dress.
fit perfect.  long, so be sure you don't trip.
Great fit, very comfortable. Received a lot of compliments!
review_summary: Perfect day dress to wear over a bathing suit lounging by the pool!

review_text: The fit of this is true to size OR even a bit large... I generally wear a size 6 (which I wore) but it wasn't anywhere near tight. Thick fabric but really pretty take on a little black dress. I think it was a bit longer on me than a lot of the other pictures I have seen (I am 5'3") but still short enough. Overall, very comfortable to wear and I was happy that I rented it!
review_summary: Any dress that gets you into the VIP is a winner!

review_text: This was an easy breezy outfit for vacation. I wore it with converse and it looked pulled together yet comfy. The material is thick, but not overly so. The top fit me a bit large and I think it could have been tailored a bit on the shoulders, but otherwise it was a good choice.
This dress was so flattering and comfortable for roaming around a new city. I will rent this dress again when the weather gets warmer!

The dress was comfortable and a nice fit (despite the lack of smile in the pic - I liked the dress). It was a tad short (I'm 5'7"), so sitting for a 3 hour show wasn't ideal for this dress (kept having to try and pull it down).
review_summary: Super fun dress for a night out in Vegas!

review_text: Easy to wear, beautiful silk pattern. Very comfortable. I rented this for a beach vacation and it was perfect. The bright tropical print was fun for the beach and the loose silk was comfortable in a warm climate.

Fit perfectly. I left the top few buttons undone, as it was a big snug in the chest. I gave it only four stars, as the white was a bit dingy. Since I rented at the end of September, I'm guessing it had a workout over the summer. I would rent again if it was more white. Overall a great dress thought!
review_summary: Fabulous for my birthday dinner while on vacation in Hawaii!

review_text: The dress fit and looked great on the top-half, but the inner lining was a lot longer than the outer layer and was showing the entire night. So the whole night I was very self-conscious and thought it didn't look as good as it did on the site. Too bad I didn't have a back-up for it.
review_summary: This dress was worn in Vegas to dinner and a lounge afterwards.

review_text: I rented this to wear while traveling to and from my vacation. It's very versatile and easy to wear from car to airport and comfortable for a long day. If you are between sizes, I would recommend sizing down.
A fantastic color!! It's tight but not too tight. I will definitely rent again.

I rented this for a Vegas Ladies' trip.  I wore it with heals and it was perfect for going out in Vegas.  I am do not have long legs and it was pretty short on me.  That helped in my case because it made my legs look longer but I can see where it could be pretty short on taller people.  The neckline is super flattering.  It arrived with a safety pin holding it a little tighter together which I didn't take out because it created more of a scoop neck.  Would definitely rent again.
review_summary: Sexy romper for Vegas Girls' Trip

review_text: Fitted through the bust and flowing through the waist and hips, this is a flattering summer dress with beautiful, eye-catching fabric, and enough design details to make it interesting. The color is gorgeous - neither too red nor too orange, and looks fine with a bra (if you don't mind a little extra strap showing). Really glad I rented.

this romper is my absolute fave. It was perfect for a beach vacation. I was concerned it may be too short, as I am
5'8" - so I ordered a size up... It probably would have been fine if I wore the medium, as I didn't feel uncomfortable with the length at all!

Very pretty and comfortable top.  There is comfortable room in the bust, so I'd say its great for any cup size.  The shirt fits loosely.  The fabric has no stretch, so if you get a back up size, I would size up.  A strapless bra works best with this top.  I tried this shirt outside my pants, and also tuck into my high waisted pants.  Both ways looked nice!
Beautiful dress- will require a low back and adjustable strap bra for the perfect fit!
review_summary: The dress was beautiful, but being in between sizes I would have sized down to a 10 for this one.

review_text: Fit was on the small side but wearable. Too warm-better for winter or fall.  Did not wear
review_summary: Rented via unlimited Better for cold weather

review_text: This jumpsuit worked great on me. I got it as a back up option after my original jumpsuit I picked became unavailable. I wore it with 3 inch heels and the length was great. Only con was I couldn't wear a bra bc it showed some in the front, but overall that ended up not mattering. Got lots of compliments!

I wore this dress to dinner one night while on a girls trip to Rosemary Beach. It was the PERFECT sunset dinner dress. The colors were spectacular. The dress fit me very well up top and I'm fairly small chested, however it was a bit too loose in the waist area. For the pictures my girlfriends grabbed the dress from the back and took it in a little ;) But even thought it was a bit large, I would still recommend this dress for a beach vacation for sure.

Let me start by saying I HAD to give it a star & check the fit box, (or it wouldn't accept my review,) though I didn't put it on. This dress, as you can see from the pictures, was TORN in two places when I took it out of the bag. It was as if the fabric had just frayed & couldn't be stitched because it looks like there was nothing to STAY stitched, even if anyone had tried to fix it. Beautiful dress, which is why I gave it 4 stars, but not worth trying again.
