review_summary: Unwearable, couldn't even put it on

review_text: This dress is comfortable, interesting and easy to wear. The fabric is sort of thin and white (other than the print), so I am glad I sized up (and why I gave 4 stars. Who wants a potentially tight white dress? ;) The cut out is sexy without being too much. I wouldn't mind this being in my closet! Fun!
review_summary: Easy to wear and unique. Tons of compliments!

review_text: I liked the dress you can dress it up or down. I wore my hear in a half pony and did 1inch curls. My boyfriend really liked it. I did find myself fussing with the dress because I needed a belt, it was not flattering without one on my body. Maybe I needed a smaller size.
review_summary: It was cute and really brought out my blue eyes. Liked the open back. Needed a belt!

review_text: it was light material and fit well, and fun to have on. i wore it with shorts on a casual family road trip vacation.  i do wish it was more of a pure white.  you can see from my shorts that it is more of an off white though not has off white as it shows in the picture here
review_summary: fun style to wear in the hot weather

review_text: I wore this around all day on a trip to Key West. It was pretty and comfortable - the structure of the sleeves made it feel a little special. I ordered it as an extra style and didn't select a backup size, but might've gone up one if I had. On me it fit a little tight through the chest.

This ran a bit large and actually kind smelled like the prior renter,
but I aired it out and wore it anyway.  It was cozy and different.
review_summary: Super fun getaway to Yosemite in the spring.

review_text: I wore this dress for a day sight-seeing in DC. It fit true to size and is a cute dress for everyday use!

I rented this dress with my unlimited subscription so I could take it with me on my honeymoon. I wore it probably 5 times - I absolutely loved it! The straps are adjustable, so I was able to shorten it up enough to avoid stepping on it. (I'm 5'3" and even the petite was on the long side.) I wore it with a sticky bra or without a bra at all. Super comfy, super breathable, an all-around hit.
review_summary: Beautiful, easy-breezy dress for my honeymoon

review_text: Super cute, worn for a birthday dinner, a little short in the front but the longer back makes up for it.  Very comfortable and cute!
This was such a great dress.  I wore it on vacation, and it was perfect.  You will need to wear a strapless bra with it - or a halter bra.  Very light-weight and airy.  Will want to rent again!

I loved the bright colors and fun print on this maxi. The fabric was very soft with a double layer at the top, but the back is totally open so I was not able to wear a bra. While the straps are adjustable, the top was not quite as tight as I prefer when wearing a dress without a bra, so I would suggest a nu bra.  I'm 5'8 and the length was just long enough with flat sandals, so this was a casual look. Overall I was happy with this rental for an evening at the beach.

This is a fantastic mini dress! I wore it on a girls' vacation to the beach. The fabric felt rich and expensive, the colors were vibrant. I received many compliments. It is a dress better suited for bodies with less curves.

This dress was so HOTT! I love the open back and the color on the front of the dress. The sleeves are kindof funky. They are like a bell capped sleeve, but trust me no one will pay attention to the detail of the sleeve in this dress.

I ended up grabbing this dress at the RTR in Las Vegas (which is an awesome place with super helpful stylists!) and wore it the same night out for dinner and a show.  I loved the fit!  My measurements are 32-25-35 and the XS fit perfectly.  It was a little short but it was appropriate for Vegas.  The colors are gorgeous and the stretchy, scuba-like material was surprisingly light.  I might rent the same dress again for some events this summer.  It definitely made a statement!
This dress was a great "going out dress" for Vegas.  I loved the fit and it showed just the right amount of cleavage without being trashy.
It was so comfortable! The fit was perfect and very true to size! Super flattering too.
review_summary: Went to a Vegas night club, felt like I fit right in with this comfortable, cocktail romper!

review_text: It is a light dress, perfect for vacation. The waist fit well but for me it was a little tight in the chest area. I would rent it again but I may get one size up.

Perfect spring/fall overcoat for 50 - 60 degree weather.  The man-tailoring of this coat is very flattering.  Perfect coat to travel in with nice big pockets.  Color is very flattering and goes well with most outfits.  Will definitely be renting this again.

I loved wearing this nice light dress during my recent Hawaii vacation. It was airy and comfortable. The bohemian print was perfect for going out to dinner and then coming back to our place and having a casual night hanging with  friends.
Cute but a little ill-fitting for a petite frame.
Not for me
review_summary: Not for petite gals. Much to long even with platform heels. The fit was terrible in my body type.

review_text: This was the perfect jacket to wear for a winter getaway. I had it sent to the place I was staying so I didn't have to pack a bulky jacket in my luggage (more room for souvenirs!)  Everyone has jackets like this in NYC so I fit right in! The fur on the coat is quite "furry." Great jacket to wear fancy or casual.  I wish I could own this!
review_summary: Perfect for NYC trip in December!

review_text: Loved the material, but at 5'2 the pants came down to my ankles. I didn't wear it.
review_summary: Material was very nice, but It was way too long. I'm only 5'2

review_text: Fit true to size.  I wore it casually in Napa with flat sandals and a cardigan when it was chilly, but could dress it up with wedges, or heeled sandals for a night out. Love it and wish I owned it!
I got this through my unlimited for a trip to California. I received so many compliments. It is a really funky fun dress. This company can do no wrong in my opinion love love loved it!!
Super cute dress.  Not too hot because of the netting design. Fit was true.  Fabric was comfy.
review_summary: Went to Fenway for a game in this dress.

review_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. I rented it for work and for a vacation where I would need something casual and comfortable. I usually wear a 12, but I ordered a 10 because of its shape. I don't tend to need the extra space in the shoulders, which is the only place where sizing might matter on this dress.

This dress was amazing! I have a long torso and short legs, so this dress was a little shorter than I would normally wear- but with some nude shorts underneath, it was PERFECT for the final night on a cruise! I am a true pear shape and this dress did not make me feel or look "hippy"
Great fabric and good quality. Beautiful piece, wish it fit!
review_summary: This was very tight on me! Get a size or two up.

review_text: Great dress for a beach vacation. Comfortable, easy to dress up or down.
Easy great dress. Definitely boxy, but modern. Considered wearing it to work in the summer but didn't get a chance to. Would definitely rent again.
Brightened up vacation; comfortable and fit well; needs a heeled sandal or wedge to get the best look at my height 5'5"

I wore this in the Texas Hill Country in the middle of July. It was light and breezy and super comfy. The cinching at the waist and the back design were very figure flattering. I am 5'7" and wore this with 1-2" wedges and it barely hit the ground. However the shoulder straps were very long on me. I had to safety pin both straps in the front to bring the scoop neck up some.
review_summary: Awesome dress for a wine tour!

review_text: I'm curvy and this did feel a bit large in the hips. But, it was so comfortable. The fabric is thick so I didn't feel the need to wear a bra. It does need a sash or belt. Next time I might order the 2. I may end up buying this. It is a very classic timeless dress.
review_summary: I LOVE this dress. I received compliments from people I didn't know.

review_text:
The red of this dress is vibrantly beautiful. If red is your color, this is definitely a dress to consider! 

I am 5'3", 135 lbs. and a consistent size 8. I have a short waist and a broad back/shoulders. This dress and this designer are best suited for for people with narrow frames. I was able to pull off the L with some help getting the dress zipped, but I was pretty uncomfortable the whole night. Because my waist is broad and short, the dress bunched up around the middle which made the length extra short. When sitting down to dinner, I had to put 2 cloth napkins over my lap to ensure I was decently covered. The fit in the shoulders was surprisingly roomy compared to the smallness of the waist. 

I loved the color, but I likely will not order a dress by Parker again.
review_summary: Vibrant color but runs so small!

review_text: Runs small and looked over-worn.  Need to take this out of rotation
review_summary: Did not wear this dress. Exchanged for another

review_text: I love the print of this dress and was sold even before I read that it is a stretch pullover style dress. This made walking around beautiful Carmel-by-the-sea so much more enjoyable.

I loved this jumpsuit, it was perfect for a hot weather vacation. The fabric is very light so it can easily go from day to night. It fit true to size, but the fabric & waistline have some stretch so you could size down if you wanted it a little tighter. I would definitely recommend this dress & rent again in the future!
This fit true to size. If you have a fuller midsection, you might want to go a size up. The bust area fit great for me. I'm a 34C.
review_summary: I wore this out in Nashville. It was a great top to pair with white pants and wedges!

review_text: I'm tall and couldn't keep this one from riding up! it was cute recommend you to size up if you are not petite!

This dress is AMAZING!!! Rent it! I received compliments too numerous to count by strangers all day while on vacation. The fit is slimming and true to size. The dress is incredibly special and very unique. LOVE!
review_summary: Celebrated my birthday in this fabulous dress

review_text: I wore this dress for a night out in Vegas and really liked it. It did run slightly small, so I wonder if a size up would have been a better fit, but my regular size was OK. There was a minor amount of chafing on my inner arms, but it wasn't very noticeable until the end of the night. I would definitely get this dress again.
review_summary: Fun dress with just enough flash!

review_text: I felt so feminine in this dress. I ordered a MR; it felt a little too snug around my hips and tummy for my comfort, though it wasn't tight. I want a little more give in that area, so I will be reordering in the next size up. Some of the other reviews mention that the ruffles around the shoulder area fall easily. I found this to be true as well, but would recommend double sided tape to keep them in place.

I was worried that this shift dress would look completely shapeless, but the color-block effect looked great. The dress is made of a slightly heavier fabric and it really skims the body. It was also the perfect length for my height. I wish I owned this dress!
review_summary: On-trend color-block, very fun to wear!

review_text: Rented this dress for a day out during my bachelorette party. It was super cute, but I was concerned with the practicality of wearing this romper because the zipper was tough getting up and down - and a little tight in the waste area - so I didn't wear. It seemed a little short to me, too. But not so short that I was uncomfortable wearing it (if I was taller than 5'6 I may be concerned). I'd recommend sizing up for ease of getting in and out of the romper!
review_summary: So cute, but impractical for my event

review_text:
I rented this for the Floyd Mayweather fight in Vegas. 

I'm obsessed. It is the most perfect romper ever. 

The hem on the shorts are longer than most rompers. But way more appropiate. 

The fabric is thick and rough. I didn't wear a bra and regreted it the next day. You will need pasties :)

i'm typically a 4 for this brand, this dress was no different. i did find it to be a touch low, but that's personal preference. i didn't bother with a bra, just wore some stickies and everything stayed put. i'm short so it was longer on me than the model, but the uneven hem made it work. i was able to wear high white wedges for a great casual night out look. highly highly recommend!

Wore this on a trip to Dublin in March and also back in NYC the same month. It was the perfect weight and not too worse for the wear after a bit of rain. Big pockets to put your hands or sightseeing necessaries in. Runs a little big, but that's the idea. Had no trouble fitting this over sweaters and also snuggled up in it on the plane ride as it's essentially a blanket with sleeves.
review_summary: Perfect for spring in Dublin and NYC

review_text:
Loved this dress! Perfect for a hot vacation date night dinner with my hubby. Dress does ride up while you walk, but it was fine for dinner. I have super small boobies, so I didn't need a bra. If you need support, def wear a nu-bra type thing. 
Loved the colors. So pretty with my fresh Miami tan.

Pros = good length, the neckline is a good fit, its very comfortable, easy to sit in.

Cons = dont try to walk anywhere in a hurry, the area around knees makes you take smaller steps
review_summary: I LOVE THE FIT AND THE CUT! Def had me feeling a little Kardasian-ish!

review_text: I rented this dress for a bachelorette night in Las Vegas and received great compliments. I wore the small over the medium even though it was slightly shorter than I was comfortable with accentuated my body best. As others have mentioned, the dress is a bit tight in the ribs and it was difficult for me to raise my arms high. None of that prevented me from feeling sexy, strutting, and dancing though!
It was a little larger through the hips than expected, but otherwise a nice casual dress.

The dress fit beautifully but I only wore it for about 10 minutes because the static cling caused the dress to slowly creep up my legs. I was staying on the Queen Mary and had no way to get something to help. Friends suggested hairspray and it didn't work. I really wanted to look beautiful on my 50th birthday. I was very disappointed
review_summary: Walking down the hall of the Queen Mary while my dress starts to creep up my legs from static cling

review_text: Doubt this would fit well on someone tall, I am very petite and it fit just right.
review_summary: Worn to a classy drag show brunch for a bachelorette party, got compliments from everyone!

review_text: Stunning! People stopped me on the street to compliment me. I wore a strapless bra and boy short style body shaper.
Missing trail...what was worse is how small it ran. The LRG  was snug. Normally I'm small/medium.

The dress is a tight fit, which I knew it would be due to the style. I ordered the small and had a medium as my backup. The small fit in the bust, but was way too tight on my hips. So on to the medium. The fit was great and my husband loved it but, for some reason I just wasn't feeling it for our trip. I wanted something not so overtly sexy - otherwise the dress would have been perfect. Either way, I recommend this dress if you are wanting that super sexy look. :-)

Thought I was going to need the XL since I wear a 11/12 with a medium size bust and was super pleased when initially trying on the L and having it fit perfect, even with shapewear and a normal bra underneath. Required assistance from my husband to zip it as the zipper is not super smooth to slide for me. I read that the sequins had scratched on arms and I did find that to be the case as well but it was worth it! The compliments I received on this dress were endless. The only downside was a slight bit of extra fabric at the small of my back. Likely was just due to the shape of my bum and how the dress sits on it. My husband said it wasn't as noticeable as I thought it was. Definitely recommend for a fun night out in Vegas!
review_summary: The sparkle is just right and the burgundy color flatters just about anyone!

review_text: I'm the one on the left.  This dress runs a little big, so the Medium worked out just fine!  It was even a little loose, which was nice with all of the running around and dancing I did that night.  It is very, very short, which was fine for me but might make it a little more revealing for some.   Overall, a really fun dress!  I definitely felt like a disco ball in a good way!
review_summary: Found my RTR twin at the Britney concert in Vegas!

review_text: So cute! Recommend.
review_summary: Felt great in this top. So cute! Recommend.

review_text: The fit was perfect and the cut was very attractive. Was a little short for my taste but overall I loved it and would buy it if given the opportunity

This top is interesting and eye catching. It seemed to be well made. It is able to be worn for multiple occasions (e.g., work, going out, casual). The white chiffon is sheer, so you can see your skin through it.
typically a 4, but always an XS in equipment. this was no different. loved the pattern and color. great to throw on for vacations. packs well. highly recommend as a piece to travel with.
Fits as seen on model.
review_summary: Great pattern and jazzes up any outfit. I wore this with jeans for weeks, so cute.

review_text: I normally don't wear this type of dress because I don't like the way they made look my arms but this case was DIFFERENT. Anargosa Desert Maxi complemented my arms and hips. You can see the picture this dress make you look skinner. A must for any dress.

I wanted to pack this for vacation but issues with a sticky zipper meant I sent it back without wearing it. Too bad, because I really liked it. One other note: the fabric is lovely and not at all stiff - this, however, means that it is not very forgiving. If you have bumpy thighs - the bumps will be easy to see. That said, the top hangs beautifully and there is plenty of coverage under arm holes, etc.
review_summary: Very fun, flattering silhouette and great color.

review_text: I rented this sweatshirt for a trip to New York - it worked great with skinny jeans and sneakers for touring the city. The fit was what you'd expect for a sweatshirt. I'm 5'8" with a long torso and it worked well with jeans - I'm picky about shirts/sweaters that are shorter than the buttons on my jeans, but this fit pretty well and was comfy, casual, cute.
review_summary: Comfy, Casual, & Cute top for playing tourist!

review_text: Perfect for a casual vacation dinner with friends.  Loved the color, and the fit.

I rented these pants to wear with the Greylin Navy Sleeveless top. They were a perfect pair! I originally picked the pants first because of the lightweight material. I was going to be on vacation in Texas at the end of July and wanted a pair of stylish cropped pants that weren't too "heavy". Even though they are white the lining is perfect. I  wore a pair of seamless white underpinnings and you couldn't see a thing. The whole outfit worked perfectly. And don't worry if your tall, these pants will still fit nicely without hitting in the wrong place. I am 5'10" and fit was spot on. Best part they helped keep me cool in 100 plus degree heat.
review_summary: First evning out in Texas and had a perfect outfit that was stylish and kept me cool.

review_text: Loved this dress.  I had ordered this previously but was unable to wear it.  I ordered it again for a night in Vegas.  It is really sexy without being revealing.  It is really short so I had to keep pulling it down while walking the strip or in the club, but overall a fun, sexy night out dress.

I feel in love with this dress. It is such a fun print and can easily be dressed up or dressed down. Based on previous reviews I ordered a size up, but I think I would size down. It was too long for my height even with 4in wedges.
review_summary: LOVE this dress- print + fit = win.

review_text: All eyes will be on you in this dress, like being a human disco ball!  Wore for Vegas bachelorette.  Super fun, very comfortable, true to size.

I'm 5'7 and this dress came right to my knee so the part that hung down asymmetrically looked like a strange kilt.  I'd recommend this dress be reserved for ladies 5'9 and taller like the model.  Its very pretty in person and well fitted without much stretch.  The sizes are British so its approximately 4 numbers higher than your american size.  This dress was sent in place of one that I reserved and was unavailable, but I didn't wear it.  It was in a higher price range but it was just too formal for my plans.
review_summary: Too fancy for a day out shopping and site seeing, High quality fabric.  Length best for tall ladies

review_text: I rented this for vacation to double as a cover-up and as a casual dress for going out in the evenings. As a cover up, it was amazing. Fun print, super soft fabric, and light and breezy. As an actual dress it was just ok. Very shapeless, so not doing much to flatter your figure. I don't think it was the wrong size, that's just the style. Tricky to wear a bra with, I went with a racerback and taped the dress to it. It was fun, but I was a little disappointed in it for going out.

I wore this dress to a special lunch in Napa in honor of my mom's 60th birthday and it was perfect. Classy enough for a fancy restaurant with my family, but cute enough to look great in pictures and breezy enough to stroll around (with a shawl) after lunch. Very flattering cut and comfortable to boot. Highly recommend.
The dress was longer on me, hitting closer to my ankles than my shins, but it worked out fine with wedges (and I was actually sitting for most of the evening). Super comfortable and pretty!
review_summary: Long dress but lovely for a fancy dinner outing!

review_text: color is gorgeous and the fit the good!

Loved this dress, and received endless complements. I wore it several times on a vacation to Hawaii. The neck is certainly a statement piece with all the ruffling, but is otherwise very classic. The dress runs slightly large in the top (I am a 34C for reference), but not so much so that it was uncomfortable to go braless. However, the dress was slightly tight across my ribcage while sitting.
review_summary: Loved the classic colors and styling, with the unexpected ruffling around the neck.

review_text: runs extremely large for small busted folks like myself
Comfortable

This was a backup dress, and I ended up wearing it to a show in Vegas.  It fit well, I was able to wear a regular bra and it was comfortable both standing and sitting.  It actually is much more modest in person than on the model.  Not a show stopper but it kept me warm and comfortable.  I think it would work great for a funeral.

I was underwhelmed by this dress.  It was fun and sparkly but it wasn't the most flattering thing I've ever put on my body.  I typically wear a 4 or 6 and thought this ran pretty large.  I wish I had ordered the 4.  It's strange to say for something so sequined, but this felt pretty conservative -- it skimmed my knees and the cleavage felt fairly covered.  The front rouching didn't flatter as I hoped.  It was fun for Vegas, but I wouldn't rent it again.  The other girls pictured are also wearing RTR dresses and the one in the middle was fab in person (she's also SUPER slim and would look great in anything).  The one on the right (Nicole Miller) was pretty, too, but not as nice in person as in photos.
review_summary: I looked like a disco ball -- in a good way?

review_text: This was a fun dress I rented for my Vegas trip. It's fun and somewhat flattering, but it wasn't my favorite of the dresses I rented (I did a rent one get three deal). It shows off a fair amount of cleavage without being overly sexy, but I felt like it wasn't exactly the most flattering on my body type. Still a fun dress that would work for many body types.
review_summary: My bff got married in Vegas!

review_text: I may come back and purchase this beautiful, soft, Free People sweater. It is one of those that you could wear multiple times during the colder weather. I wore it on a vacation to Lake Tahoe and I got so many compliments. It definitely does run larger than size- and if you are shorter like me then it is a great dress! Seriously so soft, feminine and beautiful. HIGHLY recommend!
review_summary: Love, Love, Love- wore it as a Sweater Dress!

review_text: Apricot color was beautiful, fabric was incredibly soft (modal) and the fit was beautiful. I would definitely rent this again.
Ordered a 2.  Loved the color, fabric, and style.  It was loose fitting so I could have gone down a size and would have been perfectly comfortable.
review_summary: Wore it out on vacation in Florida.

review_text: This dress is fantastic for curvy ladies like me.  The material is stretchy but thick, so any perceived flaws are masked well. The mixed stripe pattern is different and cool, and photographs a little more muted than in the RtR photo but it still looks fantastic.  If you're sitting, standing, or dancing all night, it won't wrinkle and will continue to look the same ALL night.
It fit true to size but my stride was shortened as the skirt part was narrow.
review_summary: I really enjoyed wearing this dress to dinner. It felt comfortable and distinct. Very nice

review_text: I found the cut to be really off and too short for me at 5'8".  Might work better for shorter girls.
Super cute on. Pretty short but very comfortable. Great for our dinner out in Miami
Gorgeous.  Soft and comfortable, well-tailored.  Easy but still elegant.  Highly recommend.

Wonderful romper! Super cute and flattering when you want to emphasize your legs and breasts.  Caution: the romper is extremely low cut and wearing a bra is not practical with this romper. I was on vacation in Miami, so I loved the riskier look.  The fit is true to size with a little snug in the waist. The material is very nice and the romper was in excellent condition. It is heavy material and I was very hot in the romper since I wore this in July in Miami. However, I would definitely rent this again (and would love to own it if it did not retail for $400). I received tons of compliments and lots of stares. I felt chic, fun  and most of all Sexy in this romper. Highly recommend!

Absolutely loved this floral, ruffled style!  Running true to size,  we definitely recommend sizing up for your backup, especially for women with larger busts.  This is a style that is best for A-C cups, as it is fitted at the top, and should be worn with a strapless bra but can be worn without one as well.  Although the fabric has no stretch, this is a loose, flowy style from the waist down, and has comfortable room at the hips.  At 5'5" with 3" heels, this was a floor length style on me.  Paired with wedges and gold jewelry, you'll be summer ready!

My favorite part of this dress was the explosive orange color.  You'll need a safety pin to keep the chest/collar area closed if you're trying to be modest, because the dress fastens very low and will fall open.  The length is fine for someone who is 5'9" or shorter.  I liked it but it wasn't the most flattering cut on my body.

I LOVED LOVED LOVED this dress. So sad I do not have a picture to show how amazing and fun it was. I guess we were too busy dancing away to snap pictures. Just videos. LOL! I highly recommend this dress for any beach vacation or fun summer party. It was light weight and moved nicely. I will be renting this again. Just 5 months out from having my baby it was the perfect dress to hide my tummy. I could have probably worn the L, but it was not available. The XL was a little big around my chest area. RENT IT NOW!!

RTR sent me this as a back up since the backup for the dress I ordered was no longer available.  Turned out it was a very nice flowy dress, perfect for a day at the winery.  I thought it would look shapeless but with a belt it worked very well.  It's very pretty and sparkles in the sun.  I thought I would not like it but I enjoyed wearing it!
review_summary: I didn't order this dress but RTR sent it to me as backup, turned out I really liked it!

review_text: This dress was sexy and classic for a bachelorette. A little large in the bust for me. I should have gotten a small.
review_summary: I wore this for my best friends Bachelorette trip!

review_text: I loved that this dress was sort of on the side of conservative from the front, but has flowy short skirt and a fun back. Perfect for the occasions when you can't decide if you should dress up or down, because it works as both!
review_summary: Fun dress! Can be dressed up or down. Love the back.

review_text: This dress was really pretty, and a perfect choice for a special dinner on vacation or an outdoor summer wedding. It is more on the casual side, so if you are going to a more upscale wedding or formal event you may want to go with another choice. I did really like how the top fits because you do not need to wear a bra with it. Unfortunately one of the straps was broken when the dress arrived, however RTR's customer service was amazing per usual and they overnight shipped me another dress which I actually ended up liking even better. Overall very pretty dress!
review_summary: Cute dress. Nice choice for a casual summer wedding or vacation.

review_text:
Pros: incredibly flattering in the bust and waist.  It's not your average jumpsuit
Cons: that I don't own this!
review_summary: LOVED this jumpsuit. I received tons of compliments

review_text: You can't go wrong with a LBD and even better if it's a Herve!  I rented this for a NYE vacation to Iceland.  It packed nicely (although I think it added some serious weight to my suitcase), fit like a glove and believe it or not was very comfortable - stayed in place all evening, no tugging whatsoever.  It was the perfect amount of pizzazz without being over the top or baring too much skin to celebrate NYE in an extremely cold climate.  I would be wary to wear it in warmer climates because it is rather thick and heavy.  It's true to form with a Herve - holds you in in all the right places and plays up what you're already working with.  I have a fairly large chest and was able to go braless.  I unfortunately didn't get a full length picture, but will say it's definitely a head turner - no sparkle necessary - except yours, of course.
review_summary: Effortlessly Sexy - Allows you to Sparkle

review_text: This dress fit like a glove and was very flattering! I wore it during my cruise vacation and it was perfect for the summertime tropical setting. The colors are perfectly vibrant! The fabric is very soft and comfortable, too!
So pretty. Great color. Awesome details. Runs big so I sized down which was a good decision. A little stiff but still loved!!

Rented this for summer vacation. Loved the fabric and the lace detail at the bottom, but unfortunately the dress was a little short for my 5'6" frame. Also, the buttons kept popping open, so if you have broad shoulders this isn't the best choice to wear.
Fits perfectly!
review_summary: This top is light and airy; it is perfect for vacation.

review_text: What a way to stand out in a ski town!  I rented this for a Park City/Deer Valley ski trip and it was perfect.  A fur vest is the kind of thing that I wouldn't probably buy, which is where RTR's services come in and are just perfect.  It arrived on time (to my hotel) and I wore it to the spa during the day (post slopes), then apres ski, then out to dinner and the bars at night.  Not only did my friends love it, but I got complimented by a random guy at the bar too.  Super cute!

I wore this all day on vacation.  It's comfortable, not form fitting but seemed to flatter, and super lightweight so is perfect for a hot day.  Gorgeous silk in really pretty colors.  Casual enough for everyday or for work.  I wore a white bralette and left the top of the dress unbuttoned.
It runs small. The zipper is a challenge.
review_summary: It looked like a nice black romper. I rented it for our family vacation. It wasn't used.

review_text: I wore this on our last night out in Vegas - Dinner, Cirque du Soleil and some roulette - the dealer complimented the pattern. I love renting Clover Canyon, this is my third dress of theirs (and second for this trip) and I know they will fit well and be flattering. The material is sleek, comfortable and forgiving and the prints are so much fun. I love the scuba material - I know not everyone is a fan, but I find it so comfy. My boyfriend liked the dress too and he's usually not a fan of anything too loud. I was shocked that he suggested it. It was really fun to wear.

This dress is amazing on! I felt so incredibly sexy in it -- I got compliments everywhere we went. Because it's bloused, it is very forgiving on the waistline, so I felt very comfortable in it. It's short enough to make your legs look really long, but not so short that you can't sit in it.
review_summary: Wore this dress one night in Vegas -- made the night!

review_text: It is true to size, with a little extra wiggle room. Classy length, but sexy color.
review_summary: I must have gotten over 15 compliments from STRANGERS on this dress! It was magical.

review_text: LOVED this. I wish I had taken a picture.  I wore on a cruise. Normally I wear an XS, but after reading the reviews I got a small and it fit perfectly.  The long side panel makes the dress, it was super fun and I got a ton of compliments everywhere I walked! If I had more places to wear it, I'd have bought it. I will definitely rent again.

Loved this dress!! The fit was great. Super flattering. The top does all the right things for the girls. Bra definitely optional. I have an extremely short torso which is always a concern with dresses but this dress fit perfectly. Thick material,  true to size. My fiancé was very happy with my choice for our fancy night out in Vegas
review_summary: Perfect sexy LBD for Las Vegas!

review_text: This shirt was fun for a night of going out on while on my Caribbean vacation.  Knowing my body shape (athletic build/big chest), I had taken a risk renting it, and at first wasn't in love with it, because it was very cropped as shown in the picture, and it didn't cinch in below my boobs (34DD). The fabric doesn't have much stretch anywhere (no stretchy fabric in the back). I thought it be super cute on someone with less chest, but my friends and boyfriend all really liked the way it looked on me.  It was fun and breezy for a night at the beach bars. Fun top, but rent it with the correct expectations!  Felt true to size, and I wouldn't recommend sizing down if you have a large chest.
This dress runs a little small so you may want to size up.  Be careful it rids up when you sit down.  It was very sassy.  Wore it out to dinner and drinks on a beach vacation.
I just didn't really like it. The arms were also really tight and i was self-conscious about the neck.  and overall "meh" rating.
review_summary: The neck was weird and bottom was too tight

review_text: Beautiful colors and perfect for a summer evening!   It is not fitted at all through the waist so very flows and comfortable.  Runs a bit shorter in the front.   I'm 5'4" and front hem hit me mid thigh but I was at the beach so I didn't care!    Looked great.    I wore pasties because any bra would show.    Just own it - it's a fun dress!
review_summary: Bright colors were fun for my beach vacation dinner.

review_text: True to fit, I found the 6 perfect. I had no issues with the back falling down and didn't use tape. It is short but not unwearably so. Loved this and would definitely rent again!
This dress fit snug through the hips but was large in the chest area. It was fairly short on me and I am only 5'0. Overall, great vacation dress.

Let me tell you--this dress is the absolute best rental I've ever had from RTR to date. The fit was perfect, the print was to die for, and the style is edgy and cute and sexy at the same time. It was perfect for a 24/7 shindig: conference during the day, cocktail party in the afternoon, and the bar at night. I got sooooo many compliments on this dress. I wore the skirt a second time on my vacation with a different brightly colored crop top and it worked amazing.
review_summary: I love this dress so much!!

review_text: Great cut and fit. Wore a size 4 - runs a little smaller than the other Elizabeth + James dresses I've rented previously. Needed to wear a strapless bra.

It fit like a glove, was SO comfortable and hugged my curves without bunching, riding up or making my tummy look poufy. My girlfriends tried it on later and it looked really good on all different body types. I highly recommend it.
review_summary: I wore this dress to my bachelorette party and it was perfect.

review_text: Great dress! I rented it for a night out in Vegas and loved every minute of wearing it! I received so many compliments and felt great.

I ordered this for a family trip to Denver.  It was perfect for the chilly at night but warmer during the day weather.  It fit a little boxy, but that is the style.  Super soft, yummy smelling leather and in a great color.  I had a hard time bringing myself to package it for return.
review_summary: Did not want to send back

review_text: the waist was a bit small for a medium - a small size 6? wore it at my true waist like shown on the model, but was just a little bit too tight.
review_summary: easy to wear and packed/traveled without any wrinkles - nice weight and quality.

review_text: I wore this blazer while on vacation with my gf's.  I wore it with jeans and a simple top.  I love the leather sleeves and detail.  I did not want to send it back.  If I could, I'd buy it!

I went on a trip to Paris &  Africa (hints the picture,lol) I wore the vest two different days and two different ways, this vest can be dressed up with a cute long sleeve shirt, skinny jeans and heels or tank top, and shorts for a safari! Loved this vest, it is also adjustable..

Definitely stood out on formal night on our cruise with this dress! It flows beautifully and skimmed the floor with my 4" heels. Ladies with wider rib cages - this can be a little bit tight at the waistband, so just FYI. The 12 fit TTS, but would have liked just a little more give there (even though it was fine to wear). Wore with shapewear even though I didn't really need it, and a simple necklace and chandelier earrings. Truly a knockout, so many compliments.
Nice night out. Very flattering and I was super comfy all night. Had no clue it was so flattering until I saw the pic.
I rented this dress to wear during the day on vacation with my family. It was very comfortable, soft material. Dress is conservative yet very figure flattering.
Fit true to size, flowed nicely, very happy with it
review_summary: gorgeous dress, fit perfectly, really nice material

review_text: This shirt is adorable!! The pictures don't give the details of the embroidery and colors justice. I wore with white shorts to the beach and white pants at night to dinner. I will rent this again in the summer, I did not want to send it back!

I wore this romper for a wine tour the day after my wedding and received almost as many compliments as I did on my wedding dress!  This romper is cute and comfortable, but beware it is on the short side!  I was comfortable in the environment I was in but was slightly nervous to lean over at all!  I paired it with a black leather jacket in the shade and it created two totally different looks.  I would love to own this romper!
Great fit if you're tall. Received tons of compliments.
review_summary: Perfect travel romper for my trip to Mexico. So perfect that I ended up wearing it twice!

review_text: I love love loved this dress but I would not recommend it to anyone over 5'5"... it was just so short to the point where you would be worried about a gust of wind or any real movement. Though I loved it, I couldn't be comfortable wearing it.
review_summary: Sparkly, fun party dress... but way too short

review_text: The fit was a little big on be but based on the style of the dress it still worked really well! lots of texture to the dress which made it unique! Open back made it very breathable and comfortable in the warm weather :)
review_summary: Such a fun, unique dress! lots of compliments and was perfect for my concert!

review_text: I wore this for Thanksgiving dinner at my in laws. it was light comfortable and just the right amount of dressy for the occasion. it packs great too!

I really loved this skirt! I rented it for vacation and needed long skirts for where I was going. I'm 5'2" so I had a lot of trouble finding options on RTR that I wasn't tripping over. this skirt is great, it hit about floor length for me but I could still easily wear flats with it. It's thin, breezy fabric so I didn't feel weighed down by it at all. The only thing to note is that there's zero stretch in the waist, so I sized up to a Small. I tried the XS on and it looked great but when I sat down, it felt too tight on my stomach. The Small was great, looked pretty similar on and felt much more comfortable on the waist.

This dress was perfect for a warm weather vacation.  It was a little fitted at the bust but loose and flowy through the hips.  At 5'1", it came just above my knees.  I could dress it up with heels for dinner but it looked fine with flip flops too for a walk on the beach.  It is well lined and can be worn with a strapless bra.  The colors were beautiful--bright and a bit fluorescent.  I loved this dress so much I ended up buying it.

I rented this dress for a warm weather vacation and it was perfect for a romantic date out.  The bodice is made of a beautiful lace and fitted nicely without being too tight.  The skirt is light and flows well.  At 5'1", I still wore 3" inch heels just to get the skirt off the ground, so it was a little longer than expected for petite sizing.
Not very shapely, and wrinkles. But overall style is beautiful.
review_summary: super cute design - Cold shoulder is fabulous

review_text: First off - this dress is different from the photo. There's no blue band at the bottom; rather, the whole thing is the floral pattern. I didn't care, though, because I LOVE THIS DRESS. I wore it on my bachelorette weekend and adored it so much that I ended up buying it for myself (my friends made me, I swear). It's so flattering, comfy, girly, and the material is really nice. The neckline with the buttons is so pretty, and it's fitted up top with a flowy bottom. I'm 5'2 and wore it with 2-3 inch heels and it was perfect, so if you're tall, you'll probably have to wear flats. A keeper!
Loved the dress but it had a strange smell on it like it was not previously washed.
Recommend sizing up if you have broader shoulders or need a little more space typically in the arm area in button down shirts. No stretch in the material. If you are really thin, this may run big.
review_summary: Good for beach wear. However, there isn't much stretch in the material.

review_text: You cannot go wrong with any Shoshanna dress. This designer is by far my favorite on Rent the Runway! This particular dress is great for a holiday/vacation. I got so many compliments on it and continue to receive comments about it on Instagram. The dress is super comfortable and an awesome/one of a kind color!

This dress was perfect for a big night out on the town.  The navy was different from black and the cut of the dress was super flattering.  The open back gave it some extra sex appeal.  I used double sided tape to make sure the shoulders didn't slip down.  It might be a bit short on taller girls.  I'm 5'4" and it was at my upper thigh.  This was my favorite rental thus far!

I wore this dress while vacationing in the Hamptons.  It was fun and breezy, but probably would have been a better choice to wear to work in the summer.  It's very cute - the colors are beautiful!  The pleats lay a little funny on me, but overall it was flattering.  The chest was a little snug, so anyone over a D might have a hard time with the fit.  See more of my Rent the Runway Unlimited outfits at @thehllw!
Very nice fabric.  Looks casual but not sloppy.  Change shoes night on town.  Versitile.
Comfortable fit, can be dressed up or down with heels/wedges or gold flip flops. Great bright spring/summer color!
review_summary: Very versatile dress - comfortable, cute and classy with a little bit of sexy! Loved the color!

review_text: I am pretty busty but it was still too big in the boob area

This dress is extremely comfortable due to it's stretchy fabric.  I didn't have to wear a bra which is always a plus in my opinion, but I could see how the front part would come open for women with larger chests.  The amount of skin shown is less than what's shown on the model making it just the right amount for weddings, etc.  If this dress came in black, I'd buy it in a second.
review_summary: Comfortable, fun, unique, easy way to wear color

review_text: This dress was amazing! The length was perfect, short enough that I could walk easily with it so tight, but not so short that I was ever worried about accidentally giving a free show. The thick material held everything in with out spanx, the pattern was very flattering and the cap sleeves made it easy to wear a normal bra, though I recommend a pushup since the fabric will flatten you out. I would love to rent this dress again!
review_summary: Perfect for a night out in Vegas

review_text: Wore this on vacation as a cover up. I loved it! I even considered buying it, but it there was a small stain on the side when I got it. Bummer!

This was a beautiful dress. The fabric and cut are both great. But on my frame it completely overwhelmed my figure. I'm pretty petite and the the flowing fabric on the arms and skirt just swallowed me up. Even in 5in platform heels, it just looked like I was swimming in black draped fabric. If you are taller, with longer arms and legs, this dress would look amazing. The waist is fitted enough to offset the draping on the arms and skirt on a larger frame.

I can't say enough good things about this romper. I was worried that at 36 I might be too old to pull this look off, but I felt very comfortable in it. The color was beautiful, the materials was forgiving and the cutouts were completely flattering. I was also worried about the dreaded armpit/boob area being cut low, but it was actually quite flattering. I may rent this one again!

the fit was perfect, I wore this in Mexico to dinner with my husband...wore with wedges and statement jewelry. It was cute, lots of compliments, but it just wasn't my style. It is very cute and comfy, but I should have picked something with more colors....the color is "ok."

The sleeves were so long and big, I had to push them up during dinner so they wouldn't drag in my food. The bottom doesn't really gather, so the shirt look better loose. I think this shirt would look better on brown skinned ladies than my fair freckled skin.

This was the first one piece I've worn and it worked well of a dinner out. Fit nicely on top, little baggy around hips and a tad tight on calves (I have "soccer" legs). But overall the fit was nice. Got lots of compliments and the color was beautiful. One thing to remember when getting a one piece- think about if you'll need to use the ladies...the zipper on this one is a bit tricky solo...

I wore this while on vacation with a friend.  We had a nice dinner, visited an art gallery and then bar hopped... this jumpsuit turned heads in every venue.  Such a great sexy look.  I will definitely rent this again... if I don't end up buying it first!
This dress was my backup but I ended up loving it more than my original. It was comfortable, I got compliments ALL night and felt great in it!
This dress can be dressed up or down.  It is SOOO comfortable.  It does need a bandeau since the arm holes show the sides.  I received many compliments and wish I owned this dress!
review_summary: Comfortable, flowy details set this dress apart!

review_text: I normally wear a 4 in Shoshanna, but the 6 fits perfectly. It is a flattering fit for my small waist but wider hips. I would rent again.
Loved the dress!  Fit really well and looked great on!  Would definitely recommend it for a party /night out since it's on the short side!
Cute dress and loved the fabric.  The straps pop up when sitting which is weird

I loved this dress as a coverup at the pool and to walk around during the day. Nice and breezy. BUT it wrinkles very very easily and shows every single stain. I accidentally flicked a tiny bit of salad dressing on the dress and the oil from a tiny fleck spreads out to a slightly bigger stain, necessitating the return of the dress so it could get cleaned.

I rented a small and medium, and I ended up wearing the medium due to the length of the shell/lining and the neck was a bit looser.  The fabric drapes so well that there is a lot of movement.  It was the most comfortable dress, and I would highly recommend it!
review_summary: I received so many compliments on this dress.  The fabric and cut make it comfortable and chic!

review_text: I wore it while 5 months pregnant (measurements in my account are from before the pregnancy). Normally I would wear a 4 or a 6, but because of the belly I ordered an 8. It fit well over the bump, and the top was not too loose. I loved it. It was comfortable and extremely flattering.
Great pattern and sexy shoulder situation!!! So so so comfortable. Easy and fun for a night at the theater!
review_summary: much better than tearing apart H&M!!

review_text: Fit was snug, very form fitting.  However, I received a lot of compliments.  The length is short, but perfect for Vegas.
review_summary: I wore this in Las Vegas to dinner and a show.  It was a perfect Vegas dress!

review_text: I did not wear this dress. I am athletic with and short - 5'1". It was not flattering in the mid-section and was too long. I think it would look great on someone who it taller and with a small waist. I was disappointed because the dress came with a large pink stain down the back, so I couldn't have worn it even if it did fit well.

I rented this dress for a holiday trip to Southern California.  I wore it during the day with ballet flats and in the evening with heels.  The silver thread lets it dress up well and keeps it from being too stodgy during the day.  It is just fitted enough to show your curves, without needing Spanx or the like.  I'm not terribly comfortable in dresses, so the longer length was perfect, especially with the slit up the side.  Would love to keep it.

I wore this dress to a wedding on the beach and received compliments all night. The bright color was perfect for a summer wedding - definitely a stand out color in a crowd. The fit was a littttle bit tight on my waist, however the medium was way too big so I went with the small and it worked out! The dress was made out of a comfortable material too. I would definitely recommend this dress - I wish I could keep it!
The XS ran slightly loose on me but I was the only one who could notice.  The length was perfect - not too short- and the hint of cleavage added to the appeal.
review_summary: The sequins were perfect for Britney in Vegas!

review_text: This dress fit beautifully! The thick fabric allowed it to drape very nicely. I have a large bust and the cutouts made it hard to wear a bra with the dress. BUT, it was so well made that I didn't even need one!!
Perfect, perfect dress.  Get it!!!
review_summary: Great fit, unusual but still classic.  Loved it.

review_text: I took this on vacation to Bali! It was really cute! I ended up wearing a thin belt with it because it's a very loose fit, and I like to have a waist. And it definitely went all the way down to my ankles. Perfect for a warm evening out!
review_summary: Fun for a slightly dressy evening

review_text: The dress is super comfortable and light. Plus it is lined with a super soft fabric.
review_summary: I absolutely LOVE this dress. If I could have bought it I would have.

review_text: its a nice jacket
review_summary: Its cute! Not amazingly soft which i know faux fur can be so not 5 star but good

review_text: This is a great romper, can dress it up or down depending on shoe choice. I wore it out to dinner in Napa and it was perfect, the best part is it's so comfortable. Unfortunately I didn't get any pictures but its amazing!
Wore this for a night out during a romantic vacation to the DR. It's light and airy and the print is perfect for summer. The open back is super cute.

The silk & print are luxurious. I typically only wear a rtr outfit with my unlimited membership once and then ship it out but am holding onto this one for another week. Not the easiest to get in and out of with the back buttons but don't mind.
I wore this top while traveling on vacation. I have a 34F chest...I wore the M, but wish I had ordered a large as there was no stretch in the material.

I wore this for a birthday weekend in Vegas to see Britney Spears. There isn't a more perfect outfit, actually! I loved it! It's very on trend and makes your butt look amazing. The outfit itself was a bit worn. You can't tell in pictures and maybe not unless you were super close up because I got many, many compliments all night, but . . . the lace could have been in better shape. Oh well. Still and amazing outfit and had an AWESOME time. (Yes, I did tell tell the truth to every complete stranger who asked me where I got it  - RTR!)

Danced all night at the club in this jumpsuit and got a million compliments on the look. I got a 8 long because I planned on wearing 4" heels & it was perfect. Its super comfortable if you know you will be wearing it for awhile its perfect. I will definitely rent this one again I didnt want to send it back it was so great!

I was nervous this dress would be too short for me, but I loved the print so much, I decided to give it a shot. It was perfect, and I felt beautiful in it. The knotted top detail definitely provides adjustment capabilities for your bust size, and the length was great with flat sandals.

I thought it was a bit boxy. Very warm. Unfortunately, it never ended up being cold enough for me to wear it. Very nice burgundy color. Also, I think the smell for leather dry cleaning might be a bit different. It smelled perfumy in a way
review_summary: Ended up not wearing it due to it not being cold enough.

review_text: This dress was perfect for a Vegas trip. I fit great but where my arms rubbed the sequins it left little scratches. Would absolutely wear it again though, very flattering and not too short.
review_summary: I love RtR and keep coming back!

review_text: Great dress, bright colors, just too long for me. Very flattering.
review_summary: Loved this dress a touch too long

review_text: First off I am 40 and not a stick so micro mini is NOT my thing.  I wore this on vacation and it was perfect, good dinner out dress. Comfortable too!
review_summary: Curvy girls don't be too scared - its not as short as it looks!

review_text: Love this dress! Thick material but still fine for a summer occasion. Makes an athletic figure look like it has curves

Wore this going to Liv in Miami! It was a hit and I got a lot of compliments. Really shows off your figure and tucks everything in. I didn't need spanx or anything. I like that it's a bit longer than the other Herve dresses.

I wore this to see Britney Spears in Vegas.  It was perfect.  I loved this dress so much.  It does have some stretch to it, which is nice.  It was super sparkly and comfortable to wear around town and dance the night away with Ms. Britney Jean!  It is short.  I wore Spanx underneath to make sure I didn't get arrested for indecent exposure (is that possible on the Strip?).  Overall, I'd definitely suggest this for a fun Vegas adventure!
Comfortable to wear, and I got tons of compliments. I would rent it again!
review_summary: It was the perfect top for Florida in the fall.

review_text: Beautiful flower pattern, sexy leg slits
This is a great color and nice structured material.  It definitely runs small though, especially in the waist and chest.
Great dress and so comfortable! I got the small and the medium but ended up wearing the medium, the small was a bit snug after drinking and eating for two days straight before I had to wear it!

loved it and wore it to beach/pool. this ran too small in the bust for me, and i couldn't button it up at all (was ok w/ swimsuit underneath). however, i would not have been able to wear as a standalone. a XL would have been nice if it were an option.
Hip, gorgeous, comfy, not too heavy, great fit in the shoulders, would order again.
review_summary: We were in Las Vegas in January and it was a prefect coat for over my attire.

review_text:
Fit: This dress fit true to size with a normal strapless bra underneath

Pros: This dress was eye catching without being over the top and the length was perfect all night, no ridding up.

Cons: none I felt this dress came exactly as described
review_summary: This dress was perfect for a night out in Vegas. Sexy and still very comfortable

review_text: This dress was much more form fitting than I had originally thought when I reserved it does have some stretch so it wasn't an issue. I loved the sequins for my birthday night in New Orleans! Also the sequins aren't itchy like more dresses are. Overall I loved the dress and would recommend.
review_summary: Perfect combo of classy and sexy

review_text:
After reading all the other reviews about the special chest design of the dress, I still decided to rent in an overestimation/optimism towards my tailoring (aka hemming tape) skills. It didn't work out as expected. 
Firstly, as a 5'4 petite, the XSP was a bit long for me & requires about 3 inch of heels. 
Secondly, if you are a A/B cup with amazing abs, the chest design may serve you well. The open space will create just-enough sexy for you. However, if you are C  cup or above, the dress makes you look like ready to breastfeeding your twins at any time. 
That being said, I ended up not wearing the dress during my vacation. Hopefully I will make a better choice next time.
review_summary: For A/B cup， 5‘5 and above girls!

review_text: Great Lovely dress
The dress was gorgeous and quite forgiving in my midsection, as this is my trouble area. I am 5'9" and wore heels and it was long enough.
review_summary: The dress was beautiful and I got many compliments on the ship.

review_text: Loved the color and dress, but upper body portion was too long. It ended up showing most part of the bra.
review_summary: Torso part of the dress was too long for my height(5'3")

review_text: Got tons of compliments.
review_summary: I love the dress fits me well .  Nice curve . Classy

review_text: Nice dress, breathable fabric, good fit.  Love the slit.
review_summary: The dress looks exactly as it does in photos, I just felt it was a bit conservative.

review_text: Fit my atheltic build perfectly - super comfy

Go to Vegas every year on Super Bowl weekend and Saturday night is our big night out on the town! I since it's February, I went for a long sleeve dress so I wouldn't have to carry around a coat or wrap. Got the medium, and small as my back-up since I'm petite... have a 6 month old, so with a post-baby belly, the small was a little snug. The medium with some spanx was great - the dress does have a little stretch. Arms were a tad long for me, so I folded in the cuffs slightly, no worries. Did get a little scratched by the armhole (sequins), but nothing too bothersome. I literally got compliments all night long (from guys and girls!) as we popped in and out of the casinos. It was flashy, but classy! Stylist recommended a black snakeskin clutch with metal fringe - it rocked too! Plus they have a store in the Cosmo, so just dropped it off the next day. Would definitely rent again!
review_summary: Saturday night out in Vegas and got tons of compliments all night long!

review_text: This dress is perfect for gals with smaller waists and larger busts. My bust was too small to wear this comfortably, it would need to be taken in. The sparkles were amazing tho and the dress was fun and would have been a perfect night out for NYE if it had fit me properly.

I went to nyc for the wknd with my girlfriends for a bday celebration.  I wore this fun romper to dinner and to the Gansevoort rooftop bar. It was perfect for a summer night in the city.  I wore my regular black bra and hanky panky thongs (no undie lines).  I was able to eat and not feel so tight since the fit was loose but it was very short so it stayed on the sexy side especially with a pair of stilletto heels. The embellishment on the straps and back finished the look.  I would definitely rent this again!

It was so flattering, so perfect from a beach to dinner outfit on vacation on an island. It was also super flattering in that I ate a lot that day and I never felt insecure about anything. I got tons of compliments! I wore with sandals to the beach and with wedges to dinner.
review_summary: I could not love this romper more!

review_text: Great bright, vivid color. It runs a bit large as I usually wear a 2 and the 0 was still big in the waist. I added a belt to help define it, but some pictures I took from the side weren't very flattering because of this.
fits as it should.  A little long for me... I am 5'4" but I got compliments all night.  I actually want to buy this dress

I rented this dress for my trip to Las Vegas. This dress has an amazing color and I think the dress is true to size. The only negative thing is that it's very short when sitting down. Overall I loved it and would definitely wear it again!
review_summary: Great color.. very flattering.. loved it!

review_text: Loved this dress I wore a size 2, I can be between a 2 and a 4 and the 2 was perfect here. I wore this dress twice while on vacation, once out to dinner and once with Birkenstocks on a day trip wine tasting in Sonoma.  I preferred it as a day time look, it was so comfortable and I got so many compliments. The dress is very figure hugging but very flattering. The print is striking but I never felt it was too loud. My husband loved this dress.
review_summary: fabulous dress, one of my favorite rentals ever.

review_text: Great jumpsuit! I typically wear a 2R and followed others advice to size up, and am happy that I did because the 4R fit perfect. The cut-outs hit at the perfect spot, and overall it was very comfortable to wear. My boyfriend loved it as well and he doesn't always like "different" outfits like this. I highly recommend it!
review_summary: I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. Perfection!

review_text: This dress was great for a girls trip in Vegas... I usually wear a small or medium, and the small definitely had some room to spare (as it ran large). It wasn't THE most flattering dress I've ever worn as I felt like you could see every line and flaw on my body, and the sequins were kind of uncomfortable and scratchy on my arms, but overall... it was a perfect Vegas rental and I got a lot of compliments.
review_summary: Perfect for Vegas! Runs a little large

review_text: This dress is great as a beach cover-up or for everyday wear. It's flowy and the material is very comfortable.
review_summary: The perfect dress for the beach.

review_text: Rented this for my daughter who wore it to a family reunion activity and on vacation.  Nice material, lightweight and very fashionable.  Only thing a little big in chest area which we fixed with a small safety pin.
I got a ton of compliments and this dress was great in a warm environment. The pockets were great too as on resort all I needed was my phone not a purse. LOVED it!
review_summary: The color and fit are fantastic. Finally a dress that didn't need a bra and held everything in.

review_text: Don't size down!  The lining inside the dress is true to size.  I should have gotten a 4, you can see the bulge of the lining bunching up in this photo.  But fantastic dress, great color.
review_summary: Awesome color - loved wearing this dress

review_text: I wore this on vacation and got soo many compliments. It could be dressed down with espadrilles for day and dressed up with heels for night. It was lightweight and breathable but the lace was still thick and intricate. It fit perfectly. Love, love, love!

Loved the fit and feel of this jacket.  Very sexy.  Lots of compliments.  
Only cons are there are no side pockets which is annoying and the belt is sewn in so you can't remove it. Also the arms are tight.  Glad I sized up to a S instead of an XS.  The zipper under the wrist/forearm helps to expand the sleeve around the wrist if you're wearing a bulky sweater but if you have larger arms you may have trouble with this one.

I wore this dress on vacation recently in LA.  The material is on the heavy side and the lace is very beautiful and detailed in person.  The light lace is more of a pale pink color in person.  For a night out it was a little longer than I had hoped but this would be perfect for a wedding or charity function.  Fit was true to size and I had plenty of room to feel comfortable.

This dress was the most perfect dress for a trip to Miami. It was long enough that I didn't have to worry about the length even with heels. I didn't have to wear a bra, but the top of the skirt was a little tight and I would probably go up a size for my next order. I would definitely order again! I received dozens of compliments!
I wore this dress during a bachelorette weekend in Palm Springs! Super cute, fits well, no complaints. Dress it up or dress it down!
Very thick, sweatshirt-like material.  Vacationed in southern Florida and couldn't wear it because of the heat.

The fabric was thick and felt expensive. It was also good for travel because it didn't easily wrinkle. I liked that it didn't fit super snug, so I could dress it up with heels without feeling like I was wearing clubwear.
review_summary: I have an athletic frame and it fit me perfectly.

review_text: I got this dress for a recent vacation to Mexico and loved everything about it. The print is great, the cutouts are a nice touch and the flouncy overlay is interesting without being overpowering. The length was perfect - more of a maxi on me at 5'4".  I want to buy this dress but it is hard since I have unlimited and there is always something new to try. Still I am tempted! I will rent it again though for sure.
review_summary: J'adore this dress from Nanette Lepore!

review_text: I rented this to wear while in Vegas. It was fun, flattering, and sexy. Plus, it kept me warm and comfortable all night. I need to own this jumpsuit in my closet. I plan to rent it again for a future bachelorette party too. If I recall, the fit was a bit snug but I ended up wearing my normal size 6 anyway.
I loved this shirt and got many compliments!! Very comfortable!  It's a little longer in the back which makes the shirt a little sassy.  Would definitely recommend this shirt
This is a beautiful cover up. Its sexy and pretty, the bit of sparkle makes it special. I took it to Tahiti and I felt like it and I belonged there.

i'm typically a 4 and joie usually runs very large. i usually get an XS but opted for the S just in case and it worked out perfectly! it was easy, casual, looked great with brown booties and with flat sandals. also very easy to get out of for a jumpsuit. i had to wear a sports bra under, but it didn't take away from the overall look. hem hit mid thigh on me, but wasn't scandalous

This is a beautiful dress! The high neck is a very sophisticated feature, but is not constricting at all.  The lace on the sides is more pink than the picture lets on, but it's gorgeous, and the vertical panels are very slimming.  Sizing is pretty true to size.  I'm a almost always a 4, sizing up to a 6 for extra room in certain styles due to athletic legs and glutes.  The dress looks body-hugging, but I was pleased with the amount of stretch it contained without looking sloppy.  I wore with tights because I was out in cold weather, but would love to rent this again in warmer weather and wear without tights.
Wish it was tighter and shorter for my las vegas night out.
review_summary: Great, beautiful shine to this dress.

review_text: Everything fit except the waist was too tight.
review_summary: My husband said I looked beautiful with this dress.

review_text: This dress was so beautiful, it has an under layer (crinoline)that adds body to the skirt and awesome pockets in front.  I have a large butt and thighs and a small up body so i went with the 6 instead of the 8. The waist is quite high (I have a long torso), but otherwise it was a great dress. .
review_summary: Love this dress... My husband wanted me to buy it!

review_text: Fit was true to size.  Good length and you can tell its high quality.  The top didnt fit as well as I had hoped as a mom of 3 kids (if you know what i mean) -wished there was something more to "hold them up"- was much better standing than sitting but definitely not for the modest.

I loved wearing this dress!  It was so lightweight and comfortable, which was perfect for a hot summer night out.  It definitely runs large.  I typically wear an 8 and the small fit perfectly.  Only downside is that it was a touch short.  I'm 5'7" and had to wear flats.  The length might have been better if the sizing was right (i.e. if I wore a medium).  It does require a sticky bra.

I loved this dress!! I normally would probably order a M with a S as a back-up, but I went with other reviewers and sized down to the S and XS.  I could've gotten away with wearing the XS but it was a tad too short, so I went with the S instead. The dress was very comfortable and flattering. I wore it for a night out in Vegas with my friends to see Britney and it was perfect. Fair warning: you'll get lots of attention in this dress because it's completely eye-catching :)
review_summary: Wore this to see Britney in Vegas for my birthday! PERFECT!

review_text: I literally had to kiss this dress goodbye. It was THAT good. It is SO flattering and gorgeous.
Great for daytime wedding or wine tasting!
review_summary: Beautiful dress! Great movement and color

review_text: A little loose on the sleeves and very short, but perfect for Vegas!
review_summary: Perfect dress to see Britney in Vegas!

review_text: I wore this on Thanksgiving in Hawaii. It was the perfect dress for the occasion however I was not crazy about the fit. I wore the XS and felt like the top elastic part was too small, however a S would have been too big. The shoulder straps kept popping up off my shoulder and I was tugging at the bottom of the dress all night. I would not wear this again... Even though I loved the pockets :)
The dress was quite low cut for a large chest, but the dress was very flattering!

I rented this dress to take on a vacation to France (thanks, Unlimited!) and I worked really well for me. It traveled very nicely, no wrinkling. I wore it from a day of exploring to night at a nice dinner and found it to be comfortable and definitely in style with the fashions of Paris. It was a little big on me, more than enough room in the hips and the arm holes were too large - I didn't pack a black bra for some reason but, that would have minimized the issue. I used fashion tape and it worked okay. It's a fun dress that I was glad to be able to wear.
The dress was a true fit.  It was very slimming and complemented my body.  The sequins were hard to sit in though.
review_summary: The dress was at my hotel waiting for me when I arrived for vacation.

review_text: This is a  perfect summer top! i wore it in Las Vegas so it was perfect for the heat and for that sexy vibe :) would definitely rent it again.
Beautiful dress but does wrinkle a bit after sitting in a car.
I'm not normally a ruffles person, but this dress was great - the print is pretty & the style worked well.
It fit well and made me feel great! It was snug in the chest and made my small boobs look bigger. Win win all around!
review_summary: I wore this dress out to XS in Las Vegas and had a blast!

review_text: Beautiful dress, but did not wear due to the dress running a bit large

I rented the dress in both the 14 and the 16, and I wore the 14.  I am smaller on top than through my hips, and standing up this dress was fine. However, when I sat down, it was gaping on top. Even after two safety pins to keep the top from gaping and my bra from hanging out, I still couldn't get it to lay right. I did get rave reviews wearing the dress, and it is very forgiving through the hips. I recommend it, but if ladies are more pear-shaped like I am, I would try a different style.
review_summary: Loved the navy blue dress, but too small on top.

review_text: This dress is gorgeous in the way it flows when you walk or dance. The size was perfect. I'm 5'6" and the length in 2" heels was perfect. I would definitely rent this again.

This was a pretty dress and I didn't have to do much since it's cute on it's own. I ordered the L based on previous reviews and that I have a large bust (32FF). Button downs are the most challenging for me to wear.

Anyway, cute dress to wear on the weekend. Probably would rent again.

I brought this to Puerto Rico for my brother's wedding/mini vacation. It is AMAZING! It's light and flowy, and shows a bit of cleavage. The print is beautiful, and it goes from beach to dinner to the bar effortlessly. RENT THIS!
No details to submit.
The jacket is adorable and perfect for a casual fall day/night out. Sleeves run a bit tight but be careful sizing up as the body of the jacket is trapeze-like and may fit wider than you'd like.
Dress just didn't do much for me, in my mind - BUT I did get compliments all night long and people raved about it. Wouldn't rent again, but it was a cute one time dress!
review_summary: Wish I Could Give it 3.5 stars, 3 seems too harsh

review_text: Beautiful fitting jumpsuit and very comfortable. It was much too long for me (5' 3") so I used fashion tape to shorten to appropriate length. Also wore spanx underneath to smooth things out. Would rent again, very versatile piece.

I loved the print and style of this dress - it's airy and lovely. A great transition to fall piece. However unfortunately, it was just too big for me. The length and everything was fine, but even in a Size 0 it fit like a bag. The bust was too large and as a result the sides hung off me. Definitely would have ordered another size down if it was an option!
This dress was perfect for Vegas!  It was the perfect length and so comfortable to wear! I will for sure be renting this little number again!

I had been wanting to rent this all summer but wanted the perfect occasion. This dress was perfect to bring on my vacation to Florida and to wear on a boat. The size available was a size up from what I usually wear but it still fit well. Unlike the other reviews I didn't feel the need to pin the top shut, but it is interesting how many slits and how low cut it is. The closure of this dress with the oversize hook and two snaps was also different. Overall the fit of the dress was perfect and wearing it made me never want summer to end!

Rented this dress in a M for NYE in Jamaica. I am 5'11" and about 150lbs. It was perfect for the occasion. You'll need to wear a racerback or strapless bra but not spanx or any additional undergarments needed. The material smooths you out and holds you in in all the right places!

This dress was so much fun and so comfortable! The lace is classy, and the scalloped trim made it extra fun. I wore this for a rehearsal dinner BBQ in California. It was versatile enough, and comfortable enough, to sit in for a nice meal and participate in an all-out waterfight without any complications or technical difficulties. Lots of compliments -- definitely recommend.
The colors on this dress are even more eye-popping than they are in this picture. I love this dress!
review_summary: Even more beautiful in real life

review_text: The reason this shirt works is because it's heavy. You don't want a sequined shirt like this to cling to your body, and this one hangs perfectly. It's a tad on the large size, but most ladies will be able to order true to size, so long as you're not spending a lot of time leaning over. I will warn you—this shirt is not ideal for warm weather or aerobic activities. You really feel the weight of it after an hour or two of dancing in a warm room!

I rented this romper in a small for my beach vacation and it fit perfectly. The material is super lightweight, which was perfect for the 80-degree temps. The pattern of this romper made it even more fun to wear out on Cinco de Mayo. The top can be worn off the shoulder or not; I switched it up throughout the night!
review_summary: Comfy, cute and cool for hot temps!

review_text: Incredibly comfortable and flattering, especially for those with athletic shoulders.  I loved everything about this dress.  It was perfect for our vacation beach photo shoot!
Bright colors and unique design make this a great day to evening vacation dress.  Tons of compliments.

I rented this during the summer for a trip to NYC and wore it to brunch with friends and while walking through the city. It's light, flowy and extremely comfortable - I absolutely loved it (especially because it was nearly 90 degrees outside).

It does have a loose shape, so I paired it with a belt to define the waistline - other than that though it's a gorgeous dress.

The pastel colors make this piece perfect for spring or summer, and it is lined so the white is versatile. This would be great for a baby shower, brunch, Mother's Day etc.
I wore this in Paris to dinner, it was perfect! I will say it will keep you warm, it was a little tight around my chest but I was able to zip..
I have wide hips so this dress makes me look a little wider than I would like. Regardless the top is flattering that I felt confident wearing it. This would be perfect for a spring or summer wedding.
review_summary: Gorgeous spring dress, the top is so flattering.

review_text: Fit really nice. A little baggy in the stomach area, but it comes with a matching belt.

I rented 2 sizes, XS and S. I guess they didn't have the Small, because I only received XS in this. It WAS tight, but I was able to squeeze into it!!! I didn't like the other dress they sent as a back up small. But I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat!!! If you're curvy, I think this dress is perfect. Got tons of compliments. Get some strappy shoes to wear with it!!
review_summary: This dress is just the right amount of sexy. Perfect for my trip to Miami.

review_text: I usually wear a size 4 but this dress runs a little bit small so I had to go with my back up size which is a size 6. The dress came in a perfect condition. The fabric is a little bit hard so it hugs all your curves. You don't need corset. I got lots of compliments from people at the street that I don't even know. I think the length is so classy. I wore the dress with 4" heels and it was a little bit shorter than my knee. I definitely recommend this dress.
review_summary: Perfect dress for going to a show in Las Vegas

review_text: I really liked this dress. I've packed on some lbs over the past year so I ordered the M and L and ended up wearing the Large. Quite honestly, I could have worn the XL. The dress was fitted and beautiful. Up close, the sequins were black, silver and wine/burgundy and the details were beautiful. The dress was a tad heavy but not uncomfortable but there was a slight issue of scratches under my arms, specifically my left arm.
review_summary: Sequin dress night was a hit!

review_text: I rent it for Disney World to look like cinderella,  and yet be cool and casual. It would have worked but it ran rather small in the chest, so it wouldn't button appropriately.
Very hard to wear because the shoulders are super stiff. Cannot move arms if worn the way it's described in the pictures. Gets awkward if it's not worn that way so kind of difficult to wear.
